title: Allow adding a user(s) to MULTIPLE PROJECTS
body_text: There is a major need to be able to add a new hire to many projects in ACC. Instead of wasting my time opening each project and manually adding a new user to 20 projects, we need a tool that will automate this process! Seems like it would be a pretty basic feature. This feature was brought up in the BIM360 forum SIX (6) years ago and was marked as Under Review 2 weeks after submission, ZERO response/feedback from Autodesk since... BIM 360 Docs - Add New User to Multiple Projects - Autodesk Commu

title: Increase Submittals Assignee Limit Beyond 10 Users
body_text: Currently, Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) limits the number of assignees per Submittal to a maximum of 10 users. For large-scale construction projects, this limitation creates significant workflow challenges. We strongly request increasing this limit to at least 30 individual assignees. Background & Problem Statement ACC Submittals are designed to track review status per individual assignee, which is a very valuable capability for accountability and auditability. However, the current limitati

title: Measure coordinate XYZ in 3D view
body_text: Introducing a tool to identify coordinates in 3D models would be highly beneficial. For instance, enabling the cursor to pinpoint a location and provide its coordinates, similar to the functionality in Navisworks , would greatly assist in various tasks and verifications that require precise data from the 3D model within the ACC.

title: ACC (Autodesk Docs) - Markups need improving
body_text: The markups in Autodesk Docs are terrible. BIM 360 Docs Markups are far superior. Put simply, we need BIM 360 Markups in Autodesk Docs. Autodesk Docs Markups: Require more clicks to do the same thing; the UI is not as good as BIM 360. Currently creates individual 'markups' for each drawing element. BIM 360 does this so much better by allowing multiple drawing elements to be added (grouped) into a single 'markup', for easier tracking. For the previous reason, the new Markups Panel (found on the l

title: Folder Permissions option to REMOVE Inherited Permissions
body_text: I would like the ability to control permissions on sub folders outside of what is inherited. For example, I give everyone EDIT access at the Project Files level, but we have some folders deep inside the project we want to remove full access and only VIEW access. Currently we cannot do this.

title: Organize Photos into Folders
body_text: To improve the functionality of Autodesk Build, photos should have a folder organization system. Currently, photos cannot be moved into folders or have folders created within them for proper sorting. Introducing this feature would greatly enhance the ability to group and organize files effectively.

title: Automate the "description" field values in ACC Docs when uploading documents to streamline user workflow.
body_text: Upon document upload, automate the generation of a brief description based on file content or metadata. Users can quickly identify uploaded documents without manual input through filtering metadata by using the Attributes from the Search Function, saving time and effort. Example: My Native Revit Sheet is named "FRA01_ENER_XX_01_SP_AR_0001-GroundFloorElectrical" when uploading to ACC Docs using Enforced Naming Convention, the Sheet should be split according to the enforced Attributes FRA01, ENER,

title: Naming Standard available in ACC Templates
body_text: Currently we are unable to apply naming standards to files/folders in an ACC template. Adding to the template will allow us to apply it once and have it carry over to all new projects.

title: Permission for Photos
body_text: Hi ACC team, I’d like to suggest adding a permission feature for photos where visibility can be restricted to specific roles or groups—such as allowing only the management team to view certain images, while hiding them from subcontractors. This would help manage sensitive content more efficiently and ensure only relevant stakeholders have access. Thanks for considering this!

title: Design Collaboration Publish Schedule
body_text: Currently, only weekly publishing is supported. Please expand this option to include at least Daily schedule or custom scheduling multiple times a day of possible. We are trying to push out the latest Revit updates to ACC without the users having to perform this manually. Weekly is just not enough. Thank you

title: Integrate Full Microsoft Office Online Experience in ACC (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
body_text: Autodesk must fully integrate the latest Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) functionality into Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) to streamline collaboration and eliminate outdated workflows. Key Features Needed: Create New Office Files Directly in ACC Users should be able to create Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files natively within ACC — without needing to upload or copy files through Desktop Connector or other workarounds. Native Microsoft Integration with Open Options Just like in ShareP

title: Multiple section creation in the ACC viewer
body_text: It would be helpful for userbility if several sections could be created simultaneously in the ACC viewer. This would make it easier to navigate in the model and thus increase the imagination. Furthermore, the area could also be cropped so that this area can be displayed.

title: ACC Markups tools, and ACC PDF Viewer - Improvements Required
body_text: There are a couple of issues with the Markup tools and the ACC PDF viewer. I would like to address these concerns in the hope that all of the tools get improved. Problem Statement ACC Markup tools The current set of Markup Tools leave much to be desired. The main issue around the use of the markup tools is that they are clunky and not intuitive . Users who are new to the ACC platform do not want to use them because similar tools from programs such as PDF xChange simply work better and are easier

title: Notifications on the web page instead of multiple emails
body_text: Instead sending emails, have an option to see all notifications on web. Not like the current My Home with dashboards, but more like a list of up-to-date chronological messages that is relevant to the user.

title: Build - Photos bulk edit
body_text: Editing, deleting, aplying tags is something that is only possible to do one by one in the Photos tab in Build. This can be very time consuming, there should be a way to edit the photos in bulk.

title: View all projects to which a user is assigned in Company ACC
body_text: In BIM 360 Admin portal we have the ability to see when selecting an individual user any project that person is assigned to in our portal and what their access level assigned is. We would like to have this same feature in ACC. We don't need to see every project that user is assigned to only the ones that are associated with our portal.

title: Manual SYNC button in Desktop Connector App
body_text: Currently, the syncronisation happens in the background with limited feedback. For a bulk upload of data, sometimes the upload seemed to have stalled. It would be nice to still have a manual sync button to force the synchronisation process.

title: Project List - Adding custom attributes to allow us to search/filter/organize projects better
body_text: Please allow custom attributes for projects in ACC. This would help us with long projects names and enable us to use attributes like "Client" Project Type" "Location"

title: Automated Reminder Email for Overdue items (RFI, Submittal, Issue)
body_text: We need an option to toggle on an automated (scheduled) email reminder for items in the different modules at different time frames. F For example, as a Document Controller, you need to automatically trigger an email to an Engineer when an RFI response or Submittal review is due within 5 days, another when it is due in 3 days, and then daily once it is overdue. Many users would benefit from an email to prompt them to take action. This is helpful in the interim until users are accustomed to workin

title: Allow adding of project logo image to an ACC project
body_text: Very basic, but the ability to easily update the project image needs to be implemented. In lieu of another way to communicate to the whole team what the Revit year is (aside from file name), we use the project logo. The current workaround is ridiculous or doesn't work . https://www.autodesk.com/support/technical/article/caas/sfdcarticles/sfdcarticles/Cannot-add-a-project-image-to-an-ACC-project.html#:~:text=Click%20Projects.,an%20image%20for%20the%20logo .

title: Export overview of all granted permissions per folder
body_text: It's very important for companies who don't always use the same template with the same folders and permissions, to have a clear overview of 'who has permission to what'. Now, you have to go to each folder to check the permission settins individually, if you have a lot of folders (named with numbers of similar names), it can get quite confusing. Like the file log export function, it should also have an export function showing all the permissions granted (per person, role or company) per folder in

title: フォームの回答項目ごとに自由記入欄を設けてほしい（I would like a free entry field to be added for each response item in the form.）
body_text: 回答項目（YES/NOなど）を選択した際の根拠となる理由を記載できるように、それぞれに自由記入欄があることが望ましいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ It is desirable to have a free-form field for each answer item (e.g., YES/NO) so that you can write the reasons behind your choice.

title: Specifications - Export feature
body_text: Love the newest module, Specifications, however we would like the ability to export it in a clean format, just like other ACC modules offer. Please add ASAP. Thank you!

title: Add Members By Company
body_text: At my firm, we tend to have everyone in the company on each project. This can be a pain when we get a new hire and I have to add them to each project. It would be easier if they were just automatically added when I add them to the company rather than me having to go to each project and add their email one by one. We do this because we often have coworkers who will help on any project if someone is out, and I can't limit the projects to only the people working on them. It wouldn't work at my firm

title: ACC BUILD - PHOTOS
body_text: In ACC Build - photos .... PLEASE add the possibility to organize photos in subfolders. Also, a button to delete multiple photos at once in bulk.

title: Specifications - ability to delete sections
body_text: Currently, to delete a specification section in Autodesk Build, users are required to delete the entire set it was a part of and reupload the specifications without the section. This process is both time-consuming and inefficient. I propose adding a "delete" button within the "edit section details" menu. This will allow users to delete individual specification sections directly, eliminating the need for reuploading and saving time.

title: ACC Viewer - Make PDFs documents scrollable
body_text: It would be great if pdfs could work as pdfs in any other software and we could scroll through them. We have process documents and all sorts of pdfs that are many many pages long and finding stuff there is horrible when you have to click each page and scrolling through is not possible. It is also weird that because of this behavior the pdf documents cant even be printed, because the system would only print one page. The only solution is the download and than print. Or sync the project with DC to

title: Set tags and locations on multiple photos at the same time
body_text: In the photo viewer multiple photos can be selected at the same time, but they can not be edited. When multiple photos are selected the "filter" dialog should be hidden and the combined properties for the selected photos should be shown (the same as it is in Revit). With multiple photos selected the location and tags should be able to be edited. Tags and locations are very powerful tools, but are a hard to use when each photo (and there may be hundreds taken in a visit) has to have tags/location

title: フォームのグルーピング表示（iPad）　【Form grouping display (iPad)】
body_text: PC版ではフォルダごとにフォームが表示され、該当項目を検索しやすいですが、iPadではフォームが一覧で表示されるため、必要なものを探すのが困難です。PC版と同様にカテゴリごとに分かれた表示にしていただけると、選択しやすくなります。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ On the PC version, forms are displayed by folder, making it easier to search for relevant items. However, on the iPad, forms are shown in a list view, which makes it difficult to find what is needed. If the display could be categorized like the PC version, it would make selection much easier.

title: Hide closed issues by default
body_text: Closed issues should be filtered-out by default in the issue list as they are usually don't require further activity.

title: ACC - Build - Form - attaching Folder to Smart PDF Form
body_text: Our company extensively works with the Forms and Files modules in the same time in Autodesk, we would like to suggest to attach the Specific Folder (from Project) to the Fillable PDF Forms. This could be attach through the "Add References" component. This would be so helpful for everyone who are working with the Fillable PDF forms to have this option. This will give to everyone a great opportunity to open the linked folder directly from the Form and add any Construction support files. As example

title: ACC Docs - Permission Settings: Linking Companies and Roles for Scalable Permission Control
body_text: Following the ISO 19650 folder structure for large civil and infrastructure projects, correctly assigning folder permissions is essential. Currently, this process is challenging because there is no way to link the assigned user’s company with their role. Creating ISO 19650-based roles is not desirable, as it would result in an excessive number of roles, reducing clarity. In the worst case, permissions would need to be assigned individually to users. To address this, it would be highly beneficial

title: Build>Photos Tool>Permission
body_text: Hi ACC Team, Suggesting adding permission setting for Photos like in the folder structure to control and access and visibility and add manage assignment to other members rather than limiting the access to Project Admin only. It will also be good to have a foldering/collection function to easily manage the uploaded Photos/Videos.

title: Allow "Descriptions" to be added to folders
body_text: It would be great it "Descriptions" could be added to folders. This way we could show the intent of our folder structure to less familiar / external project team members .

title: Custom Project Fields
body_text: Our company would like a way to add custom fields to the project level data (meta data). This would support project assignments and tracking through various stages. Our business as a manufacturing facility, we manage hundreds of projects at any given time. We assign key project roles that are not easily identifiable with project membership or membership roles. Something similar to the custom fields capability in the RFI or Submittal templates with the same capability. This would also improve our

title: Scrollable PDFs
body_text: For example, in Sheets, we're not able to scroll through pages. To go to the next pages, you have to click on the thumbnails one by one. Could you make pdfs scrollable? It'd be much easier to navigate through them.

title: フォームの記載内容の表示範囲改善（Improvement of the display range for form content）
body_text: 指摘事項の参照先にフォームを紐づけた際、フォームに記載された確認内容が隠れている状態になっているため、表示に手間がかかっています。一目で確認内容を把握できるように、あらかじめ全て見える状態にしておき、ワンクリックで表示・非表示を切り替えられるようにしてほしいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ When a form is linked as a reference for a reported issue, the confirmation details written in the form are hidden, which makes it cumbersome to view them. To make it easier to grasp the content at a glance, I would like all the information to be visible by default, with a one-click toggle to show or hide the details.

title: シートを閲覧しながら同期処理を行えるようにしてほしい（I would like to be able to perform synchronization while viewing the sheet.）
body_text: 複数人で同時にシートを閲覧して編集する場合があるため、即座に同期できることが望ましいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ Since multiple people may view and edit the sheet simultaneously, it is desirable for synchronization to occur instantly.

title: 撮影した写真の自動保存ができるようにしてほしい（I want to be able to automatically save the photos I take.）
body_text: 指摘事項に写真を参照する際、撮影後に【次へ】ボタンを押す工程が必要となっており、そのため保存を忘れやすいです。シャッターボタンを押したら一時保存され、必要な写真を後から選択できる環境が望ましいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ When referring to photos for issues, it is necessary to press the [Next] button after taking the photo, which makes it easy to forget to save it. It would be ideal if the photo was saved temporarily when the shutter button was pressed, and the necessary photo could be selected later.

title: 写真に電子黒板をつけられるようにしてほしい（I would like to be able to attach a digital blackboard to photos.）
body_text: 日本の写真管理には黒板に検査内容を記したものを添付する必要があるため、写真に電子黒板を合成できるようにしてほしいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ In Japan's photo documentation practices, it is necessary to attach a blackboard showing inspection details. Therefore, I would like to be able to overlay a digital blackboard onto photos.

title: レポート出力時のリンクの有無を選択できるようにしてほしい（I would like to be able to choose whether or not to include a link when outputting a report.）
body_text: ACCを利用していない人にレポートを渡す場面もあるため、リンクの有無を選択できるようにしてほしいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ Since there are cases where reports are shared with people who do not use ACC, I would like to be able to choose whether or not to include links in the report.

title: 写真の保存または追加の確認機能（Photo saving or additional confirmation function）
body_text: 保存忘れをする方が多いため、×ボタンを押した後に確認を促す画面が表示されるようにしてほしいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ Since many people forget to save photos, I would like a screen to appear asking for confirmation after pressing the x button.

title: 検索機能の向上（Enhancement of search functionality）
body_text: 文字の全角・半角に関わらず検索でヒットするようにしてほしい。操作する人により入力方法が違うため、該当するバリエーションを増やしたい。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ I want the search to return results regardless of whether the characters are full-width or half-width. Since input methods vary depending on the user,I want to increase the number of applicable variations.

title: フォームの参照先に追加できるデータ形式の拡大（Expanded data formats that can be added to form references）
body_text: フォームの参照先に追加できるのは現状写真のみであるが、写真で状態を共有する以外にも、仕様を伝える書類や検査データを紐づける場面などが想定されるため、エクセルやPDFも追加できるようにしてほしい。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ Currently, only photos can be added as references in the form, but there are situations where documents conveying specifications or inspection data need to be linked in addition to sharing conditions through photos. Therefore, I would like to be able to add Excel and PDF files as well.

title: 指摘事項のステータス変更の反映速度の向上（Please Improved speed of issue items status changes）
body_text: 指摘事項のステータスを変更した際、ステータスに対応した色が反映されません。即時に変更後のステータスに対応した色が反映されるように改善してほしいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ When I change the status of a issues items , the color corresponding to the status is not reflected. I would like this to be improved so that the color corresponding to the changed status is reflected immediately.

title: 参照先の写真に付与したタグの視覚化（Visualization of tags added to referenced photos）
body_text: 参照先に追加した写真をタグで分類した際、現状では指摘事項の画面にタグが表示されません。どのタグが付けられているかを画面上で確認できるようにすることで、直感的な理解がしやすい環境にしたいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ When you add a photo to a reference and classify it with a tag, the tag is not currently displayed on the issue screen. I would like to be able to see which tags have been added on the screen, making it easier to understand intuitively.

title: Allow to pin Favorite Projects to project list
body_text: Without removing project from project list. I would like to pin or favorite the project I'm currently working on to avoid scrolling and seeking for the project when I have a long list of available project. I would also prefer to hid projects from view without deactivating them.

title: フォームテンプレートの選択時に直近で使用したものを表示してほしい（Please  I would like the most recently used form templates to be displayed when selecting a form template.）
body_text: 同じ工種・検査内容の対象となる工区が多い場合、連続で登録できる状態だと使用しやすいです。そのため、フォームテンプレートを選択する際に直近で使用したテンプレートを一覧に表示してほしいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ When there are many construction sections that are subject to the same type of work and inspection content, it would be easier to use if they could be registered consecutively. Therefore, when selecting a form template, I would like the most recently used template to be displayed in a list.

title: 指摘事項のステータスの名称変更と項目の追加（Issue status name change and  items added.）
body_text: ステータス名称の変更および追加をユーザーが自由に設定できるようにしてほしいです。これにより、活用方法とステータス名称の不一致を防止し、利用者が直感的に使用できる環境を目指したいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ I would like to be able to freely change and add status names to the system. This will prevent discrepancies between usage and status names, and create an environment that users can use intuitively.

title: Bulk edit Account and Project Members details
body_text: Existing members in both the Account Members list and the Project Members list can only be updated one member at a time. This is very time consuming when manually updating a large number of members on either member lists. Bulk editing member details is already possible when adding new members to a project. Please add the same functionality for members that have already been added. Request summary: Enable the bulk editing feature from adding new members to all member lists. Impact: Improves and a

title: 保存される写真サイズの統一（ Please unification the size of saved photos）
body_text: 撮影時の写真と指摘事項に表示される写真のサイズが異なるため、統一してほしいです。現場で必要な部分のみを撮影して記録として残したいのですが、撮影時と異なる範囲で保存されると使い勝手が悪く、不備も生じやすくなります。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ I would like the photo size to be unification, as the size of the photo taken and the one displayed in the identified issues differ. On-site, we aim to capture and record only the necessary areas, but if the saved photo covers a different range than what was originally taken, it becomes less user-friendly and increases the risk of errors.

title: レポート出力時の撮影者の名称横に役割も表示されるようにしてほしい（I would like the role of the photographer to be displayed next to the photographer's name when the report is output.）
body_text: 撮影者の立場が明確になるように、参照した写真の出力結果に撮影者の役割情報も表示できるようにしてほしいです。現状では撮影者の名前しか表示されず、大人数の現場では撮影者の役割（監理者 or 管理者）の把握ができない状況になっています。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ I would like to be able to display the photographer's role information in the output of the reference photo, so that the photographer's position can be clarified. Currently, only the photographer's name is displayed, so in the case of a large number of people on site, it is difficult to determine the photographer's role (supervisor or

title: 指摘事項のフィルタに絞り込んだ属性ごとの該当数を表示してほしい（I would like to display the number of relevant items for each attribute, filtered by the identified issues.）
body_text: 現状ではシート上に配置されている指摘事項の全体数しか表示されていません。ステータスやタイプでフィルタをかけた場合に、該当する指摘事項の数を表示することで、詳細の理解をしやすくしてほしいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ At present, the sheet only displays the total number of identified issues. To improve clarity and understanding, I would appreciate it if the number of issues matching the applied filters—such as status or type—could also be displayed.

title: レポート出力の言語を自由に選択できるようにしてほしい（I want to be able to freely select the language for report output.）
body_text: テンプレートとして言語設定をできないため、アドミン権限保持者が都度変更を行う状況になっています。そのため、操作ユーザーごとにレポートの出力言語を選択できるようにしてほしいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ Since it is not possible to set the language as a template, administrators have to change it each time. Therefore, I would like to be able to select the report output language for each operating user.

title: アップロードした資料上にフォームを配置したい(I would like to place interactive form fields on top of the uploaded document.)
body_text: 指摘事項と同様の形式で図面上にフォームを配置し、図面を確認しながらフォームの内容確認やステータスの更新ができるようにしてほしいです。現状では、指摘事項を配置してから指摘事項にフォームを紐づける必要があり、各紐づけ作業に多くのタップが必要で時間がかかっています。 ========================================================================================================== I would like to place form fields on the drawings in the same format as the issue items, so that users can review the drawings while checking the form contents and updating their status. Currently, we need to place the issue items first and then manually link ea

title: Batch photo location & tags
body_text: You should be able to select multiple photos and assign a common location or tag so they can be filtered at a later stage in construction. Furthermore if you are creating an issue and have assigned the issue a location, this information should automatically be assigned to the photo. Currently the photo section is not what it should be and clients are taking photos in folders so as to organise them as they wish. This is very frustrating and one I believe competitors can fix easily thus giving the

title: Meetings Should Create an Outlook/Teams Calendar Item
body_text: Adding a video conference link doesn't create a calendar entry in Teams or Zoom. This should be changed to allow for users to get calendar invites like they would for a normal meeting. Currently, I would have to download an .ics file and sync the event to my calendar which becomes a headache when there are multiple meetings.

title: Multiple page PDF navigation
body_text: To review a PDF with multiple pages in Docs, you have to go through each page individually, which can be time-consuming and impractical. It would be helpful to have a solution or an option to enable a PDF reading experience similar to Acrobat Reader, where you can quickly navigate through the document using the scroll wheel to slide through pages.

title: ズームアップ状態を維持したままシートを切り替えられるようにしてほしい（It would be helpful if the zoom level could be preserved when switching between sheets.）
body_text: シートを切り替えるとズームアップ状態がリセットされるため、詳細を確認する際に毎回拡大操作が必要になります。オプションとして、ズームアップを維持した状態でシートの切り替えができるようにしてほしいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ When switching between sheets, the zoomed-in view resets, which requires manually zooming in again each time to check the details. I would like an option to keep the zoom level maintained when switching sheets.

title: タブレット端末を使用した撮影時のシャッターボタンの位置を変更してほしい（I would like to request a change in the position of the shutter button when taking photos using a tablet device.）
body_text: 横向きで使用した際、画面中央の下にシャッターボタンが配置されるため撮影しにくいです。iPhoneやiPadのデフォルトカメラと同じ位置にシャッターボタンを配置してください。ツールによってシャッターボタンの位置が異なると利用者が使いづらくなります。特に、iPadでACCアプリを使用する際、タブレットを横にするとシャッターボタンが下に配置されており、押しにくいです。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ When using the device in landscape mode, the shutter button is positioned at the bottom center of the screen, which makes it difficult to take photos. Please position the shutter button in the same location as the default camera on iPhone or iPad. If the shutter button

title: Show file description on ACC in file explorer through Desktop Connector
body_text: With the file name being a file naming convention, and the file plain language name being in the description field on ACC, however it is not visible in file explorer through Desktop Connector. When faced with 100 pdf's it's near impossible for users to remember the codes to find the relevant drawing. As it's not only company standard naming conventions users need to learn but various clients' standards too. We enter the information already, would make a huge difference if the information was sho

title: チーム管理方法の機能追加提案
body_text: post translated to English (using google translate) When selecting personnel in various situations, "company", "role", and "individual" may be used, but it is difficult to manage each team using these three functions. Specifically, there are the following issues. ・It is difficult to set each member as “company”, “role” or “individual” on ACC every time ・Some teams cannot be controlled by role or company ・There are various teams for each project For this reason, project admin I would like to be a

title: Filtering by name or subject in meetings
body_text: The possibility of filtering by meeting name would help a lot in the meetings/build module. Today we can only filter by date and status. When I need to find a meeting, I have to go through several pages to find it.

title: Archive Markups
body_text: I know that on the ACC platform, we have the option to publish and unpublish markups, however, this somehow prevents the team from keeping track of all the activity around reviews and document corrections within Files or Sheets, since only the creator can see the unpublished markups. I think it's a good idea to have this option that already exists in BIM 360.

title: Modelle Coordination: Store a model coordination view point direct in meeting notes
body_text: It would be nice to link a view point of Modell Coordination direct in meeting notes. That would help the users to improve the meeting speed (and handling) and skip the discussion on drawings.

title: Adding New Member to a Project in ACC/BIM360
body_text: When adding new users on the ACC or BIM360 platforms, it is necessary to add them individually by logging into each project. In the account management section, we request the creation of a dashboard structure where users can be assigned to projects in bulk (by ticking them). Do you have any alternative methods to simplify this process?

title: New Custom Field Type: Multi Selection (Issue Module)
body_text: Situation Currently, a separate custom field must be created in the “Issues” module for each possible property in order to allow multiple selections. Example: For a project with seven disciplines (e.g. Electrical, HVAC, Architecture, Plumbing, Building Automation, Laboratory, Process), seven individual fields are currently required — each with the possible values Yes or No . If only four disciplines are relevant (e.g. Electrical, HVAC, Laboratory, Process), all seven fields still need to be crea

title: シートの削除権限を持つ役割を増やしてほしい（I'd like to see more roles with sheet deletion permissions.）
body_text: 【管理者】権限を持つ人しか削除できないため、【編集】権限でも削除できるようにしてほしいです。運用の中でアドミン権限者が削除を行わなければならず、専任の方を配置する必要があるため、アドミン権限者の業務が増加する原因となっています。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ Only those with [Administrator] privileges can delete files, so I would like to see it made possible for those with [Edit] privileges to do so as well. This requires that only those with administrator privileges delete files, which means that a dedicated person needs to be assigned, which increases the workload of those with administra

title: 【指摘事項】フィールドの必須表示項目も非表示にできるようにしたい（[issue items] I want to be able to hide required display items in fields as well.）
body_text: ユーザーが必要と思う項目のみ表示できるよう、柔軟に設定できるようにしてほしいです。現状ではデフォルトで非表示にできない項目があり、利用したくない項目も表示されてしまうため、利用者が困惑する原因となっています。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ I would like to see more flexibility in the settings so that users can display only the items they need. Currently, there are items that cannot be hidden by default, and items that users do not want to use are displayed, which causes confusion for users.

title: Add Automated Reminders for Issues, Reviews, Forms, Schedules, and Tasks in Meetings
body_text: Autodesk must implement automated reminders for the following elements within Autodesk Construction Cloud: Issues Reviews Forms Schedules Tasks in Meetings These reminders should notify users when due dates are approaching — for example, 3 days in advance — and must be customizable (e.g., timeframes, notification method). This is not a “nice-to-have” feature — it is a basic, expected function of any professional Common Data Environment (CDE). The lack of reminders creates unnecessary risk, misse

title: Nested Links need to resolve paths when publishing/packaging/bridging
body_text: Many companies use nested links, and when bridging projects the nested links in a main model do not resolve their pathing when received by an external company so they do not display. Please allow nested link paths to be able to auto-resolve when using Bridge.

title: ACC - Upload folders/folder trees via the web interface
body_text: This is a must have. ADC does not hack it for this task. The ability to upload multiple folders or folder trees and all their sub-folders and files via the web interface. Generally, the web interface is much faster uploading files than the clunky ADC and Windows File Explorer route.

title: Ability to Rotate Photos and view in Desktop Connector on ACC
body_text: Dear Autodesk Team: Could a feature be added for the ability to rotate photos on ACC? If a photo is uploaded to ACC without the proper orientation (horizontal vs vertical), there seems to be no way to correct it on the ACC Website (without downloading/deleting/re-uploading). If this ability to rotate photos could be added to both the web version and the mobile app, it would be very beneficial for all users of the new photos module in ACC. During our initial testing we were unable to find a way t

title: ACC VIEWER ISSUE ON/OFF BUTTON
body_text: it would be nice to have in the bottom bar a button able to turn on/off the visualization of all the ISSUE pinpoints in the viewer. because when they are a lot, they make it hard the navigation. right now i need to filter by some "fake" parameter in order to clean the view

title: ACC Review
body_text: To add few simple additions to speed up the process of marking up on ACC: Shortcuts for commands (callouts, clouds, arrows etc) Auto-resize of the text box (every single new callout requires manual resizing). Have the option to set markups to be automatically Published once created. Saves a click every time. Multileader callouts. Different hatches beyond simple solid color. Ability to independently change sizes of arrows and thicknesses. Being able to paste photos onto a sheet in ACC.

title: Adding a watermark to documents downloaded from Docs
body_text: Add the possibility of inserting the user's name and the time of the action (watermarks) they took on the document (downloaded, printed, shared the file, etc.) in each .pdf file (be it a bim - rvt or dwg model board, or a normal .pdf) that is in the CDE. This possibility could be enabled and disabled by the project administrator via a toggle button. Here is an example of a mounted image.

title: Favorite projects on the start page
body_text: In addition to the search bar on the ACC start page, it would be practical if you could mark projects as favorites. These should then always be displayed at the top of the list of projects.

title: Export markups with sheets
body_text: English: I want to be able to check whether there are any points raised in the sheet list. It would be convenient to be able to export findings and markup-related information to the sheet log. Japanese: シート一覧で指摘事項があるか確認出来るようにしたい シートログに指摘事項とマークアップ関係の情報も書き出せるようになると便利

title: Offline Mode for Revit cloudmodels in ACC
body_text: Context: Recently, a disruption in the Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) environment caused users to lose access to their Revit models, making it impossible to continue working locally. This highlighted the need for a fallback mechanism to ensure continuity during cloud outages. Proposal: Introduce an Offline Mode within the Autodesk Construction Cloud platform working with cloud models. The system should: Default to Cloud Connection: Users work with a live connection to the cloud, ensuring real

title: Add Option for Changing Review Initiator in ACC Reviews
body_text: when the review initiator goes on leave, leaves the company, or moves to another project, there is currently no way to transfer ownership of the review to another user. This situation disrupts our workflow, causes delays, and sometimes forces us to cancel and restart reviews from scratch. We kindly request that you consider adding a feature that allows the review initiator to be changed during an active review, or to enable project administrators to transfer review ownership . Such a feature wou

title: Remove members in Bulk from projects
body_text: There are unfortunately no checkboxes in the members tab to remove multimple members from a project. It would make it a lot easier to not have to press the 3 dots and hit delete 10+ times. 🙂

title: PDF Publish and Custom Attributes
body_text: Similar to how the Build Module allows you to search content inside of a PDF to populate sheet numbers and descriptions would be great to carry into Docs and allow that data to be recognized and linked to a custom attribute. An example would be where removing a PDF sheet description from the file name and adding it to a custom attribute under description. This would help reduce long files names. Another idea would be to read a Revision area on a titleblock and apply that revision delta number or

title: Point cloud integration with 3D models in ACC (Integración de nube de puntos con modelos 3D en ACC)
body_text: Dear All. Using Point Cloud information is becoming more and more necessary due to the great help it offers by capturing the reality of existing facilities and being able to integrate with 3D models of structures, architecture, etc. Currently we can say that the Navisworsk and Recap Pro software are the software that allows us to easily and quickly carry out all the integration of 3D models with the point cloud. Integrating the 3D Models with the point cloud in ACC would be excellent to avoid im

title: Enable Excel Upload as a Form Template Source in Autodesk Build
body_text: Overview Today, Autodesk Build Forms only support the creation of interactive forms through manual field creation or by uploading a PDF. However, many construction workflows rely heavily on Excel-based templates that include formulas, conditional logic, predefined data structures, and standardized layouts. When attempting to convert these Excel files into PDF to use them in Autodesk Build, much of this logic is lost. Problem Our teams frequently work with Excel templates that are already validat

title: ACC better integrate with MS Teams
body_text: Hello, A lot of customers use MS Teams (more and more) to manage some project. It will be great to better integrate ACC to MS Steams. For instance, instead of sending emails when something changes or issues arise, prefer sending messages via Microsoft Teams. The benefit is faster visibility, better collaboration, and reduced inbox clutter. Voila Olivier

title: Totally deleted files from ACC!
body_text: i would appreciate the functionality of Delete in the project because it doesn't delete the file totally, but now it's my thoughts changed. Once you upload Revit files to ACC, the platform automatically detecting the Revit version by this ways defintely the platform let you access the files from that Revit Version, so if some one by mistake upload upgraded version automatically the entire project will upgrade to the newest version, so your accessability to the files through Revit is disconnected

title: Correspondence - Allow email body content search
body_text: It doesn't look like the search feature in Correspondence will search the body of the emails.

title: Model Coordination: Store measurement settings per project or per user
body_text: At the moment every user has to select the accurancy settings for the measurements every time again when open the coordination view. In infrastructure projects we work with Millimeter accurancy. The setting should be stored. Ohterwise the user has to do many clicks before the information is usefull.

title: Extend Bridging Function  to files instead only for Folders
body_text: Situation Within ACC, directories can be linked from one project to another using the Bridging function. The entire directory and its contained files are synchronized in real time. Concept To avoid creating a separate “Bridging” folder for each individual file, it would be useful to enable linking not only at the directory level but also at the file level. This is particularly helpful for a coordination project that aggregates individual files (e.g., project schedules) from multiple projects int

title: Forms - Table or a matrix
body_text: In Forms it would be really useful to have a table or a matrix in the template builder. When you are setting up in the template builder you could decide the columns and then add rows when filling out, this is similar how the daily report log works. Maybe also you could choose another option which would be to have fixed columns and rows which you then fill in selected fields. This request came up originally in regards to commissioning, when we were setting up templates for test reports.

title: Desktop Connector Updates
body_text: Having to manually update the Autodesk Desktop Connector on dozens of computers almost every week is not only time-consuming but also disrupts our workflow. Additionally, requiring administrator-level permissions for installation is another hurdle we face. Continuous updates are essential for security and performance improvements, but they shouldn't come at the expense of productivity. It would be beneficial to explore alternative update methods or streamline the update process to ensure that ev

title: Modell Coordination - Sorting of coordination space
body_text: It would be nice to sort different coordination spaces for the users in the table and for selection. At the moment the coordination spaces are sorted only by creation date. That is in big projects difficult to handle because they need up to 10 spaces with a minimum logic. (Area, Topic,...)

title: Automatically pull location boundaries from Revit rooms to Sheets
body_text: Currently, you can import rooms from a Revit model as locations in the project, which is great. However, you have to manually draw the location boundaries for each "location" on each sheet. This is very time consuming. It would be great if the ACC pulled the room boundaries right from the model and automatically applied them as locations in the project on every sheet in which that room is shown. This way, when you create issues, you can just click on a point in the room on any sheet and it knows

title: Build Photos- permissions
body_text: There should be permissions on who can view photos.

title: Custom Submittal Cover Page
body_text: There is currently the ability to upload a custom cover page but this requires uploading each time. Could a cover page template that has fields prefilled based on the project/submittal be uploaded once and a single click to add to the submittal?

title: Optimize Workflow Process for Review Markup and Approval
body_text: A) Purpose The purpose of this feature request is to establish a review process that is lean, efficient, and user-friendly—both to understand and to submit. Furthermore, by consolidating all documents to be reviewed and approved into a single stack within one module, the process becomes more streamlined and transparent. The review and approval workflow forms a core element of document management within a CAPEX project. Without the optimization of this process capex will lose much efficiencies. B

title: Interaction between ACC in the browser and the Desktop Connector
body_text: On SharePoint, when a file is opened in the browser, there is the option to continue editing in the Desktop app. Similarly, when a file is opened on the Desktop app (e.g. MS Excel, MS Word etc), there is the option to switch to the web browser. Additionally, there is also the option to view files through the browser instead of File Explorer. However, when a file is opened through the Files tool on ACC in the browser, there is no option to open that file in the Desktop app. Additionally, when a f

title: リンク共有先の限定 | Restricting who can share links
body_text: リンク共有時、共有先を限定する方法はありますか 共有候補メンバーが多く出てくるのでコントロールする方法を確認したいです English Translation Is there a way to limit the recipients of a link when sharing? There are a lot of potential members to share, so I want to check how to control them

title: Digital Signature for Review Approval Workflows
body_text: Introduce the ability for approvers to digitally sign PDF documents and drawings directly within the Docs review workflow. This feature would allow users to add an electronic signature to a file (similar to functionality in standard PDF readers) before approving it. Proposed Functionality: During the review process, approvers can open the document and insert their digital signature directly on the PDF. Optional validation: prevent approval or progression to the next workflow step unless the appr

title: Sheet Disciplines
body_text: I would like to be able arrange the Disciplines in a Template to what we typically use since we always have to re arrange the order of disciplines in every job (our sheets are never in alphabetical order which is the default for the disciplines in ACC)

title: 指摘事項の表示方法 | View number on pins
body_text: 指摘事項のピンに番号などを表示して欲しい カーソル合わせた時のみでも番号が見える様にしたい English Translation I want the number to be displayed on the pin of the point of indication. I want to be able to see the number only when I hover over it.

title: Add Workflow Templates to Forms feature in Autodesk Construction Cloud
body_text: Hi there, currently the modules like RFI and Submittals have workflow templates that help streamline and standardize processes across projects. However, the Forms feature doesn’t yet support this kind of customizable workflow, which I think could be a great enhancement. Forms are widely used for different site activities, safety checklists, inspection reports, daily logs, quality reviews, etc. Having the ability to set up workflow templates for these forms would bring huge value by: Helping stan

title: ACC Correspondence Enhancements
body_text: The Correspondence module offers a strong foundation for managing project communication; however, several limitations are affecting adoption. The following enhancements would improve usability & better align the module with industry workflows: Signatures – Add native support for email signatures within the module to streamline communication without relying on Outlook or manual uploads. Currently, sending correspondence without a signature can appear informal or unprofessional, depending on the r

title: Forms - Expand Conditional Logic Options
body_text: When creating Forms on ACC the Conditional Logic options are very restrictive, and we would like to have more customisation possibilities. In the below example, I would like more options to choose from in the drop down menu, and most importantly, I would want a bespoke text field. I want the form to be able to say "If no, please write why" and a text field option where people can type in their answers without having to make it a separate question for it, and the option to say "if yes, please ski

title: Revert ACC project back to a non-revit version state
body_text: I know there is a document that states it is not possible. However, this should be possible. The case: A project was calculated based on IFC models and PDF. A lot of documents where added to the acc project prior to the stage where actual design of the MEP parts where started by our company (pre-order). Once the order came in, a Revit 2020 file was recieved and an over-eager employee saved it as cloudmodel in Revit 2024 (yep, new = better, and I know, user error...) Now should that not be an iss

title: Add built‑in Snip/Capture capability to Markup Tools
body_text: Currently, Autodesk Construction Cloud does not allow users to crop or snip content within the PDF viewer. If a user wants to highlight a specific portion of a drawing, they must use an external tool to capture the area and then upload it as a separate attachment—not as an overlay on the PDF. This creates several challenges: Workflow Disruption: Switching between ACC and external apps slows down reviews. Loss of Context: Uploaded images are detached from the PDF and do not appear in exports. Ine

title: Improve Stamp Functionality in Submittals – Support Smart Field Auto-Population or Default Comment Sets
body_text: In the Submittals tool within ACC Build, I’d like to request an enhancement to the Stamp functionality. Specifically, when using a Custom Stamp that includes smart fields (e.g., reviewer name, date), these fields should auto-populate , similar to how they do in Forms (I even used the smart field properties suggested for Forms). Since those fields stay blank upon inserting and do not auto-populate, we are forced to either: Manually enter repetitive information, such as our name and the date each

title: Model Coordination: When Saving a View, Save the Viewpoint (Orientation) With It
body_text: In Model Coordination, the orientation doesn’t currently save as part of a view. This would be a very useful feature so that when people revisit a saved view they would not have to repeat any orbiting/zooming/panning/walking/etc. to return to the desired viewpoint.

title: Assets should be able to be linked to existing assets during model import
body_text: We need the ability to link assets during import with existing assets. This means that the asset already exists in the Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) before there is even a 3D object associated with it. Using the unique AKS number that we assign in the model and to the assets, the linkage could be performed during import. Currently, when I create a mapping between the model and assets, all objects are created anew, even though I get the same name from the model as the existing asset. Therefor

title: Model Coordination: Show Point cloud together with other models in model coordination view.
body_text: At the moment it would be very helpful to show point clouds in the model coordination view together with models and other information's. That would save a lot of time to create models from existing condition. It would enable the project team to discuss fast in 3D in meetings to find solutions. A mesh is not a solution because of details and the accuracy. See example pictures of other CDE types for inspiration .

title: Multi Photo Organization
body_text: When adding Photos using the "Use Camera" option in either "Issues" or the "Photo" markup tool, whenever you take multiple photos in the same session, the photos do not retain the same order when you view them in the Issue or in Photos. They are given the same file name, which I think is the problem. You are forced to take one photo and select "Done", then re-enter the "Use Camera" option to keep the order in which you take the photos. This forces the users to hunt for photos, which is frustrati

title: Form template
body_text: When creating a Form template it would be very useful to be able to make questions dependent on eachother depending om an answer. For exemple when choosing the answer yes on a question you are required to anser a follow-up question - a bit lika the function with conditional logic but insteed of a photo or a issue you are required to give a description or answer another question. This would reduca a lot of unneccasary questions that would only be relevant if choosing one alternativ answe on quest

title: Date and Time option at ACC - Build - Form
body_text: We need the date and time option to choose at ACC - Build- Forms as dd/mm/yyyy HH: MM based on the requirements defined by authority. Current ACC has constraint to achieve this. I would like to request date and time function. Example requirement as below Report Date Time Report submission date and time Mandatory Date-Time dd/mm/yyyy HH:MM Date of assessment by QP(S) Date-time of declaration and assessment by QP(S) for ERSS Mandatory Date-Time dd/mm/yyyy HH:MM Section B1: Date of inspection by QP

title: Add horizontal slider for long folder-and file names
body_text: When you have a large folder structure and long name, on the web p age the file name is usually not fully visible. Currently, you can only Collapse the left panel to create more space, but sometimes this is also not enough. It would be nice to create a horizontal slider at the bottom to help with this issue.

title: 指摘事項の可視化 | Visualization of issues
body_text: 同じデータの内で、ビューやシートに指摘事項が付いているのか分かるようにして欲しい ページ毎もしくはビュー毎に見える様にしたい English Translation I want you to be able to see if there are any issues in the view or sheet in the same data. I want to be able to see it on a page-by-page or view-by-view basis.

title: “Step back” in SUBMITTALS should allow for editing of the review step and not erase review responses
body_text: When a SUBMITTAL is reviewed and submitted for review, there is the option to “ Step back ” the SUBMITTAL. Once the SUBMITTAL is stepped back, the “ Response/action ”, “ Attachments ” and “ Comment ” information completed by the reviewer is erased. It would be useful to, once the option to “ Step back ” is selected, be able to edit all information such as responses, attachments and comments made by the reviewer as opposed to erasing all review information. This will also allow the reviewer to go

title: Family display in Files
body_text: Within Autodesk Construction Cloud and BIM 360 platforms, families (.RFA) are not visible in some type of preview. It would be very useful to have the ability to preview families directly. Perhaps this is related to the formats supported by the platform. Having .RFA as a native format would be very helpful

title: Bridge Issues between projects
body_text: Possibility to bridge issues between ACC projects. This would save time working in projects where you have multiple ACC hubs for the same project. For example client, designers, and main contractor each have their own hub.

title: Meeting Items Export Report
body_text: If Meeting Items can be exported to PDF or called as a report from Reports, just like Issues, this will help immensely.

title: Display Revit Properties in ACC App for 2D Sheets
body_text: To display the properties of all objects in the 2D sheets (Revit Sheets), we publish the sheets directly from the Revit model (published 2D Views) instead of exporting them as PDFs. This way, all properties of the objects from Revit are displayed under Autodesk Build Sheets (Web). (see Screenshot) Unfortunately, these properties are completely missing in the ACC App, making them unusable on the construction site. (see Screenshot - there is no function in the App Viewer to get the Properties from

title: Folder Permissions
body_text: An improvement would be the ability to select the desired permissions and then choose the folders where they should be applied.

title: Option to consult archived projects
body_text: Have to ability to consult (read only) archived projects in ACC. Currently, Account administration have to restore the projects in order to consult and archive it again.

title: ACC Build - RFI workflows should be as flexible as Submittal workflows
body_text: Often, RFIs and submittals follow the same exact workflows. Currently, the RFI module is just to rigid. We would like to add steps, assign a role or company as responsible reviewer, etc. The current set-up just doesn't work. Have the submittal and RFI teams work together!

title: File Sharing to Anyone - default setting
body_text: The default setting for projects is set to NOT allow file sharing to anyone. However, our workflow is to create thousands of separate projects per year, and we need to manually change this setting on every project after it has been created. Being able to change the default setting within a project Template file would be the best solution to support this.

title: Coloured Folders in ACC
body_text: It would be an advantage if you could design the folder structure in different colours in ACC. This would allow you to recognise which permissions are set in the individual folders. This would then be similar to the working method in Vault. Here, authorisations are controlled via categories.

title: Desktop Connector - Project Selection Search
body_text: The Desktop Connector is a valuable tool, enabling users to selectively sync current projects and thereby conserve local storage space. However, the process of scrolling through an extensive list of projects, especially when the number exceeds 200, proves to be inefficient and time-consuming. This challenge is particularly pertinent for roles such as BIM Managers, Project Managers, Contractors, and Technical Reviewers, who often manage numerous projects. To enhance the user experience, integrati

title: Bridge link removal
body_text: Mistakes will made when setting up Bridge between ACC Projects. After being created Bridges can only be hidden i timelines and Bridge overview , not permanently removed. But hidden bridges can not be filtered out neither generally nor specifically by project the Bridge comes from. They can only be hidden by filter "external" status and that hides all bridges, regardless of active/hidden status. A Bridge should be possible to remove completely in the case it turned out to be unhelpful in retrospe

title: Enable view of users' last log-in date to ACC
body_text: Admin teams need to be able to remove people from a project periodically, especially inactive users. Currently this is only in BIM 360 and needs to be made available for ACC either in member or as a report to use ACC as a proper CDE.

title: In-Platform Notifications
body_text: Currently, notifications are mainly sent by email, which can lead to overload or them being missed. It would be much more convenient to have all notifications centralized in a dedicated “Notifications” tab within the platform, similar to how notifications work on social media. This would improve user awareness and efficiency by keeping all relevant alerts in one accessible location.

title: Items in Meetings template
body_text: We need to have items in meeting templates. Only topics is not that helpful. A certain meeting type usually has a set of standard items that must be discussed. Ex: a project startup meeting. Then the first meeting will have alle the standard starting items in place from the template. This makes it a lot easier to standardize the context of meetings and ensures basic item are not forgotten.

title: Docs - Photo Attachment / reference to model
body_text: It would be very helpful to have the option to attach a photo to a plan or a view also in ACC-Docs.

title: Bulk Delete Option for Photos
body_text: At this time it seems as those no ability to delete photos uploaded to the Photos tab in bulk, only individually. I'm working on a long horizontal roadway project and uploaded about 1200 photos to the project. The only problem was that I meant to only upload 600 and I mistakenly added them all twice. There isn't a way to get rid of the ones I want (or get rid of them all and start again) unless I delete them one by one. Possibly linking the Photos with Files, so that I could select folders full

title: OCR titleblock functionality on DWG files in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC)
body_text: In Autodesk Construction Cloud, the OCR functionality is limited in the Build module and is also limited compared to the OCR functions in BIM360. - The OCR functionality should be made available in the ACC Docs-module as well and not only in the ACC Build product. That way some of the attributes can be filled in automatically according to the uploaded titleblock. - Another idea is to also make this OCR functionality available not only for PDF files, but also for DWG file format.

title: Allow Saving of In-Progress Markups for RFI and Submittal Attachments Before Submitting Response
body_text: In ACC Build, reviewers cannot save in-progress markups to RFI or Submittal attachments without submitting the official response. This forces reviewers to either complete all markups in one session or discard them, creating inefficiencies in review workflows. When reviewing/marking up attachments for an RFI or Submittal, the reviewer must add their markups to attachments only when they are ready to submit it - there is no way to save these review markups and then come back to it later - you are

title: Feature Request Watchers
body_text: Build out a page to "watch" or "follow" requests from start to finish so we know when that request goes live. Would also be nice to add my own comments, such as ID number, to match it up with some list I might be managing for a large company. There is no "follow through" with this platform. My requests or requests I up-vote cannot easily be recalled/viewed to check the status; they just go into the abyss. My request/Request I choose to follow -> I become a watcher -> See it get however many vote

title: Add Last Sign In Information for Build Users
body_text: The current last_sign_in date only shows the date for BIM 360, not Build. Please add a last_sign_in_build date for Build or change the process so the existing date reflects the users last sign in date on BIM 360 or Build. Also, add a last_sign_in on the admin_project_users extract table for the last time that user accessed each project.

title: Correspondence Type Update
body_text: We would like to be able to change the correspondence type after an email has been uploaded or change the type if the title of the type is in the email subject to auto change the type to match. This is when using the project email not manually uploading emails or creating emails in ACC.

title: Model Coordination - Saved Views & Section Box
body_text: Feature request to retain the state of the section box/plane when a Saved View is created. I see tremendous value in being able to retain sectioning to let Views focus on a particular area subset of a set of models. Example: Tower crane study. If a tower crane needs to be placed within the footprint of a building, then we need to be able to coordinate its position with the structure and utilities. This requires loading the appropriate building models and then creating a section box around the cr

title: Publishing and Schedule
body_text: Publishing is an essential part of Revit Cloud models and worksharing, because all parties (including design teams, management, etc) would generally like access to the latest models versions through Docs and/or Design Collaboration. This also ensures better version handling and backups. For workflows that require publishing only models which are approved, the "Live" (Work in Progress) model should be non-accessible to other teams, and sharing through Design Collaboration should be utilized (afte

title: BCF export improvement
body_text: Hello, There are several areas for improvement regarding the BCF export in ACC : ACC doesn't export custom parameters ACC doesn't export "Assign to" field ACC does not export the issue’s exact location (pinpoint). Instead, it only exports the camera position, which is completely different. In addition, the camera position is exported using the internal coordinate system rather than the shared coordinate system . As a result, the BCF file becomes incompatible with other software and important loc

title: Option to add markups in continuous scroll
body_text: When you have documents with 20+ pages, that can even be in hundreds, you want to scroll through the pages. Likewise, when you are scrolling through so many pages, you do not want to keep going back and forth between single page and continuous scroll just to leave a markup, as it is time consuming. There should be an option to add the markups the same way as in the single page view to add markups in the continuous scroll view.

title: Feature Request – Temporary Permissions & Consolidated Permission View in ACC Docs
body_text: I would like to suggest two improvements to Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) that would significantly enhance access management and data security within projects. 1 - Temporary Folder Permissions - Ability to grant a user temporary access to a specific folder (or set of folders) with a predefined expiration date. - Once the expiration date is reached, the access would be automatically revoked without the need for manual removal. - This is different from “sharing” as the user would remain inside

title: Build - Assets - Provide API for "Asset Systems"
body_text: There are currently no GET/PUT/POST API-endpoints for Asset Systems. These APIs are very important for us for two reasons: 1) to efficiently create and update asset systems based on the assets 2) to automate the status of the Asset Systems based on the attached Forms and Issues Both use cases 1 and 2 have been implemented as highly automated tool solutions in our company, and without similar tool functionalities for Asset Systems, the "Systems" functionality cannot be used due to the scale of ou

title: Build correspondence export
body_text: We now could export pretty much all data but correspondence, which should be key data to be kept and saved in case of future court case.

title: MarkUp: Different line types
body_text: For better markups, the option to choose different line types (dashed, dotted) would be very helpful.

title: Public link for view model only
body_text: Please make it possible to share a link of published ReCap Point Clouds for external users to just open and navigate in the models in a browser and make markups without the need of a license. Only dowload is provided, which seems quite odd since the purpose of sharing this way is to let stakeholders who don't have a license of the Design Software (ReCap) view the Point cloud and make Annotations to the project. Now it is possible to share the files (download), but often we are communicating with

title: QR code adding tool in PDF files
body_text: QR code adding tool in PDF files

title: メンバー追加時の役割 | Role when adding members
body_text: フォルダコントロールの人がプロジェクトにメンバーを追加する時も、役割が入るように出来る様にして欲しい English Translation I would like it to be possible for the folder control person to include the role when adding members to the project.

title: Request for Bulk User Assignment Feature in ACC
body_text: This has been raised several times, but it never seems to gain much traction—which I find quite surprising! We urgently need the ability to add members to multiple projects at once . We manage over 100 projects, and every time a new starter joins, I have to manually go through each project to: Select project → Add members → Add user → Send invite — repeated 100+ times. This process can take over an hour. To make matters worse, the new starter then receives 100+ email notifications, which is over

title: Placeholder Documents Functionality – Files
body_text: Overview of the Idea Introduce a “Placeholder” feature in ACC Docs, allowing users to predefine expected documents before they are available, supporting better document planning, workflow automation, and compliance with industry practices such as maintaining a Master Document List (MDL) at the start of the project. Problem Statement In current ACC workflows, teams cannot represent or track documents that are planned but not yet uploaded. This gap leads to: Poor visibility on upcoming deliverable

title: Add a permission setting to restrict project admins so they can only add members that already exist in the account directory
body_text: Add a permission setting to restrict project admins so they can only add members that already exist in the account directory, managing all members from an account level problem : compliance, security, cost control, data governance. impact : risk of unapproved users gaining access, audit issues, billing surprises.

title: Uploading files with nameconvention including optional Attributes
body_text: When I download a file from a folder with a naming system, I can choose whether additional attributes are added to the file name. If you edit a file outside the cloud and want to upload the changes to the cloud, it would be helpful if the file name listed the optional attributes correctly. The file would then be saved and versioned with the file name (without optional attributes) and the optional attributes in the name would be recognized as such and added.

title: Build - Assets - Custom Attributes for Asset Systems
body_text: Currently, Asset Systems don't have custom attributes. Currently, they only have a "status" and hold the references to Forms and other attachments. When adding "custom attributes" to Asset Systems, the ACC users would have significantly more possibilities to customize the usage of the "Asset Systems". It would be possible to collect information that do not belong to any individual asset, but to the asset system.

title: Option to unlock files locked by user in a project through Autodesk Desktop Connector
body_text: Currently files remain in locked status from time to time even after the file has been saved and closed through Autodesk Desktop Connector. This problem is a major one in case it locks a file that needs to be used/worked on by different people in a project. When this happens people need to make phone calls to confirm that the other person finished it's work, unlock manually which is a great annoyance. As far as I understand Autodesk Desktop Connector gets its command that a file can be unlocked

title: Files Log in dataconnector extractions and Insight builder
body_text: On several occasions it would be beneficial to have files log (report) in the dataset extraction from ACC to enable it for Power BI and Insight builder. Should be easy to add this information to the datasets.

title: Deliverable List inside DOCs
body_text: It is required the possibility to enter a deliverable list (that can be reffered to model, drawing or reports or other formats in general) in order to track the project development as part of the planning and follow up activites. This would allow to all the Project Manager to have a clear idea about the status of the project agist the completion, being direcly inside ACC without need to track elsewhere the design development status. This will lead to a more comprehensive use of ACC for big compa

title: Issue Template - set of information and Issue bulk import
body_text: Please introduce the possibility to settle the Watcher by Role or Company and not only by user in the case of: in the Issue Template; xls import of the Issue; The template setting will minimize the effrot in filling redundant data; The XLS bulk import fill allow a better integration between different system for tracking of Project Development that can be used in a project, reducing any manual re-works

title: Sync ACC Assets with Revit
body_text: Currently, ACC Assets can be managed within Autodesk Construction Cloud, but there is no native way to sync this data back into Revit. This feature would be highly beneficial for workflows where asset information needs to be updated in the Revit model, ensuring consistency between design and asset management. I propose adding a direct integration that allows ACC Assets parameters to be pushed back into Revit through a built-in sync option. This would streamline data management and reduce manual

title: Model Coordination- Proposed Feature: Clash Zoom Options
body_text: Proposed Feature: Clash Zoom Ratio Option: Current Behavior: The zoom adjusts to fit both clashing objects, often making it hard to focus on the actual clash when large objects are involved. New Feature: A user-defined zoom ratio setting that allows: Full Object Zoom (default) – Zooms to both clashing objects. Intersection-Only Zoom – Zooms only on the overlapping/clashing area. Custom Zoom Ratio (e.g., 1x, 2x, 5x) – Allows users to define how much surrounding context to include around the clash

title: Permission in Meetings
body_text: Only invited members have access to the agenda. It would be good if there were different authorisations such as Manage, Edit or View.

title: Search Option for Meeting Minutes
body_text: A search bar in the meetings tab would be very helpful. It would help you search by meeting title, topics within the meeting minutes, attachments, and/or certain dates. Right now, we have 41 meeting minutes cataloged for our BIM coordination. It would be helpful to quickly pull up old issue history or agreed upon solutions.

title: Customize the notification email
body_text: Submitting this request on behalf of the EBA customer. The current notification email is set by default. The customer would like to customize it with template.

title: Submittal - Each file statues tracking
body_text: ACC Submittals support only one consolidated status per submittal When multiple files are submitted under a single submittal , it is not possible to track individual file statuses (Approved / Rejected / Revise & Resubmit) Review stamps and comments are available at file level, but these are not reportable or structured data. Suggestion - Allow each file inside a submittal to have its own status Example: File A → Approved File B → Revise & Resubmit File C → Approved

title: Design Collaboration and Folder Permissions
body_text: There are several entries, but none quite explain it how I'd like. When you set up your project template, your folders have permissions. From there, you make your Design Collaboration Teams. Only, the permission levels in Design Collab are 4 levels with Folders having 6. The team creation process will automatically override your permissions in the Folder to a higher level than you want, which means you have to go back to EVERY folder and reduce permissions again. You can think of it like if I gi

title: Add Text Box Markups in the Photos Module
body_text: Empower teams to communicate clearly and efficiently by adding text box markups directly on photos. No more guessing what a circle or arrow means, add context, notes, and instructions right where they’re needed. This simple enhancement will make photo documentation faster, clearer, and more collaborative.

title: Model Based Assets of Assemblies
body_text: Currently, asset creation is limited to individual model elements, which can be restrictive and inefficient. Introducing the ability to generate assets from categories or, more importantly, assemblies , would significantly enhance the workflow. Assemblies are a standard practice among mechanical contractors, used to define prefabricated units that move through fabrication shops and are installed in the field. These assemblies often consist of a handful to dozens of elements. However, the current

title: Unable to add member to multiple projects
body_text: Why Autodesk allows us to add user to only a single project at a time? We are managing hundreds of project and when create a new member we need to keep on adding member project by project. If they are member on lets say 20 projects this mean to do this 20x If you can add multiple members to a single project why we can not add a single member to multiple projects?

title: Bulk Tag Photos
body_text: It would save a lot of time if photos could be bulk-tagged. The only way I know of to do it currently is one by one and only after they are uploaded. It would be nice to bulk tag photos at the time they are taken on mobile as well as being able to bulk tag from desktop.

title: ACC Model Coordination - Clash Issues highlight geometrical resolving clashes
body_text: We propose improving the Clash Issue tool by adding a feature to automatically highlight or change the status to “closed” for active issues with resolved clash geometry. Additionally, it would be beneficial to automatically reopen closed Clash Issues if the clash geometry reappears. We have encountered significant challenges on large AEC projects, where we manage approximately 50,000 clashes at a time using the ACC Issue tool. While Clash Issues are excellent due to their simplicity and template

title: Issue Pin to be transparent and can be smaller size
body_text: I currently have 400 issues on the model, when you zoom out you wont be able to see the model geometry cause all the Pins are blocking it.

title: Submittal Stamp
body_text: Usually there is legal jargon on a typical submittal stamp that represents protecting the company stamping the documents. This is necessary information - ie legal jargon. The option to create a stamp in the submittal review area with dynamic selections is an efficiency feature, but the option to add legal jargon everytime takes the efficiency off the table and becomes a hassle. It would be nice if either API or a project template could have the legal jargon already on the stamp when selected dur

title: Save issue filters
body_text: Allow users to save issue filters just like they can do it for files. Allow projects admins to create shared saved filters to be used by all members. Ideally show the saved filters on the maín issues screen for quick fliter switching without having to open new panels.

title: Maintaining Markup Integrity: Ensuring Uneditable Annotations by Project Members
body_text: It's essential that markups made by project members remain uneditable by others, even if those members have editing permissions within the folder. This ensures the integrity of the feedback process and maintains the clarity and accuracy of markups, preventing unauthorized alterations that could potentially lead to confusion or errors in collaborative work.

title: Create Reviews (Option) from Received Transmittal in ACC & BIM 360
body_text: We anticipate the inclusion of a feature that allows users to create reviews directly from received transmittals within both ACC and BIM 360 . This functionality would eliminate the need for admins to manually select file s from various folders, saving them significant time and effort . Benefits: Reduced administrative workload: Eliminate manual file selection for Review creation. Simplified collaboration: Initiate Reviews directly from received transmittals. Avoid error: To eliminate the select

title: ACC Compare 2D drawings - export report
body_text: In Autodesk Construction Cloud, give the possibility in the 2D viewer 'Compare' mode to export a report. This is already possible in 3D model Compare, but not in 2D.

title: Desktop Connector - Collaboration on Files
body_text: Please allow Collaboration on files through Microsoft Office Products when in Desktop Connector and in the Desktop Versions of Office products. Currently, this is a large hurdle for full adoption, because of this functionality in Sharepoint.

title: Attachment section in Reviews  in ACC
body_text: ACC Review Comment section should have an attachment section. So that when a review is done we can attach the comments in it.

title: Automated workflow to add Assets to a schedule or workplan
body_text: The possibility to add assets to Tasks in a workplan is a great feature. However, there is currently no way to automatically add assets to workplan tasks. The current, manual workflow for each asset is: Click on a task, click "Edit Tasks", click "References", click "Add references", click "Assets", search for the asset by name, click "Add assets". This effort per asset is way too high to efficiently use the workplan-asset relationship in an ACC project with 1000s of assets. Any way to automate t

title: Files - Permissions Import Template
body_text: We have an extensive filing structure for our projects and over 50 different roles with varying permission levels. The filing structure and roles on individual projects also evolve regularly, requiring the regular updating of permissions. Updating the permissions using the interface in ACC can take several hours. An Excel template for importing/setting up permissions in the Files tool would greatly reduce the time required. The template could be based around the Permissions Report. Project Admin

title: Markups made in previous file versions also appear in new version in BIM 360 or ACC
