body_text: create a system per project/folder where you can hide all Issues and Markups from previous versions by default. https://www.autodesk.com/support/technical/article/caas/sfdcarticles/sfdcarticles/Markups-made-in-previous-version-also-appear-in-new-version-in-BIM-360-Document-Management.html?_gl=1*1fvmd2e*_gcl_au*OTQyMTI0ODQzLjE3NTEyNjcxNDQ.*FPAU*OTQyMTI0ODQzLjE3NTEyNjcxNDQ.*_ga*MTQ1MTg4ODM2My4xNzUxMDM2ODc5*_ga_NZSJ72N6RX*czE3NTEyNjcwNjIkbzgkZzEkdDE3NTEyNzA0NjUkajU4JGwwJGgw&_ga=2.245019021.92513558

title: Autodesk Takeoff - Allow annotations and non-takeoff markups on sheets
body_text: There is currently no way to add simple annotations — like text notes, clouds, or arrows — in Autodesk Takeoff. Every drawing element must be tied to a takeoff type, which creates clutter and confusion for things that are meant to be informational only. Request: Add a separate annotation toolset for: Text labels Shapes (e.g., revision clouds) Arrows or highlights Keep annotations visually distinct from takeoffs Let them be exported with the sheet if desired This would help users flag coordinatio

title: Add 'Welcome to project' email when we add new member to project
body_text: Every time when we add new member to project, we always have to send them separate email 'Welcome to project xxx' that goes like this: Dear Project Member, Welcome to Project XXX XXX ACC Platform! Activate your ACC account by clicking on ‘Activate your membership’ button in separate invitation email (example in attachment). Invitation link is valid for 7 days! I am sending important documents to help you get started on our project: 1. Document Control Standard (hyperlink) 2. Org charts (hyperlin

title: ACC create a new project - Project Types list to be made editable.
body_text: When a new project is created in ACC you have to select a Project Type from a pre-assigned list (table). several of the list items are irrelevant for our projects and the just clutter the list. What is required is a Account Admin level function taht enables organisations to create their own list of project types and for these types to be listed in the new project form. As it is likely that the pre-assigned list is a table in the ACC database it doesn't seem mush to me for that table to be viewab

title: Bring back Photo Reports from Sheets in Build - old feature from PlanGrid days
body_text: As an owner, one of the main reasons I signed up for ACC Build was to use the Sheet feature and do progress photos, punch lists, and to develop pre-bid documents to distribute during the RFP process. My favorite feature of PlanGrid was the ability to tag a sheet with photos the export the photos into a report that showed the location on the plan where the photo was taken. It had a cover sheet and on each page of photos it would also have a small key of where the photo was taken on the plan. This

title: Ability to customize project invite email
body_text: The email that our subcontractors get when they are added to a project has the email address of the person that added them. The person that adds them is not the point of contact for subs, but emails are still being sent to them. Having the ability to customize that message would help with this as we could remove any extra information that the subs do not need as well as add in who they should be contacting with any questions. Being able to customize for each project would be ideal! Thanks!

title: Titleblock Automation - within the ACC Review Process
body_text: Good day esteemed forum members and Autodesk staff. Problem Statement Within the ACC Review process, there is no ability to update title-block information during or after a ACC Review . No "smart" or "automated" process by which this data can be updated, even with Reviews getting approved. What this means is that when working in a "Work-in-progress / draft" state, the drawings we work on and the PDFs for which we create need to be created in a "ready to issue" state, pre-filled with any verifica

title: ACC Build - Allow Customisable Statuses in Issues
body_text: Allow the creation of customisable statues in issues. This would allow for more effective filtering and exports if required. For example, if something is actioned to the client who is not an ACC member and I can set the status to "with client" I can then filter for discussion in meetings and export only the relevant items if required.

title: Meetings invitees
body_text: One thing that could be really useful is to add meeting invitees by role or company. We can only add invitees by email or name and if we have a coordination meeting with all BIM Coordinators or Managers we have to search it one by one.

title: Enable Custom Attributes on Folders in ACC Docs
body_text: Summary Currently, Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) allows metadata and attributes to be applied primarily at the file level , while folders do not support structured custom attributes . For teams managing large volumes of documents, we strongly request the ability to assign custom, typed attributes to folders and use them for search and filtering , similar to enterprise document management systems. Background & Use Case Many project teams are transitioning from other document management platfo

title: Be able to have multiple users edit Microsoft files at the same time similar to working in MS Teams files
body_text: A common question I get asked when convincing project teams to switch from SharePoint to ACC is can we edit documents at the same time, which to my understand isn't possible in ACCs current form. This is a feature in SharePoint/Teams that they use regularly and is a final blocker for moving the teams fully to ACC. What I'm asking is can the functionally of multiple users editing Microsoft files (Word, Excel etc) at the same time be enabled/developed.

title: Enable Assigning Naming Standards in Templates
body_text: The latest update of ACC has arrived with the option to apply a custom naming convention to a project in templates, however, it is not possible to assign them to specific folders. The more we can do in templates, will be less repetitive tasks to go through after projects are created.

title: BuildingConnected Invitations to company not just the person
body_text: When we invite bidders to a bid package in BuildingConnected when we have the project set to "I want this project to be invite only.", we invite one to a few people from a company, and we've had those few people try to invite others from their company to the package. This causes that new person to not be able to see the package until we remove them and reinvite them ourselves. It would be very helpful to have those that are invited have the ability to add others from their company. I could see i

title: Location Option on Submittals
body_text: You can assign a location to RFI’s, Issues, Forms, Sheets, photos, but not to Submittals. Would love this as a feature add. @ssuppes @gcigc.com

title: Issues - Draft status shouldn't send out until put into Open status
body_text: We create templates in Issues for punch lists and have different "watchers" and "assigned to" members, depending on the issue type, (Architectural, Civil, Structural, MEP, etc.). When a draft issue is created in the field, we may still want to edit or review it when we return to the office, but members assigned in the "watcher" and "assigned to" fields have already received the notifications. An issue that is in "draft" status should remain unsent like it does in Microsoft Outlook and should not

title: Ability to create a log export, even after using the filter to select specific files
body_text: It would be helpful and desirable if the export of file logs were possible, even after using the filter to select specific files.

title: DATE FORMAT INCLUDING HR MINUTE AND SECOND
body_text: we noticed that the OOTB parameter of ACC for the date is in DATE format and does not include the option DATE + TIME. For integration applications between different software, it is necessary to have the time as well, since the same day mutlitple integration has been done and there is no possibility to track or check in case of failure the reason. This limitation, currently overcome managing as a text string, instead of as DATE + TIME format, depending on the time zone, there is a lag, which crea

title: Box and Fence Selection for Clashes in Coordination Space
body_text: Feature Request: Box and Fence Selection for Clashes in Coordination Space Description: Introduce Box Selection and Fence Selection tools in the coordination space to enable users to quickly select and isolate clashes within a defined area, especially when dealing with many small elements such as pipes inside insulation, ducts, or other closely spaced MEP and structural components that often indicate a single clash. Currently, clicking and selecting these elements one by one is often impractical

title: ACC clash detection issues improvement
body_text: In clash issue feature we are looking for improvement: Assigning Watchers Based on Role : It would be highly beneficial to have the ability to assign all individuals under a specific role as watchers to an issue automatically. Currently, we can only assign individual watchers, but these individuals may change throughout the project’s lifecycle. Having the option to assign roles in templates would streamline this process. Change Placement : There is an issue with the placement being fixed to the

title: Desktop Connector - Share link Function from Windows Explorer
body_text: Our teams use the Desktop Connector function extensively - however one of the main issues is when sharing the file location from the windows environment, it uses the "cached" location of the file which is obviously unusable by other users. It would be helpful and IMO necessary to be able to create the link from the web location (not the cached location) when sharing the link. It's time consuming to use the desktop connector, then go into the web portal to choose the shared location. Kinda defeat

title: Add Photos as Reference to Issues in ACC projects from computer
body_text: I would like to propose an idea for improvement, in the Bim 360 system there was an option to add images to Issues straight from a computer. The ACC system does not have this option, it is only open to users with a Build license. For the consultants team, this option is important in order to upload screenshots or any other image to communicate with other team members inside the Issue tool. I would love for you to add the option just like it was in the Bim 360 system.

title: Folder Permissions
body_text: It would be convenient if when granting permissions to a folder, one could immediately start typing to input the desired name, company, or role, without the need for an additional click to enter the field.

title: Default Transmittals to 'Hide Recipients' instead of visible option
body_text: When working on projects that have multiple bidders, contracts, sensitive information, etc, the ability to: 1. View what a transmittal is set at (view other recipients or hide them) in a column, report, or filter 2. Set the default to be one option over the other would be incredibly helpful. You can get all other data in a report, but that setting. And defaulting to a different setting as an option will keep mistakes from happening more often.

title: Enhancing the Revit Cloud Upgrade Process – Control, Progress Visibility, and Clear Error Reporting
body_text: In large ACC projects with multiple disciplines, data drops, or phase folders, a version upgrade can easily involve hundreds of cloud models. In our case, there were about 850 models totaling 130 GB . Currently, the automatic cloud upgrade process runs strictly sequentially and treats the entire project as a single operation. It would be extremely useful if users could: prioritize or order specific models for upgrade, see a clear progress and status overview (e.g. “in progress”, “completed”, “fa

title: Project Favorites (Star + Filter)
body_text: Add a simple favorites feature to quickly access relevant projects. Problem 200+ projects today, >500 soon. I actively work on ~10; finding them is slow and inefficient. Solution Star ⭐ icon on each project to mark/unmark as favorite. “Favorites only” filter on My Home and in all project lists. Sort so favorites appear at the top. Benefits Faster access to my projects. Less search, better overview. Scales as the portfolio grows.

title: Bidirectional Folder Permissions Matrix
body_text: Currently, managing folder permissions must be done individually for each folder, and creating a permissions overview requires external tools such as Power BI or Excel. It would be very useful to have a bidirectional permissions matrix within the platform, allowing permissions to be managed in a centralized way for multiple folders and users at once. This would save time and reduce errors.

title: Option to open PDFs in native browser viewer (Chrome PDF Viewer) instead of ACC PDF Viewer
body_text: After the latest update in ACC, all PDFs are forced to open in the built-in ACC viewer instead of the browser’s native PDF viewer (previously Chrome PDF Viewer / PDFium). This change has a significant negative impact on daily workflows: Performance: The ACC PDF viewer takes around 10 seconds to open a file, compared to ~3 seconds before. Zoom & navigation: The zooming behavior is less precise. It jumps and does not stay focused on the title block or other details I need to check. Copying text: I

title: Ability to Recover a Deleted Form
body_text: Please add functionality for admin users to recover deleted Forms. We recently encountered an issue where a team member accidentally deleted a Form (Daily Report / Work Log). Unfortunately, there is no way to recover deleted Forms, so we had to recreate the Form from scratch. It would be very beneficial to give admin users the ability to recover/restore deleted Forms.

title: Review - Approved w/ comments
body_text: When a file that is in review is approved w/ comments I would like to suggest that the comments made in the comments section in Reviews would be accessible from Files after the review is closed. Now you have to go back to the Reviews tool and find the correct review to be able to see those comments, even though you can see from Files that the file has been approved w/ comments.

title: ACC my home 'assigned to me and/or my role'
body_text: I would like to be able to set the 'assigned to me' card on ACC's 'my home' to me and my role

title: Status for Transmittal
body_text: I need to be able to update the description of the Transmittal sent I also need the option to add a status void to a transmittal that was sent by mistake. If the wrong documents were added by mistake to be able to update. This request is URGENT

title: Import BCF in Model Coordination (and not only in Docs)
body_text: It would be very useful if the BCF import function will be available again in Model Coordination (as in the BETA version) Reasons: Collisions often involve at least two different models, so importing only to one model is not practical Often, you don't want to communicate all clashes in a project as individual clashes (as BCF), but rather want to create grouped clashes in which are involved different models and communicate them as BCF

title: Meetings Templates
body_text: Thank you so much for the functionality to add Meeting Templates into the Account Library - this is a great function. However, it would be good if these meeting templates could be added to a project template and automatically be available on any projects created instead of us having to remember to add these templates in each time a project is created. In addition, could we please be able to create a meeting template in a project? One example of this would be a subcontractor progress meeting. Ins

title: ACC Model Coordination - Clash Matrix - Results Database Export
body_text: Ability to export the model coordination module's clash matrix results (number of clashes per test) to a database, eg. .csv We need the clash results in this format to visualise the data as progress over time, among other visualisations. With the ability to export the results in database format a scheduler feature would be required to set this export to a regular schedule. ACC Data Connector - the solution could be delivered through the improvement of the ACC Data Connector, which today can sche

title: Create custom reports in Autodesk Build from issues and meetings just like Autodesk Cost Document Templates
body_text: Create custom reports in Autodesk Build from issues, meetings, submittals, etc...from Microsoft Word templates. Just like it is now allready possible in Autodesk Cost with variable fields in Microsoft Word templates: https://help.autodesk.com/view/BUILD/ENU/?guid=Cost_Document_Templates

title: Self Discipline Clash Check (Interference Check)
body_text: While we are checking for clash in ACC it provides us the flexibility to check clash between two or more models/views, but does not allow us to check the clash between the Revit categories of a single model/view (e.g. For structure model we want to check the clash between wall and floor of Revit Category).

title: Add Option to Display Issue Number not Pin Label
body_text: As the title.

title: ACC - Lack of Version Descriptions
body_text: Currently there is no manner in which you can give descriptions to specific versions of files (such as .dwg / .pdf). I request that there be the ability to add comments or notes to specific versions of files, so that we can better track changes between versions (much easier than tracking through hundreds of file versions without knowing "when" a specific change was made. While I acknowledge there are other ways of describing information (such as when issuing models via Design Collaboration and t

title: Creating automatic QR code for the Assets in Build
body_text: Hi, It will be good to have a QR code automatically created once the Asset is created on Build Assets. It should be printable so that the QR code can be pasted on the Assets at site. The site engineers can scan the QR code which can take them to the Assets on ACC and see all the attached references to the Assets.

title: Adding watchers to reviews workflows
body_text: Please add the option to name watchers in Reviews workflows. In the situation that document control initiating all the reviews for the design team, there is no option to notify the relevant project managers/designers that the review process is finished and they need to see the relevant comments.

title: IDS validation in model coordination
body_text: IDS (Information Delivery Specification) validation should be in Model coordination. IDS is a new upcoming standard from BuilidingSMART that will be very important to get into ACC to be able to compete with other platforms. Click this link for more information: Information Delivery Specification IDS - buildingSMART Technical

title: ACC Docs - Stamping a PDF document without opening it firs
body_text: Introducing a digital validation stamp with visible personal characteristics is crucial for our clients to validate documents efficiently. This feature not only ensures the validation is visible on hardcopy documents but also recorded within ACC-Docs, providing legal validity to the document. It would be highly beneficial to establish an automatic link between the stamp on the document and its metadata to streamline the review and validation process. This would eliminate the need to manually ope

title: Smart and Scalable Management in ACC: Efficiency for Large Organizations
body_text: As projects and users grow in ACC, these improvements bring more agility and efficiency to today’s manual management: Centralized Member Management: Edit roles, access, permissions, and assignments from a single panel, fully integrated in ACC. Centralized Template Management: Update templates across all projects (including those created before updates) at once. Bulk Document Download: Download all files from one or more folders across multiple projects simultaneously. Bulk Addition of Business U

title: Export Specifications
body_text: It would be useful to be able to export specifications, either all or selected via a check box, similar to drawings.

title: Assignment Groups for Transmittals
body_text: When selecting emails for our transmittals I would like to be able to create and access "Groups" of individuals similar to the way we can access lists of companies and roles. Currently we need to search for individuals in our large team in the "user" section. It is very time consuming when we already have the groups set up within the Build contact system.

title: Enable Replacing Naming Standards for Existing Directories that already contains files
body_text: Currently, ACC only allows you to remove a naming standard from a folder. However, it is not possible to assign a new naming standard to a directory that already contains files . In project work, it often happens that a naming convention changes slightly and existing files need to be renamed to comply with the updated standard. At the moment, this process in ACC is very time-consuming and inefficient : A new empty folder has to be created All existing files must be manually moved into this new f

title: Show RVT Links Without Cloud Worksharing in ACC
body_text: Currently, Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) only displays RVT links that are published as Cloud Worksharing models. However, models stored on the same ACC platform—but not initialized as Cloud Worksharing—are not visible in published views. Suggestion: Allow visibility of RVT links in ACC even if they are not Cloud Worksharing models, as long as they reside within the same ACC project.

title: Support all file types in ACC and Autodesk Desktop Connector
body_text: Currently, ACC has a major limitation: not all file types are supported. Even worse, Autodesk Desktop Connector and ACC do not support the same file formats, which creates significant workflow issues. For example, in our projects we use PLS-CADD and TOWER software for project calculations. Unfortunately, we are unable to properly save or synchronize key file types in ACC or Desktop Connector. Some files fail to upload altogether, while others are not synchronized. A few examples include: .lock .

title: ACC - Build - Form: Scan QR Codes directly into text answer fields in Forms
body_text: In the ACC app, in the Asset module, when selecting a custom attribute text field to fill out, the keyboard opens and on top is a small "Scan" button. The same functionality, just in the "Forms" UI for text answers would increase the user experience for filling out ACC Forms significantly. Most of the data collected and information entered by our end users happen in Forms. We have about 3000 to 5000 Forms per ACC project. In each Form, we have 1 to 4 information that could be read and inserted f

title: Bulk edit photos
body_text: A fundamental feature and very frustrating not to be able to bulk edit, delete, and add tags to over 10,000 photos. Whats more frustrating is how long Autodesk take to implement seemingly basic features. I've been waiting over three years. How hard can this be?! @eoghan_harris - moderation has edited out the second paragraph per your request.

title: Submittal Workflow Creation in Project Template
body_text: My team would like the ability to create submittal workflow templates within the Project Template that way every time we create a new project using that template, the associated workflow/workflows template(s) will automatically generate so we do not have to create these workflow templates every time we create a new project.

title: Notification when files are deleted
body_text: We receive notification when files are uploaded to folders, but we also need notification when files are deleted or restored. As document controllers, we need full control over folders.

title: Cost Management - Search Feature
body_text: I would like to request a search feature within Autodesk Cost Management. Currently, locating specific cost items, budget entries, can be time-consuming, especially on large projects with extensive data. A robust search function would greatly enhance efficiency by allowing users to quickly find relevant cost information using keywords, cost codes, vendors, or other relevant filters. Additionally, a Change Event (CE) does not always originate from Issues, Submittals, or other documents. It is oft

title: Barcode/QR Code Generation for Locations in Build
body_text: Product Name: Autodesk Build - Locations Feature Summary: Requesting the ability to generate and print barcodes or QR codes for Locations within Autodesk Build. For consistency, barcodes and QR codes will be referred to as the same in this document. This functionality would be similar to the feature available in Procore, which allows users to create and print barcodes directly from the system without the need for external software. Current Limitation: Autodesk Build does not currently offer any

title: Revit Version Reporting
body_text: One area that has been a pain everywhere I've worked, is figuring out what projects are in what version of Revit. With ACC I would think that it would be easy, but it surprisingly has no such feature and even finding the version of a single project is still not intuitive. On a project level, having a field for the project that shows it's revit version, would be great. A way to auto add a prefix of the revit version on a model would be even better. On an admin level, it would be great to report a

title: Automatic Status Updates for Each Step in Review Processes
body_text: It would be beneficial to implement a feature where the status attribute automatically updates at each step of a review process with many steps. This functionality would provide clear visibility into the progress of the review by indicating which process step the file(s) are currently in.

title: Show rooms into ACC viewer
body_text: I'd like it to be possible to display the parts (with Revit information) directly in the ACC online viewer. I don't understand why this function isn't already implemented. Often customers don't have a Revit license, and the only way to view (and approve) the project is via the online viewer.

title: Embed Attachments and References in Meeting Minutes
body_text: Add the option to embed the attachments and references. Especially for the non-members that are receiving the report. They can't access the links without signing in. It is creating additional steps to export the meeting minutes, export the attachments/references, compile outside of Autodesk, and re-email them out to the attendees.

title: Meeting Minutes Template
body_text: We have numerous meetings where we have the same items on each meeting in addition to the topics- can we get the ability to add items to meeting templates.

title: QR Code for On-Site Plan Version Tracking
body_text: It would be very useful to include the ability to place a QR code directly on drawings for use on site. When scanned by a mobile device or tablet, the QR code would indicate whether the drawing is the latest version or if an updated version exists. This feature would greatly improve version control on site, ensuring teams always work with the most current information, reducing errors and rework, and saving time.

title: Allow Form Section Assignee feature to support multiple members, roles and companies.
body_text: Currently, when we turn on the Section Assignee feature in the Forms template, we can only assign either one member, one role or one company to each section assignee. There are cases where the section assignee needs to include a mix of specific members or roles. Creating new roles every time to meet these needs is not convenient, especially since Roles can only be created by an Account Admin, not a Project Admin. Hence, please consider allowing the Form Section Assignee feature to support multip

title: Allow to combine docs and build menu in a single menu
body_text: We almost only use build. People with a build license will automatically have a Docs license also. Why cant we have a single menu (left pane) with selected options that we want available for our users? Ideally: in a project template let us setup what sections are available, whether they are for docs or build? For Docs-only users that will automatically revert to only the docs-sections to be available but for the Build users that would save them the effort between switching between docs and build

title: Request to Enable ACC Meetings Module Without Requiring Build
body_text: I'd like to see if it's possible to enable the Meetings module in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) without activating the Build module. In many projects, we only need access to the Meetings functionality and don't utilize all the features offered by Build. However, enabling the Meetings module currently requires the use of a Build token/license, which may not be fully utilized depending on the project scope. Therefore, I'd like to see if it would be possible to make the Meetings module availabl

title: AutoSpecs - Recognize French
body_text: Pype and AutoSpecs will only catch on French words that have the exact same spelling as their English counterpart (ie inspection, qualification). Neither AutoSpecs or Pype recognizes accents (é, è, etc). No projects with French construction documents can use Build AutoSpecs due to its inability to scran through French documentation.

title: Content Catalog - Included Attached Detail Groups in Model Groups
body_text: Current Situation: When loading a model group into the content catalog, the model group itself is successfully imported. However, any attached detail groups associated with that model group are not included in the process. This results in incomplete data representation and requires manual intervention tor recreate the detail groups. Wish / Proposal: We would like to propose an enhancement where attached detail groups are automatically included as part of the model group when it is loaded into th

title: Visibility on ACC for new project members
body_text: We have a high staff turnover as we have a very fast projects with fast schedule. New project members are joining all the time, from beginning to the end of the project. When they join they cannot see any previous RFIs, tech subs, forms, transmittals, correspondence, issues etc., even is I used entire company as responsible reviewer or if I shared transmittals or correspondence with entire company. Can you please fix this? I need to waste a lot of time to export and send everything to the new me

title: Autotrigger Approval Worklow -   Naming rule
body_text: Autotrigger Approval Workflow (AW): The case study concerns the automation of two AWs that are concatenated: AW1 approved → AW2 start. This is possible based on the latest developments of ACC, but the title present in AW1 cannot be replicated inside the AW2: all AW2s would be given the same title, regardless of the original title of AW1. This reduces effectiveness in managing flows when there are many, and where the title is an important field for identifying the content. The request is to make

title: Allow Account Admins to set up custom project settings.
body_text: Maybe this is burried someplace already, but I have been unable to find it. I wish there were a way for us to develop custom Project Settings within ACC. Right now, the settings barely cover basic project data (Location, Project Type, Value, Name, Job Number, etc). However, when dealing with firmwide data, metrics, and dashboarding, it would be helpful to add our own fields to this list so we can slice our PowerBI dashboards a little easier. Some fields we would like to add for our firm would be

title: Photos and Locations Edits
body_text: List View of all Photos Ability to create folders and sub-folders Bulk Edit PhotosAbility to apply tags & “Location” of photos in bulk Ability to edit names of photos in bulk (similar to naming sheets) Ability to assign/modify GPS coordinates (with map interface) Ability to delete in bulk Expand Functionality of “Locations” in Project Admin Settings Using either a map/satellite image or an uploaded image of a site’s footprint, the ability to assign a coordinate (or a drawn boundary) to a locatio

title: Permissions for Photos
body_text: We need the ability to manage access to photos with permissions. There are times when photos need to be taken, but don't need to be seen by all project members (i.e. safety or quality concerns). BONUS: add folder structure to photos and allow permissions by folder/category.

title: Assigned to Me for Roles
body_text: I'd like if a member is assigned a role in a project that when an issue, RFI, reviews, submittals is assigned to a role that those are shown in the assigned to me in My Home and the user is notified. This allows us to assign multiple people to a task and lets them be able to both know an item needs to be looked at.

title: Please add option for Live Linking models through BRIDGE
body_text: We are reluctant to utilize BRIDGE until a live linking option is available. I feel like this would be desirable for others too. Currently, we can link models from other Projects through the BRIDGE functionality, but we're limited to only getting updates of those links when they are published. This is not how we prefer to work, and would find much more value if they were automatically updated when synchronized (and then reloaded obviously, or when opening our model and the link is loaded).

title: Toggle Sheet Permissions
body_text: We need to be able to restrict access to Sheets. If possible, turn them off entirely for a given member. Certain Project members do not need to see all Sheets within a project, such as Vendors, Subs, Consultants. Files offers more flexibility on who can see content, we need that in the Sheets module.

title: Docs reviews: Multi-step reviewer approval
body_text: It would be beneficial if we could have the ability to assign an approval status at each step within a multi-step review process.

title: Submittals review template: Bulk edit / import-export Review Templates (Excel-based management)
body_text: We’d like to share a feature request related to Review Templates management in Submittals, based on feedback from customers managing large-scale projects. Background In large and mega-size projects (especially in Japan), customers often manage 100–200+ review templates within a single project. At the same time, project members frequently change over the course of the project (e.g. reviewers joining or leaving every few months). Because approvals are required per individual person (not just by ro

title: Forms - Save Signature
body_text: Save Signature for Forms or be able to upload their own stamp (almost a combination of Submittals and Forms)

title: Enable Clickable Hyperlinks in ACC Folder and File Columns (Using Custom Attribute)
body_text: Currently, Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) allows users to add custom attributes to folders and files, but these attributes do not support clickable hyperlinks. This limitation affects workflows where users need to reference external systems such as SharePoint, OneDrive, or internal portals directly from ACC. The proposed enhancement is to enable support for clickable hyperlinks in folder and file columns (via custom attributes or metadata). This would allow users to: Add external URLs as attr

title: Automated Overdue Task Reminder
body_text: It would be great to have an option to send an automated daily reminder to users, summarizing each task for a project that is in their court and is currently overdue.

title: Members Details Page - Account Admin
body_text: The new member detail page in account admin is a welcome addition. However, it doesn’t allow bulk editing of member details (e.g., access level, role, products) across multiple projects. Currently, updates must be made one project at a time. Adding bulk editing directly from the member detail page would be a valuable improvement.

title: Access to Mark-up Tools in Compare & Continuous Scroll
body_text: In Autodesk Docs, it would be valuable to have access to mark-up tools when "comparing" documents and using "continuous scroll" in the recently released multipage viewer. Not even existing placed mark-ups and issues are visible, when these modes are activated.

title: Sortable Photo References in Autodesk Build Sheets
body_text: In Build Sheets , photos attached to Sheet annotations should be sortable . Requested features: Sorting by name , capture date , upload date , uploaded by , etc. Consistent sorting in annotation view and photo reference panel . This would greatly improve site documentation , making photo management faster and more transparent.

title: Microsoft Conditional Access & Device Security with ACC iOS Mobile App (SSO / SAML)
body_text: In our work environment, there are special requirements regarding data protection and data security. Therefore, we consistently use Microsoft 2FA with Conditional Access for all our devices. Situation Description: Conditional Access works without issues on Windows devices via the browser. However, on construction sites, using Apple iOS phones and tablets, it is more practical to use an app rather than the browser, especially when a convenient solution for small screens without a notebook is requ

title: Build - Assets - Restrict Asset custom attribute visibility
body_text: On ACC assets, we typically have 20 to 50 custom attributes. Only up to 5 of them will ever be important to mobile users, the rest is important for data management and for integrations with design & engineering tools and other systems. Therefore, it would be a great usability and user experience improvement if we could configure the visibility of each custom attribute individually. Customers would have more options to configure ACC and improve the usability and mobile user experience of ACC. Thi

title: Ability to Adjust Minimap Size in ACC Viewer
body_text: Submitted on behalf of an EBA customer. The customer would like the ability to resize the Minimap in the ACC Viewer. Adjusting the size would help them more easily locate issues on drawings, improving navigation and overall usability.

title: Schedule API
body_text: I would like to add the possibility of getting the ACC Schedules through APIs. We have a development project in which there is a need to track the schedule get the schedule data and also update the schedule though APIs. This is for an integration between MS Project and ACC. Unfortunately, there is no availability of Schedule API at this point.

title: MANAGEMENT OF RECAP FILES ON ACC
body_text: ACC currently supports laser scanner RECAP files smoothly only if they are on DOCs and are standalone. By the way those files are supported in VISUALIZATION ONLY and the viewer is not integrated with ISSUE TAB in docs, so only mark-up not connected to Issues can be produced. Moreover these files are NEVER used alone, in all construction Market, those files are used jointly with Design Model files, because they are functional for defining inputs in case the design is performed is a revamping or/a

title: IMPROVEMENT OF FILTERS WITHIN THE ISSUE TAB ACC
body_text: IMPROVEMENT OF FILTERS WITHIN THE ISSUE TAB ACC FILTER on the Issue 'Placement' FIELD. This field, often a pivot for many operations, is not usable for sorting issue records or to filters the issues when there is a request of masssive modification

title: Meetings Template - Increased Functionality
body_text: We have observed in our business operations that the functionality for creating meeting templates across projects is quite limited. Currently, the template creation only allows for the inclusion of main meeting headings, which essentially functions as a general list. It would be highly beneficial if the functionality could be enhanced to allow the addition of detailed meeting items under each heading. This would provide greater clarity and structure by expanding on key considerations for each to

title: ACC Documentation_Font Customization
body_text: I would like to propose the ability to select and upload specific fonts for ACC documentation, similar to the functionality available in Revit. This feature would allow users to embed desired font files into a dedicated folder when uploading or upgrading documents. Implementing this capability would enhance document compatibility and presentation, effectively preventing issues such as text scaling discrepancies or overlapping in tags, title blocks, and other elements. Providing the flexibility t

title: Form - Scroll through Photos
body_text: FORMS - On the web browser, when going through photos attached to forms it would be really nice to use the arrows to scroll through the photos instead of having to click on each one to open it and X to close it.

title: Reviews: Additional permissions and functionality urgently required
body_text: We have a suggestion for a streamlined way of managing files using the 'review' workflow, which I've set out below: Standards: In line with BS EN ISO 19650, we have gateways all information must progress through within the 'Files' module, with each stage being limited to certain groups: Work in Progress Shared Published Archived We don't believe it is possible to follow the guidance set out in BS EN 19650 in full, and are concerned this leaves us at risk of not achieving accreditation, as the cu

title: Bulk Assign Photos To a location
body_text: Hi, Can we add functionality to bulk assign photos to a location. Have to individually assign photos to a location is a cumbersome slow process.

title: ACC Model Coordination - Option to automatically close Issues created from Clashes when clash is cleared
body_text: I come from using Bimtrack. One thing Bimtrack currently does better than Model Coordination is helping the user keep the clash and the issue created from the clash linked together. Based on my testing of Model Coordination so far, once a clash has been turned into an issue, it is removed from the clash area and is no longer tracked as a clash. This means that there is no way for anyone to know if those issues are actually still clashing or not on future clash tests. As it stands right now, afte

title: Publish Schedule Without Links
body_text: Allow us to create a Publish Schedule that offers the option to publish without links.

title: Enable Transmittal Export Function in ACC
body_text: Currently, the ACC Transmittal feature does not allow exporting the transmittal itself — only the attached documents can be exported. This limitation has caused some difficulty among our team members. For instance, when issuing correspondence related to drawing discrepancies, we are unable to attach the transmittal as a reference or export it as a PDF for record purposes. This affects our documentation and communication workflow. We would like to request the enhancement of the ACC Transmittal mo

title: Importing description and custom attributes for files directly from Excel
body_text: When users bulk upload files either via drag & drop or by selecting them from their system, they typically rename each file according to a predefined naming standard. However, updating the description and custom attributes for each file individually becomes not only time-consuming but also confusing, especially when dealing with large volumes (e.g., 100+ files). The naming standard alone often doesn't provide enough clarity to identify the exact content or purpose of each file. Users maintain an

title: Default for markups should be Published, not Unpublished
body_text: Make all markups left in Reviews automatically published, same as it was on BIM360, as this is prone to be left unpublished this way

title: Markups in ACC - @Mentions/Assignment, Comments, and 'Resolved' state
body_text: ACC markups lack @mentions/assignment, threaded discussion, and the ability to resolve/hide completed markups. This forces teams to export PDFs and use Bluebeam Studio, creating duplicates and breaking single-source-of-truth workflows. ACC 'Issues' do have these features, but oftentimes minor markups do not warrant creating an 'Issue'. This blocks real collaboration on in-progress sets and pushes teams to Bluebeam Studio or other tools outside of ACC. Also, there should be a toggle on/off button

title: Ability to view Activity Log or who Created an issue on the ACC mobile app
body_text: Dear Autodesk ACC Development Team: One Major ask from our Construction Team using ACC is the need to be able to view who created an issue on the Mobile App. Currently there is no way to do this without using the web version. If we had the ability to view the Issue's Activity log on the mobile app that would be even better. Adding this feature would allow for better collaboration between the construction team and the person who raised the issue. Thank you! Issues ACC Mobile app

title: Specifications-Markups
body_text: There are currently no markup tools when reviewing specifications. Would be helpful to be able to add notes, link RFI responses that relate to specifications, etc. For example, I recently had an RFI response that changed items on drawings but also what is called out in the specs. When a team member refers back to the specs later on, they need to be able to see a note in the appropriate place that notifies them of the change.

title: Reviews in Mobile APP
body_text: It would be super helpful if reviews were also available in the mobile app - there may also be applications on site where it would be useful to carry out a review. If this could be integrated into the app, it would be practical.

title: Improvement in the LOGICs in ACC to import  BCF status inside ISSUES
body_text: ACC, once importing aBCF inside Issue Tab, THAT IS UPDATING AN EXISTING ISSUE FROM BCF, ACC Issue is not reading correctly the value 'Open' of the BCF Status. Note: This occurs not at the first import (new issue) but in the update of an existing Issue. This happens only in the case of Status Open, while in case of status Close, the issue status is updated reading the BCF Status. The same situation happen in case of other Status related to BCF imported inside ACC Issues, such as In Review or Pend

title: Change "Project Files" folder name to "Docs"
body_text: The Autodesk Desktop Connector virtual file path name for Autodesk Docs is VERY long and contributes to maximum file path name violations. It would be helpful change the top level ACC Docs folder name from "Project Files" to just "Docs". Our company hub name is only 4 characters and my personal company user id is only 5 characters which is shorter than most, but by the time "Project Files" is reached in the file path name over 50 characters have been used. Not to mention that spaces count as 3 c

title: Ability to Download or Extract Correspondence
body_text: Currently there is no way to download correspondence from ACC. Obviously email correspondence is a major part of a company's record retention plan. There needs to be a way to download or extract all of the correspondence so it can be archived with all of the other "as built" files like submittals and RFI's. If there is no way to permanently download the correspondence, why would anyone use it? If we stop using Autodesk, we lose all of that correspondence? That doesn’t make sense and seems like a

title: Automatic Virus & Malware scanning of attachments uploaded to ACC
body_text: In an effort to remove our company's largest barrier to adoption of ACC - Could the functionality provided in FedRAMP be available to all ACC customers, and not limited to just the government? A FedRAMP Overview: Introduction - https://youtu.be/I_3YFkmGTt4 [youtu.be] As a large grocery retailer and pharmacy in the USA, our company is the target of many hackers and bad actors. Many organizations we work with have been hit with ransomware due to infected files being passed around. In order to miti

title: Offline Conflicts
body_text: Scenario 1: You go offline and work on a DWG. Someone else edits that same file while you were offline. When you return, you file syncs and a new version is created. There is no indication that the file was edited while you were offline. Scenario 2: You go offline and work on a DWG. Some else is currently editing that same file. When you return, you are presented with conflict resolution options. See the link below, near the bottom, in the Getting Back Online section for a description and anothe

title: Allow Project Admins to disable specific tools which are not in use
body_text: Project Admins need to be able to disable specific tools within Docs and Build, to limit access by project admins and project members to the tools which has not been rolled out to the company. For example, yesterday the new 'Specifications' tool was added to the platform, but this is now available to all members with no way of limiting access and giving the account admins time to test the tool, understand the workflow, arrange training and implement into our ISO company standards. This makes it

title: Importing file attributes from XLSX / CSV
body_text: Filling file metadata such as Descriptions manually is very labour intense and could be automated by importing as they usually already exist in form of document schedule.

title: RFI Detail Report
body_text: We would like the RFI Detail Report to be able to in Excel format. We need the "Suggested Answer" to show up on our report (and we need this in Ecxel format), but the Detail Report does not allow this - only .pdf. The Summary Report can be downloaded as an excel file, but does not show the Suggested Answer.

title: Uploading photos from forms in the ACC APP (Attachments VS References) not clear enough. Some photo icon dont upload to Photos area
body_text: When using the app there is an icon of a "photo" to uplaod photos but it doesnt tell people this is an attachment and the photo wont be uploaded to Photos area. It should be more clear or even ask you if you would like the photo to be kept in Forms area or also in Photos area.

title: Export sheets in PDF with Embedded Photos
body_text: In ACC Build, when adding photos to a drawing using the photo markup (camera icon), the exported PDF only shows the icons with hyperlinks to the platform, requiring access to ACC to view the images. It would be highly valuable to enable the export of drawings as PDFs that include both the photo markup icons and the corresponding images embedded in the file—ideally with numbered references or a legend showing each photo, date, and author—so that the document can be shared externally without needi

title: Subscribe to a folder on behalf of other users
body_text: It would be useful for project admins or those with relevant permissions to be able to subscribe to a folder on behalf of selected users, roles or companies. As notifications can be sent for users who subscribe to a folder, many users (particularly field teams) will not subscribe to a folder, as this is not possible using the ACC mobile app. Additionally, if in app mobile notifications were possible, this would enhance the experience more.

title: Permissions based on Company and role
body_text: Currently, folder permissions in the CDE require assigning individual roles per folder per user , which becomes inefficient in multi-contractor environments. For example, with five contractors , each having their own Project Manager (PM) , we must create and assign five separate roles —one for each PM and their corresponding folder. This approach leads to unnecessary role proliferation and administrative overhead. We propose enhancing the permission model to support conditional access based on b

title: Bulk Add Members by Company
body_text: Hi, I’d like to know if it's possible to include a feature that allows adding members by company, rather than individually. For example, I have projects where I need to add around 50 members, and doing it one by one is time-consuming and inefficient.

title: Enable bridge function for different ACC regions
body_text: It's been some time that Autodesk has introduced few new data regions. In the past, even with having only 2 data regions (US and EU) we had a lot of problem transferring data during a project if companies used different data regions. Now we have 8 different regions which can not be bridged together. I understand that some work has been done so the handover packages can be shared from one region to another but we would like to have the bridge function available for different regions during the pr

title: Turn off minimap for all sheets
body_text: Some users don't like the minimap always hanging out there in that corner... It would be great to be able to toggle it off "permanently" if you should so choose, from the navigation settings on the sheets. Thank you!

title: BuildingConnected Messages - Templates & Variables
body_text: It would be great if BuildingConnected Messages had Templates and Variables. Templates are self-explanatory but Variables I envision would work like ACC Cost Management Contract variables so you could send a Not awarded messages that you could send to all not awarded contractors and packages at the same time because you can use a variable to insert the package name. That is just one example, but I hope that conveys the idea.

title: Issues - Reference field
body_text: It would be very helpful and useful, and less time-consuming to have a Reference field accessible when creating an issue in Docs and Build. Currently the Reference field appears just after the issue is created, so you need to first create an issue and then open it again to add references.

title: Daily Forms
body_text: It would be very helpful to have an option to click "Next Day" or "Previous Day" while scrolling within a Daily Form . Currently, when reviewing Manpower , we often need to check multiple days to find specific information, but the only way to do this is by exiting the form and manually opening another one, which can be time-consuming. Additionally, a search function that scans across all Daily Forms—not just the Notes section—would greatly improve efficiency. For example, if we need to search fo

title: Translation of custom roles between languages
body_text: When a French-speaking stakeholder views an ACC project through a web browser, the default roles in ACC are automatically translated into French. However, any custom roles that were created remain in English. This situation is causing confusion and potential duplication of roles among project collaborators who speak different languages. We would like custom roles, to be properly translated when viewed by non-English speaking stakeholders.

title: Edit/Customize the "Built-in" Submittal Cover Page
body_text: Rather than uploading your custom submittal page from your computer, it would be nice if you could edit/customize the "Built-in" submittal cover page.

title: Naming Standard without delimiters between attributes
body_text: The current naming convention only allows "_", "-" or "." as separators. However, there is a need to use no separators at all, as in some projects, the individual attributes are written together. It is important that the naming convention is based on the number of characters in the attributes (e.g., Attribute 1 has 2 characters, Attribute 2 has 1 character, etc.). Example: AEHVI263.pdf Character 1: A=Architecture Character 2: E=Execution Planning Character 3: H = Hanger Character 4+5: VI = View

title: The possibility to upload a folder's structure with subfolders and files directly with drag&drop option, through ACC Docs web platform
body_text: It will be possible in the future to be able to upload a folder's structure, with subfolders and files directly through ACC Docs web platform? it is very inefficient to create first the entire folder's structure and after this to upload the files. Please, don't offer as a solution the Desktop Connector. The Desktop Connector is very, very slow, with a lots of errors, total inefficient. The same for the possibility to copy an existing folder in another location.

title: Customized Trade
body_text: In BIM you can create a custom "Trade or company type" instead, one must choose from a predefined list. We would like to have the same thing in ACC. The current predefined list is too limited for my industry and does not reflect categories my company would like to see\use.

title: Forms review workflow with multiple reviewers
body_text: Forms should have a review flow similar to "Reviews". In a real-world scenario, one reviewer is not enough for some form templates.

title: Saved Model Property Filter States
body_text: Similar to Search Sets in Navisworks, it would be extremely useful to be able to save a set of property filters, especially when using the Takeoff module or when people who are less familiar with BIM are navigating the model or contributing to the Takeoff. It is inefficient and prone to error if each user has to re-generate all of the filters each time they open the model. Bonus feature to have this saved set be transferrable between projects on ACC (similar to how Takeoff Types can be imported

title: Custom Dashboard "Card" for Project-specific links and information
body_text: A beneficial feature of Project Management software is often a "home" dashboard where the project can post important information. Information like key safety contacts, links to project information and other sites, etc. In the Build tool's "Home" tab, there does not appear to be a way to customize it to add a "card" or "tile" to contain this kind of information. I also looked at the Insight tool's "My Dashboard" tab and there are plenty of pre-formatted cards and partner cards, but no option for

title: Excel (spreadsheet) support for exporting/importing members and their permissions
body_text: Excel (spreadsheet) support for exporting members and their permissions, like we already have now. But also to have the ability to make changes in that spreadsheet file and import back to your ACC/BIM360 account admin area. The hope would be to remove module access in batches. Especically when you have a ton of external people who have been added that would be impossible (or at least mind numbingly slow) to update their module accesses across the board. A bonus idea, make it possible to update d

title: ACC Model Coordination -  Allow utilization of Issue Templates When Creating an issue from a clash
body_text: Users should be able to utilize Issue Templates when creating an issue from a clash. We are utilizing custom fields and specific groups of watchers for different areas in a project and want an easy way to apply these values to clashes as we create them without having to fill them in manually for each clash. I created Issue templates for each area assuming I would be able to utilize them when we created clashes only to find out that they do not apply. 😞 I could see this working as follows: Method

title: Model Viewer - Do not highlight image when mousing over
body_text: In ACC Model Viewer, if aerial imagery is attached to a drawing, it highlights when moused over. This makes overlaid linework very difficult to see without unloading or hiding the image. It also makes it difficult to see the image as it is generally always tinted yellow. Can we make it selectable only by selecting the frame (like in Civil 3D) or just make it not highlight in general?

title: Markups | Paste screenshot as markup
body_text: I several cases you want to enrige your markups with more information. this information is not always direct available on the ACC project location. Or you want to refer to a specific part of a specification. In this cases it woult be helpful to past a screenshot as a markup or make it posible with a direct upload in the reference tab. in that case the pasted screenshot is uploaded to the Photo library of Build.

title: Bulk import members by spreadsheet
body_text: Hello, In the BIM 360 platform, it was possible to import project members using a spreadsheet, which was very efficient for managing large teams. In Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC), this capability is no available. Could you plan to introduce a bulk import option (for example, via spreadsheet upload) to simplify and speed up user management, especially for projects with a high number of participants and frequent onboarding needs? Thanks Olivier

title: Business units in template or for project creators.
body_text: So, they did it again. As of september Business Units finally came available to use in ACC. Big huray moment. That didn't last. First it was visible for the our project creators, but they could not select/set it. Only the account admin was able to use it. So we opened a case for that. The solution? Remove visibility of the function for projectcreators..... So basically, the whole function is now unusable. You can't set business unit in a project template (which would be preferred, but at least w

title: Add Workflow Steps Setup for Issues, Forms, and Assets (like Submittals)
body_text: Hi Autodesk, I have shared the idea previously to have the workflow template to ACC Forms, but i think it would be a great improvement if Issues and Assets in ACC also could have a workflow setup feature similar to the Submittals module. Currently, these modules rely heavily on manual updates for statuses and responsible parties. While this works, it often requires constant follow-up or manual reassignment to ensure the process moves smoothly. A built-in step-based workflow would bring much more

title: Meetings Module - Lock when editing or user view
body_text: Would it be possible to implement a locking mechanism for the agenda/minutes when someone is actively editing? We’ve encountered issues where multiple users editing the same meeting simultaneously results in only one person’s changes being saved. A feature that either locks the record while in use or alerts others that someone is currently editing could help prevent lost updates.

title: Enable Temporary View Permissions for Admins
body_text: Enabling Account and Project Admins to define what project members can view based on their permissions across ACC tools, would provide greater flexibility in project management. This could be implemented as a temporary visibility feature that allows admins to toggle between different permission assignments based on user, role and company.

title: Show Markups from Forms in Exported Reports
body_text: When a form is referenced to a sheet and the report is exported, the revision markups made in the form do not appear. This is a limitation, since teams on site (Quality, Production, H&S) often make annotations directly in the forms. These annotations are essential and should be included in the exported report for full traceability and communication.

title: Issue Summary: Excel Export – Custom Fields Options Not Sorted by Creation Order
body_text: When exporting issue reports to Excel from Docs, it would be helpful to have an option to arrange user-defined fields in the desired column order during export. Currently, the exported fields appear to be sorted alphabetically, making it inconvenient to edit the results afterward. It would greatly improve usability if users could customize the field order when exporting to Excel.

title: Able to rename the Issues status in Autodesk Construction Cloud
body_text: It would be great if we were allowed to change the issue status to suit company standards and policies

title: Excel Scripting
body_text: Enable the ability to run excel scripts in Build.

title: Add GPS-support for Assets, similar to the GPS-support already available in Issues
body_text: It is possible to activate "GPS Location" for issues, and place and view issues on a map. The same functionality would be very useful to have in Assets as well. Any ACC customer in any infrastructure project (roads, rail, …) would profit from an increased overview about the location of all the asset in a given project. In infrastructure, assets are often spread far apart, and the GPS location is a common feature to locate and identify assets in a project in any infrastructure-related industry. T

title: Enable Template for Assets Permissions
body_text: In ACC Build, many functions have "Permissions" settings, and most of them can be configured using "Templates." However, this functionality is not available for Assets . We would like to request an improvement so that permissions for Assets can also be pre-configured using Templates , similar to other features.

title: ACC Docs - Allow for custom stamps to be added to Reviews
body_text: In ACC Docs under the Reviews tab, when a PDF is sent for Review, there is only the option to add a stamp from a defined template. It would be useful to have the option, similar to that in reviewing workflows within submittals, where a custom stamp can be created. The custom stamp should allow for uploading an image (for example, with a signature) from "Your Computer" or make provision for the "Drag and drop" option. In our scenario, PDF drawings, letters etc are often sent for review, therefore

title: Member Name Override
body_text: When members are added to a project and they already have an autodesk account, it defaults their name to how they set it up. Is there a way for the project admin to override their name that is associated to our member list. Often times we see the name populate as their first initial last name instead of first and last name. This poses a problem when generating a documents and also when sending for E-Signature.

title: Collaboration Model "Collaborative" for Uploaded Smart PDF Forms
body_text: For projects who want to have an uploaded form be collaborative, there is only a sequential mode. But if it's sequential, it has to be passed from one assignee to the next, not collaborated on simultaneously. Please work on getting the "Collaborative" collaboration model in Forms as an available option. A common use case for my company is a deliveries tracking board. It would be very beneficial to have all trade partners schedule their own delivery times digitally, whenever they need to. The bes

title: Forms Table Functionality in Autodesk Build Forms
body_text: When creating a form template in Autodesk Build, there’s no option to add tables. Forms only allow question-by-question inputs, which is very limiting. If I upload a PDF with tables, I still can’t copy and paste full tables into it — only one cell at a time, no option to paste multiple rows or columns. It’s not flexible and slows down workflows. It would be great to have a built-in table tool in the form builder, with the ability to paste multiple rows/columns (like from Excel).

title: Separate Admin(s) For Different ACC Products
body_text: Hi Autodesk and Autodesk Community, I believe it would be very beneficial if we have the freedom to assign different members as admin for different products in ACC. The issue raised for us when our BIM coordinators who were supposed to be project members needed to adjust the settings for Design Collaboration and Model Coordination products, but they shouldn't have had admin permissions in Docs and Build because of sensitive data stored. Unfortunately the project admins who traditionally acted as

title: Option to DELETE and ARCHIVE PROJECTS
body_text: Can we please add the ability to delete and archive projects in ACC? Currently, it is a nightmare to find the archive feature and there isn't an option to Delete any projects. In some cases, we setup test/training projects and would like the ability to remove those from our project list.

title: BUILD Submittals Disclaimer
body_text: Every firm I’ve ever crossed paths with has some sort of disclaimer that is included with the returned submittal as part of the submittal stamp with the submittal status. Example is below. The missing piece is that there is nowhere to build the workflows so that it is included with every submittal. Build users are left with manually typing this or copy/pasting it for every submittal (assuming folks remember to do it) or adding it as a markup.

title: Send Transmittals to Non-Project-Member
body_text: Ability to send a transmittal of files, sheets, models to someone that is not a member of the project and possibly not even a ACC participant. Pretty simple I think.

title: 3D Walkthroughs with 360° Photos/Videos vs. Model
body_text: Currently, Autodesk does not offer integrated 3D walkthroughs combining the model with 360° photos or videos. This capability is often requested by clients. Having this functionality natively would avoid the need to use external platforms, streamline workflows, and improve efficiency for both office and site teams.

title: Integrate Legal “Stamp” with Review Status (Always Visible)
body_text: The “stamp” is not just a markup, it’s a legal statement. When an item is approved (e.g., drawing, document, plan), the stamp must be embedded as part of the document; not just shown as a visual label or overlay. Requested enhancements: Bind the stamp to the Review/Approval status (e.g., Approved, Rejected, For Review). Embed the stamp into the file so it’s persistently visible: In ACC Viewer Via Desktop Connector When downloaded (not exported) Ensure the stamp is tamper-evident and audit-tracke

title: Add Members Permission without Project Admin
body_text: It would be nice if we are able to give a specific role or individuals the permission to add members to a project without being a full admin. We foresee many instances where we would want someone assigned to managing a project to be able to add new members to the project, but want to avoid giving full admin access to that project. This would allow us to isolate these permissions and have a better workflow for adding people to projects where their involvement is needed based on the current status

title: Develop priority to project template instead of project
body_text: I have mentioned this already mulitple times to succes managers from Autodeks, but it doesnt seem te get through, and new policy is to add "feature requests" throught the idea board. Why are things developed for projects instead of project templates. Basicaly a template is also a project, but one that gets copied when a new project is created based on that template. We turn 200+ projects a year and because new features that are developed are only available on projects and not in templates all th

title: Autosync Additional Subfolders Post Bridging Projects
body_text: When creating a bridge between two project folders, automation is only enabled for files within the folders and subfolders that were present during the initial (manual) bridge setup. Subsequently added subfolders will not sync automatically. This feature should be enabled to eliminate the need to manually share folders each time new data is uploaded.

title: Provision for Configurable Reminder & Escalation Matrix in All ACC Modules
body_text: Currently, Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) does not provide an in-built mechanism for automatic reminders or escalations across its modules. In real-world project management, many workflows—such as Issues , Reviews , Forms , and Submittals —are bound by Turnaround Times (TATs) and compliance SLAs . Example: In the Issues module, for a Safety Category Issue with a TAT of 3 days: Day 2: An auto-reminder should be sent to the Assignee (and optionally to the Creator) if the issue remains open. Aft

title: Sheets Tool Improvements
body_text: Context: The Sheets tool is the heart of our project record. It’s where contractual obligations are tied, drawing logs are created/archived, and continuous drawing improvements are tracked. These enhancements would materially improve accuracy, speed, and downstream coordination. 1) Bulk export & bound sharing from Collections Request: Add “Export All” for Collections (helpful on projects with multiple AHJs—Authorities Having Jurisdiction). When sharing, allow one-click packaging that binds PDFs

title: Improve the photo resolution of photos or attachments on printed PDF reports.
body_text: Even we set up reports to print one photo per row the resolution of the photos that displays is of poor quality, forcing users to click on the link to the photo in Autodesk Build where they can get a high resolution photo. We would like to see the image in the printed report improved.

title: The ability to bulk edit members for Autodesk Construction Cloud Module Access
body_text: Problem statement: The client is unable to bulk edit members for module access within the Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC). Handling module access for multiple projects manually is time-consuming and presents significant challenges for administrators, impacting overall productivity and project management efficiency. Desired action/outcome: The client wants the ability to bulk edit members for module access in ACC. This feature will allow administrators to quickly and efficiently assign or edit

title: ISSUES - Increasing the size of the ISSUE window panel after it is created
body_text: After an ISSUE is created under the ISSUES tab. When the ISSUE is selected, a side window panel appears which allows for editing of the ISSUE information. It would be great to increase the size of the ISSUE window panel that appears when an ISSUE is selected after it is created. This will allow for easier access when viewing and editing the ISSUE. Additionally, the ISSUE window panel that appears blocks out some information (start date and placement) on the right of the screen which is relevant

title: Edit Excel chart in ACC
body_text: It is currently not possible to add / edit an Excel diagram in the ACC web interface, even though you are in “Editing mode”. Although the corresponding editing options are displayed in the menu bar, you currently receive a “Feature Error” message when selecting one of the features. The answer from ACC Support is: This function is currently not offered. Workaround is to open the document in the desktop app and create the chart / diagram there and edit the data accordingly. However, this loses the

title: Fully restore folders deleted via Desktop Connector
body_text: When a folder is deleted using the Desktop Connector, all subfolders and files are deleted individually. As a result, restoring the parent folder only brings back an empty folder - the full folder structure is not recovered. Subfolders and files must be restored one by one, which is very time-consuming. The system should be able to recognize when a parent folder has been deleted via the Desktop Connector and allow for a full restoration of the folder, including all subfolders and files - similar

title: Delete Submittal Revision
body_text: Allow project admins to delete or void a submittal revision without deleting or voiding the whole submittal.

title: BuildingConnected Bid Leveling Sum Quantities for Quantity X Unit Cost Items
body_text: In BuildingConnected Bid Leveling it would be great if the Quantities had Subtotals for each section and totals for the entire Package for like Quantity X Unit Cost types. The Example I am thinking of is Hours X Cost/Hour where knowing the subtotal and total hours would be very helpful for bid analysis.

title: Assign issues to companies without members
body_text: As a site manager, I want to be able to assign issues to companies without members. Not everyone has access to the project or wants access, as subcontractors are sometimes not so tech-savvy and can work better with a printed report. But for this I need to be able to assign the issues to a company so that I can filter by the company in the report. In BIM360, issues can be assigned to companies without members. In the beginning, this also worked in ACC, but not anymore

title: Support for 360-Degree Video Playback in ACC
body_text: I would like to request support for viewing 360-degree videos directly within Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC). Many construction teams use 360 cameras (e.g., Insta360, Ricoh Theta, GoPro Max) to capture immersive site walkthroughs. Currently, these videos must be viewed outside of ACC using third-party tools, which breaks the workflow and reduces collaboration efficiency. It would be great if ACC could: - Support uploading and viewing 360-degree video formats (e.g., .mp4 with equirectangular p

title: Review Notifications and Visibility Settings
body_text: Contractually, Reviews may need to be visible to individuals beyond those directly involved in the process (i.e., the Initiator, Reviewer, and Approver). For example, Project Managers typically do not participate in the review itself but still require visibility into all review activities. To accommodate this, the template should include options for configuring both notifications and visibility settings.

title: New Export Dialog – Selection of Required Folders in Handover
body_text: In large projects, documentation often needs to be carried out in several parts. Therefore, it would be useful in Handover to be able to select which folders (only the first level) are intended for export. This would significantly improve the creation of the ZIP file and the download volume, as the entire documentation does not always need to be downloaded, and unnecessary folders can be deleted afterwards.

title: Editing an approval workflow should include the ability to add or remove steps.
body_text: Currently, in order to add or remove a step, the member either needs to duplicate another existing approval workflow that has the correct number of steps or create a new approval workflow. Using the example below, when editing an existing approval workflow, the member should have the ability to either add or remove a step.:

title: Correspondence ID
body_text: Currently, the Correspondence ID in Autodesk is auto-generated and cannot be modified or hidden. This creates challenges when logging documents that need to be forwarded to external users, especially when those documents follow a predefined numbering system. For example, if a user creates a Correspondence Type for CCD (Construction Change Directives) and wants the Correspondence ID to match the CCD number, Autodesk does not allow this. Since CCDs may not always be issued sequentially, the inabil

title: Add functionality to upload data to forms
body_text: Add the functionality to mass upload data from an excel sheet into a form template. Assets seem to have the functionality to populate fields with an excel template, but forms does not. Forms is lacking any sort of mass change feature and only copy/paste from a previously created form. After creating a form template using build, give the ability to download an excel template of that form for mass changes or auto generating new forms. Forms is good for staying organized but bad at inputting change

title: Original Scaling when compare sheets
body_text: When the format of sheets changes in new versions and a sheet comparison (Compare Document) is performed, the sheets are scaled to the same format. This results in one sheet being distorted, making comparison impossible. It is important that the sheets retain their original scaling during comparison so that I can move the sheets to compare the desired positions. With the current distorted scaling, comparison is not feasible. In this Example the Cross on the Sheet has the same position in both ve

title: Folder Permissions by Company in Project Template
body_text: Our firm uses folder permissions by Company (primarily) to specify who has Edit access to particular folders.
