It would be great if we could preset those folder permissions in our project template. Currently we are limited to specifying permissions by Role. It works that way once the project has been created. But it would save a bunch of time if we could save it in our template.

title: Autodesk Build not having an option to export compared drawings
body_text: Autodesk Build does not have an option to export the drawing after they are compared. PlanGrid had the option to export the compared drawings. It would be helpful to have this option to export the compared drawings on Build.

title: ACC Build - Forms - Environmental Template Type needed
body_text: Please can you add a Template Type of Environmental in ACC Build Forms so we can easily identify all our environmental inspection templates. You have Quality and safety but not environmental

title: Batch Photo Tagging Now Please!
body_text: Does anyone else out there use ACC to generate daily site reports? If so, you probably take dozens of photos every day to document on-site work and use them later for reference. The tagging of these photos makes them invaluable for finding them later when you need to check things like structural or foundation work, framing, find rough-in photos after the drywall has been boarded, find cables or dampers in finished ceilings, check for in-floor hydronics where repairs are needed or things need to

title: Make RFI Disciplines customizable
body_text: Enable custom disciplines in RFIs the same way they can be sustomized in Sheets. Ideally add a global project discipline list shared across tools such ass Sheetsm RFS etc.

title: Multiple revisions for RFI's
body_text: RFI's need the functionality to go through multiple reviews back and forth, in my experience, RFI's are almost never complete after one response. On my current project we have had to create a workaround because RFI's are closed when a response is received. It would be great if RFI's in ACC could function more like the Submittals which can be rev'd up.

title: Editing Multiple Photos at a Time
body_text: It would be very helpful to be able to tag / delete multiple photos at a time. I currently upload about 20 progress update photos at a time and need to tag each one individually. If there was an option to "Tag all Selected" it would help speed up the process when multiple photos need the same tag. Additionally, being able to delete multiple photos at a time seems vital. My assistant accidentally uploaded 1000 photos to the Photos app instead of a photos folder we have. I now have to go through e

title: Intermediate Admin access level that allows additional invites within that company.
body_text: We want to see an intermediate access level between "Admin" and "Member." This access level would allow that user to invite additional users from their organization only to the project. As consultants, we want the ability to staff up a client's project when required, especially for deadlines. Currently, we need to wait on the client admin to add users, which can sometimes take a while and is therefore not ideal for deadlines or when our users are out of the office. If we need another engineer or

title: Submittals Activity Log in Exports
body_text: Add functionality so that the submittals activity log gets added to a submittal report (similar to how RFI reports include the activity log). This log is extremely important and yet there is no offline access for a consultant who will eventually lose access to the project.

title: Review : adding File review status Icons
body_text: Hello, From the outset in ACC, in the revision settings, there are only three file revision status icons. It would be nice to have more icons to better reflect the different stages of a document lifecycle, improve clarity for project teams, and make it easier for stakeholders to quickly understand the status and readiness of files at a glance, especially on complex, multi-disciplinary projects..

title: Critical Security Risk: Exposed Asset "B3F IDs" Make NFC Tags Easy to Clone!
body_text: While testing NFC integration for asset tracking, it became clear that exposed Asset "B3F IDs" can be effortlessly cloned . This loophole compromises data integrity and security , allowing unauthorized access or replication of asset information. Why this matters: If Asset "B3F IDs" remain visible or unencrypted, anyone can duplicate tags—undermining reliability and trust in the entire asset management process. Suggested improvement/Proposed enhancement: Introduce a “View only” permission option

title: Section Creation - Object Alignment - in the ACC viewer
body_text: Section Creation - Object Alignment - in the ACC viewer It would be really hepful for userbility if sections could be oriented with a plane of an object in ACC viewer. In adition, it would be great to make possible the Section Box oriented by selected object with move options in each plane (similar to Revit section boxes)

title: Manage Project List
body_text: The ability to control, remove, and/or favorite projects in the project list on the home page. Each person should be able to toggle on or off projects to reduce their list.

title: Connect Daily Quantities to Cost Pay App
body_text: A very common workflow in construction is tracking quantities entered on Daily Reports. These quantities then go into what is being billed for/charged/paid in the Pay Apps (Cost and/or Budget). Being able to connect these would be incredibly valuable in completing construction workflows. The solution would need to be able to take daily entries and add them as Pay Apps are typically submitted monthly (or weekly, but not daily). A verification setting would be helpful too - or an approval workflow

title: ACC - Intellectual property control, External Project Visibility and Data Security
body_text: We’ve identified several challenges when working in external Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) portals where our team members are added as collaborators or share data via Bridge. These situations often result in reduced visibility and control over company data, permissions, and intellectual property. When a Revit model is published, regardless of whether certain elements such as legends, views, or schedules are excluded any user with download rights to the folder containing that published versio

title: indicator within ACC when there are files in the folder
body_text: Hello, We would like to have an indicator within ACC when there are files in the folder so that it is accessible and clear to users.

title: Feature request: Submittals and Reviews - unification of functions
body_text: Hi all, Today, I’d like to discuss my suggestions for improving the Submittals tool. This tool is very similar to the Reviews tool, with nearly identical core functionality, but the flexibility for project admins is much more limited compared to Reviews. Would it be possible to extend the Submittals functions with the same features as in Reviews? This shouldn’t be too difficult since the functionality already exists in the software. For example, adding the option to choose between calendar and w

title: Manage Assets on 2D Sheets from Mobile Devices
body_text: Currently, it is possible to visualize and manage assets on 2D sheets when working from a PC. However, this functionality is not available on mobile devices (Smartphone, tablets, iPads).

title: Bridge - Allow live update of data flow through bridge
body_text: Hi all, There have been many discussions about the limitations of the Bridge tool. While it offers some useful functionalities, there is still much potential for improvement to make it a more efficient tool for working with complex data structures. For instance, auto-syncing additional data structures would greatly enhance its usefulness. At the very least, the Bridge should provide a live representation of the data flow between bridged projects to ensure it remains up to date. Currently, when a

title: ACC Browser: Improve the process to close Microsoft documents from the "Editing" mode
body_text: On ACC Browser, the process to close Microsoft documents (for example, Word files, Excel files etc) from the "Editing" mode can be improved to make the process simpler and less tedious. Currently, to close a Microsoft document from the "Editing" mode on the ACC Browser, the user is required to click the document name on the top left of the page, click "Return" and then wait for the document to reload and return to "Viewing" mode. Thereafter, the user is required to click the "X" on the top right

title: Bulk edit - delete member from project
body_text: It should (must) be possible to remove several members from a project at the same time. Today, I have to select and remove each member individually in the "Project Admin" area, which is a lot of work, especially for large projects, when changing entire teams and people. Additional, it would be also great to have this functionality for account members in the account admin area. This function was available in BIM 360 (project and account), but is not available in ACC (see screenshot).

title: RFIs – Allow for a default setting to save closed RFIs and set default location
body_text: In the RFIs tool on ACC Build, when an RFI has been answered, it is thereafter closed and distributed. To save the closed RFI to a folder in Files, the user is required to tick the box next to “ Save closed RFIs item report to a folder in Files ”. The user is then prompted to choose a location to save the closed RFI. In our projects, we generally have several RFIs being generated. It would be useful to have the option to mark the box next to “ Save closed RFIs item report to a folder in Files ”

title: Transmittal Customize Distribution Lists
body_text: We have had several complaints/requests for having to issue transmittals on a recurring basis to a large amount of recipients and the document control team is having to manually select the SAME recipients over and over again. We have created a distribution list role, but I do not understand why we cannot customize within ACC projects to allow for greater control since every project is different and has its own needs and uniqueness. I suggest that we can create a transmittal list similar to an em

title: Files' Data via Data Connector
body_text: We are trying to extract Reviews data and Files' & Packages' data into Power BI using the ACC Data Connector, but it does not provide the same level of detail as the reports generated directly from the Reviews tool or the Files tool . For reviews' data, we are specifically missing information such as the name of files, their associated dates, individual approval statuses, file path and the before-and-after values of the file attributes. Manually generating these reports each time for dashboard c

title: Viewing Issues
body_text: In the detail view for Issues is limited to a relatively small column on the right side of the screen. Is it possible to have this information shown in a wider column or a pop-out window?

title: Overdue Review Step Notification
body_text: There should be a Project notification setting specifically for when a member has an overdue Review Step. The notification frequency should be Daily until the Review Step has been submitted.

title: Generate Issue report sorted by sheet (placement)
body_text: In a lot of our use cases we present issue reports in meetings or send to users that do not (cannot) have access to one of our projects. It becomes quite annoying when going through a report and the issues are not sorted, or grouped, by sheet (placement) and we are forced to jump around. Please add the capability to sort however the user needs.

title: Exporting a Work Plan to PDF.
body_text: We are in need of being able to export a work plan to pdf.

title: Adding screen shot to meetings.
body_text: Can you enable a function so screen shots can just be added to meetings minutes via keyboard shortcut control paste (CTRL-V). Currently, if I want to do that now I have to save the screen shots, and reference it in photos. This takes too long, and too much clicking.

title: Add the ability to add a single or group of users to multiple projects in one go.
body_text: It is often necessary to add a user or group of users to multiple projects in ACC. e.g. a new member of staff. Account Admins need a function to add a user or group of users to multiple projects in one go.

title: Enable Company Logos on ACC Projects for APAC Servers
body_text: It’s frustrating that Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) accounts hosted on APAC servers lack the capability to add project logos—a feature that is natively supported in BIM360 and on ACC projects hosted in other regions, such as Europe and the Americas. This limitation forces users to rely on workarounds, which are not only inefficient but also inconsistent with Autodesk's promise of streamlined project management. It’s disappointing to see ACC missing basic functionality that BIM360 has offered

title: Decrease permission levels at a sub-folder with inherited permissions / Adding an option to break the inheritance.
body_text: Wishing having the ability to change inherited permissions of a sub-folder with other lower permissions. Right now, inherited permissions can only be raised for the sub-folder but not to be decreased. more valuable to have an option to break the inheritance.

title: View permissions by project member
body_text: Project Admin needs the ability to view permissions by project member. For example, an area to select member John Doe and you will see all modules and files John has access to. Specifically in files, you currently have to navigate to each folder to see what John has access to.

title: Project Template Additional Functionality
body_text: Project Templates need to have additional functionality added to them so that new projects don't need so many additional steps taken to get the project setup with the appropriate company standards. Sheet Discipline - The order and custom designations need to be added to the template so they don't need to be setup after a project is setup Report Templates - seems like a no-brainer, but maybe the currently in-beta Insight Builder will resolve this? I'm sure others have more, but these are the 2 th

title: Reviews: Improvement in comments report export: Need for PDF format
body_text: We request the implementation of a direct PDF export functionality within the "Comments in Review" report. The current Excel format presents configuration issues (layout, line breaks), requiring a manual and doubled effort to reformat the document and subsequently convert it to PDF. Including the PDF option will streamline the process and ensure the integrity of the report's layout.

title: Enable ACC Library Management Across Multiple Hubs
body_text: As multiple ACC hubs can be enabled under a single Autodesk account, it would be more effective for the ACC Library to be managed at a level above each individual hub. For example, if an organisation has three hubs representing different office locations, each currently requires its own ACC Library to be managed independently. Managing the library above the hub level would allow each office or division within the same organisation to work independently while maintaining company-wide standardisat

title: Issues & Files
body_text: When you are on a sheet you have to individually click on each issue - this would be good to have a number in the issue pin (instead of the type of pin) and utilize the issue list on the side view to link the number of the pin to the number on the list.

title: Sum Function in Properties Panel Not Working When Identical Revit Elements Are Selected in ACC Docs
body_text: 1. When selecting multiple elements, the Sum function in the Properties panel works if the selected elements have different element IDs. This allows users to see the total value for that parameter across selected elements. 2. However, if identical elements are selected—for example, copies of the same member with the same element ID—the Sum function does not appear or work in the Properties panel. It seems this is because the elements share the same object ID. Conclusion: Regardless of whether th

title: Enable Section Assignee for Forms Template Builder in the Account Admin Library & Project Templates
body_text: The Section Assignee feature in the Forms template builder is currently available only for templates created at the project level. This option is not available when creating templates in the Account Admin Library or in a project template, which would be more valuable for managing forms across multiple projects.

title: Email subject lines
body_text: The email subject lines can be confusing for all ACC emails and it would be nice to be able to customize these for clarity. We want to be able to customize the subject lines for emails that come out of ACC. It is confusing for our partners and clients and internal employees what the emails are requiring that come from ACC. Today we are having to perform extra training to get people to understand what the emails are trying to say.

title: Searching for model elements in ACC Docs using their Revit Element ID.
body_text: During meetings with Revit users or while reviewing an IFC file exported from Revit, the Revit Element ID (or Tag in IFC) is often used to identify specific elements. However, users who only have access to the BIM 360/ACC web interface do not have the option to search by Revit Element ID. If this information cannot be searched directly, it becomes challenging for ACC users to locate and reference the same elements during discussions, potentially impacting effective collaboration.

title: Custom attributes of type dropdown should allow multi-select
body_text: Wherever it is possible to create custom attributes, e.g. files or issues it would be beneficial if the attributes of type dropdown can be configured so that they are either single-select or multi-select. This would allow us to flag issue that belong to multiple areas or categories.

title: Request for Notification Enhancement in Forms Module – Autodesk Construction Cloud
body_text: We would like to bring to your attention to a request reported by clients (The Brij & Max Estates) who is actively using the Forms Module in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) for managing quality checklists, safety inspections, and other critical forms . Current Behavior: At present, once a form is initiated by a maker (initiator), email is automatically triggered and sent to all section assignees listed in the form, even before the initial section has been filled and submitted . Additionally, a

title: Contract Required Fields based on Type
body_text: Make fields within Contracts required base on the Type that is listed. For example: we have purchase orders and subcontracts within the cost module. If the type is subcontracts then all the custom attributes we created for subcontracts would be required.

title: Assign Smart PDF Forms to Company or Role
body_text: This one feels like it would be addressing an oversight rather than an idea or suggestion. Please Autodesk. Allow us to assign smart PDF forms to companies or roles. And while you are fixing that. Please make all companies available in forms if I have selected all project member in the permissions. Ta muchly

title: Cancel two step verification
body_text: Please provide a method to turn off 2 step verification in PlanGrid. We sometimes have other employees that need to log into projects in PlanGrid and the Verification Code is an issue because we may not have access to the persons email.

title: Add notification type - drawings have been approved
body_text: We need notification type in Files: 'documents changed status'. Currently we get notifications if we are part of reviews. Or we can get notification if we subscribe to folder when documents are uploded. But we have a lot of members who want to get notified if drawings got approved. So we need new notification type. Drawings status can be edited to any text per each project (status A, status B, status C, compliant, non compliant etc). So I think solution is to add general notification ´documents

title: Enhancing Create Transmittal function in ACC to prevent sending of wrong files.
body_text: Problem statement： Users may accidentally send transmittals to the wrong recipients or wrong files or, worse case, send the entire project files out Since transmittals cannot be deleted or void, there stand the danger of unintentionally exposing sensitive information which may result in undesirable consequences. Suggestion 1: Add a 2 step verification or warning notifications that make the user confirm their actions before allowing transmittal to be created when using the Create Transmittal butt

title: Geographical coordinates
body_text: Open the possibility of including, in addition to the address described, the geographical coordinates of a reference point of the project. These coordinates would replace the latitude and longitude that generate the location on the map of the "my projects" card and also in "insights"

title: Project specific roles
body_text: It would be nice to have the ability to create project specific roles at the project level. Some client's requirements include specific roles for their projects, so for a project admin to create roles and permissions ad-hoc on a project rather than creating several variations of a role at the account level would be beneficial. This would maintain a tidy account level roles list for the majority of projects, with perhaps another list or attribute to control the ad-hoc roles.

title: Automatic Filling of Related Attributes from File Names
body_text: When a file is uploaded to a folder with an active naming convention, the system attempts to fill the naming convention from the file name. Unfortunately, only the fields defined for the "Naming Standard" are filled. If there are additional "Related Attributes," they are not filled from the file name. Often, the last part of the file name contains the index or revision. This index cannot be part of the naming standard, it must always be manually transferred to the field. It would be great if the

title: Shared File Emails (Anyone with the Link) saved in Correspondence
body_text: When forwarding files directly as an email in Autodesk Docs (see screenshot), it would be helpful if this email could also be saved in the correspondence for later proof. This would ensure that it is clear for future tracking that the email was sent to the respective person, even if the recipient is not added as a member in ACC. Additionally, an alternative solution would be a new function that allows users to directly create and send the link along with the correspondence email. Currently, in C

title: Selection of Report Templates for Issue Export
body_text: Currently, it is possible to set up custom templates for issue detail reports, where you can define which custom issue fields should be included in the report. However, when selecting issues and exporting them directly, you can only choose between all custom fields or none. It would be very helpful if, during export, you could select a pre-configured report template and use the settings of that template for the export. Proposed Workflow: Select issues Open export function Select report template

title: Adding Notification Frequency: Weekly
body_text: Submitting this request on behalf of the EBA customer. Currently the notification setting options are: Instantly, Hourly, Daily, and Never. The customer looks for an option for Weekly as well.

title: Toggle through "previous" and "next" Submittal without going back to main list page
body_text: It would be very helpful if there was a "previous" and "next" submittal button to toggle through the submittals in order rather than having to back out to the main submittal list and select the next submittal each time. It would be best if it was able to toggle through the filtered main list if a filter was applied. For example, I need to work through tasks in my court, so to filter by Ball in Court, then toggle to the "next" in the list would be much faster than going back to the list page to s

title: Files (Docs) // Support for 360 Photo viewing
body_text: This is an ACC-specific request off the back of a similar and somewhat popular BIM 360 request. 360 degree Photo Viewer - Autodesk Community The Photos gallery in Build currently has 360 photo viewing support. This is great, but also very limiting. Files in Docs currently does not support 360 photo viewing. This causes many problems and data bottlenecks, especially when mentioned in the same sentence as ACC Apps and other ACC activities. ACC has numerous 3rd party Apps that captures 360 photos f

title: Separate File/Folder permissions ▢View ▢Link ▢Download ▢Modify ▢Create  ▢Delete
body_text: Proposal to Update File/Folder Permissions Current Approach: The existing selection pulldown for permissions will be replaced with granular checkboxes for Read/Write/Create (RWC) options for files and folders. Issue Identified: To manage Revit-Cloud-Workshare files, we currently require Edit permissions, which inadvertently allows the creation of subfolders. Proposed Permission Structure: Files: ▢ View: Web-only access ▢ Link: New feature allowing linking within Revit-Cloud-Workshared models (no

title: ACC Insight Dashboard and PDF Issues Report with Built-in Charting Features
body_text: We need BASIC chart features, like Pie Charts, to visually display the number of open and closed issues within the ACC Insight Dashboard and PDF Issues Report. ACC Reports should include diagram, trends for issues based on priority, zone, or issue type. Such reporting enhancements are basic but essential. This is a fundamental feature expected in reporting, yet currently, we are forced to use external software like Microsoft Power BI to achieve this..adding an unnecessary step to an already busy

title: Export Sheets with Asset Markups
body_text: It would be very helpful if assets placed on a sheet could be exported like any other markup. That way we can provide a "snapshot" of current progress to stakeholders who may not be apart of our ACC project. Right now the only option is to screen-shot, which results in a low resolution image.

title: Smart Folder Visualization: Identifying Empty Folders
body_text: Boost efficiency by visually identifying not only completely empty folders but also those containing only subfolders. Applying subtle gray shading or unique icons to these empty folders will benefit users working with predefined existing folder structures.

title: Streaming Civil 3D .sid on ACC for Image Quality
body_text: When viewing the xref image directly in Civil 3D on desktop the .sid is a large and dense image which is streamed (Per my troubleshoot with Autodesk). This means the image is constantly regenerating when it is zoomed in and appears high quality. The ACC Docs web viewer doesn't enable streaming, therefore the image is very grainy when zoomed in as it behaves like just a snapshot. This is problematic for my Civil 3D users who are trying to use the ACC platform for its viewing and sharing capabilit

title: Enable RFIs deadline to be set for working days as well as calendar days
body_text: Enable RFIs deadline to be set for working days as well as calendar days. Currently we're only able to set calendar days, whereas in the Review workflow there's an option to also select 'working days' to exclude weekends. Thanks

title: Complete real BIM workflow and save huge time and bugs
body_text: Design teams today are obliged to export in pdf and reload this pdf set in Docs to send to review process. The idea is to integreate pdf creation directly to bim process saving this timeconsuming and no bim task, to develop this idea Ipropose to take advantage of design collaboration product sets please see attached PNG explination file this idea. additionally this workflow solve known markups bugs that exist when used in a pdf, because now used native revit sheets to do markups 1.-if add new pa

title: Connection between MS Copilot/MS Teams Transcript and ACC Build MOM
body_text: Ability for ACC Build Minutes of Meeting to be generated automatically by connecting MS Copilot/MS Teams Transcript or by Autodesk AI taking the minutes.

title: Holding area : notification when file come
body_text: Hello, Using a naming convention is highly effective. When a file does not comply with this convention, it is placed in a Holding Area . Request: Currently, no notifications are sent when a file is moved to the Holding Area. It would be beneficial to introduce a notification process so that relevant users are informed as soon as a file enters this area, enabling faster review and resolution.

title: Project Admin Settings - Create Custom Attributes
body_text: At the University of Florida, we have a need to track custom attribute data at the project level. This data would be helpful for inclusion on project dashboards and account-level dashboards. I kindly suggest that Autodesk allow users to create custom attributes that can be managed by project administrators through the Project Settings page and via the API. It would be especially helpful if these custom attributes could be created on the project templates.

title: Allow setting a saved Viewpoint as the default start view in Autodesk Construction Cloud
body_text: It would be extremely helpful to have the ability to define a specific saved Viewpoint as the default start view when opening a model in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC). Currently, the "Set current view as home" option only applies to the current session and resets after closing the viewer. Suggested functionality: - Allow project admins or model authors to assign a saved Viewpoint as the default view for all users - This default view should load automatically every time the model is opened in

title: Add Account Level Activity Logging
body_text: Add Autodesk account activity logging so account admins can see all admin activity at the account level.

title: Markup should only be visible in the version where it was added.
body_text: Currently, markup added in older versions can still be seen in newer versions. However, this causes confusion because it's unclear which version of the document the markup was added to. Is it possible to make markup within a document visible only in the version where it was added?

title: Bring Browser Viewer Functionality in Line with Mobile App (Especially Sections Tool)
body_text: I’ve noticed a significant difference between the way the viewer works in the mobile app compared to the browser version. The mobile app offers a much smoother and more user-friendly experience, especially when working with the Sections tool . In the mobile app, creating and adjusting sections feels intuitive and efficient — for example, the simple arrow interface makes it easy to cut through models. In contrast, the browser viewer feels less polished and harder to use for the same tasks. In oth

title: Able to copy folders in ACC
body_text: Please allow copying of folders on ACC and not limited to files only.

title: ACC Build Feature Idea - Feedback in Meeting Minutes
body_text: In many projects, meeting minutes capture the “what” but not always the follow-up “so what.” Right now, if someone needs to respond to an action item — with clarifications, updates, or revised drawings — that conversation often happens over email, leaving the ACC record incomplete. A simple solution? Allow stakeholders to post feedback or responses directly in the Meeting Minutes item, complete with file attachments, and have these entries visually separated in a different colour. This could wor

title: Default CC people in cost when sending contracts/invoices/etc.
body_text: Each time we send a contract we have to manually CC people and remember to do that. We want to be able to set default people for the CC line so we only have to set this up once. If we forget to CC someone on a contract, we don’t get the information we need to people that need it and it slows workflows. We are manually copying people.

title: Advanced Document Tracking & Reporting in ACC Docs / Insight Builder
body_text: We are extensively using Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) across multiple large-scale construction projects for complete document and workflow management. While ACC provides a strong foundation, we have observed critical gaps in document tracking and reporting capabilities that significantly impact efficiency, especially when managing multiple projects. Current Challenges: Lack of visibility for documents linked to Reviews: In Insight Builder or Reports, there is currently no option to view whi

title: Add Asset Notifications
body_text: Add notifications for Asset activity, including asset creation, status changes and editing with the ability to control which users receive notifications. This would improve efficiency on projects that use Asset progressing.

title: Meeting Attendance Reporting
body_text: Would like to be able to run reports on meeting attendance. Have it contain, at minimum - meeting name, meeting date, attendees name, attendees' company, attendance status (absent or present).

title: Add a subject line when sharing a file
body_text: When a file is shared through the ACC Browser, the recipient receives an email where the subject line reads the name of the project and states that someone has shared a certain number of items. In our case, we receive several files from ACC users on a daily basis. It would be useful if there was the option to add a subject line when sharing a file. This will allow us to add more details about the file being shared. When we receive the email, the subject containing information about the file bein

title: Meeting Minutes Content Search
body_text: Currently, the meeting minutes module does not have the ability to search for content withing multiple Minutes/agenda. I would like to see this functionality as it would help us with finding when things were referenced in the past, and also legally during the discovery phase.

title: Show assets in Model Coordination aggregated 3D view
body_text: When creating assets from multi-discipline models, it would be highly beneficial to view the colored assets in a unified 3D view within the aggregated Model Coordination 3D view. This capability would provide project or BIM managers with a quick and comprehensive overview of all disciplines across different federated models—without the need to switch between individual models. It streamlines the process of checking and tracking asset status and progress in a single, cohesive 3D view. #STRABAG

title: Feature Enhancement Request – Visual Image Support in Meeting Minutes
body_text: Currently, while it's possible to attach files to meeting minute items in Autodesk Build, these attachments are stored in a way that does not display visually within the published meeting minutes. This results in reduced clarity and less effective communication, especially when visual context (e.g., annotated screenshots or site photos) is critical to the discussion. Feature Request: Enable the ability to paste (Ctrl+V) or drag-and-drop images directly into the body of a Meeting Minute item, sim

title: Export Overlay
body_text: I would like to be able to Export overlayed sheets to a PDF. Currently, when you click Compare, it will show the 2 overlayed documents but there is no way of exporting the overlay to a PDF. The exporting of overlayed sheets was an available feature on PlanGrid, but there is no option for exporting the overlays in Autodesk. Your help is appreciated!

title: Indicate Use Tax on Invoice
body_text: Our tax team reviews each invoice and indicates the use tax by line item for each different vendor. Currently there is no way to specify the use tax by line item in the invoice section.

title: Add electronic signature within mark ups
body_text: The Ability to add a signature to a file within mark ups to allow an item to be signed within a review workflow.

title: Request for "Description" attribute to be used as part of Naming Standard
body_text: When uploading files in Docs into folders with enforced Naming Standard "Description" attribute does not come up which means we need to add Description to all uploaded files manually after the upload of files. This would be very time consuming and not practical. As we were unable to add Description to naming standard because its built-in ACC attribute, we created new attribute "TITLE" and added it to our Naming Standard(s) as related attribute. This mean that it comes up when uploading files int

title: Handover to Organize Submittals by Spec Number/Section not ID
body_text: Both As-Built Exporter and Handover package Submittals up in the order of the non-editable Submittal ID number. Handover should group the Submittals, not just by type, but then by Spec Section. I don't need a Warranty piece for an HVAC next to a Lighting Panel - I need them based on their sections so maintenance teams and stakeholders can accurately and effectively get to one they need.

title: Request for Customizable Email Templates for Issue Notifications
body_text: I would like to customize the text of the emails sent for issue notifications. Currently, when an assignee is assigned to an issue, an email is sent, but the text is not suitable for customers. It would be helpful if we could add a template option to customize the email content.

title: Request for Customizable Issue Marker Colors
body_text: I would like to change the color of the issue markers. Currently, they are orange pins, but it would be helpful if we could set them to different colors like red or blue depending on their importance.

title: Submittal Spec Section Auto populate
body_text: Currentl,y you auto populate the spec section in the specification module. The specification module does not sync with the submittal. I would have to enter the one-by-one spec section in the submittal. Submittals and spec sections should sync with each other.

title: Measurements in the issue thumbnail in Model Coordination
body_text: It would be helpful for usability if annotations like measurements are saved in the issue thumbnail when creating an issue from clash in Model Coordination. Currently, only the line of the distance is saved without numbers.

title: Build Meetings - Navigation through meeting minutes
body_text: When we are writing meeting minutes, main view keeps on 'jumping' to the top any time when we click anywhere. Can you please remove this bug and allow us to scroll through meeting minutes window normally, like we would in pdf window. This breaks meeting dynamic and disturbs our work.

title: Better Filters for File selection during adding files to Handover
body_text: We use attributes in Autodesk Docs during the project phase. So it is very important for us that the filtering options from Autodesk Docs are available when adding files to the handover. Searching only by file name is often very difficult because, due to naming standards and versioning, many pieces of information are not included in the file name or folder structure but only in the designated attributes.

title: Need a way to know when Shared Links expire
body_text: Short of setting a custom attribute that most users won't fill out, how can we tell when a Shared Link will expire? It would also be helpful to get a report of who shared it, when, and then when the link expires in one place. Project Activity kind of works, but only for 30 days and if you have a link valid for 90 days, at some point the creation date will change and I do not want to have to hunt every 30/31 days for this information.

title: Account admin project list - search by project number
body_text: Feature request: Ability to search by project number while in account admin project list. Currently the only option is search by project name. @mark.kingCNGDL @matt.docter

title: Markups: Filter files by markups
body_text: If a document has markups, I can see that in the markup column. I am not able to filter this colum like the other ones. Also the option to only show files with markups or only export files with markups is missing.

title: Implement the functionality to create folder shortcuts within other folders in ACC-DOCS
body_text: In our project, we have a folder structure that includes various contracts and a central management folder for all contracts. In the contract management folder, we need to have links (shortcuts) to all the specific contract folders. This will facilitate quick and organized access to documents related to each contract. Example of Folders Structure: 00-Management -----01-Letters ----------01-Contract01 ---------------01-Letters --------------------01-Letters(Shortcut) --------------------(Other ma

title: New Stamp Feature allow to push through publish to sheets
body_text: To help with our workflow it would be nice if the approval stamp was allowed to be pushed in with the publish of sheets. Markups are not pushed through but stamps should be allowed. We have a review folder once the document is reviewed it is stamped and sent to a IFC folder then from there it is published. The IFC folder retains the stamp applied during the review but is lost once published to sheets. Maybe this is not the intended workflow, if not explain, but with this workflow the printable s

title: Request Permission to ACC Project
body_text: There needs to be a Request Access to Project interface. When new team members need to be added to a project, they should be able to follow a link to the project and request permissions from the project admins.

title: Schedule & Primavera P6 - Physical % Complete
body_text: We do our scheduling program in P6 and then upload it into ACC Schedule once a week but the "% complete" column does not correlate to "Physical % complete" and I already know it only translates "Duration % complete" correctly. The reason why we are and want to use the Physical option is we can write the percentage manually, but the Duration option is a fixed formula with respect to current date, start date and finish date. My feature request is: Is it possible to add the usage of "Physical % com

title: PowerBI dashboard for de RFI | Days overdue
body_text: Hi, We are using the Data connector (insight) from ACC to create PowerBI dashboard for de RFI. One specific dashboard we are trying to create is days overdue. Our calculation is: As the RFI is created day overdue starts because we should close all RFI within 24 hours (excluding weekends and holyday’s). and when the RFI is closed, it should stop counting. Our formula is: Days Overdue = if(ISBLANK(rfis_rfis[closed_at]), NETWORKDAYS(rfis_rfis[created_at],TODAY()), (NETWORKDAYS(rfis_rfis[created_at]

title: Account-Level Settings - Allow users to browse all projects in account and request access
body_text: There should be account-level settings to allow: 1. All users in an account to be able to browse the list of projects and request access as required. 2. Allow full access to all projects for all users in an account. There should be a setting at the project level to disable this for certain projects, as required. We are currently doing a mass migration of projects to ACC and there is a high burden on the project and account admins to track down project teams and provide access. We have also found

title: See linked models in tree view (name and version) on ACC (Autodesk Construction Cloud) and be able to hide entire linked models
body_text: When viewing our published models on ACC (Autodesk Construction Cloud) that contain multiple linked models we would like to see the linked models in the tree view/structure (model browser) (name and version) and also be able to hide entire link.

title: Markups in Transmittals
body_text: It would be valuable to be able to send a transmittal to a team member that included mark-ups made on the drawing. It would streamline the communication and then being able to see the mark-ups

title: Bulk Delete, Select Multiple Photos
body_text: Please encode a way to delete more than one photo at a time. It is very easy to upload swaths of photos to the wrong project, and nearly impossibly tedious to remove them individually.

title: Copying/Duplicating Option Required in Autodesk Takeoff Type Template.
body_text: When creating a Takeoff Template, currently, the takeoff types have to be manually created for each part, which is time-consuming. We need a functionality that allows us to copy/duplicate/import-export options, which will significantly reduce the need for manual entries.

title: Add revision control to Reviews like files revision control
body_text: Here is an idea to simplify Reviews. It will be more usability if we add revision control. Here how it is now. In some reasons one Review can repeat (mistakes, changes, ets.). In big projects we have thousands of review. Here is example 20 % of project. it's not easy to understand what going on. If we reduce amount of records it will be usefull. How I see it. In this way we not see all duplicates and have ability to compare if needed of course need to improve submit review menu

title: Autodesk AI Assistant to generate BIM Execution Plan
body_text: Using Autodesk AI Assistant to generate BIM Execution Plan from the Customer requirements which are also uploaded into ACC

title: ACC Specification
body_text: Simpler upload functionality to upload 000's of specifications allowing to skip version sets etc and shortening the upload process

title: Revise and Resubmit Payment Application to first approver
body_text: When Payment Application is rejected during the approval workflow, we suggested that the status of Payment Application will be changed to ‘Submitted’ rather than ‘Revise and Resubmit’. If the user click 'Submitted' button, the claimed Work Completed would take the Work Completed amount which is inaccurate. The Claimed Work Completed should remain as the supplier’s first submission. The submitted status should remain the Claimed Work Completed original amount and allow the user to edit the Work C

title: Add Section Assignee Support to Account Library Forms and Project Templates
body_text: Please enable the ability to configure Section Assignees in Autodesk Build Form Templates at both the Account Library level and within Project Templates . Today, Section Assignees can only be set inside an active project, after the form has already been deployed AND copied, which prevents standardized, centralized setup. Current Limitation Section Assignees are not available when creating or editing a form in the Account Library Section Assignees do not carry through Project Templates Project Ad

title: Desktop Connector path generation tool
body_text: Being that Desktop connector file paths in File Explorer are unique to Workspace (user profile by default), when sharing file/folder locations with team members by copying paths in address bar (or right-clicking and copying path), the address does not work for other team members (unless everyone's workspace is set to the same location somewhere not in user profile). Replacing the Desktop Connector Workspace location with "Autodesk Docs" does make the path universal and usable to others on the pr

title: Correspondence "Reply" options/BCC Recepients
body_text: Correspondence needs a BCC field or an advance setting that sets all replies to go to the initial creator only. For example when using Correspondence to issue a Delta notification sent to all Subcontractors and they start sending replies with cost, it is issued to ALL other contacts in the initial Correspondence - eliminating cost confidentiality, and generating a lot of unnecessary emails to everyone else on the initial message.

title: Issue Report Template - Watchers field not available
body_text: Even though we have Watcher's field in the Issue detail, when we extract the report, it's not appearing. Even in the template field list watcher field is not available

title: Permissions for Issue Types
body_text: Currently, permissions in Autodesk ACC apply at the overall issue level – meaning that all users with issue permissions can see and create all issue types that exist in the project. This creates challenges, particularly on construction sites: Contractors and field workers are often presented with a long list of issue types , many of which are irrelevant to their role. This increases confusion, leads to frequent mistakes when selecting issue types, and results in poor data quality for later repor

title: Enable to assign RFIs by company or role
body_text: It would be better to have the option to assign RFIs by company or role, instead of being limited to adding up to 10 individual users. Currently, the option to assign by company or role is only available for default watchers, not default reviewers. Allowing assignment by company or role for reviewers would make it easier for users within the same company to receive and respond to RFIs.

title: Folders Content Indicators
body_text: In large projects, our files section often contains a large number of different folders automatically created based on our project template. When a project get started, most of the folders are empty. Sometimes, it can be hard to know in which folders an upload has been made so we have to open each folder invidually to look for something. We have come up with a system using a check mark emojii in the folder name when somthing is uploaded, but this leads to some problems in itself and I'm sure the

title: Civil 3D Part Catalog Support
body_text: Per discussion with Autodesk staff during the Level Up Your Civil 3D Projects with Connected Workflows in the Cloud webinar, hosting Civil 3D Part catalogs on ACC is not supported. The Part Catalogs are several folders deep, have many long filenames, and make use of forbidden .html files. Because of this, it is not surprising that Part Catalogs are difficult to implement on ACC. However, excluding Part Catalog support for Civil 3D is analogous to requiring Revit design teams to leave their famil

title: Markups in ACC not showing via Desktop Connector — Big Problem for Multi-Tool Projects
body_text: I’ve run into a consistent issue that’s causing real headaches. When we create and publish markups in ACC, they look fine in the web or mobile viewer — but they’re invisible through Desktop Connector or when the file is opened in any other PDF tool. From what I understand, ACC stores markups as an overlay in its own viewer, not as an actual change to the PDF or DWG file in Docs. That means the underlying file never gets updated, so Desktop Connector doesn’t see a new version to sync. If you open

title: Cannot search through the Meetings
body_text: Cannot search through the Meetings - no searchbar

title: ACC Browser - Recognise URL and folder shortcuts
body_text: In the ACC Browser, it would be useful if file types such as URL's and folder shortcuts are supported. Currently, files of this format are not supported and cannot be uploaded to the ACC Browser. When files of this format are uploaded through the Desktop Connector, they do not appear on the ACC Browser. It would be helpful to be able to upload and view URL's and folder shortcuts through the ACC Browser.

title: Enable to filter Issues by placement
body_text: In a large project, we need the issues for the review process. Each issue is assigned (placed) on a document. Unfortunately, it is not possible to filter the issues according to the placement. Therefore, all project participants (several hundred people) have to transfer the placement to the name every time they create an issue. This allows you to search for the name later and find all issues in one document. It would be much easier if we could filter the issues by placement.

title: ACC Admin - Add Members Metadata to the Account Directory When Adding From Project
body_text: Currently when you add a new user to a project that does not yet exist in the account level directory yet, it will add them to the project with the assigned role and company, but then it adds them to the account directory with no company or role assigned. This means that our workflow currently is clunky where we get a request to add a user and we try to add them to a project, but if they do not exist in the account yet we then need to go to the account directory and add them there first with the

title: Definition eines Export-Standards (Projekt odeer HUB) für das Herunterladen von Dateien
body_text: Es wäre sehr nützlich, wenn in der Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) die Möglichkeit geschaffen würde, einen globalen (HUB) oder projektspezifischen Export-Standard für das Herunterladen von Dateien zu definieren. Diese Funktion würde die Konsistenz und Effizienz beim Exportieren von Dateien innerhalb der ACC verbessern. Besonders vorteilhaft wäre dies für die Benennung und Strukturierung von exportierten Daten. Ein solcher Standard würde die Handhabung von Projektdokumenten erheblich vereinfach

title: Schedule - Exporting and Reports Needed
body_text: Need ability to generate and print reports from the schedule tool, specifically reports showing things that have changed when a schedule is updated, such as Delayed start, new activities, in/out of critical path. It's nice to be able to see these in Autodesk, but a report that we can print or share is needed. We also need to be able to print a PDF comparing schedules when comparing versions. We also need to be able to export PDF's, including filtered views. For example, if I filter to see only c

title: Hiding unused fields in the flyouts
body_text: Hiding unused subsections of each section of the flyouts. You currently have the ability to hide the sections but there are times I don't want to remove each section in its entirety, just a piece of it. Also would be beneficial to control this from the library.

title: Plangrid time out due to inactivity adjustment
body_text: Currently PlanGrid automatically logs you out after 1 hr due to inactivity and you have to relog back in and do 2fa every time despite clicking the box saying every 30 days. This is very time consuming especially now with 2fa enabled. With the current 2fa it is not only very annoying but sometimes doubles the amount of time it takes for a task, since I have to wait longer for the 2fA email to show up to log in that it would have taken in first place to just look at the submittal, photo or plan p

title: save sorting settings of the projects in "My Home"
body_text: The sorting of projects in the "My Home" area should be saved when changed by the user. Ideally, it should be possible to set the sorting individually.

title: Allowing Clash Issues Be Seen In Federate Views/Models
body_text: Hi, We recently found out that all the clashes made in ACC Model Coordination are automatically placed on the original model (task team model), and if these models are published without the links and are only aggregated in ACC Model Coordination, the clashes will not be visible to the users who only have ACC Docs or Build. There is only a thumbnail image which shows what is clashing with what, and no other way to see the clash in Docs. In order for everyone to be able to see what elements are ac

title: Add Packages to Transmittals
body_text: In order to add files that are in a package to a transmittal currently, you have to open the package, select all of the files, then you can add those files to the transmittal. So in essence you are adding the package to the transmittal, but not really. I want to add it as a package. As one entity. Makes it simpler and also ensures a slip of the wrist doesn't remove something. If I'm wrong on something here, and it is currently possible, please let me know. Thank you.

title: clickable links in PDF ACC Viewer
body_text: It would be very practical and helpful to have clickable links in PDF in ACC Viewer, both in a web browser and the ACC app.

title: "Go to Desktop Connector" file menu option in Docs file list
body_text: It would be helpful to have "Go to Desktop Connector" file menu option. There is no easy and quick way to get to the file in Desktop Connector when we are in Autodesk Docs file list level. We have to manually go to Windows Explorer and navigate through folders, to get to the file. Search by name option in Windows Explorer isn't convenient.

title: Hide all 'Closed' Issues from Sheets and Files
body_text: Please remove 'Closed' Issues from Sheets/Files. They should not be shown on the plan and should be accessible only from the Issues panel instead. We have hundreds of closed Issues on some drawings and as they are all still present on the drawing it is not a good user experience and also slows the loading time. Please hide all 'Closed' issues from the drawings as standard, as was the case in BIM 360. Thanks

title: Mass Sheet Comparison
body_text: Autodesk Build currently does mass sheet number and title recognition upon uploading a new drawing version set. However, the next step I typically need to take is to find what changed compared to the last version set. The existing sheet comparison tool can only be used one sheet at a time. This is impractical to use to compare a fresh set of hundreds of sheets for changes against the previous set. My current workflow is therefore to export the current and previous set from Autodesk Build for off

title: Permission
body_text: It would be beneficial to be able to set permissions in a project template for specifications, issues, RFIs, submittals, and assets. These permissions could be role and company based. Setting permissions in this way would save a lot of time since it would remove the need to update the permissions every time a new project is created.

title: Clash detection of embedded objects
body_text: Idea reported on behalf of Customer: There is a need to add a possibility of clash detection of embedded objects. ACC does not recognize collision in case of smaller mass object inside bigger mass object. Collision is recognized when the surface of one object touches or goes through surface of another object.

title: Bridge metadata within the documents
body_text: Once bridge is used to share documents between projects, the metadata associated to the documents is not "bridged". Metadata is as much important as the document itself. So this should be also bridge within the doc.

title: Multi-Select Issues/Assets by holding Shift Key
body_text: Currently, it is not possible to select multiple "Issues" and "Assets" by holding the Shift key. This functionality is currently only available for "Sheets" and "Files," where you can select the entire range by holding the Shift key and selecting two entries. It would be helpful if this worked similarly for "Issues" and "Assets," allowing for quick selection of a range of entries. Sheets: Issues: Assets:

title: Automatic Synchronization of Individual Files with Bridge
body_text: Currently, it is only possible to automatically synchronize entire folders with "Bridge" to other projects. Since usually not the entire content but only individual files are relevant, the ability to synchronize individual files would be advantageous. Individual files always have to be manually copied between different ACC projects, and it is not possible to enable the "Automatic syncing enabled" option for them.

title: Simplified Upload of New File Versions via Drag & Drop in Viewer
body_text: We would like to upload a new version of a file by opening the existing file version and then dragging and dropping a new file into the viewer. It should not matter what the new file's name is; it should always take the name of the opened file to maintain the naming standard and versioning. Alternatively, there could be a function under the "..." menu to upload a new version of the file. It is important that adding via drag and drop is always possible. Often, we are viewing a file in the ACC vie

title: Hide Insulation in ACC Viewer (Model Browser) for Revit Fabrication Items
body_text: In the attached video, there are two Revit Fabrication pipes (blue and red) and one Revit Design pipe (gray), both categories have insulation. In the ACC model browser, the entire insulation of the design pipes can be easily removed by hiding the entire model category. However, for the fabrication components, all insulations are also categorized as pipes and thus fall under the same model category, making it impossible to hide the insulation entirely. Each piece of insulation must be hidden indi

title: ACC app - eraser function
body_text: Feature request to add an additional function in ACC app when making markups on photos using pen on iPad - eraser function . When opening Photos in ACC app and using pen on iPad only "redo" and "undo" function is available. An eraser function is needed.

title: Search tool to the content inside the project
body_text: I used similar software (Procore) for a while and it has a superb tool to search for any word within the project delivering where the word was founded (RFIs, Sheets, Meetings, Files, etc...). All the content was indexed. It will be great if ACC has something similar as we often need to quickly search a specific subject inside the platform content. I think it should be a must have!! Thank you.

title: Sheets: Folders and Subfolders
body_text: We need to (be able to) separate Sheets into Folders. The Collections are a step in the right direction, but Folders and Subfolders would allow users to better organize and manage Sheets. This would more easily facilitate the much needed Permissions for Sheets.

title: Refresh button for Coordination Spaces
body_text: In Model Coordination, it seems that Coordination Spaces update periodically. However, this can be frustrating when you have made changes and have to wait for the clash matrix to update in its own time. The ability to force the Coordination Space to refresh and update the Clash Matrix, would be great.

title: Tasks Module
body_text: Can we have a Tasks module in Build, similar to the PlanGrid Task / Activity page, that shows us all tasks/activities on a job? This can pull from open tasks on all modules and allow us to create our own tasks with assignments. Some of our users use the Issues module as a project to-do list, but it really isn't meant for that. If we can have one running list of tasks and filter by status, who they are assigned to, due dates, etc, that would help the team ensure no balls are dropped (and eliminat

title: Automatic Column Length Adjustment with Double-Click
body_text: It would be nice if the columns in Docs could automatically adjust to the necessary length with a double-click.

title: Scheduled Publish Without links
body_text: It would be helpful if there is an option in the Schedule Publish Settings, under the Design Collaboration, to exclude links in the publishing. There are times when links are not required on a scheduled publish. This will be a redundant work for us because we are required to do execute a manual publish, thus, rendering the scheduled published model, useless.

title: Implement a real and functional ISO 19650 workflow for file states in Docs
body_text: This one is probably the biggest issue we have with ACC. According to ISO 19650, the information containers should be able to exist in states such as WIP, Shared and Published and the permisions and visibility should be controlled by these states. ACC provides no such functionality, therefore we have to enable this by having separate folders named WIP, Shared etc., where the permissions are assigned per role. That is really not great as it leads too file duplicities and seamless approval workflo

title: Automated Follow-up Review Process
body_text: It would be nice to have the option for an action after the approval of a review to automatically initiate a new review, ensuring that all necessary steps and quality standards have been met. This would seamlessly continue the workflow, ensuring no delays occur before proceeding to the next stage of the process.

title: Move ACC ideas from B360 Forum
body_text: There are a considerable number of ideas that concern ACC over on the BIM 360 forum. Please move these here and do not make the contributors re-post them.

title: Schedule - 4D Capabilities
body_text: It is super important to understand at all times what the construction progress is on site from both a planned and actual perspective. There are a couple of products currently on the market that we know can enable customers on achieving that, all of them outdated and disconnected from the construction ecosystem- Navisworks Timeliner, Synchro (Bentley), Assemble tool (Schedule Integrator)

title: Submittals - Custom Attributes / Fields
body_text: Now we can add our own custom attributes for Issues and RFIs. We also need the same methodology for Submittals. As an example: we want to categorize our Submittals meaning that when creating a submittal the user can choose a subtype. Another example is that we want to add an attribute to define the internal priority of the Submittal (low, medium, high) or designate submittals for specific phases or buildings of a project.

title: Project Locations for Docs
body_text: It would be helpful to add Project Admin Locations as Docs attributes. In this way all files in Docs will be aligned to project standard locations in a consistent way.

title: Adding Photos to Issues is causing my field issues - Adding them as Attachments is too easy when we need References
body_text: When adding an issue on an iPad, it used to be the case that to add a photo a user would need to scroll down to the References section, select '+Add' and then the user could select 'Use Camera' and add a photo to the issue. This photo could then be used by all project members. However, a few months ago the interface was updated and this 'Attachments New' section showed up with big, obvious button that says 'Use camera'. Attachments are not available anywhere else in the project. Despite multiple

title: Project Admin Self-Removal in ACC
body_text: It would be highly beneficial if a Project Admin could have the ability to remove themselves from a project without requiring approval or action from another Project Admin. This functionality would streamline project management and provide greater flexibility for admins when managing their participation in projects.

title: Moving Mark-Ups between different Versions
body_text: It would be good if, when the layout of a plan changes, the markings are also moved accordingly. For example, if the floor plan and the section are swapped on a plan, the previous markings should also be moved. This prevents any confusion when plans are moved. This applies in particular to PDF and DWG files, as well as plans in Revit files that are stored in Docs and compared with each other through version control.

title: BuildingConnected - Delete bid packages
body_text: Hello, I would like to request Autodesk to bring back a long standing feature of BuildingConnected which supported deleting bid packages / bidders after publishing the package. I n a small construction business like ours, we occasionally need to revise our scope of work. This can involve removing a bid package or a bidder entirely. Autodesk customer support suggested, we could technically create a new project and close the existing one to achieve the same outcome; however, this approach would re

title: Allow Non-Admin Users to Create Form Templates
body_text: This is a problem because the people who normally create and manage these templates are not the same as the project admins. As a result, teams are forced either to: Grant temporary admin rights to users who should not have full access, or Create auxiliary projects just to generate templates. Both workarounds create risks and inefficiencies. Other modules, such as the Assets module or the Schedule module, already have their own permission settings that allow specific user roles to manage them wit

title: Announcement Feature or Notice board
body_text: Need: ACC is the project’s single source of truth, but there’s no central way to share urgent information (HSE alerts, workflow changes, site rules). Updates get lost in emails or WhatsApp. Feature Concept: Add a Project Announcements function with: Login Pop-Up for urgent notices. Dashboard Bulletin Board visible on the project home screen. Targeted Distribution to all users or selected roles/companies. Expiry & Acknowledgement Tracking for compliance and audit. Multi-Format Support (text, imag

title: Reopening Closed Forms in ACC
body_text: To improve this process, we need the ability to reopen closed forms that have the " Review " status toggled on. This will allow form or template managers to make necessary corrections to a closed form after its status has been changed from "In Review" to "Closed."

title: Referencing Meetings in Issues
body_text: We currently cannot reference Meetings in Issues. It would be helpful to have the ability to reference all other ACC activities as some meeting minutes are relevant to an issue, and the only solution currently is to PDF the meeting minutes and attaching to the Issue, which breaks the golden thread.

title: Documents copied after review with markups when approver doesn't have upload permissions
body_text: It is currently not possible to have a review automatically copy a document if the final approver does not have uploading permissions. This shouldn't be based on the permissions of the approver, but should be system generated. If we don't want to give the final approver upload permissions, we can't configure a review to copy the documents. Then you are left with manually copying the documents, but then markups cannot be copied.

title: Duplicate Issues
body_text: Is there a way to duplicate an issue?

title: Issues Pop Up Window Adjustment
body_text: When we click on an existing issue in the issues section of ACC a small window opens on the right-hand side of the screen that's about 4" wide with the information regarding that issue. Back in the days of BIM 360, when you selected an issue, a large window would open in the center of the screen giving the user all the relevant information on the issue. In our opinion, this is preferred to the current layout. Having all of the required information for issues crammed into a corner is less than id

title: Request for Control to Prevent Accidental Discarding of Forms in ACC
body_text: We would like to bring to your attention a recurring issue being faced across multiple accounts, regarding the Build Forms module in Autodesk Construction Cloud. It has been observed that users are accidentally discarding forms across various projects. This typically happens due to the close proximity of the “Discard” button to other active forms buttons, and the absence of a access control mechanism to prevent unintentional discards. Given the importance of these forms in ongoing construction w

title: Stamps to be made Visible in Transmittals or Downloaded Drawings
body_text: We’ve observed that stamps and markups added to drawings are visible in the Files tool but not in transmittals. When creating a transmittal or downloading files from it, these annotations are missing. Based on Autodesk documentation, this appears to be expected behavior—however, we’d like to request a feature enhancement to retain stamps and markups in transmittals and their downloads.

title: Autodesk Takeoff - Stop resetting vector view toggle when returning to a sheet
body_text: When working in 2D sheets that are not auto-vectorized, I have to manually enable vector view (or snapping to vector geometry) every time I return to the sheet. Autodesk Takeoff disables this by default each time I leave and come back. This is disruptive when doing quantity takeoff across multiple sheets and needing snapping enabled for precision — especially for aligning to existing takeoffs. Feature request: Preserve the “Enable Vector View” setting per sheet across sessions Or allow a project

title: Autodesk Takeoff - Allow users to continue a takeoff after completion instead of forcing new geometry
body_text: When drawing an area takeoff, if I click out or stop partway through, I can’t resume the same takeoff later. Autodesk Takeoff finalizes the shape the moment I complete it, and there's no “Continue Takeoff” function. If I don’t trace an entire parking lot or slab at once, I’m forced to: Either create a new shape next to the old one (breaking continuity) Or go into vertex editing, which is tedious and error-prone This hurts productivity on large or complex scopes. We need the ability to reopen or

title: Add In-App Notification Center or Inbox for ACC Users
body_text: Currently, Autodesk Construction Cloud only supports email-based notifications for updates such as document changes, task assignments, issue updates, and other project activities. While this is helpful, it lacks the convenience and efficiency of an in-app notification center or inbox , which has become standard in most modern collaboration platforms. As a result: Users must rely solely on email to stay updated. Important updates can get lost in cluttered inboxes or overlooked. There is no centra

title: submittal reminder
body_text: Would like the ability to send a reminder to a member regarding an overdue response to a submittal

title: Auto Filling Location on Photos When Photos are Tied to an Issue that has a Location
body_text: When I generate an Issue and Take a photo that is tied to the issue, and a Location has been selected in the Issue, The Location Should Automatically be tied to the Photo as well.

title: ACC Takeoff - Folders and Subfolders for Packages
body_text: When using Packages in ACC Takeoff it would be crucial to organize the packages in folders and subfolders. Especially in a bigger project with different types of infrastrucutre and with different people working in the same project. The same applies for the sheets and models. Please add this feature as soon as possible.

title: Inline Editing for Assets Data
body_text: Currently, users need to click on an object to open a separate window on the right side to enter data for the parameters. This process is time-consuming and clumsy. Proposal: Introduce an inline editing feature that allows users to change data directly in the table cells, similar to Docs. This would significantly improve user-friendliness.

title: Import Spec Sections into Submittal Tool
body_text: Rather than having to manually enter every project spec section in the submittals tool, it would be nice to be able to import them from a word or excel file. They could then be brought in all at once and would match the contract document spec book.

title: Add "Change in Member Status" to Activity Log
body_text: The activity log has activity types for "member added to project", "member added to project as project administrator", "member removed from project", and "project administrator removed from project". There is no activity logged when a member is changed to a project administrator or when a project administrator is changed to a member. This should be added.

title: Duplicate Issues
body_text: Need the ability to duplicate issues in Build, the same way RFI's can be duplicated. Would be very helpful during QA/QC walks.

title: Improvement of 3D section box in Model Coordination
body_text: It would be convenient and helpful if the 3D section box in Model Coordination is always oriented to the project north of the loaded models (not only the first loaded model), and if the view from Model Coordination is saved, it remembers the settings.

title: MarkUp: PDF Objects after Export
body_text: At the moment, markups on exported PDF files are not editable objects in the PDF file. This is problematic if you have to work with other companies that don't use ACC. In BIM360, all markups were editable objects after an export.

title: Custom Form Types
body_text: ACC has default form types (Quality, Commissioning, Safety, Punchlist) that seems to be default. Need to be able to create custom form types. It is possible to create custom issue types, custom asset field types, custom asset status types. But, it does not appear possible to create custom checklist/ form types.

title: Drag and Drop email from Outlook Desktop application
body_text: Hi Could you please re-add the ability to drag and drop email messages directly from the Outlook desktop application to the Web based ACC Doc > Project files area please? Prior to around August 2024, our users were able to drag and drop emails directly from the Outlook app, straight into the Web based ACC Docs area. Since then, when performing the same action, it fails to upload, it acts as if nothing has been dragged into the upload "area" This is on Chrome and Edge browsers. I downloaded Firef

title: Add project members from mobile app
body_text: It would be great if project admin could add project members from the mobile app.

title: ACC-Traffic Light Protocol (TLP)
body_text: In Autodesk Docs, I would be grate to have possibility to classify documents as defined in Traffic Light Protocol (TLP): Display TLP Information Inside the Document, Designating the End of TLP-Labeled Text, Handling TLP in Automated Information Exchanges, Additional Sharing Restrictions, Permission Management, Logging and Auditing.

title: Auto-Complete Function for File Attributes in Docs (Naming Standards)
body_text: When uploading new files that have a naming convention, it would be very helpful if text fields had an auto-complete feature that suggests previously entered values as you type. This "Auto-Complete" function would provide suggestions based on what has already been entered in that field. This would significantly reduce errors due to typos and make adding new files much faster.

title: Improve Assets Reports
body_text: The assets report contains a lot of information that is not needed (Who created the report, who created the asset, when was the asset created). Other helpful information is not displayed. For example, we need the location of an asset on a plan in the report. The plan is only stored as a link.

title: Optimization of Redirected Links for the ACC App on Tablets
body_text: Redirect links to files or links sent to tasks, sheets, assets, etc., currently only work on the web. When someone clicks on this link on an iPad, the app briefly opens but then redirects back to the web. Since the web interface is not optimized for tablets, the user cannot effectively use it. This is particularly impractical because the field team is the group that would greatly benefit from such links, which directly lead to documents, tasks, sheets, etc., and would significantly increase acce

title: enhancement for "Extract pages and attributes"
body_text: It would be beneficial to be able to ignore page(s) in the extraction dialog: A PDF with more page can not used with this feature - but if we have the possibility to ignore these multiple pages, we can extract the needed data. BR Markus

title: Direct Creation and Assignment of Locations in Sheets
body_text: Currently, it is possible to manually create locations as areas in a sheet. The problem is that each location must be individually assigned to the sheets and then the area defined. It would be very helpful and more efficient if areas could be created directly from the sheet and assigned to the location. This should work similarly to assets, where it is possible to select an existing asset and then draw the area directly in the sheet. Proposed Workflow: Open Sheet and Autodesk Build Sheets Functi

title: Business Units for ACC
