body_text: Our office executes dozens of projects for several clients every year. It would be very helpful to segregate the projects by client, and even by site for those clients. The Business Units feature in BIM360 seems like it would be a good tool for this need. It would be helpful to also to have that as a sortable field on the Projects homepage.

title: ESG (Environmental, Social and Governance)
body_text: Considering ESG (Environmental, Social and Governance), I propose an improvement in the system where an equivalent is indicated in relation to the impact we are avoiding with printing (A4-A0 formats, equivalent pages), for example, the percentage equivalent to 1 tree, kg of CO2 we stop emitting, amount of energy saved. Indicators that add value to Docs. Trees: Corresponds to the number of trees used to make paperCarbon: Corresponds to gases released in the production of paper (CO2 equivalent)Ene

title: Instant Synchronization of Issues and Reporting Card on Insight Dashboard
body_text: The current synchronization time between Issues and the Reporting card on Autodesk Construction Cloud's Insight dashboard takes hours, leading to delays in reflecting the actual number of OPEN issues. Updated Nos of OPEN and CLOSE Issues on the dashboard is essential for timely and effective decision-making.

title: Ability to Edit multiple Photos information at once
body_text: Currently, you can only add locations and takes to one photo at a time. The idea is to have the ability to make bulk edits (adding locations and tags) to multiple photos at once (similar to how you can with sheet tags).

title: Offer split view mode
body_text: B360 Docs had it, so why doesn't ACC Docs?

title: Expandable Side Panels
body_text: It would be really helpful to expand out the Side Panels - especially Issues. We can increase the box/window size in Revit and Manage, but not on the website. When descriptions are detailed, you have even more scrolling to get the whole picture. If we could expand out the side panel, it would be very helpful.

title: Coordination Issues Plug-in for AutoCAD and Civil3D
body_text: We have trade partners that have not moved to the Revit platform and are still using AutoCAD (in various flavors) to create their 3D content. Here locally, this is common for Fire Protection and Underground Utilities (generally "wet" utility piping like Storm, Sanitary, Water, Gas, etc.). It would be very beneficial if there was an Issues/Coordination plug-in for AutoCAD and Civil3D similar to the plug-in for Revit that would allow the modelers to see the issues within their authoring model.

title: Provide permissions for correspondence
body_text: I would like the option for all correspondence to be visible to all team members in ACC, not just team members in recipient list.

title: Make Reality Capture files (.rcs / .rcp) compatible with Model Coordination
body_text: It would be extremely helpful to bring reality capture files (in my case, mobile laser scans) into Model Coordination so that it can be aggregated with other models.

title: Docs holding area accessible to non-admin users.
body_text: Make the holding area accessible to users without project admin permission level. The person uploading documents should be able to fix the naming convention.

title: Different Scale selection for same Sheet in Takeoff
body_text: At the moment, one scale can be set per sheet but it would be a nice feature to be able to set different scales for different viewports on the same sheet.

title: Actions after reviewing a file.
body_text: In Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) there is the capability to automatically perform actions after reviewing a file. One of these actions is to automatically copy approved files. Our workflows are designed to move files to different folders based on the review. It would be helpful to have the option "Automatically move to folder after approval."

title: Auto-Publish & Markup Toggles
body_text: A toggle to auto-publish markups like Photos in BUILD needs to be added. While the photos added by users will auto-upload to the "Photos" tab, if the user doesn't hit "Publish" for each and every photo, they are not linked back to plans. This makes the entire process significantly less efficient. Worse still if you do not capture this and the employee leaves, there is no way to recover that markup location as even Administrators can't publish "private" markups. (Which, be definition are still pr

title: Search- and Selection options for Desktop Connector
body_text: In the Desktop Connector when Selecting Projects, you have a dialog box to select up to 40 projects. - Please add a Search or Filter function to search through projects more easily (red in screenshot). The more companies are going to use ACC and Desktop Connector, the more projects you will have to choose from, some people may have up to 100-1000 projects under their account. - In the tab 'My Selections' (orange in screenshot), have the option to select/deselect multiple projects at the same tim

title: Diagrams in Forms to do custom mark ups in performance checks
body_text: When performing checks for ventilation or other pressure checks it is needed to mark up some figures or point on top of a diagram. This is about the air flow, or multiple test in a single environment. For this particulair checking it is needed to have this diagram.

title: Auto-trigger flows for attribute population
body_text: In addition to triggering review flows, it would be very useful to extend the scope of Auto-Triggers to other actions such as auto-filling attributes according to defined conditions.

title: Assets permission: Manage - Be able to import assets from models
body_text: With the Manage permission in Assets you should be able to also import assets from models. Now, as of 11th December 2025, it is only the project admins who can do it. This is not good because you preferably want the persons (f.ex. 3rd party) handling Assets not be able to control the whole project. This is especially critical when working with multiple stakeholders.

title: Shift Insight Reporting from Reviews to Files
body_text: Reporting must always be file-level, as CDE Admins and other relevant parties need to know which files were reviewed, which remain in review, whether they are overdue, and their associated metadata. Insight cards should therefore focus on files, not on reviews. Review numbers have no contractual value; what matters is which files where reviewed, which ones are still under review and whether they are overdue.

title: ACC - Delete Transmittal
body_text: I have a scenario where my team mistakenly issued a transmittal to the wrong recipient, who should not have had access to the document. This is a significant concern, as the current Transmittal functionality does not allow us to remove recipients or delete a mistakenly issued transmittal. It would be greatly appreciated if the Autodesk team could consider enhancing the Transmittal feature to include options to remove recipients or delete a transmittal.

title: Issues - Manage rights per category & manage status list by category
body_text: First point: A person who creates an issue has a drop-down list with all the categories/types available in the project. It's not user-friendly and is confusing. We need the ability to filter issue types based on role, company, or user. For example : a quality manager can only create quality issue, no need to see all other types. Second point: Depending on the category, it should be possible to configure different drop-down lists of statuses.

title: Compare Versions in Specification Module
body_text: It would be nice to compare versions in the specification module to see a quick glimpse of what has changed.

title: Export Sheets in ACC Mobile Application without Needing to Enable Public Links
body_text: Issue: In order to export PDF sheets from the ACC mobile application, the ACC project needs to enable Public Link Sharing for Sheets and files. The snapshot function is not effective for a drawing package, and it is much better to export the entire sheet to retain the most information. This is the error we receive. If our users on the Mobile App want to export a few drawings to package while onsite, the Public Links setting has to be enabled. The current workflow is to enable public links that a

title: Issues & Reports & Files - Issue Export on full sheet
body_text: If you select 4 issues and then export this - it would be good to have them on the full sheet and a list of issues on the side for those particular drawings. At the moment, we can just export a report but it doesn't show the full drawings. If there is 4 issues on the same drawing they are listed on 4 different pages.

title: Forms & Reports - Customizable Reports
body_text: It would be good to see customizable reports and print this out. For example, Reports for Forms can go for about 10 pages but can be consolidated to 1-2 pages.

title: DocuSign NDA's
body_text: First, Building Connect is great and serves our company well. One thing we see that would be a massive benefit, is to have an integration with a company like DocuSign. Several of our customers require a wet signature NDA or Docusign. We would love a way to make this mandatory before the can view the project. I know you currently off an option where they do a check box and accept the NDA but that is sufficient for our clients. After doing this, we then have to email them separately to get a wet s

title: Add and Populate a Date Closed Field on Forms
body_text: A Form - Date Closed field that is set when the Form is closed would be a very valuable piece of information for project teams to use when filtering, sorting and reporting. While it is possible to devise the date from the Last Updated date if the Form is Closed, it is currently not exposed as a separate field in the grid view on screen, filter or report criteria. Also, include the Form Date Closed field in the As-Built filtering criteria.

title: Autodesk Takeoff - Allow Global Update of Default Input Values Across Existing Takeoffs
body_text: When using Inputs (e.g., wall height) tied to a primary or secondary output in a Takeoff Type, changing the default value after takeoff instances have been created does not update the existing instances. This creates inefficiencies during estimate adjustments. For example, if a wall height assumption changes after takeoff has begun, the estimator must manually update every instance in the Inventory tab or re-perform the takeoff. Proposed Enhancement: Add an option to "Apply updated default value

title: add ability to create Asset Mapping Templates. Add ability to capture mapping templates in the ACC Template
body_text: Adding Assets from multiple Models is time consuming and clunky, the first time through. Adding ability to create Asset Mapping Template would be a massive time saver. Adding the ability to capture mapping templates in the ACC Template would be a logical extension of this. In addition, adding Asset Permissions into the Template should be done.

title: Autodesk Assistant in Meeting Minutes
body_text: While ACC’s Meetings module offers useful features, many AI-powered tools on the market provide far more advanced capabilities for recording, transcribing, and summarizing meetings. These tools are often available at a relatively low cost. Hopefully, with the release of Autodesk AI at Autodesk University in 2023, this functionality will soon be added to "Meetings".

title: PROJECT INFORMATION METADATA
body_text: Problem statement: While creating new projects, we need to describe all information regarding the project and the workspace and the information available in ACC (Project Admin) is not enough for us. Desired action/outcome: Business requires to been able to create extra customized fields to the project information in order to reuse this information while extracting via the Data Connector. Current issue/challenges: Fields available in project information are very limited and not precise enough. Cu

title: Enable Calculation Columns for Custom Attributes in Change Orders
body_text: We would like to request to add calculation column functionality for custom attributes in change orders to automate calculations. Custom calculation columns are currently not available for change orders. While custom attributes can be used with manual input, there is no way to create calculated fields that automatically compute values based on these custom attributes. Therefore, we would like to add the ability to create calculation columns in change orders that can reference and perform mathema

title: Enable Account-Level Logo Defaults for APAC Server Projects
body_text: Currently, on the APAC server of Autodesk Construction Cloud, company logos must be uploaded manually in each Project’s Reports module. This slows down setup and makes it hard to maintain consistent branding. On the US and EU servers, a function allows a centrally stored logo to be applied automatically to all new Projects—ensuring brand consistency, saving time, and reducing errors. Why It Matters: Inconsistent branding in client reports. Extra admin work for every Project. Training burden for

title: Notification Settings for Issue Creation
body_text: Add an Issue Notification option so users could be notified when a new Issue is created. Currently, outside of the Assignment and Watcher fields, there are no means to trigger notifications to members of the general contractor who is managing all Issues or interested consultants when an issue is created. Instead it's only if the issue has changed statuses or has been commented on ( https://help.autodesk.com/view/BUILD/ENU/?guid=Issues_Notifications ). Project teams are worried that people aren't

title: Bulk Add Forms to Assets
body_text: Currently, if a user wants to create forms for an asset, they need to create each form individually. There should be a way to mass create a unique form for selected assets using the same template. For example, I want a new Fire Sprinkler overhead checklist form for every room asset in the hotel we are building. There is not a way to mass produce forms; I have been going in and manually adding the form for every asset. I think that a solution for this would be adding a button for "unique forms" w

title: Meetings Module - Activity Log
body_text: Would be fantastic if there was an activity log within meetings that take place inside of the Meetings module - who changed what item to what status, who added an item, who deleted an item, etc. etc.

title: Build - Pläne - mehrere PDF als Einzeldatei exportieren
body_text: Unsere Baufirmen fragen häufig nach der Möglichkeit, mehrere PDF-Pläne in Build als einzelne Dateien zu exportieren. Derzeit wird eine mehrseitige PDF-Datei erstellt. Für die Dokumentation und Benutzerfreundlichkeit wäre es vorteilhaft, wenn im Build-Pläne-Modul mehrere PDF-Pläne ausgewählt und als einzelne PDF-Dateien mit der korrekten Benennung (nach Namenskonvention) heruntergeladen werden könnten.

title: Build-Correspondence-Increase attachment size limit
body_text: Currently, the maximum attachment size is limited to 20MB per correspondence . In Outlook, however, the limit is higher. To continue using Correspondence effectively, we suggest increasing the attachment limit to 50MB to accommodate larger file size. We prefer not to to add files using References, as that involves additional settings such as folder permissions. Instead, we prefer that the correspondence recipient can view attachments directly within the correspondence content.

title: Automated Report Generation for Review
body_text: I would like to set up an automated report to be generated and exported at the beginning of each week using a predefined template. The report should identify any overdue Reviews and organize them by the person responsible for the current Review step. At present, it appears that only Issues in the Docs module support automatic report generation with templates. I would like to request similar functionality for Reviews , enabling scheduled reports to be created and distributed in a consistent and a

title: Autodesk Takeoff - Improve arc tool functionality with real-time arc creation during takeoff
body_text: While the A shortcut technically toggles arc mode during 2D length takeoff, it’s extremely limited: No visual preview of the arc before placement No confirmation that arc mode is active The O key (to flip direction) is unreliable No control over arc radius or smooth curvature Request: Add a visible toggle or button for arc mode Display a live preview of the arc path Let users adjust curvature dynamically while tracing This would make drawing curved edges or pathways far more efficient and intuit

title: Model viewer improvements for on-site usage
body_text: Using BIM models on site for execution of a project is becoming the standard way of execution. BIM kiosks and tablets have replaced 2D drawings. This requires some upgrades for the current BIM model viewer: Allowing BIM model aggregation from a blank canvas or multi-selection of files Easy possibility to save a view (including hidden objects, measurements, 3d text annotations, coloring) in order to prepare for a meeting or to prepare instructions for team members. Including the data-table in the

title: Meeting Minutes
body_text: Additional formatting options: Strikeout; text color Undo button for text

title: Display Form #ID next to the Form Name
body_text: Currently in Forms, for a native format, the Form #ID is only visible in the Basic Information section. If we view another section of the form, the #ID is not displayed. This means that if we want to share a screenshot of any section other than Basic Information, we can't view the Form #ID.

title: Customised body of a Transmittal in Docs
body_text: We would benefit from customised body of Transmittal to meet out business requirement. Our company`s Document Management Standard says " the reason for the issue shall be provided on each Transmittal" using the following - for consent / approval / acceptance - for review / comments - for information - for tender - for construction / implementation - as built - other The recipient of Transmittal shall check that received documents from outside parties adhere to basic requirements of controlled do

title: Rotate files
body_text: We need ability to rotate files and save new position as permanent settings. This is not for model, but for documents like pdfs.

title: Add automatic indexnumber to filename/attribute when add documents on ACC
body_text: Within namingstandard or without namingstandard it will be usefull to have a automatic indexnumber in the filename or attribute when add a file in a project. This number give's a unique id for documents in the whole project. And that in combination with a versionnumber can be used to generate a qr-code to print on documents.

title: Permissions
body_text: It would be nice to have a permissions dashboard for each projects that makes you able to adjust all permissions for each piece in one spot, rather than having to go to each section to adjust permissions. That way you make sure that everything is set up completely.

title: Model viewer sidebar size adjustment
body_text: Something that has always bugged me in the ACC model viewer is the size of the side bar, especailly when using the model browser tool and my file names are going of the side, having to use the tiny scroll bar at the bottom is very frustrating, it would be much nicer to be able expand the sidebar to my needs.

title: Saved Custom Filters for Photos Module
body_text: In ACC, it would be great to have the ability to save your filters on Photos to be referenced again and again in the future. As we transition to ACC, our users are putting photos into folders for ease of searching and filtering photos they took. Each time you go into the photos module, you need to redo your filters to find what you are looking for. It would be awesome if users could save their own filters, or if an admin could setup shared filters that multiple users could use to find photos of

title: Search and Sort Function for Custom Fields in Assets and Issues
body_text: A search function for custom fields in assets and issues would be very helpful, as there are often several hundred custom fields. Additionally, it would be useful to allow sorting of custom fields by title in issues, similar to how it already works for assets. Assets: Issues:

title: Placement of an  existing Issues on Sheets and Files
body_text: Currently, it is only possible to place an existing issue on a sheet, file, or model by opening the issue and then selecting a file or sheet under "Placement." The file or sheet is then opened, and the issue can be placed. This process must be repeated for each issue. We often need to place hundreds of existing oder imported issues on sheets for documentation purposes. It would be very helpful if the issue placement process could be similar to that of assets. This means that when a sheet is open

title: Placement of Issue PINs with Sheet Format Changes
body_text: When an issue PIN is placed on a sheet in Autodesk Docs and a new version of this sheet is later uploaded with a different format, the issue PINs are shifted. In the attached example, the reference point of the title block (bottom left) was maintained, and only the format was extended to the right. However, the issue in version 2 is placed in a completely different location. Version 1: Version 2 A base point (e.g., bottom left corner, so that the format can only grow to the right and upwards) wo

title: Display Issue PINs only for visible objects in Model Viewer
body_text: In the Model Viewer, issue PINs for objects that are not currently displayed should also not be shown. For example, if a selection box is defined in the viewer, only the PINs of the visible objects should be displayed.

title: Question - Can I add customized statues to my issues tool in ACC?
body_text: Question - Can I add customized statues to my issues tool in ACC? I am trying to add my customized statues and I am not able to do so. Can you help with that?

title: Enable "Hide All Issues" in Files
body_text: Currently, it seems that the eye icon to hide all issues is only available in Model Coordination. It will be great to have the option to hide all issues in models viewed from Files, as this would be beneficial for customers who do not have a Model Coordination subscription as well.

title: Forms available in "Assigned to me"
body_text: Forms on a project home page is great, but as more users are on multiple projects, having this on the Assigned to Me card on My Home would be ideal.

title: Forms // They need clearer buttons and directions
body_text: As a project admin I occasionally come across others that are confused by the terminology and steps that go into a Form. I've also heard similar from numerous other project admins. This is due to a few factors. 1. When editing a Form, the Submit button is ambiguous. Am I submitting just what has been completed so far, or am I submitting it for other reasons? This is unlike other ACC features like Issues and Meeting Items which make it very clear that you are managing the process by way of a Stat

title: Centralized Notification System in Autodesk Construction Cloud
body_text: Implement a dedicated notification page within Autodesk Construction Cloud to centralize all user notifications, replacing the need for multiple email alerts. This feature would include a status system to track whether notifications have been read or cleared, ensuring that users remain informed about critical updates without leaving the platform. The proposed notification center would function as follows: Centralized Notifications: All system and project-specific notifications would appear on a

title: Bridge between hub's hosted on different locations
body_text: Would it be possible to enable to use the bridge tool between projects hosted on different server locations? For example a project on US server and another on the EU server? This would make collaboration between international partners a lot easier.

title: Issues - Add Sheets as a Reference
body_text: When you create an Issue, you have the ability add references from multiple sources (photos, files, RFIs, etc.), but one that is missing is Sheets and Specifications. Often during model coordination, we need to reference drawing details or areas to highlight when a model is not correct per the plans and/or specs. Under the current Issues tool, we would have to take a screenshot of the plans/specs, upload that screenshot as a photo. It would be much more conducive to be able to point to a sheet o

title: Bulk Remove Users with CSV
body_text: This is regarding the Autodesk management and user-access groups. Please add in the functionality to bulk remove users using a CSV file. This would work in the same way as the Add User 'Import' option as in the attachment, but would have the extended option to remove users by importing a CSV too. It's almost the same functionality that already exists, but would mean that BIM Managers and Admin staff would be able to remove people from products, or by groups in bulk, rather than having to delete

title: As-Built Export needs to include Meetings -or- Provide a Report
body_text: When creating an As-built Export, Meeting decisions need to be captured. Meeting items have links to the various As-built files, Sheets, RFI's, Submittals... We need to be able to access Meetings in the As-built Export. Thanks, Bruce

title: Be able to organize custom field drop down options
body_text: Much like you can organize the position of the field fill-in within an issue type, it would be beneficial to organize the drop down options within a custom field. Right now the drop down options only let you put them in the order they were created, it would be more efficient to users managing issues if you could manipulate it by alphabetical order or order of priority, etc.

title: Enhancing the Transmittals Panel Functionality: Customization of Attributes
body_text: Hi, The attributes within the Transmittals panel are currently static. Enabling customization and the addition of folder attributes would significantly improve the panel's functionality and providing more information about files. Thanks. Attributes Inside A Transmittal:

title: Sheets for the Field auto populate attributes and Autopublish to Sheets
body_text: We publish Sheets as PDF to ACC. Attributes are populated with title block information. After approval the files are copied to corresponding Folder in the container "Published" including all attribute vallues. To share it to construction site we need to make an extra step to do a publish to "Sheets for the Field". Title blocks will harvest sheetnumber en title 🙄 . most of the times this is labour intens. Request Please make it possible to map attributes in the files section to Sheets. Make it po

title: Import BCF
body_text: While BCF export was implemented at some point, you still cannot import issues found elsewhere. This format is for collaboration so why not embrace it and allow its use to report issues, requests for information, decisions made wherever they come from.

title: Meetings - Modify Text Color
body_text: Support different text colors inside meeting minutes

title: Default value option for doc attributes
body_text: Specify default (prepopulated) value for a field when editing the attribute or in a naming standard. Fields are left blank until a user fills it. It would be helpful if we could specify a default value for specific fields, so that the user does not have to type it in or select it from a list, unless it r equires another value.

title: Add Job Title column to Members Page
body_text: Please consider adding a Job Title column under members in ACC. I believe this would be a valuable enhancement, as it would allow the construction team to keep all contact details in one centralized location. Currently, we maintain a separate log for contacts, and this addition would significantly streamline our process. Thank you Kym Livingston

title: Enable Collaborative Editing of Microsoft Office Files in ACC Desktop Workflow
body_text: Currently, collaborative editing of Word and Excel files stored in Autodesk Construction Cloud is only supported through the online versions of Microsoft Office. This limits workflows for teams who rely on desktop applications for advanced features and offline capabilities. I propose adding support for real-time co-authoring in Microsoft Office desktop apps when files are stored in ACC, even when using Desktop Connector. This would greatly improve efficiency for construction teams and align ACC

title: Add Export Log Option for Specifications
body_text: Please add an Export Publish Log option for Specifications same as export Sheets log option. This feature is critical for project documentation and control because specifications are as important as drawings. While the 'Sheets' module allows users to export a log to excel showing drawing numbers and issuance versions, the 'Specifications' module lacks a similar capability. An exportable publish log for specifications would eliminate manual administrative work by providing the same functionality

title: Filter forms by section assignee and status
body_text: Forms now allow sections to be assigned to different companies. When filtering forms however, there is no way to filter based on section assignee. For example, we have a room checklist with sections assigned to Mechanical and Electrical. If Electrical completes their section the form still shows up in a filtered list. This makes it difficult to know who's section is still open.

title: Customizable separator characters in between data field in naming standards
body_text: Currently ACC only allows one global delimiter character to be chosen in a naming standard. The industry practice usually uses different delimiter characters in between different data fields. We would need a solution where the delimiter character can not only be selected globally in the naming standard, but individually in between every data field. This would enable us to handle situations like the example below: [Project Code] - [Design phase] - [Building Code] - [Discipline] - [Level] - [Docum

title: Review - Markups management
body_text: We are doing reviews for drawings and technical documents. When we are doing reviews with multi pages PDFs, we can have dozens of markups on the same documents. With APS, we have an Excel containing all markups (interesting to have a native feature to do it), it could be great to have a hyperlink to open directly the good sheet inside the document. It's time consuming to find the page with the markup. Maybe interesting to have & see the markup id inside the web browser to help a bit.

title: Markups - Status Data and Assigned to
body_text: When doing review, we are doing lot of markups. On the same documents, we can have markups assigned to different people/companies. To track it, it could be interesting to have data to assigned markup to a discipline / user ? and to have a status to manage each markup as other software as Bluebeam.

title: Native Scheduling in Autodesk Build
body_text: It would be beneficial to provide the ability to create and manage a construction schedule directly within Autodesk Build. Although the current functionality is powerful, it cannot be utilised without relying on, Primavera P6, Microsoft Project & Asta Powerproject.

title: Feature Request: Option to lock amount only or fully lock flyout on SCOs (like contracts)
body_text: Cost Management Product In the contract settings, we can currently fully lock a flyout after integration (thereby removing the ability to change anything) -or- we can lock the amount only - see snip. My company opts to lock the amount only, as we sometimes need to change items in the flyout after sending (i.e. the contact name for the vendor, the work scope, etc.). This allows us the flexibility we need to work with our vendors and get contracts executed. This same setting is not currently avail

title: Enable to create new forms via Excel-import
body_text: It would be very handy to make an import to create new forms. We make hundreds of forms and all have to be made individualy. It would be great if the basics could be imported via an excel (Name, description, location). This would be like the import for issues, where you can import 500 at once.

title: views saved in the ACC, including the filters set (!!), should be displayed in Navisworks
body_text: It would be very helpful if the views saved in the ACC, including the filters set, could be displayed in Navisworks. Currently, the saved views are displayed, but the filters (e.g., hiding certain components by parameter) are not included.

title: Reports - no option for Reviews
body_text: There is no option to automate Reviews Reports, and each time you'd need to report on Reviews, manual extract is required. Reviews aren't communicating with the rest of the sections, and considering this module is the more customisable and usable than Submittals, makes no sense.

title: Significant Added Value Through Automated and Structured Document Distribution in Construction Projects
body_text: Significant Added Value Through Automated and Structured Document Distribution in Construction Projects 1) Problem Statement In construction projects, the timely, organized, and traceable distribution of drawings and documents to subcontractors and project participants is a critical success factor. Drawings typically go through several revision cycles. It must be ensured that subcontractors always work based on the latest approved version, without having to spend time searching for it on the pro

title: ACC Web Viewer & ACC Mobile Viewer Limitations
body_text: Many users in the filed rely on the following attributes: Viewing highly detailed 2D drawings (with extensive tagging and cross-referencing). Accessing model properties on 2D Drawings. Infinite zoom capability. Hyperlinking/Cross Referencing to other drawings. Item selection enabled across multiple views in sheets. NOTE: DWFx file format supports all of the above. Current limitations in the ACC web and mobile viewers are disrupting workflows & prompting field teams to revert to the BIM 360 app o

title: View bids online
body_text: Right now the only way to view a subcontractor bid is to download it and open it offline. This seems like a strange thing to be missing from an online bidding platform. Can you have bids open in a separate PDF reader window please? That way we can look at the bids without having to download and save all of them, which was supposed to be one of the benefits of Building Connected.

title: Adding standardised reporting to Project Template
body_text: We encourage a standard set of reports to be created across all of our workspaces to help our project teams keep track of live or overdue Issues, RFIs and Forms. The setup of these Reports can take up to 30 minutes each time a project is created - could Reports be added to the ACC Library in the same way that Meetings and Forms are?

title: Select attachments from Autodesk Docs in forms.
body_text: If you want to add an attachment to a question in forms, you currently only have the option to browse in your own system. It would be desirable to also be able to browse in the folder structure of Autodesk Docs itself.

title: Auto-Naming Photos in Assets & Issues
body_text: Currently, photos taken within Assets & Issues are named with date/time stamps, which lack context and make it harder to identify or organize files. This forces users to either rename photos manually or risk confusion when reviewing large sets. Proposal: Automatically name photos using the related Asset or Issue name , with an optional timestamp for uniqueness (e.g., PumpStation-3_20250916.jpg ). Benefits: Provides immediate context and traceability Reduces manual renaming Improves search, repor

title: Sheets Scrolling
body_text: Allow users to scroll through drawings in Sheets similar to what was recently implemented for PDFs in Files.

title: Export Revit Model – Provide Combined PDF & Direct Upload Options to Autodesk Docs.
body_text: Exporting a published set from a Revit cloud workshared model in Autodesk Docs via the Export tab, currently generates a ZIP file downloaded automatically to the user’s download folder. Greater flexibility in this process could be achieved by implementing the following enhancements: Custom save location: Allow users to select where exported documents are saved. They could choose either their local machine or a folder within Autodesk Docs, rather than defaulting to the downloads folder. Combined

title: Ability to name specific file versions
body_text: The ability to view the version history of documents saved in the Files tool is really helpful. However, it would be helpful to mark/bookmark specific versions related to specific milestones. e.g. The version where images had been incorporated, the version approved internally, the version submitted to the client for comments, etc. Being able to name or add a description to specific file versions that will display in the Version History will serve this purpose. Currently, it can be difficult to k

title: Option to Remove Broken or Deleted References in ACC
body_text: In Autodesk Construction Cloud, there is currently no way to remove broken, deleted, or inaccessible references once they are added. These invalid references remain attached and disrupt workflows, even if the user has full admin rights. Example: Within the Assets module , schedule activitie s previously linked as references now display: " Couldn't display 1 reference " " You don't have permission to view this reference" When attempting to access or remove these references, the system only shows

title: Meetings - Option to Hide "Created on [DATE] By [NAME]" Information in Meeting Minutes Exports
body_text: When exporting meeting minutes from ACC, the “Created by” and “Updated by” fields are automatically included for each meeting item, which creates unnecessary clutter and looks unprofessional when sharing minutes externally. These details are useful internally but serve no purpose for clients or external stakeholders, and there is currently no way to toggle them off or remove them through corporate templates. It would be very helpful if Autodesk added an option—either a simple toggle in the expor

title: Extending the duration of public sharing links under ACC beyond the current maximum of 1 year, contingent upon valid subscriptions
body_text: Enabling the extension of the duration of public sharing links beyond the current maximum of 1 year, contingent upon valid subscriptions, is essential. This flexibility supports long-term projects and ongoing collaborations by ensuring continuous access to necessary documents and resources without interruption, enhancing productivity and client satisfaction.

title: Import/Map Assets by Revit Schedule
body_text: Instead of importing assets on a per-project basis by mapping Revit properties, it should be possible to import them through a predefined Revit schedule, especially when the same asset types are managed across multiple projects. Provided that a category or subcategory & any relevant properties are defined in the Schedule, there appears to be no significant barrier to enabling this functionality. Third party tools have existed for years that allow the export of Revit properties, and the underlyin

title: Remove/Delete Published Specifications
body_text: Add a feature to allow you to delete/Remove published Specifications in case of uploading the wrong document. At this time this feature does not exist & Currently subcontractors are able to view a document that falls under the wrong specification. Due to this I am unable to remove a published file which can cause discrepancy to the subcontractors.

title: ACC Docs Settings - Allow “Automated drawing extraction” to extract pages and attributes from AutoCAD 2D drawings (DWG).
body_text: Problem statement: The automated drawing extraction workflow allows to extract data from the Title blocks from PDF files only. However, customers normally use drawings that are published directly from the DWG files. Desired action/outcome: EBA Customer would like to allow “Automated drawing extraction” to extract pages and attributes from AutoCAD 2D drawings. For this they would like to Create Title block templates for the 2D views drawings from DWG files and use the OCR to read the data from th

title: Markups in ACC Specifications
body_text: Unlike Sheets and Docs, ACC Specifications currently cannot be annotated with markups. Adding Published and Unpublished markup functionality to Specifications would allow project teams to highlight, comment, and visually call out key sections for coordination, review, and personal reference. Specifications do not currently have this capability, limiting their usefulness as an interactive project document - Currently, users must resort to downloading Specifications and marking them up offline (or

title: Workflow Requirement in Forms
body_text: Use Case: Currently, the Forms module in ACC does not allow predefined workflows for approvals, rejections, or conditional routing. This limits process automation and accountability in scenarios where multi-step approval is required, such as safety permits, inspection reports, or quality checklists. Importance: Without workflow capabilities, tracking progress and enforcing structured review becomes challenging. Manual follow-ups lead to delays and possible compliance risks. Expected Benefit: Add

title: Home Page Customization
body_text: Could the home page be customizable, similar to how it was in BIM360, to show relevant information and stats that each person would like to track.

title: Automatic Text Wrap in Excel Export from PCO Summary (Report section)
body_text: Currently, when we export the PCO Summary Template (in the Report section), columns automatically expand in width to accommodate longer text content. This creates formatting challenges and makes the spreadsheet difficult to navigate and print. Current Issue: Excel exports from PCO Summary reports extend column widths indefinitely to fit text content This results in unwieldy spreadsheets that are difficult to view on standard screens Printing becomes problematic due to excessive column widths Dat

title: Submittals - Allow for the creator of a Submittal to add watchers
body_text: When creating a submittal, the Responsible Contractor is not able to add Watchers . On our projects, only senior staff create submittals. These submittals often contain work produced by junior staff. The junior staff cannot be made default watchers as they should not have access to all submittals that are created, as some contain confidential information. Furthermore, we want to avoid the step where the Submittal Manager has to add Watchers to each submittal as this creates unnecessary admin. It

title: Task Tracking
body_text: We'd like to see all assignments for all projects on one dashboard so employees know what to work on. currently there is no comprehensive view and we manage hundreds of projects in ACC. it is IMPOSSIBLE to track assignments, project by project.

title: Make markups visible in Issues add-in for Revit
body_text: At this moment you are able to use the Issues add-in in Revit to search for Issues created on ACC in that particular model. However, if you are creating an issue on ACC and are adding markups to that particular issue, you are not being able to see these markups in Revit (just the metadata, pin and attachments). Especially when checking/remarking sheets in ACC, it would be really useful to be able to see these markups in Revit as well, as an overlay of the actual sheet for example (a bit like usi

title: due date Notification for  Issues
body_text: It would be helpful if a notification could be sent again for overdue tasks. It often happens that the status is forgotten to be adjusted due to the large number of tasks. It also often happens that tasks are overlooked. This would be an important functionality for the use of the ACC

title: Multi select custom field in Issues
body_text: Hi, I would like to be able to create a multi select custom field in Isses. In RFIs this is a possibility so I don't see why this should not be possible in Issues. I feel like this is a basic feature. Thanks!

title: Building Connected - Close Bid Package
body_text: Currently, you can 'close' a project, but you can't 'close' a bid package. Our work is construction management, so it can take a year or more to sequentially tender each of the bid packages in a single project. Although the project may be open for years, the bid packages are only open for weeks. It would be nice if we could close each bid package once the contract is awarded (without closing the project), to prevent people from altering a bid package where we already have an awarded contract.

title: ACC Mobil App - Sheet Zooming
body_text: Ref: topic from @davidgPGADA (ACC general discussion forum) An improved zoom when viewing sheets through the mobile app for ACC Build. For example, when viewing a sheet through the web browser, you can zoom in a great deal further to read very fine print tags. Though when viewing that same sheet on the mobile app, the zoom functionality is limited so you can't see the same detail. Autodesk replied to this topic and suggested to use/turn on the built in Zoom option on a tablet. This is an option

title: Add folders with subfolders to transmittals
body_text: Can you please add option so we can select folder and add entire folder to transmittal? Currently we can add only files. We want to use transmittals to share documents with non member, but we have a lot of documents that look completely unorganized when we share them in one lump now.

title: Review Auto-Trigger to include subfolders in folder selection tree
body_text: Review Auto-Trigger to include subfolders in folder selection tree Currently individual folders have to be selected. If a User adds a new subfolder it then isn't included in the review auto-trigger workflow, and needs to be manually added each time. We allow designers to add the subfolders that they need - therefore it creates a headache for us to monitor the folders that have been added and apply the auto-trigger to the folder each time. Please correct.

title: Autodesk Takeoff - Cutouts Should Only Apply to the Active Takeoff Layer
body_text: When applying a cutout in Autodesk Takeoff, it affects all visible takeoff layers underneath. There is no way to assign the cutout to a specific takeoff type only. This is a major problem for layered takeoffs (e.g., when multiple items overlap, like slab and flooring, or walls and finishes). Cutouts unintentionally remove quantities from multiple takeoffs unless I manually hide all but one. Requested fix: Let users apply cutouts to only the **active or selected takeoff type** Add a setting to **

title: Export Custom Issues Template to other projects
body_text: I have developed a set of custom ACC Issues template comprised of custom categories, types and fields. This includes different visibility and sequence of fields per type. Please provide us a way to copy and transfer these to multiple projects within ACC.

title: Open Folders and Files in new tab
body_text: There should be an option in this menu to open a folder in new tab. When I'm searching for something I have to leave the search to open the file and start the search over again when it's not what I'm looking for. Very inconvenient. Thank you.

title: Assign New Clashes to Existing Issue
body_text: Create some way to assign new clashes or items that were missed when selecting the clash to an existing issue.

title: Customised Attributes in DOCS - unable to select Multiple Values
body_text: In our projects we have a lot of Customised Attributes in DOCS ( Documents folder ) with long list of Values. We need to be able to select multiple options under one column in some cases, but this is not an option in Autodesk. Is this something which could be added, enabled ? If we can have a multiple selection under one column in SEARCH why Autodesk does not have the same in Attributes drop-down? Screenshots attached

title: Desktop Connector - Search function for Project Selection
body_text: Minor thing, but an important thing seems to be missing from Autodesk Desktop Connector (v16.11.1.2320): The ability to search list of projects to connect and sync. Autodesk, if I haven't seen it yet, then disregard; otherwise, please include this function. I have scores of projects on my hub and it is tedious and annoying to have scroll down the list. Just make a search bar, pretty please with awesome sauce on top.

title: Co-editing Word and Excel documents
body_text: It will be a great idea to enable users to co-edit (co-authoring) documents in Autodesk.

title: Notifications summary field on ACC profile
body_text: Hello ACC team, I suggest 'notifications summary field' on ACC profile or anywhere on project 'Home' page. So when you open ACC, there would be small red number showing total number of unread notifications. We would expand this field into bigger window where we can read all notification like in daily notifications email. There would be link to turn off all notifications or edit frequency of notifications. We could turn off email notifications and receive notifications in this summary only.

title: Providing Handover Information in the Data Connector
body_text: We often need more detailed listings of all files created in a documentation that is generated with Handover. Therefore, it would be very helpful for us if the information defined in Handover could also be output in the Data Connector. At a minimum, the following information would be helpful: Folder and file structure in Handover (file names that are overwritten in Handover) "urn" of the file from Autodesk Docs

title: Ability to automatically/schedule Revit cloud model publish without links
body_text: As a general contractor, we often Bridge projects with the design team and their models are typically published with links. When they are bridged over to our project, they essentially become useless because they can't be linked through the Desktop Connector because of the "zip file" issue. If there was a way to modify the "schedule publish" feature in Design Collaboration to publish without links, that would resolve this issue. Thanks!

title: Enable/Disable Photo, Issue, and Note Options in ACC Forms
body_text: In every point of an ACC form, the is the options to add photos, issues, and notes are automatically displayed. Often, we do not want to allow these options at certain points. Therefore, it would be useful to enable or disable these options for each field.

title: NWC Export from ACC Web Version
body_text: If we can have a option to export NWC/DWG from revit file of ACC web version that will be highly beneficial for users to avoid the file opening time.

title: AEC - Docs - Revision
body_text: AEC - Docs - Revisions Flow In the Revisions Flow, it is possible to leave a setting for sending within administrative hours; Or any submission outside administrative hours to be automatically considered for the next working day. No Fluxo de Revisões, ser possível deixar um ajuste para envio dentro do horário administrativo; Ou qualquer envio fora do horário administrativo que seja considerando automaticamente o dia útil seguinte.

title: Convert Markups Into ISSUE
body_text: Allow added markups to be selected and grouped with direct conversion into an ISSUE. Select the relevant markups on a sheet then right-click to select "GROUP and CREATE ISSUE" as a new option. When the ISSUE is generated, a screenshot is added to the ISSUE including the markups.

title: Add "Stretch Window" Functionality To The ACC Viewer
body_text: Please add the tiny functionality that will improve UI of ACC Viewer. The models' names and elements' names always are quite long and it could be good to stretch a little the sidebar as I wish.

title: Create An Issue From "Any" Place/Tab in ACC Model Coordination Viewer
body_text: I recognize a need, where users can just create and issue from any tab in ACC Model Coordination Viewer. Currently, we can only create them from "Clash" or "Issues" tab. It's not convenient to anybody It's super important because sometimes we need to present certain areas/elements in the model and hide rest of them ( we can do that only from "Model Browser" )

title: Remove one previous version of the file
body_text: When contractors/consultants resubmit resubmissions, they may upload incorrect files to replace previous files that make it from V1 to V2 then, after they upload the correct one which makes V2 to V3. However, V2 of the file cannot be deleted. This creates lots of useless information on CDE and confuses. If I delete the file, the record of V1 will be lost such as review status, transmitted date, and upload date. It is good to be able to remove one previous version of files.

title: Photos Function
body_text: Hello, We have been experiencing issues with 'Tagging' of photos. Our team is trying to bulk add tags to a group of photos and these have to be done manually at the minute. This can be a rather time lengthy process as hundreds of photos could be getting uploaded at once.

title: Allow users / admins to remove themselves from projects
body_text: From time to time, account admins might need to add themselves to a project they are not actively contributing to (ie. project setup, troubleshooting, adding a user if no Project Admins are available, etc.). Afterwards, the admins are unable to remove themselves from projects and must either have another admin remove them or just put up with a long list of projects they are a member of. Please give admins the ability to remove themselves from projects. Thanks!

title: Add functionality for 360 Photos
body_text: Add functionality for 360 Photos

title: Submittals custom fields
body_text: Add custom fields to sumbittals.

title: Reviews reports
body_text: Please add the option to create reports for reviews. It would be very handy to have the option to summarize all the information regarding reviews to identify bottlenecks, problems with individuals in the team, optimize time settings, etc.

title: Inherit "Location" data from parent with Location. (Form, Issues, etc.)
body_text: This came to light specifically with Forms, but applies to multiple workflows. If a Form has a "Location" then any photos, issues, or attachments linked to that form does NOT inherit the form's location. This is a grievous oversight, particularly when dealing with Punch or Assessment forms. If users are in the field using forms toggled to specific areas and required to flag an issue, photo, or other capture it MUST inherently be linked to that area. This inheritance should be automatic, but curr

title: Bridge - share a file's custom attributes when sharing a file across projects using Bridge
body_text: When sharing files across projects using Bridge, none of the custom attribute data is shared across projects. Some customers find that sharing custom attribute data across projects will improve communication and coordination across bridged projects.

title: Increase Custom Field (Text) limit beyond 250 characters.
body_text: Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) currently limits Custom Field (Text) inputs to 250 characters. This restriction creates challenges for large and complex projects where detailed, structured information is required. Custom Text Fields are commonly used to capture contractual references, technical notes, compliance remarks, and operational instructions. In many cases, these details cannot be adequately conveyed within the existing character limit, forcing users to abbreviate critical information

title: Improved integration between ACC Docs and Goodnotes on the iPad app
body_text: I'd like to see improvements to ACC's markup functionality, but since I currently rely on Goodnotes for markup, I'd like to see better integration between Goodnotes and ACC Docs in the iPad app. Specifically, I'd like to be able to import PDF files directly from ACC Docs to Goodnotes, and save PDF files directly from Goodnote to ACC Docs. Again, this is a request on the iPad.

title: Ability to customize the layout of email notifications
body_text: We would like to be able to customize the layout from emails received from ACC

title: Issue filter needs to be optimized
body_text: Currently, when filtering issues by role or company, only those issues directly assigned to that role or company are displayed, not those assigned to users belonging to that role or company. It would be very helpful, especially for analysis and reporting, if this could be changed so that all issues belonging to a role or company could be filtered, even if they are directly assigned to users within that role or company.

title: Issue Report Template - Assigned item by ROLE
body_text: We’ve been working with the “Assigned Item by Company” report template, and while it’s a great fit for projects with clearly defined company structures, we’ve run into a few challenges. In many of our projects, subcontractors can change midstream. When that happens, it becomes tricky to track which items still need attention—especially if they were originally assigned to a company that’s no longer involved. We also have cases where multiple subcontractors operate under the same company, and in t

title: Lock files that are in review automatically
body_text: Add option to files settings: automatically lock files that are submitted in review. We have a huge problem with drawings being constantly updated while being under review at the same time. Only workaround is locking the files manually. Please add option to lock files automatically. This is already available on Equinix platform.

title: Drop down values for Asset custom attributes to be ordered alphabetically
body_text: Drop down values for Asset custom attributes to be ordered alphabetically. At the moment, the values are displayed in the order in which they were created. This becomes difficult if the list is longer.

title: Customizable Issue Statuses
body_text: Please consider allowing admins to add customized Issue Status in the Autodesk Constrution Cloud, for example "In Dispute" which was offered in BIM 360, but not in the ACC.

title: Resizing model browser window on ACC
body_text: Currently resizing the model browser window on ACC viewer is not available, having this feature will help a lot to see the full model name.

title: Show All properties and metadata for files from Autodesk Docs in Desktop Connector Data Panel
body_text: Desktop Connector’s Data Panel doesn’t show key ACC attributes like Review Status , nor Custom Attributes (e.g., Revision). This makes reviews and metadata management harder. Request: Let us choose which attributes to display (checkboxes). Include all active standard ACC attributes. Support project Custom Attributes. Save display preferences. Ref: https://help.autodesk.com/view/CONNECT/ENU/?guid=Data_Panel

title: Improve Forms Template Importing and Sharing Across Projects
body_text: Currently, locating and reusing form “checklist” templates in ACC Build requires users to know which specific project the template originated from. This limits efficiency and creates duplication of effort, as many project teams spend many hours building detailed, high-quality checklists that could serve as excellent starting points for other projects. In BIM 360 Field Classic, there was a very useful feature that allowed users to search templates across the entire company account. The search res

title: To View Gantt Chart Schedule on Mobile
body_text: I would like to propose enabling ACC schedules to be viewed on a tablet in an interactive Gantt chart format. The tool should support zoom and scroll navigation, filtering by trade or task, critical path and milestone highlighting, and quick access to task details. It should also allow offline viewing, annotations, and real-time syncing with ACC so that field teams can both review and update progress directly from the tablet.

title: Insight Builder Issues Analysis/Dashboard – Add "Select Visual" Filter in Actions to Exclude Deleted Issues
body_text: The ability to add a "select visual" filter within an action to exclude deleted issues from both an Issues analysis and its published dashboard would be highly valuable. An Issues Insight Builder analysis/dashboard currently displays deleted issues by default.

title: Export Clash Results from ACC Model Coordination to Excel Format
body_text: Current Issue: The Model Coordination feature in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) is essential for identifying and managing clashes across disciplines in BIM workflows. However, it currently lacks a built-in export functionality for clash results. This limitation creates challenges for BIM teams, especially when: Clients or consultants require clash data in Excel matrix format for review or documentation. Project teams need to perform offline analysis , reporting, or integration with other tool

title: a few ACC suggestions for improvements
body_text: 1.Would it be possible to disable the automatic notification emails that are currently sent whenever a new project is opened? 2.the ability to control the name of the user that appears in this e mails as the sender? 3.the ability to control link in the email notifications be directed to the Files section rather than the Members section? 4.It would be very helpful to have a role with “almost admin” permissions – someone who can manage members (add/remove) but without the ability to delete or chan

title: API Support for Assigning Licenses to Users in Autodesk Construction Cloud
body_text: Currently, Autodesk Construction Cloud allows administrators to assign product licenses to users via the web interface. However, there is no documented or supported API endpoint that enables license assignment programmatically. This limitation makes it difficult to automate user provisioning and license management, especially in environments with large user bases or integrations with identity management systems. Requested Feature: We request the addition of an API endpoint that allows a system t

title: ACC issues and bridged models
body_text: Currently, we have the ability to bridge models from another ACC account for our own use, which is very helpful. However, for our project we create issues on our ACC and these are not accessible by the company who is bridging the models, it would be extremely valuable to also “bridge” issues back to the other ACC. Why This Matters Improved Collaboration: Linking issues between ACC accounts would greatly enhance collaboration with external partners. Seamless Issue Tracking: We could maintain a di

title: Improve Reporting for Asset Progress Tracking
body_text: Currently, we are setting up Assets for Rooms and Doors on projects to track progress visually within sheets thanks to the unique colours that can now be assigned to each. One thing that we currently aren't able to extract is a % of progress complete. In order to achieve this, we are having to extract the data from ACC Build and build a custom Power BI report for each project. In the Power BI report I have given each status a value for percentage complete and then we are calculating the overall

title: Reviews and Transmittals in Mobile Application
body_text: Currently, the Reviews and Transmittals tools are not available in the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile application. These tools are fundamental to our workflows and play a critical role in managing project documentation and approvals. We need the Reviews and Transmittals tools to be available on mobile to ensure smooth collaboration and quick access to project data from anywhere.

title: Feature request: Locking folders in ACC Files
body_text: It would be great to introduce a feature that allows locking folders in the Files section. This would significantly improve the organization and functioning of folders that are primarily used for bridging and synchronization with other projects. The ability to lock a folder would prevent accidental changes or disruptions to the process, ensuring that users working on the project cannot unintentionally alter the structure or content of these essential folders.

title: Submittals - Allow for “Title” in the submittal list to be edited by the Submittal Manager
body_text: In the SUBMITTALS tab on ACC Build, all created submittals are displayed in the form of a list. To edit the information in any of the submittals, the Project Member is required to click on the submittal to open it and then edit the information. In our projects, we have several submittals being created daily. It would be useful if the “Title” column in the submittal list could be edited by the Submittal Manager directly from the list, without needing to open each submittal. This will allow the Su

title: Build - RFIs - multiple answers in one RFI tracked in one place - already in Procore
body_text: Allow multiple answers in one RFI, see screenshot from Procore. Entire flow of RFI needs to be tracked in one page chronologically. not split between RFI submit response page and activity log. This screenshot is from Procore. You see here that one member can add response multiple times and it is all sorted and tracker chronologically. ACC RFIs design and setup needs to be rebuild completely.

title: Conditional Logic Function for Forms
body_text: Use Case: In many safety and quality processes, certain sections should only be accessible if specific conditions are met. For example, if a critical safety checkpoint fails, the form should not proceed to the next step. Importance: Conditional logic will help ensure that incomplete or non-compliant forms cannot be submitted, preventing bypasses and enforcing quality and safety standards. Expected Benefit: Improved data integrity, reduced human error, and increased compliance with mandatory proc

title: Meetings: Subtopics and Text Formatting in ACC Meetings Module
body_text: 1. Subtopic Support in Meeting Agendas The current Meetings module only allows for a single-level list of agenda items. For complex, multidisciplinary projects like ours, it would be highly beneficial to: Add subtopics or nested agenda items under a main agenda point (e.g., Architectural → Open Issues → Issue 1, Issue 2, etc.) Maintain the full topic/subtopic structure across recurring meetings using the "Carry Forward" function. Track the status of sub-items independently (e.g., Open, Closed, I

title: Restrict Issue Reopening by Assignee Post Closure by Creator
body_text: During the UAT of the Issues Module in our project, we have identified a critical concern related to issue control and accountability on construction sites. Observed Concern: We have observed that even after an issue is marked as Closed by the issue creator , the assignee is still able to reopen and modify the issue . In construction workflows, once the issue is resolved and closed by the creator (typically the QA/QC or Safety team), no further edits or reopening by the assignee should be allowe

title: Autodesk Takeoff - Add Native Annotation Tools to Autodesk Takeoff (Text, Arrows, Clouds, Callouts)
body_text: Autodesk Takeoff currently lacks basic annotation functionality that would allow users to communicate context, notes, or visual cues without impacting quantified takeoff data. Right now, all visible items are treated as takeoff inputs, meaning there’s no way to add a simple text note or arrow without affecting quantities or creating workaround takeoff types. We need native tools similar to what’s available in Bluebeam or Docs Markups — things like: Text notes Arrows Callouts Clouds Freehand tool

title: BUILD - Submittals - Enable Contractor Submittal Creation and Submission via Mobile
body_text: Currently, Contractors are unable to create or send submittals to Consultants for review using the mobile app , which limits their ability to manage submittals efficiently while in the field. Several Contractors have requested this functionality to streamline workflows and reduce delays when away from a desktop. It would be highly beneficial to enable mobile support for creating submittal items and submitting them to the Consultant , allowing Contractors to initiate, populate, and send submittal

title: Allow more than 150 different values for assets custom attributes dropdown
body_text: We use assets custom attributes dropdown fields to ensure valid inputs parameters. Unfortunately there is currently a maximum of 150 different values and it is not possible to create more. As we work with large datasets (mainly model/component numbers), we would need this limit to be removed or raised.

title: Export Correspondence Tool as a Report
body_text: Currently the Correspondence Tool in ACC doesn't contain much feature. Yes the idea of sharing the email with Project members or having the email thread in ACC, or creating one in ACC does seem useful. However, to properly handle the correspondence tool, the project require these email thread to be documented together either on the Project Closeout or Handover, or just documenting purposes. This was highlighted by the clients during the construction phase. The only workaround that can be seen as

title: Doc Reviews - Give us the option to assign elevated permissions
body_text: Doc reviews are a great way for project teams to develop review workflows. However, we don't have any permission levels that we can assign. We have users that may need to manage their team's workflow in the project, but they shouldn't need project administrator to make those changes. Build allows us to assign permissions on a variable scale (e.g. "View" to "Manage"). Can we get permissions for Docs/Reviews? We have some users that aren't necessarily involved in the review that may need to modify

title: Specifications - Download entire spec book
body_text: There is currently no way to download the latest version of the the entire spec book. You need to download each spec section individually. We would like the ability to select and download multiple spec sections at the same time.

title: Document Receipt Acknowledgement by Receivers in Transmittal
body_text: The General Contractor and Consultant require other contractors and subcontractors to acknowledge receipt of shared data and documents. This acknowledgment serves as confirmation that they are committed to following the instructions and agreed-upon plans with the entire project team. Is it possible to have an acknowledgment option within the Transmittals module in Autodesk Docs to support this workflow? Yes, there are “Viewed” and “Downloaded” columns available, but these alone do not serve as a

title: Able to rename ACC correspondence project email address
body_text: Able to rename the project email address would such be great. At the moment, its format isn't well formatted adding these unnecessary and unfriendly characters. Hoping that these will be available at the earliest possible.

title: [BIM model aggregation] View multiple BIM models (RVT, IFC, DWG,...) from ACC Docs Files
body_text: Our site teams (site manager, foreman,...) are becoming increasingly familiar with handling BIM models. They choose themselves which BIM models they want to view and which ones not. This full-flexibility fits our needs in chaning on site situations. The BIM models are provided as files using the folder structure in ACC Docs' file section. On site, in meetings or for work preparation we want to be able to open the BIM models directly from ACC Docs without having a specialist (e.g. BIM coordinator

title: Adjustment the name sorting of member
body_text: The user should have the option to sort the members in various lists (in the members area, in "Transmittal", "share", etc.) according to their own preference. Currently, sorting is always done by first name. There should also be an option to sort by last name.

title: Activity log of All Permission Changes
body_text: We currently cannot see when a ACC user is demoted from project admin to project member in the activity log or vice versa. This would be a fantastic feature to have to keep better logs on access permission. We can see when someone is brought into the project as an administrator but that is it.

title: Request for a reminder option for forms and submittals
body_text: We would definitely benefit from a reminder option in : - Forms : to allow a GC to send a reminder for the superintendents making sure they fill out the daily logs and other daily inspections. Having a recurrent reminder sent out as a daily task is a tool that will enhance the end user daily work. Maybe the tool can be added to forms or to plans in schedule as a reminder to notify assignees of their next to do task. - In submittals : having also a tool to send a reminder to the ball in court mem

title: Ability to restrict photo permission access on a member level.
body_text: we dont generally want the client to have access to our photo archive, as there are many problems recorded in there. We should have to ability to remove certain members access to photos and control access on a member level.

title: Admin > members: Add more information and filters to see who is active and add custom fields
body_text: In Account Admin > Members we can see all members we have across all of our projects. As projects end, we need a way to remove specific members, and we want to be able to filter members by the last time they have logged into ACC. At the moment, we are unable to see which members are active for what project and when they have last signed in (as same members may be invited to multiple projects, some active some closed). Increased information and visibility will help us manage which members should

title: Sheets
body_text: Please create a back button in sheets. When a detail is hyperlinked and then selected, it jumps to the sheet, but then you can go back to the parent sheet from which the detail derived. If you have 50 sheets and select a detail, you then have to go back to those 50 sheets and scroll through until you find the parent sheet. Definitely a waste of time when trying to jump around sheets with someone.

title: Add Side-By-Side Comparison in Sheets on the iPad
body_text: Currently, the iPad App allows for overlay comparison of sheets but does not allow for side-by-side view as in the Web version. This functionality would help our inspectors in the field compare sheets.

title: Budget Transfer Report
body_text: I would love to have the ability to create an Internal Budget Transfer report - specifically detailing all the budget items that have had a budget transfer applied. The excel file generated for the individual line item is fine, but it's only one piece of a large and potentially complex puzzle. Currently, the budget overview report can be used and set up so that all the items with budget transfers appear at the top of the list, but then all the other budget items are still there. The budget trans

title: Filtering Issues & Searching for Issues
body_text: While I enjoy the filtering tool, there are times when I need to search for an issue. Sometimes that issue cannot be shown because of the selected filters. I would like to see the search tool override (temporarily) the filter tool to show me the issue I am looking for WITHOUT resetting the filters. If I search for an issue by number, it is a temporary thing. Once I am completed with looking at that issue, I would like to return to my filtered issues without having to recreate the filter selectio

title: Download entire user history and activity on project
body_text: Hello, we got another request from client team on our project. These are very fast projects whit lot of project participants and high turnover of staff. Is it possible to add an report that would show all activity and history per ACC member? We have consultants who are responsible for checking local compliance and signing off correct materials on construction site. They would like to download all of their activity in case they will be moved to different project and new consultant will continue t

title: Need to add download to device functionality to ACC Mobile App
body_text: There needs to be a way to download files from the ACC app straight to the device. You can view text files, but there is no way to actually download the .txt file to the phone so that it may be accessed locally or transferred to equipment. Please add a "download" button or "save local copy" button to the application. The current state of the app only allows viewing on iPhone and 3rd-Party workarounds on Android. Also, there is an issue when using third party workarounds in that the name of the f

title: Meeting PDF reports should include attachment files.
body_text: When sending meetings, PDF reports to members who are not attendees, it should be possible to include all attached files in the report. Right now, only links to attachments are send and only meeting attendees can open those files.

title: Desktop Connector - Selected Projects
body_text: I understand the desire to conserve local file space, which is one reason the desktop connector has moved to select only 80 projects to keep locally. The issue our firm will see with this switch is that we have employees who work on over 100 projects within a short period. Having to select which projects to sync locally can cause confusion and result in the BIM Managers having to remind and troubleshoot visibility problems. If there was an option for optimizing storage, which would enable the pr

title: In Reports add the attached and/or referenced PDFs at the end
body_text: While exporting any type of Reports (Issues, Forms, Assets..) one should have the chance to chose how to export the attached / referenced pdfs of the item. Either as currently only a Link to the attached/referenced pdf or pasted/added at the end of the report. The idea is to have also the attached PDFs joined into the exported Report

title: Meetings - Color Text and Highlight Font
body_text: Please allow for different colored text and the ability to highlight font in meetings. This will assist in delineating meeting notes withing the topics. @annieweldon

title: Collapsible Discipline for Sheets
body_text: It would be a nice feature to add collapsible discipline in the Sheets tool, like in the Specifications tool, would make it much easier to manage large drawing sets, especially when dealing with multiple disciplines. It would streamline navigation and reduce the need for excessive scrolling. Overall Benefits of this feature: Improved navigation – Users can quickly find and access specific disciplines without excessive scrolling. Better organization – Collapsible sections would reduce visual clut

title: Add companies to project templates
body_text: The ability to add companies to a project template without users. We have recurrent companies on a project by default. My current workaround is to create fake users for a recurrent company and add them to the project template.

title: Display on/off Issues and markups
body_text: Submitting this request on behalf of the EBA customer. There are options to turn on and off displaying Issues and markups in BIM 360, but this feature is not available in ACC. It would be helpful to have a quick on/off button, in addition to the filtering options.

title: Alert system for duplicate review flow
