body_text: Given the need for greater control over review flows, we would like to request Autodesk to develop an alert system for the Docs Reviews module. This system should ask users to confirm whether they want to proceed with the creation of a flow with the same name, in order to avoid duplicate flows in unwanted cases.

title: Multi-line Display of Custom Fields in the ACC App (Issues, Assets, ...)
body_text: In the ACC App, the full content of custom fields in issues and assets is not displayed. Therefore, it is not possible to view the complete information of a custom field in the app. It is necessary for the fields to be displayed in multiple lines or at least for the full text to be shown when clicked. Example Assets: Example Issues:

title: Republish Revit Models without generating a new Revit Version Number
body_text: Currently, it is not possible to republish a Revit model if it does not have a new Revit version number. For WIP models, this is not a major issue as they are continuously changed in Revit and thus always have new Revit version numbers. However, for models that only have links to other Revit models (e.g., coordination models), this models are not opened and changed anytime, and therefore does not receive a new Revit version number. It is only possible to republish the "empty" model if the model

title: Share Views Option
body_text: Within ACC's Model Coordination, specifically the Views tab, there is no good way to share an individual view with someone. If you send a link of an opened view to someone, it redirects them to the Models tab (within Model Coordination) instead of opening the view. If you send a link of the Views tab, you then have to direct them to the specific model (we have approx. 20 to choose from per coordination space). Ideally there would be a way to select the view then select a 'Share' button/link. Thi

title: Combine Company and Role
body_text: For the assignment of permissions and also for other modules (e.g. workflows), it would be very useful to link the role and the company. For example with an AND filter. We currently create the following in complex projects where we use ACC workflows for approvals or where some tasks should not be seen by certain roles (competitors): “Company1 | Foreman”, ‘Company1 | Fitter’, ”Company1 | Project manager” “Company2 | Foreman”, ‘Company2 | Fitter’, ”Company2 | Project manager” In projects with over

title: Add folders and subfolders in packages in one step
body_text: Allow adding a folder structure into packages as one step. That is an absolute must when you have the project documentation structured in folders and you need to capture everything delivered as a package. I also suggest packages could be created from transmittals to have the same content.

title: Model Coordination - IFC files
body_text: Further IFC versions from various authoring programmes are required. It is also important that more and more MEP software is added here. It would be good if Model Coordination runs just as well as Navisworks in terms of the files. For example - Trimble Nova - TriCAD

title: Overview members in Projects
body_text: As in BIM360, it would be good if ACC also had an overview of the projects in which individual members have been added.

title: Ability to apply a template folder/file structure after a project has been created
body_text: One of the good features of ACC/Docs is that you can create a new project using a project template that contains multiple folders, files, members, companies, roles and settings. This saves a lot of time setting up new projects. However, it is very easy to accidently forget to select a template when creating a project. In this situation you either have to upload the contents of a template structure manually from an alternative source (and the only way to do this is via the clunky ADC) or manually

title: Model Viewer Orientation (Project North vs True North)
body_text: Allow model viewer (viewcube) to be set to either project North or True North. Seeing as usually people set the project to project North to make it easier to work and add sections and control section boxes I think ACC Model viewer should allow the same. When using the Section Cube, even thought the tool is extremely good, by allowing you to select several elements and creating a section abox around those, having that section box aligned to true north makes it very hard to control.

title: Markup Font Size
body_text: Submitting this request on behalf of the EBA customer. The current smallest font size is 8pt; however, the customer looks for something smaller like 1pt.

title: Change Issue Pin Placement
body_text: It would be extremely useful if it was possible to change the placement of the issue pin in model coordination. Currently, once the pin has been placed on a modeled element, this can no longer be updated or changed to another element or model if required. For example, if the issue is changed to a different assignee or discipline, then the element and model pin placement should be updated to reflect this. This would also benefit the Revit Issues add-in tool allowing the correct element to be sele

title: View as a test user
body_text: As a teacher using Canvas, when I'm making edits in my online content, I can jump into a default 'test student' to see how things look to make sure my edits are coming out as planned. As a project administrator in ACC working to help set up a lot of new templates for our projects, it'd be nice to have something similar to test at a few different levels to make sure the people I want to see/access certain content are able to, without having to consistently ask them to check for themselves & repor

title: Markups to be added as a reference to Issues or Vice-versa
body_text: While We create an issue on a drawing we have the options no options to add a markup as a reference. This is much needed as issue pin does not indicate an area. So we had to create a cloud markup but no way we can link that mark-up to the issue.

title: Autodesk Viewer (web) - Searching for object properties
body_text: You can only search for "names" in the model browser. It would be great if you could also search object properties. The item number would be particularly important. The idea behind this is that when employees are on the construction site or workshop, they can easily find out where an individual item is located using a tablet.

title: CLASH VIEW / MODEL BROWSER SWITCHING VIEW WHILE MAINTAINING POSITION
body_text: It would be wonderful to be able to toggle between Model Browser and Clashes while running a clash detection on ACC without the view resetting to top down every time. If you have a cut plane active, and orbit to a location where you see a clash and aren't 100% sure what the other ghosted elements are, switching to the model browser view clarifies that because it shows all elements, not just clash elements. When returning to the Clashes, the view completely resets (the cut plane stays) to top dow

title: Changing attributes of folders
body_text: Hey, Can we please have the possibility to change the attribute of a folder? (instead of only files) thx

title: Request for Enabling 'Export Settings' Option for Revit Files
body_text: Hi, I am unable to find the 'Export Settings' option for Revit files under '2D Sheets & Views', a feature that is only accessible with PDF files. Could you please make it available for Revit files as well? Thank you. https://help.autodesk.com/view/DOCS/ENU/?guid=Export_Files

title: Make issue permissions more customizable
body_text: Current issue permission levels are not sufficient. Project admins should be able to define custom issue permission levels and specify in more detail what activities the level allows such as: closing other members' issues, viewing other members' issues, viewing unpublished issues, changing assignees or other issue properties, visibility of issues depending on category/type etc. Take this just as an example of what kind permissions could be controled by the project admin, but I think the issue pe

title: ACC Model Coordination - Issue Filtering
body_text: In the ACC Model Coordination tool, a user is only able to filter the existing Issued by a drop-down showing only 2 options: "All Issues" or "Clash Issues". In the Docs and Build tool, there is an expandable panel allowing the user to fine-tune the filtering of issues. The Issues filtering panel of Build/Docs should be replicated in the Model Coordination tool

title: Microsoft Office & Excel Plug-ins Need a Tune-up
body_text: The Microsoft word and excel plug-ins seem to work well on the ACC through the web. All except for closing out. The method for saving and returning to ACC is a bit clunky and not clear for new users. Many people on the team do not have confidence that their updates have been changed. A save changes and close button, would save a lot of confusion and questions. The method in some tutorials tells you to choose "Return from the drop down menu on the top left, but that opens the same document in a s

title: Locations // Import from Revit // Limitations around duplicates
body_text: I've just been trying to import architectural Revit rooms into the ACC Locations and hit a limitation. To be honest, this seems like a fairly obvious one that should have been picked up during development. Firstly, some background. In Revit, you can have duplicate room Names, but not duplicate room Numbers. In ACC Locations, there is no room Number attribute, and rooms that exist at the same hierarchy level cannot have duplicate room Names. Therefore, there is a mismatch in naming/numbering rule

title: Markups Set to Public by Default
body_text: Copied from Autodesk BIM 360 Ideas. Credit given to @Unknown_Account59 Note this item currently has 182 votes and 90 comments on BIM 360 Ideas and is a heavily requested feature. Please change the default setting of Markups to 'Public' instead of 'Private'. We have had a few cases where this setting has been missed by Site Management teams, so they have saved the Markup and are under the impression that the rest of the project team can see their comments.

title: Download Sheets from ACC Design Collaboration
body_text: Sheets can be viewed within Autodesk Construction Cloud (document management & Design Collaboration) why can't I download them? By being able to download would enable enhanced document work share. Project teams could enable auto publish, push publish, or share the model with selected sheets from sheet sets. Project teams could view and download the sheets for internal purposes directly from ACC without asking other project teams to provide them. Currently project teams need to print the sheets t

title: Edit or add attributes to the naming standard (ISO 19650)
body_text: I copied this from the BIM 360 ideas because we also need this in ACC. When the naming standard is applied it is not possible to edit or add attributes once set up but this has caused problems later during the project. It seems this was made available on BIM 360 but not ACC It is not always know who is working on the project at the start so therefore adding all the attributes is difficult. I have not come across a problem I need to add more originators to my project under the originators and I c

title: Company based User management
body_text: How about adding company 'slots' instead of named users for projects that run over a long timespan? In present times the employee turnover is huge, and administration/keeping track of all projects and users takes more and more time. My suggestion would be that my partner company adds slots for my company, and managing the projectmembers from my company is done by me...

title: Meetings - Customize text when sharing the minutes
body_text: After writing minutes of a meeting you need to notify and share with invitees. You can do this but it comes with a generic notification with no option to customize it. The request is, when sharing meetings, to have the option to send out a notification with a customized subject and message. An example of this can be seen in Cost Management when sending out contracts, you can customize the subject and the message (see screenshot attached).

title: Additional Work Performed Keywords - Building Connected
body_text: Would it be possible to add some design entity-related keywords to the "Work Performed" section under the Company Profile tab in Building Connected? Specifically for companies that also provide design services, it would be helpful if electrical engineer, mechanical engineer, etc. were on the keywords list.

title: Custom RFI Status other than "Open", "Closed" or "Answered"
body_text: RFIs have a variety of applications. At time questions are submitted for review that aren't necessary. These unnecessary RFIs then dilute the reporting, and status of RFIs which are legitimate. There needs to be an RFI status where the "reviewer" can provide a response that states something like: "Refer to contract documents", or "Included in Plans and Specs" etc. This is necessary to avoid the dilution of RFI status reports with information that could appear as "Open". They also drive up the nu

title: Notify approvers when SCO workflow is initiated
body_text: Currently, when initiating a workflow in Autodesk Construction Cloud, only approvers can be added to the process. However, many change orders require additional people from our organisation to be informed of change orders for visibility and awareness purposes, without requiring them to take any approval action. Introducing a “notify-only” option within workflows would allow users to include these stakeholders and automatically notify them when a change order is initiated or updated, while keepin

title: Search and Filter Build Schedule Fields
body_text: Improve the search and filter capabilities within Build so that individual items can be identified through IDs and other fields.

title: Download All Attachments in Submittals
body_text: Summary: In Autodesk Build Submittals, it is currently not possible to download all attachments in a submittal at once. Each file must be downloaded individually, and the Submittal Report export does not package or include the actual files, only hyperlinks. This creates significant workflow challenges for QA/QC processes, consultants, and client-facing deliverables. Problem Description: Submittals frequently include multiple drawings, datasheets, certificates, method statements, calculations, te

title: Utility to upload Revit files as Cloud Models in Bulk
body_text: We are given at the start of the project Revit files that were originally Workshared Models delivered by the design team in their working environment. Information is shared with us by the client as detached models that are not Cloud models anymore, and hence, links are not working and sheets are not properly displayed. Recreating the working environment manually again is a time-consuming task, especially when dealing with a high volume of models. Even when we are lucky and models are transferred

title: Combine multiple PDF's submitted submitter
body_text: In Submittals: When a submitter submits multiple files you have to download all files to an external folder to combine in a 3rd party product. The only other option is once downloaded to the external folder is for the manager to start the review process and open one file to review and import the other files saved in the external folder. We need something at this step that can combine files within the review process without exiting the review or having to downloading the multiple files externally

title: Photos added as attachments to Issues/Forms should appear in the Photo Library
body_text: Currently photos uploaded as attachments to Issues and Forms are associated only with that form, and no not appear in the project Photo Library. It would be helpful if these photos did appear in the library, as it would allow forms/issues to be used to effectively group photos, as well as ensuring that all photos captured by the site team are visible. In the current system many photos will not be available to project members unless they know they need to go looking for them.

title: Compare file versions in Docs in mobile App
body_text: Even when on the go , it may be necessary to compare version differences between documents or plans , as the mobile app is used not only by assemblers but also by project managers on site. It should be possible to decide which version of a document to open while on the go , albeit perhaps in a slightly more “hidden” way, in order to avoid misunderstandings on the construction site.

title: ACC Meetings/ Minutes
body_text: Our team has been actively using the Meetings Tool in Build , and we’ve encountered a few challenges that are affecting our ability to use it efficiently. We would greatly appreciate your assistance in reviewing and implementing the following enhancements to improve functionality and user experience: 1. Expanded text-editing options – Please consider adding additional formatting tools such as strikethrough and text color to allow for clearer documentation and emphasis in meeting notes. 2. Image

title: Reference an Asset to an Asset
body_text: Provide the ability to reference and Asset to an Asset. I have a client who’s an insurance restoration builder using Assets as locations within Autodesk Build. This approach allows them to reference nearly any project element to a specific location, enabling detailed tracking of the remediation lifecycle for each space. They can't however reference a physical Asset to that space. While it may seem logical to use Locations, their visibility is limited to Issues, Forms, and Assets once the Locatio

title: Submittals - Mass File Download
body_text: It would be helpful to have the ability to download all approved files with a single click, instead of downloading them one by one.

title: ACC Template across hubs and regions
body_text: ACC project templates reside on one hub that can be accessed for project creation from another hub. The same template could be used to create projects on different hubs or different regions. Currently a project can be created on the hub where the template resides. So, if a firm has multiple hubs, we have to recreate the same template across multiple hubs and multiple regions. There is currently no way to copy an ACC template across hubs or across regions. Creating or modifying templates have to

title: Takeoff Scales
body_text: Allow the ability to apply a scale to a page range.

title: The possibility to mark fields/parameters as mandatory for issues and assets
body_text: The possibility to mark fields/parameters as mandatory for issues and assets.

title: ACC create a new project - Project Types list to be made editable.
body_text: It makes no sense that ACC requires a project type but doesn't allow you to customize project type. 90% of the options don't apply. And a bunch are missing. A program that is as large as ACC shouldn't have work arounds.

title: Building Connected Bid Leveling Toggles Updated
body_text: When setting up the subcontractor Bid Form that feeds into Bid Leveling, there are the Line Items, Alternates and Inclusions fields, per snip 1 below. This then feeds into the Bid Leveling tab, so that when a sub submits their proposal they fill out the bid form, which then shows up on bid leveling. Often times there are scopes of work that need to be broken apart that are apart of one major scope. The only option to do this and enable the ability to toggle each line item cost on/off is for subs

title: Ability to Add Subitems Before Linking to Budget Items in Contract SOV
body_text: It’s common practice to include subitems in the Contract's Schedule of Values (SOV) rather than directly linking them to budget items, starting with the details of the Contract’s SOV. Therefore, we would like to submit a feature request to enable the addition of subitems before linking to any budget items, following the same approach as in the Main Contract SOV.

title: Folder Permissions in Project Templates by User & Company
body_text: A recent update allows account-based members to be added to 'Project Setup' of project templates. With this user data available, folder permissions in 'Files', should be configurable by user & company, not just by role. Leveraging user & company assignments to folders in project template set-up, would provide greater flexibility & reduce administration for admins.

title: Show Cost Workflow Reviews at the company level "My Home" screen.
body_text: Our Executives want to be able to see a list of all the cost workflow reviews that are in their court, on the "Assigned to me" card on the My Home screen. This would allow them to see any cost reviews across all projects that need their approval to move forward. Right now, they have to open every project to see what is waiting on them to approve. It is a big waste of time and effort, for a class that needs maximum efficiency.

title: ACC viewer : Section box viewer ==> possibility to rorate along axis
body_text: Hello Dev team, In the ACC viewer, you can create a section box and move it along the axes However, there is currently no option to rotate it around the axes. Could you add this feature in Roadmap ? Olivier

title: Pin issue : placement modification permission
body_text: Hello Dev Team, I’ve noticed that in Autodesk Docs, it’s now possible to freely move Pin Issues in 2d and 3D mode. While this flexibility is useful, it could lead to accidental repositioning, which may cause confusion or errors. To mitigate this risk, I’d like to propose the following enhancements: Restrict Pin Issue movement based on user permissions – Only authorized users should be able to modify the placement. Add a confirmation prompt – When a Pin Issue is moved, display a warning message s

title: Title Block Templates - Add Additional File Formats.
body_text: Enabling attribute extraction from title block templates in Revit and AutoCAD formats, rather than restricting this functionality to PDFs, would provide greater flexibility.

title: Schedule Suggestions in the Data Connector
body_text: Please consider including the schedule suggestions in the Data Connector. We have other scheduling integration partners that would like to ingest the suggestion data, approve or reject the suggestion in the master schedule, receive an updated master schedule & push that schedule back into ACC through the data management API (into the Schedule folder). This will allow a truly fluid workflow from suggestions from your field team to the master schedulers, and back to the field. This workflow could

title: Add Asset Systems into ACC Template
body_text: Adding Asset Systems into the ACC Template will save a great deal of time when initiating a new Build Project especially for clients that have a lot of consistency between Projects.

title: Make basic valuta setup in Template
body_text: It looks like a small thing, but it has become a big nuisance. Why is the valuta for each new project (no matter from what projectemplate and region) in dollars. Also, you can only scroll and not type to change it. When in a certain country (or for example in the Euro region) 99.9% of the projects would NOT be in dollars. How tough can it be to either let a project template setup the valuto, or at least have something in the account admin panel to select the default valuta? We do over 200 projec

title: Add a "Documents"" section to the Account Admin Library
body_text: It would be beneficial for the Account Admin library to include a dedicated “Documents” section for company-wide materials, such as standards, procedure manuals, & letterheads to name a few. The idea is that this section would house content that is not tied to any specific project template. This section could function similarly to the existing “Forms” and “Meetings” template libraries. Additionally, a "Document Templates" subsection within "Files" could be introduced to support more effective ma

title: Filename Limitations
body_text: Autodesk Docs currently recognises version history only when the document name remains unchanged upon upload. In regions such as Australia, it is common practice to include revision identifiers in document names, which limits the ability to fully leverage ACC’s version control capabilities. Enabling version recognition to be driven by a stable attribute within the filename, rather than the filename itself, would align ACC with industry practice and greatly improve usability. This would not affec

title: Create Asset Report - Mobile
body_text: It would be beneficial to have the ability to generate an “Asset Report” in the mobile viewer, similar to the existing functionality for “Issues.”

title: Revit Proprieties - Mobile Viewer
body_text: Revit properties are accessible in 3D within the mobile viewer; however, they are not available on published 2D sheets, in contrast to the functionality provided in a web browser. Will properties in 2d published views of a publish set be made available in the mobile viewer anytime soon?

title: Revit worksharing - Model publishing times
body_text: Publishing times for Revit workshared models can be excessively long particularly with established models. This is especially problematic for field teams working in fast-paced environments that rely on constant up-to-date model data.

title: ACC Build - Add “Seach and filter” box option to project “Home” page
body_text: The “Search and filter” box is currently available on each page when a tool is selected in ACC Build. This allows the project member to search and filter for documents within the selected tool. It would be useful if the “Search and filter” box is added to the “Home” page. This “Search and filter” box can allow for all documents on the project to be searched and filtered for, directly from the “Home” page. This would assist us as documents on the project can be easily found across all tools on AC

title: Support URL Hyperlinks (Internet Shortcut) in ACC Files/Docs
body_text: ACC Files/Docs currently does not allow adding a hyperlink (URL) as a stored item, unlike Windows File Explorer. Being able to store and organize web links alongside project files would allow quick access to related online resources without leaving ACC - Current workaround is to create a Word document that has the URL hyperlink, but this is not ideal and requires more 'clicks'. SUGGESTION: Allow users to create a Hyperlink or “Internet Shortcut” file type in ACC Files/Docs. Support renaming, mov

title: Multiple companies within one company
body_text: I believe it would be beneficial for companies to have their parent entity as the main account and ability to complete each Pre-qualification as the subsidiaries it falls under. United Site Services is a national leading provider of Site Services. We currently have several entities. Once an email is associated to one account, it is unable to be used for any others. This creates an issue as we have a designated team that will look through all bid requests and forward to the appropriate team and t

title: Better Enhanced Folder Permission Control
body_text: Autodesk Construction Cloud Docs module currently lacks truly robust folder-level permission controls, we augment it with SharePoint and other platforms to fill this gap, ensuring the level of access management and security our projects require. However, in order to fully feel confident that Autodesk Construction Cloud can serve as the single source of truth for all project information, this permissions limitation must be addressed and resolved. Please add additional enhanced folder permission c

title: Add more sorting options across ACC
body_text: Add more sorting options. For example technical submittals do not have sorting in fields Ball in court and Review response. Issues do not have sorting in Assigned to field. Members do not have sorting in Role and Access level. Reviews do not have sorting in next Action by. RFIs do not have sorting in Ball in court field. I suggest you sort fields like Ball in court by the first name added to this field.

title: Submittal reminders
body_text: Problem - We would like an easy way to remind people of submittal items in their court Desired action/outcome - It would be nice to have a reminder button like the RFI module to remind an individual. Current issue/challenges - We have to go outside of the system right now to remind or we have to @ them in the comments.

title: Duplicate a Section in a Form Template
body_text: Description: Currently, when creating a form templates in Autodesk Construction Cloud, we are able to add, reorder, and delete individual questions within a section, but there is no option to duplicate an entire section within the same template. This feature would be highly valuable, especially when building complex forms that use recurring sets of questions or sections with only minor modifications. We currently have to recreate manually the questions inside every section. Request: Please add a

title: Add Option to Identify Collection on Sheets POST API
body_text: Currently there is no option means to publish Sheets to a collection folder because the API does have a collection parameter. The Collections API ( https://aps.autodesk.com/en/docs/acc/v1/reference/http/sheets-collections-GET/ ) only supports a 'GET' at the moment, but no Collections parameter exists on the POST API.

title: Automatic storage in Docs of forms
body_text: We work a lot with forms in ACC. It would be great if it were possible to export completed forms directly as PDF files and store them in specific folders that can be assigned in Docs. That would be a great innovation.

title: Add QR code generator for Locations
body_text: Now there is a QR code generator for Assets. Cool. Please add it for Locations as well and consider higher flexibility in terms of configurable layout and displayed texts below the QR codes.

title: Additional notifications to Project Admins
body_text: It would be great for Project Admins to receive notification: When new members are added to a project when a role is assigned or removed to/from a project member When the permissions in FILES or any other ACC tools have been changed This will assist Project Admins with better overall control of project members roles and permissions with the project.

title: Filter TradeTapp invitations by a BuildingConnected Bidder List Template
body_text: The rollout of the Projects In Bidding feature has been a great hit!! Thank you!! Along those we have identified a need to be able to filter TradeTapp invitations by a specific Bidder List Template and/or the Scope-Specific Bid Packages within a Bidder List Template. This functionality would greatly benefit the task of maintaining vendor prequalification status when the vendor is not currently tied to a specific bid/project. The goal would be for a regional office to have improved tools to upkee

title: Submit for Review to include subfolders in folder selection tree
body_text: Current Issue: When selecting a folder for submission, the system currently does not recognize or read the files inside its subfolders. This forces users to manually select the main folder, then each subfolder, and finally each individual file. This process is time-consuming, especially when working with deeply nested folder structures. Proposed Improvement: Enable the system to recursively read and include all files within the selected folder, including those in any subfolders. This functionali

title: Asset Custom Field Type - Calculation Type
body_text: When creating a custom field in Assets, the dropdown types include 'Numeric', but there is no ability to perform calculations with a Numeric field. Ideally, there would be a field type that allowed calculations using other Numeric fields from the asset list.

title: PHOTOS EDIT
body_text: Add the option to edit a group of photos at once. Add a location photo by photo is complex when you load severals.

title: Audit Trail for all activities performed by users with Account Admin privilege
body_text: ​ We use ACC at an enterprise level and have a group of users with account admin privileges. As we work in a regulated industry, it's crucial to have an audit trail of all changes made to our ACC Account's configuration. This includes new custom integrations, application configurations, and setting changes. Having this audit trail would allow us to reproduce when a change was made and by whom.

title: Rename tabs with folder names
body_text: While navigating through multiple folders or multiple projects in acc, when opening several tabs, we find all of them with the same name: "Files - Autodesk Docs". Could you PLEASE adopt the name of the folder we are viewing in the tabs (or the model, if it's open), so we don't have to cicle through all tabs to find the one we need?

title: Homepage Dashboard
body_text: Right now, as someone who actively manages anywhere from 3-7 projects from beginning to end, I actively have a dozen browser tabs open in a constant pin-ball game back and forth between all the different jobs depending on the task. This is all day, every day nonstop. It would be extremely efficient to have a custom homepage that can be set up as a main starting dashboard to all of the downstream projects and give a visual overview at all times of everything I'm actively managing. A homepage that

title: Photo Gallery
body_text: Auto sync photos that are uploaded to the Daily Report Form to the Photo Gallery to avoid having to double upload, or uploading photos to the gallery and then having to link to the daily using references.

title: Correspondence Type - Edit
body_text: It will be good to be able to edit the Correspondence type after I've created the correspondence.

title: Add Issues to the Library for Company-Controlled Issue Management and Enhanced Conditional Logic in Forms
body_text: Description: Currently, when using forms with conditional logic, the issues must be manually included in each template. This creates a heavy maintenance burden, especially when the same forms and issues are reused across multiple templates. I propose extending the library functionality to support issues, allowing issues to be centrally managed and included in forms via the library. When importing a form from the library that contains conditional logic tied to specific issues, those issues should

title: Possibility to continue viewing the model with the section plane at the point where it was stopped.
body_text: It would be very useful and convenient to have the possibility to continue viewing the model with the section plane at the point where it was stopped. Currently, when working on a model, using a section plan and creating an issue, the section plane disappears. When clicking again on the section plane, it doesn't remember the previous position and it starts from the beginning.

title: Enhanced Editing Options for Meeting Minutes Templates
body_text: It would be desirable if meeting minutes templates could be edited more extensively—not just the headings, but also the content and structure

title: ACC meeting minutes export in different languages
body_text: It would be helpful if meeting minutes or other documents that are exported from ACC as a PDF were also directly available in another language - for example German. This would improve comprehensibility for international teams and reduce the translation effort.

title: Search by ALL - missing in drop-down menu
body_text: In our instance of ACC, we have a variety of customised drop-down attributes. Some drop-down lists can have up to max 300 values. Unfortunately, when we want to create a search or just search using some customised attributes, there is not an option to select “All” only “Empty” or option to "select existing values". This is very inconvenient as if we had for example 100 values in a drop-down, we would need to tick every single one to get full search. Why there is not an option to select ( All ),

title: Master Information Delivery Plan (MIDP) on ACC
body_text: A Master Information Delivery Plan (MIDP) is a standard deliverable under ISO 19650 standards. It defines a list of BIM names that are contractual for delivery to mark a project as complete. As a user, I would like to be able to enter a list of deliverable BIM names to be delivered to the client. This list can then be exported into an open standard spreadsheet ( like the one available for the Environment Agency in the UK ). Kind regards, Tony

title: Assigned Schedule activities visible in my home
body_text: How nice would it be if all activities you are responsible for was shown in My Home? Right underneath Meeting Action Items would give a nice overview of your tasks/work, inspections and deliveries in the project.

title: Copy permissions as well as a folder
body_text: Using the share function, its possible to copy folders between projects, handy when you need to copy a revised folder structure between projects. Whats not handy though is that the copied folders don't bring their permissions with them. It should be possible to share them both with new projects, that way I don't need to go back and set permissions on 100's of folders each time we update our company template.

title: Save sort issues and selected columns
body_text: Now it is not possible in the Issuelist to save the sorting and save the selected columns. When open the project back it have always a default sorting and default columns. https://help.autodesk.com/view/DOCS/ENU/?guid=Issues_Search_Filter#sort-issues-log

title: Files Locked by Me section on home page
body_text: We often find ourselves in situations where some files are locked though they are not in use. Maybe even locked for weeks or months and than it is an issue when someone needs to open the file. If there would be a "Files locked by me" across all projects section on the acc home page or monthly email report, that would make it easier to maintain files and would save regular trouble. That way each user could have an overview over which files they have locked and could unlock everything they dont us

title: Auto-Complete Function for Text Fields in Assets
body_text: In Assets, it would be very helpful if text fields had an auto-complete feature that suggests previously entered values as you type. This "Auto-Complete" function would provide suggestions based on what has already been entered in that field. This feature should not only be available on the web but would be even more important in the ACC App. On tablets, it often leads to incorrect entries or takes a lot of time because the entire word has to be typed out.

title: Assigning permissions to companies in the template
body_text: In a template, the platform could allow adding access permissions to folders for companies and members that are already registered in the account.

title: Last login should be added
body_text: today I see the information when a user was added to ACC. For data privacy reasons (deleting users following EU law) and for user clean up it would be great to have the information when a user was logged in last time and this is also part of the export possibility. Proposal see attached screenshot.

title: Support for Date Values in Naming Standards (Related Attributes)
body_text: Currently, it is not possible to add an related attribute with a date value in the naming standard. Only attributes defined as text or dropdown are available for selection. It's clear that the date field cannot be part of the naming standard but there should be an option to select all attribute types in the related attributes. This is needed because the date of receipt often needs to be saved for the incoming sheets.

title: Edit Project Information Programmatically
body_text: While developing some in house solutions for project closeouts in ACC, I ran into a fairly large roadblock. There doesn't seem to be a way to PATCH a project like there is in BIM360 from the API (the only PATCH there is for ACC is for uploading a project image). The goal being, have the ability to change project status from active to archived via the API. Now this isn't a deal breaker as there are some roundabout ways to get similar results, however I find it strange that the option to change pr

title: Exporting Plans
body_text: I would like to be able to export a plan in schedules to either excel or PDF to be able to send to customers or contractors.

title: Save filters in Model Browser in ACC Viewer
body_text: Hi I would like to be able to save filters made in Model Browser in ACC Viewer. As standard filters for the ACC Viewer for all the projects in the company for properties that we are supposed to use in any project. Such as Model Maturity Status (MMI) or similar. And also for personal preferences for each user, if I set up filters I would like to control in the model I would like to be able to save filters for my user.

title: Autodesk for Markup Tool Enhancements
body_text: Markup Symbols : Introduce the ability to create and apply various predefined symbols (e.g., arrows, circles, and other shapes) for quick annotations during reviews. Import Symbol Library : Enable users to import custom symbol libraries, allowing them to standardize and reuse commonly used symbols across projects. Insert and Paste Images : Allow users to insert and paste images directly into markup layers, offering enhanced visual feedback when annotating documents. More design Review features t

title: Photos - Private and Published
body_text: We need the ability to have private photos only accessed by the user and published photos accessible to the entire project team. This should work similarly to private vs. published markups on sheets. In the photos module, each user would have an area for private photos and published/public photos.

title: Add bookmarks in pdf documents
body_text: Add the ability to create bookmarks in a pdf document or access/use bookmarks that are already set up in the file.

title: Split view 2D and 3D
body_text: It would be powerful to have a split view mode when viewing a model with 2D views and 3D views. Even when working with IFC, DWG or a RVT without 2D views.

title: Submittals - Specifications
body_text: If the specification module is being used, allow for the "spec sections" within submittals to be automatically populated. Allow for custom specification sections in the event that a submittal follows a specification that is not uploaded to the spec sections.

title: Collections in Specifications
body_text: In ACC build "sheets" there is the option to make collections. This same option does not apply to specifications, it would be nice to have collections for specifications so they could correspond to a collection of sheets.

title: RFI response attachments
body_text: The RFI module only has the ability to add attachments through the references section. It woudl be nice to have the same consistency with RFIs as is in submittals - attachments are included when slecting the review button.

title: Open files in Blue Beam
body_text: Our estimating team relies heavily on BlueBeam and would like to open files directly from the AutoDesk web version in BlueBeam. Since the Desktop Connector doesn’t update promptly, we need to use the web version. Currently, the only workaround is to download the files to our desktop, open them, and then re-upload them to AutoDesk each time. This process is very time-consuming. Therefore, we would like to streamline this by being able to open files directly from AutoDesk in the web browser.

title: Files // Version History improvements
body_text: Today, Files received a long-awaited feature to view versioned historical attribute data, called Version History . Despite now having this feature, it still needs more work to make it far more usable. Better UI Flow The process to get to the Version History I guess is fine, but it is a pain when you then want to move between numerous files within the same folder. Each time you move to a new file you need to close the Version History, to then open it again for a different file. This is maddening

title: Meetings Format
body_text: In the meeting minute format, it would be helpful to our team to be able to highlight and strike through. We currently only have the options to B I U Number and bullet.

title: ACC Meetings // AI Notetaking in MS Teams
body_text: MS Teams is nicely integrated into the ACC Meetings tool as an easier method to manage conferencing links and access for team members. But it would also be nice for ACC to use AI to summarise the meeting action points and create them as draft Items in the Meeting . I feel these draft Items may need to go into a 'holding area' in the meeting for the organiser to review and organise into the meeting topics before sending out the Minutes. I'm not sure if ACC could work in with existing AI such as M

title: Issue status change
body_text: The assignee to an issue should not be able to mark the issue as Closed. Maybe as Completed, but not as Closed. They should also not be able to re-open a closed issue.

title: Previously approved drawings / documents
body_text: Drawings that have gone through the approval process are marked as "Approved." If I upload a new version of this drawing, I can't see in Docs that the previous version was already approved. It would be nice to have an icon within the folder for these drawings indicating that a previous version was approved. Thanks Peter Jirát

title: Add ability to markup and add text to Photos
body_text: Add functionality to be able to markup and add text to Photos.

title: Issue Due Date management template
body_text: Right now our users don´t get any email notifications when issues that are assigned to them run out. It would be nice if either at a user level or on project level we could choose how we want to manage due dates. For example: - Do nothing (like now) - Email X days before due date runs out - Weekly emails for example on Mondays that summarize all issues that are with a due date within 10 days Something like this could add real value I think.

title: Within Account Admin, Companies - show list of projects and members
body_text: Within Account Admin page, and the Companies module, please show the actual list of members and projects the company has been assigned to. Currently it simply says '2 members' which is not much use!

title: Apple Pencil Support
body_text: I’m trying to markup PDFs stored in ACC in the field for surveys. I am using the pen tool in conjunction with an Apple Pencil and a latest-gen iPad Pro, and the program is very unresponsive to the apple pencil’s touches. For example, if I try and draw the number 5, the bottom half will register, but I’ll have to come back to draw the top half. It often doesn’t register the first touch of the pencil, leading to illegible handwritten numbers and text. From what I understand, Apple Pencil is curren

title: New response types in Build Forms
body_text: Please add the following new types of responses for Build Forms. Drop-down menus with project members and companies. Possibly roles as well.

title: Meetings - Create Agenda Templates
body_text: We would like the ability to have meeting templates. When creating a new meeting, have a list to pick from the Account Library

title: Location & Tag information be added to photo details on Forms & Exports references.
body_text: If Location, Tag or Uploaded By information has been added to a photo record, display that information along with Description and Date in references on Forms and Exports. This simple addition would make producing punch and observation reports easier and clearer for the report reader.

title: Pinpoint Project Location Accuracy
body_text: ACC does not allow administrators to define the project’s exact geographic location. Since the address is entered manually, the system displays only an approximate location rather than an accurate one.

title: Renewed Call for A Proper Autodesk Desktop App Similar to Mobile
body_text: I am so tired of constantly deleting Cookies and browsing history, and restarting my computer in the vain hopes that autodesk will not run like a Frame-y, Mess in Chrome or Microsoft Edge. Or Waiting 3-4 Minutes on a page in order to try and get it to smooth out. The Mobile App works and runs 100 times better than the Browser based version, and it really affects productivity when your doing mark ups or location marking, and the screen is moving at 5 frames a second. Yes I have tried all the Tech

title: Enable Mark-Ups in Continuous Scrolling PDF View
body_text: It would be extremely helpful for document reviews if the software allowed creating and editing mark-ups while using the continuous scrolling view for multi-page PDF files. Currently, we always need to switch to the single-page view to add mark-ups and then return to continuous scrolling to navigate large documents more efficiently. This limitation has generated frequent complaints from teams who work with extensive technical documentation, as it significantly impacts the fluidity of their revie

title: Create Forms automatically for each asset and link Form statut and Asset statut
body_text: It will be great to improve the creation of forms and the link between forms & assets Example: quality check to do for each element. We have assets for all the elements with different statut (formed, rebar, poured, checked) We want to create automatic quality check forms for all elements. When the status of the quality form is closed, the status of the asset has to change automatically to the status "checked" for example.

title: Forms Download Enhancement
body_text: I have been downloading Forms over 3 years, and desperately need this function fixed: For (all) referenced Forms [RFI, Sheets, Submittals, Forms] to populate into the export with 1 click. Currently, the hyperlink gets listed at the bottom of the Form. This is useless because clients & subcontractors do not have total access to our database and per contract I am to compile the document into 1 file. Therefore I am needing all of the Referenced docs to be included in the export with 1 click [Run Re

title: Enable Comments within Plan Tasks in Autodesk Build
body_text: Allow users to add comments within plan tasks in Autodesk Build, to capture greater detail behind task progress. While this level of detail can be managed within an imported schedule, not all users maintain connected timelines. Plans can often be used independently.

title: Workflows  ( Reviews )   Approver Step : Every Approver must Approve the documents
body_text: The workflow is where the Engineer is the consolidator ,being the first member in the "Approver Step". This Approver goes through the documents and sets the Approval value ( Approved/ Rejected ) Following that, Document Control, the Second member in the list, checks the documents for missing information, and according to the Approval Status, places a "Stamp" ( via Markup ). In order to achieve this, the request is: In the Approver Step, "Every Approver must enter this step", similar to the optio

title: Meetings feature request: Enable adding comments
body_text: Hi all, Welcome back to my series Make the ACC Tools Great Again! Today’s topic: Meetings. This tool has huge potential to be truly useful, but for large-scale adoption it needs a few key improvements. One super-useful feature would be the ability for everyone involved in a meeting to add comments directly to the agenda items discussed during the session. Right now, meeting participants can’t share anything with each other within the tool. It would be fantastic if any attendee could add a commen

title: Clashes must be visible until the created issue is closed
body_text: Currently, in the Model Coordination, clashes are no longer displayed as clashes once a task has been created for them, even if the task is still marked as open. This is incorrect in practice and leads to confusion, because clashes remain clashes until the task is completed/closed. The clashes must remain visible until then. Perhaps instead of directly "closing" the clashes, a clash status could be introduced: open, in progress (once a task is created), and completed/closed.

title: Add Stamp Templates to Project Template Setup
body_text: Every GC has a specific Submittal Stamp that we use to acknowledge general conformance review for all submittals going to the design and engineering members of a project. Currently, every Project or Account Admin needs to create that standard stamp from new, for each new project. It would be great to add this to the Project Admin Template Setup settings. Thank you!

title: Members report - who added the member
body_text: Who is allowed to do what is a big concern and often permissions must exceed what would be wanted for a particular user in order to grant access to one or two features they need, but then overextends their access to other features. The ability to add users to a project (and thus to the Account members) is something that can get out of hand quickly and there is no way to track who added a user. It would be terrific if the Members Report could include who the user was added by. This would go a lon

title: Meetings API
body_text: Please release meeting API instead of data connector. We would like to connect meetings to 3rd party tools.

title: Enhancement Request for “My Home” Function
body_text: I would like to bring to your attention a limitation I have noticed in the “My Home” function. Currently, the Project Assigned Work section only allows filtering by individual names, rather than by Role or Company . This limitation poses a challenge, as our team frequently assigns Submittals based on Role or Company . As a result, I am unable to efficiently track assigned work through the My Home function and must manually filter by Role or Company within the Submittal section, which can be time

title: Improving UI for "Push to Autodesk Docs"
body_text: When pushing drawings to Autodesk Docs, there are three UI issues observed. 1. The selection list shows all projects I have access to. It's hard to find the correct folder! -> They are not in (alphabetical) order. -> It should show only folders that I have selected in the Desktop Connector. 2. The folder with naming standards is missing the icon to show it has naming standards. 3. Fields for fixing names are too small to show the name to be fixed. -> The fields have the exact size of the defined

title: Ability to open the Microsoft desktop Apps from ACC Docs
body_text: When we open Microsoft Documents in ACC the Microsoft web app automatically opens(i.e. Word), there is no option to select 'open' the desktop app. The web app functionality is very limited compared with the Desktop apps. Furthermore we would like to co-author documents using the desktop apps on top of the ACC Docs file. One alternative is to use the Desktop Connector App however there are a few problems with this option: Users would have to have a local copy of the ACC folders/files which negate

title: ACC Viewer Docs - 3D Views
body_text: The viewpoints functionality is a welcome addition to the ACC Viewer. However, when multiple 3D views are included in a Revit publish set, orbiting in one view is not replicated across the others. In other words, users cannot toggle between 3D views while maintaining the same viewpoint within a single viewer session. Instead, the viewer reverts to the last location, when a user returns to a view. @twellins

title: Reviews - Reopen or recreate closed review
body_text: Most of the time when drawings are updated from a review, a new review needs to be created. It would be good to see an option that reopens or recreates closed reviews.

title: Feature demand: Reviews: Dynamic adjusting number of approving key reviewers
body_text: Hi all, While creating a new review, there are currently only two options for setting the number of key reviewers who must review a step in the workflow. These two options are: either every key reviewer must approve the step, or a minimum number of key reviewers must be set. However, if you're using roles for key reviewers and have multiple people assigned to the same role, the current setup for defining the minimal number of key reviewers becomes quite inefficient. For example, I may select two

title: graphs showing participation w/i a given radius
body_text: Owners often want ot encourage use of subcontractors local to the project site. it would be nice to be able to show a graph of subs within X miles.

title: The possibility to have all assets displayed in one page
body_text: In BIM 360 there used to be the option to not have the all assets listed in one long list not several pages. It would be beneficial to have this option also in ACC mostly when it comes to selection.

title: Meeting minutes download with photos
body_text: Hi, I would like to suggest an improvement regarding the meeting minutes export feature. It would be very helpful if photos added to meeting minutes — such as those from issue reports — could be embedded directly into the downloadable PDF, rather than appearing as links. I often need to share these documents with stakeholders who do not have an ACC license, and therefore cannot access the linked images. Unfortunately, I had to manually copy and paste the content into a Google Doc in order to inc

title: Enable search in Meetings
body_text: We love the meeting modules - a very effective way to manage meeting series On a multi $ bn project like ours with 5000 ACC users , we have over 1000 meeting series With growing number of meetings/series its getting hard for users to find their meeting/series Ask: develop search filtering options in Meetings. Like: - text search - introduce a meeting number/id that you can search filter on - filter on originator/originating company - date span ( from - to, last 3 months , last 6 m etc ) - export

title: Allow Initiators to Assign Approvers per Review
body_text: In our approval workflows we face a limitation: the initiator can only adjust the reviewer, not the approver . Here’s how we currently set it up: Roles (e.g., Project Leader as reviewer, BIM Coordinator as approver) are predefined in the templates. At project level, we want the initiator to select a specific project member from those roles when starting the review. This way, only the selected person receives the notification and knows they are responsible. The problem is that right now all proje

title: Option to delete Submital Revisions without voiding the previous revisions
body_text: Currently, if we create a submittal revision accidently and need to delete it, there is no option to just delete the revision without voiding out the complete package, which would void the previous revisions as well. It will be really beneficial if we are able to delete accidental revisions, so the submittal does not keep showing up as 'Required for Submission'. This will be a requirement to close out all submittals during closeout.

title: Issues - assign to multiple
body_text: Sometimes we get issues (especially with design coordination and field coordination, like clashes) that have 2 or more parties involved that need to be addressed. It would be nice to have the ability to assign it to multiple people or roles to resolve. Ex: the leads of Mechanical and Electrical to addresscoordination of power connections to mechanical equipment, or Mech and elecrical needing to coordinate routes to avoid clashes as they cross.

title: RFI emails should say RFI in the Subject of the Email
body_text: Please make is so when an RFI Notification is sent out RFI is in the Email subject, currently it only shows the a number.

title: Integration of Specification with Autodesk Build Submittal Spec Sections & Autodesk Takeoff Classification Systems
body_text: It would be advantageous to enable seamless integration between project specifications and their corresponding Autodesk Build submittal spec sections and Autodesk Takeoff classification systems. Furthermore, direct integration with widely used specification subscription services would ensure that accurate information is automatically linked to the specifications, submittal sections & classification types, reducing reliance on manual data entry or Excel imports and streamlining the management of

title: Adding an Account Logo
body_text: At present, ACC does not allow you to add an account logo directly as you can in BIM360. If a logo is already set in BIM360, it will carry over into ACC, but not all users have access to BIM360. I think users would appreciate the option to upload an account logo.

title: Allow Reviewers to Add Documents to Approval Workflows
body_text: Would it be possible to allow reviewers to add documents directly to the review workflow, rather than sending the process back to the initiator? In multi-step workflows, this often results in unnecessary delays. If initiator approval is still required, it could be handled within the reviewer’s step, reducing or even preventing the need for multiple review rounds.

title: "Jump to" detail call out
body_text: Create feature to “jump to” page when clicking on a detail call out (like on Bluebeam or Procore).

title: Keep takeoff on previous versions
body_text: Do not delete takeoff from previous versions when takeoff needs to be updated for newest version. This is imperative when there are multiple rounds of budgeting and estimating to be able to compare old takeoff to new. It'd be best if the takeoff could be copied forward instead of fully moved.

title: Ability to link forms/checklists to Sheets upon upload
body_text: It would be very useful if ACC had an option to link forms or checklists to Sheets , so that completing the form becomes a requirement when uploading a new drawing. For example: Condition: “When uploading a drawing (Sheet), the linked form must be filled out or completed first.” This would help us ensure that the right quality checks and approval steps are always in place before a drawing is made available. This would make workflows more consistent and give us confidence that every drawing has g

title: Ability to Move Cost Payment Application to different period
body_text: Many times subcontractors are not paying attention to what period they are entering their billing under and just selecting the first one that pops up. Which could result in a Subcontractor creating a billing in a period that has expired. This is happening quite often. The only way to fix this is to delete the billing from the older period and re-enter to the correct period. The ability as a project administrator to move the Subcontractor billing to the correct period without having to delete it

title: Exclude Closed Submittals from “Your Assigned Work” on home page
body_text: We’ve recently noticed a change in the “Your Assigned Work” button on the home page. Previously, this quick link worked exactly as intended, showing only open submittals that required action. Now, however, it’s also displaying closed submittals, which creates unnecessary clutter and confusion — for example, my home page currently shows 9 submittals under “Your Assigned Work,” but non of them are actually open. In some of our projects, team members are seeing 50+ items under "your assigned work"

title: Build - Meetings - add reviews as references option
body_text: In meetings references we can add almost everything as as reference except reviews. Please add this option also.

title: Files - Get rid of pop up cloud on ACC
body_text: As I wrote to you multiple times already, please listen more to people who work in construction and less to people who work in IT. I do not understand who thought that hiding information in pop cloud is good idea. Please elaborate. Reviews hyperlink is hidden under review status attribute in files. Total number of markups is hidden under crown icon. Now you are progressing this into issues as well so we can have total number of issues hidden. I would really love to understand your logic here. Ar

title: Improving Submittals Module & Review Capabilities in ACC
body_text: While working on the Master Delivery List of Documents using the Submittals module in ACC, we have encountered several limitations that restrict us from fully recommending it to our users. Currently, the submittal review process lacks flexibility and advanced features that are critical for smooth document management and real-world workflows. Current Challenges: Limited Review Actions: Reviewers cannot send the document back to the initiator for corrections. No ability to perform multiple follow-

title: Forms: calculations and scoring
body_text: Our teams are frustrated that current form functionality doesn't currently facilitate scoring or calculations, particularly on forms used to conduct audits. There are a lot of other products on the market that can give on-screen overall audit scores based on form responses. We have had to build dashboards in PowerBI which apportion score values to questions which have set responses and then provide an overall percentage score for the project. Having to take this out of ACC means that we are reli

title: “Cancel” Status for Forms
body_text: Use Case: There are cases where a form cannot be completed because the related task was canceled or made irrelevant (e.g., canceled work permits due to weather or scope changes). Currently, the only option is to archive the form, which loses contextual information. Importance: A dedicated “Cancel” status will retain the form history and reasons, enabling accurate reporting and audit trails. Expected Benefit: Better process documentation, accurate analytics, and improved transparency for all stak

title: Location Editing Issue in Forms
body_text: In Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) Forms, we’ve noticed that the location field can be edited at any time until the form is closed . This creates a risk of incorrect or unauthorized changes to the recorded location after the inspection or checklist has been initiated, potentially affecting data integrity and traceability. Suggested Improvement: Once the form is created and the initial location is selected, the location field should be locked (or editable only by specific roles) to maintain acc

title: Enhancement Request – Mandatory Live Photo Capture in ACC Build Forms
body_text: To ensure that all photos attached in ACC Build Forms are captured live on-site — not uploaded from the device’s gallery. This would enhance the authenticity and reliability of site documentation. Current Situation: In the Forms module, when a question or checkpoint requires a photo, users can currently: Capture a live photo using the device camera OR upload an existing image from their gallery Why This Matters: Allowing gallery uploads can lead to: Lack of authenticity – Photos may be old, unre

title: RESOLVED - SEE COMMENTS - Autodesk Takeoff - Allow Use of Count in Quantity Formulas for Count-Based Takeoff Types
body_text: Currently, when using Count-based Takeoff Types in Autodesk Takeoff, there's no way to reference the total number of placed instances within the quantity formula. This limits real-world use cases where the count drives a physical quantity, such as: Volume of concrete for column pads or piers Total weight for equipment or precast units Labor/machine estimates based on item quantity Even though you can define variables like depth, width, and height, there's no ability to multiply these values by t

title: Add markups, issues, hyperlinks to Specifications
body_text: Add the ability to add markups and hyperlinks and pin issues to pages in the Specifications module.

title: Form Template Reference Documents
body_text: Allow us to attach Reference Documents to Form Templates for relevant documents such as Submittals, logistics, RFI's, charts, etc. for users to reference and review in the Form itself.

title: Bridge : Some files failed ==> we neend a report
body_text: Hello Team, On ACC, when creating bridges, some files occasionally fail after the operation. For instance, in attached picture : 2 out of 912 failed. It is a bit tedious to search in each folder / sub folder / sub sub folder where failed files are located (by find the red flag). Proposal : After each Bridge operation, generate a report that includes: ✅ Target Hub and Receiver Hub 📁 List of folders and files involved 🕒 Last update timestamp ❌ List of failures , with direct links to the affected f

title: ACC Parameter Service - Label management
body_text: The ability to manage or cleanup available Labels would improvement the management by multiple admin. Alike the Tags in Content Catalog. Up to today when importing shared parameters, it always adds labels even the name of the .txt file. Managing project specific parameters really fills up the list of available labels. Time to make it possible to clean up the garbage.

title: Photo and Video Organization
body_text: We are requesting the option to upload photos and videos in separate folders. This is especially critical for progress tracking during construction when it comes to quality control and deficiencies. Currently, the only option one has is to filter by date. This option is not ideal because it relies on the photos being uploaded on the day they were taken. Additionally, for someone who is not on site daily, looking at a single photo, without the context of the project phase, it is very frustrating

title: Possibility of sharing insight builder dashboards to ACC insight
body_text: It would be really great if we have the possibility and functionality of sharing/publishing dashboards which are made in Insight Builder to ACC Insight (as a card). The reason is, this way we could have all the dashboard cards in one place for viewing (built-in insight cards, partner cards, and insight builder cards). Now, users need to check two places to get a full overview and it's not really ideal. I believe this feature was already on the roadmap since last year (see attachment) and AWS Qui

title: Reopen Closed Reviews / Multi-Cycle Workflow
body_text: It would be highly beneficial to have an option to reopen closed review workflows or initiate a second cycle/loop under the same workflow ID . This would help manage multiple review rounds without creating separate workflows each time, ensuring better traceability and consistency.

title: Location Details on photos
body_text: When taking multiple photos, there needs to be a way of assigning them to a location en masse.

title: Aufgaben zentral im HUB verwalten
body_text: Für eine standartisierung von Projekten und einem zentralen Aufgabenmanagement wäre es gut, wenn die Aufgabenkategorien analog zu den Formularen für den gesamten HUB verwaltet werden können. Dies würde die Administration und Pflege von Projekten vereinfachen. So dass Benutzerdefinierte Felder, Aufgabenkategorien und Aufgabentypen für alle Projekte verteilt werden können, ggf. auch mit Vorlagen.

title: Reference an Asset to another Asset
body_text: Currently, when adding a reference to an Asset you cannot choose another existing Asset. This functionality would be critically helpful in tracking our material shipments as they are incorporated into the build in phases.

title: Vieweing Assets on the 2D Sheets created in the Revit model
body_text: We are able to create Assets based on Revit model data. This Revit model also contains Sheets, which are the actual drawings used by the operatives on our construction sites. We would like to be able to view the Assets correctly in the Sheets, since it is in fact "all in one Revit model". At the moment ACC does seem to "want to indicate" the Assets on the 2D view, but it does e very poor job at it. Here are some ideas: 1) Show only the Assets related to the 2D View. The 2D view contains only a p

title: BuildingConnected Bidder View with Filterable Metadata
body_text: Company profiles contain address, scopes, labor type, tags, reviews, etc. None of this metadata is available within the bidders tab which makes it only partially useful. One can run a bidder status report which shows some (not all) of the metadata, however that is somewhat similar to the company in that it is an inefficient way to utilize information as it requires using a separate tab or window to try and categorize and track info separately. Showing this info in the profile on the right side o

title: Sheets - Review option
body_text: A review option before the Sheets become published is crucial. This review would take place after the Sheets are uploaded but before they are published. Alternatively, another option could be to have accepted drawings (Reviews tool) end in Sheets AND Published folder. This would save time, confusion and discrepancy between the Published folder and Sheets. In the snippet you can see inside the Publish log in Sheets which shows that one log has a status "Ready for review", I got this by pressing "

title: Ability to Edit/Delete Registered Non-Member Emails in Correspondence
body_text: The ability to edit or delete registered Non-Member emails in the Correspondence module would significantly improve list maintenance and reduce the risk of confusion. Currently, once a Non-Member email is registered, it cannot be edited or deleted. Example Scenario: If a user accidentally enters a typo when adding an external email, they are unable to correct it after clicking “Create.” Instead, they must create a new Non-Member entry with the correct email address. This leads to multiple entrie

title: RFIs - Companies and roles as ´Ball in court´
body_text: We need an option to assign company or a role to ´´ball in court´´ field in RFIs. We need this because people go on holidays, sick leave, change projects, leave companies, etc. If we have Company assigned to ´´ball in court´´ field would save a lot of time. Too precious time on very fast construction projects. Please implement this idea. Second point, please add company who is opening RFI as default watcher on this RFI. On our projects it does not make sense for only initiator sees the RFI. Thei

title: Subscribing to Packages
body_text: We need to be able to subscribe to Packages. We can already subscribe to folders, so we want to be able to subscribe to packages in a similar manner and would like to be able to do the following: -Be notified when a document is added, removed or updated. -The ACC Admin to be able to set up subscription settings for each package individually as each package would have a different subscriber (per role/company/individual) -Notifications settings - to be able to choose how often to be notified of ch

title: Saving views from BIM models
body_text: We use BIM models a lot in our meetings and on site. Usually the BIM models are aggregated on the spot depending on the needs. During the meeting or as a preparation for the execution on site, we create views within the model context using: coloring of objects in the BIM models, hiding of objects in the BIM models, annotations and markups (like 3D text), and measurements. This information is very valuable and should be storable. With the current features available on ACC (also within Model Coord

title: Cost Management Reviews for multiple projects
body_text: As an Executive I have to log into each project to see what cost payment application reviews are ready for me to review. I would like to request the ability to have the cost management review be visible on the My Home page.

title: Meetings Folders
body_text: Could you add the ability to organize meetings into folders? Yes, they're separated by meeting series, but for example, could we go further and under those meeting series have the ability to file into specific discussions if need be? It would be nice to be able to keep meetings more organized.

title: Milestone limit
body_text: I would like to suggest an increase on the limit of milestones that can be put into a project. The current limit, 15, is nowhere near high enough. I suggest limit be somewhere around 50.

title: Schedule Automated Reminders to Subs to Submit bids
body_text: There should be a feature that allows you to set up an automatic reminder to subs that their bids are due at set date.

title: RFI References imbed images automatically
body_text: When exporting an RFI PDF to someone without ACC, the references made in the RFI get lost in the export. It would be ideal if the markup that was referenced to the RFI would make a "snapshot" or "snippet" of that sheet and markup automatically so the PDF export contains all of the imagery the reviewer will need without having to create your own images through "Windows Snippet" and uploading that image to Photos, then making the reference in the RFI.

title: Save review filter
body_text: The filter feature in issuelist works well becouse it stay available. This is not possible when filter in the review list. It will be good if we can save the filter in the review list.

title: RESOLVED - SEE COMMENTS - Autodesk Takeoff - Let Users Set Default Notification Preferences Across All Projects
body_text: Right now, Autodesk Construction Cloud defaults new projects to **hourly notifications** for modules like Takeoff, Docs, etc. Every time I’m added to a new project, I have to manually go into Notification Settings and switch everything from hourly to off, or whatever. It’s tedious and easy to forget, especially when managing multiple projects. Request: Give users (or account admins) the ability to set **default notification preferences** globally — at the user profile level — so that new project

title: Make custom fields visible in Reviews
body_text: Currently, we are not able to add or filter by any custom fields while QA Reviewing, we can only see the default Path, Comments, review status, description, version etc. We have a lot of custom fields we ask the team members to fill in and we would need these fields visible so we can Review them in order for the Review process to be purposeful. Without this feature, we are forced to view each file separately in Docs first to review the custom field data, which is tedious and inefficient. All the

title: Dimensions as Markups
body_text: Currently Dimensions are only temporary. It would be useful if dimensions can also be added as markups when doing a drawing review.

title: RFI Workflow
body_text: Is it possible to assign companies, rather than just individuals, to the "Ball in Court" workflow for RFIs? In the Submittals workflow, we have the ability to assign responsibility at the company level, which has proven helpful. Different team members within a company are often responsible for reviewing specific aspects of a project. Being able to assign the RFI to the company, rather than a single individual, would better reflect this collaborative review process and help ensure nothing is miss

title: Admin tool - View as User
body_text: In the Power BI tool we have a feature to be able to View the Report as a specific user. This is very helpful for admins to double check if the user is not seeing anything that he should not see. I can imagine that this feature in ACC would be very helpful.

title: ISSUES Search in all the infos
body_text: ACC Docs in the Issue section, we can search by title and ID. but sometimes I need to case a specific topic described in the "Description" or any other field. it would be great to extend the search set to all the field in it.

title: Ability to Edit Issue Thumbnail Image in Navisworks
body_text: When creating issues in Navisworks, sometimes the issue thumbnail gets shifted to a different area if you move around the model before the issue is done populating. Therefore, the thumbnail doesnt adequately show what the issue is at hand.
