Please add a multi-select feature within the table, like other modules of ACC, to make it easier to bulk edit and audit In the review process of uploading new specs or versions and selecting the code, I

title: Adding 3D view saving function for model coordination within ACC
body_text: Currently, model coordination space read the view published from models that stored in ACC folder. But setting up views in different models take time. For example, If one wants to have first floor view or particular view for clash detection or field aggregate viewing purpose, every model in the coordination folder needs to set a view to make it happen. If we can create view (maybe by using section box) directly within ACC model coordination, it can drastically reduce the view setup time. I sugge

title: Multi-Model Asset Status View
body_text: Current limitation: Linking multiple models to view combined asset status is not supported. Desired feature: Allow viewing asset status from multiple linked models simultaneously, when categorized. Currently, only one model's information is accessible per category.

title: The Possibility to appear the References on the issues detail report (like on Forms export)
body_text: now, if you have at references on an Issues a pdf file, or a line from schedule, when you export that issues, those references are not exported (as linked file),like on Forms or Meetings. Is it possible to appear also on issues?

title: PDF Forms re-assignment possibility for Project Admins
body_text: Project Admins must have more privileges to re-assignment PDF Forms from someone assigned Members to someone else

title: Additional fields added in forms based on answers.
body_text: It would be a good feature if we could get additional questions if a certain answer is given. In this way you can get additional information/documentation if necessary. Microsoft and google Forms have this option.

title: Totally delete projects from ACC.
body_text: It should be possible to delete projects or files totally from ACC. This is crucial for some projects. Owners and/or governments demands everything regarding the project and or files permanently deleted after handover of the project. Due to lack of this possibility ACC can't be used for these type of projects. And due to GDPR you may break the law if you upload something with personal information, and no way to fix it. It could be an option for a few selected Account Admins and an extra override

title: Integrating 'File Path' Visibility in the Issues Panel
body_text: Hi, Not seeing 'File Paths' in Issues Panel makes identifying files difficult. I suggest adding 'File Path' information within this panel, as it's done in the Reviews and Transmittals. This change would improve file navigation and management in ACC Docs. Thanks. Reviews:

title: Add different area shape (circle or semi-circle) in Autodesk takeoff
body_text: Autodesk Takeoff does not have a circle or semi-circle area tool in its takeoff, So I may have to do some math to calculate the area included with the boundaries of a radius wall separately

title: ACC-Model Coordination-Clashes
body_text: When creating coordination space for locating the models to be ready for clash run, it is not under control to use a specific clash test, but it runs the clashes file versus file. we need an option to load (import) a specific clash test with desired tolerances and all other main options that we are using with Navisworks , to have a complete 3D coordination - cloud based process. Also we need to have an option of export report for the clashes.

title: Automated Reviewer Workflows for TradeTapp
body_text: It would be great if you could set up reviewer workflows so that every time someone reviews a vendor profile it can be automatically assigned to the next person based on rules.

title: Cost Pulling in Documents from the PCO into the OCO
body_text: We need the option when pulling in documents into the OCO to be able to pull in the Merged PCO documents instead of all the individual documents from the PCO. Pro's: Pulling in the Merged PCO.pdf is a cleaner when reviewing the PCO to make sure all the PCO's backup has been attached Easier to follow Ensures we are using the same document that was used as backup in the PCO approval process in the OCO. that the Owner. Con's: Existing process pulls in all the individual documents Makes it harder to

title: Streamline site for sub contractors
body_text: Hi all, I'm a land surveyor, I do construction staking. I get invited to all kinds of jobs through this site, it's great. But it's time consuming to bid the same job for the same price, with the same qualifications and insurances to each individual general contractor. From my perspective, this site has great potential for sub contractors but falls short. Ideally the owner or developer would post the job, sub contractors in the area would be notified and have an opportunity to place a bid for the

title: Add Title Field for Issues Created on Mobile/Ipad
body_text: When creating a Safety Violation or other Issue type from an iPad or mobile device , there is currently no ability to enter a Title . Because of this, all Issues created in the field display the same default title (e.g., “SAFETY VIOLATION” ) when reviewed on a desktop. This makes it difficult for project teams to quickly identify, prioritize, or search for specific Issues—especially on projects with a high volume of field-generated items. Adding a Title field to the mobile / ipad w ould allow fi

title: Exclude Email Signature Images from Correspondence Attachments
body_text: When sending emails via the Correspondence tool, embedded images from email signatures (such as banners or logos) are automatically added as attachments. As the email thread continues, these images keep accumulating, resulting in unnecessary attachments and cluttered correspondence. Suggested Improvement: Add an option to automatically exclude embedded signature images from being treated as attachments. Alternatively, provide a toggle or filter to ignore images below a certain size or marked as

title: Issue Status - Change Color
body_text: Hello, It will be really great to have the possibility to change the color for each Statut as we want.

title: Lockable Bidder List & Bid Form Templates - Building Connected Pro
body_text: It would be nice to have the option to lock a Bidder List Template or Bid Form Template so that no further edits can be made.

title: Default Views
body_text: It would be helpful if: When you save a custom view to replace the "Default View", the view name reflects the custom description. For example, if the view that needs to automatically show when opening Cost>Budget is "Company Standard View", the default view name would update to reflect "Company Standard View". Otherwise, that view is in two different places and any updates would have to be made in both views. This creates duplicate work and more risk for human error. Company created standard vie

title: Allow Nudging
body_text: RFIs have an option to send reminder email but Submittals do not.

title: Shared Custom Fields
body_text: Being able to pull a custom attribute from Issues into RFIs, etc would be helpful - keep them linked and updated. For example, if I'm tracking a WBS (Work Breakdown Structure) that is different than my Spatial Structure, I cannot use Locations for both, so I make a custom attribute. That I then must recreate in other areas and update in multiple places.

title: Send automated reminder emails when workflows are overdue
body_text: Currently, Autodesk Construction Cloud provides a manual option to send reminder emails for change orders. However, this requires users to actively monitor due dates and trigger reminders themselves, which can be time-consuming and may lead to missed follow-ups on busy projects. It would be highly beneficial to have automated reminder notifications when a change order passes its due date. The system should automatically send reminder emails or in-app notifications to the respective responsible u

title: Design Collab permissions — need for granular, role‑based access
body_text: We’re using Design Collab to share and consume folders. The issue we’re seeing is that when roles are assigned in Teams (Design Collab), everyone with a role gains view access to all subfolders under the shared folder. Our intent is to assign roles at the subfolder level so access aligns with the specific discipline/folder. In Docs, those roles had view and create permissions limited to their folders. After setting up Design Collab, they now have view access across all subfolders within the shar

title: Add screenshots into Meeting Minutes
body_text: It would be very useful to be able to add screen shots into the minutes of meetings

title: Assets to export with all attachments included (not just as a reference)
body_text: It would be incredibly helpful if, inside the Assets module, you could print off almost a cover page associated with the Assets that could include all references as "embedded attachments" (similar to RFIs and Submittals) where the files themselves would actually display / print upon export. Like what you can do with Submittals and RFIs. We are using Assets for something similar to requirements tracking / punchlist and at the end of the job, when we go to compile all of our supporting documentati

title: Temperature in Fahrenheit in Build / homepage
body_text: The temperature is in Fahrenheit in homepage of build module. Can you add an option to switch to °C ?

title: Autodesk Build - Increase the character limit on the RFI Number field - required by ISO 19650
body_text: Autodesk Build – RFI Numbers allowed in Autodesk Build are not long enough to ensure compliance with ISO 19650 numbering requirements We are using Autodesk Build on ISO 19650-compliant projects and have run into a limitation with the RFI Number field. Under ISO 19650, we are required to use structured, standardised container IDs (for example: ABB-EXX-KIZ-ALL-ZZZ-RFI-0000). The current RFI Number field in Autodesk Build does not allow enough characters to store the full ISO 19650-compliant ID. Wh

title: Save Files from RFIs to Docs
body_text: We should be able to save files that are attached to RFI answers directly into Docs. Currently you have to download the files to your computer and re-upload them, which takes a lot of time when your RFI containes 20+ files.

title: RFI - Allow for Default Settings to be change
body_text: Currently, users do not have the option to edit the default RFI settings to select which attributes should appear in the RFI template. We would like to introduce different RFI types—for example, Construction RFI and Design RFI —each with its own category and discipline. Certain attributes would be mandatory only for specific RFI types, while some of the default attributes are not relevant to the project but cannot be removed from the template. Is there a way to customize or edit these settings?

title: Correspondence Types in Project Template
body_text: The ability to create Correspondence Type in Project Templates. I understand that Correspondence Types in projects can permissions around members/roles/companies. But when creating them in a Project Template, you can remove the permission restriction entirely from the Project Template and have it show in the Project once created. This would save a lot of manual input adding in Correspondence Types to every project created from a Project Template.

title: Form - Equipment / Material Section
body_text: Enable the option to add new parameters for these sections. For Equipment, the fields are currently: Equipment / Quantity / Hours. It would be useful to create custom fields (Shift, Subcontractor, etc.).

title: Add Change History for all Templates
body_text: We use a lot of Templates for Reviews, Forms etc, and have multiple admin users making changes to them. Can we please add a history section, similar to how we can see the history and edits of a file or an issue, to all templates so we can know who changed what within a template. This will add transparency, improve internal workflows and catch mistakes earlier.

title: Approval Request - Project Drop Down Menu
body_text: When submitting a new approval, the submitter can type anything into the Project Name. The different variations on project names will lead to a highly unorganized RMP Tracking system. Would a drop down menu be possible? I know this would take some legwork internally. Adding a project number field could also fix this issue.

title: More text options for the transmittal message
body_text: A client recently sent me a few screenshots that they wanted me to send out alongside a transmittal of a model. They did not want them uploaded to ACC or in a separate email, but to be copy/pasted into the message for the transmittal like you can in a standard email. This is currently not possible, and there aren't any text options available either, such as bullet points, making something bold, a different colour etc. We sometimes send out long messages with a transmittal and would want to see m

title: Model Coordination – Models tool to display the “Description” attribute in a column
body_text: Problem: In Docs there is a possibility to add/view Description attribute. However, in Model Coordination, in the Models tool, there is no possibility to add the Description attribute to the list of models Desired outcome: Model Coordination – Models tool to display the “Description” attribute in a column or the ability to add the Description attribute in as a column in the Models list Current issue : business teams find it very difficult to work when finding the right file in model coordination

title: Restricted Comments for RFIs and Submittals
body_text: It would be very helpful to have the option to add Comments in the RFI and Submittal modules that can be checked as Restricted, similar to the option available in the Cost Management tools. This would allow the GC project team to add notes for one another related to coordinating the scope of work or scope changes that they may not want to share with upstream or downstream collaboration partners in that forum.

title: Assets with form attached by default
body_text: When you create an asset from a specific category I want to have the option to reference specific forms when it is created. For instance when I create an asset in the switchgear category, I want a receiving log form, torque log form, megger test form and maybe a couple of others automatically referenced in that asset. I also want the choice of that form name to reference the equipment name by default rather than just an arbitrary number. I shouldn't have to create the forms for each asset indivi

title: Model Coordination Support for IFC4 from Other CAD Tools (Including Hexagon Eyecad)
body_text: Hello, I’d like to share an idea that would be very helpful for customers who work with multi-vendor CAD environments. Today, IFC4 models exported from some third-party CAD tools can be viewed in Autodesk Construction Cloud’s Model Coordination , but clash detection is not available . For example, IFC4 models from Hexagon’s Eyecad load correctly for viewing, but we cannot perform clash checking. If possible, it would be great to see expanded clash detection support for: IFC4 models exported from

title: Notifications - Improve Frequency
body_text: To have format and frequency with more settings. Some notifications are instantly or never, others are instantly, hourly, daily or never... Files > Instantly or never We need the option daily for all type of notification, and weekly could be interesting to add.

title: Transfer forms between projects
body_text: We can't transfer tree folder of forms between projects. We need to tick the forms 1 by 1 and to create from scratch the folders in the destination project.

title: Better Management Role by Project
body_text: Today, we can manage rights by user, company, roles. Roles are linked to the roles defined in the hub. For all project, we have some specification, it could be really better to manage roles inside a project (create specific roles inside a project which are not including in the hub). Or maybe to have a third solution inside the projects, to create "group" of users and manage access with this "group" in addition of company / roles.

title: Title of Documents - Description field and custom attribute "Title"
body_text: For all users, we need a metadata for the document title. The codification is not sufficient to clearly identify which document is being opened. If we use description field, we cannot search or filter by ‘description'. With the API, we can't have the description Data... If we create a specific metadata "Title", by default we can't see this metadata "Title" inside the review to see quickly the name of the document. It's really a pain point for the users.

title: Markups - APS - Have the page number available in the data
body_text: We developed a specific tool with APS to extract all markups inside an excel to track all comments. In the excel, we have all markups of dozens / hundreds of files. In the projects, we have a lot of multipage pdf and on these PDF, we could have dozens of markups. We loose a lot of time to find where is the markup inside the PDF because we cannot have the page number data with APS.

title: Markups - The filter resets after a markup is selected
body_text: The documents contain dozens of markups created by different people. When we use the filter tool on the markups to see the markups done by people A, it helps us to see just these markups. After selecting a markup from the menu to zoom in on it, the filter is disabled which means we have to reapply the filter each time after selecting a markup. This bug is extremely frustrating.

title: Category & Type issue - Deactivated but it appears in the filter
body_text: Some categories and types of issues are deactivated inside projects. When we filter the issues, the deactivated categories and issues are always here.

title: My Home - Cross-Project review workflow tracking
body_text: On the My Home page, a user should be able to see ALL their Open Review items in a list/Card. If someone is a member of 10 projects and needs to possibly keep track of multiple Approval Workflow reviews for each of them, they currently have to dig through EACH project to figure out which ones have things they need to attend to. Notification emails are one thing, but they're not as good as a Heads Up dashboard of all your project wide tasks. This is also not something that should be handled by In

title: Improve Review Process
body_text: It's important to have Image Stamp inside review process(as submittal).

title: Better management of Markups for review
body_text: It's important to have a good process for reviews & markups. Today, we do markups on documents during the reviews. The markups are not linked to the reviews, but linked to the documents. If the reviews are closed, all users (key reviewer / initiator / final approver) and others can continue to do markups on the documents.

title: Enable Markups and Comments in Continuous Scrolling View for Multi-Page Documents
body_text: In ACC Docs, markups cannot be added when using the continuous scrolling view for multi-page PDFs. This forces users to open pages one by one or download the file to annotate offline. Please enable markup tools in continuous scrolling view to improve review efficiency.

title: GC to have the ability to respond directly to sub (via email or BC) when they submit a proposal
body_text: I am a Precon manager for a general contractor and would like to know why I can not respond directly to the person via email when they submit their proposal via building connected. Since they submitted thru building connected, I receive the email notification as shown below and to avoid more button click and having to go to BC and create a new message, I want to be able to quickly respond to this email below and acknowledge that I have received it and maybe ask them a couple quick questions. I d

title: Inability to Step Back Submittal Revisions – Critical Project Impact
body_text: Our team has encountered a serious issue within Autodesk Construction Cloud regarding submittal revision control. Once a new revision is created, there is no functionality to revert or step back to a previous revision. This limitation presents a major risk and operational failure for our project. In cases where an incorrect file or action is submitted, there is currently no way to correct or undo that revision. This is absolutely detrimental to our document control process and is causing confusi

title: Feature Request – Ability to Assign Multiple Assignees to a Form Section
body_text: I would like to request an enhancement for the Forms tool in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC). Currently, we are unable to assign more than one assignee (e.g., Subcontractor + Main Contractor ) to a single form section. As a workaround, I have created a new combined role. However, this approach requires manually assigning the new role to each individual user who should be included, which becomes a time-consuming and tedious process as the project progresses. It would be greatly beneficial if th

title: Feature Request – Add Locations Without Replacing Existing List
body_text: I would like to request an enhancement for the Locations tool in Autodesk Construction Cloud. Currently, to add new locations, users are required to delete and re-import the entire location list. This process removes the existing sheet links, causing members to redraw all the location markups manually. It would be greatly beneficial if the system could allow adding new locations without replacing the existing list , so that the links and markups on the sheets can be retained.

title: Submittal Manager Workflow Position
body_text: Would like to be able to configure the entire submittal workflow, including at what point the submittal manager comes in the workflow. This was some internal review can be done prior to getting to the submittal manager.

title: Date on Minutes and Agenda
body_text: Include the date when something was added (which meeting and meeting date) to the agenda and minutes. This can be shown with the created date but doesn't print or show unless looking into each item.

title: Description field on OCR data capture
body_text: When processing PDFs with OCR as part of the Titlesheet Templates, the Description Field is not available. This is forcing us to finish the process by manually adding a description value to each and every single file that goes into our named enforced folders. This documents are later sent in Transmittals. Our company uses ISO 19650 complaint drawing names, therefore there are no words describing the contents of each doc, making it paramount to use the Description Field, which is the only that is

title: Bring back the calendar view that is used in BIM 360 FIELD
body_text: Bring back the calendar view that is used in BIM 360 FIELD. It is an easy visual audit to see who is completing daily reports and an easy, visual, intuitive way for field guys to navigate to the daily reports and create them.

title: Description to be added in reference section for the forms in assets.
body_text: Is it possible to add the description onto the reference page where you click onto the form. Just so you know what form you are clicking onto. Please take a look for examples (snips) attached. Description is available in the assets section for the form but not in the reference page where the forms are listed and attached.

title: Dashboards and URLs
body_text: This I hope is an easy and I believe logical fix for Insight Builder. When you click on a dashboard, it's URL is the same as the level above. I.e The issue with this is that when I send a dashboard URL link it always opens to this page NOT the Dashboard. We have plans on placing monitors in our drawing office with a number of dashboards rotating through on the screen. I can't do this when the URL keeps reporting back to this page. It's also a pain as a number of our guys have created shortcuts t

title: RFI reports
body_text: I have been asked by ACC support to create a post here, we have encountered an issue with the RFI reports as they seem to have a limit to 1000 lines when exporting. Can this limit be increased? As currently we are unable to streamline this process when having 1600+ RFIs in the project

title: Submittal PDF Export Report
body_text: I have encountered a limitation when exporting a Submittal Report . While some Submittals contain multiple Revisions , the exported report appears to capture only the latest Revision . As it is important to keep track of all Revisions within a Submittal, I would like to highlight that there currently seems to be no option to include the full revision history in the exported report. It would be highly beneficial if the export functionality could be enhanced to retain and display all Revisions for

title: Locked file organiser
body_text: A view where you can see in seconds what files you currently have locked in the current project. Include an option to unlock all

title: Members - Delete Yourself as a Project Member
body_text: Allow functionality so you can delete yourself from a project. Currently, I can't delete myself as a member of a project.

title: Improve Aggregate By functionality
body_text: The "Aggregate By" setting in the Associated Costs section of a Budget Payment Application is inconsistent and doesn't always apply the desired aggregation method. Often, Expenses default to aggregating by Qty (Work Completed) , even if Amount option was selected on a previous Pay App. This can result in major problems, such as a value increasing from $1,800 to $45,000. On large projects, errors like this can easily go unnoticed and, without detailed line-by-line verification, may lead to signif

title: Better data verification in reporting
body_text: To make it easier to compare data across the system, it would be helpful to have additional reports available or to be able to filter and group by additional data within currently available reports. These types of reports can help to understand discrepancies within payment applications, related to complex change orders and varied approval dates. Currently, it is difficult to track down issues when values don't align between a cost payment application, change order, and budget payment application

title: RFI Workflow With Sequenced Reviewers
body_text: Really need a RFI workflow to be able to assign reviewers in sequence. For example, assigning a structural RFI to structural engineer as step 1, and assigning Architect as step 2 to close it out. Procore can do this so ACC should do it too!

title: Issues while doing takeoff
body_text: Add the ability to note “Issues” while doing a takeoff. Jumping out of a takeoff to go to another file to note an issue, then jumping back to the takeoff is a pain in the ass…especially if we need to switch back and forth a few times to make sure you are noting things correctly.

title: Do not re-set location every time one goes from one page to another.
body_text: Once you are on a page (eg Floor 1). The location should be set and left alone so that the user does not need to set the page again when they return to page.

title: Forms - Ability to Reference Files on a line item in a Form Section
body_text: Ability to Reference Files on a line item in a Form Section

title: Export messages and follow-up comments
body_text: The ability to export messages and follow-up comments onto a report.

title: Meetings Module - Ability for assignees to update items in the items tab
body_text: One improvement I’ve been thinking about for Autodesk relates to the Meetings module, specifically the item list. Currently, it displays the items created during the meeting along with the assigned individual, but it would be extremely helpful if those assigned could mark items as completed and provide a brief update or explanation of how the item was addressed in the items tab. This would function similarly to the “Suggestions” feature in the Schedule module, where admins can review and choose

title: Activity in Reviews
body_text: I would like to be able to see in the activity column in a review who the review was sent to. Currently you are only able to see the current step candidates and in previous steps you can only see the candidate that ended up being the reviewer, not all possible reviewers.

title: Add subcontractors to bid package without generating an email invite
body_text: We'd like to have the ability to add subcontractor proposals to bid packages without the system automatically generating a new ITB email to the sub. My company will occasionally invite subcontractors to one bid package, and they end up bidding more than one. To accurately track received proposals for reports, we then have to add the sub to the all additional bid packages and manually upload their proposal to each one. When we do this, they receive a new ITB email for each package and question wh

title: Development of Tables in ACC Forms
body_text: It would be great to allow the development and addition of Tables in Templates, which allow control of the number of columns with "fixed" headers through the template. This way users creating and using the form can populate the rows/columns of the table, to allow freedom and better organization of data/information in the forms.

title: Attach a Detailed PDF Report to Closed Forms and Make Them Available in Form APIs
body_text: Companies with persistent handover workflows where proof of Form completion is required throughout the project rely on users to manually export Form PDFs, then manually upload those PDFs to other systems. Currently, the Autodesk Build Forms API only provides a link-based approach. Proposed Enhancement: - When a form is completed, automatically generate and attach a Form Detail PDF report to the Form record. - Make this PDF accessible via a Forms API so external systems can retrieve the document.

title: Add the ability to apply project naming conventions automatically to Submittals, Meetings, Reports, and Forms in Build
body_text: It would be extremely useful if project naming conventions (based on ISO 19650 or company-defined structures) could be automatically applied to Submittals, Reports, and Forms within ACC. Currently, naming conventions can be enforced for files in Docs, but not across other modules like Submittals, Meetings, Forms, or Issues etc. This creates inconsistency and additional manual work when generating or exporting data. By allowing projects to link a defined naming convention template, ACC could auto

title: Assets Bulk Selection in model
body_text: I would like to suggest an improvement regarding the way assets can be selected in 3D models and Civil 3D files. At the moment, the lasso tool allows mass selection of multiple assets when using asset annotations , which is very efficient. However, this option does not exist when working directly in model sheets: assets can only be selected one by one. This limitation is a real productivity issue. In practice, assets are created and managed directly from models or Civil 3D files, not from annota

title: Locations & Files - Have the same ability to add locations to files
body_text: Can only add locations to Sheets at the moment and not files. Most of the drawings reviews occurs through files, so at the moment this is a manual process to add location.

title: Sheets & Files - Compare and Create Issues
body_text: To be able to compare in files and sheets and create issues. At the moment the Issue and Markup tab disappears when you compare files.

title: Reviews - Checklist
body_text: It would be good to be able to attach a checklist to a review on the side (more of an interactive one). E.g. Have you checked Item 1 Item 2

title: Read Only Parameter Service Parameter Functionality
body_text: When I saw that we could "easily" make Read Only and Hidden Parameters with the Parameter Service, I was excited. I thought a good use for the Read Only parameter would be one that we want the user to see, but not be able to manipulate.... turns out no one can manipulate the parameter. In the Family Editor, we cannot change it in any manner that I can find. I can see the parameter, but there is no way to manipulate the value of the parameter. I can't enter a formula or anything in the Family Edi

title: Preserving the order of parameter columns in Excel File export
body_text: The order of the columns for the file list export should to be preserved as it is in ACC. At the moment even if you change the order of the parameter columns, when the list is exported as Excel, the order is not preserved and this is affecting the further use of the file.

title: The possibility to save searches for assets
body_text: The possibility to save searches for assets, as it is currently possible for file searches.

title: Hyperlink References in Submittal Excel Report
body_text: Users would like to have hyperlink references is Submittal Excel report as they exist now in PDF reports.

title: PDF (Smart) to Forms template
body_text: Introduce a feature within Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) that allows users to upload a PDF or smart PDF (e.g., ISSO-managed checklists or inspection sheets) and have it automatically converted into a form template using for example the Autodesk Assistant. This would significantly reduce manual data entry and setup time for forms. Value Proposition: Time-saving: Automates the process of creating form templates from existing PDFs, reducing repetitive work. Consistency: Ensures standardized for

title: Ideas for streamlining work at ACC
body_text: Hello, we have several ideas on how to streamline work within the ACC. 1. Limiting submission of MARKUPS and ISSUES on a file to the REVIEW framework only The ACC platform currently distinguishes between different types of comments: • Comments and Notes – can only be submitted as part of a Review. • Markups and Issues – can be submitted at any stage, regardless of whether there is an active Review. This situation creates a gap in the control and approval process, as comments such as Markups and

title: Kanban Board Preview for Issues
body_text: Add a Kanban-style preview to sort and view issues (similar to Microsoft Planner). Key points: Columns by status (e.g., To Do, In Progress, Review, Done) Drag-and-drop issue cards between columns Quick filters (assignee, due date, priority) Compact card view with title, status, assignee, due date Persist board layout and user filters Benefit: Faster triage and clearer workflow visibility for teams.

title: Issues photo viewer in browser
body_text: When using ACC Build on a web browser and viewing a photo that has been added to an issue it is not possible to page through multiple photos without closing the photo viewer and returning to the issue view to open a different photo. Please add the ability to page through photos that have been added to an issue. Using MS Edge, version 140.0.3485.81.

title: Submittal template (workflow) not visible on Submittals
body_text: Once a submittal is submitted, there is no way to see what template (workflow) has been chosen for the submittal, all you can do is change to a new one.

title: Submittals attachment is not required
body_text: Why isn't the Submittals Reference/Attachment available in the first window when opening a submittal or a required field? It's not an RFI that it can be submitted without a document. This is a module designed for a review of documentation, but the documentation part is so easy to miss.

title: user-specific issue templates
body_text: As a construction manager, I would like to be able to activate issue templates that are necessary and relevant for me. Currently, the issue templates displayed are the same for all project members and cannot be customized.

title: Able to edit or delete comment in Issue function
body_text: I would like to request an enhancement to the Issue function, specifically regarding the comment section. Since comments are the primary way of communicating with others within an Issue, it would be highly beneficial to have the option to edit or delete a comment after it has been posted. This functionality would help correct any mistakes made during submit the comment and reduce potential confusion among team members. Providing the ability to modify or remove comments would ensure clearer commu

title: Building Connected Logo per Office
body_text: Is there any way that a modification can be made to allow Companies to change their logo based on office location? Currently, one logo appears on all bid invitations. However, with some GCs, the logo can vary by region. Thanks!

title: Building Connected Discoverable Status Per Bid Package
body_text: Is it possible to move the "Discoverable" status option down a level in order to be able to apply the setting on a per Bid Package basis? There are instances where a GC will have a list of known bidders to invite for certain trades but would like to accept bids from anyone for other trades.

title: Review report limitation, currently set to 20,000 rows in the review report.
body_text: Review report limitation, currently set to 20,000 rows in the review report.

title: Content Catalog - filter by Last Changed
body_text: Although it should be possible to filter on parameter value(s), think of revisioning of your families or keeping track what has been added or modified in a catalog, somehow Saved Searches does not work with this way filtering on parameter values. Also not all parameters of uploaded families are being extracted and made available in Content Catalog (it's a random thing), not to mention System Families or things where parameters are not applied (e.g. hatches). Therefor, can a filter on Last Change

title: Cost Payment Application Retention Change
body_text: Once a supplier contract is executed the retention percentage is locked. However, this causes an issue because there are instances when the retention percentage needs to be changed in the middle of a project. But with retention locked, it has to occur manually on the cost payment application every month, which causes the possibility for errors and mistakes. A feature needs to be added that allows Project Admins or Account Admins to unlock the retention percentage and change the percentage. Then

title: Photo details editable by others
body_text: Currently, photo details can only be edited by the person who uploaded it. This is hindering anyone from being able to organize the photos by a title naming convention or location. Please have permission settings where we can choose if everyone can update details or not.

title: Additional Takeoff Functions & Customizations
body_text: Would the development team please add a "Send to Back / Bring to Front / Send Backward / Bring Forward" option to the takeoffs on Autodesk Takeoff? Also, will the development team please add additional customizations for takeoffs (i.e., a broader color selection, hatching/patterns, additional count shapes, etc.). In addition to this, markup options such as text boxes and highlights would be helpful as well for team collaboration in the Takeoff space.

title: Customize Default options for Markup tools
body_text: Within Docs, you have the option to mark-up files and drawings. This is similar functionality to 3rd party mark-up tools. However, the default for markups is "Unpublished". Create an option in the settings where the project admin can set the default for markups to either "unpublished" or "published". This way, there is not an extra set up for users who are adopting ACC Markups from other 3rd party markup applications.

title: Add quick way to duplicate sheets
body_text: Add a quick way to duplicate sheets (rather than having to go through the upload process with the sheet you want to duplicate). This would help when there are multiple scales on one drawing and both scales will be needed for different takeoffs.

title: Meeting Item Statuses - Add Option to Customize
body_text: Provide an option to edit the drop-down status options. Right now, we're stuck with what is shown below.

title: Ability to add attachment to the correspondence module in the ACC mobile platform
body_text: Adding the ability to attach files to the correspondence module in the Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) mobile platform enhances communication and documentation by allowing real-time sharing of photos, documents, and drawings. This feature enhances convenience and efficiency for on-site team members, fostering improved collaboration and accountability.

title: Enable file uploads through drag-and-drop in submittals, similar to the RFI feature.
body_text: Implementing drag-and-drop file uploads in Submittals, similar to the RFI feature, is necessary to improve user experience and efficiency. This functionality will streamline the process of attaching documents, making it more intuitive and faster for users to manage their submittals, ultimately enhancing workflow productivity and convenience.

title: The compare function should be able to save as a separate file, markups, and create issues.
body_text: Enhancing the compare function to save comparisons as separate files, create markups, and generate issues is essential. This improvement would enable users to document and track changes more efficiently, facilitate better communication among team members, and ensure that discrepancies are addressed promptly, thereby improving project accuracy and accountability.

title: Allowing Reviewers of RFIs to assign roles and companies
body_text: Allowing Reviewers of RFIs to assign roles and companies is crucial for ensuring the right expertise is applied to each RFI, facilitating more accurate and efficient responses. This capability streamlines the RFI process, improves collaboration, and ensures that RFIs are handled by the most suitable personnel, ultimately optimizing project workflows and reducing turnaround times.

title: Autodesk Build photos
body_text: Can you add an option in the photos module to add folders to organize photos better.

title: ACC Account Admin - Members - Display a column with the "Last sign in" information (similar to BIM 360)
body_text: I would like to suggest the ACC Account member view displays a column with “Last sign in” as shown in BIM360 member management. The purpose of this would be to remove users that have not signed in recently from the hub.

title: Enable "OR" Logic for Multiple Reviewers
body_text: Currently, TradeTapp workflows require all assigned reviewers to complete their review before progressing (i.e., "AND" logic). This proposal suggests adding support for an "OR" condition—allowing any one of multiple assigned reviewers to complete the review, thereby streamlining the process and reducing bottlenecks. So, I'm proposing to add a toggle or setting in the workflow configuration to choose between: All reviewers must approve (AND) Any reviewer can approve (OR) Optionally, allow tagging

title: Bulk add members to a new project via role hierachy (Team Lead → Automatic Team Inclusion)
body_text: Currently, adding members to a new project in ACC requires inviting each user individually. This becomes time-consuming and error-prone in larger organizations where teams are structured under leads or managers and we can easily forget to add a member. Proposed Features: Introduce a tool to be able to bulk add members : Option 1 : using roles from the account admin or companies : add by role or company. Option 2 and more accurate : a hierarchical member manageme nt. This tool allows admins to pr

title: Creating URL Links for sharing Issues
body_text: We would like the option to create and share links to issues, the same way we can with files. We want to be able to reference an issue in an email, and paste a link directly to it. Currently this is only possible for issues that have been placed in a model, by copying the URL link when the issue is selected in a 3D view we can copy paste it into an email, however this is not possible for all the other issue types, and currently there is no way to share them directly.

title: NDA Signature Transposed
body_text: Hello, Can a feature be made that let's the signature transpose onto the NDA that will make it legally binding? I know that BC says it is, but having a signature that each GC would be able to print out for legal purposes would be great. I submitted a feature request for this back on Oct 3, 2023. Best

title: Files - Revision info as attributes in Files
body_text: Ideally, we would like ACC to track 'Date issued', 'Status', 'Date returned' and (additional) 'Current step' (as current step of open review) for every revision like in drawings register. See screenshot from drawings register. These fields could be attributes in Files. We need this info when we want to track how long it took for subcontractor to issue new revision and how long it took for entire life-cycle of drawing to complete.

title: ACC training department - Live daily ACC training
body_text: Can you create some live daily training where people can you questions about ACC? Reading though these ideas I see that a lot of users dont know the basics functions on ACC. Nothing beats real human interaction, you know this in America already. What worked really well on our projects was live ACC training, twice per week. You could form education department that will do these daily trainings live. I sent invitation bellow to all project members and I have these trainings 2x per week per project

title: Ability to surface metadata from referenced items into forms
body_text: We use assets and related forms a lot in our company. The ability to prepopulate built forms with metadata from the related asset (to include the client asset id, description, category, location and selected custom fields) would be an excellent feature, rather than the user having to manually enter data that is already in the system. Having the data prepopulate would reduce the instances of input errors and would greatly enhance the experience for the user that is either creating the form instan

title: Single-Device Login Restriction in ACC Mobile App
body_text: Use Case: In many organizations, site staff share login credentials unintentionally or intentionally, leading to security risks and accountability issues. Restricting login to one mobile device at a time can improve control. Importance: This restriction will ensure only authorized personnel are accessing project data, reducing misuse and protecting sensitive information. Expected Benefit: Enhanced security, better accountability, and compliance with IT governance policies.

title: Time Response Option in Forms Template Section
body_text: Use Case: When designing a forms template, there should be a field type allowing users to input time (HH:MM) in addition to date. This would allow more accurate data capture in situations like shift reporting, daily progress tracking, or inspections. Importance: Without a time field, critical time-sensitive information is lost or has to be recorded manually in a text field, reducing data quality. Expected Benefit: Structured time data entry will improve reporting accuracy and consistency across

title: Asset Template Export and Import
body_text: Add the ability to export and import Asset templates, similar to what existed in BIM 360 Field Management.

title: Add Meetings Card to the My Home Page
body_text: It would be great to have the ability to add a “Meetings” resource card to the customizable My Home page. This would allow users to view all their scheduled meetings for the day or week (with filter or view options) at a glance—without needing to open each individual project or check their email/calendar separately. This feature would enhance visibility and efficiency across multiple jobs.

title: TradeTapp Bulk Download Documents
body_text: In TradeTapp, subcontractors will submit documents under multiple tabs such as "financia", "safety", etc. Provide an option to download all documents from all tabs at once, or at a minimum an option to download all documents within a specific tab at once.

title: Bulk Reference Photos
body_text: Sometime teams run around and just take pictures all day, and it would be ideal to be able to jump into photos, select multiple, and tie them to a form, issue, or tag all at once.

title: Form Template QR Codes
body_text: Add the ability to create QR codes for Form Templates such that project members can scan the code to create a new instance of a Form based on a particular Form Template.

title: Remember Markup Settings
body_text: It would be helpful if the system remembered markup settings from the last markup that we created (font size, line thickness, etc.). Users must change them every time.

title: Add Meeting Permissions
body_text: Allow projects to decide who can create meetings and update meeting information.

title: Specifications Page Deletion
body_text: Users cannot delete pages from a set or in general. You have to delete an entire set to accomplish any deleting. Cannot delete blank pages easily during the upload process. Please improve the editing to allow users to remove the irrelevant pages.

title: Update Form Permissions to Prevent Editors From Being Able to Discard Forms 'In Progress'
body_text: We are concerned with the current security permissions on forms as 'Editors' are able to discard forms that are 'In progress'. You need 'Editor' permissions to complete the form which means anyone can Discard the form. We believe we have individuals that are discarding incomplete forms instead of completing and closing out the form and we have minimal visibility into it. Instead of allowing Editors to discard, it would be nice if only Managers could discard these entries. This is especially impo

title: Files log export for packages
body_text: It would be great to generate / export a files log for the documents collected in a package. Similar to the function which is available for folders under files. Having this function for the packages you could generate with on click a log which contains all the information captured in the package which would be great and save time. Currently this is not possible. You need to go back to the files location search for the files and export the log with all the attributes. This is time consuming espec

title: Watchers tracking
body_text: Please add watchers tot he assigned to me section on the home page.

title: Closing out Forms after employee leaves the company
body_text: I would like to suggest anyone with access to the Forms under a project, should be able to go in there and Submit the form after an employee leaves the company. That employee no longer has access, so who is able to cover for that employee and close out all their open items? Thank you.

title: Issue Batch Creation BETA
body_text: If I select multiple collisions and create several issues via "Batch Creation," it would be beneficial if I had the option to automatically reference these tasks to each other.

title: Add Attachments to Form Templates At the Header, Section or Item Levels
body_text: Allow project admins to attach reference files, such as reference charts used during an inspection, to a Form Template. Ideally, attachments could be added at the Form Template header, section or the Form item levels.

title: Reopening Closed Forms for Templates with the "Review" Status Toggled On
body_text: As a form/ template manager, it would be beneficial to have the flexibility to reopen a form that is closed, after the status has been changed from "in Review" to closed. On my project, we are using Forms for partial turnovers between trades, and in some instances, have needed to revise the information contained in a closed Form. Giving the project admin or template manager the ability to reopen closed Forms with that review status active would facilitate making any required corrections after th

title: Support for Calculated Parameters in Docs
body_text: Managing metadata in Docs would be greatly improved by introducing calculated parameters. These are attributes whose values are derived from logic — for example: if Parameter X = "GR", then Parameter Y = "Grundriss". Such logic could help automate plan code conversions, support rule-based naming, or simplify mappings for exports. Additionally, calculated parameters could help streamline metadata maintenance, by automatically filling in dependent values, minimizing manual input and ensuring consi

title: Cost management documents are not getting updated in Docs
body_text: Once we turn on the " Access generated documents and uploaded attachments from Docs" the files and folder are only generated/uploaded in Docs in the target location but if the document package gets updated, for example a file gets deleted from the document package in Cost Management, Docs won't be updated accordingly. The old file, although deleted from the document package in the Cost Management, will still exist in Docs. Same also applies to the folders that are automatically generated. For ex

title: Bridge Sheets by Discipline or Select All
body_text: It would be a great enhancement if we could bridge sheets across projects using a selection filter—ideally by “All” or by discipline. Even the ability to mass select would be a big help. Currently, having to manually click through hundreds of sheets (in my case, 960) is quite time-consuming and increases the chance of oversight. A feature like discipline-based bridging would also help prevent errors when new sheets are added. For example, if a Civil sheet is uploaded but wasn’t manually selected

title: Improve project template settings
body_text: At this moment we are looking to improve and standardize our way of work. However, when i"m trying to set up our project template i run into the problem that the options are incredibly limited. Below are some settings I would love to see added to the project template set up. - Add company permissions to DOCS - Add Auto-trigger reviews to folders - Assign naming standards to folders - Set up standard collections in regards to sheets - Set up standard coordination spaces linked to certain folders

title: TAKEOFF & ASSETS - Enable Sync Between Takeoff and Assets for Seamless Quantity Tracking
body_text: We currently invest a significant amount of time creating takeoff types and markups to establish accurate quantity data during the estimating phase. However, once the project moves into execution, we often have to recreate the same structure manually in Assets to begin tracking progress—resulting in duplicated effort and a high risk of inconsistencies. It would be a major efficiency gain if Takeoff could sync directly with Assets , allowing takeoff types, quantities, and associated markups to be

title: Build - Submittals - Automatic Filing of Closed Submittals with Attribute Mapping
body_text: Currently, there is an option to save submittals to Files when closing and distributing; however, on consultant-driven projects , it is typically the Contractor who closes the submittal, and as a result, the submittal often doesn't get properly filed. It would be a significant improvement to introduce a setting within Submittals that enables automatic filing of closed submittals to a designated folder. Ideally, this folder could be predefined per project or submittal group. Bonus points if the s

title: Build - Support for Metric Units in Project Weather Display
body_text: Currently, when an address is added to a project in Build , the system displays local weather and forecast data, but only in imperial units—temperature in Fahrenheit (°F), wind speed in miles per hour (mph), and precipitation in inches. This can be limiting for users in regions where the metric system is standard. It would be highly beneficial to introduce a settings option that allows users to toggle between imperial and metric units, enabling temperature to be shown in Celsius (°C), wind speed

title: Company Logo
body_text: I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to address the matter of resizing the logo as part of our current project. As we continue to align our materials with business goals and brand visibility, the ability to adjust the logo size and clarity is not only necessary but a key factor in driving engagement and maintaining consistency across platforms. Flexibility in logo sizing ensures that we can optimize its presence in various formats—whether for print, digital, or promotional assets—while s

title: Enhance File Collaboration in ACC Docs/Build – Add File Activity History & In-Context Communication(Chat system)
body_text: A new feature for Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC), specifically within the Docs/Build > Files module. The goal is to improve communication and information sharing during construction projects by adding two key capabilities: File Activity History Panel Shows all relevant actions related to a specific file. Includes: Who shared the file When and with whom it was shared (including external collaborators) Who viewed or downloaded the file Status changes or comments Chat-style Communication Panel A

title: Support for Correspondence tool on ACC mobile app for Android
body_text: Please allow for support of the Correspondence tool on the ACC mobile app for Android devices. Currently only iOS devices are supported in this regard, meaning a fair portion of users are unable to utilise a core function of ACC from their mobiles.

title: Markups & Stamps
body_text: The behaviour of markups and stamps in ACC Docs - seems to have been recently changed by Autodesk and doesnt make sense now. For instance, markups and stamps are visible in the web browser view and are only embedded if the pdfs are exported and then outside of the ACC. Markups and stamps that are published are also not visible if the pdfs are transmitted in ACC. The use of stamps as a way of electronically signing a pdf in a workflow doesnt work. ie. Stamps of documents do not carry through on t

title: Notification Settings - Watcher
body_text: Please make the notification settings more granular to include the role watcher.

title: Existing member name editing
body_text: The account admin should have access to change any member's information in the system not only the options in the dropdown menu. A lot of users don't even go into the program other than look at plans.

title: Add Project Plan data to Insight Builder
body_text: In Insight Builder, we are currently able to report on tasks that are in the project schedule (imported from MS Project) but we cannot report on tasks that are created in a Plan. As an example, it can be useful to see when a specific milestone is scheduled to complete across all the projects in the organization. We can do this if the milestone is in a project schedule, but cannot do the same thing if the milestone is in a project plan. As plan becomes a more robust tool, with new features added,

title: Better customisable properties in model coordination viewer
body_text: The 'properties' tab in model viewer currently shows limited or irrelevant information to the average user. It would be good to have a clear section that you can input into, to show information such as where each part of the model came from and what date, a description and any assumptions made in the modelling (e.g. what surface the levels were draped from). In our BIM model, we can have dozens or hundreds of pipes in the same model, and being able to add properties, especially to multiple at on

title: Ability to filter by code in the breakdown of the Contract
body_text: It will beneficial to have additional functionality that allows us to feature/highlight/filter specific item by code or name within the breakdown of the contract (refer to the screenshot below). The enhancement would help us better manage and track the various components of our contracts, making it easier to identify or manage the key items and improve our overall project oversight.

title: Importing Master VO lists to the Cost Items to act as a Master VO Lists in the Change Orders of the Cost Management
body_text: As we undergo digital transformation, we need to transfer all our data into the web platform. One key feature we would like to have is the capability to import our Master VO Lists (currently stored in Excel files) directly into the Cost Items section of Change Orders within the Cost Management system. This functionality would facilitate our smooth transition to a digital environment. Thank you.

title: Sort/Filter deleted Files by "Date" or "Deleted by"
body_text: if you currently go to Deleted files at the highest level “Project files”, you still have the option of sorting by date, but then you will not see all the files that are in subfolders. So if you select only files on the right-hand side under “Search and Filter”, you will see all deleted files. However, it is then not possible to sort by date of deletion or by the person who deleted the file. This is a basic function that MUST work. This should be fixed as soon as possible.

title: Reference Issues from Photos
body_text: Currently you are only able to reference photos through the issue tool - this can take a long time to scroll through all the project photos if selecting a photo from the project photo library. It would be good to be able to be able to reference the issue direct when selecting the photo. See screenshot for the reference options available when selecting the photo

title: Link Model Elements to Schedule
body_text: Be able to select on an object(s) and link them to a schedule activity to track install dates.

title: Members dashboard for Project Admins
body_text: As a project administrator, it is crucial for me to assess the validity of each member and eliminate those who are inactive or no longer require access to the ACC. It is important to show the last login/activity date and time for each member.

title: Flags in Trade Tapp Landing page be the color they are, not all red
body_text: On the landing page (invitations page) the flags are all red. It is t difficult to quickly filter the reds from the yellow and greens. We should be able to filter by flag colors also. This way it is now is very time consuming.

title: Subcontractor "Invalid Email" designation change
body_text: It would be helpful to have an available report or to add a new symbol for the status field to indicate if a subcontractor has clicked the "unsubscribe" link. If we had the ability to see if they unsubscribed vs just showing an "invalid email" symbol, we could better optimize the bid packages rather than waste time trying to diagnose if there is a true IT issue with them receiving ITBS or if they just no longer want to receive them.

title: Enhanced Transmittal Notification and Reporting
body_text: Preview of transmittal's content in the email notification. We propose the addition of a preview of transmittal content within the email notification to improve clarity and efficiency. Additionally, we recommend including revision status in a structured tabular format within the notification email's body and/or PDF attachment generated during transmittal creation and sent as an attachment along with the transmittal notification. This would provide recipients with immediate visibility into docume

title: Multi-Hub Access for Building Connected Users with one email
body_text: As an IT support administrator for our Building Connected platforms, I currently support two separate business units. To effectively assist both, I require access to multiple hubs within the platform. At present, I can only access one hub per account, which limits my ability to provide timely support and often necessitates contacting BC support for additional assistance. Moreover, several of our employees also support multiple business units and similarly need access to multiple BC hubs. Current

title: Ability to create subfolders
body_text: Users should be able to create sub-folders using the ACC app interface.

title: Make an xref image in a dwg visible in Autodesk Docs
body_text: It is importand to see xref images in Autodesk Docs. I am thinking of linked aerial photos and other mapping material. For infrastructure projects, this is extremely important.

title: Be able to remove inherited permissions on folders
body_text: It would be very helpful if we could have the ability to remove an inherited permission from the parent folder. My example is on our projects we have a Project Management folder and with there we store all various sensitivities of data and in particular we want to restrict access to some of the folders like CVs, Employee Training Certificates etc that belong in the PM folder but don't need to be accessed by everyone who has access to the parent.

title: Adding a company to a project in ACC without an user via the API
body_text: Currently we are developing an integration with ACC to add an existing company to a project. We want to be able to add a company without also supplying a company member, just like in the ACC UI (internal endpoint used: https://developer.api.autodesk.com/bim360/admin/v1/projects/*****/companies ). It would be great if this API endpoint is published for use via APS.

title: Add ability to add notes in the Estimated Cost section in Building Connected.
body_text: Add a notes section in the estimated cost panel just like you can under each separate bidders section. It would also be helpful to add attachments in this section also.

title: Ability for Outside People to View Exported RFI Attachments
body_text: It would be very beneficial for people who are outside of the Autodesk Construction Cloud environment to have the ability to view RFI attachments (Sheets, Forms, Photos, etc.) without having to login to Autodesk. If someone can view/respond to an RFI without being in the ACC environment, why can they not view attachments without being in the ACC environment as well?

title: Desktop Connector Download Speed Limitation
body_text: The Desktop Connector has a bandwidth limitation and slow downloads which is caused by breaking up transfers into 5MB chunks, our company has conducted many tests working with Autodesk Support to find out what exactly is going wrong. They assured us that it was not intentional and not by design so I am hoping that this feature request for removing this limit is going to get more attention and expedite the solution. We have tested opening models with multiple links invoking download requests thro

title: Submittals: Additional line item at the end of "download attachments" context window to download all attachments of a given stage with only the click of a button (screenshot provided).
body_text: As per what it says in the title, for Submittals, it would be great if there's an additional line item at the end of the "download attachments" context window to download all attachments of a given stage as a compiled .zip file, with only the click of a button. Not being able to do so is really annoying, especially when working with a larger number of attachments (like 51 files for example, which the rest of the components in Submittals do support without much problems). The current practice req

title: TradeTapp Qualification History and Risk score/status history
body_text: We would like to have the ability to get the qualification history for each subcontractor using your API. Right now we are solely basing each sub's 'qualification window' with an assumed 2 year expiration date. If we could somehow get a history list so we can track our AP payments over time, that would be perfect. Also, we were hoping that you could expand the current api endpoint to include the risk status/score as well. Thanks!

title: Autodesk Page Turning
body_text: Arrow keys should be added to allow for quick page turning especially when in the takeoff page. Using a drop down to go from drawing to drawing is cumbersome.

title: Add option to add references to reviews
body_text: It would be useful to have the same attach reference feature submitting has to the review package. For example we see the case where a contractor submits a document which references a file/asset etc but they have to attach it to the review causing duplication and larger files sizes.

title: BuildingConnected - Toggle for Bid Leveling "Other Costs" items
body_text: In BuildingConnected's "Bid Leveling" you can toggle most times on or off to include them in the leveled price or not. But, you cannot toggle items in the "Other Costs" section. Ideally you could toggle "Other Costs" items also.

title: Add ability to export all sheets across all collections
body_text: Add ability to select all sheets across all collections for export.

title: Commissioning Checklist Bulk Creation
body_text: Being able to create forms in bulk, with 1 being assigned to each piece of equipment would be a huge time saver. Having 250+ assets and having to create each checklist individually is a huge time dump.

title: Building Connected Files Display Numbering
body_text: Hi, I would like to suggest displaying the number of files on each folder. When uploading/downloading/moving or selecting the files, it's an easy way to keep track of the amount of files uploaded/moved/downloaded and/or selected. Thanks in advance.

title: Amend transmittal
body_text: It is quite basic idea but I don't understand why I cannot customise Transmittal format . For example I would like to add extra column with my attribute in Files section and company logo in Cover page. Can you help, please?

title: Access to issue templates as project member
body_text: At the moment only project admin has access to the issue templates because there are under the settings. We need the option that also project members has access to the issue templates and edit, can create new ones and activate/inactivate them. Maybe it can be solve simular to the reports with a seperate section.

title: Map View Functionality for 3D Models and Markup toolbars
body_text: We need a feature similar to the existing "Map View" , but applicable to 3D views/3D models. My suggestion includes two key enhancements: 1- Enable users on site, using a phone or tablet, to take photos that are automatically attached to specific 3D elements within the model, functioning in the same way as photo pins in the current Map View. 2- To add Markups toolbar on 3D-viewer, similar to what currently exists in 2D sheet views to make this process more intuitive and effective for communicati

title: Superseded status - gray out documents
body_text: We need superseded status under reviews stats that could be added by project admin. After we add this status document would be grayed out.

title: Add packages to reviews
body_text: Some of our drawings have 20 revisions. Currently there is no any easy way to find all reviews where these drawings have been reviewed. We need an option for packages in reviews, for example: Architectural layouts ground floor package, upper roof package, lower roof package, mechanical layouts package etc. etc. Or if you can come up with some automation on ACC directly where we could put drawings number in reviews and we would get list of all reviews where this drawing number was submitted and r

title: Print a zoomed section of a sheet
body_text: Folks in the field have expressed interest in the ability to print a zoomed in portion of a sheet in the Sheets module. Some sheets will have multiple section views or elevations. People would like to zoom in on a section/elevation and be able to print what is showing on the screen. When using the print function from the more menu, it automatically prints the full sheet. When using ctrl+p within sheets it tries to print what is on the screen but only the toolbars get printed and surrounding shee

title: Missing adjustment feature in Report template
body_text: We have encountered an issue regarding adjustment feature in Report template. When exporting a form from Form folder, there are adjustment options such as "Include Assets" and "Include Files", etc (include or exclude assets). However, this option is missing in the Report Template settings. We need this functionality in the Report Template as well so that we can unmark it and ensure that the final documentation does not include the Asset Sheet. Whether we export a form as a PDF from the Forms fol

title: Autodesk Desktop Connector - Window resizable
body_text: Hello Team, I've got a request coming from customer about Autodesk Desktop Connector. They want Autodesk Desktop Connector resizable for easier navigation and better usability when managing large folder structures or working on high-resolution displays . Regards Olivier

title: Default email message > Need a Default Subject line as well
body_text: Love the "Default email message" feature within Cost Management, especially being available to all the different types of notifications that go out to trade partners. In addition to the "Default email message", there should be an associated "Default subject line" that can be populated. Ideally, a default subject line would be available for each type of default email message that could be sent. FOR EXAMPLE: Cost Management > Settings > Cost > Default email message - "Trade Partner Pay Application

title: Transmittal template creation
body_text: I had a request recently about creating a transmittal template and thought it would be worth sharing. It could be a template that is setup by project admins, that would have the ability to setup the transmittal details and who it gets sent to and then it can be used for creating transmittals throughout the project.

title: RFI Cover Sheet
body_text: It would be nice if the RFI module had the same functionality as the Submittals module to add a Cover Sheet.

title: Allow Renamed Bridged Team to be Renamed in Project Timeliner
body_text: When a bridged team is renamed in the bridged project, the name should be updated in the Timeliner of the project into which it is bridged.

title: Admins to have visibility of unpublished Issues
body_text: As Document Controllers (Admins) we need to be able to have visibility of unpublished Issues. As team members come and go on big projects, we cannot have unpublished issues being forgotten about if a user leaves the project before publishing.

title: Bulk attach in Issues
body_text: The bulk edit feature in ACC Issues is super useful and I would want to be able to do everything possible in bulk. Currently I cannot bulk attach, reference or comment on Issues. I want to grab multiple issues, and attach the same drawing to them, it currently wastes a lot of time to have to do it one by one. I am currently doing it manually at it wastes a lot of time. Thanks!

title: Build - Archive meetings
body_text: We need an option to archive meetings. We have a lot of subcontractors on our projects and some of them finish their scope in the early stage of the project. We would like to archive this meeting series, but we do not have that option. And we do not want to delete this meeting series.

title: Suppliers should not be able to bill against Change Orders that are not "executed" yet
body_text: We are using the Signing feature through Autodesk but realized that suppliers can still invoice against change orders that are not fully executed. That should not be the case. Once executed they should be able to bill against it, but not before that.

title: Extended Options for Form Creation
body_text: When creating forms, more design options should be available, such as the ability to include tables and an additional free-text field for custom answers in multiple-choice questions. This would greatly improve the flexibility and usability of forms.

title: add custom attributes in review window
body_text: add custom attributes in review window. It necessary for check (by Doc control) the metadata in review process.

title: Scope section in Estimate Center could use "Save As" - to accommodate multiple revisions or options under one project
body_text: Our workflow is to use Excel spreadsheets to estimate and Word templates to compose the proposal. We're using the Scope section in Estimate Center primarily for storing and formatting proposals. Our problem is we nearly always have to create multiple proposals under a single project to accommodate different phases, or separate buildings, or simply revising proposals per addendums or updated drawings - and we need the ability to save many proposals under a single project. Currently, the Scope pag

title: Build - Submittals - do not delete all statused when we step back
body_text: This option we already had when we used Procore. Unfortunately, on ACC it does not work the same. When we step back submittal all statuses are deleted. Can you please change this. We need to step back and keep all statuses. Then each reviewer needs to be able to update their status. This is the whole point of stepping back. When we do it now, we lose a lot of time when we need to ask all reviewers to add their status again and we wanted to update only one status.

title: Add larger scale options to the "Set Scale" dropdown.
body_text: In large horizontal developments we often have plan pages that are 1" to 100' or 1" to 250'

title: Saving Submittals naming format
body_text: Provide a naming format when saving submittals at closeout. Currently, they save using the section number, revision, and title. It would be nice to have section number, revision number, section name, and title. Current file name: #331413-1-Product Data.pdf Proposed: #331413-1-Water Main-Product Date.pdf

title: UPDATE of VIEW created by others (Project Members)
body_text: Inside ACC Model Collaboration it is possibile for a NON PROJECT ADMIN user (a member) to save a view and make this view as public. By the way other viewer cannot edit this view, for example just updating the list of files that this viewer filter among the all present inside a certain collaboration space. The possibility to allow other to update the view would be very intersting since, withour renaming, it will be possible to set up by an advance user some filtered views in a certain spaces, and

title: Linking Schedule module to Project Dashboard Milestones
body_text: The project schedule module should report Milestones out to the main project Dashboard Milestone Module. That way there is a single source of schedule milestones being tracked and reported.

title: Customizing Columns within Forms (Work Log Specifically)
body_text: It would be really useful to have the ability to customize columns within the Work Log section of the native-built forms. This could mean changing the names of existing columns, or even adding in new columns for items such as an employees Time In/Time Out for the day, amount of time taken for lunch, or even the amount of time taken to drive to/from the jobsite for that day. This is something that would add much value to reports run from these forms within Build.

title: import metadata attributes values from excel
body_text: Is there an option to export the files activities of a files with the name and all the custom attributes. It should be an option for import the new value of this metatada via EXCEL , for changing the value of them via admin. This could be interesting also to revoque this value per some non authorizing users.

title: Ability to switch between Internal Origin and Shared Coordinates in Model Coordination
body_text: As for now, you only have the ability to publish your Revit models to ACC, ACC then automatically uses the shared coordinate system within Model Coordination.
