However, we are working with a lot of different kind of models (Plant3D, Civil3D, Aveva etc) and not every software package has the option to switch between coordinate systems. For example, if we setup a project in Revit we are mostly using Internal Origin to exchange models between different software packages. Behind this Internal Origin

title: Set and lock the Docs columns to a specific order and visibility
body_text: In Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) Docs, unfortunately you cannot currently lock the column order or visibility for all users across a project. These settings, however: Are user-specific – changes only apply to your session or profile. Are not persistent across sessions in all cases – especially if you're clearing browser cache or switching devices. Cannot be locked or standardized for the whole team or folder. I think standardised views should be set as default by the administrator, with the

title: Bookmark Frequent Projects on My Home
body_text: Rather than bookmarks to external websites adding frequent projects to the home would help those of us in large firms with lots of projects. My project list is 4 pages long now, and I need to be on most of those to assist, I have 5-6 core projects that would be great to have on my home. Plus, our projects run multi-year and we still need to access them from time to time but I now have to scroll through a bunch of project to get to my current one.

title: ACC Publish Sheet Settings
body_text: It would be really nice if you could specify the sheet publishing settings similar to printing/exporting. Not being able to publish to Black Lines for some of our subconsultants is a real hinderance. It would also be nice to publish in sheet order based on the browser or a sheet index schedule.

title: Search within meetings
body_text: It would be helpful to search within meetings. Quickly find a specific topic you want to review. At this moment it is time consuming to search within meetings.

title: Assets : Assign barcodes / QR codes to systems
body_text: While any asset can have a barcode or QR code, the system currently doesn't support this feature. This functionality would be useful on mobile devices, as both the system and assets are in the same UI. Scanning should be able to quickly retrieve both types.

title: Admin > members Tab > Filter/order
body_text: Add filtering option and sorting order of the list by Access Level

title: Civil Tools in ACC
body_text: The implementation of the Civil tool in ACC is very interesting. However, it is quite limited: 1- It only works with Civil 3D files that contain an alignment and a profile. 2- It does not work in other environments like Model Coordination, only in Docs. 3- Many objects and structures are created or coordinated in different software (Revit, Navisworks, AutoCAD, IFC, etc.). Therefore, it is not possible to cut along the axis in any of these files. 4- Many Civil 3D files themselves are split using

title: Filter photos by a date range
body_text: Can we please request to add to the photo a feature that allows you to sort photos by a date range, currently you cant do this and it is time consuming to find photos especially during a few years long projects.

title: ACC - Build - Meetings
body_text: This tools looks good, here are some suggestions tho ; Be able to create report for items (opened, closed) Be able to create issues from those opened items (instead of searching for issues to add to) Be able to look for previous open items and merged them together so we don't have many of the same items opened/close Be able to export multiple meetings at the same times (using report) Use AI would be nice to get a summary on a column of the minutes

title: Template changes should be pushed to projects created with that template
body_text: I've used a standard template to create 100's of projects, and today I noticed I had 1 user group with incorrect permissions for a single but important folder. I now need to go back over 100's of projects and change the permissions of that single folder. There should be a way of pushing template changes to projects created using that template, even if its an optional opt in for the projects. For instance when I open the project it could prompt an Admin 1 time that the template has been updated a

title: Comments on meeting items
body_text: Comments on meetings items is missed by users. This is possible for issues, RFI's+++ This is also needed for meeting items.

title: Better Admin Access and controls
body_text: We should be able to have access to all projects without having to be assigned to the project. Being assigned to every project is highly annoying as we get notifications to that project and are treated like a project member when Admins are not project members; we are IT and other professionals tasked with dealing with administrative and technical support for the actual project members. Besides this issue, we should have the ability to act as any other user . This would give us better problem sol

title: Selectable Text in OCR documents
body_text: When viewing documents in the sheets module within build it would be great to make text selectable so you can copy to clip board and paste into the search so we do not have to manual type a long easily mistaked panel name. We search keywords through construction documents 100s and sometimes 1000s of pages in the sheets module. The ideal function would be to right click a text word and have a dropdown for search keyword in sheets collection.

title: Copying Forms without including Photos
body_text: Our company uses a form template for our Superintendent Daily Reports. When copying the prior day's form, currently the photos on the previous form are copied to the new form, along with the text. It would be great if the photos would not copy over. Deleting photos from the form on a daily basis is becoming time consuming, especially as a project progresses.

title: Transmittals only showing versions
body_text: Hello! Our business had noticed a flaw within the Transmittals tool. You can only see the version of the drawing or document that has been submitted. If you want to know the revision you would need to open them 1 by 1. With the new feature that was released end of November, with combining the version and revision under 1 attribute we thought this would have resolved the issue. This doesn't seem to be the case.

title: Add a feature where "comments" made on the comparison document are included in the revised drawings
DOCS指摘事項の項目順番
body_text: プロジェクトごとに、各自で毎回設定している項目の順番を、 個人設定として、デフォルトにして、簡単な操作で、 自分の設定した項目の順番になるようにしてほしい。 "I would like the order of items, which each user sets for every project, to be saved as a default personal setting. This way, with simple operations, users can have their preferred item order applied automatically."

title: Enhance Navisworks and Revit Issue Synchronization Workflow
body_text: Currently, the process of synchronizing issues created in Navisworks to Revit using the Coordination Issues Add-In and Issue Add-In is limited by its reliance on published cloud models, which reduces flexibility during coordination. Additionally, the conversion process for opening Revit files in Navisworks is time-consuming and must be repeated each time the model is accessed. To improve this workflow, we propose enabling direct synchronization of Navisworks created issues to Revit without relyi

title: Ai review of Submittals
body_text: I would like to see an Ai review feature in submittals that reviews the provided submittal versus the specification. I can see this being beneficial to a reviewer for product data. Shop drawings may not work for this feature. Looking for a cursory review of the submittal for compliance prior to a reviewer even having to look at the submittal. This would save us a significant amount a time on submittal reviews.

title: ACC - ability to transfer projects between Autodesk datacentres.
body_text: Due to when we first started using BIM 360 all our data is stored on the Autodesk USA datacentre. Since then new datacentres have been created by Autodesk in the EU and Australia regions. However, it i not possible to transfer projects from one regional data centre to another. We'd have to download projects (and loose all the meta data) to be able to do this. We work soley in the UK and would mu prefer our data (note I said our data, it is not Autodesk's data) to the EU data centre from the USA

title: ACC Docs - Correspondence, meetings and Forms to be moved from Build to Docs where they properly belong.
body_text: I refuse to purchase Build on top of BIM Collaborate and Bim Collaborate Pro for the functions Correspondence, Metings and Forms. These fundamental function should be moved over to Docs where they belong so everyone can avail themselves of these functions. e.g. I have lots of forms in Excel and Word that would be ideal for the forms function. This would mean I could get rid of my Excel and Word forms and better integrate our project processes and procedures into ACC.

title: ACC - docs - ability to have more project status views in Docs
body_text: We have the views Active and Archive for projects in ACC. But it would be more useful if we could have more views for exmample - Active, Archive, Lost, On Hold, Completed, Rejected. These are the terms we use in our accounting systems. It maks listing projects by view types much easier, especially when we have a lot of projects in ACC.

title: Open saved .msg files in Outlook.
body_text: We use the eFiler plugin for Outlook to save emals to ACC and BIM360 docs folders. This enables us to save emails as .msg files directly inside ACC and BIM360 Docs. But the .msg files have no association with the Outlook desktop app or the online Outlook app in MS 365 once inside ACC and BIM360. The association needs to be created to enable the .msg files to be opened in Outlook desktop and Outlook MS 365 and it would be useful to have a .msg viewer built into ACC and BIM360 so the .msg files ca

title: Revit source file Download option on ACC should have Detach from central option on ACC itself before saving it on the local drive
body_text: Lot of users download the Revit source file from ACC to their local computer drives and most of the times the user opens the file from Revit without ticking the "Detach from central" option and sometimes it leads to errors in the design file if the downloaded file is being used for some different purpose. So, the idea is to have an option to the user while downloading the source Revit file directly from ACC. ACC should give the user an option while clicking on Download source file (Revit files)

title: Add tags to projects
body_text: Please allow tags to assist with searching for projects in ACC. Some projects have a formal name and an informal name. Users may know it by it's informal name, but the ACC folder uses the formal name to match the office format.

title: Create a mobile friendly interface for user management
body_text: It's great that the ACC web interface is slightly more mobile friendly than its predecessor BIM360, but there's still a long way to go, especially for very simple tasks like user management. This is something that takes only a few seconds on a desktop browser and could easily (and often urgently needs to) be done while I'm away from my desk and only have access to my phone. However, the website does not efficiently adapt to the small screen and persists in displaying a fixed sidebar in certain v

title: Edit documents in mobile app
body_text: Add the ability to modify documents in the mobile app. Making quick edits to word, excel, etc. on a tablet would be very helpful.

title: Show more than 50 Issues
body_text: It would be helpful to set page views of Issues to see more than 50 Issues per page. This be toggled to be 100, 250, 500 or All Issues.

title: Compare Latest Two Versions of a Document by Default Please
body_text: Loving the ACC platform (DOCS) and its ability to compare versions of documents and its ability to scroll through other documents whilst in this compare mode. Improvement suggested here is to make ACC compare the latest two revisions by default rather than wait for the user to select version each time on each file. Comparison is essential for our document review process; ie compare last version to ensure changes are captured in the current order. This process needs to be improved to minimise the

title: Model Coordination - Moving the section plane by scrolling
body_text: When using section view in the model coordination, it would be very convenient if you could move the section plane back and forth by scrolling the mouse wheel. Using and clicking the intended arrow each time you want to move the plane is very cumbersome and slows down the workflow. This feature is standard in many other CDE-platforms already and would also enhance the experience of ACC.

title: Add file when stepping Back Submittal to Responsible Contractor
body_text: When a responsible subcontractor uploads a submittal and submits, the submittal gets reviewed by the 'submittal manager' prior to sending to the submittal 'reviewer'. Often times the submittal needs to be returned to the responsible contractor. There is the option to step back but there is not the ability to include an attachment or provide detailed notes - the 'note' section is not conducive to this. It would be very helpful to have the same process in a step back as there is when moving the su

title: Model Coordination - Transform Units
body_text: In Model Coordination, there is the ability to apply X/Y/Z/Rotation transforms, but there is no option to override model units. Navisworks has this ability in the Units and Transforms feature. This is a common issue when dealing with internationally created models or with CAD programs where the model author does not specify the Insertion Scale (it appears that ACC default "unitless" files as Meters, despite the project units being se to Imperial).

title: Model Coordination - Refined Object Colors
body_text: Now that Model Coordination supports object colors, it would be useful to do the following. Basically, support workflows for people that are accustomed to the Appearance Profiler's abilities in Navisworks. Support a larger color palette, similar to how other Autodesk software lets you pick a color from a spectrum or enter RGB directly. Save color schemes. For example, say you want to color by File. Have a way to apply the same color to the same files, no matter what View or Coordination Space yo

title: Attached PDF to Forms
body_text: it would be great if you could attach a PDF document to a Form from outside the ACC platform.

title: Allow Creation of issues on the model viewer in iOS app
body_text: The ACC iOS app allows you to view the model but not create issues on the model as you can on the web. While you can place issues generally, you cannot place them on the model. It's great being able to see the issues that have already been made from the web viewer on the iOS app models. Would just complete the experience and allow full model reviews on iOS. (I'd love clash detection views too but that's another topic).

title: Admin enhanced filtering and saved views
body_text: Enhance the administration area where all projects are listed for users. In BIM 360 Team you had the ability to pin projects to the top, would be useful for this to be in ACC particularly where you are constantly in and out of the hub. Ability to add custom metadata fields, filter and view method to the projects list. To allow additional filtering, grouping and sorting other than just alphabetical or search. For example this could be fields for region, country, site or type of asset/project whic

title: Step Back RFIs
body_text: Submittals have the ability to step back during any part of the submittal process. RFIs however can only "reopen" and "Return for Review". It would be very helpful to be able to have the ability to step back from the reviewer to the submitter. Having this ability would also fix the current configuration where RFIs go directly to the reviewer from the prompt resulting in missing or incomplete information with no way to returning to the originator of the RFI.

title: Increase limit of visible submittals
body_text: The current limit on a single page to view sheets - 100, the current limit on a single page to view submittals - 50. Is there a reason that this list can not be a full list of the first page? At least increase to 100. Additionally when selecting a submittal to view from say 51-75 of 75, when returning to the submittal list it brings you back to the 1-50 of 75. I would be much more convenient to return back to the location where you clicked on the submittal.

title: Name form after the title when downloading
body_text: When downloading a form from Autodesk Construction Cloud the title of the PDF is a labeled generically "form detail report-1234". It would be nice for the download report to use the title of the form and the date when downloading.

title: Assets should be linked to individual schedule activities with the notification feature
body_text: Hi, I am expecting a feature on ACC Build related to Assets. In ACC we have the Assets feature under the Build. In real life, all the Assets require some maintenance activities to be performed at some regular intervals. We can list out these individual maintenance activities in the Schedule option available on ACC. Once we list all the activities, we can link these individual schedule activities to the Assets related to it. So, when the dates for the maintenance activities are scheduled, it shou

title: Manage Issue Fields in Bulk
body_text: The addition of being manage the fields needed and their order is great, but can we get the ability to manage those on the Category Level and not just the individual issue type? I've created a new Category and then have 12 Types, I need to manage the fields of each Type on their own....that's a lot of clicks and drags. The individual type manage is still needed, as there might be some types that need or don't need a field that other types have.

title: Reports - Review Reports should include Revision column
body_text: It's great that we can now create a Report from the Reviews function (via the Export all button), and that this report schedules out all the Comments made against various drawings. The exported report doesn't include the 'Revision' column however, which is obviously vital information! The Version column is included, but that is of no use on an exported report - only Revision is relevant.

title: Design Collaboration team permissions based on multiple criteria
body_text: Currently team permissions are simple, single criteria permissions like "users with the Role of 'Architect' have 'Edit' permissions to this team folder" or "user with Company 'ACME' have 'View' permissions to a specific team folder" but on many projects we have complex arrangements of teams where a single company has multiple disciplines and certain disciplines have multiple firms. So on a project where we have two architecture firms and one of those firms is also the structural engineer, we hav

title: When uploading photos without GPS coordinates, add geotag functionality
body_text: When uploading photos that do not have GPS coordinates, be able to drop a pin on the location, and geotag the photos right in the app.

title: RFI Markup Layer
body_text: It would be nice to have a feature where you can divide markups into ' layers' or at least manage who can see certain markups. For example an RFI layer, with options for RFI markups to only be visible to the team members that are involved and not to the whole project team.

title: Add descriptive text to a photo markup
body_text: A photo markup can hold multiple photos, but can't hold descriptive text about the space, leading to a disconnect between the photo and what is being documented. Being able to add context is important. Notes would often be added after the photos are taken. These photo sets often don't need issues with all the issue tracking (why they are created as photo markups) but the ability to convert a photo markup to an issue tag where a description can be added might be an acceptable workaround. Notes wo

title: Add Submittal item number in the Excel import template
body_text: Custom sumbittal item numbering has been introduced recently. However, the excel template for item import seems it hasn't been updated, therefore it doesn't allow for numbering the imported items. Please update the template so it can also import the sumbittal custom number.

title: Sheets // Discipline // Don't show the Designator
body_text: The way that Disciplines are identified and extracted in Sheets is immensely inflexible. I understand the theory behind how it is supposed to work, but the reality is that it fails to perform adequately on projects. This is primarily due to drawings not being delivered with correct/perfect naming. To help work around that inflexibility, some of our discipline Designators would need upwards of 6-7 characters. This gives us sufficient characters in the Designator to identify what discipline that d

title: Include an ICS file in ACC Maintenance emails.
body_text: It's a little thing, but it'd be SO easy to save thousands of users a minute or two. Either send along a calendar invite that folks can click on, or an option to sign up for invitations instead of emails, or even a public shared outlook calendar so that folks can more easily add than try to figure out what time zone they need to change their appointment to.

title: Better attachment upload for issues
body_text: Do I really need to upload a screenshot on a folder in order to link it in an issue?? There are way better options to add attachments to issues directly from the issue interface: copy and paste from a screen capture app Upload from local folder ... Look at other issue management tools out there.. they all support much better attachment upload features than ACC... (even this text editor I am using to write this has better upload features.... 😂 ) Idea came from this Forum post

title: Data Exchange, extract ALL parameters/properties
body_text: Creating a Data Exchange file from a published Revit model initially seemed like a great idea. In fact, the entire concept of Data Exchange, even when used within its native software, appears very promising. However, it currently does not extract all parameters or properties from the model. I raised a case with Autodesk Support regarding this issue, but was redirected to this Idea Board. These missing parameters are, at present, by design. It seems the development team is aware of the limitation

title: Cost - Documents need to Sync from PCO to RFQ's
body_text: Currently when Documents are uploaded to the attachments of a PCO and we "Batch Request for Quotes" the document is copied from the PCO to generate RFQ's there is no automatic synchronization between them. When we get a revised document pertaining to the PCO/RFQ and upload the new document to the attachments of the PCO there is no way for the new document to be pushed to the RFQ's that are tied to the PCO or in other words any document changes made on the PCO do not automatically update across t

title: Build Home // Insight Builder // Create more space for the custom dashboards
body_text: The Build Home page keeps improving with the inclusion of the Insight Builder dashboards. But it still has a lot of wasted space. The first thing to note as a recent improvement is that when changing to an Insight Builder tab (dashboard), it is displayed in full width. That is, the 'white space' on the left and right are greatly reduced. This doesn't happen on the Overview tab, but I'm glad it does on the IB dashboards. So that then leaves that very large waste of space above the dashboard tabs

title: References being shown or flagged better in the various tools
body_text: References on packages, photos, schedules tasks, assets (possibly others) are not apparent whether a reference has been included or not as part of using that tool. There is only a link/button/heading that the user can click on and see if something has been added there or not. Would be nice to have some sort of flag, or numerical indication when those tools have a "Reference". Issues, Forms, RFI's as an example do a decent job at visually seeing whether something is there based on those being rig

title: Exclude Revit Sheet Sets from Packages
body_text: While there is an option to check or uncheck Revit sheet sets in the package the selection of set selection is not propagated to the shared model. Either remove the checks or include or exclude them as per user input.

title: Restore Submittals that have been voided
body_text: This would save us a lot of time when a submittal has been inadvertently voided.

title: Access Control Enhancement for RFI/Submittal Managers in Multi-Contractors Project
body_text: The current implementation of Submittals and RFIs in the ACC project environment allows users assigned the Submitter/RFI Manager role to view all Submittal and RFI submissions, regardless of the Contractor Company associated with the submission. This is causing an issue for the Developer (Client/Project Admin) who is managing submissions from multiple independent Contractors (Project Members) within this single project. The desired outcome requested by the developer (client) was for the Submitte

title: Possibility to archive photos in Build
body_text: Possibility to archive photos in Build

title: Automatic Audit Scheduling for Revit Models in ACC / BIM 360
body_text: Description: This could be considered a feature for both Revit and ACC/BIM 360 so I decided to post in both forums. Since ACC/BIM 360 currently does not have an automatic audit function, we would like the ability to automatically run audits by setting a day of the week and time—similar to a publish schedule—for models that are collaborated in ACC/BIM 360. Current Situation: Because audits can only be run when opening a project file, modelers experience waiting time when they start work in the mo

title: FORMS WITH REVIEWS NO INTERNAL NOTIFICATION
body_text: Having sa forms with Review ON, the reviwer will get an email notification but no internal "alert" unde Build -> Home page. This is critical, since the review is waiting for a member and no internal warning / notification. \ I sigges to ad dit to "Projectsigned work" or under My Home - > Assigned to me

title: ACC Mobile App - Geo Fencing of Users in a project
body_text: While Mobile App is really useful for the field users, some times it is also being misused. i.e. A user who is not physically present at site, is performing safety check / Asking PTW from a remote location. ??? !!!! This is unacceptable. We look for Geo Fencing of users tied up to project location which is very common in HR Attendance systems.

title: Submittals bulk download attachments
body_text: Function to bulk download all attachments while the submittal is open and not just after it is closed. It is tedious for users to have to open and wait for each individual file to load, the option to bulk download will make it easier to view drawings.

title: Sheets Module Custom Attributes & Database Functionality
body_text: We need the capability for the ACC Sheets module (Specs as well) to include custom attributes as with other modules. For example, Sheets should have the ability to be assigned to a responsible Company that authored the drawing, as well as ability to assign the current Revision number (not version number the way it is now). Sheets also need a custom "Status" attribute where they can be tracked throughout the design and construction process. For example, "Draft", "Issued for Review", "Issued for C

title: ACC - Submittals
body_text: While ACC supports multiple reviewer groups across different review steps, it currently does not support a draft-and-final workflow within the same reviewer group . There is no mechanism for group members to submit a draft response that can later be reviewed and formally submitted by a group lead as the final response for that group. Suggest to have. Enable draft responses within a reviewer group , where group members can prepare internal drafts and only the designated group lead can submit the

title: Exporting Schedule
body_text: It would be nice to be able to generate a pdf of the schedule as collapsed, etc.

title: Ability to reject workflows and send it back to a specific step
body_text: Currently, when a workflow in Autodesk Construction Cloud is rejected, it typically returns to the initiator or restarts from the beginning. This limits flexibility, especially for complex approval workflows that involve multiple stakeholders and review stages. In many real-world project scenarios, a workflow may only require corrections or clarification at a specific step rather than a full restart. For example, a reviewer may need revisions from a particular approver or department while the ea

title: Multiple DC Users on One Machine
body_text: Allow multiple different logins on DC on a single machine. I have two different Autodesk Accounts. I use the same computer for both. I want to be able to log out of one account and log into the other on Desktop Connector without needing to completely lose everything that I have set up on DC for the one that I'm logging out of. There should basically be multiple profiles within DC able to be set up. Each profile would have it's own workspace on the C:\ drive that could be set up. Then allow us to

title: RFI Response Box
body_text: When a Responder clicks the response button. The Response Box appears but is not moveable. many times the user would like to see the question or suggested answer in which they need to close the response to view the information. Make the response box moveable or add more info into the response box.

title: Autodesk Build Auto-Publish Markups
body_text: There should be an option to automatically publish markups, like lines or shapes, that I draw on sheets in Build. Having to publish each one manually is a huge time-waster.

title: Make unnecessary RFI fields Removable
body_text: When creating a new RFI, some fields are required, marked with an asterisk, and many are not. Can we please allow admins (RFI type creators) to remove/disable fields that are not required? It is causing confusion amongst the team, and we want to streamline, simplify and clarify the process for the project. Similarly, can we be given the option to choose which ones are required, this could be a tick box after each item inside the RFI type (template). Thanks!

title: Additional Columns for Cost & Time Implication Identification in Submittals
body_text: Users (especially the consultants) would like the ability to flag each submittal item with indicators for Cost Implication and Time Implication . Currently, ACC Submittals does not provide dedicated fields for capturing these impacts, making it difficult for project teams to assess potential variations or schedule risks early. This feature request proposes adding two optional columns— Cost Implication and Time Implication —as configurable Boolean or dropdown fields at the submittal item level. T

title: Overdue Reports for RFIs, Issues
body_text: To efficiently work our RFIs and Issues, we need to quickly run a reports to determine the OPEN items that are overdue. This allows us to view only what needs to be addressed during an event. Create a report for each in the template section.

title: VIEWER FOR LARGE MODELS
body_text: Capability to use models larger than 5 GB

title: Edit the columns for the exporting a File Log report
body_text: To save time and remove unrequired columns, it would be good to be able to set the required for a File Log report. this would vary the requested information for required reports.

title: ACC Connect ACC / BIM
body_text: It would be great to have as many features in ACC as we already have in BIM 360. Additionally, access to all the connections provided by Workato would be very useful (e.g., Aconex – ACC)

title: 3D Viewer : Section Box aligned to selected objects
body_text: The orientation of the section box in ACC follows the project coordinates and does not align with the orientation of the elements. Having the ability to quickly adjust this for a clean 3D view would be a valuable improvement.

title: Cost Variable Date Format
body_text: The current options for date formats in the Cost Variables are all US based (MM/DD/YYYY). There needs to be an AU/AEST format (DD/MM/YYYY). The project has the correct timezone and currency if that is relevant.

title: Link schedule tasks to elements - Assets
body_text: A way to have a 3D visual of the progress site easily with a calendar.

title: Issues inside forms - poor report
body_text: For a lot of forms, we are creating issues inside the forms. When exporting forms in pdf, we have a table with the issues but not the detail of the issues (metadata, photos...) It's not enough, for example, we are doing safety walkthrough with a form containing issues, we need to quickly generate a report containing all the informations for each visit. To have a report with the details of the issues, we need to use the issues interface, but we can't filter the issues depending of the field "refe

title: Meeting PDF Export
body_text: It would be great if there was an option for when a meeting agenda is created, you have the option to select what types of items are pulled into that PDF export. Similar to the function already available when just viewing the meeting agenda online, you can filter out "on-hold' or "closed" items in the agenda or minutes, it would be nice if these filters were applied to the export function. Maybe prior to the agenda being downloaded there was a prompt that allowed you to selected the items types

title: Manage the rights for photo module
body_text: On different projects, the client has access to our ACC with the Build module activated. It is not possible to manage rights within the Photo module to prevent the client from accessing this functionality.

title: Reviews - Add Custom Attribute Fields
body_text: You can only see Path, Comments, Description, Version, Markups and Issues on Reviews - It would be good to have custom attributes be added into the Review for Files.

title: In the ACC model viewer, have the ability to automatically change the section direction of a section plane
body_text: Problem: In the Civil Tools for Autodesk Construction Cloud, there is a button to revert direction of a cross section. But this doesn’t exist in the regular ACC viewer. Desired outcome: In the ACC model viewer, have the ability to automatically change the section direction of a section plane. Current issue : Not being able to to automatically change the section direction of a section plane.

title: ACC model Viewer - Allow precise rotation of section arrow
body_text: Problem: When using Y, X, Z plane it is possible to rotate it, but it cannot be done precisely adjusting it manually to a more appropriate angle is an impossible challenge Desired outcome: Being able to rotate the section in an intuitive and precise way or referencing to the surface or typing rotation angle value Current issue : can only rotate manually which is not precise and not easy to perform

title: Submittal - Copy attachments
body_text: In the current submissions workflow, every time you move to the next submission step, you must manually copy each attachment from the previous step to the current one. This process is unnecessarily time-consuming. When copying a file, the interface automatically scrolls down to where the copied file appears at the bottom of the list. If you have a long list (e.g., 30+ files), this forces you to scroll all the way back up for every single file, making it difficult to keep track of which files you

title: ACC Viewer – Show only the relevant properties per Revit category
body_text: When selecting an element in the ACC web viewer, the Properties panel shows every Revit parameter. This creates clutter and makes it hard for teams to find the information they actually need. Feature request: Allow admins to set property presets per Revit category (e.g., Windows, Doors, MEP Equipment). When a user selects an element, the viewer shows only the curated list for that category, with an option to “Show all properties” if needed. Example (Windows): For Windows, teams typically only ne

title: Issues Workflow
body_text: It would be amazing to have a workflow for Issues. Similar to RFI, Submittals, or Reviews. Right now, limiting it to managers only being able to close issues is good, but an automated multi-step review process would be great. We use issues in our prerelease internal review work. This is before our final review for releasing a doc, for which we use the reviews function. It would be fantastic if we had the option to assign the issue to a different person depending on the status or allow people to

title: Account Default indication in Project Admin
body_text: The new improvements in Account Admin around Roles are a huge win so thank you for that! That being said this prompted us to look closer at our roles who has what roles and on what projects which is great. That lead us into going into each project and trying to clean up all the roles. With that, trying to remember what role each person is supposed to have while inside a project is nearly impossible for us mere humans. That leads me to my idea. When you select a role (and this could work for defa

title: Specification Upload
body_text: When uploading specs, there are usually a few pages marked “intentionally left blank,” and Specs/AutoSpecs doesn’t really know how to handle them. Right now, you have to track down which spec they belong to and manually add them back in. It’d be great if there was an option under the + icon to just attach that blank page to the spec above. That way, you could quickly drop those pages into the right packages without constantly scrolling back and forth.

title: Expand the Photo Limit for As-Built Exports
body_text: The As-built export process appears to fail if a project contains more than 5,000 photos. I'd suggest that this limit be extended, or that functionality be added so that the export tool can work in batches. Using the Photos module to do this requires tiny manual batches as well as long periods of scrolling to populate the module, which isn't sustainable for large projects. Thank you!

title: Cost Management - need a better function to determine tax for line items
body_text: Our tax team uses the comment function to determine if a line item requires tax payment. However, once a comment is entered, it cannot be deleted, which causes a problem if there's an accidental input. Would it be possible to modify this comment field to a text field instead of a Boolean field? Or could Autodesk create a checkbox for each line item to indicate whether it needs to be taxed?

title: Documents - Extracts the documents with metadata in excel & with refresh
body_text: Maybe with Data connector or insight builder or new feature in docs. The goal is to have a dashboard with auto-refresh capability to manage documents/ review.

title: Draw locations zones
body_text: In the location part of ACC, once the organization is imported or created we have to creates the zones one bye one which is time consuming. Also, if we have same zones from on level to another, it is not possible to copy/paste the zoning.

title: Review
body_text: In the review workflow, add an option to include watchers. Some users need to know when the documents are approved and it's not possible to impose to the final reviewer to add them as notifiers.

title: PDF Viewer
body_text: Some compagnies are not using software as Adobe / Bluebeam. Some PDF printer are generating some visual issues... text disappearing... complicate for the reviews when some text are missing. It will be great if PDF viewer could be "compliant" with all PDF printers. Temporarily, we can switch the viewer pdf as raster viewer, but we loose some features.

title: Review - Improve the filter
body_text: We have hundreds of reviews on projects, for better management for all the teams, it will be great to have the possibility to filter the reviews depending of the key reviewers. In the columns, we have "next action by" but we have key & optional reviewers in this list, so complicate for the people to see quickly which reviews he has to do.

title: Review - Update setup with new key reviewers
body_text: Observations for different projects: When we have to update the review workflows to add new key reviewers, it doesn't update all current reviews. So we have to update the workflows + all reviews with this workflow. It’s challenging. For example, the client is starting to do all reviews, but but he's in the process of setting up a team of 50 users with different specialists, we have around twenty different workflows for client approval (by discipline/sub-discipline) and dozens / hundreds on going

title: Export PDF with markups
body_text: We need to export regularly the documents (PDF) including markups. The markups done are often outside of the sheets for text documents. When we export in pdf with markups, the markups outside of the sheets are deleted.

title: Insight - Data Extraction - Regularly shut down
body_text: We schedule regular data extractions (daily). For all projects, the extraction process regularly shuts down for unknown reasons, and we have to resume each project manually, one by one. Additionally, when using a bot, we cannot receive automatic notifications about these shutdowns.

title: Show Location Information in Autodesk Build Photo Reports
body_text: On the ACC platform, you can assign a location to photos. However, when exporting photos into an Autodesk Build Photo Report , there is currently no option to include the location in the report. The only selectable location-related information is the GPS position , which is not very useful within a project context. It would be extremely helpful if the assigned location for each photo could also be displayed in the report, since this data is already available per photo.

title: Ability to open several files simultaneously in Files tool
body_text: The ability to open several files simultaneously from the Files tool in the browser would be really helpful and save time. Currently, it is only possible to open a single file at a time. When the file opens, it is in the same tab. This is frustrating when attempting to open multiple files. We propose an option to open several files at once, with each one opening in a new tab. This would preserve the original tab showing the folder structure, allowing quick navigation and searching for any other

title: Please enable continuous scrolling during version comparisons.
body_text: When opening a file, there is a comparison feature with the previous version. Is it possible to enable continuous scrolling while using this feature? Currently, you cannot open files without selecting each comparison option individually, which limits the scenarios where this feature can be used.

title: Admin rights on ACC
body_text: ACC has only 3 different types of rights for hub admins. We need to get an access right on the admin hub that allows all possibilities regarding the library and application but restricts project creation.

title: User management Licenses
body_text: User management : 1. We should be able to specify multiple default roles at the Hub level instead of just one, as it is possible within a project. 2. We should be able to edit/delete multiple users (Licenses, roles, company, module, …) at once after they have been added to the Hub/Project directory. Currently it is only possible when we add multiple users to a project.

title: Images from forms corrupted
body_text: Images frequently becoming corrupted when completing forms using the app. These cannot be retaken for subsurface works so entire ITC forms are invalidated. This means we incur waste of time and resource and that we are unable to submit a full record of inspections to the client : g.allaouis@equans.fr

title: Data Connector - No access to the documents inside the review/transmittal
body_text: In Power BI, with the data connector, we have specific template and table for review & transmittal. But we don't know which documents are inside the reviews & transmittals.

title: Change model location of an issue
body_text: The issues are attached to a model and not to a X, Y Z position. We need to change models without having to re-select the X, Y, Z position. Otherwise we must reposition all the issues if we re-initialize the model following a fatal error.

title: Asset - Not available in 2D drawings on mobile device
body_text: When we create asset with 3D models by taking specific category of 3D models (doors for example), it generates well all assets. By using laptop, we can update each door on 3D viewer & 2D drawings published with 3D view. By using mobile device, we can only use asset on 3D viewer (not possible on 2D drawings). 2D is really important for our construction teams.

title: Edit the statut of differents assets in the same time in the interface / have multiple selection
body_text: With laptop, it's possible to edit the statut of different assets in the same time in 2D & 3D views but not possible to do it in the table with all assets.

title: Notification App mobile
body_text: It seems all notifications are email. How have notifications in the mobile app ?

title: Ability to view-only project files for people not using ACC Docs
body_text: Hi, We have design-build jobs that we bring on firms that don't use CAD let alone ACC Docs which we use for a chunk of our jobs. I can provide links to the "Files" folders of the job I want them to have access to, but after the free 30 day trial that is the only way they can have access to the most up-to-date versions of files. This creates a real disconnected workflow for a situation where I only want these people to view and download files. Thank you, Carlos

title: Unique Project Number to Avoid Duplicates
body_text: To maintain data integrity, we want to avoid project number duplication. During project setup, can we enforce a requirement for a unique project number to prevent duplication across projects? Please advise.

title: Company Details: Alternate Name/Trading Name addition
body_text: When adding a new company in ACC, it would be helpful to have an additional field for an “Alternate Name” or “Trading Name” alongside the existing “Company Name” field. In Australia (and many other regions), it’s common for organisations to have a registered legal name that differs from their trading name . On most projects, the trading name is what users and stakeholders recognise and use on a day-to-day basis. Currently, ACC only allows entry of the registered company name. This can cause conf

title: Issues - Manage the data inside the issues per role / user
body_text: It's important to have better management of the issues, to manage each data / property per user. Today, when users have edit access to the issues, they can modify everything.

title: Assets - Multiple selection
body_text: In the 2D/3D viewer, it’s really an urgency to have multiple selection with rectangular selection to select mulitple assets, to affect reference, change statuts... We are assigning each asset to scheduled tasks, but it’s too long to assign manually thousands of assets one by one.

title: Customizable Home Screen and Tabs within "Build"
body_text: Currently, the project home screen within build is not fully customizable. Consider enabling users to customize their home screens to tailor the project to their clients specific needs. Company logos and preferences should be able to be uploaded and customized on the project home screen. Additionally, the tabs on the left hand side of "Build" within a project should be customizable. Not in the sense of their name or purpose, but a user should be able to toggle on/off certain tabs to simplify the

title: Transmittal search/ filter by recipient
body_text: Currently it's possible to filter the transmittals by recipient company. It should be possible to filter by recipient person also.

title: Bid Package number displayed at the bidders/vendors end
body_text: In BuildingConnected platform, currently, when a subcontractor or a vender receives a bid invite from a General Contractor, they can only see the bid package name. It will be beneficial for them to see the bid package number as well, since this number option could be used to directly refer to the Specification division number for the relevant bid package from the tender documents. That way, the subcontractors/venders can be easily directed for the correct specification division.

title: Add .RCP file extension in Model Coordination Space
body_text: Adding support for the .RCP file extension within the Model Coordination space

title: Recycle Bin - Filter/Sort
body_text: Currently, there is no option to filter the recycle bin or sort the columns according to the metadata “Deleted by” and “Deleted on.” This would be very helpful if large parts of a folder structure are deleted “accidentally” or if the Desktop Connector causes problems.

title: Please add the ACC app to the Microsoft Intune Partner Productivity apps list.
body_text: In order to properly secure and protect the ACC app using Microsoft Application Management (MAM) via Intune, ACC needs to be added to the partner productivity apps list here: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/intune/intune-service/apps/apps-supported-intune-apps Some of your competitors are on this list. Let's get ACC on there!

title: Copy and Paste File Folders
body_text: Under Files/Folders when you are creating a file folder and want to copy and paste from another folder within the same project or an outside project, you cannot do that. This is very frustrating and would make it so much easier.

title: IDS Writer in Specification Tab within Docs for IFC Validation
body_text: There are ongoing discussions around the potential mandate of the OpenBIM initiative in the UK by 2026. In preparation for this, it will be increasingly important to support the management and exchange of IFC data within the ACC environment. While ACC currently provides functionality for managing IFC models and exporting coordination issues as BCF files, there is a significant opportunity to enhance these capabilities further. A valuable enhancement would be to expand the “Specifications” tab wi

title: Reviews and Skipping Steps
body_text: It would be helpful if when skipping the current step (key reviewers) in order to send the review to the approval step, the Review retained and still showed all of the assigned reviewers. As of now, when you skip a step it only shows the reviewers that participated and submitted a review. So you lose the list of all the assigned key reviewers, which is important - to show that people had the opportunity to review and either chose not to or did not complete the review during the review duration.

title: Model coordination - option to sort or configure saved view lists simple sorting or more powerful search filters
body_text: Currently it is not possible to sort the saved views under the views tab. It would significantly streamline the user experience if these views could be sorted or configured by the project administrator. This could allow the project administrator to prioritize which views are first in the list. Alternatively, if search filters and saved seaches could be applied to the view tab similar to what is available in files would be even more powerful.

title: ACC Drawing titleblock manager via ACC attributes and Reviews
body_text: In the case for all files on ACC, attributes need to be added manually (or custom APIs developed). For drawings, and specifically PDFs related to drawing titleblock such as revisions, dates, names, drawing titles etc can be updated using the OCR feature. This currently workflow relys on the Engineer/Checker to markup the PDF, the drafter backdraft it, reprint the PDF and re-upload the PDF and re-extract the attributes with OCR. ACC would become significantly more powerful if the titleblock infor

title: Attributes - Bulk Edit / Delete / Add
body_text: For Custom Attributes, we have the feature to Bulk Edit (i.e. Add Values) to the Attributes the first time. However, during subsequent Bulk Editing of Values to the same Attribute, there is no way to Bulk Delete or Bulk Add more values to this attribute. This causes the user to first delete each Attribute value one by one, and then bulk add all the values again. Or the user to add additional values one by one only. There should be a way to Bulk Add or Delete Values in subsequent edits. This woul

title: ACC Mobile App - File Download & Project Sync While Screen Is OFF
body_text: Files currently do not sync while screen is off while on 5g on iOS or Android. This makes it nearly impossible to download larger files in the background on company managed devices with basic security management profiles like screen timeouts.

title: ACC Mobile App - File Download & Project Sync Network Metrics
body_text: Currently, when downloading a file (such as an NWD) or syncing a project, there is no metrics on the mb/mb downloaded or the mbps/performance of the download via the network. Thus, there is no way currently to internally troubleshoot issues with downloads/syncing.

title: 百家乐口诀
body_text: 更多百家乐口诀试玩地址【xs33.vip】薇或者Q【2274868784】 1. “庄庄闲闲庄，跟跳不跟连” 含义： 这是典型的“看路”口诀。“跟跳”是指上一把开“庄”，下一把就押“闲”（认为结果会切换），反之亦然。“不跟连”是指不相信“长龙”（连续开多个“庄”或“闲”）会持续。 真相与风险： 每一局都是独立事件，过去的结果无法预测未来。这种口诀诱导玩家在根本不存在的“趋势”和“反趋势”之间来回摇摆，最终在手续费和随机波动中耗尽本金。 2. “赢了就走，输了莫追” 含义： 提醒玩家要控制贪念，设定赢利上限和止笋点。 真相与风险： 这是所有口诀中相对最“理性”的一条，但它只是一个资金管理建议，并不能帮你赢钱。它只能帮助你控制损失的速度和规模，但无法改变游戏的负期望值本质。 3. “有长龙就跟，到断缆就停” 含义： 当出现连续多次同一结果时（如连续开7个“庄”），就跟着押，直到这个趋势中断为止，更多实用口诀扣扣：而二期死吧留疤七八四。 真相与风险： “长龙”在随机分布中是小概率事件，但确实会发生。问题在于，你无法预测“长龙”何时开始、何时结束。你可能在“长龙”即将结束时才跟上，然后瞬间亏损

title: AS-BUILT HYPERLINKS RETAINED ON DRAWING SHEETS TO RFI'S / SUBMITTALS / DOCUMENTS
body_text: We are utilizing the As-Built export feature of ACC to facilitate the as-built deliverable requirements for our projects, and have encountered a common issue / complaint with respect to the hyperlink's being lost from what operates inside of ACC where it takes you to the linked RFI/Submittal/Document - when the export is completed this way currently, the exported PDF of the drawing sheet has the reference to the attachment, but that link does not work - which degrades the quality of the as-built

title: Add “Date Published” as a column option in the Sheets module
body_text: It would be extremely helpful if the Sheets module allowed column customization — specifically, the ability to display a “Date Published” column and had the option to hide columns less relevant to the user. Currently, users can only see the publish date by drilling into each sheet or viewing the version set details, which isn’t efficient for tracking or verifying release timelines across multiple sheets. Having the publish date visible in the main grid (or at least available as a selectable colu

title: Scan for duplicate files - run automatically daily
body_text: Add option to schedule ´ Scan for duplicate files´ report daily.

title: Page Navigation in Takeoff
body_text: In the 2d takeoff, have an additional navigation bar at the bottom or a few buttons added to the navigation bar to go to the next page, go back a page, etc. The drop down is fine, but it would help speed the navigation between pages as we are doing a takeoff.

title: Takeoff Info
body_text: In 3d takeoff, when we select an item and hover our mouse over it, have a small window pop up giving a very basic overview of what that item is and what takeoff we’ve labeled it as if we’ve done that.

title: Multiple colors for takeoff items
body_text: Please add more colors to the item pallette. and allow transparent, fill, hatch, etc... to takeoffs. Have the takeoff types appear with the right color rather than showing the colors as little dots. It is incredibly difficult to see the colors of the items at times.....

title: Signature block on Building Connected messages
body_text: Can we please have the ability to save a signature block to our profiles on BC so that we don't have to cut and paste it every time we send a message? Thanks!

title: Locations - On Docs
body_text: Currently you can add locations on Sheets but not on Files through Docs. Would be good to be able to link issues through reviews to locations similar to Sheets.

title: Separate Daily Log Tool
body_text: The forms area combines too many project functions. A separate daily log tool should be generated rather than using the forms feature. Daily logs should be collaborative between General Contractors and Subcontractors on projects. One report should be able to be generated and combine the GC's entries as well as subcontractors including images.

title: NDAs for Project Access
body_text: BuildingConnected's NDA feature is nice, though we would love to see the option for a Docusign integration. This request is specifically for Build/Docs under ACC. It would be helpful to have the option to require NDAs before accessing the project or any public links that were shared.

title: Assets - Statusing
body_text: Future Improvement - To be able to get an indication of what references (issues/forms) to assets are still open or having a little text box saying "references still open"

title: Forms - Smart Forms Approval Workflow
body_text: Currently no form approval workflow for Smart Forms, we can not see who it is sitting with.

title: Reviews & Transmittal - Transmit Drawings with Issues Attched
body_text: A feature where you can decide if you would like to transmit the drawings from the review with the issues and markup attached, so consultants can review what you have reviewed. Decide if markups on particular reviews will stay only in that review. At the moment, transmittal only shows the file not the markups or issues at that given time.

title: Create a file as a placeholder
body_text: What is missing from ACC that other platforms have is the ability to create a file as a placeholder. What I would like to see in docs is an option to create a file (any file type would be the goal) and set it as a placeholder. The placeholder can then be overwritten by an updated file and stored in the version history.

title: Bridge Locations Across Projects
body_text: We would like the ability to bridge locations across projects. A lot of times we open up a new project for Warranty Tracking (or in a unique case, Punchlist Tracking) and it would save a lot of time if when we bridged a handful of sheets to the new project, it held onto the Locations that were already assigned. Currently when you bridge a sheet, it wipes out all the locations that were set.

title: Needed cost detail report
body_text: I would like a report that provides the following information. Right now I have to manually combine 2 different reports. Cost Name Trade Partner Description Cost Status Orig. Commitment Approved Change Orders Uncommitted Change Orders Pending Change Orders Projected Cost Actual Cost Landscaping & Irrigation Landscape INC 169,781.00 46,112.00 0.00 50,176.00 266,069.00 205,098.35 PCO 51.2 Site Resto - Irrigation AALC Draft 36,065.00 PCO 51.3 Site Resto - Sod AALC Draft 14,111.00

title: Add Device Type (Web/Mobile) to Docs Activity Log
body_text: Hi team, I request the ability to distinguish between Web and Mobile usage in the Docs Activity Log. Current limitation: The Activity Log records actions (upload, download, view), but it does not indicate the device type. This makes it difficult to: Analyze usage patterns across different environments (e.g., field staff often use Mobile, while office staff mainly use Web). Enforce security policies and respond effectively to incidents. Integrate logs into enterprise monitoring systems, since dev

title: Photo Mark-Ups on Files/Sheets
body_text: A report similar to the Issues on Sheets report, where we can export a report for photo mark-ups on either Files or Sheets. We commonly use these for Dilapidation Report or Mark-Up Shop Drawings with quality records, then issue upstream.

title: Add Layers to Sheets like PlanGrid
body_text: Add layers to sheets like PlanGrid currently has. This helps teams sort markups on a project.

title: Takeoff | Set 2D Locations on Multiple Sheets
body_text: It would be much more efficient if we could designate locations on multiple sheets at once during the upload process, similar to how sheet numbers and titles are designated. This could be a process where we select multiple sheets, marquee an area in a preview view, and then assign that marquee to a location. Again, this is similar to what the system already does with sheet numbers and titles except rather than running OCR in the marquee areas, the user would associate those areas with a location

title: Possibility to create multi step RFI process
body_text: At the moment, an RFI process contains a single step. Ideally, it should be possible to incorporate multiple steps. For example, an answer give in an RFI should also be validated in the same process.

title: Asset full detail report including all attached information embedded
body_text: Customer asked to have full detail report (including all Issue data, forms data, photos, RFI, etc. (not just hyperlinks)) on a report like embedded references. It is not possible to create a report from an Asset including all detailed information from all references linked to that particular Asset.

title: RFI Activity Log - Pop Up when @-ed
body_text: I don't think I saw this elsewhere as a suggestion, but could have missed it. As we adopt the platform more, it is becoming more typical to be within the environment most of the time (having the window on A project within ACC on another screen - though sometimes a different tab that isn't active). I'm not sure it'd be possible, but having a "popup" option for notifications specifically when @ed in something like the RFI Activity Log could help streamline receiving information - since it doesn't

title: Remove deleted persons from review workflow
body_text: When a person is removed from the project, they should also be removed from the review workflow, as they can no longer check the points.

title: Filter by empty location fields
body_text: As a site manager, I would like to be able to search the issue list for issues that do not have a location specified so that I can add one. A field for empty locations needs to be added to the filter option.

title: Publish log for Files
body_text: We need the publish log from the sheet section also in the files section. It is helpful to be able to see the error log when an upload fails, as in BIM360.

title: Attributes or Tags for Model Coordination
body_text: Add the ability to add custom attributes or tags to the model files in model coordination for ease of sorting, filtering, and searching.

title: Notification for Assigned Workplan Task and Deliverables
body_text: Currently the notifications do not support assigned tasks and deliverables in workplans (Schedules tool). It is important that we have the option to enable it in case needed, so members can get notified that a specific task has been assigned to them in a workplan. We would also like to have an option for notifications to be sent out if the task is over due or due within 3-7 days. This way we ensure that all members are aware of their tasks and can prioritize.

title: Centralized Custom Fields at Account Level - Issues Module
body_text: Custom fields in issues are often used to define lists that are standard across organization, which currently have to be set up individually in each project. There should be an option to set up custom fields at account level, which can be used in all projects. This will be especially helpful when changes are done to the standard custom fields which are required to reflect in all project, but currently require manual changes in each project. Having a central custom field option will ensure standa

title: Different Status Sets for Different Issue Category/Types
body_text: Issues module is used by multiple teams throughout the lifecycle of the project - Design, Execution, Quality, Safety, CRM, etc., requiring different categories and types. The status sets for these different teams are usually different. For example; For Quality - Open, Approved, Not Approved, Completed, Closed For Design - Open, Pending, Approved, Completed, Rejected, Closed For Safety - Open, Approved, Not Approved, Closed For CRM/Handover Teams - Open, Approved, Not Approved, Completed, Conditi

title: Nested Dropdowns in Issues Custom Fields
body_text: We use issues for capturing process non-conformities and observations on field. For configuration of issues in order to get structured output data which can be used for analysis and improvement, we need four levels of selections within the issues module - Issue type (quality/safety/design, etc.), Category (Trade), Sub Category (Activity) & Issue Checkpoint. Currently we can only set up Types, Categories and Custom Fields. If there was an option in custom field to add nested dropdowns, we could h

title: Mark all questions in a Section in Forms as "N/A"
body_text: We would like the functionality to mark an entire section as "N/A" instead of having to mark each question as "N/A" An Example of how we would use this: On our Daily Safety Assessments we have sections where if the hazard isn't present on the Jobsite - ex confined spaces, we don't need to assess any confined space requirements. We still have that on our inspection form, so we end up marking all of the questions as "N/A" Having the ability to mark the entire section of Confined Space section as "

title: Private Field needed
body_text: In Building Connected, we have "Private Attachments," but it would be great if we were able to add "Private Notes" as well. This would house many internal thoughts we could share with our team members.

title: Custom work
body_text: On the website, companies are limited on what type of work they perform. For example, we are a scaffolding company and there are things that we do that a GC may not search by "scaffolding". For example, some of the things we would like added would be: Trash Chute, Temporary Hand Rails, Dance Floor, Swing Stage, Stair Tower, and Overhead Protection. There are probably others I am not thinking of right now, but these are the main categories that we handle.

title: Organizing Issues
body_text: The issues list can be filtered but the filter or search cannot be saved. Is there a way to save default filters so team members dont have to create them (each individually). A folder structure would be nice or a quick selection for the filters.

title: Edit Custom Field Option Order in Assets
body_text: Bring the ability to re-order custom field options like in the issues module, into the assets module. Options that can be added to drop-downs or multi-selects cannot be re-arranged after they have been created. If you wanted to keep things alphabetically or group certain items together within the custom field, you would have to manually manage that. Ex. If you had a drop-down field with 9 options and needed to add 1 more alphabetically in the middle, you would need to delete the options until th

title: More Permission Options in Build
body_text: Going through the numerous ideas on this board, it's apparent that more granular permission options are needed in ACC Build. I know that the photos module has action pending regarding folders and permissions based on the status of other threads, so that is excellent news! While we can turn on/off some modules at the project level as an account admin, we need to be able to do this at the role level. We can then tailor what each role has access to. Or, make each module have granular permissions. E

title: Model Coordination on Mobile
body_text: Model Coordination needs to be included on mobile devices. Our field teams need access to the models and our only work around is to bury an NWD file in an ACC folder, which is not a live version. So we have to continually create NWDs. But since they are typically buried in a folder, no one uses them in the field. This is a huge need on the GC/trade side. We would also most likely have issues with not having wifi on site to be able to view these models. Procore has already fixed this issue with a

title: Have Workshared Models saved on ACC template files remain workshared when a new project is created using the template
body_text: Please make it possible to have Workshared Models saved on ACC template files remain workshared when a new project is created using the template. The way ACC templates work currently is that it will just make a NON-workshared copy of the workshared files saved to the ACC template. This is completely pointless since the non-workshared copy can not even be opened in Revit. I would LOVE to use a feature like this to use on ACC projects for training that I often need to recreate for each training se

title: Snap to horizontal or vertical line
body_text: Add a key to hold to snap to horizonal or vertical lines (like Bluebeam Revu’s hold SHIFT feature).

title: Idea to Improve the Location Tool in ACC Build
body_text: In our company, we use the Location tool to help employees work faster with the plans/sheets. However, we have noticed the following issue: When creating locations in a published plan/sheet and defining them through marked areas, these locations can be connected to other plans/sheets. But currently, only the locations are transferred – not the marked areas themselves. For example: we defined the marked areas on architectural plans/sheets and then wanted to connect several additional plans/sheets

title: Set member visibility per project
body_text: Currently, it's possible to adjust member visibility in the account settings. This setting then applies to all projects. There are projects in which the member list should be visible and others in which it should not be visible. Visibility should be adjustable per project.

title: Show Relevant Review Workflows Based on File Location
body_text: While configuring a review workflow, allow administrators to define one or more starting folders from which that workflow can be initiated. When an initiator submits files for review, the system should automatically filter and display only those workflows that are applicable to the folder the files are located in. This would ensure that only workflows relevant to the folder from which the review is initiated are shown to the initiator. This way, only workflows relevant to the folder from which t

title: Enable File based search in Reviews to track Review History
body_text: In Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC), there is currently no direct way to search for a specific file within the Reviews module to check its review history. This creates a challenge when users need to verify through which reviews a particular file has already been processed. For example, if a file has gone through multiple review cycles, there is no simple method to trace its path across those reviews unless users manually open each review and search for the file. This is especially inefficient i

title: folder empty or not visual indication
body_text: When viewing folders in ACC using a web-browser a visual indication whether or not a folder is empty (different colour or shape or small icon inside the folder icon...) should get implemented.

title: New Project Members Unable to Access Previously Sent Transmittals in ACC
body_text: In Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC), when new members are added to a project, they are unable to access transmittals that were sent prior to their addition. This creates a gap in visibility, especially when the transmittals were addressed to a company or role that the new member is now associated with. Ideally, if a user is added to a company or role that was previously included in transmittals, they should be able to view those records to maintain continuity and context. Without this access, v

title: Option to Mandate the acceptance of target folder by the initiator
body_text: In the Reviews tool, while configuring approval workflows with the “Copy approved files” option enabled, we often allow initiators to change the target folder by checking the “Allow the initiator to change the target folder” box. However, initiators sometimes forget to verify or select the correct target folder, which leads to approved files being moved to incorrect locations within the project. To prevent this, we propose adding a fourth checkbox (or a sub-checkbox) under the existing option: “

title: Customise look of meetings pdf export
body_text: Would be great if the meetings pdf export could be customised to improve readability. Currently there's no options available when exporting the pdf.

title: Export markups in excel format
body_text: You can export documents with markups imbedded into them, but there is no option to export markups on the document in an excel form. Should be an option to click on markups tab and click on export

title: Bug: Invalid sync indicator
body_text: Hi, I would like to report a bug related to bridged files. When a file from the source folder is moved into a subfolder within the shared parent folder, the sync mark on the source side disappears. However, in the target folder, the file still shows as being synced with the source file, but the sync is invalid. At this point, synchronization no longer exists. This invalid sync mark could be misleading, giving the impression that the files in the target folder are still being synced, which could

title: Webhooks for ACC Form API
body_text: It will be nice to have this feature, especially most of the users is using forms in day to day usage, so that user can know which form they are in: When form is created When form is updated When form is deleted Etc...

title: ACC User Groups
body_text: A feature to add the individual users to one or multiple groups which could then be associated with an ACC project or projects to automatically extend the invitation and user permissions to a batch of users. Then as you added users to the groups they automatically be invited to the multiple projects that the group is already associated to.

title: enhance viewing support for MicroStation .dgn files: external references
body_text: This is a high priority issue for companies that do not only work with Autodesk files on ACC, but also use MicroStation with ACC (currently only as a 'cloud platform'): In order to make use of further ACC processes like issue management viewing of .dgn files must be accurate. Currently ACC just displays content from the .dgn file itself, but NOT from (frequently used) external sources. (MicroStation itself should finde the ext. file automatically as it looks into the current folder of the active

title: Allow for "CC" in RFQ Requests
body_text: When we bulk request quotations in Cost we cannot "CC" our other team members on the email notification. In Procore we are allowed to CC other team members so they get the responses emailed to them as well versus just one person receiving them and then the others magically have to know to go in there and look daily.

title: Reviews - allow for deactivated workflows to be deleted
body_text: When we deactivate workflows, we need to rename them in order to fall at the bottom, and they stay there forever. There should be an option to delete workflows and as needed restore them the same way as the documents in Files, so we don't have big lists of workflows that aren't all necessarily being used and active. Or at least move it into drafts?

title: Cost Codes for Forms
body_text: For forms, it would be great if there was a way to link to budget cost codes (a drop-down list pulled from the budget). This would help track productivity, other costs etc.

title: Permissions for Sheets
body_text: There is a need for more granular permissions in Sheets. Just like photos, sheets are wide open, which is problematic. We are a design-build company, and many drawings done by us or by a vendor contain proprietary information. We don't want every external user to have access to sheets. That means we can't invite them to the build module, and this is disappointing and frustrating (the same applies to photos, actually). We could store all our drawings in files; however, our field crew prefers to h

title: Required fields
body_text: At the account admin level it would be good to be able set certain fields in modules to be required, especially members and companies. But this could also apply to RFI's and Submittal and Forms. This would help to maintain standards on modules for the minimum required data

title: Forms Enhancement: Predefined Data Sets & Dropdowns
body_text: It would be extremely helpful if Autodesk Build Forms allowed us to create and use built-in data sets. These can be created per project if needed. For example, predefined lists (such as locations, cost codes, equipment IDs, or employee names) could be selected from dropdown menus within a form, rather than requiring users to manually type entries each time. This would: Improve data accuracy and consistency across forms. Save time by eliminating repetitive manual entry. Allow for better reporting

title: Add option to duplicate a meeting, but not as a follow up
body_text: If I wanted to copy the agenda for a meeting from another meeting, I have no option to duplicate it but only copy paste the agenda. Follow up only works if it's for the same invitees and meeting title

title: References in Assets - Export All as Download
body_text: Would like to request to export all references in the Asset Module that are assigned. Right now, we have to click on references and select one by one in order to download. When there are several that are attached to the asset it would be nice to have a select all button to export all at once to send with our package for closeout. Thank you.

title: Apply Tax at Line-Item Level via API
body_text: Context I work in sales for Agave, the leading ERP integration partner for Autodesk Build clients. We’re working with a Canadian general contractor who is implementing Cost Management and needs financial data to sync accurately with their ERP, Viewpoint Vista. Issue In Vista, users can apply unique tax codes and amounts at the line item level on invoices and purchase orders. This is critical for construction accounting and billing, especially for Canadian firms with complex tax requirements. Aut

title: Manually Assigning Disciplines
body_text: The auto-assign for disciplines is nice, but it's restricted to latching to the first letter in the sheet number. My architect starts their sheet numbers with the letter tag of the building (A, B, C) followed by the discipline letter. So I can't put all the architectural drawings in one discipline unless I manually edit each of my 477 sheets. There needs to be an option to select a group of sheets and assign them a discipline with a click of a button.

title: Customize home tab in ACC app and Build homescreen on WEB
body_text: Several projects are not using Sheets and uses files only with titleblock extraction or just models. In the APP half the screen is used for Sheets and is not needed for these projects. If it was possible to edit the layout of the home tab in the APP and home screen for build it would be very helpful. Projects are using more models than drawings these days. See green circles.
