title: Custom Variables in Takeoff Type formulas
body_text: When using formulas in takeoff types in Takeoff it would be useful to be able to add custom variables in a forumla. For example, when measuring items like drainage we may have variable such a pipe width, depth of excavation (which may be different from the manhole height depending on existing ground level) The workaround is using the available variables such as width, height, length, depth etc, but would be useful to be able to have Custom Variable A, B, C and so on. These could be named as requ

title: Form template builder in account library : Require both photo and issue creation in conditional logic
body_text: The current ACC Forms template builder allows for conditional logic but we can't enforce multiple actions together based on responses. This limits the ability to capture complete, standardized data in the field : Ability to require both photo and issue when using conditional logic Being able to chose multiple options from the conditions list And being able to customize the options available in the conditions list to support this request, we also would appreciate if there is a branching logic, al

title: Meeting Agenda References - Deleting Old Form References Out
body_text: The ability to delete Form References out of a meeting agenda that are in the state of "close". Currently have to go back into forms to "reopen" the form, then I can go into the Meeting Agenda to delete, then go back into forms and re-execute.

title: Cannot link Meeting references to Issues/RFIs/Forms
body_text: Cannot link Meeting references to Issues/RFIs/Forms

title: Meetings
body_text: Teams link can be added and sent to invitees however it does not allow them to accept or decline the invite or add it to their calendars - they have to add it from their ACC, no link

title: Can't customise RFI fields to make them required
body_text: Can't customise RFI fields to make them required

title: Add functionality to consolidate budget codes for a single Change Order
body_text: Description: When iterating through {#oco.costItems} to display the budget code, the OCO number is repeated for each cost item, even if they belong to the same change order. This leads to redundant data in the report. Example Use Case: For an OCO with multiple cost items, the current output is: {#oco.costItems} {oco.number} - {budgetCode.formatted} {/oco.costItems} Which results in: OCO-001 - BGT-1234 OCO-001 - BGT-5678 It would be more efficient and create a cleaner report if there were a way t

title: Meeting attachments
body_text: We can only attach pictures to meetings at the bottom of the meeting notes, we can’t add it per section or item. We want to be able to add images to sections or items so it’s clear what image goes with what meeting item. Currently it’s confusing if we have multiple attachments for where they go to. Today we are having to do extra work to make sure people know what goes where by naming the file with the section or item number.

title: Data exchange from coordinated 3D-view
body_text: Right now you can create a dataexchange från a model (.rvt) in Docs from the 3D-view published from Revit. When having a larger project with a lot of diffrent models it would be useful to be able to make a Dataexchange from an established View in Model Coordination. Or have a "Saved view to Docs" that is dynamic and keeps up with the updates so the dataexchange also updates. Maybe this could be solved with a function to Schedule a view in model coordination being saved to Docs. This would allow

title: Folders within the Assets > Settings > Custom Fields
body_text: Currently, in Autodesk Construction Cloud, all Custom Fields under Assets > Settings are stored in a single list. As the number of fields grows, this makes it harder to organise, locate, and maintain them—especially for accounts managing multiple asset categories or large, complex projects. On the US and EU servers, there is no equivalent functionality yet either, but introducing folders (or a similar grouping method) would allow Custom Fields to be organised logically, improving usability and r

title: Allow Admins to Remove Unused Sheet Tags
body_text: Allow project admins to delete unused Sheet tags.

title: The ability to set up reoccurring meetings in the Meetings Tool
body_text: It would be helpful to have the ability to create recurring meetings directly within ACC. Ideally, the feature would allow a consistent Zoom or Teams link to be attached to each occurrence, and automatically schedule the series for all participants involved. This would streamline coordination and reduce the need for manual re-entry or external calendar management.

title: Issue Workflow Improvements
body_text: Requirements: To assign multiple companies in a specific order to complete work and have ACC automatically assign the issue to the next company identified in the workflow sequence. Background: In order to complete a deficiency multiple scopes of work may be involved in completing the work. Currently using ACC users will have to create multiple issues, assign them to a company and hope that the companies complete the work in the correct sequence. Example: A washroom accessory is installed in the

title: Print in Files
body_text: The Print option only prints the page they are on, as opposed to the whole document. Currently they have to download the document, then print. I'd like to see an option to print the whole document direct.

title: Ability to Export Drawing with Asset Markups
body_text: When exporting sheets, there currently isn't an option to do so with assets marked up. It would be nice if project teams could export drawings with the asset markups to show the various room statuses on any given week.

title: Add Option to Include Asset Markups in Sheets Exports
body_text: The ability to progress Assets is a great feature, but sometimes we need to export the Sheet with those Assets markups. Add an export setting to allow users the option to export Sheets with the Asset markups with the corresponding Asset status legend.

title: Sync Markup Data in Bridge
body_text: Sync markup data in Bridge. Not only red-line markups, but all markups. Markups are critical information and the bridged project needs that information as well.

title: ACC File Folders
body_text: I would like to be able to easily identify folders in ACC that have files stored within them. For example if the text could remain Grey when the folder is empty but when there is content present in the folder the text color would change to blue.

title: Copy text from PDF files
body_text: Dear Team, It would be very helpful to have a feature that allows users to copy text directly from PDF files – similar to what is available in most other PDF readers. This functionality would greatly improve usability and efficiency when working with PDF documents.

title: Ability to Generate Unique URLs for Forms so Teams Can Create QR Codes
body_text: Project teams are starting to use more and more QR codes on site. Right now, QR codes cannot be created for individual forms in Build because unique URLs are not available. This is a barrier to widespread use of Build for HSEOPs.

title: Improve Sheet Callout Hyperlink Navigation
body_text: Bring back the smooth drawing callout hyperlink navigation that existed on BIM 360 Docs, where the drawing thumbnail would appear when the user hovered over the hyperlink and the user would only need to single click to navigate to the drawing. The Build callout navigation is awkward, annoying and requires more clicking.

title: Expand Meeting Notifications
body_text: Add Meeting notification options, such as "Meeting Shared", "Meeting Item Assigned to Me", etc.

title: Add the Ability to Report or Export Meeting Items Assigned to Me
body_text: Add the Ability to report or export Meeting Items assigned to oneself or perhaps specific users or companies.

title: Add Summary Sections on Forms Detail Reports
body_text: Add a summary section to the Forms Detail reports, similar to the one on the BIM 360 Checklist Detail report. The summary section shows the counts of Sections, Items, Issue, Conforming, Non-Conforming, N/A, and To Be Answered.

title: Additional Form Export Options
body_text: When selecting Forms to export to PDF, provide the following as options: 1) Create individual PDF files for each Form instead of one combined file 2) Name each file with Form ID # and Form Name instead of just the ID #. This will make it easier to export completed forms for uploading to external systems to manage information not manageable in Build, such as Inspection Test Plans (Autodesk: Yes, they are a thing!).

title: Allow multiple shapes to be tied to the same asset
body_text: We are creating assets for interiors where we are grouping the assets by room type (bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, etc.) but we cannot create multiple shapes for the same asset. The current workaround is to use the highlight function to highlight separate areas for the same asset, but it is less than ideal.

title: Allow Users to Hide All Issue on Drawings
body_text: Allow users to hide all Issues on Sheets when viewing drawings. In BIM 360 Docs, users were able to select a button to hide all issues on a drawing to make it easier to read if there was a large amount of them. It looks like this feature wasn't migrated over to Build. We are aware that we are able to hide all markups, but not all issues. This will be very handy for projects as they approach their completion. I noticed there are filters available, but no way to fully filter out all the issues.

title: Add Additional Activity Data Extract Options in Insight Data Connector
body_text: The current options for extracting Activity data are "Past day" and "Custom". Custom allows use to extract a specific date range of up to 31 days to extract the Activity data. This date range does not adjust on a daily basis. Please add additional options to extract Activity data from scheduled Data Connector extractions.

title: Allow Project Admins to Make Bulk Member Changes
body_text: Allow project admins to bulk edit member Company, Access Type, Services and deletions. Also, allow Project Admins to delete themselves.

title: Able to make mandatory field on Files
body_text: Being able to make a custom attribute in Files as a mandatory field as part of uploading.

title: Schedule automation for save to docs Model Coordination views.
body_text: Hi, Would be great if a schedule automation is added for the "Save to Docs" feature of views in Model Coordination. Now it is a manual repetitive action. Regards!

title: Cost - Change request approval workflows additional condition option
body_text: Currently we would like to setup Change request workflows so they go to the appropriate team members for each review type. Our CRs are split into cost banding which is easy to do but then they are further split down into the CR type, which is a current metadata field we have added e.g. Design, Operations, Customer change etc... At the moment there is no field we can select to further split these out. If custom metadata fields could be added this would really enhance the CR customisation and make

title: Attach files during review process
body_text: It should be possible to attach a file or more during a to a review during a review workflow. It's very often the case that additional Excel-Sheet, a letter a pdfs or other file types needs to be attached to a review as an answer. For example in the comment-field.

title: Forms Template Filter
body_text: Allow for filtering Forms by Form Template. You can't filter forms by their template within the Forms menu. This means you can't do an extract of only forms created from a particular template except through a report.

title: Display Photo Location on Images
body_text: It would be very helpful on solar projects to have the location (XYZ) coordinates to show up on the images attached to the Form and Issues when exported next to the timestamp in the PDF export.

title: Add the ability to make Issue due dates mandatory
body_text: Make the due date field a mandatory / required field so that due dates are consistently populated. This will allow better accountability and add a sense of urgency to the issue. It will also allow for better reporting on issues that are open beyond the due date. Additionally, have a setting to be able to control the default due date so that project teams can set a default number of days (like it was available in Classic).

title: Sort members by company and bulk delete
body_text: Allow project admins to sort members by company and bulk delete, similar to BIM 360 Field Management.

title: Issue Detail Report Customization
body_text: In the Issues Detail PDF export (screenshot below) – is it possible to customise the format of this report? Changes requested are listed below: In the Contents page, can it display Issue description, ID number and location along with the Title? On each Issue page – is it possible to remove some fields and keep others?

title: Review - previous versions of file not visible
body_text: We have noticed that in a review workflow, we can not view previous versions of the file – only the current version. Even when we open the file through a review workflow – it open the file in another tab but we are unable to flick through previous versions of the file.

title: Autodesk Build Report Filter for Submittals
body_text: We need the ability to filter Submittal in the Report page by Responsible Contractor. Currently this feature does not exist. I'm aware of filtering the Submittal Log by responsible contractor and exporting a report that can then be converted to Report Template. However, this feature did exist at one time and now it does not appear.

title: Adding Required/Optional people to Submittal Review Workflows
body_text: After a submittal is created, when editing the submittal review workflow on ACC Browser, " Required reviewers(s) " and " Optional reviewers(s) " are to be added. Once a project member is added as a " Required reviewer ", that project members' name does not appear under the " Optional reviewer " list. Similarly, once a project member is added as an " Optional reviewer ", that project members' name does not appear under the " Required reviewer " list. It would be useful to allow all project member

title: BUILD - PHOTOS - Request for more than 1000 Photos Displayed on Map
body_text: The current 1,000-photo display limit on Autodesk Build’s Photos Map significantly restricts its usefulness for large-scale infrastructure assessment projects, especially those spanning entire cities. Our team relies on the Photos Map to visualize georeferenced images for comprehensive condition reviews, but we've encountered issues where many photos fail to display due to this cap. After consulting with Autodesk Support (see attached response from Kelsey G., Senior Technical Support Specialist)

title: TAKEOFF - Add Bulk Import Functionality for Takeoff Types
body_text: I am currently building out an ACC Takeoff Project Template that includes custom classification systems for various clients and a full set of pre-generated takeoff types to ensure consistency across all projects. This template project serves as a centralized master list for takeoff items and is intended to streamline standardization and reduce duplication of effort. However, a significant pain point has been the need to manually create each takeoff type one by one , including linking them to the

title: Build - Weather Tracking
body_text: It would be great if the "Site Weather" section on the home page could be expanded to include weather tracking over the duration of the project, displayed in formats such as tables, charts, or graphs. This would allow users to visualize trends and gain insights into how weather conditions evolved over time. Even more powerful would be the ability to sync or overlay this weather data with the project Schedule , enabling users to look back and analyze how specific weather events may have impacted

title: Subcontractor Cost Item Creation
body_text: Ability for Subcontractors who are collaborators to create unattached cost items on project. This feature would allow General Contractor to have ability to review, approve, or reject submitted cost items not associated with an RFQ. Once the cost item is approved, the general contractor can either create new PCO or attach to an existing PCO. This would allow sub contractors to submit change orders that are not necessarily associated with RFQs but it informs General Contractor of all open and outs

title: Schedule - filter by custom fields
body_text: It would be very valuable to utilities clients to filter the schedule tasks by custom fields that come in from P6. It would allow teams to filter more easily what they are looking at and responsible for.

title: Possibilty to edit (turn off/on) Stardard fields when creating a new form template
body_text: We need the option to enable or disable standard Fields when creating a new form templates in the Library—such as Due Date, Created By, or Start Date. Specifically, for the Daily Report template, the Due Date field is unnecessary and should be removable, as it’s redundant for a report that is submitted daily. Additionally, it would be helpful to have options to enable/disable or reorder the Attachments and References sections in the report. Since we fill out these reports every day, having contr

title: Form Creating and Editing
body_text: When creating a template for a form, it would be more streamline if I could add a form template to multiple assets and when it attaches to multiple assets it makes copies of the template to each of the assets. Right now it only adds one form across all the assets, its needs to be all different forms for each asset. When Editing a form template, its needs to also update to all open forms that may or may not be attached to an asset. If I change a template it needs to take effect to all of those fo

title: Delete Submittals & RFI's
body_text: It would be nice to be able to delete submittals RFI's that were prematurely generated that are clouding the workflow rather than "VOID"

title: Email responses from non-project members in build for Issues and Submittals
body_text: RFI's can be sent to non-project members via their email. Reponses and attachments from those individuals become part of the RFI. It would be great if that same functionality existed for both issues and Submittals.

title: ACC Server Location
body_text: With the release of the new server locations (e.g. Germany), it is possible for every account admin to change the server location. This also creates a new hub on the respective server. In my opinion, it does not make sense for every account admin to be able to change the server location. This leads to chaos and ACC customers lose the overview of server locations and their projects. It should only be possible to set or adjust the server location for the ACC via manage.autodesk.com.

title: Report limit increase
body_text: Hi all! I work on a project with a large number of documents, and managing them became a very chaleging data analysis task. To do this, my team extracts reports from ACC and use the reports to feed various controls that generates several important KPIs for the team. Recently, however, we discovered that the limit for these reports is 20,000 rows, which has impacted our database. Therefore, I would like to suggest the increase of rows report limit. In an era where we talk a lot about Big Data, AC

title: Subcontractor Database
body_text: I would like a database product that is specific to a general contractor where data could be maintained by the GC such as updates of email addresses, ratings, etc. This would be a separate database and not just a subset of the large database that all GC's share. GC's would however still have access to the large shared database.

title: forms template coly
body_text: we can copy from forms tab but we can't copy from templates. so when i make similar template i have no choice but to make template from the very first. please make copy template function.

title: Ability to mark prior employees as inactive without re-assigning their projects
body_text: The ability to mark old employees as inactive OR remove their profile from the roster without having to re-assign any closed projects that they were the lead on. We'd like to keep the historical data showing what employee worked on a project, but we are forced to re-assign their projects to a different employee if the old-employee profile is deleted.

title: Proposal: Adding Direct Access to Company Member and Project Information from the [Account Admin] - [Company] Screen
body_text: I would like to make a suggestion. Regarding the [Account Admin] - [Company] screen, if it were possible to directly navigate to the details of each company's members and projects, or view them in a list format from this screen, I believe it would greatly enhance usability. Currently, checking information for each company requires navigating through multiple screens. This can significantly reduce work efficiency, especially for those managing multiple companies or needing to quickly grasp the st

title: Add member to multiple projects at once
body_text: Members cannot be added to multiple projects at once. Suggestion: Individuals who are already members of certain projects can grant access to multiple projects simultaneously for a new member by selecting them all at once.

title: Building Connected Project Search
body_text: It would be great to be able to search project-wide in Building Connected for a specific person's name, phone #, etc. I will often remember a person's name but not the company they work for, or I would like to search the project for an unknown phone # I have a missed call from. Other benefits would be being able to pull up a specific person's message and/or document download history, etc. Especially on the fly while on the phone with somebody or in the middle of a meeting. The "search" and "find

title: Meeting PDF Footers
body_text: Need to add the ability in the settings to remove the footers on Meeting PDF exports. These footers are very busy, unsightly, and general do not present professionally in meetings where handouts are required.

title: Remove and update NDA in Building Connected
body_text: If a project was published and a NDA was issued, there is no way of updating the NDA in the event that the NDA is changed or modified. This would be easy to re-issue and when the trade contractors log-in after the new NDA is published, they would need to re-acknowledge the new NDA.

title: Assets - Ability to apply a column view and display order across multiple asset categories
body_text: Problem: It is not sustainable to manage specific views within assets as the list of asset categories and sub-categories grows. Setting up asset views requires users to manually update what columns they see per asset category and sub-category within each individual project. Why is this a problem? Data Integrity - Users miss critical information without manually updating each specific view across all projects Adoption - Reduces user adoption unable to see the value of the workflow without seeing

title: Submittals
body_text: You should be able to change the status of a submittal even if it is voided.

title: Warranty Tab
body_text: Suggestion: Have a warranty tab created for each project (like there is an RFI tab or an Issues tab) so that we can track warranties more efficiently using a custom flow of information/ball-in-court tracker. Having to use the Issues tab makes the issues more convoluted and harder to keep track of warranty versus punch items, etc. All projects have a warranty period so this would be useful across the board.

title: Pop out View Window
body_text: Provide the ability to view sheets, other than the one presently working on, to use as a reference, preferably as a pop out window.

title: adding switch to multiply typical floors
body_text: Good morning, Is there a switch to multiply takeoff for typical floors? Currently, we are copying and pasting graphics or manually adjusting outside of the software.

title: Automatic Permission Setting setup
body_text: Hi, I find it quite challenging to set up permissions individually. It would be very helpful if Autodesk could provide a feature that allows for automatic permission configuration. Ideally, I would like to be able to upload or export a permission matrix in Excel format to Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC), which would then automatically apply the appropriate permission settings. While creating a project template is an option, it is not effective in this case, as each project typically requires d

title: Forms Export
body_text: While working with Autodesk Construction Cloud, I noticed that the current export function does not provide clean page breaks. It would be very helpful to have an option to define proper page separation when exporting documents, especially for longer reports or documentation. Additionally, it would be a great improvement to have "smart fields" that automatically populate project information such as the project number or address, based on the existing project data. This would not only save time b

title: Add notes section at top of Bid Leveling tab
body_text: On the bid leveling tab in Building Connected, it would be helpful to have a box where the primary reviewer for that bid package could add notes for any other secondary reviewers at the top of each bid submission to indicate current status of bid review, or other significant info. This might include things like the following: Incomplete bid - missing miscellaneous metals waiting for updated pricing on steel frames does not have proper certifications used non-approved manufacturer scope review is

title: Add another report logo to project template / change default report logo in the project template to another than the account logo
body_text: We would like to be able to add additional report logos to the project template and set this as the default setting.

title: Placeholder files in ACC Docs
body_text: This would display as a placeholder file which can have an issue raised against it, sent out to an assignee and reported on so the information manager has an idea of what deliverables are overdue.

title: ACC User setting
body_text: Hi, we would like to have that some setting gets stored on the ACC User Profile like Filter option the main page. If users have more than one Account and need to filter always for the same account, they get crazy :-). It would be nice if we can save some setting as default and each time if a user login to ACC this setting is active (see picture below). Regards Michael

title: Close a review with 'multiple reviewers’ in the middle step as a project administrator
body_text: There are to ways to solve our porblem: Could Project Administrators delegate these outstanding reviewers’ action to Project Administrators, even though Project Administrator’s name is not added as one of the reviewers/optional reviewers on the same WF step? Or, Could we have a button (e.g. ‘ Step Closed Out ’ button) only visual and restricted to all ‘Project Administrators’ to close out all the outstanding multiple reviewers’ WF step in one go so that it could be pushed to next reviewers for r

title: Exporting Form Templates
body_text: We would like the option to export all form templates from a project. Currently you can export created forms within a project, but not the templates. This would be a handy feature for our company's use.

title: TradeTapp Main Invitation View - Your Completed Reviews Section
body_text: The main view area under Invitations in TradeTapp has a section that contains all the qualifications you are assigned to at the very top, which is helpful. Once you mark your review finished, they go into the main area that contains all the rest of the applications, which runs into the 100s . It would be so helpful if there was a 3rd section that contained all the invitations a reviewer marked as completed. Due to the effort it takes to complete a financial review, the whole application being ma

title: Issues on Sheets
body_text: I was just exploring the "Issues on Sheets" (Beta) function while printing an issue report. I like the map showing the issue pins with individual labels. However, the plan is much too small to read, especially when printed. we would to print a plan sheet on 18x24 (or larger) with the issue pins and issue number. Having the ability to filter and only show pins for selected issue types would be extremely helpful.

title: Submittal Packages
body_text: Would love to see submittals to have the capability to be sent to the architect as package (covering multiple submittals for a specification). For example per my sectional door specifications, I have a submittal 08 36 13-1 for product data & 08 36 13-2 for shop drawings. My sub sends both of these as one document. Without separating the file, I would like to send one document to the architect for review that covers both of the required submittals listed above. Some how these two sections are lin

title: Notifications for New Projects
body_text: Could I request an option to prevent Notifications from going out when I create a new project and add members. Not all of our members need to be notified when they are added to a project but still want to be added. It bogs down their email. Please and thank you!

title: Published Markups to Show Up When File is Attached to a Form
body_text: Please just make published markups show up when the file is attached to a form. That's it. It seems like it would be super simple code to implement. The packet of documentation I create using a form is what I am supposed to give to my customer. It seems odd that I cannot attach a file with it's published markups to a form. Thanks,

title: Setting same permissions on all forms in library
body_text: It would make life easier if you could set the same permissions for all forms within a library. I feel it would be easier to change a few specific ones which are different and generally permission across forms are similar.

title: OCR in Docs
body_text: t would be an advantage if you could activate OCR in Autodesk Docs in some projects or for some file types. This would allow important attributes to be read from the plan stamps and automatically specified as an attribute in Docs.

title: Submittals no markup from File
body_text: When the contractor created an item in Submittals and added documents from File (Docs) that have markup in them, but that markup wasn’t attached in the documents. (Trying to use ACC as a Smart PDF to sign the e-signature before sending to Submittals.) It would be better if the imported documents from Files had the ability to attach markup within themselves.

title: Comment Function for Specific Versions
body_text: It would be helpful to have the option to add comments directly to a specific version of a document. This would improve traceability of changes and allow targeted feedback on individual versions.

title: Building Connected - Update keywords to 50 division MasterFormat
body_text: It would be helpful to update and expand keywords in the Building Connected Bid Package Information to the current 50 division MasterFormat. This would help us to connect with trade partners who actually perform the scope of work we need.

title: Custom Stamps / Symbols for Commenting PID
body_text: Hi ACC group, I'd like to bring up an Idea for your consideration. In our current method of PID Drawing Review workflow, we do red-line mark-up on PDF and have a 'library' of custom stamps that are in shape of PID Symbols, primarily to show the drafting team what are the required.. this is beneficial for us as we do not need to scribble/draw all the time, the comments looks more neat and organized. what I'm suggesting is the same concept of custom symbols / stamps freely customizable in ACC, ins

title: Rename or change name of Issues tool
body_text: Several clients have expressed interest in renaming the Issues tool in Build (like Tasks in plan grid). Can you come up with a better name, or better yet allow user to create their own custom naming (like in Cost Management).

title: RFI and submittal context menu consistency
body_text: Currently, when right-clicking on an RFI or submittal, there is an option to open them in a new tab. However, this option is located in different positions for RFIs and submittals. On submittals, the "Open in New Tab" button is the first option in the context menu, whereas on RFIs, it is the third option, with "Duplicate RFI" being the first option. This inconsistency creates confusion and can lead to accidental duplication of RFIs. To avoid confusion and create a more consistent user experience

title: File processing
body_text: Hello ACC Team, I would like to propose the addition of a feature that allows users to stop or cancel file processing in ACC Document Management once it has started. Additionally, if a file has not processed within 30 minutes, it would be beneficial for the publisher to receive a notification indicating that the file did not publish and the publisher could also have the option to cancel the ongoing processing and republish the file.

title: Notifications in Schedules and meetings
body_text: It would be nice if the schedules tool and the meetings tool sent an email to project members when a task is assigned to them.

title: Build Submittal Workflow
body_text: It would be beneficial to be able to create/edit a Submittal workflow in a similar way that the RFI workflow w/ coordinator is setup.

title: Add rubber eraser in the mark up function
body_text: Add rubber eraser in the mark up function

title: ASSET viewer in DOCS
body_text: In a model where NOT all the geometry are setup as assets, it is not possible to visualize the entire model geometry when the Asset are "coloured" by their status. but it will be nice to visualize the entire model and the assets coloured by their statuses.

title: Design Collaboration/Folder Permissions
body_text: I would like to propose having the ability to edit the Inherited permissions but only if you want to increase the permission level within Design Collaboration then you would not have to do a workaround to get the permissions needed within Design Collaboration. Currently the folder within Files that a Model is stored in brings over its permissions into Design Collaboration for that Model. That makes sense but what does not work is the fact that the permissions are set to Inherited and greyed out

title: Level filtering for the ACC issues in the model coordination
body_text: For construction purposes, it’s extremely common to need to review issues floor by floor, but the tool doesn’t provide that option, even though all the UI elements are already in place, and the feature does exist for clash tests. I’ve personally reviewed the data within the platform, and it’s interesting to see that the points displayed on screen do contain XYZ coordinates in their internal data. It’s actually quite accessible, using the Z value in combination with the level filters already avai

title: Filters in Forms-ACC Build
body_text: Customization of filters: The filtering options available for forms and reports in ACC Build should be customizable to meet specific user requirements. Currently, it has been observed that filtering by description is not supported, which hinders our ability to effectively sort and identify the desired forms based on their descriptions . This limitation also affects our capacity to generate tailored reports that align with our specific sorting needs. We recommend enhancing the filtering functiona

title: Download complete Submittal Packages including uploaded files as zip archive
body_text: As a submittal manager I would like to download whole submittal packages including the uploaded files as zip file. This should only be the finally closed submittal. Old revisions don't need to be in the zip file. This is in order to hand such a file over to parties without BIM360 access. Also it might be necessary due to contractual reasons to hand over all submittal documents at the end of the project to the client or to archive documents.

title: Group Notification
body_text: I believe it would be a good idea to have the option to add users to groups with different notification frequencies. For example, the same user could receive instant notifications for certain items and also receive a daily notification at the end of the day. This would act as a summary of all the notifications they received throughout the day.

title: Content Catalog to support System Family templates
body_text: Hi, Based on our workflows, specially when starting new projects, it is essential for a cloud repository like Content Catalog to support System Families that would cater to various company templates. We usually store/upload walls, ceilings, floors and wall types that are commonly used to several projects in our Revit template or a Shopping Model (.rfa), but I guess having an option to load these standard system family types directly from Content Catalog, enables our template to be more efficient

title: Prevent create issues on certain documents.
body_text: Anyone can make issues. It would be good if you could prevent certain users from posting issues on certain documents.

title: Allow access to Content Catalog without needing to be added to a project
body_text: In order to access the new Content Catalog, users need to either be an account administrator, standards administrator, or added to a project in ACC. It would be helpful to allow users to be assigned a "Project Member" role (or equivalent) without needing to be assigned to an ACC project for users that need access to the central library of content but are working on more traditional network folder-based projects. It appears the only current solution is to create a "dummy project" to add these use

title: members log report to folder
body_text: Most report exports have been updated with a Save-to-folder location option but the Export from the Project Members list does not have this. It would be very useful to be able to save automatically to a folder location as then it can be used as a project directory and amended with further information and additional 'offline' users. Having to download and re-upload isn't convenient.

title: Sheet Discipline - Remove tie to Sheet Number
body_text: There is zero benefit in having the sheet number tied to the discipline. If you have an electrical drawing E-101 you would have to use discipline labeled E and which you would designate for electrical. If you also have a structural steel erection drawing that is labeled E-01 you can only assign it to discipline E which is electrical. The only way around this is to change the drawing number i.e. ER-01 to allow for a new discipline 'Steel Erection Drawings" to be created. By doing this, the drawin

title: Let User place an existing issue on the current view.
body_text: If I have two or more views, and I put an Issue in a wrong view. Or I have an issue create without view in model. It's much harder to do it well than create a new issue. And constantly switching pages is annoying. Please add this workflow for issues, just like Revit can put a existing room back to view by "create new room" button. As an extension, I also want to be able to move an issue to the same location in another 3D view within the same file.

title: Autodesk User Management portal > export of users with the 'group assignments'
body_text: For Primary and Secundary Admins there is a function to export all Autodesk Users: Please add the Assigned Groups to this export. To analyze and manage assignments to groups it's currently impossible with large accounts of users.

title: ACC user management add 'Valid Until' field on project level to manage access till a certain date
body_text: On ACC project level the product access is defined for Project Members. If there is a Valid Until field that would automatically revoke product access when the date is reached it would be a great feature! This function could be extended with automatic reporting x days in advance to the project administrators and project member. Even automatic extending when a reply has been send from the project member could be a good idea.

title: Home Page Project Wide Search
body_text: We need a Search bar on the project Home page. This would run a project wide search rendering (hyperlinked) results from across the entire project. We should not need to open each module to search the same thing.

title: Review/Workflow template Library
body_text: Requesting to enhance or to add feature wherein we could use a review workflow template under the Account Admin that we could modify the existing template that is been used in the existing projects. It limits the advantage of the workflow if it's only a one time editing of the workflow in the project template, once there a need to change in the created workflow it doesn't follow on the created project. As for me setting a multiple project with the same workflow, it is inconvenient to edit all of

title: Link a Schedule from Docs into the schedule module
body_text: This is the principles of information management. The schedule module shall be able to link, create and update schedule files from Docs, rather than upload the file from a local computer.

title: Budget Sub Items Linked to Schedule Tasks
body_text: Add the ability to link budget sub items to schedule tasks for forecasting. For example, if I have a lump sum budget for Concrete Subcontractor, I would like to add budget sub items that match the schedule, such as slab on grade, paving, curbs, flatwork, etc. Then, I can link those budget sub items to the tasks in the schedule for accurate forecasting.

title: Forms email Notification PDF Needed
body_text: When forms are completed, the email notification needs to have a PDF of the completed form, not just a link to log in to view it. It would be much easier for people who receive the email notification if they can simply open a PDF of the completed form, rather than a link where they have to log in and export it to see it.

title: File Information popup in ACC Viewer to view file meta data (description, date added, etc.)
body_text: Add a 'file information' icon to the top bar of the ACC Viewer, which when opened will display a popup containing the file information. This is a simple addition, which would assist the useability of the platform. Currently we spend a lot of time closing files and reopening to view the related meta data (even such as the description tag which is used for the drawing name, also the date added etc.) Every time the file is closed and the user is returned to the list view it is then sometimes diffic

title: Feature update on ACC Issues & Reviews to make the initiator / creator company members to Access
body_text: Requirements: If the Reviews or Issues are still open & the initiator / creator left the particular organization, as an admin, we should be able to change the Initiator in Reviews & created by in Issues. Since that person's autodesk id will be deactivated, except the admin & tagged people of that review or issue rest of the team members in that project who have member access are not able to see. Also if possible, if a person from a particular company raises an issue or review, the other members

title: Package Reports
body_text: Ok we have the Packages tool, but we can't yet create Reports from it. We need to be able to Export a Report from a Package to create a downloadable list of what drawings are in a Package! At the moment we have to run a dummy Transmittal every time a Package is updated to be able to report what's in the Package.

title: PDF visualization
body_text: Hi everyone. I would like to give the idea of improving the PDF visualization on Docs. We must see the real line thickness and text that will be printed. Also, it is necessary to manage the percentage of zoom in use to know the real size of the elementos.

title: Add File Description to Revit and Autodesk Docs Interface
body_text: Add the File description Column as visible on the web interface to the File open interface within Revit and to the Autodesk Docs folders on the local computers.

title: Display issue list within the sheets/views in mobile app
body_text: Submitting this request on behalf of the EBA customer. You can see the list of issues while opening the sheets/views in the web browser; however, the list of the issues and actual sheets/views are shown in the different screen in mobile app. The customer looks for the list of issues shown while displaying the sheets/views with mobile app as well like the attached image.

title: Docs/Files/Desktop Connector - Folder Icon Customization
body_text: With the new OneDrive update for Windows allowing the change of folder colors within Windows Explorer, I think this functionality would be extremely useful within ACC Docs/Desktop Connector etc. This would allow for additional visual organization within file structures. Screenshot of OneDrive example attached.

title: Fix Markups
body_text: Markups currently are VERY broken. If I comment on V1 of a sheet, the comments should not continue to be shown on subsequent versions of the sheet. We ran it as a trial and by V5 the sheets were unusable due to existing already actioned comments appearing on sheets, no one could tell what was meant to be happening, which comments had been addressed and which were new. If we, as per Autodesk suggestions, unpublish comments they also disappear from previous sheet versions, this means all comment h

title: Project Home Screen Default Sorting and Additional Columns
body_text: Being able to specify and default to the same sorting method each time logging in that ensure the projects are sorted either by number, name, or organization. Adding an additional column with Owner or Alternate Project Number would be great as well. Having an owner or alternate project number compatible with a smart field would be great as well.

title: Revision Attribute in Transmittals
body_text: Hello, A few members of our team who have been using Transmittals frequently have mentioned that the 'Revision' attribute would be beneficial to have included.

title: ACC Messages
body_text: Hello, it would be very useful and important to have a messaging system for users of an ACC project. To avoid emailing groups of users or individual users, to quickly communicate problems, news, miscellaneous about projects, it would be really very useful to have a single or group messaging system (users who will be able to send messages should be ES enabled. PM, BIM Manager, IT...etc.)

title: feature in the ACC Model viewer to toggle on Navisworks hidden items.
body_text: There is an issue with Navisworks document uploaded to ACC, where hidden elements/models cannot be found in the model browser. Attached file with screenshots for reference.

title: Filtering layers and getting visual rezultaal in ACC
body_text: With the switch from BIM360 to ACC, we are missing a frequently used feature to easily filter by layers. (See image attached). And thus see only the filtered layers. This is easy for the users on site, without a thorough training they can very quickly find the desired info. We build our layers in such a way that we can easily filter. Also to surface certain from these shading we miss . We have built our layers so that we can make a quick selection with a few abbreviations. It is mainly a functio

title: Bridge for Design Collaboration // Needs quality control tools
body_text: Introduction Historically in a non-Bridged project the host has excellent control with dictating the structure of the Design Collaboration Teams and Docs folders. This can all be documented in project standards and even in the BIM Execution Plan. But under a Bridged environment, all that quality control has been removed from the project host and reallocated to each party’s own project. It appears that this was a conscious development decision. In Kyle Seyler’s ACC article , he says: With Bridge

title: Enhancement of "View version history" with additional functionality for previous file versions in Autodesk Construction Cloud
body_text: I propose enhancing the "View version history" feature by adding two critical functionalities: "Edit attribute values" for previous file versions : This feature would allow users to modify attributes of past file versions if necessary. This could be useful in cases where errors need correction or when marking a file as archived. Currently, this capability is not available. "Submit for review" for previous file versions : Adding this functionality would ensure that only authorized users can chang

title: Model Coordination // Clash Highlighting // Shouldn't change object visibility
body_text: The Clash Highlighting button in the Model Coordination > Clashes space has now been activated as per the September 2024 Release Notes . The problem is, regardless of whether the button is toggled on or off, it will always hide all elements that are not generating clashing result. This is not good. Consider this. I am viewing a particular space with a few clashes that may all be able to be resolved together. But before doing so, we need to do a little more investigation of the area and with the

title: Add ability to see all reviews across ALL projects.
body_text: We often want to see all "Open" reviews across all projects. It would be nice to have a report (or a Review tab within Account Admin) that shows this rather than comb through every one of our 80+ projects looking for open reviews.

title: Column Width Adjustment Stays while Utilizing Sort Function
body_text: I sort through a lot of data on ACC, especially in the Forms and Files. Frequently I need to change the width of the description column so I can see what I'm working with. Utilizing the drag and drop feature works, but it is incredibly easy to accidentally select the column, causing the data to be resorted.. and the column width to be reset! I do this multiple times a day every day. Please enable a feature to where once the column widths are adjusted, they stay, even when re-sorting the data via

title: Manual Sorting ACC custom fields
body_text: We started extensively utilizing ACC Issues for our model/general coordination and added a few custom fields like internal project numbers with drop downs etc., One feature, we need the most would be to manually sort the custom fields for users as project number keeps getting added and numerical order doesn't work there. The last added project number by default stays the last on the dropdown which is annoying. This looks like an easy feature to add, please look into that.

title: Takeoff NWC/NWD Support
body_text: For projects where IFCs are not the standard deliverable, our required file format for model exports is NWC and NWD. It would be helpful to have the Takeoff module work with NWCs and NWDs directly, especially since those formats are already supported in other modules like Model Coordination.

title: Retain Filter - Sheets
body_text: When filtering submittals, the filter chosen will remain until user clears or changes the filter. This is helpful as different users use the submittals for different reasons. The same logic should be applied to sheets. Many workers in the field are generally looking at a specific discipline of the drawings i.e. structural, electrical, etc. Currently users must reset the filter each time they leave the sheets module.

title: Sheets as a Reference in Forms
body_text: This seems like a basic requirement of build but has not been implamented yet.

title: Assets mapping
body_text: When using a standard configuration of parameters in a Revit file and using the same "custom fields" in tha asset module of ACC, it should be possible to automate this. In that case the mapping should not be done every time when uploading a new version or file.

title: Issues tab - Possibility to pop-up the issue window (resizable) and commute to the next photo
body_text: Hi, It will be great if you can develop the following 2 things related to the Issues tool. 1. The possibly to pop-up the issue detail window, not only to see it in the right corner of the desktop. (a lots of people told me that it will be amazing if they will be able to see a center and resizable window to a specific issue or move it. It will be easier to track) 2. The possibility to commute to the next photo attached to a issue directly from the photos viewer (like on "Photos" tab), without clo

title: Punchlists and Site Observations
body_text: As an architect that does construction administration where a general contractor may not use Build for their CA, it would be extremely helpful to be able to use the punchlist and site observation report capabilities on the designer side.

title: New Form type "Sequential"
body_text: Upon creating a Form in ACC, Can ACC add "SEQUENTIAL FORMAT" in the form beside (Single and Collaborative). This will help us a lot in the monitoring/ observing the assigned person in the section of forms.

title: Reports - Templates for Transmittal and Review Reports
body_text: You can only create Report Templates for Issues and Assigned Items. We need templates for Transmittal Reports and Review Reports.

title: Request for enabling NWD format at Design Collaboration in BIM Collaborate Pro
body_text: As current available formats for Design Collaboration in BIM Collaborate Pro are "RVT", "DWG" and exported IFC from Autodesk software, however, we intended to use Design Collaboration for status control for several disciplines, and several disciplines use several software, that is not only supported format. even through several format files, but they can easily make NWD format, and useful. Please add available formats as NDW files in Design Collaboration.

title: Save submittal markups without submitting response
body_text: We noticed that if you are working on a submittal review, you cannot save it and come back to it later. You have to complete the review and provide a response if you want your markups saved. Some submittals are huge and can take several days review. The only work around right now is to download the submittal and work with it offline until you are ready to re-upload. This is not a great solution. Please provide a feature to save markups within Submittals without formally providing a response unti

title: Require or suggest action in smart PDF forms
body_text: For example, if a given selection is made in a smart PDF dropdown menu, prompt the user to create an issue. Specifically, we have calibration forms which contain too much information (as well as pictures which cannot be added) to use the ACC form builder. A pH meter can report five results on a calibration procedure (+++, ++, +, -, ERROR). The two latter results require a visit from an expert. I'd like this to go through issues rather than different means of communication.

title: Add numbering for Forms in Autodesk Build
body_text: It would be beneficial to implement a categorization system for forms in Build. Currently, all our forms, including WIR, MIR, Safety Reports, etc., are managed in a single location with automatic ID numbering. My suggestion is to introduce a numbering attribute similar to the one used for submittals. This would allow us to assign unique identifiers such as WIR-01, MIR-01, etc., making organization more intuitive. Alternatively, providing the option to categorize forms by template would offer gre

title: 4D timeliner feature in ACC
body_text: Hi, It will be good to have a timeliner feature in ACC since it can be visually appealing to see the 4D timeliner tasks running on the ACC viewer since it has a good visual appearance. Regards,

title: Raster overlay for civil surfaces (aerial photo)
body_text: It would add so much to the coordination views if it was possible to drape an aerial image over the civil surfaces similar to Infraworks. If we do that in civil now on ACC, it doesn´t carry over to the viewer. Would be a great addition. Doesn't even have to be super detailed, even if the image would be dulled down in res would add a lot of useful information to project coordination.

title: Object Visibility Override
body_text: When setting up viewpoints in Navisworks, you can select to "hide/required" saved attributes. When I upload my .nwd to ACC, I can see all the viewpoints I have set up, but it does not remember the "hide/required" saved attributes I have setup for each viewpoint. This is such a useful feature for showing all stakeholders the staging for a project/construction sequencing. Could this feature be included as part of upcoming ACC development?

title: Sorting Issues by "Most Recent"
body_text: It would be beneficial to have the ability to sort Issues by the most "recently created" option. This would allow coordinators to quickly identify when an Issue was created and identify what Issues to follow up on without digging deep into the filters. Also, having that quickly viewable in the Issues dashboard would allow coordinators to quickly sort what Issues are old and which are newer.

title: Start/End date for issue filter
body_text: Having the ability to set just a start or just an end date for the filter on issues. Right now, you have to input both a start and end date in order for the filter to take effect. Sometimes the date I want to pull up to is the current date, but you have to spin back years to go back to the beginning of time. If no start date is chosen, the system should default to "beginning of time."

title: ACC Parameter Service - Select all, edit all, download and share capability
body_text: Hello, In the ACC Parameter Service. There needs funtionality to Select all, edit all, download txt and share capability for the parameters or a collection of parameters.

title: Make the description field Version specific
body_text: The description of a model file or really any file can change from one version to another, but should stay with that version. So my description on version 2 could be, "Initial" and then on Version 5 could be "Design Development", and version 21 could be "Sent to contractor for estimates". And then when you look at the version history of the published files, it should be able to show that description with each version.

title: Add attributes to the Model Coordination tab
body_text: I want the ability to add description for to the model coordination tab. I am working on a project that uses a WBS coding for the naming of the model´s, we use attribute´s to be easily identify what model is what and their status. The model´s already have attribute´s in the doc´s part so why not in the model coor´d part? Thanks

title: Fields in Issues automatically populated with information from model
body_text: Other platforms have this option. If an Issue is added in a model you could have properties mapped into custom fields to be able to more easily fill in the issue. I Norway we often use Contract numbers and Control Zones in models and in other platforms we can use this information directly into issues. It is important to be able to use information from models in all aspects in ACC. We have several model based projects without any drawings/2D elements, and to be able to work with models, good tool

title: Add documents to a question in Forms
body_text: ACC is lacking the ability to add documents/files to a question in forms. This was possible in BIM 360 and is a really necessary feature. Now we can only add Photos/videos, issues or notes.

title: Enhancing File Path Navigation in Transmittals by Updating Moved File Paths
body_text: Hi, When a file is moved, it's 'File Path' does not update in Transmittals, unlike in Reviews where it does. Clicking on the file path still directs to the file, despite the outdated path information. Updating the path information to match the new file location would improve clarity and navigation. Thanks.

title: Option to hide issues outside of section
body_text: When navigating through the model in model coordination, when you are in the issues tab, the view shows all issues in the model. We should have a toggle to hide issues if they are outside of a section or section box. Currently, if you cut a section or apply a section box, all issues are visible, making it virtually impossible to understand the

title: Integrate Navisworks Freedom with ACC
body_text: Currently, the Coordination add-in for Navisworks works only with Navisworks Freedom and Navisworks Simulate. On our larger projects, our users need to be able to open a model locally in order to walk/fly thru it (the web browser whites out and regenerates all the graphics whenever the user moves). Our current workflow is to open Navisworks Manage, use the Coordination add-in to open a Saved View (living in ACC Model Coordination), save an NWD local to the desktop, drag-and-drop that NWD to ACC

title: Add attributes from ACC Web folder to Autodesk Docs folders
body_text: It would be great if we could add all attributes with the ability to check/uncheck if we want to see them with the standard ones shown by default through DC in Autodesk Docs. At a min. we need to start w/ the standard attributes. User, version, modify date, lock status, etc all needs to be synced between ACC Web and Autodesk Docs

title: Compare more than two drawings at once
body_text: The sheet compare feature allows the comparison of 2 drawings. Idea: Overlay more than two drawings in the viewer (eg. compare a mechanical, structural, plumbing and electrical drawing in the same view)

title: Link sheets to Combined Coordination Models
body_text: Problem Description: When merging IFC and Revit files into a single leading coordination model, I use the Model Coordination feature. From this environment, I save the combined model to Docs so that all project members can view it. However, I’m missing two key functionalities: Linking Sheets: It’s currently not possible to link sheets (floor plans, details, etc.) to the combined coordination model. This limits context and makes it difficult to navigate directly from the combined model to relevan

title: Merge Sheet Collections
body_text: We've had instances where, for example, 2 Sheets collections were created but they should've been under one, but there is currently no way to merge them together without having to delete and re-upload. In some cases, it wasn't discovered till too late, and comments were already made on some sheets, so deleting and re-uploading is not an option. Please make this merge possible. We are not able to use the Compare function otherwise.

title: Enable Auto-publish when using Live Linking Workflow
body_text: There should be an option to enable the weekly auto-publish for those using the Live Linking (LL) workflow WITHOUT having to enable Teams in Design Collaboration (DC). Why? We don't need to publish for Share/Consume, BUT we do leverage published models for Model Coordination, for non-Revit users to view/markup/comment in Docs, to share models via Bridge, etc. Problem with creating the Team in DC: If permissions (by company) have been given to folders PRIOR to creating the Team in DC, when you ad

title: Files: Naming convention POST API
body_text: Hi all, Could you please release the POST API for the Files tool's naming convention? It would greatly improve global admin administration for a large number of projects. Rather than spending time manually selecting each of the desired folders, a script could be run to do this from one place. Thanks for your attention to this matter. Bye

title: Make Measurement Markers Transparent
body_text: I have a suggestion with regards to measuring, would be to have the square that is solid be transparent with crosshairs. Other apps have a crosshairs tool that is transparent so you could see where it lined up more accurately. In the Build app, users report the tool being a little clunky as they are not sure where to start their measurement and have difficulty finding it under their finger.

title: Pending Owner Changes - further breakdown needed
body_text: "Pending Owner Changes" in ACC Cost includes two categories - Pre-Submitted and Submitted Owner Changes. Pre-Submitted Owner Changes includes Open Change Events, Open CORs while Submitted Owner Changes includes Submitted COR's, Accepted COR's, and Submitted OCO's. The Revised Budget is the current Owner Contract + all of these pending Owner Change Order Types. There is need to be able to report individually on the groups of Submitted/Accepted Changes: 1-Accepted COR's, 2-Submitted COR's, 3-Submi

title: Issues - Location Details
body_text: When exporting Issues - Summary Detail report, the Location Details field does not appear in the report output. Is it possible to include Location Details (sub-locations/room-level information) as a column in this report? Having Location Details available would provide clearer, more precise location context within each room, report on multiple issues within that may exist within the same location and reduce the need for manual clarification after export.

title: Review grouping workflows
body_text: We want to be be able to make groups/categories for the workflows. Now we have more than 10 review workflows and more will come in the future. Now its already difficult to find the right one from the pull down list.

title: Display Change Order Subitems in Budget Payment Application
body_text: Scenario: Currently, sub-items cannot be added to SOV items once they have been partially claimed. One of our project teams often needs to introduce additional sub-items or further breakdowns even after partial claims have been submitted. As a workaround, we attempted to use Change Order to manage these new sub-items. However, sub-item hierarchies created through Change Order are not reflected or displayed in the Budget Payment Application, which limits their usability during the claim process,

title: Bulk-Add a member to multiple projects in Build
body_text: We would like to share our concern. There have been several times where we need to add newer members to all of our projects and perform that by bulk-adding a member or multiple members to multiple projects. The Bulk Add feature will reduce the amount of time spent manually adding a member or multiple members to multiple projects. It is an inconvenience we would be glad to give up.

title: Retainage amounts in Revised Cost Forecast
body_text: Currently in the Revised Cost screen on budget line items where we have a subcontract with retainage, there retainage is shown as a cost yet to be incurred, even though the work is completed and the costs are accrued. See Below: When Looking at the total Subcontract Amount, the subcontract is billed in full. This creates issues with how our accounting department recognizes revenue. Based on ASC 606 revenue recognition requirements, we recognize revenue based on total work completed, not what has

title: Location - QR Code / BAR Code Improve special caracters
body_text: Hello, When creating location, we can't use special caraters as "space" "_" "-".... directly as qr code / barcode I think it's linked to old technology with barcode With QR code, to have these special caracters is not a problem It will be really usefull and save time. For location, we use the rooms data (number & name) and we always have these caracters &, space, -, _...

title: Issue - Setup different status depending of issues type
body_text: Hello, The list of status is different if it's design issue, quality issue, safety issue... Today for all issues, we have always the same dropdown list, it generates mistakes for the users. It will be great to setup the list of the statut depending of each type of issue.

title: Markups on continuos scroll
body_text: It would be a great plus if we can have markups on continuos scroll on PDFs.

title: ACC Issues Webhooks cannot register when viewpoint/attachment/reference/comment is added/updated/deleted in ACC
body_text: ACC Issues webhooks cannot register when viewpoint/attachment/reference/comment is added/updated/deleted in ACC. Integration partner says, "We cannot create a 2-way sync with ACC while the above events are not registered by ACC's Issues webhooks"

title: Export and Import Do Not Use List
body_text: I manage two separate companies on Building Connected. It would be useful to export one company's Do Not Use List to import it to the other. Additionally, exporting a list would make it easier to use excel's tools to mine that information. Best, Jon Hanlon

title: Insight Builder - Possibility to print the dashboards created with Insight Builder in Build Home Page
body_text: Hello, We create different dashboards with insight builder for issues, forms... it's really good. The sitework team need to create monthly reports for all topics (design, safety, quality...). We can't print dashboards in specific format as A4 direclty in the dashboards published in Build > Home Page We can only print inside Insight Builder. It will be great to add the button print in Build > Home Page

title: RFI Email Reminders
body_text: When an RFI, Submittal, or Issue is overdue, Autodesk should have automatic email reminders sent out to whoever has the ball in their court. Procore has this where an email is sent daily.

title: Automatic Asset Tagging
body_text: Currently assets need to be tagged manually with no way to do it automatically. For light fixtures tagging each fixture can take hours given the size of the project. It would be nice to have a feature that will recgonize assets on a sheet and automatically tag them for tracking.

title: Move the Reviews out of Docs and Place in Build
body_text: I would like to see Reviews moved to the Build side. All my reviews need to be done in a single area. Reviews (internal review, subs, designers) then it can be moved to RFI/Submittals to be sent to the owner.

title: Form Detail Report - Additional Filters
body_text: The form detail report can currently be filtered to a limited set of criteria. Request to add the filters listed below. This enhancement would make the report significantly more useful, as it would enable the export of Form Detail reports for a specific Asset, System, or Asset Category for reporting and handover purposes. Additional filters: Asset Category – Pick from drop-down System – Pick from drop-down Asset name - Free text search (any containing)

title: When advancing to RFQ or SCO, keep the same name as the related PCO
body_text: When a PCO (Potential Change Order) advances to an RFQ (Request for Quotation) or an SCO (Subsequent Change Order), the system should automatically retain the same name as the related PCO. Rationale: Ensures traceability between the PCO and its corresponding RFQ or SCO. Reduces confusion when tracking multiple change orders. Maintains consistency in reporting and documentation.

title: Retain SCO Review Timeline After Workflow Completion
body_text: During the Subcontract Change Order (SCO) review process, Autodesk Construction Cloud displays a review timeline at the top of the record, showing the workflow steps, reviewers, and approval progress. This timeline is very useful for tracking the review status and understanding where the SCO is within the workflow. However, once the SCO workflow is completed, this review timeline is no longer visible. As a result, users lose access to important historical information, such as who reviewed or app

title: Edit PCO type after it's been created/executed
body_text: Currently, once a Potential Change Order (PCO) is executed, it can no longer be edited. This creates a limitation, as change orders often go through multiple rounds of review, clarification, and back-and-forth communication during the approval workflow. In many real project scenarios, additional cost items are identified after the PCO has already been accepted or executed. At present, if a new cost item is added after the PCO has progressed to the Subcontract Change Order (SCO) stage, that cost

title: Drag Drop Opportunities
body_text: Instead of, or in addition to current "add opportunity", there should be the ability to drag drop opportunities into other opportunities to combine.

title: 3d Connection Space mouse integration in ACC model Collaboration
body_text: Support 3Dconnexion SpaceMouse devices for navigation in all ACC web viewers (Docs, Build, Model Coordination) in Chrome and Microsoft Edge.Enable full 6‑DOF navigation (orbit, pan, zoom, roll) from the SpaceMouse cap, matching behavior in Revit/AutoCAD/Fusion.Provide default SpaceMouse profiles plus user‑configurable sensitivity, speed, and axis inversion.Ensure SpaceMouse works in 3D models and, where sensible, in 2D sheets for pan/zoom.Add a simple toggle in the viewer UI to enable/disable Sp

title: Bridge Photos
body_text: Would be nice to be able to bridge photos between two projects. Think of projects that an Owner has ACC and contractor/subcontractor has ACC, would be nice to bridge to prevent duplication of work.

title: Ability to Bulk Tag photos
body_text: To maintain pace with construction schedules, we require the ability to apply tags to multiple photos simultaneously . This capability should be introduced as a bulk tagging feature or a programmatic endpoint to replace the current, inefficient individual editing process. @tushar_nath

title: Form Template - creation - admin
body_text: Hello. It could be great to improve the managment rights for form templates. Today only admin projects can do it. Idea: in admin rights, fot each member, have a tickbox "form template" Different people on project have to be autonomous to create form template (safety manager, quality manager...). Whatever the platform, it is not wise or safe to give admin rights to too many people.

title: TYPICAL FORMATTING IN ACC MEETINGS
body_text: It has become such a burden to log all of our meeting agendas and minutes in ACCs meetings function due to lack of formatting. You need to be able to change TEXT SIZE COLOR FONT HIGHLIGHT BETTER SPACING OPTIONS STOP SHOWING THE UPDATES WHEN YOU PRINT OUT THE PDF VERSION Microsoft word would be a better tool that ACC meetings but because the project is so far along we cannot change now. Please at the very least I am asking to add SIMPLE formatting to Meetings in ACC..... Even this forum has more

title: Create report from all shared links and bridges in one or more projects
body_text: Create a report of all shared links and bridges in one or more projects. Now it's a matter of finding out what data has been shared with external parties and how.

title: Review version compare
body_text: After a document is reviewed and rejected. It would be nice if you have the option to compare 2 file versions within the review itself (with a split view?), so you can see the differences between the versions and you can see the markups created on the older version.

title: 3D Viewer - Cluster feature per category, data...
body_text: It will very usefull to have this feature to quickly sort the 3D elements by data, category... really interesting for estimators for example & for data check I believe we have this feature in BIM 360 and we are using it in Tandem too.

title: Building Connected to Notify Bidders if the Bid Form has been updated after bid submission
body_text: It's frustrating to hear about a revised bid form from the client vs a simple notification from the web site.

title: Print from mobile app
body_text: I know that there are a few posts that mention this functionality in some fashion, but I wanted to make it an overall general request. Please make it possible to easily print from the mobile app. Field staff absolutely need this ASAP, especially from a quality and safety perspective.

title: ACC Review Workflow – Multiple Initiator Role Requirement
body_text: Hi Team, With our projects operating on a 2:1 roster, we require multiple team members to be assigned to the Initiator role within the ACC Review tool. When a comment is sent back to the initiator, it needs to be addressed by whichever team member is currently available in the initiator role, not only the original submitter.

title: Allow a custom field for Status or add one "Approved"
body_text: The status fields have a "Not Approved" status but should in turn have an "Approved" status. There is currently no ability to add a custom field to statuses in ACC Issues. I would like Approved to be added or the ability to add it myself.

title: Blanks on Specifications
body_text: After assigning all the spec pages to where they belong, if there are blank pages left over, allow a function to just delete all the blank pages instead of having to assign them to a fake spec and delete them after the fact.

title: Require Issue Resolution Before Form Closure
body_text: There needs the ability to prevent certain forms from being closed when they contain open issues. For high-risk or quality-critical Scopes of Work, allowing forms to close while issues remain open creates risk and reduces accountability. Adding an option that requires all issues to be resolved before a form can be closed would ensure higher-quality inspections, better compliance, and more accurate workflow control.

title: Model Coordination and DOCS: DWG support with text information
body_text: At the moment it is not possible to show the DWG in the ACC model coordination and DOCS with text information. As long as BIM is not full implemented in government workflows it would be very helpful to have a bridge solution for that. Also for the design team that would be helpful in meetings. Please find a solution to display also the text information like in the example of an other CDE solutions. See pictures below.

title: Implement Webhooks for Project changes
body_text: Currently it's not possible to detect changes to projects' status or details via webhook events, requiring active polling of the API to achieve this task which is not always viable in the 2rd party application. Webhook events for project changes would provide a better and more precise experience for integrations.

title: Forms
body_text: I’d like to request two enhancements to the forms functionality: Allow in-progress forms to be edited like templates. Right now, if we need to adjust a form that’s already in progress, we’re forced to modify the template and then create a new form. This is time-consuming and inconvenient when only minor tweaks are needed. Allow the Form ID # to be edited. People sometimes make mistakes or need to revise forms after they’re created. When we’re required to create a new form instead of editing the

title: Trade Partner Phone Number Entry Field
body_text: When adding trade partners to a project, there is no option for the project team to enter their phone numbers. Only trade partners themselves can add this information. Because many trade partners do not complete this step, key contact details are often missing. This creates communication gaps in the field and forces superintendents to spend extra time tracking down phone numbers, pulling them away from higher-priority responsibilities.

title: Locations: Need Ability to Use Spaces, Not Rooms
body_text: Current workflow for creating "Locations" is tied to architect-generated "Rooms," which are often inaccurate, inconsistently named, and frequently revised throughout design. This creates a static location list that must be manually updated every time room names or numbers change, causing significant rework and coordination issues.
