Enabling Location creation directly from Spaces, rather than Rooms, would greatly improve efficiency, reduce manual cleanup, and provide a more dependable workflow for

title: Model Coordination Issues // Pin the element to the Model - Not the Published View
body_text: I've said it before on this forum, and I'll say it again. The premise of using Revit Published Views in Model Coordination is flawed. In this instance, the flaw is when creating and reviewing Issues. Because Model Coordination treats Revit Published Views as unique 'Models' (that's ACC terminology, not mine), elements that are found across multiple Revit Published Views from the same Revit model are also considered as unique. e.g. A Revit model may contain three Published Views: 'All Levels', 'L

title: Transmittal: modify / add address to transmittal already made.
body_text: Once a transmittal has been made to a person, it is impossible to add a recipient / role / company.

title: Review Workflow - column to see who create / update the setup
body_text: In the review workflow setup, we don't see who creates and update the workflow. It could be great to have this information.

title: Photos in Build
body_text: Delete multiple photos on the fly: Currently, you have to open photos one by one to delete them. Auto Tag (Beta): Great feature, but in some cases it creates a mix of English and French tags (e.g., “doors” + “openings”). Google Issue: The 3D satellite view may differ from the 2D view because they were captured in different years.

title: Markup - bad warning "selected markup is deleted"
body_text: Users regularly receive an error message on markups : "selected markup is deleted". This message is not understood because markups are not deleted and no action done by users.

title: Give us possibility to share templates from different HUB
body_text: To better share knowledge and standards, we should enable the ability to import, export, and share templates from one hub to another.

title: Expiration date of user licenses
body_text: Enable the option to automatically delete inactive users (access from the project and licenses) that are inactive for a certain moment (example : 1 year)

title: Make it possible to duplicate a Review Auto-trigger
body_text: We create 100+ Review Auto-triggers per project and would request the ability to duplicate an existing review auto-trigger, like you can with a review etc. Currently each Review Auto-trigger has to manually be set up from scratch, which is taking a lot of time and duplicates a lot of information which opens up the process to errors. I would also like to request more options within the view window where you have an overview of all of the review auto-triggers. Instead of just being able to filter

title: Create Saved Searches and Saved Filters for Every Function in Build
body_text: Just like the Sheets search already does, please create the ability to save searches and save filters for every other function in Build. One example of this hassle is for filtering RFIs. I should not have to filter out closed issues every time I go back to that screen. Provide the ability to save a filter for easy navigation.

title: Submittal - Bulk attachment download (in review process)
body_text: I am aware of the current submittal limitation whereby, during the review process, we are unable to download attachments in bulk. We must download each document manually, which is highly inefficient, especially when there are more than 20 documents uploaded. Please consider enhancing this feature to improve ease of use and support smoother project workflows in ACC.

title: Enable total review deadline with internal time allocation per step
body_text: Currently, the due dates configured for each step within a Review workflows operate independently, which creates inconsistencies with the overall contractual deadline for the review. For example, if the contract specifies that the entire review must be completed within 5 days, one might configure Step 1 with a 2-day deadline and Step 2 with a 3-day deadline, adding up to the required 5 days. However, in practice this does not work as expected . If the reviewer in Step 1 completes their task in 1

title: Review - Rename the function "Delegate Review"
body_text: The “Delegate Review” function currently allows releasing the review initiated by the actual key reviewer (not the delegate). It would be better to rename “Delegate” to “Release” for clarity. Additionally, it would be more user-friendly to have a new button labeled “Delegate Review” next to the key reviewer list.

title: Design - Coordination - Improve Template/Transfer - Save View filter Rules
body_text: In different projects, for design/construction coordination, we are setting up the same views / rules to have better way to manage the coordination. Specific views with rules to check vertical elements between architectural and structural models, and other views for coordinating architectural doors with the structural model. It would be extremely helpful to save these rules and views within an ACC template or have the ability to transfer this setup between projects.

title: 3D Viewer - To drag/resize the panel
body_text: The names of the files are often long and we can't see the global name of each file in the viewer and we can resize it.

title: Data Connector - Loss of history extraction
body_text: Please check the screenshot. The automatic extraction was set up a few weeks ago, but it stopped during July (after July 16) without any notification. When we logged into ACC today, we noticed that the history is missing, we don't have all history (in mails we have the automatic notification).

title: Including Change Order or Cost Review Responses in the Activity Log of Corresponding Item
body_text: As a project admin, we can always check the activity logs related to a change order's or cost's review response in the Settings tab > Activity. I have attached an example screenshot. Unfortunately the same type of response activity does not gets captured when users with "Full visibility" open the change order or cost (panel on the right hand side) and check the activity log. I would like to request that the response logs to also be included and made visible to users who have "Full visibility" in

title: Specs - Approve Ergonomic to manage Section & Section Details
body_text: We are using specification features to load contractual documents for a french project. In France (as other countries), we don't use format as CSI, UniFormat... for the documents so we choose "Other". It generates automatically section details but it's often wrong, so we have to remove & recreate section details. To remove, we have to remove 1 by 1 all section detail, it would be better to have a checkbox and possibility to select multiple section details. It is not possible to quickly affect mu

title: Insight Builder - Manage permission
body_text: To give access to dashboard to project team, it could be really better to give permission by role & company. Today it's by member, 1 by 1, too long to give access to 30 people.

title: Insight Builder - Add a card in insight to view dashboards created in Insight Builder
body_text: Improve Ergonomic, it could be better to have a direct link to dashboards created in Insight Builder. Maybe have a possibility to create a card in Insight to view Insight Builder Dashboard.

title: Add Issue Reference Number option to Issue Pin Locations
body_text: We want to be able to use Issues for tracking Risks across the scheme and print out drawings of where they are physically located using the Issue Pin locations, however this is not possible as the Pins do not contain the Issue Reference Number making it impossible to tie them back to the right issues from the register. It would be great to have this as an option within the settings. Some issue types I want to identify through their Number, some through name. Some through different colours etc. I

title: Reviews - Saved Layout for Attributes
body_text: At the moment when you change the layout of your attributes in reviews, it goes back to default after the new review. Can we have a setting where we can change the default layout for reviews.

title: Allow for licensing history
body_text: We have multiple Admins that can edit licenses for our users, but no way of tracking of who assigned someone a license, or more importantly, who removed a license from a user. If a users Build license has been toggled off for example, we cannot find out who did it or when. We would like more transparency on the CDE administration side, the ability to see who has done what and when. We would like a section similar to 'project activity' but for the CDE management in general, not for an individual

title: filepath on the upper
body_text: Hi, It would be very useful to display the file path in the tree structure at the top, as in AutoCAD or Revit.

title: Can't click links in PDF continuous scroll
body_text: Please make the links in PDFs active when in continuous scroll.

title: ACC Data Connector: include Models information in exports
body_text: The ACC Data Connector aloow us to download the assets structure and assets containers . But information about the linked models is missing, we just get their model_lineage_urn out. --> Please include the models information (name, version, path...) in the ACC Data Connector exports.

title: Formatting headings in meeting minutes
body_text: It would be good to be able to adjust the font size of the topics or the elements below them. Currently, the topics are very small and it is difficult to see when a new topic begins. The printout of the meeting minutes is very confusing. Either it should be adjusted so that the hierarchies in the minutes are differentiated according to size, or there should be an option to adjust the formatting yourself. In their current form, the meeting minutes are very confusing. I have attached a screenshot

title: Engineering Change Order with no Budget
body_text: Currently, change orders are managed through Cost Management and are heavily focused on budget and timeline implications. Our team uses change orders during our design stage, before they have budget implications, to track requirement or design basis changes. Our company has multiple subteams that act as stakeholders for projects in other teams, meaning that before we create a budget or schedule, we are locking down requirements from all the stakeholders. Sometimes these have to change either bec

title: Shape size follows instance property
body_text: It would be great if one could make one Takeoff Type that is for Spread Footings and then another for Continuous Footings, and let the variation in width be set by each instance. This is possible now, but it would be nice if visually the instance appearance would be set by the width property of that instance, so one would be able to see on the page that the instances to align with the specific footings be called out. Right now, all the line sizes are set for the entire takeoff type, and appear t

title: NOTIFICATIONS - DO NOT HAVE YOUR ACTION IS REQUIRED ON EVERY NOTIFICATION
body_text: Why do people who are watchers get notifications that say your action is required. This is causing no end to confusion, and we are wasting our time explaining to our people, and others. Can't you have watchers receive a different email title, or is the system not sophisticated enough?

title: Version Comparison
body_text: Comparison of more than one sheet at a time.

title: Add multiple assets to an Asset system
body_text: We have to select objects one by one as the select all box do not seems to work, make sure it selects ALL assets matching the filter, not only the one visible in the window. The “Load more” at the bottom gives the impression. It will only select the visible ones.

title: Interface BIM Collaborate - Structuration
body_text: When we create a package a BIM collaborate, we have often a lot of files. The interface is really not user friendly. We can not enlarge the content Brower (nightmare to tick the files because the files name are not short). We don t see the folders tree, all the files are mixed (including subfolders). We have to click save and after click share to validate the package. Why 2 buttons ?

title: Team and Folder Management between WIP and Shared
body_text: We are using team with collaborate and we create to package to share files between WIP folder and shared folder. In team folder in WIP, we need to have different subfolders. When we create package with collaborate, all documents are copy past in shared but without folder structuration.

title: Forms filtering remember
body_text: Recent changes have stopped us being able to filter forms select and approve one and simply hit back in the browser to return to filtered lists. We now have to go looking again many times repeatedly, again incurring waste of time and resources. g.allaouis@equans.fr

title: RFI due date
body_text: We should have the option to specify the Due date in calendar days OR working days, as it is possible for review. The functionality is unusable right now as it is only calendar days.

title: Review : 2D Markups
body_text: We should be able to add 2D markups in an Issue (as we can in 3D). Currently we have to choose between using Issues (with no markups but that can be extracted and tracked) or 2D markups (that we cannot track or comment but that gives context regarding the comment provided).

title: Rearrange/filter Comments (latest update on top)
body_text: It would be better if the latest update were visible at the top rather than at the bottom. Currently, you always have to scroll down to see the latest update. Optionally, consider adding the possibility to reorder or add filters.

title: Visualization of forms positions on drawings
body_text: QA / QC: visualization of forms on drawings. For site QA/QC, inspection forms, etc., if we compare with the solutions used by BBI (SnagR, Novade, Dalux, Fieldview, etc.), we can visualize the position of forms (task, inspection, control, exits, etc.) on plans. Currently, the only data that can be visualized on ACC plans are the exits. To enable this, a process linking issues to forms would be required. The goal is to display the location of forms directly on the plans.

title: Issues process: Issues process not so easy to set up
body_text: Issues process: Issues process not so easy to set up if you want to give each stakeholder identical access to the issues, requires regular training of stakeholders to explain the process adapted to their needs. Issues are accessible in several different places (docs, design collaboration, design coordination, build). Depending on where you create the issue (Revit model, plan, view created in model coordination...), the link to the viewpoint will be different if you open the issue from the issues

title: Process Review / Markup / Issues
body_text: The process proposed by Autodesk to mix markups with issues is a solution. However, these are 2 parallel functions, with no links between issues / markups and review. How do you know that issues 25, 3 and 42 correspond to review X? Idea 1: Manage markup rights independently of folder rights (as for issues), make markups linked to a review visible only at the end of the review.

title: Issues in Revit - Issues created with a section plan or section box
body_text: When some section plans / boxes are created in ACC and the issues are created with these viewpoint. In Revit, we don't have the same visibility with section plan / section box. (In Navisworks, it's works fine).

title: Design Coordination - Issue with Clash
body_text: When an issue is created linked to a clash in design coordination, we need to improve the process in ACC to detect the clash disappears, the status has to change or we want an automatic notification.

title: Review - metadata stamp
body_text: Today the stamp is considered as a markup. It could be interesting to have a specific metadata "Stamped" as "review status".

title: Design Coordination - Manage Rights by Coordination Space
body_text: For all projects, we need different coordination space. It could be really useful to manage the rights by user / company / role for each coordination space.

title: Creation of QR Code
body_text: On location and assets, we have the possibility to link the reference to QR code. The actual process impose to export/import excel and use a external tool to add the QR code. It would be great to be able to create them directly on ACC.

title: Error date assets in multiselection
body_text: ACC informs the date of the previous day when we use multi-selection.

title: IFC color misinterpreted in forge viewer
body_text: Lot of bugs with color of IFC files. Blocking regarding Assets use (status by color) also problematic when using models to do color spotting (4D planning, info spotting ...). This is a very basic functionality that needs to be fixed urgently!

title: Asset progress and timesheet
body_text: The timesheet information is not retained, and there are errors when transferring data to new objects.

title: IFC exports/conversions from ACC
body_text: Being able to launch IFC exports remotely would be extremely useful and time saving. Same way, being able to convert IFC files to revit files from acc would be a huge time saver ("link IFC" operation in revit which generates a .ifc.RVT) These operations are increasingly time-consuming and take up workstations for nothing.

title: Review - Transmittal at the end of review
body_text: When a review is closed, only the guys who creates review and approve can see the reviews. Inside the closed review, we can do a transmittal. It will be great in the setup of the workflow to have a checkbox to activate the transmittal at the end of the review to shared the reviews with other guys not implicated inside the review. (we can do it with other solution).

title: Filter by types the issue on the map
body_text: Get the possibility to filter by types the issues which are on the map.

title: Issue - To see the issues in 2D & 3D
body_text: The issues are linked to the view. On ACC, if we are doing issues in sheets inside Revit models, we need to see it in 3D, On ACC, if we are doing issues in 3D, we want to see it in 2D drawings too.

title: Prevent Subs from Being Able to Bill for Unexecuted SCOs
body_text: A setting needs to be added that will prevent Subcontractors from being able to bill for unexecuted SCOs. Currently, if a SCO is in a "Sent" status it will automatically be added to the Sub Pay Application or they can select it and add it in. Subs should not be allowed to bill for an SCO unless it has an executed status. If that SCO has to be changed and it is already in a sub billing then it becomes tedious to have to revert back to detach it especially if integrated with the ERP.

title: Efficiency. Not wasting customers time in Forms Feature: Ability to Download All documents within a Form with 1 click.
body_text: Problem: Wasting enormous amounts of time [~4 times longer to download 1 form]. Solution: Ability to automatically attach all docs into the form download with 1 click - Run Report. Currently: It is NOT possible to download ALL the PDF docs with 1 click [Run Report], Files, Forms, RFI, Submittal, Issues, Sheets, Photos, etc. The only docs that automatically attach are [Files]. There are links to all toggled docs that a person must click on each to download separately, THEN open all downloads in B

title: ProEst Feature Requests
body_text: The ability to add more than 2 groupings in an estimate. We would like to sometimes be able to group by Bid Number, Building Number, Phase, etc. These would help our estimators achieve the views they need to see in their Estimates without having to go through making a Report.

title: ACC Open/Closed Transmittal Status
body_text: I frequently assist with document control and submissions on several projects. In these cases, my team typically sends drawings or reports in PDF format via a transmittal that need to be sent to the client. When I receive a transmittal and have viewed and downloaded the attached documents, I’d like the option to mark it as “Closed”. This would function similarly to the Open/Closed status column used in Reviews, where a transmittal remains “Open” until all actions have been completed.

title: Inputting issues during continuous scrolling
body_text: Please enable the ability to add comments in continuous scroll mode. For PDF files with many pages, switching to continuous scroll mode is necessary, but annotations cannot be added in that state. Opening each page individually to enter annotations takes too much time, so ultimately the only option is to download the source file, add annotations separately, and then upload the PDF.

title: Include Change Order Cost Item "Type" attribute on Data Connector
body_text: I am developing a Power BI dashboard for change orders. We need the “Type” field available as a chart legend, but it is currently not included in the ACC Data Connector extraction.

title: Feature Request: Export-Locked Reviews for Documentation
body_text: Hi, I would like to request a feature that allows us to lock the content of a Review when exporting it. Besides we need E-Signature feature which is currently available in the Cost Management module in ACC. It is essential for us to export Reviews in a locked format because we need to submit them to the client's platform as part of the documentation for as-built records. Ensuring the content remains unchanged after export is critical for compliance and traceability. Is it possible to implement t

title: Option to add more recipients to both open and closed review as watchers
body_text: Including an option to add additional recipients to both open and closed reviews would be very helpful.

title: RFI
body_text: The status when creating RFI defaults to "Open for Reviewers". We require our RFIs to be "Open for Managers". Even when defined in a workflow it always reverts to "Open for Reviewers". We would like the ability to make "Open for Managers" the default setting in our template (or at least no default (blank) as users are not changing it to the correct setting). Alternatively use the setting in the workflow i.e. "Open for Managers".

title: Meetings - Add Subtopics into the different topics
body_text: It would be good to have sub topics. For example - 1. Topic then be able to do 1.1.1 and 1.1.2 then 1.2.1 and 1.2.2 Some Items have multiple discussion items that may need to be tracked.

title: Simultaneous Submittals Review Needed
body_text: Simultaneous commenting would improve efficiency during reviews. What tools or features are available to enable real-time collaboration among multiple reviewers on a single document during a submittal workflow "One step"? Please assist as this is very important.

title: Enhancement – Option to Add Multiple Logos in Autodesk ACC Meetings
body_text: We would like to propose an enhancement for the Autodesk ACC Meetings module. Currently, it is only possible to display one logo in meeting templates or exported reports, and there is no option to manage attendees by company. In collaborative projects involving multiple stakeholders (owners, contractors, consultants, subcontractors, etc.), it is essential to customize meetings to reflect the real structure of the project team. We suggest adding the following features: Ability to upload and displ

title: Read-Only option in Trade Tapp
body_text: We would like a READ ONLY option so that we can have more users in the system and not have to worry that they will make changes to anything like the Basic access allows, (put notes in, upload documents, push reminders, change questionnaires, etc) We would want to also be able to limit what tabs they can see. For instance, are they allowed to see the financial tab and all the documents uploaded. These documents contain sensitive information that we do not allow everyone to view. So we need to be

title: ACC Assets & Systems Notifications
body_text: Currently, ACC Assets only allows users to see notifications if Assets are imported or exported. No notifications if someone updates an Asset Status, adds reference files, raise issues or completes an attached Form. Even if we don't have real-time notifications, a daily report would be great.

title: Feature Request – Display Role Information for Photo Captions in Issue Detail Report
body_text: I would like to request an enhancement for the Issues Detail Report in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC). Currently, when exporting the issue detail report, the photos showing the member’s name and the timestamp of when the photo was taken. However, if the photo was taken by a member assigned under a specific role , the report does not display which role they belong to. It would be very helpful if the exported report could also include the role information of the member who took the photo. This

title: Feature Request – Ability to Reuse Deleted Submittal Package ID Numbers
body_text: I would like to request a feature enhancement for the Submittal tool in Autodesk Construction Cloud. Currently, when a submittal package is deleted and a new one is created, the system automatically assigns the next sequential ID number and does not allow users to reuse the deleted ID. For example, if the previous package ID was 04 , after deletion, the new package is automatically assigned 05 , even if users wish to retain 04 . It would be very helpful if the system allowed users to manually ed

title: Customizable Workflow for RFIs (Similar to Submittals)
body_text: Hi Autodesk, I’d like to share some feedback regarding the RFI module in ACC. Although it currently provides two predefined workflows, these workflows are fixed and not customizable , which is quite disappointing for many users. The issue is that the RFI process in real projects is often more complex than just “Main Contractor → Consultant → Response.” In many cases, it involves multiple reviewers , additional steps , or even the need to change the reviewer midway due to project dynamics. Unfort

title: Ability to add multiple custom field filters for 'Issue Status Summary' reports
body_text: At present, it is not possible to apply multiple custom field filters to the 'Issue Status Summary' reports, unlike other report types. It would be beneficial to have the capability to configure custom filters within the 'Issue Status Summary' report layout. This functionality is particularly valuable when managing large-scale projects involving numerous consultants and subcontractors collaborating on a centralized platform to monitor statistics and relevant metrics.

title: Larger "Interface" for Issues
body_text: Currently, on the web version, the Issue Pane interface only occupies approximately 20% of the screen on the right-hand side. Would it be possible to expand this pane to provide a larger workspace for working on issues and reviewing the relevant information more effectively?

title: Cost Management - Internal  vs External Custom Attributes
body_text: Please provide the option to enable certain Cost Management custom attributes to be accessible for external users (users with Collaborate permissions). Use case: allow for someone submitting a cost pay application to enter the joint check payee information directly against the cost pay application.

title: Redirect Form Reviewers to specific users
body_text: when users are submitting forms we have specific roles in the Reviewer section of the from template however unlike the Reviews tool in Docs you can not target the notification to a particular user meaning all users with that role get notified my example is we have an ACC project with multiple projects in it and each has a project manager, then someone is summitting the form that needs PM approval all the PMs in the ACC project get notified but only one should have been because its for there proj

title: Make Folder Description Field visible at root folder structure, even when "Project Files" has no permissions..
body_text: When setting up folders, not everyone has access to view all folders, so "Project Files" Permissions are set to none. People who don't have at least view permissions are unable to click Project Files, so the folder cannot be selected and descriptions do not appear at the root level. Please make the Project Files root folder selectable, and default the view to open the "Project Files" folder so all root descriptions are available.

title: Make Building Connected Pro available to EMEA
body_text: Building Connected Pro is currently only available in the US Region Hub - please make Autodesk products available in all regions.

title: Sticky filters and ctrl + click for forms
body_text: Currently when using the forms tool, every time an in progress form is opened and action taken on it, when the user goes back to the main page of the tool, it defaults the user back to the top of page one, and removes the filters applied. This creates a massive time constraint if the user is on say page 14 reviewing a form. There are a couple ways to address this, sticky filters when going back to the forms main page, and the ability to utilize the control + click shortcut (like in sheets) to be

title: Content Catalog Preview images
body_text: There is a need to have the ability to select multiple images for a family preview while uploading them on CC. At the moment when editing individual families, the preview images can only be uploaded one by one. Also, when there are empty slots in the images, there should be a way to uploading by clicking there. It would be much faster and intuitive.

title: Sync between Build Specifications and AutoSpecs
body_text: would be ideal if upload between Build Specification module and AutoSpecs can be connected. Reflect changes to uploads from both end would help with consistency and reduce redundant work.

title: Option to attach temporary reference files while initiating a review
body_text: When initiating the review process, it would be beneficial to include an option that allows users to attach temporary files. These files can serve as reference material or supplementary information, supporting reviewers in understanding the context or details of the documents under review, without affecting the official record or final deliverables.

title: Enforcing a naming convention for Transmittals
body_text: Enforcing a naming convention for transmittals will help ensure consistency in the naming pattern.

title: To automate the “Extract Pages and Attributes” feature
body_text: To automate the “Extract Pages and Attributes” feature so that it populates the description, revision, and file name automatically. This functionality can also support QA/QC checks performed by the document controller.

title: Extracting data older than 1 year via the Data Connector
body_text: Please give users the ability to export all of their data through the Data Connector, not only the last 12 months' worth. Projects often last years and not being able to export the entire history is detrimental. Secondly, please improve on the export options, the current maximum of one month's worth of data at a time is too limiting, a suggestion would be to allow up to a year at a time, and if file size is an issue, have the data connector share the approximate size of the exported file as a pr

title: Insight Builder - Admin project data set needs a value for "project_business units"
body_text: There is a current dataset called "admin-projects (v1)" within Insight Builder. There is a field for "project_type", but I do not see a field for "project_business_units". Business Units is now part of the selection process when filling out information for a new project. It would be very helpful to be able to make a pie chart from this value.

title: Set range of photographs when exporting Issues PDF report
body_text: We utilize Issues to track our projects and use photographs to document progress on a weekly basis. At the end of the week, we run a PDF report to include the photographs for each Issue, which are usually tied to each room or major area throughout the site. It would be beneficial to have a feature where we can set a range of photos to limit the number of photographs that get published when a report is ran. For example, if an item is used to track progress over the span of 25 weeks, there would b

title: As-Built 5,000 Photo Limit
body_text: There should be a higher limit for exporting photos in the as-built than just 5,000 photos. My projects last a year plus and average 10,000 photos per project near the end. A 15,000-20,000 photo limit is much more reasonable.

title: Conditional Formatting - Forms
body_text: I would love to see the functionality of conditional formatting be improved. I think it would be really helpful to be able to tie questions together. For example: If a specific control is not required (shoring, hot/cold weather controls, etc.) I should be able to select no or N/A and then the follow up questions for that control should go away and not be a part of that form. This would make it so final forms would have less information and would be a little more user friendly for filling out in

title: Original upload date attribute
body_text: Can you please create additional attribute on the system to automatically displays the original file upload date without manual entry. The system is capable of doing this, but for some reason this attribute is not included as part of the Files view settings. As at the moment only "Last updated" attribute is displaying the date of the file in the folder, but if changes to revision or attribute are made, as an example, the "last updated" date is also updating.

title: Cost - Change Order Type need the ability to set a default for scope of the PCO.
body_text: As a company, we only want to use the Internal (INT) change order types for "In-Scope" PCO's, that bypass the OCO process. If we would be able to select a default Scope for a Change Order type in the settings and templates, this would elevate our PM's from using Internal (Int) PCO's for other Scope types.

title: Make File Path visible in References
body_text: After adding a reference, only the name of the document is visible. Add a pop-up window or a description of the file path. This helps to identify the source of the reference.

title: Automatic Reminder emails
body_text: It would be nice to be able to set up automatic reminder emails in the system to automatically remind people of approaching bid date, or to replay to an invite and then also that their bid is due or past due please submit. This was something we were able to do in Procore and would be a nice feature in Building Connected

title: Version to be replaced with revision
body_text: Idea for version to be replaced with revision. Since version does not equal revision and since revision is a very important element (while version is not important), revision should be displayed in ACC, without needing to open the document to see what it is. It is very confusing to see V5 for a document in revision 01 for example. An idea how this could may be working for single uploading would be that each time you want to upload a higher revision to be asked if this is a version (for example y

title: Add "ACC (Forma) disruption" notification to Forma Connected Products
body_text: When ACC goes down, we can get an email that it's down. Instead of random loading bloopers, broadcast on a secondary channel ACC status that Forma connected clients can see and pull a fail message from. If it's down, and a user is trying to access ACC services, they should get a popup to the effect of "ACC is experiencing a disruption, please see health.autodesk.com for additional details." This would get the outage information infront of all users as quickly as possible instead of asking their

title: Alternate file names for Transmittals
body_text: We regularly use Transmittals when submitting documentation to external parties, such as clients. Their file naming conventions often differ significantly from our internal conventions, forcing us to save separate copies of files we plan to transmit according to the client's convention. This results in unnecessary copies of files and is tedious. The option to provide an alternate name for files would solve this. The alternate name could be in the form of a custom attribute, similar to the curren

title: Download of sheets
body_text: I am inquiring on the downloading of sheets in Autodesk. I know that our office has requested this previously and I would have to think that other companies might have as well. When I closeout a project to get the asbuilt or red lined drawings to provide the owner, there is no option to download sheets individually, if you will. The download comes in as 1 pdf file, vs individual sheets. The download coming in as 1 pdf file is not a problem, however, they are not named or identified as their resp

title: GPS Tagging of Photos in Forms
body_text: Dear Autodesk Team, As a frequent user of Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC), I’d like to request a feature enhancement that would significantly improve field documentation and traceability for site activities. Feature Request: Enable GPS metadata capture and export for forms and embedded photos within forms. Current Limitation: While ACC allows GPS data to be included in photo reports, this functionality is missing when photos are embedded within forms. This gap limits our ability to accurately

title: Add Template Create/Update in ACC Forms API
body_text: Hi Autodesk Team, I’m working with the Forms API — everything works very well: creating forms, updating values, etc. But one missing piece is the ability to create or modify form templates via API. It feels like the final piece of the puzzle — without template control we can’t automate template evolution. Adding endpoints such as POST /form-templates and PATCH /form-templates/{id} (or similar) would complete the CRUD experience and enable better automation. Thanks for considering it!

title: ACC Model coordination landing page configuration - Models and Views tabs
body_text: Currently, the landing page defaults to the the models tab. This would be ok if the project only has a few models. But for large projects, it would be far more intuative to configure Model Coordination in a way that the view tab is the default landing page for users.

title: Upgrade ACC permission management to include individual files and file versions - ISO 19650
body_text: In the context of ISO 19650, the current method of managing permissions relies on assigning access permissions to folders that simulate states such as WIP, SHARED, PUBLISHED, and ARCHIVED. This approach results in multiple copies of the same file across different folders, leading to inefficiencies and potential confusion and errors. A more effective solution would be to enable permission management at the individual file level, including specific versions of each file. These versions could be li

title: The filter tool for packages needs more features
body_text: Currently it is very difficult to try and find a package. The filter tool needs to be improved. Currently, users are only able to filter packages in the timeline by Active team's models, or other teams' models or Hide models. The feedback I get is that it is almost impossible for a team to search for a package when there are a significant number of packages or over a long time frame. The filter needs to include date range, keywords, user names, file names, consumed by, packaged by, suitability c

title: Adding new clashes to existing clash issues
body_text: It would be very helpful if new/additional clashes can be added to existing clash issues. 1) Either a new clash comes up that need to be included in an existing clash 2) A clash might be been missed when grouping clashes to a issue Either way this would reduce the number of new issues created relating to the same clash group, and much easier to track.

title: Build - Photos map like Google Photos
body_text: It is super useful to have the photo locations display on the map, but it is still cumbersome to find the photo you are looking for as one has to click through the icons to get the photos to display and some icons might contain 20 or 45 or whatever photos. Could you make this feature work similar to Google Photos or iCould Photos where when you zoom in to an area, the photos that are in that area dynamically update and you can scroll through those photos and change the zoom if needed. It might o

title: Account Administrator - Improved Access to All Build Projects
body_text: Account Administrators should not have to join each individual project in order to assist project teams with help. All "Account Administrators" should be able to access a "BUILD" project without actually joining the project as a member!

title: Issue imoprt email assigned notification
body_text: We are facing a huge problem with issue import feature, it doesn't allow email notification to the assigned member. An assigned member who never receives an email notification is something serious that will cause delays and faults in the system. So my question is, we have more than 100 projects on the Acc system so how a member will be notified on an issue? He/She have to visit each project to check?!

title: Forms - Move Questions between Sections
body_text: Hey! I'm just reworking some form templates, and I am stuck having to rewrite several questions because I need to move them between sections. It would be a nice to have feature if we could move questions around int he different sections without deleting and recreating them entirely. Thanks!

title: SHEET SET SORTING IN SHEET SET MANAGER AND ACC
body_text: SORTING DOES NOT PASS THROUGH TO ACC VIA THE SHEET SET MANAGER. NEEDED IN SHEET SET MANAGER AND BE ABLE TO BE PASSED THROUGH TO ACC OR SORTED IN ACC. MUST HAVE FOR SORTING MECHANISM AVAILABLE AND POSSIBLY 3 LEVELS OF SORTING TO PRECLUDE LACK OF NON ALPHABETIC, DISCIPLINE, etc. SORTING DEFICIENCIES. THEN SETS WILL STAY INTACT FOR MARKUPS, WITHOUT HAVING TO ASSEMBLE AND COLLATE SEPERATELY. WOULD BE IDEAL IF SORTING CAN BE APPLIED FROM REVIT SHEET SCHEDULES TO SHEET SET MANAGER, AND THEN PASSED THR

title: Option to Redefine Model Orientation or Keep Navisworks Viewpoints in ACC Viewer
body_text: When a Revit model has a rotated True North, it appears slanted in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) Viewer, making it difficult to use the Section Box tool since it follows world coordinates instead of the building orientation. It would be very helpful if ACC Viewer could either keep the saved viewpoints/orientations from Navisworks when uploading models or provide an option to redefine the model orientation directly in ACC Viewer so that section boxes align properly with the building. This imp

title: Improved Associated Costs report
body_text: The Associated Costs export appears to generate a report intended to serve as a Job Costs backup report, consolidating all expenses related to the Pay Application and identifying who incurred which costs. While the concept is sound, the current format raises several concerns, and some would argue it is unusable. The report lacks essential functionality, such as the ability to sort or group data as needed, such as by Vendor. Additionally, it omits important columns, including Quantity and Rate/Un

title: Submittals Features on ACC Mobile Apps
body_text: Dear Team, As a service implementation of Autodesk, Its really diasppointing to see the basic feature is missing from Submittals tool in Mobile APP . This is come to our notice while implementing ACC Build for a Organization wide Company. This is unfortunate to see the basic functionalities of 'Creation of Submittals' and 'Review' is missing from the Product. This has been addressed by the customer and they rellay need to have that in their product. we as a partner doesn't want to loose that tru

title: 腾龙网址
body_text: 腾龙网址【TL10939 .com】腾龙公司联系方式 TEL：157-5840-9296 薇或者Q【2274868784】 旱季的夜空格外清澈，银河横跨天际，繁星如钻石般闪烁。老街在星空下沉睡，只有几声犬吠偶尔打破宁静。萤火虫在草丛间飞舞，点点荧光与天上的星星遥相呼应。 佛寺的烛光在夜色中摇曳，像是永不熄灭的明灯。晚风轻拂，带来缅桂花的幽香。在这静谧的夜晚，老街做着一个悠长的梦，梦里有着四季轮回的美好，有着生生不息的希望。

title: ACC Shortcuts
body_text: Additional Shortcuts for ACC - add shortcuts/ the minimize the need for double clicking (i.e. shortcut for issues, ability to add more short cuts to the home screen)

title: Report templates - Save to Files - File Name options / naming standard
body_text: Currently when scheduling reports to run, saving into the Docs Files area, you can only specify a folder. There is no options for controlling the file name. Ideally, you want these to go to a folder that has your projects enforced naming standard, but this isn't possible as the autogenerated file name doesn't comply, they just goto holding area. Please add more options, with the ability to save to an enforced folder. E.g. as part of the report template, we could specify attributes from the namin

title: Daily Report (Forms)
body_text: Daily Reports are a key part of project management, and control over them needs to stay with the GC or software owner. Right now, subcontractors with Collaborative permissions can create and close Daily Report forms, which causes confusion and loss of control. Autodesk should add a permission setting that restricts Collaborative users so they can only enter time — not create or close Daily Reports — unless specifically allowed by the owner.

title: Assets
body_text: Currently, there’s no direct automation where selecting an element in the Asset Model Viewer automatically updates its status. It would be very useful to have the ability to click or toggle an element’s status directly upon selection, instead of manually editing it through the details panel. This feature would greatly improve efficiency during reviews and progress tracking sessions.

title: Hyperlinked Pages in Takeoff
body_text: In the 2d takeoff, allow the plans to be hyperlinked so we can click on those hyperlinks, and it pops open in a separate window view so we can do our takeoff and look at the details while doing so.

title: Viewport Scales
body_text: Allow multiple scales per page like Bluebeam uses Viewports. Often times we have several views with different scales within a page.

title: Publish Revit Schedules to ACC
body_text: Please add the ability to publish Revit schedules to ACC for review like all other views. Would be good to have ACC be able to select a line in the schedule and locate the item similar to how plans and 3D views work now

title: Allow cutouts to areas to be one process and not many
body_text: Cutouts require adding an element to a takeoff, applying element as a cutout, then removing the element to show the cutout on the original takeoff. Extremely inefficient. Also, create a "Do not show again" option so you don't get a warning every time you want to delete an item...

title: Creating transmittal from multiple packages
body_text: We now have possibility to send files from one package via transmittal, but what would be really valuable to us is the possibility of creating one transmittal directly from multiple packages, where each package in the transmittal would show as a separate folder with the name of the package. This option will help us prevent duplication of files. Since Transmittal has the possibility of including multiple folders, but not yet packages, we now have to download the packages and put them in a folder

title: Display file name AND description in the viewer. E.g. An Excel file may display the coded file name, but not its description
body_text: Display file name AND description in the viewer. E.g. An Excel file may display the coded file name, but not its description. When having several files open with similar coded file names, it's easier to get lost as the description is not displayed.

title: Joint Venture logo to a specific project invite
body_text: We are starting to do more joint venture work and want to make sure all invited trade partners know there are two General Contractors involved on the project. If one of them sends out the invite it will only reflect their logo in the invite and the other. The only workaround we found was adding both General Contractors names to the project name but then that makes the project name very long. Having a joint venture logo on the invites would be much more impactful. If there is way to add this func

title: Submittals - Global Numbering versus Spec Numbering
body_text: The ability to switch back from spec numbering to global numbering if spec numbering was selected.

title: Filter Issues by Templates
body_text: Issue templates are used a lot in my company so we would like to be able to filter issues based on templates. It is not sufficient for us to filter by types since some templates have the same types.

title: Docs files size filter to improve as-built export
body_text: I like search files in docs by file size to identify big files. This is important for a later as-built export as this export is limited in size. Especially 3D laserscan data, which are used during a project might not be extracted in the as-built export. Currenty you have to know where big files are located.

title: Improve printing quality of pdf files
body_text: When printing, for example, flow diagrams, the default resolution is 46 x 33 inches and cannot be changed. When printing in A3 format , the print quality is not as good as when printing via Adobe Acrobat. As a user, I would like to print PDF files (drawings) directly from ACC so I can take flow diagrams with me on paper (e.g. in Ex zones) and make quicker handwritten annotations. However, the print quality is poor, and I have to take the detour of downloading the file first.

title: Linking Members at Project Level should Push To Corporates Directory
body_text: Expecting all project members to be known at the start and already exist in the corporate directory is completely unrealistic. In practice, new project members are added over the course of a project, at the project level. Ideally, when these new members are linked to the correct company (at the project level), that link should be saved to the corporate directory. It is counterintuitive that if a member’s company-specific email is correctly linked to their company (at the project level), that thi

title: Sheets Reports
body_text: We need different options for generating sheets reports. Our project teams like to use collections to sort out disciplines in addition to disciplines- it makes it much easier on the iPads to run this way. When you have collections- it makes running reports for the current sheets much more difficult. Right now the only option is to either run a report of current sheets for each collection, or all sheets issued in every collection. Can we get an option to run a report for all current sheets in all

title: Display Only Issue Types in the Issues Filter for Which Issues Have Been Created
body_text: The Issues filter currently shows all Issue Types, regardless of if the Issue Category / Type is active. Users should only be presented with the Issue Types for which Issues have been created. This would result in far less scrolling for users and provide certainly as to which Issue Types have Issues. Note: Simply showing only Active Issue Types would be misleading because it is possible that a project may have had an Issue Type enabled for which Issues were created, then inactivated the Issue Ty

title: Industrial Sheets - Naming Conventions
body_text: Industrial drawings can be complicated and do not follow the conventional naming process. AAB-Z01-000D comes before AAB-E02-013D in our list of drawings, but there is no way to name them that automatically lists them this way. Even when disciplines are renamed and reordered, we can't get the sheet to fall into place. If we can't get the naming conventions to change, perhaps being able to move the sheets on the main page (like we move disciplines around) would take out time and energy to the alre

title: Feature Request: Default Schedule View Permission
body_text: Would like the ability to have the Schedules, when uploaded, to be defaulted to Restricted versus public. This helps with restricting views to schedules that might not be able to be released to the project yet. This could be a template toggle so different users can choose the default desired.

title: Create an opportunity to turn off visibility to RFIs even when Closed visibility is enabled
body_text: If we want to have RFIs visible to all members when closed, but we still want to be able to restrict security related RFIs and keep them included to members only, at the moment we can only pick or choose to have Closed RFI visibility enabled or unenabled, having to be extra vigilant on security RFIs on sharing info and attachments when Closed RFI visibility is turned on

title: Add a “Notes” or “Description” field to Issue Categories and Types
body_text: It would be very helpful to have a Notes or Description field within Issue Categories and Types setup. For example, when creating a type such as HSE – Near Miss , we could include a short explanation like “This type is used for reporting incidents with no injury or damage but with potential risk.” This feature would help project teams understand the purpose and correct use of each Issue Type, especially on large projects with multiple disciplines or contractors. It would also make template shari

title: Rounding Settings for Mark-ups
body_text: With Mark-ups on Change orders- we usually keep the overall amount rounded to the nearest dollar by changing the amount of our fee. We still do need to see amounts less than a dollar in the system, but limiting amounts less than a dollar in our change orders makes budget management much easier. The preferred method for us would be to have a mark-up amount variable so that we can modify it to the nearest dollar.

title: Adding watcher using Bulk edit of submittals
body_text: Instead of adding a new user as a watcher in each submittal one by one, by using bulk edit adding a new team member to see all the submittals related to his/her scope will be helpful.

title: Forms - Permission Improvements
body_text: - Ability to create a workflow that allows more than two people to sign at once, but the last person has to wait until all the above have been signed.

title: Assets - Automatically connect assets to the sheets
body_text: Once Asset is created, have the ability to run something on the sheet that reads the assets and puts them on the sheet (i.e. window code)

title: Issues - Presaved Filters for Issues
body_text: No reset for filters on the issues when you are in a review. If you are looking at a particular custom field you have to redo the filter. It would be good for the filter to carry onto the next page.

title: Review - Add Files by Filtering
body_text: It would be helpful to be able to add files when setting up a review while being able to use all the filtering tools that we normally have when searching files - currently we can only just go scrolling from a drop-down list which becomes time consuming for the team. This applies for both Setting Up a Review and once you send back to initiator to add files.

title: Add ability to default Co-Reviewer to RFI Types
body_text: Currently only a default reviewer can be set on an RFI type. Would like the ability to also default the co-reviewer as well.

title: Option to include Mark-ups when using Bridge
body_text: When files are bridged from one project to another, mark-ups done through ACC are lost. It would be good if there was an option to include mark-ups when bridging a file / folder

title: RFI Company Template
body_text: Good morning, it would be great to be able upload our company RFI template to ACC Build and have the export of an RFI in our company template.

title: In model viewing, lock the section plane drag arrow to the toolbar and make it a spin wheel
body_text: When viewing a model, the section plane arrow moves around the screen and can be hard to find, or wedged against an edge, or pointed right at you. The orbit (?) arcs that hover over it get in the way of dragging the arrow. Just make the arrow a fly-out on the tool bar at the bottom and make it a spin wheel that you can roll up and down to move the plane. This will avoid all the current problems with the arrow design.

title: ACC using Navisworks Sets with Navisworks View
body_text: Run clash inside the ACC using Navisworks sets so we can clash Element to Element, instead of Model to Model Saved views from Navisworks to ACC and run clashes on those views so it acts as search sets, and run clashes in ACC model coordination.

title: Autdesk Build - Need to be able to give visibility to ALL submittals (submitted, in review or closed) to non-Submittal managers or submittal tagged persons
body_text: Right now you can only allow visibility to closed submittals. I need to be able to give visibility to ALL submittals (submitted, in review or closed) to non-Submittal managers or submittal tagged persons. We have a lot of consultants who do not need to be in workflow to review and do not need to be "watcher status" and get all the updates. However, it is helpful if they can thumb through the other submittals as needed for coordination rather than going through my log or asking for each piece of

title: Automatically Apply Sales Tax to Budget Payment Application
body_text: In our State, sales tax is applicable on construction projects and is billed on the Owner pay applications each month. Unfortunately, Autodesk requires the application of sales tax to be a manual process which can cause the possibly of someone forgetting and not billing tax to the Owner. As the main contractor, we are required to pay it regardless of if the Owner pays us. In the settings it would be great to have a simple check box that would automatically apply sales tax to the budget payment a

title: Meeting Minutes Bulk Export
body_text: A function where Meeting Minutes can be bulk exported into PDFs for Handover requirements, possibly best suited to be an item within the current Handover tool rather than reports in Build.

title: Multi-Week Schedule Reporting
body_text: Add a multi-week (e.g. 6 week) Schedule option within Build that allows project teams to develop a multi-week schedule within Build and be able to print it off as a PDF for progress meetings. This would allow, for example, a 6-week schedules to be standardized and stored in a centralized location for the project.

title: Form names are cut off and hard to see
body_text: When selecting a form, the form template names are cut off. The window is small for no reason. The web UI is restricted in places for, seemingly, no reason. Allowing users to change the size of elements, or in this case, the forms window will prevent confusion with similarly named form templates.

title: Build - Submittals -  name steps like in Reviews
body_text: Hello, we need an option to name steps in submittals, just like we can in Docs - Reviews. Usually, you have Build more developed then Docs because you charge additionally for Build license. This should not be too difficult for you. We need this because this is our workaround for your strange setup of submittals. Usually, we have 5 reviewers in open step, but when we step back all reviews, comments, attachments are gone. So, we need to create each reviewer as separate step. We want to name each s

title: Manager to be displayed more visibly in an RFI
body_text: Manager to be displayed more visibly in an RFI, similar to how it is in a submittal.

title: Create RFIs on behalf of other users in the company
body_text: Create RFIs on behalf of other users in the company.

title: RFI excel report to contain Company column for Responsible Contractor
body_text: At the moment, the field Responsible Contractor in an RFI contains the Contractor Name and the company in brackets. When creating an Excel Report only the Responsible Contractor name is preserved, there is no column for the Company. The Column for company should be added.

title: Hyperlink References in RFI Excel Report
body_text: Users would like to have hyperlink references in RFI Excel report as they exist now in PDF reports.

title: RFI Ball in Court section shoudl dispaly only the persons pending an answer
body_text: RFI Ball in Court section should display only the persons pending an answer. At the moment all assignees are displayed in the Ball in court field, whether they entered the response or not.

title: RFI creator to be visible clearly after the RFI is closed
body_text: RFI creator to be visible clearly after the RFI is closed. At the moment you can see the creator only if you search for it explicitly in the activity log. This information should be easier accessible.

title: The possibility to create submittals for other members of the same company
body_text: The possibility to create submittals for other members of the same company.

title: A rejected submittal should trigger the creation of a new submission round
body_text: A rejected submittal should trigger the creation of a new submission round without the intervention of the submittal manager and the responsible contactor should be directly required in the specific submittal to submit the new revision documents. This will increase the speed of completion since it isn't required to wait for the intervention of the submittal manager anymore.

title: Submittal excel report to contain Company column for Responsible Contractor
body_text: At the moment, the field Responsible Contractor in a Submittal contains the Contractor Name and the company in brackets. When creating an Excel Report only the Responsible Contractor name is preserved, there is no column for the Company. The Column for company should be added.

title: Stepping Back Revisions On Submittals
body_text: Please add an option to Step back revisions on created Submittals, Sometimes revisions can be created accidently, or created and assigned without a need to resubmission, We need to have an option to return to previous revision, instead of getting stuck with unnecessary revisions

title: Edit ACC Profile Name
body_text: Several people are asking about changing a profile name. The names they are known by are different than what is listed for them on the same project.

title: Integrating Markups into the Issues Add-in for Revit
body_text: The Issues Add-in for Revit has been an important step in connecting clash detection reviews with users working directly in the model. However, it only addresses issues and not markups . Issues are well-suited for pinning clashes in 3D space, but the workflow is too clunky and time consuming for simple 2D redlines. Expanding this functionality to include markups would be a game-changing improvement. Current Limitation Today, redline markups can be placed on published sheets in ACC Docs, but they

title: Issue "Description" field functionality
body_text: When populating the "Description" field in a new issue on an iPad, it is possible to hit enter for a new line within the field. In a browser hitting enter closes the field and it is not possible to type on multiple lines. Please add this functionality to the browser UI.

title: Add References to Plan Tasks
body_text: Would be helpful to include References to Tasks within Plan (Schedule).

title: Review name update in settings to update actual review workflow name
body_text: It would be good to have the option to update the name of a review workflow in settings, that updates the name within actual reviews, open or closed. Similar to how it works with RFI types in Build. This can provide consistency for wider reporting when needing to standardise across projects. Currently, it only applies to new reviews. Thanks

title: Ability to reference issue on issues in the mobile app
body_text: In the web app it is possible to reference issues to issues. We also need this option in the mobile app

title: Conditional Folder Permissions with Logical Operators
body_text: Currently, Autodesk ACC only allows permissions to be granted to explicitly selected people, roles, or companies. This can be inefficient in cases where you want more advanced control – for example, when you want to grant access to everyone except a certain role, or when you need to combine multiple criteria. Introduce conditional folder permissions as an optional feature alongside the existing method. Users should still be able to set permissions the simple way (selecting roles, companies, or i

title: TradeTapp Approval Request Edit
body_text: In TradeTapp's Approval Request feature, I would like to be able to edit the " Note from Requester" after an approval is submitted.

title: ACC Viewer: Consistent Font Rendering with DWG/RVT
body_text: Description: The fonts are not displayed the same in the ACC Viewer as in AutoCAD/Civil 3D or Revit. The goal is for the ACC Viewer to render all fonts exactly as defined on the plans (e.g., in DWG or RVT). The attached image shows the difference: left Civil 3D, right ACC. Please also integrate the missing fonts required for proper rendering. The ACC Viewer should display fonts exactly as in AutoCAD/Civil 3D and Revit. All fonts defined on plans (DWG/RVT) must be rendered identically. Please inc

title: Reports | Display plan overview and plan details side by side
body_text: As a construction manager, I would like to see the overall plan and a zoomed-in section of the plan side by side on one page in the issue detail report so that I can see the position of the issue more clearly and have all relevant information on one page.

title: Be able to set priorities for meeting items
body_text: It will be helpful for us to have an option to set up priorities next to the status of a meeting item. This option can help us to see which are the important points that must be processed first.

title: Function to Reverse Incorrectly Created Revisions on Submittals
body_text: Requires a function to allow admins to reverse a newly created revision if it was created incorrectly on Submittals. This feature would enhance project accuracy and reduce error correction time.

title: ProEst Relationships - Additional Columns and Sorting
body_text: Would it be possible to get an additional column on the Relationships main page so you could add a trade type? The example below is not very good because the trade type is in each company's name, but it would be helpful. Adding a sort function would be great too. That way you could sort by location, or trade type, etc.

title: Export Sheets to Print From ACC App
body_text: It would be extremely helpful if the app allowed our team to export sheets and print plans directly from their iPads. Our team relies heavily on iPads both in the field and in the office, and they often don’t have access to a computer. As a result, exporting documents through the website isn’t always a practical option.

title: Stop Spamming Your Existing Customers
body_text: Stop spamming your existing customers with links for "'free demos from our specialists". We've been a large account for many years and our employees are getting spammed to try Autodesk services we've subscribed to for many years. Perhaps have your marketing bots filter out the email domains of existing customers.

title: Add review auto-triggers to Template
body_text: Can we please, please, please have the ability to add Review Auto-Triggers to our templates? The Review Auto-Trigger is a great feature which we have embraced wholeheartedly but it takes approx. 5 times longer to set up a project workspace now because of the auto-trigger setup.

title: Markup versus Stamp functionality
body_text: Can Markup functionality please mirror Stamp functionality? During review, when a Markup is created on a document and copied to a destination folder the same Markup will copy to any subsequent versions that supersede the document in the destination folder unless the Markup is deleted. However, if a Stamp is added to a document during review and then copied to the same destination folder it remains on the one version of the document only, i.e. it won't pull through to any subsequent versions that

title: Copying forms without references
body_text: The option to copy forms is great - it allows project members to copy across lots of information and saves them having to retype it all again. However, the automatic attachment of Issues, photos and signatures isn't great - this causes confusion when reporting, leads to irrelevant or out of date photos being included and has the potential to cause problems when signatures are added without their owner's consent. Could Autodesk please introduce an option that allows project members to opt NOT to

title: File Type Restrictions per Folder in ACC
body_text: File Type Restrictions per Folder in ACC Need: Currently, any file type can be uploaded to ACC folders. This creates risks with uncontrolled formats (e.g., ZIP files, unsupported CAD files) and makes compliance harder. Some folders should only contain specific deliverables (e.g., PDFs for IFC drawings, approved reports). Feature Concept: Add a File Type Restriction setting at folder level: Admins define allowed formats (e.g., PDF only, or PDF + DWG). Attempts to upload non-compliant files are bl

title: Add comment or note to meeting Items
body_text: It would be helpful to allow meeting attendees to add notes or comments to individual agenda items between meetings. These comments would not appear in the official minutes but would be visible to all participants ahead of the next meeting. This would enable ongoing input and collaboration, including from those who may not have attended the previous meeting or won’t be present at the next one. Relevant comments could then be reviewed during the meeting and incorporated into the minutes if approp

title: Improve Export Functionality for Forms Report by increasing the limit beyond 10 Attachments in Autodesk Construction Cloud
body_text: We are encountering a significant inconvenience with the current export functionality of Autodesk Construction Cloud's forms report, which limits the number of directly embedded attachments to 10. When there are more than 10 attachments, all items are converted to hyperlinks, complicating access to the required documents. To improve user experience and efficiency, we suggest increasing the limit on the number of attachments that can be directly embedded in the exported report. Specifically, allo

title: List Non-member's company in Meeting Minutes
body_text: The meeting module allows you to add non-members to the attendees list, and even asks for their company name. However, when you pdf the meeting minutes, only their name shows up. Regular members have their company listed next to the name. Now I have to re-list the attendees within the minutes, including company name, wasting additional time.

title: Sort and filter by comments within Issues
body_text: We have dozens of active users collectively commenting on hundreds of Issues daily using the comment section below Issues as the main portal to discuss and resolve issues, so we urgently need to be able to find and filter activity by comments to monitor and manage this. When sorting issues by 'updated on' or 'updated by' this does NOT include activity within comments, so there is no way for us to see which issues have been commented on most recently. We urgently need this feature as arguably it

title: API for Automated Plan Reviews with AI
body_text: The current ACC Reviews API only allows read access to review objects. To enable automation, we need an endpoint that lets a system user: Query assigned reviews ✔️ Analyze attachments with AI ✔️ Automatically accept or reassign reviews ‼️ This would unlock AI-driven plan checks, reducing manual effort and speeding up review cycles.

title: Improve Location Display for Objects in ACC Mobile App
body_text: In the ACC Mobile App, the assigned location for assets is not fully displayed . This leads to confusion , especially when there are multiple rooms with the same name (e.g., “Storage Room”) in one building. Suggestions: Show the full location path (e.g., “Building A > 2nd Floor > Storage Room”) directly in the object view. ( For Issues , the location display already works well – the full location path is shown) At minimum, include the floor level to help distinguish between similar locations. Th

title: RFI Transmittal -  List Watchers in Exported .pdf
body_text: Please change it so when an RFI is closed and Generated, Watchers are listed on the Distribution or at least the option to have them listed is there.

title: Overdue RFI - Show over due # of Days in Summary
body_text: Please give us the option to show the number of Days an RFI is overdue in the Summary Report

title: Add app "version comparator"
body_text: Autodesk Customer Technical Success has informed me that web access to ACC from mobile devices (phones and tablets) is not supported, and that the app should be used instead. The issue is that some key functionalities, such as the version comparison tool , are not available in the app. I believe it is essential that this functionality be added to the app in order to ensure proper use of the platform across all devices. ACC is often accessed directly from construction sites, where a computer is n

title: Option to delete or hide document version is mistakenly upload
body_text: It is recommended to add a feature that allows users to delete or hide mistakenly uploaded document versions. The current option of making an older version as the latest is not sufficient for proper audit tracking and may cause confusion.

title: Bookmarks
body_text: PDF's saved in the files section of Autodesk Build, loose the functionality of Bookmarks. For contracts or other large PDF files, it would be usefull to be able to use the bookmarks within the pdf, or be able to create bookmarks within ACC Build.

title: File export/download version history and file activities report
body_text: It would be good when exporting or downloading a file to have an option to include a pdf report of the version history and file activities with it. This would be helpful when archiving files and old projects.

title: Option to Bridge Completely New Sheets
body_text: We've run into a potential issue on a project that we have bridged with a GC. The Bridge feature is great, overall. However, when a completely new sheet gets uploaded to the GC's project, that brand new sheet will not bridge over. This is potentially hazardous for field and project management, especially if we're not getting directly notified by the GC on an updated drawing. These new sheets could get lost in translation with so much going on. We suggest to have a blanket option to bridge brand

title: What is the item in takeoff
body_text: It would be great if hovering over an item in takeoff I could see what it is and what location it is in. Currently I need to use the right button, then click an item to find those answers. The need arises quite often to see what it is.

title: Reviews Tab - the possibility to filter the information by a person from key reviewers which still not submit their review
body_text: In this moment, I'm not able to find out which people have submitted their response, and which didn't in Reviews tab. 1) It will be very nice if we will have the possibility to export this information in an excel file and also to filter the information by key users and the status of their response (submitted, claimed, unclaimed). 2) It will be useful if they can select a status as Approved, Rejected, Approved with comments in their step, not only in the final step. (or the possibility to choose

title: Bring Sheets from Build to Docs just like Specifications are
body_text: Please bring Sheets module that is in Build, to Docs. You already have the running set of specifications in both spots, please have a running stick set of sheets in both spots. It saves the time in Docs of having to manually upload individual sheets as a running set, and I would think would be easy enough to have in both spots just like the Specifications

title: Download (or copy) revit cloud workshared files without links
body_text: ACC need to add possibility to download (also copy to another folder) a revit cloud workshared file without linked files. Many times revit files need to get copied to another system than ACC. Now if I download a file it gets all linked files and makes a large zip out of it. So instead of downloading for example 200Mb file that I actually want file I end up getting 2Gb where all linked files are included. I suggest that there would be an option when downloading (or copying to another folder in AC

title: Export Document Lists to Excel from Folders and Packages in Docs
body_text: Within Docs , the document lists in folders and packages are already structured in a table format. However, there is currently no option to export these lists directly. It should be possible to export document lists in Excel format from both folders and packages. Having an automatic export function would make it much easier to create delivery registers or document indexes when sharing information outside the project. This functionality would also reduce the risk of errors compared to manually re

title: Enhancing Form Template Creation with Project Attribute Integration
body_text: In Autodesk Construction Cloud, form templates are a powerful tool for standardizing data collection across projects. However, the current process of manually creating and populating fields for each template can be time-consuming and error-prone — especially when those fields duplicate existing project attributes. Proposal: Enable Project Attribute Lists in Form Templates To streamline template creation and ensure consistency, Autodesk Construction Cloud should allow users to select from existin

title: Assets to have Placement possibility similar to Issues pin and have placement possibility to nwd-files
body_text: Issues pins are great for highlighting locations of issues in different model-formats, pdfs, etc. It would be great if Assets could be done the same flexible way by just clicking on a 3D model location and filling in (and updating) the asset information. For example in the 3D viewer the Asset tool could be under the Issue tool on the right side panel for manual placing of assets. This kind of Assets could be similar to Issues pins in the model viewer. Now the Assets can use only rvt, nwc, ifc, d

title: Project Admin removing from archived
body_text: A suggestion of allowing Account admins to be able to remove project admin at mass including from archived projects. We have improved our control and there are only 5 admins/project admins with in the company. However the long list of project admins from over the years isn't helpful to demonstrate our new controls. Work around - re-instate the archived jobs and remove the project admin then archive - we have over 100 archived projects so this is not good use of time. Thanks

title: Option to Generate Final RFI without Activity Log
body_text: Activity Log is quite Cluttered, and messy. Is it possible to add an option for this to not be on the Final Distributed RFI, if we chose to?

title: Show The Project Number Under the Project Name
body_text: We rely heavily on the project number. It would very beneficial to have the project number under the name. While in Cost you have to navigate into Build then in to settings to find the number. Which is time consuming.

title: Suggestion to increase photo file size limits
