body_text: Current photo size limit in ACC is 20MB which limits users to share Hi Res photos (both still images/360 photos, typically goes beyond 20MB)

title: Member report export info
body_text: Could we have a column on the Member export that shows who added each member?

title: TAKEOFF - Enhance "Count (EA)" Takeoff Type Symbols - Use Both Border/Fill Colors and Match Shape to Type Icon
body_text: Currently, when measuring “each” items in Takeoff , the symbol only displays the selected border color, which makes it difficult to clearly distinguish between multiple types on the same drawing. A big improvement would be to have the outer edge of the symbol reflect the border color and the interior “1” reflect the fill color , so both color choices are fully represented. In addition, it would be even more effective if the symbol shape (circle, diamond, square, triangle, etc.) chosen also match

title: Asset Sheet Placement Lock
body_text: For Assets placed on Sheet, currently they can be selected and moved/resized by accident. Would like to add an option to lock asset location on sheets.

title: Default Asset Locations on Associated Forms
body_text: If a location is defined on an Asset, it would make sense the location be populated in the associated forms. This is not the case and needs to be populated. If for some reason a user picked a different location, have Build flag those instances to confirm.

title: Send Notification to Watchers When Issue Created/Opened
body_text: Currently, watchers are not notified when a new issue is opened. It would be nice if these people were notified if a new issue is opened, instead of just when updates are made.

title: Enable Approvers to Modify Destination Folder in Reviews
body_text: Sometimes, when a review is initiated, the initiator may forget to select the correct destination folder. In such cases, the approver should have the ability to modify and select the appropriate destination folder before completing the review. Currently, if the destination folder is missed, the review becomes unusable and must be voided and recreated, which leads to unnecessary delays and effort. This small enhancement could make a big difference in day-to-day workflows. Would love to hear if ot

title: Assign Submittal managers based on roles or companies.
body_text: Assigning Submittal managers based on roles or companies within Autodesk Construction Cloud is essential to streamline the submittal process, ensuring that the right individuals or teams are responsible for managing and approving submittals. This leads to increased efficiency, accountability, and reduces the risk of errors or delays in project timelines.

title: ACC Project Admin Limitations
body_text: We are a large firm with multiple departments utilizing ACC across its various modules. One of our ongoing challenges is managing the Project Administrator role, as administrative permissions are currently tied to the entire project rather than to individual modules. This structure forces us to grant full project administrator rights to users who only need limited administrative capabilities—such as creating reviews, managing forms, processing submittals, or tracking project-wide statuses. To ad

title: Issues Permissions
body_text: I have a client that wants to be able have more control over permissions in the Issues tool. Right now, everyone in a project has the ability to create new issues (albeit only for their company), and the lowest level of default permissions. My client would like to turn off permissions all together for Issues by individual user or role. Seems easy enough. Thanks for your consideration.

title: RFI Tab - Building Connected
body_text: Preconstruction RFIs are such an essential and common aspect of preconstruction; RFIs should have a dedicated tab. Right now, RFIs are managed in Messages, and it's completely unorganized. - The tab would simply list the RFIs in a log and could have required fields to fill, like "Question", and "reference document" - It would track when questions are submitted and answered - The GC should be able to add a question from a sub (just like uploading a bid for them) - There should exist an option to

title: Downloading Multiple Submittals at Once
body_text: Currently, ACC only allows you to export submittal files one at a time. This is tedious and time consuming. You can export a report with multiple submittals included, but it comes out as a single pdf file. You can download the individual submittals if they have been saved in the Files tab, but not from the submittals tab.

title: Ability to Quickly Detach Cost Items from Budget Payment Application
body_text: Currently, to detach costs that are associated with a Budget Payment Application requires to either delete the entire payment application all together and start over or detach items one by one which is time consuming. It would be nice to have the ability to detach multiple cost items at one time. A checkbox system would accomplish this. See below:

title: Use a mapping template when importing assets from a model
body_text: At the moment, when importing assets from a model to ACC, an import rule needs to be manually created for each asset category in the 'map assets' step. This is very time consuming and annoying because the same import rules will be used for all projects. With a template, filters can be created only once and be reused for future models, saving a lot of time and repeated actions. Needless to say, the same goes for the 'map properties' step of the process.

title: Attached Forms references and attachments to be followed to copied forms.
body_text: Due to ACC limitation, admin cannot reopen closed sections of the form. The current workaround is to make a copy of the form and discard the old one. But if references and attachments are not going to be carried over, it is going to be very disruptive as they will need to reference/attach everything again.

title: Import Cost/PCO Items
body_text: Sometimes you have to create a PCO with a large number of lines especially on large PCOs or where you need to be very detailed. The other import functions in Autodesk are very useful. It would be nice to have a similar function for PCOs. This would allow a user to create all the PCO items in an excel template, ensure all budget codes are correctly allocated and double check all the values and ensure that all the items are in the desired order. You can't easily re-order PCO items in a PCO.

title: BuildingConnected - Estimate (Internal)
body_text: Note: this idea was originally submitted to Autodesk on August 29th, 2024, and on December 11, 2024, it was noted that Autodesk submitted this as a feature request on customer behalf because they didnt have a way for customers to submit ideas or feature requests. Now that this Idea's portal was released, we wanted to be sure this idea was captured and still being reviewed. In BuildingConnected, you can add an estimated cost prior to bid date but this estimate is a lump sum (individual number) an

title: Messages Export Report
body_text: I would like to request functionality for exporting the messages either by a bid package or a by a project. The export / report should include functionality to filter or sort by company, sender's name, date, subject, content of the message and include a zip file of all of the attachments that were included in the messages.

title: Standardized/Group "Other Followers" for specific teammates within same office on opportunities
body_text: It would be incredibly helpful and increase efficiency if there was an option to create a standardized team or followers list. IE: an opportunity is created by myself; I am automatically generated as "Other Followers", and my teammates who also oversee my opportunities are populated under "Other Followers", rather than add them individually for each opportunity. - Opportunity is created - Myself & selected teammates are listed as "Other Followers" - Teammates can assign opportunity to others Our

title: GPS tags included on photo meta data in reports
body_text: Currently GPS Tagging does not automatically show on photos that have been included on a Forms Detail Report. However the GPS tags are shown if you export a Photos Report. It would be very helpful to automatically include the GPS meta data on photos that are included in other report types.

title: Feature Suggestion - Saving Dashboard Preferences in Submittal Module
body_text: Dear Autodesk Team, I’d like to share a suggestion regarding the Submittal Module within Autodesk Build. I recently explored the feature that allows users to customize the dashboard view by rearranging submittal information columns—such as Title, Ball in Court, ID, Type, Manager, etc .—using the gear icon. This functionality is a great step toward improving user experience and workflow efficiency. However, I noticed that once you navigate away from the dashboard, the customized column arrangemen

title: Forms - Assign Multiple Locations
body_text: Similar to the RFIs tool there are use cases for indicating that a form applies to multiple locations that may not be grouped in the project's location breakdown structure. For example, if I had a project with the locations as indicated below there is no way to indicate that an in-wall pre-closure checklist applies to rooms 100, 101, 102, 103, and 104 because those room numbers are not grouped in the hierarchy. See attached screenshots comparing the Location field for Forms and RFIs. Locations E

title: Forms: Notification email messages
body_text: Could you change the wording for the notification emails that go out to Form Managers? Right now, they say, "Your action is required," when it really isn't required because they're not set as reviewers, they're only managers. It's misleading and creates confusion. "Your action is required," should only show for reviewers. Could it say something like, "No action required," for managers?

title: ACC Docs - Ability to move xref DWG files between folders without breaking the links
body_text: Problem statement: Customers can upload dwg files with ref linked files. However there is no function to move files with linked files between folders. Desired action/outcome: EBA Customer would like to have the possibility to move DWG files between folders with linked files or without breaking the links.

title: Report on Building Connected Website
body_text: There is no way to print the "Messages" being sent and received as a report on Building Connected. This report is critical when we try to present the communications that have taken place in a neat and organized fashion. Would be great if the messages can also be added to the reports section.

title: Build  - Meetings - Add attendance automatically from teams attendance
body_text: Add attendance on ACC meetings automatically from teams attendance. We have meetings with 60 members, we do not want click every time on 60 invitees. This is slowing us down and it is easy to make mistake. (this can be quite expensive mistake!). Please add this automation.

title: Enable PDF Forms Data in Insight Builder for Analysis
body_text: I would like to raise an enhancement request regarding the integration of PDF forms data into Insight Builder for reporting and dashboard purposes. Use Case: On our projects, we have configured several Smart PDF forms in the ACC Forms module. These Smart PDFs are used because they provide advanced capabilities such as: Automatic calculations (e.g., quantity checks, hold amounts, progress measurements). Embedded validations and conditional logic. Custom layouts as per project-specific requirement

title: Notification icon by each tools
body_text: I would like to suggest adding an assigned item notification icon to each tool. This way, when I open my ACC, I won’t need to go to My Home and check the dashboard to see the items assigned to me. It would be very helpful if this notification icon could be displayed directly within the modules, next to the tool name, making it easier and faster to track any assigned items. Example:

title: Add a Project Search box for Desktop Connector
body_text: When adding a project to the synced projects on Desktop Connector, it would be useful to have some way to search. There can potentially be hundreds/thousands of projects on an ACC hub and looking for the correct one can be difficult. This is especially true if there are multiple "projects" for the same project and different trades, different buildings on similar sites, or multiple projects for the same client/location over time.

title: Enable Issues in Navisworks 2026 for Mixed Local and ACC-Synced Files
body_text: Description: In Navisworks 2026, the Issues panel is disabled if a project includes any appended local files, even when some of the loaded models are fully synced with Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC). The only current workaround is to open a single published NWD file from ACC, which is not practical for certain workflows. Problem: When reviewing point clouds against model data, we often need to load: ACC-synced design models (Revit, DWG, etc.) Local point cloud files (RCP/RCS or other formats)

title: Move Multiple Folders
body_text: Topic: ACC files, folder section Requesting to be able to select multiple folders and move to another location. Its a feature that is available on Desktop connector but not online on ACC.

title: Reports reviews
body_text: You cannot create a report template to show overdue reviews on the date whenever it is run, it needs to be adjusted every time according to that day's date

title: Docs - edit existing steps by adding/removing steps
body_text: Add option to adjust the number of steps within existing workflows - add/remove a step within the existing workflow so you don't have to disable and manually create a new workflow if it has more or less steps

title: Project admins don't get review notifications
body_text: Contrary to BIM360, Project Admins do not receive all the notifications (e.g. Review changes when you are not a reviewer). Should be an option to choose notifications or not. This makes reporting of MIDP much too difficult

title: Meeting item export list
body_text: Problem statement - We want to be able to export the meeting item list. Desired action/outcome - We want to be able to export the meeting item list so we can more easily find and filter meeting items. Current issue/challenges - Currently it is difficult to find meeting items. Current workaround - We don’t close items and instead list them as “For information” so we can still search for past items in future meetings.

title: Block the ability of people from joining your team
body_text: As an IT professional, I'm starting to see people using this feature as an attack vector to gain unauthorized access to our team information. I fully expect this to evolve into a Spam/Phishing scheme as well. Can you please implement a way to block random people from attempting to join our team from system preferences? Perhaps as a simple tick box? I'm afraid that one of these attempts might succeed, as we have more than one platform admin because of contingency reasons. Thanks.

title: Default CC people in cost when sending contracts/invoices/etc
body_text: Default CC people in cost when sending contracts/invoices/etc. Each time we send a contract we have to manually CC people and remember to do that. We want to be able to set default people for the CC line so we only have to set this up once. If we forget to CC someone on a contract, we don’t get the information we need to people that need it and it slows workflows. We are manually copying people.

title: Ability to Delete Individual Spec Sections
body_text: Currently we can only delete the version set under specifications. An option to delete individual spec sections after they've been published is extremely important.

title: Add Photos to Issue Summary Report
body_text: It would be helpful if we could choose to add photos to issue summary reports. Our only option if we want to include photos is to use the detailed report.

title: Add 1:25 Sheet Calibration Setting to the Sheets Measurement Tool
body_text: Please add "1 : 25" Sheet calibration setting to the Sheets measurement tool. Many projects get drawings that are 1:25 ratio.

title: Bulk Asset Status Changes
body_text: Allow authorized users to bulk update Asset Status. It would make it more convenient to use Assets for progressing.

title: Permissions in Model Coordination
body_text: Current state is that we can only choose to have it be private (meaning only the creator of the model and the site admins can see) or public (everyone can see). Request is to add the ability to select visibility at the View level by Role. (eg: Ability to provide visibility to “BIM Manager” role only.) Add permission levels at the View level to limit users to View/Edit/Manage permissions. (Example: would like to allow Trade Partners to view it, but not be able to save/edit it.) Business Case Peop

title: Make the Form Section Assignees Optional or Add an 'Anyone' Option
body_text: Form sections can contain general information that should be filled out by the first person to fill out their section of the Form, not necessarily a particular company or user. Allow sections to not require an assignee, making them available for everyone who has edit access, or allow project admins to indicate 'Anyone'.

title: Add AI capabilities to read Revision numbers and Revision Dates from Drawings
body_text: Most projects still work off 2D PDF drawings and we still encounter cases where consultants may issue a drawing that is an older rev than a previously issued one. With all the AI advances Autodesk is working on, perhaps Build could identify and capture the Revision Number and Date, which are often listed in a table in the title block.

title: Improve asset filtering options
body_text: Currently there are a limited number of filter options available in the Assets filter panel. We would like to be able to filter on category (and sub category) and the location to assist with viewing what could be a large list of assets.

title: Add Issue Activity Information on Mobile
body_text: Allow users to to see who is adding comments or making edits to the individual Issues and when it happened on the mobile app. This can be done on the desktop version but not on the iPad in the field. It would allow users to immediately follow up with team members (internal or external) if there are questions about status/comments/photos, etc. when they go through the items in the field.

title: Customer Support
body_text: Instead of Customer Support saying "we appreciate your feedback. If you would like to see improvements in this area, we encourage you to submit a feature request directly to our product team via the ACC Ideas forum:" It would be great if Customer Support could collate and submit ideas that would enhance the UX to the product team.

title: Add Option For Photos to Display GPS Coordinates in Reports and Extracts
body_text: Add an option that GPS coordinates will appear next to the timestamp in photo attachments on Insight reports and data extractions. This is particularly important on solar projects.

title: Display Form Progress in Forms List
body_text: Display the completion of each Form when displaying the Forms list, showing the number of items answered out of the total items (e.g. 15/30) either as a progress bar similar to Field Management Checklists.

title: Allow Projects to Optionally Import Meeting Templates From the Library
body_text: Allow projects to optionally copy Meeting templates from the Library instead of using the Library as only a centralized forced distribution system.

title: Add Meeting Insight Reports
body_text: Introduce Meeting reports in Insight for not only the meetings themselves, but Meeting Item reports that allow filtering for Item statuses and individual or company assignment. A bonus would be to have a 'Assigned Meeting Items' report similar to the '(Issue) Items Assigned to Company' report.

title: Add Ability to Filter Meeting Items by a Particular Meeting
body_text: Allow users to find the items for 1 or multiple meetings.

title: View Previous Versions of Specifications
body_text: Allow users to view the pages for previous Spec versions. When they go into version sets and try clicking on a previous version to view it, it does not show any pages for that version. You can only view the latest set.

title: Specifications Navigation Improvements
body_text: When you open the spec section, there is no easy way to scroll to the next spec section. You need to click in the top left-hand corner, to get the Specifications Sidebar. When you go to the next spec section, it forgets the sidebar and you need to click the top left-hand corner every single time to get to the different spec sections.

title: Compliance Requirements
body_text: Currently, our trade partners to have the ability to update compliance requirements. They also have the ability to upload documents, some of which are incorrect. We do not have the ability to prevent this currently, which is causing a huge issue for us. We need the option to disallow particular roles from updating compliance requirements.

title: Add Form Template to the Forms Filter
body_text: Add 'Form Template' to the Forms filter criteria when viewing the Forms list.

title: Meeting Minutes Time Stamp
body_text: The Meeting Minutes module currently has a large topic, and individual items to help build out minutes. Within each individual item, there could be several updates that don't all happen the same day. The current work around it to name the item, in high level, and them manually time stamp any any updates below it. We would like Build to either have a time stamp option for updates on an item, or potentially another tier to the meeting minutes module to be able to better track updates for each item

title: Drawing Locations - Click and Hold to draw rectangles
body_text: Locations are created from drawing a closed polyline, but since most room are rectangles, it would be more efficient to click one corner, hold the mouse down, drag to the opposite corner, and release the mouse to create a rectangle.

title: Allow Sorting with Multiple Columns in the Sheet List
body_text: Not all sheets are captured by the simple single letter identifier and so we need to have multiple disciplines in the search to get all of the drawings in a single discipline. This new list cannot be sorted by floor level and still contain all of the sheets. The ability to choose our own series of columns to use to sort after the search would be very helpful.

title: Save Issue Filters Similar to BIM 360 Field Classic
body_text: On large projects with hundreds or thousands of issues, it would save significant time in the office and in the field if we could save filters. Similar platforms like Newforma Konnect (Formerly BIMTrack) and Revizto have this feature. There is a huge time savings for our subtrades as well; we could populate an issue filter for just their company. BIM 360 Field Classic did a great job of this.

title: Allow for Custom Attributes in Sheets
body_text: Previously in BIM 360, project teams were able to create Custom Attributes for drawings. For instance, a project team could create a Custom Attribute for 'Rev #' so they could easily track/reference the latest revision number on the published Sheet without having to open the drawing. Why not use Files which has custom attributes?: Using Sheets functionality is still preferable for most projects as opposed to publishing drawings in Files.

title: Add picture markup from your PC
body_text: There is no way to add a reference to a markup from your PC, it needs to be uploaded onto ACC even if it's a picture, which is disrupting the process and flow and is creating additional steps

title: Cost Management - Cost & Change Order snapshot function
body_text: ACC already has snapshoto function on Budget section. It would be great if ACC can also have the same function on Cost and Change Order section as well to ensmooth the audit.

title: Permissions on a specific file
body_text: We constantly have to come up with new ideas/concepts to protect files from unnecessary downloads. What would be great is to have the ability to apply a permission to a file within a folder that already has permissions applied to it. For example... - Contractor A and B are both a member of folder 1 that contains two BIM models: One BIM is a downloadable version that contains proprietary information, and the other is a BIM that is viewable on the ACC viewer only... - Contractor A needs a fully do

title: Cost - Introduce risk workflow to cost functionality
body_text: In projects typically project risks are identified in the early stages of the project and may materialise into a PCO / CO and then ultimately a project cost. It would be great if this workflow stream was considered within the Cost module. One thing that would be required for this would be to introduce formulas into the metadata / custom attributes for things like risk score and calculating the risk cost

title: Saved Views for RFI and Submittals
body_text: It would be nice to be able to save views in RFI and Submittals similar to what you can do in Cost Management.

title: Automise Linking Assets with files.
body_text: Would be great to be able to automize the linking between Assets and Files. If a file with a specif meta-attribute (Asset-Name) is uploaded, it should be linked automatically to a specific asset with that name.

title: Possibility to link a Review to a Form is missing
body_text: We need a way to link a form to a review. While reviewing documents, we often have checklists/forms to support the review process. But there is no way today to connect these things.

title: Export Plan to Excel With Linked Schedule Task ID
body_text: Description: In Autodesk Build, under the plan tool, there is an excellent feature that lets us link tasks in a plan to tasks in the project schedule. However, when exporting the plan to Excel the export currently does not include the ID of the task linked from the schedule . Request: Please add the field or column of the ID to the excel report of plans with linked schedule tasks . This would allow users to quickly trace, filter, and coordinate tasks between the plan view and the detailed projec

title: Member Directory
body_text: This really isn't a problem, but more of a suggestion as I have been running into an issue with my superintendents onsite with the member directory. It would be nice if the member directory could also include an area for the scope they are responsible for. IE. Name, Company, contact info, Scope of work (IE.Fire Alarm) Some sub-contractors are self-explanatory, but others have names that do not reflect the trade they work on.

title: Allow Single Contributor Form Assignment
body_text: Add an 'Assignee' field on Single Contributor Form instances so forms can be assigned to a Company (trade) or individual.

title: Print photos on PDF issue reports regardless of whether they were added as an "attachment" or a "photo"
body_text: Attaching photos in an issue as an “attachment” does not print the image when exporting a PDF report. Adding as a “photo” shows the image as expected. It is expected this distinction is intended to make coding easier on the backend when generating the PDFs but mentioning it as a potential improvement anyway since project teams may not be aware of the difference.

title: Issues Conditional Formatting
body_text: Similar to forms, I would also like issues to have a form of conditional formatting. The biggest example i can think of is, prior to subcontractors being able to change the status of an issue to "In-Review", it would prompt them to take a picture of the item.

title: Edit disciplines When Design Sheet Labeling Is Not Ideal
body_text: Would be helpful if we could Edit disciplines When Design Sheet Labeling Is Not Ideal. For example, a project has a drawing set that the architect drew with sheets labeled "MR" for Model Room, It contained Demo, Architecture and Electrical sheets. I can add a designator to put them all under architecture, but i cant parse out the demo or electrical into different disciplines.

title: Add icon for issues on Sheets list
body_text: In Sheets it would be nice if there was an icon to show which sheets have issues pinned on them, or a field that shows the number of issues pinned on the sheet.

title: Expand Maximum Issues per Page
body_text: In Autodesk Issues the display is limited to 50 lines per page, which can make navigation cumbersome. It would be great to bring back the BIM 360 Classic concept of being able to customize how many lines are displayed on a page.

title: Group by Company in Issue Summary and Issue Detail Reports
body_text: Currently, you can group by company for Issue Summary reports, but not for Issue Detail reports. You also cannot sort by company in either report. This would be a helpful function, how we used to be able to in BIM 360 Field. Also, in BIM 360 Field you could choose to show the history of the issue as well.

title: Notify Assignees of Tasks in Plans Under Scheduling in ACC Build!
body_text: We need to be able to notify assigned members of tasks that have been assigned to them automatically through ACC! This seems like an oversight not to have this functionality. We can notify assigned members of Issues , but when I'm trying to create an entire task block for members I cannot notify them without needing to start a new correspondence or some other work around for Plans. These are literal tasks that need to be completed and not being able to notify members of these items really sets b

title: Project Audit Report
body_text: Request for a new report, Project Audit Report, which would show an audit trail of all internal employee's actions on a project from its creation to current. This would include a date and time stamp with employee identifier if/when a bid package is added, if a project information is updated, if the project due date is changed, etc. Ability to generate this report with filterable data would be a plus, but not required as long as the information is available to be extracted into an excel format.

title: ACC Mobile App - Add description in the main Issues screen
body_text: On the mobile app, when we go to Issues, we only see the issue title along with the ID number but not description – can that be added?

title: Enhancing Defect Tracking Workflow with ACC - Issues
body_text: Hi everyone, We're working on integrating ACC for on-site operations, including collaboration with subcontractors. One key aspect is the defect tracking workflow. To ensure the integrity of this process, it's crucial that information added by the initiator, such as priority and categories, remains unalterable. I propose implementing permissions on issues feature for attributes, whether custom or native, to address this. Additionally, making GPS location a mandatory field would be beneficial, as

title: Enable widening of sheets/views list in desktop model viewer.
body_text: I would like to be able to see whole name of a sheet in published set when viewing model in desktop on Docs. Right now experience is not great having to hover for a second over a sheet to see its full name preview.

title: 30 optional reviewers within a review workflow not enough
body_text: In our projects, the detailed design group includes more than 30 members. Unfortunately, the current reviewer limit of 30 creates a significant challenge in managing our review processes effectively. Due to the lack of flexibility in the review functionality, I’m forced to use a workaround — which is far from ideal and adds unnecessary complexity. Your support team was responsive, but unfortunately, the current system limitations do not provide a practical solution for large projects like ours.

title: Break down project admin tasks
body_text: I would love to see the possibility to break down some of the project admin possibilities and assign them to certain users/roles in a project. For example, my BIM manager can create coordination spaces, but i don't need him to be able to change permissions in the folders in DOCS, or my quality controller can add forms to a project, but shouldn't be able to add or remove member from the project. Without the possibility of breaking down the task of project administration, bottle necks can form whe

title: Category-Based Issue Numbering in Autodesk Construction Cloud (Build)
body_text: I’m reaching out to formally raise a feature enhancement request on behalf of our multiple clients in the Delhi region who are actively using the Issues module in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC Build) across various departments such as Quality, Safety, and Design. Currently, ACC assigns a global issue numbering pattern like #1, #2, #3, and so on across all issue types and categories. However, our clients have been consistently requesting a more structured and category-dependent numbering syste

title: Publish Button
body_text: Please add a setting to where I CANNOT accidentally click publish for a bid package before I'm ready to in BuildingConnected. 'Publish' is the same color as the 'Add Bidders' and it's just WAY TOO easy to accidentally click publish before you're ready. Please consider removing it from being so easily clickable before you're ready to click it.

title: File Attachment Option in ACC-Files Email Notifications
body_text: Currently, when a file is shared from ACC-Files or referenced within a correspondence, the system includes a link to the file in the email notification. In most cases, this approach is effective and efficient. However, there are certain scenarios where it would be preferable for the file to be directly attached to the email itself, rather than requiring the recipient to access it via a link. For example, external recipients or stakeholders may benefit from immediate access to a fixed version of

title: Expand My Home Page Analytics to Include Role-Based Assignments
body_text: Currently, the analytics displayed on the My Home page only reflect items that are directly assigned to the individual user. While this is useful, it does not provide a complete picture for users who work as part of a role-based team. Please consider enhancing the My Home page analytics to also include items that are assigned to roles the user belongs to, in addition to their personal assignments. This would provide a more comprehensive and accurate overview of all responsibilities and progress

title: Disable Pushpins While Reviewing Models on Browsers or ACC
body_text: During model reviews, it would be helpful to have an option to temporarily disable or hide all pushpins , similar to the coordination view in Navisworks. This would improve visibility and navigation within the model. Refer to the attached sample, created after generating over 5,000 issues in a large-scale project.

title: Add Glass Scratch Repair as an option for 'Work Performed'
body_text: Currently, there are several trades that are not options to choose from under the dropdown for 'Work Performed' in the 'Work Information' section of the 'Company Profile'. One of those is Glass Scratch Repair, but there are many others. Yes, these are niche trades, but they are still needed trades. And it is so much easier for contractors to find these niche companies that they need when there is an option for those companies to choose so they can be on the list. Another idea is to have the opti

title: Feature Request: More Accurate Work Category Options for BuildingConnected
body_text: I’d like to suggest an improvement to BuildingConnected that would enhance the accuracy of trade classifications and, in turn, improve search rankings and bid relevance for specialized contractors. Currently, our company—which specializes in commercial coffee and espresso equipment—is limited to selecting between “Appliances” and “Food Service Equipment.” These categories are too broad and group together a wide range of unrelated equipment types. As a result, it becomes difficult for businesses

title: ISSUES AND NOTIFICATIONS
body_text: I suugest that the creator of the issue receive notifications when comments are added

title: [Schedule] Ability to pin/lock tasks
body_text: I am a BIM manager and I use Build's Plans to create my BIM schedule and activities. I import the construction schedule from our field team and link activities to my BIM schedule. I use the auto-forward feature for all my tasks but I have many tasks or linked items that I would like to not auto-forward. For example, if I link an activity from the construction schedule such as underground MEP work, I would like to pin these tasks so they don't move when my handoff task dates change. Ideally you w

title: Navisworks 2026 Issue Status Mapping - Doesn't follow ACC standards
body_text: Navisworks 2026 introduced a Clash Detective clash result status mapping to the ACC Issues status. But the problem is the concept and order of these statuses in both products do not align very well. This causes confusion. Starting in Navisworks the problem is quite noticeable with the 'Reviewed clash' and 'Approved clash' settings. In the below screenshot, they are mapped to their default ACC statuses. When you then review the Statuses in ACC, taking note of the 'Completed' and 'In review', you

title: RFI Types - Management
body_text: Currently when an RFI Type is deleted, we cannot reuse that title name again. Would be very helpful if they types would either 'version' or we could use the name again.

title: ACC Forms Section API
body_text: Can we get an endpoint to get Form Sections to check the status of each section, and also the section assignees if any. Currently there is no such endpoint to get sections to check the status.

title: Ability to tie multiple Building Connected Contracts to a single Cost Management Budget Code
body_text: "As built, the integration from BuildingConnected to Cost Management only supports a 1:1 relationship between contracts and budget codes. Supporting a 1:many relationship (multiple contracts to a single budget code) isn’t currently available" In ACC you are able to associate multiple contracts to a single budget code. Building connected can not support the same ability.

title: New project notifications to added members
body_text: Ability to have control over email notifications to project members when they are added to a project. I have a client with a user based account and does not want to assign their limited number of licenses to individuals who are invited to the project. They would like to eliminate the automatic email notification that a member receives when added to the project.

title: Check Boxes for Applicable Plan Packages
body_text: We're working on a project that spans many miles and will have plan sets released to us periodically. In lieu of submitting the same submittal 17 times (for each segment), we're looking to simply check boxes as part of the initial submittal process. Just need to add an option for a plan segment, and ability for the admin to customize what those are, similar to the spec packages now. Then during the submittal process, you can click a drop down with all the plan segments, and you can select which

title: Post api for photos module with tags and location
body_text: I'm currently working on implementing the POST API for the Photos module in our application, and I’d love to get some input, suggestions, or best practices before finalizing the design and functionality. 📌 Objective We need an endpoint that allows users to upload photos along with metadata (e.g. title, tags, comments, or album association).

title: Status option for markups
body_text: It would be nice to be able to change the status of a markup and group them into various buckets. (as well as associate those markups with issues). We can set internal procedures using the colors, but this could quickly become complicated if there are multiple users or coordination with other companies that have their own color code. How are we do identify whether these markups have been picked up or discussed while still maintaining the marks as a record? I would like the ability to filter the

title: Text markup rotation
body_text: It would be very helpful to be able to rotate text and other markups in order to orient the text at a specific angle. Thank you.

title: Issues indicator in Reviews
body_text: Currently, only the Markups indicator is shown in the Reviews. We suggest adding an Issues indicator that displays the number of Issues on each file, along with their Type details. This is because we are now using Issues to provide comments on the files instead of Markups. Having an Issues indicator would help Final Reviewer determine the review status of each file more efficiently, without needing to open each file individually to check the comments. Typically, comments are contributed by the I

title: Complete review indicator for each file
body_text: When multiple files are submitted in a single review and received by the reviewer, there is no indicator showing which files have been opened and reviewed. As a result, when the review involves multiple files, especially when no markups are added, the reviewer may have difficulty remembering which files have already been reviewed and which have not. Currently, only the 'Submit Review' button is available to indicate that the review for all files has been completed. However, it is suggested to in

title: More section planes in ACC
body_text: it would be helpful if we could have more section views in ACC that align with the View Cube planes rather than having to reverse the VC orientation to get the desired section view. (i.e. looking from the bottom section plane to review reflected ceiling layout)

title: Support multi-line QR codes in Assets
body_text: We're a company working with modular building that we rent out. As such, we have all our modules tagged with QR codes. However, the current Barcode scanner in the ACC app does not support our multi-line QR codes. Since quite some time back, we've created these and put them on out modules so changing it is quite challenging as most of them are out on rent. Thus, I suggest that Autodesk fix the problem in not supporting these QR code in line with the ISO/IEC 18004 standard for how to handle multi-

title: Request to Enable Correspondence Data Extraction for Reporting and Dashboarding – Autodesk Construction Cloud
body_text: Hope you are doing well. We would like to raise limitation we are currently facing with the Correspondence Module in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) . The issue pertains to the inability to extract correspondence data , such as open vs. closed correspondences , either through the Reports or the Insight Dashboards . Current Challenge: The project team is actively using the Correspondence module to manage internal and external communication across multiple stakeholders (Contractor, PMC, Client,

title: Estimate numbering in ProEst
body_text: It would be great if ProEst had the ability for the users to configure estimate numbering. For example, something like the YYYY-XXXX for the year and sequential estimate number i.e. 2025-0001... As it stands, someone inadvertently created an estimate in our system and entered xxx-xxxxxxxx as the number, now all future estimates are getting assigned the next 12 digit number. It's a long string, and error prone if someone has to transcribe the number. At a minimum, we should be able to reset the c

title: Select more than 50 issues
body_text: Now the select all button, at the top of the issues list, only select the issues on that page. As the list is paged for every 50 issues it is not possible to select more than 50 issues. The select all button should select all issues, not only the issues on that page. Or add another button!

title: Issues for multiple clashes / group of clashes / group of "activities".
body_text: Could it be possible to investigate the option of grouping tasks withiin a single issue; something like generating multiple sub-tasks in a single issue? For clarity I´ll explain a sample with clashes. Opening an issue for solving out clashes of the same typology, same level or just a group of them. Be able to select those clashes at attach their ID to the issue. This will be very benefitial as we will need to open, assign, etc.. just one issue for the resolution of multiple taks (in this case, c

title: Auto save PDF Fillable Forms
body_text: 'Native' forms in Autodesk include auto save. Would like to include that same feature to the PDF fillable forms as well.

title: Automatic Hyperlinks Issue
body_text: The automatic hyperlinks are great for contract drawings. However, our shop drawings have dimensions on them and ACC is automatically highlighting all of the dimensions on all shop drawings, with no actual reference point. Excess highlights/markups on our drawings that we don't need and make them messy.

title: Files, search first Version (V1) Uploaded by myself - the "document creator"
body_text: have a challenge by using Search in Files. I would like to find the documents that I have “uploaded the first version of” (it is like the creator in windows explore, but It is not possible to Create documents in Autodesk Construction Cloud, so that is the first uploader of version 1 am trying to find) to follow the document lifecycle of these and not my colleagues documents

title: Design Collaboration // Allow the ViewCube to move down with the Timeline
body_text: The Design Collaboration interface has recently received some subtle changes. The previous layout had the Timeline spanning the entire top part. While viewing the Team Model and with the Timeline expanded, the ViewCube moved down with it. You can see this in the below older screenshot sourced from the Autodesk website. With the new changes, the Timeline no longer spans the entire top part. And when the Timeline is expanded, the ViewCube becomes hidden behind the Timeline panel. In fact, the Mini

title: Downloading all versions
body_text: I am not sure sure if this is a setting made on our system. Currently I cannot find a way other than manual export each file to download all the versions of files. This is a requirement for archiving in our company. We need a simple way to download/sync all versions of files within ACC.

title: Plant 3D models open in 3D view as default
body_text: Hi Autodesk Please setup ACC Viewer open AutoCAD Plant 3D models default in 3D view instead of 2D view.

title: [Submittals] Add an option to include the Revision as part of the file name when downloaded
body_text: Raising this on behalf of our client: [Submittals] Is there a way to automatically include the Revision number in the file name when downloading documents? Ideally, this feature could be optional or set as default, allowing users to manually remove the Revision number from the file name if needed. While it might seem counterintuitive, this request comes from users who want to ensure the Revision number is consistently reflected in the file name for version control and traceability.

title: Improved Issue Filters
body_text: With so many types of issues being added, additional filter parameters would be a valuable improvment. The ability to configure and SAVE custom Filters would steamline daily use and reduce repetitive setup. Integrating these filters into the iPad sync settings would also allow users to avoid syncing unnecessary data— helping improve performance by focusing only on the issues that matter to that individual . - Keyword search for Description Title allows for a keyword search, but title is restrict

title: Build Submittal Workflows
body_text: It would be helpful to add a feature to copy workflows either from another project (which I understand is challenging based on users but could be done by roles) or at least within the same project. Submittal workflows I have created are very similar to each other with the exception of a few people or roles and this feature would make it faster when creating new projects.

title: Alphabetize Bidder List by Company Name
body_text: We can only export a bidders list that's organized by division and then alphabetized by company name. It would be nice if we could export a bidders list that is formatted strictly by company name having a separate column that lists the division name/number.

title: ACC RFI
body_text: Id like to see the "watcher" in the excel export and filter function, thanks.

title: Add project adress standard to forms reports
body_text: the project adress can be filled in the project settings. when creating a report from a form, the project adress isn't shown. however for reporting this can be valuable information. please make this optional, or add in the form report.

title: Sheet or View Name on the Title Bar
body_text: There is a big empty space at the top of the sheets/views window. Please automatically add the sheet / view name when i open any sheet. Many sheets have very long names and they are not completely displayed in the left-side list. All i see is Floor plan... or Formwork plan...

title: BuildingConnected - Share link with third party printer
body_text: If a bidder wants to send bid documents to a third-party printer, currently they need to download the documents and send them to the printer using some other method - usually a FTP site, because the documents are too large for email. Ideally they could share a link with their printing company without having to go through this step.

title: Custom fields - Location categorization in Submittals-Reviews
body_text: Having rigid submittals and reviews process makes it impossible to use. Please make it possible to add the project location to (submittals - Reviews) that is made in the project settings Also to have the possibility to add additional custom attributes as in RFIs to categorize the submittal even more, as the current setting is not giving options for any customizations at all.

title: Review Status Options
body_text: ACC only allows Approved or Rejected as a status. In Vietnam these words are very strong in terms of accountability and often we receive documents we need to review, accepts as information, check the content and filing etc etc. So it would be great to have a status of a file as Accepted/Reviewed/Checked for example. When we ask a document controller for example to review a scanned file being uploaded for record that it is readable, named correctly and in the right folder they are refusing to pre

title: Review Auto Trigger Issue with new uploaded Versions
body_text: When we apply auto trigger on a folder there is an error in the logic when the initiator uploads a new file version. The process: Uploads V1 file --> Review 1 starts auto triggered. Review 1 is ongoing but initiator uploads V2 file. Auto trigger rules initiates a new review 2. There needs to be some pop - up/choice to the user when they upload a new version of a file when the previous version is still in review. There could be options to void the first flow, or by pass the auto trigger so they c

title: Snaps, Scales, Dimensions, and Polyclouds
body_text: Hello, I've been working with my team to onboard them to ACC for reviews. We're a legacy Autodesk Design Review team, but we've run into significant issues working with that software on ACC through Desktop Connector, so we're looking to migrate to improve our cloud experience. That said, the team is disappointed that they are losing dimension callouts with snaps, scale recognition for views, Dimension callout markups, and Polyclouds. These were in BIM360 Docs, so it's frustrating that this new p

title: Link Root Causes to Specific Issue Types for Improved Categorization
body_text: Description: Currently, all root causes are available for selection regardless of the issue type, which can lead to confusion and misclassification. For example, root causes related to HSE (Health, Safety, and Environment) are not relevant for production-related issues, and vice versa. I propose introducing a feature that allows administrators to define and link specific root causes to specific issue types. This would ensure that users only see relevant root causes when logging or analyzing an i

title: Ability to export RFI with Correspondence details
body_text: Hello, We need a feature that will allow us to be able to export RFIs with attached correspondence emails. Currently it does not do that and we need to be able to note these for our GCs when working with outside partners. Thanks.

title: Issue Templates Should be able to be created by a project Member with appropriate Permissions, not just a project Administrator
body_text: We have our site teams create templates for issues, but have to give them administrator access to do that. If possible we would like to be able to assign that to Project Member, but restrict it through permissions. Regards

title: Submittal - API Deleted/Filter Status
body_text: The Submittals module does not currently have an API endpoint/webhook that reports on deleted items. While APIs exist for creating, updating, and retrieving submittals, there is no way for customers of the API to be notified or retrieve records that have been deleted. I would recommend to either have a filter status added onto the submittals to pull deleted issues or include it in the current submittal statues.

title: Save search filters in Reviews
body_text: Save search filters in Reviews - to speed up finding previously used combinations (eg workflow, status and initiated by - save as one personalised search filter)

title: Add "Forms" funtion to the Home Dashboard
body_text: We are using "Forms" function under build product for the TQ's and it will be helpful if you could add this fucntion to the dashboard like issues, reviews, RFI, submittals etc. thank you in advance.

title: Limit Member Creation to Account Admins
body_text: It would be great to have the ability to limit those on our account who can create new members to only account admin. Or perhaps a toggle on the project admin setup, allowing us to decide if that role can add new members.

title: Ability to Lock Specific Folders in Desktop Connector
body_text: Context: To prevent accidental moves or changes—especially during large-scale operations—it would be extremely helpful to have the ability to “lock” certain folders within Desktop Connector. This could prevent unintended actions such as moving or renaming critical directories. Request: Introduce a folder locking mechanism in Desktop Connector that allows users or admins to restrict movement or edits to specific folders. This could be a native feature or potentially leverage existing Windows file

title: Building Connected - Disable the Bid Forms option
body_text: When doing public bidding sometimes we need physical sealed envelopes with bids and forms. Having the "Bid Forms" tab available is confusing for the bidders. There should be an option to disable the tab.

title: Email Notifications
body_text: The subject should include the project code and project name for all the email notifications, rather than just "New sheets were published" for example. People who are part of multiple projects will greatly benefit from this. Also, when sheets are published, the email body should show the sheet titles too, because not much information can be gathered by just looking at the sheet numbers when compared to the sheet titles. Having the ability to customise the subject and the body contents of the ema

title: User Specific NDA Requirements
body_text: Make the NDA requirement user-specific on each project/package. This will be useful for projects that have to invite the Owner/Client to packages as they should not have to sign their "own" NDA.

title: Saving All Versions
body_text: When you revision a document and then close it down, saving everything to file - if you were to transfer this to a thumb drive would both versions copy over or only one? It appears that ACC will only save the version that you are currently on, but that does not make sense - why would you not save the whole file - or at least have an option to save the whole file - save "All" or "X Version". Our clients want all documents at the end of the job, not just the most current version, so this takes way

title: Improved permissions for approval workflow reviewers
body_text: Internal Approval workflows need an expansion to have the ability to include people who are directly involved in the item being approved but should not have Project Admin privileges. I have an 8 step upstream internal approval workflow - all approvals need to come from members of the same company, and who are in different departments. These people should not have Admin privileges, do not need the ability to see items that are not directly assigned to them, and will not be in the Cost system for

title: RFI Due Date Flexibility
body_text: I am currently experiencing an issue with setting Due Dates for RFI responses in the Build system. At the moment, I can only set due dates to today or later, which is problematic as I am trying to input my previous RFIs to harmonize my reporting methods. Due to this limitation, and as the system recognizes all newly input RFIs as being created today, I am prevented from entering the correct due dates. Additionally, I am unable to edit any already set due dates, as the system forces me to select

title: Leave a Hub
body_text: I have a bunch of hubs I will most likely never need access to again. I wish there was the ability to leave a hub without contacting the admin of some other company, who's contact I no longer have, etc

title: Improvement of Notification Settings – Time Control & Markup Alerts
body_text: I appriciatee flexibility of the notification panel—being able to set the frequency per option is a great feature. There are 2 of key improvements that would make it even more useful in real-world workflows: Notification Timing Control Our clients and subcontractors often want daily updates, but getting them at 4 a.m. isn’t ideal. A simple option to set preferred delivery times would go a long way in keeping everyone informed—without the early morning frustration. Add Notifications for Markups R

title: Admin Rights for Forms
body_text: Hi I am a Senior Document Controller/Information Manager and have worked on many CDEs (4Projects, Aconex, Asite etc etc) over many many years. On all other CDEs I have been an Administrator on - which is all of them, I have always been able to override the system in case of error. However, on a project we have with ACC 4 forms were accidentally 'Approved' but they shouldn't have been. As a result of this system I cannot override the decision. I appreciate that one doesn't want the Users to be ab

title: Project template Folder permissons
body_text: In some cases, it would be helpful to be able to select a company for the authorization folder settings that are assigned in project templates.

title: Navisworks Issue View from Clash Matrix – Toggle Wireframe
body_text: When creating issues from a clash within the clash matrix on ACC, the resulting view in Navisworks displays a wireframe model and highlights only the two clashing objects. This makes it difficult to understand the context of the clash, as the surrounding model elements are hidden. The only way to view the full model and see what’s around the clash is to close the issue entirely (within Navisworks). This becomes particularly frustrating during meetings, where it's important to quickly assess the

title: Attachment Renaming
body_text: Attachment renaming, it would allow us to use attachments similarly to photos but attachments have the additional permission benefits. We use the renaming to track photographs, for example window references etc.

title: DNU List/ Preferred List
body_text: For the DNU list, it would be helpful for our team to be able to view the DNU list but not be able to add/remove. It would only be admin who adds and removes. For the preferred list , there is no way to get a list of the subs the company has selected. Just by trade. Would like to be able to pull up a list since multiple people can add.

title: add the attribute "approved with comments" in review
body_text: add the attribute "approved with comments" in review. otherwise, there is no option to understand that the documents have any comments.

title: Markup tool - pin up callout for Reviews
body_text: Add option in Review to pin callout tool panel in place, rather than have it turn on and off everytime I have to add a document markup. When it turns on and off it moves the entire view of the document and the user can lose their place.

title: the files which are sent by Transmittal should be "frozen" as in Reviews
body_text: I observed that the files which are sent by Transmittal are not frozen: for example, I sent today the version one of a file to a contractor , or an entire folder but, those files that I sent today are not frozen. If tomorrow I will change something in that folder or the version of a file, that company will not download the initial files, it will download the last modified version. I think that those files should be "Frozen" like in Reviews tab, when you send something for review, the files remai

title: Asset Sorting on mobile devices
body_text: Hello Everyone, To work as efficiently as possible in our factory, it is desirable to sort assets not only by name or creation date but also by manually created fields. This is related to production order sequences, etc. it would be nice if this feature is implemented on short notice. Best Regards Chris

title: Manage Worksets on multiple links
body_text: Manage Worksets on Multiple Links Simultaneously Description: In many BIM projects, we link multiple models from various disciplines. Currently, managing worksets for each link must be done one by one, which is both time-consuming and error-prone — especially when working with large projects or frequent link updates. I propose that Autodesk enables the ability to manage or change the assigned worksets for multiple links at once . For example, selecting several links and assigning them to the sam

title: Hyperlink on Sheets Shoud Navigate to Detail, Not Just Sheet
body_text: Would be great if the hyperlink bug would take you to the actual detail vs. just the sheet.

title: Document attachments for Submittal templates
body_text: Create the ability to add standard document templates to the Submittal review templates so they don't have to be individually uploaded in the creation/review process

title: EXPORT REPORT OF A SEARCH
body_text: When you create a search in ACC it would be interesting you could export a report with all the files and shared metadata to a excel. This could be interesting for Locked files for sample.

title: Issues indicator
body_text: In the good old days of BIM360 we were able to tell which documents had an Issue raised on them from an indicator in the document list. This indicator is not available in ACC - can it please be made available?

title: Submittal Log Limited to 2000 Entries
body_text: Please remove the limit of 2,000 items from the submittal log. This is an unnecessary limit for large projects.

title: Line thickness setting option for markups
body_text: Submitting this request on behalf of the EBA customer. They are looking for a 'Border Thickness' option to be available, allowing them to set the line thickness before creating markups, similar to the functionality available in the ACC app.

title: Asset Systems Isolate
body_text: Similar to when selecting on an Asset and being able to view that asset in the model, it would be amazing if you could select on an Asset System and have it isolate showing only the assets in the system.

title: Vacation Callender in BUILD
body_text: It would be great to have a vacation calendar in build, where you can assign a delegate that will have the ability to complete any "ball in court" steps in your absence. The issue is raised because sometimes when we are using custom work flows for RFIs and Submittals, if that member is on vacation for an extended length of time, then the RFI or Submittal can be held up. If there was an option to add in your days off within ACC, set a delegate to cover your work and ACC automatically assigns thos

title: Linked Images/PDF in Revit Model Should Show in ACC Published Docs File
body_text: I find myself linking a lot of PDFs or JPEGs for a variety of reasons, but it appears those images do not show up when they are linked (Using "Link PDF" and "Link Image"). They do show up when I import them ("Import PDF" and "Import Image"), however, it is easier to link images for ease of updating those files; a simple reload will update it.

title: Forecast - Multiple per Project
body_text: Request that multiple Forecast be allowed per project. Per our company procedures, we have to forecast per quarter and report any variance per quarter and annually. So, in other words, we need to keep track of multiple forecasts per project. Additional line items could be added below Forecast Final Cost – such as, Forecast 1, Forecast 2, etc. Also, we need the ability to compare to each forecast with a variance report.

title: Project Admin Locations available as Attribute in Docs
body_text: it would be helpful to add Location out of the Docs Project Admin environment. this way a document is better aligned to a specific location of the project. I know it is possible with Sheets, but would be cool to have it for all files in Docs.

title: Copy files as an option within Packages
body_text: For some workflows it can be helpful to have a copy files option within the packages environment.

title: Report Feature for Document Shares
body_text: In light of the recent phishing emails sent from no-reply@autodesk.com (see the alert page) and as this has been an issue plaguing my client's company, I would like to request that a "Report this Document" feature be implemented. Docusign, DropBox, and other companies that do document shares have this on the landing page of their shares, so that if a user receives a document with just a link to a phishing site, they can report it to help speed up removal. This would assist in preventing other pe

title: Lock Plan Entries
body_text: It is incredibly easy to move around Tasks and SubTasks in Plan. The idea is to have users come in and update their progress, add references, etc, but not drag items around.

title: TAKEOFF Custom Scales
body_text: Currently there is a drop down with select scales to choose from when performing 2D takeoffs (see attached image for options). I recognize that there is the option to use the calibrate tool if you have a different scale then what is shown, but it is requested that there is a "custom scale" feature that can be used to directly input any scale.

title: Proposal for New ACC Issue Status: "Awaiting / Pending Info"
body_text: Some ACC users want to add custom status fields for issues. I think this might make things more confusing and less consistent. Instead, it might be better to add one new status that most users could use. Right now, we use these statuses: Open Completed Closed Not approved Pending The problem is when we need more info from the reviewer. It's hard to track. We could either: Add a new status called "Awaiting / Pending info" Or just rename "Pending" to "Awaiting / Pending info" Either of these optio

title: Adding member to a job
body_text: It should not be so hard to add a member to a job. 1) If you want to add an existing member, once you pull them to the "General Contact" or any of the other roles, the should automatically be added to the job and to at least the Cost application. Currently if we add a member to the "Cost Payment Application Contact" we still have to go into the project admin to add them to the project before they are actually able to submit invoices. 2) If you want to add a new member, you should be able to add

title: Model Coordination > Clashes
body_text: Idea: Option to revert clash data to clashes list in case of miss selection of clash item on created issue by actually voiding/deleting issue item Current behavior: when Issue item is deleted, the clash data will not go back to the clashes list instead it will go with the deleted issue

title: Ability to Hide Issues on Sheets
body_text: I'd like their to be a quick button on each sheet to easily and quickly hide issues. Right now, when we open a sheet, it's hard to see the drawing when it's covered in issues. We always need to be able to see what's on the drawing. I think two things needs to happen the issues icon should be a lot smaller when zoomed out so you can see the actual plans there should be a quick button to turn off issues and turn them on again so if you just need to see the plans, you can see them.

title: ACC TAKEOFF - Permission Settings
body_text: It appears that there are no permission settings available in TAKEOFF (except for files, which is standard throughout all of ACC products). I would like the ability to apply permissions to TAKEOFF packages, sheets and models (similar to sheets in BUILD). For example, I would like the ability to add the Client or Contractor to TAKEOFF with only "view and export" permission. This way they can review the takeoffs from 2D sheets / 3D models along with the inventory but not have the ability to edit o

title: Export Budget Payment Application
body_text: I need a way to export the budget payment application. Our process require a wet signature (not just the system approvals) I also do not link to any accounting software and need to have a easy to follow summary to use when cutting a check. Does this exist? I don't have any export or print features.

title: enabling/disabling attributes in excel reviews
body_text: Option to turn off and on attributes when creating issue report template or running issue report. This already works for PDF reports. Eg. when i dont use Location in project, I want option to turn the attribute off for excel since i dont want to send half empty report. This would be usefull for any attribute, plus there could also be option to add custom attribute into report, since you can use it a lot in issues

title: Notification settings for published plans
body_text: Notification settings for published plans

title: Library Tool
body_text: It would be nice to be able to push out File folder structures out to projects to be able to update the structure on projects that have been created from the template, but don't currently have files.

title: ACC Shared Parameter Service Permissions Controls
body_text: Currently, I can see the Shared Parameter Service parameters for any firm that I've ever been invited to work on a project on their hub. In turn, anyone I've invited to a project on my hub, they can see my firm's shared parameters on the Shared Parameter Service. This should not be allowed, certainly not as a default. There should be a permissions setting that prevent external consultants from viewing company standards unless specifically given permissions to do so. Ideally there could be a Para

title: Sort issue reports by assignee
body_text: Having the ability to sort and group issue reports by assignee would make it easier for recipients to find their issues when viewing the report.

title: Display Project Number at top of Project page in Build
body_text: We would like to see the Project Number displayed at the top of the project page, along with the Project Name. We currently include the Project Number in our Project Name since you were not able to see Project Numbers when searching for jobs when we onboarded. But, having them combined in the Project Name field requires an additional manual step for our Stratus team because they have to remove the Project Number from the Project Name field to get their labels to populate correctly. It's nice to

title: Collections Sub Folders
body_text: It would be great to have the ability to create subfolders within collections, allowing for better organization by separating preconstruction drawings from construction drawings.

title: Display sheet title at top of page instead of version set.
body_text: It would be nice to see the sheet title at the top of the page when viewing the sheet. That's almost always more important information than the version set. It helps with navigating through the sheets while viewing.

title: ACC Build: Connecting Schedule and Model
body_text: It would be good if we can connect a schedule with a model in ACC

title: Make Form Details bar hideable
body_text: In Autodesk Build under Forms, when filling out a form, specifically a fillable PDF, it would be helpful if we were able to minimize or hide the Form Details so that the viewing window would be bigger.

title: Project Description
body_text: I would like to be able to add a description to the settings of a project and be able to show it on the projects home page. We have multiple projects with the same customers where we would like to be able to show what the difference is without having to add it to the project name. The longer project name can cause issues with desktop connector for character length in windows.

title: RFI- allow us to template more details
body_text: Allow us to template the following: Remove "Open for Manager" status Set starting RFI number at 001 Set roles as watchers

title: RFI- Updates needed when using "Assign to Email" function
body_text: We are a subcontractor and are not inviting 3rd parties into our site. We are using "Assign to email" when sending RFIs to the GC. There are several things we'd like to see an improvement on: Do not add "non-members" to our Account Member List when we use "Assign to email" in RFIs. Only allow attachments to be uploaded since non-members cannot see them if we add a reference from an ACC tool. Only allow PDF attachments since other file types don't seem to make it to the recipient. Allow us to see

title: Scheduled Actions
body_text: In construction management, there are a lot of dates or events that trigger work. Being able to plan for these with triggers and accompanying actions would greatly improve the responsiveness to the client and contractor. The most simple would be scheduling the "Expiration" of an approval. For example, some materials are approved for a duration based off the last provided Certificate of Analysis. Being able to schedule reopening a submittal for an updated Certificate of Analysis would mean that t

title: Default Clash display on ACC
body_text: When user select Clash in the list of clashes, the model window shows objects that intersect, with the view scale, angle and camera position set to see both objects in their entirety. In case one of the objects is very large in dimensions and the second object is small, finding the intersection becomes a big problem. If, after selecting Clash, the view was oriented directly to the intersection, then it would greatly speed up the procedure of analyzing the problem and creating Issues. As an examp

title: Request for Default Value Setting Feature During Project Creation
body_text: I would like a feature that allows administrators to specify default values for each item, such as 'Project Type' and 'Template,' when creating a project

title: Enable/Disable Snap Points  in Viewer
body_text: It would be a great feature if the Viewer had an option to toggle Snap Points on and off. This would allow for more precise and flexible measurements, especially in situations where snapping might interfere with the desired dimensions. Having this functionality would greatly enhance the usability of the Viewer for detailed reviews and measurements.

title: Selecting folders to apply naming standards to the template
body_text: Today, it is possible to add naming standards to the template, but we are still unable to select the folders to which we want the standards to be applied. In my opinion, there is no reason why naming standards cannot be applied to the template.

title: Proposal to add functionality to team management methods
body_text: When selecting a person in charge in various situations, you may use “company”, “role” or “individual”, but it is difficult to manage each team with these three functions. Specifically, there are the following problems ・It is difficult to set each member as “company” or “role” or “individual” on ACC every time ・There are teams that cannot be controlled by role or company ・There are various teams for each project Therefore, I would like to be able to create something like a “group” that can be ma

title: Ability to create new company parameters
body_text: The possibility of creating new parameters in the configuration of a company is required. Parameters such as a second classification code, name of the main contact, name of the legal representative, logo, etc.

title: Correspondence Linked to RFI's
body_text: In RFI's, you can add correspondence by picking from the references. However, the correspondence is not actually linked to that RFI, and there is nothing in the RFI that shows that correspondence was sent. If correspondence is linked to an RFI, it needs to show up in the references when viewing the RFI. The reason this is needed is because we want to document any and all correspondence related to that RFI and have it linked to that RFI for future reference. For example, if a subcontractor ever s

title: Be Able to Control-Z in Model Coordination Web Viewer
body_text: It would be a sanity saver to have the ability to utilize control-z (undo previous action) in the Model Coordination web based viewer. Similar to its utilization it in Navisworks/Revit/Civil 3D applications.

title: RFI workflow default assigned by Role or Company
body_text: Currently only one default workflow is able to be selected for the entire project. We have a project with multiple subcontractors that have access to creating RFIs back to us, the GC. We would like to assign different default workflows based on the role or company the individual creating the RFI is part of. Restricting the number of workflows in the drop down based on the role would be nice to have as well.

title: Attributes for Folders
body_text: It would be great to have the ability to add attributes to folders within ACC-Files to leverage search and filter feature.

title: Navisworks Issues Add-in - Default Issue Status Filter
body_text: Whenever I open up the Coordination Issues "Manage Issues" window, it is defaulted to showing all issue pins. Each time I have to go to the filter, click on the Status drop-down, and individual check all the status options except for "Closed". It would be much more efficient if the Closed issues were set to be hidden by default, or at least give the user the ability to save the filter state for a model.

title: Members
body_text: When a member is created in a project, the information like the Company assigned and role should follow through to the Account Admin.

title: Feature update on ACC Issues & Reviews to make the initiator / creator company members to Access
body_text: Requirements: If the Reviews or Issues are still open & the initiator / creator left the particular organization, as an admin, we should be able to change the Initiator in Reviews & created by in Issues. Since that person's autodesk id will be deactivated, except the admin & tagged people of that review or issue rest of the team members in that project who have member access are not able to see. Also if possible, if a person from a particular company raises an issue or review, the other members

title: Package folders in Project Templates
