body_text: We are beginning to use Packages to package drawings into groups for submission for Building Regulations approval (Building Codes). The Regulations in the UK have a predetermined structure (Part A to Part T currently). It would be very efficient if we could add a folder for each Package in a Project Template, to save us having to do this manually for each project.

title: The ADC System Tray App to open in a separate window not a pop up window
body_text: Need this pop up window to be a floating window that stays on screen instead of disappearing when I select something else.

title: Copy files across ACC projects
body_text: Can't copy folders/files across projects in a single tenant, only a move option is available but it fails every time. You can copy foldes/files acorss separate tenants though so why not across projects in a single tenant.

title: Request for Recursive File Inclusion and Folder Structure Preservation in Review Submissions
body_text: It would be highly beneficial to enhance the review submission process with the following features: Recursive File Inclusion : When submitting a folder for review, ensure that all files within the folder, along with files in all nested subfolders across all levels (not just the first level), are automatically included in the review process. Folder Structure Preservation : Provide an option to copy approved files into a specified destination while retaining their original folder hierarchy. This a

title: Reference forms in Approvals workflow
body_text: This would be a nice to have. During the approvals workflow being able to reference forms at the initiator, reviewer and approver stages.

title: Email notification
body_text: When an Issue is made and assigned to a member, the member receives an email notification. The email notification only has status, type, assignee, due date, location, and linked document. This is good but it does not include the description filed. The member that receives this email does not know what it is about or an idea of the problem. Will it be possible to update the default email template to include the description field? This is the ask.

title: ACC, Meetings, add follow up to items, highlighting changes
body_text: It can be handy to see what is changed in an item according the previous meeting. It can be with highlighting the new text, or by adding a kind of follow up

title: Mobile App Download Button
body_text: Recently, the ACC app was updated to allow the uploading of various files. However, there is still no functionality to download files within the app to an accessible location on the phone. Our field technicians require the ability to transfer files to their data collectors, but all files are currently hidden away within the ACC App's secure folders, requiring root level access to interact with. The workaround we currently implement is to run an APK that allows the saving of the cached file throu

title: Add ability to reassign the initiator role for the approval workflow
body_text: A recurring question from several projects is how to address an unforeseen absence of the initiator during approval workflow process. An administrator can overrule the initiating of second or next round when a document is returned OR the other designer can start a new workflow. Both are unwanted workarounds, because we want to save on the time of the admin AND keep tractability of the comments in the affected workflow(s). Therefore, the request to add the ability to reassign the initiator role f

title: Create a tool to reset user profile/clear cache
body_text: Kinda like the AutoCAD profile reset tool, it'd be nice to have a tool to reset the user profile related to Desktop Connector.

title: APS API - Activity (Log)
body_text: Create an API for APS ACC to get Activity information from Forms, Issues (and other items that have Activity Logs). Here is the reference API for Forms: https://aps.autodesk.com/en/docs/acc/v1/reference/http/forms-forms-GET/ .

title: ACC Parent View
body_text: We would like the option to manage multiple 'child' views that are based upon a single 'parent' view. So, if you were to add a model to the parent view child views would update with that same added model from the parent view. The reasoning behind this idea is a GC could manage a single view that multiple subcontractors could duplicate for their own model view.

title: Enhancement of "Review" Workflow with Resubmission Options for "Closed" and "Void" Reviews in Autodesk Construction Cloud
body_text: I propose adding two key features to the "Review" area in Autodesk Construction Cloud to enhance file resubmission workflows: "Submit for review" in "Closed" reviews : This feature would allow users to resubmit files from a "Closed" review for a new review cycle, similar to the existing "Transmit all" function. The key difference would be the ability to select files with their latest versions or the versions that were originally reviewed. This would save time by avoiding the need for manual file

title: SET PROJECT NUMBER AS UNIQUE
body_text: Currently, the Project Name is unique per Account. I suggest adding the option to set other project Attributes to be unique. Currently, my request is to set the Project Number as unique. I manage my projects by Project Number. Sometimes Project Names change, but the number does not. When I search for Projects via API / PBI I search by Project Number

title: Multiple window viewing in mobile app
body_text: iPads have the multitasking tool that allows for a split screen view of multiple windows. There are other apps that are compatible with that capability. It would be helpful for Autodesk to incorporate that into their iOS ACC app.

title: Sort Issues in Build
body_text: In the Issues tab in Build, you are unable to sort the issues by title, status, type, assigned to, etc. It would be nice to be able to sort issues when viewing them, instead of having to go through the filter function. This is also not an option in the Issues tab in Model Coordination either.

title: Autodesk Docs Files Saved Search (Import/Exort and Project Template)
body_text: As of today there is a great tool in Autodesk Docs to search for Files using filter. Those filters can be saved as "Saved search" and also share with others project members. However we have to recreate those filter for every new project. It would be really helpful either to import/export those "Saved Search" list or to get them include in Project Template. In our case, we use naming convention but we use this tool to search for files having a combination of naming convention attributes. So, this

title: adding (OR) condition in Model Browser search Filter
body_text: the Model Broswer search filter is amazing, but the only missing part in it is not having the (OR) Condition. For exemple, if i want to filter all the cabletrays + its fittings by level, it is not possible since both use different constrains when comes to level (Level vs refrence level), when the filter is used like the image below, it will only use (AND) condition. it will be nice we have the (OR) condition as well

title: Submittal Revision Numbering
body_text: We have clients and engineers who require specific submittal revision identifiers. When a submittal revision is created, it currently defaults to REV 1, 2, etc. We need the ability to change this to REV A, B, C, etc.

title: Data Exchange for Tekla Structures 2023 and newest versions
body_text: Hello, It was cool if this plugin, Data Exchange, had the possibility to work with other versions of Tekla, like 2023 and earlier. Because like Revit, Tekla also released new versions (2023, 2024, etc.), and this plugin is just for the 2022 version. Not everybody continues with these older versions and makes upgrades to their software as well. Thanks. Regards.

title: Regarding the type of review comments,
body_text: In the current frame, only a portion is visible, so I would like to have a feature added where the window can be expanded to show the entire content at once.

title: 3Dモデルとシート図面の重ね合わせ（ハイパーリンク）の活用
body_text: Revitでシート化したものはACC上で3Dモデルと図面の重ね合わせ（ハイパーリンク）機能を活用できますが、ビューで書き出したものに対しては、ACC上で重ね合わせ（ハイパーリンク）が出来ません。 ビューでも重ね合わせ（ハイパーリンク）ができるように改善してほしいです。

title: Adding Reviewers and Watchers
body_text: When adding watchers to a submittal on the front page of the submittal one can type the persons name, press 'enter' and continue typing someone else's name. Conversely when performing the same function for "reviewers" or "watchers through the "edit review workflow" or in the settings>review template one can type the name, press 'enter' but the letters entered for the previous name remain requiring the user to backspace to clear the previous typing before typing again. "Edit review workflow" and

title: Sort & Filter Submittals by Ball in Court
body_text: The submittals module used to have "Ball in Court Company" as one of the columns. This was removed and replaced by putting the company in parenthesis after the user. This column of "user (company)" does not have the ability to be sorted in the submittals module. Additionally the filter feature will not allow you to filter by 'contains' which does not allow you to filter by company. One can sort/filter if the submittal log is exported but cannot sort when looking in the module which is the more c

title: Model Coordination Object Colors Save to Docs
body_text: It's great that Model Coordination now supports colorizing objects (pretty basic as of now, could use some refining), but it would be very helpful to have that color scheme remain when a View is Saved to Docs. I use the "Save to Docs" feature to create views that the rest of the non-BIM team can open to view the model, and color schemes are part of our standard practice.

title: Submittal Default Sorting
body_text: Submittals default sorting is in decreasing order. Change this to increasing order, or retain sorting.

title: upload Files from mobile app
body_text: Upload files from mobile app (ACC) to Autodesk Docs

title: Apply Naming Standard to Folder with Files
body_text: Need to be able to apply a Naming Standard to a folder that already contains files. It's not always feasible to apply these standards to folders before they contain content, and downloading/deleting/apply standard/re-uploading the files should not be an acceptable alternate workflow.

title: Mobile Setting for automatic project sync interval
body_text: For asset management, it's very important to see real-time progress in our factory. We use mobile phones to set statuses on our elements, but we want to display progress on other screens so everybody can see the progress in 'real time'. Therefore, it would be nice if there were an option to sync our assets automatically every 5 minutes. automatically Sync default setting is off, and needs to be configured by the user. the time interval needs to be a setting with pre configured options Best regar

title: Schedule on the App
body_text: SCHEDULE IDEAS It would be nice to have the option to view the Gantt version of the schedule when in the app. Also it would be nice to have the ability to easily update percent complete for each item

title: Create folder in the Mobil app
body_text: Would it be possible to create a function on the mobile app to create a new folder where files or photos can be uploaded to?

title: Add members by NAME
body_text: This is another BIM360 vs ACC whinge however previously you could add members by either NAME or EMAIL. Now it only accepts Email addresses. Can you please fix.

title: Notification transmittal email - received by user name
body_text: Hi, i want to receive notification email by user name and not from Autodesk Construction Cloud as you can see in picture below

title: Notification transmittal email from USER name
body_text: I want to receive a notification from the user who sent the transmittal and not from Autodesk Construction Cloud as the user name.

title: option to submit a Form/Issue anonymously
body_text: For our field guys, I was thinking it might be beneficial that they add certain things, such as issues or forms, anonymously, especially when it comes to safety concerns.

title: Improving Data Transfer in Docs
body_text: Currently, we have the ability to transfer data to external recipients throug Trasnmitials. Now, there is a new feature that allows us to create data packages. It would be very helpful if we could also send these data packages to external recipients. This would significantly simplify and streamline the data transmission process.

title: Requiring Photo or Issue on a Question without needing logic
body_text: It would be very helpful to just plain require a photo or an issue for a question even if there is no conditional logic. Such as filling in a serial number from a piece of equipment and then having a photo of it as well.

title: Escape Key & Section Boxes in Model Viewer
body_text: Currently, hitting the Esc key will deactivate a section plane/box, which is very frustrating when other Autodesk workflows rely on pretty heavy use of the Esc key, mainly to deselect objects. Personally, I usually mash the Esc key in Revit when I need to deselect something because there are often times when it takes multiple presses to close out of any messages or active commands, etc. I can picture the frustration and resistance for non-BIM personnel who are usually just trying to view somethi

title: Collaborative Comment Section in Reviews
body_text: To have a section allowing the initiator to respond to the comments of the reviewer and vice versa. (similar to that of RFI, Forms, and Issues) The initiator would be able to respond directly to the comments, facilitating a clearer, trackable conversation thread, particularly useful in scenarios where they need to collaborate on resolving general comments that are not specifically related to the documents being reviewed, such as clarifying the completeness of submitted documents.

title: ACC usage data per ACC project
body_text: Currently, there are no means to check usage data (monthly unique user/ token consumption etc...) per ACC project, making it difficult for customers to assess ACC adoption progress. One of EBA customers (owner company for highways and related facilities) requested for such a data to be reflected in the token usage report which can be exported from Autodesk Account so that they will be able to assess ACC adoption progress per project. Much appreciated if you could take this idea into consideratio

title: Multiple Fopders for Coordination Space
body_text: It would be great to have a selection of multiple folders when creating a coordiantion space

title: Make mandatory the Due date option when you create an issue
body_text: Make mandatory the Due date option when you create an issue - When you are in a big project with different parties involved the due dates are quite important. That's why making same as the name of the issue, the due date mandatory is important to keep a track of the issues.

title: Toggle File Custom Attributes in Reviews
body_text: When opening a review, we would like to request the ability to toggle on and off the custom attributes for the submitted files to display as columns in the view. This feature will greatly assist reviewers in accurately identifying and tracking the files.

title: Wish to add functionality for Desktop Connector errors and ACC errors
body_text: When using the Desktop Connector to upload files from Windows Explorer to ACC, If the Internet connection is temporarily lost due to some problem, the following error occurs. ”Failed to update file. The requested service is currently unavailable. ...” ”Upload failed. Please update and try again. ...” If the same file is uploaded to ACC again without resolving the above error, the file will not be uploaded to ACC, but it will be updated locally. The file will be updated locally, but not uploaded

title: File Upload from Mobile
body_text: It would be very helpful to be able to use the mobile app to upload pictures or notes to projects or even specific files. I can see on the Browser version for desktop that you can add pictures and upload notes, but that is completely missing from the mobile App. Our goal is for our shop foreman/project leads to be able to upload pictures and notes regarding issues or changes directly to the project file without adding additional steps and log-ins.

title: Add a Dashboard showing Weather data from specified location and Date Ranges
body_text: Add functionality to show weather data as a chart in home screen data for project location/s.

title: When a Model Processes in Docs, Have the Previous Version Viewable in Navisworks
body_text: If a model is processing (in Docs) that model will not be viewable in Navisworks. If you go in to re-append that model it shows that it is not selected to be viewable, but selecting and appending it does not bring it in. This has cause several meetings to be postponed/canceled due to the models being inaccessible in Navisworks. It would be a huge benefit to have the previous model version viewable while the newest model version publishes. This feature was added to ACCs web viewer and it would gr

title: Submittals Workflow manager permission
body_text: In the permissions you can set someone to be the submittal manager but that can be way too much permissions. Need the ability to assign permissions so that someone can just edit the workflows, if needed. Sometimes a lead discipline will refer the review to someone else to look over. This would be nice for a lead reviewer to edit according to who they want to assign to review the submittal.

title: 2D CAD Files Added to Model Coordination
body_text: In non-Coordination Space Navisworks, we can add 2D CAD files to Navisworks. Adding 2D CAD files for Room Names or reflected Ceiling plans or simply CAD files for reference had been useful in Navisworks. Can this be added to Coordination Space Navisworks? Thanks,

title: Support more file Formats 3DM, OBJ, FBX (other than IFC,RVT and DWG) in Design Collaboration
body_text: Support more file Formats 3DM, OBJ, FBX (other than IFC,RVT and DWG) in Design Collaboration modeule to create packages in from the Model section and create Project Models (Federated Models) from other file formats

title: Improving Integration: Displaying Project File References in the Photo Module
body_text: With the Build license, I can add photos to documents under project files. However, when I select the photo in the photo module, the references to the respective project files are not displayed. This should be adjusted.

title: Rename Views Without Having to Open Them
body_text: In Model Coordination, within the Views tab, it would be a huge time saver if we would be able to rename a View without having to open the View itself. Currently, the time breakdown when renaming Views is - 99% loading the View and 1% renaming it. Doing this for Views adds up quickly.

title: Have a Files activity list
body_text: Provide a Files/Docs activity log that lists activity of files being added or modified from Insights or project home page.

title: Status Increment when Sharing Package
body_text: When Package Sharing WIP to Shared it should have the option to change the status from S0 to S1 or some other S code on sharing so that it can be managed as if it were a review from WIP to Share

title: Let Manage Permission Validate File Names
body_text: Currently only Project Admins can validate File Names when the File Naming is enforced on teams folders. Those with Manage permissions on the folder should also be able to validate their team's file names. Otherwise the Project Admin will be overwhelmed.

title: Timeliner information TAP shown in ACC properties
body_text: IF you publish a NWD to the cloud .... and add some 4D information (MS Project, CSV,...) you can see in each element selected all the information of the timeliner plan... planned star, finish.... but if you upload this model to the cloud nothing of this is shown... You should add in the properties option all the timeliner information included in Navisworks.

title: Grouping references (in Build>Assets)
body_text: Our work concerns processing equipment, and one machine may have a plethora of documents related to it. When assigning references to one such machine, it would be great if we could group these references together in ways we see fit, e.g., manuals, lists, certificates, etc. Currently, references can be filtered according to type, but documents exist as a one-tiered list which can be impractically long.

title: Hidden Folder
body_text: Create a folder permissions that allows only admins to see it. For subfolders.

title: Voice Memo / Note for Issues
body_text: Things often have to be done quickly on the construction site and if you could then attach a voice note to the issue and work on it straight away in the office, that would be a big advantage.

title: Ability to add tags to issues
body_text: Like photos, issues should be able to tagged for easier filtering. Issue types are broad (Punch List, Design) and descriptions should be specific to an issue. Tags would bridge the gap allowing more detailed reports and make it easier to assign a group of issue to one person to handle (find all the issues involving "Dimensions" or "OPCI Equipment")

title: Assigning Issues in other modules, add sorting option and search by issue number
body_text: In the Meetings section for example, you can add references to your items etc. When trying to add an Issue, it doesn't seem to be possible to search by issue number or sort. Would be nice to have this, so I don't have to scroll through 100's of issues.

title: Required fields when closing issues
body_text: Some issues must go through an internal process before getting closed. If we had some Custom fields only available to certain roles, that had to be completed before closing, it would be very helpful.

title: Request for Enhanced File-Sharing Settings to Allow Selection of All Project Roles
body_text: Hi, I'd like the ability to share files with all project roles, not limited to those with 'Edit' permissions in the file's folder. Currently, I can only select members individually or by company. I'd appreciate an update to the file-sharing settings. Folder Permissions File Share Settings

title: Show Issue properties without opening the issue view.
body_text: When creating issues in the model coordination space, if you want to check the properties of an existing issue by clicking on an issue tag, you will be taken directly to the view of that issue. We need to be able to decide whether we want that. For example, double-click to go to the view and single-click to open the issue properties. And have the ability to go to the previous view.

title: Add Sheets to BIM Collaborate
body_text: Sheets should be available in BIM Collaborate. Being able to organize, share and view sheets in the field would be extremely helpful to our designers. I totally understand why it's necessary to upgrade to Build for many of it's features but sheet management is such a basic component of a functional AEC CDE it's a shame it's not included in by default.

title: add more file-types to supported files
body_text: Add eplan-files (*.zw1) en caneco-files (*.afr) to supported file-types.

title: Export multiple issues to BCF
body_text: At some point exporting issues to BCF was added to ACC and B360. I found no way to export them from the issues table though but could only get it to work inside model views. Remedy that, please.

title: Projects Automatic migration from BIM360 to ACC.
body_text: We are in a great need to a direct process for projects migration to ACC. with a simple tool used for coping all data (Folders & Files) from BIM360 to ACC. Also this tool to have an option for re-initiating Revit cloud workshared files to its new destination on ACC. No need to a third-party involvement like cloudsfer or any-other one.

title: Enable multiple folders to be moved/copied in one go on Desktop
body_text: Please add this functionality directly into the product from on the web desktop version. Whilst the desktop connector allows multiple folders to be moved/copied in one go, we do not want everyone to download a separate piece of software and have to learn a new system.

title: Construction Cloud Activity Log API or UI
body_text: Copied from Autodesk BIM 360 Ideas Hub. Credit given to user @arsen.safaryan Since its inception, BIM360 used to have an activity log in the admin panel as well as on the project in Docs. Now that we have moved to Autodesk Construction Cloud it is unavailable. Moreover, it is unavailable/not exposed via the APIs. Please, as a matter of urgency, expose the API for the user/project activity log and then think about adding it to the UI at least for admins.

title: Document Export settings naming to include Description
body_text: The ability to export files from Docs using a name format that includes custom attributes is welcome but I really don't understand why 'Description' as a field wasn't included. Using enforced naming standards forces unique file names that don't include description within the name and so Description is commonly used and needs to be exportable when taking off ACC. Please include the field 'description' as an attribute for appending to file names.

title: Model Coordination - sub folder selection like the Design Collaboration module but for workspaces
body_text: Please enable the same sub folder selection option that is in Design Collaboration but for when setting up a workspace in Model Coordination:

title: Auto Tag Locations on Pictures
body_text: I would like to be able to have progress photos I take auto fill the location. I have locations entered and the plans linked to them but I have to manually enter the location in the drop down "Location" tab after I take a photo. Can you make it to where if I select a room to take a picture it will auto fill that location. When I do that with "Issues" it will auto fill but not with photos.

title: Automatically Add Mentioned Users as Followers in Issues
body_text: Problem Description: When a user is mentioned in the comments section of an issue , they are not automatically added as a follower of that issue. As a result, they only receive a single email notification and cannot easily filter or track the issue afterward. This often leads to missed action points because the mentioned user is not actively subscribed to updates. Why is this important? Users who are mentioned are usually relevant to the discussion or action, so they should stay informed about a

title: Add Project Invitation to Project Notifications Settings
body_text: We would like the project invite email notification to be manageable through Project Notification Settings. Our company supports multiple portfolio clients with many smaller projects. We have internal operations support team members who need to be added to every project by default. However, whenever a new project is created from a template, or when users are added manually, those team members receive an invite email notification. Because we often open 10–20 new projects per week, this creates ex

title: Ability to bookmark folders
body_text: As ACC becomes the default repository for the files inside a project, its folder structure grows and can be quite large during project development. This frequently makes us spend a considerable time navigating through folders or finding a specific one. We should be able to bookmark folders in a project, and then display them in a "favorites" section in the browser inside the Files area.

title: Maintain Version History Through Bridge
body_text: Currently, when bridging sheets from one project to another, the version history is not maintained in the new project. Carrying the prior versions through the bridging process would make maintaining an accurate history significantly easier when working in the new project. It should be noted that this is a different use case than the existing "Maintain sync" functionality when bridging; even with this option enabled, preexisting versions are not carried over through the bridge.

title: Have ability to make a file favourite, and have a quick link to it
body_text: It would be so helpful to have an option to pin or favourite a file, and be able to have all the favourites in one place with quick links. In the sea of documents, some can easily escape you if they have a document number or title that doesn't quite reveal what's within them.

title: Revertible Clash Issues
body_text: Something that I have found to be problematic on several projects is that clashes understandably leave the clash pool upon being assigned to an issue. This behaviour is fine and logical until a project member goes full tilt creating issues from clashes, or you realise just after creating the issue that something was incorrectly included/excluded. In these cases depending on how widespread the impact is the only real workaround is to set up a whole new coordination space or reuploading the affect

title: Quantity takeoff from IFCSpaces
body_text: IFCSpaces are helpful model objects for calculating quantities, such as surface areas. Currently, IFCSpace items are not treated as physical objects within the Autodesk Construction Cloud viewer which means that they cannot be used. It would be helpful to close this gap so that every model object, including IFCSpaces, can be used for quantity takeoff.

title: Search functioning when adding projects to sync in Desktop Connector
body_text: Hi there, It would be great if there was a search function when adding projects to sync in Desktop Connector. It would be ideal for it to work in the same way as the filter search in Microsoft Excel, so could just start typing a project name / number and it would pop up. We have lots of different projects and they're raised in project number order. So if a team member doesn't know the project number, they have to scroll through them all to find it. Thanks!

title: Asset Column Filter View Save
body_text: Within the Assets, the manipulation and filtering of columns only saves through web browser cache. This does little good for companies that may try to manage browser cache or attempt to clear user's web browser cache during troubleshooting other problems, only to find that it resets a user's saved views within not only ACC's Assets module but other modules within the platform. The ability to save defined views across the entirety of the platform should be a staple. This seems like something ever

title: Manually Re-order Drawings in Sheets Tool
body_text: ACC Sheets automatically sorts drawings within a discipline by numerical order. When ACC's automatic sorting doesn't match how the drawings are listed on the Architect's sheet index, there is no ability to manually re-arrange our sheet set to match. The only way I can fix this is to create new 'disciplines' by using more of the sheet number, which is an incredibly inefficient and time-consuming way to have to fix the order. It seems like a very easy feature implementation to allow admin users to

title: Set Scale at Upload of Sheets
body_text: One suggestion was to have the scale set on a sheet at upload. This is a cumbersome process for the field to have to do and the dial presents the measurement in an odd manner. If we could have the office do it in bulk at upload when the names and titles are assigned that would be awesome.

title: Don't truncate drawing title when viewing drawings
body_text: The drawing file name is often truncated. We use ISO standard numbering, yet the file name is always truncated, with an eclipse at the end. This is incredibly frustrating, especially as there is plenty of blank white space to the right that could be utilised to display the full name, and then only truncate if the drawing title clashes with something else (such as the page selector on a multi page PDF).

title: Building Connected - Read Only Access
body_text: A very very common request I get with Building Connected is to allow team members to be added to projects in a Read Only capacity meaning they would be able to see the information in Building Connected without being able to make any edits. For example, this would allow the preconstruction team to allow members of the ops team (PMs, superintendents, etc.) to review subcontractor information on Building Connected without the risk of inadvertent edits being made to the Building Connect page. You co

title: "Opened On" Field for RFIs
body_text: Add a system field to RFIs that captures the date and time the RFI is opened (sent to the reviewer). This field would clearly reflect when the RFI is officially transferred into the reviewer’s responsibility, improving transparency, reporting accuracy, and response-time tracking.

title: Removal of Captcha for implementing automated Bot Services
body_text: Automation is the need of the hour. We have implemented Bot services for monitoring some of the mundane tasks. The introduction of Captcha recognition and 2 step verification is becoming a hindrance to successfully implement the same. Requesting to remove it for our account or provide us with an option to enable and disable at our convenience

title: No trace of which members got notified of a completed review
body_text: When completing a review we are given the option to notify additional team members at the end, however, there is no historic collection of who it got shared with. If we ever needed to prove a Review was shared with someone, there is no way to find out this information. When exporting the closed review as an excel, I can see the message that was typed up when shared with the additional members, but there is no list or trace of who it was sent to. Could this please be addressed as soon as possible

title: Primary Prequal Contact Updates
body_text: Hello, I have been experiencing chronic issues with companies' primary prequalification contact names and email addresses being inadvertenty and unintentionally changed. This means that when I need to send a request for documents in the application or want to invite the company to renew, I have to stop and find out if the update is legitimate and if not, wait for it to be corrected. Most of the time this is an entry error by a subcontractor employee who is not the prequal contact and is using th

title: Issues - Sort by Assigned To
body_text: It would be very helpful if Issues could be sorted by Assigned To. Currently this is not an option. In the Reports tool there is not a template that will allow sorting by Assigned To that also included photos. The Issues Detail template in Reports includes photos, but there is not an option to sort by Assigned To. Ideally, sorting in the Issues tool is preferred. If that is not an option, then sorting by Assigned To in the Issues Detail template in Reports would work too.

title: Sheet Collections
body_text: It would be very helpful to standardize Sheet Collections using a Project Template. Otherwise, we constantly need to remember to add these each time a new project is created.

title: ACC Build - iPad/Web App - Make an option for required photos on issues
body_text: When editing options on the web app ->through the Issues tab->Settings->Types->Manage fields->There is no option for making a picture a required field. When general contractor and trades create QC's we want the option to be able to make a picture to be taken. Pictures show the non-conforming issue and conforming fix for it. This is available on Procore.

title: ACC Build Web App - Hidden Fields on Printed Issue
body_text: We have hidden certain standard categories/fields that Autodesk sets up in the issue that we don't need. When we print the issue to send to the owner it still shows those categories/fields with a blank line next to it. We don't want to show the owner these reports; it looks as if we are leaving information out. When hiding the category in the issue, hide it when the issue is printed/exported too. If a field is hidden for an issue type/category it should not be included in the export because it l

title: ACC Build - Attaching Files to Issues
body_text: When I attach a file to an issue on the internet app it goes through the folders making it easy to find. When I attach a file on an issue on the iPad app it brings up all files which are very confusing to sort through. Please change the iPad app to look like the web app for this process. @jake_gallagherCDQBR - edited title per your request.

title: ACC Build - Copy/Paste Issues on Sheets
body_text: Copy and paste existing issues to another area of the same sheet, and have the issue number change. During Punch, many of the issues are the same but just in different places. Recreating the issue, even using a template is a lot more unneeded work. This was an option on PlanGrid and is not on Build. Please bring it back.

title: Additional Reviewers on trade tapp approvals
body_text: create the ability to add additional reviewers on a Trade Tapp Project Approval. Right now I can do one reviewer and one approver. It would be awesome if i can add more reviewers to it.

title: Section-Level "Revise and Resubmit" in ACC Forms
body_text: ________________________________________ Section-Level "Revise and Resubmit" in ACC Forms 1. The Use Case: Maker-Checker-Approver Workflow In standard construction quality and safety workflows, a checklist goes through three distinct stages: • Step 1 (The Maker): A Field Engineer (Maker) fills out specific sections of a checklist (e.g., Material Inspection). They submit their section. • Step 2 (The Checker): A Quality Manager (Checker) reviews the data. They notice a typo in the batch number or

title: Drop Down Mandatory Fields
body_text: We have multiple buildings under one project code, we rely on someone creating a review to specify the building number clearly in the review name when submitting any documents for review. It would be really helpful to add in a mandatory custom field where we could add the building numbers. As reviewers we could then filter through specific buildings.

title: ACC CDE data Caching
body_text: Hi there. My team is currently working with multiple parties on quite a large project, and we are using ACC Docs to help us centralize all the data and also utilizing the workflows to make reviewing and approval more streamlined. However, there is quite a major issue that we have been facing when accessing ACC Docs through web browser (in tablets it is no problem at all since it's downloaded all the resources before we got to see it). That issue is the unstable internet connection. If it's possi

title: Include last updated at in Form detail reports with Past N days options
body_text: It would be helpful to have last updated date in the filter selection for Form detail reports. Customers who have forms that are opened at different times, need a way to generate reports based on last N days since forms more recent updates. This allows customers to run reports on recently updated Forms and not just the Form date or Due date which could be at very different times. This would allow customers to run reports based on a specific form template that are closed and have their last updat

title: Please add keyword
body_text: Please add the key word artificail turf to your options

title: Attach File Button for Companies/Members
body_text: I need to be able to attach files to company profiles, like an insurance certificate or W9. This is an oversight that I'd love to see fixed soon on ACC.

title: Validate the latest version of drawing with QR Code
body_text: It would be beneficial to add a QR code to approved drawings. Once printed on site, workers could scan the code to verify that they are using the latest version of the drawing. If they are using the latest version, the screen is green: "You are using the latest version." If there is a newer version, the screen is red: "You are not using the latest version. Please find the latest one at this link: [link]." Such a feature would greatly help people on construction sites. @BOUYGUES_CONSTRUCTION @hig

title: Make Internal Fields Conditionally Required
body_text: I would like to be able to make internal fields, like Win Probability or Profit Margin, required when a bid is submitted. We use this information for financial projects, so it would be helpful to be able to ensure the information gets reported for active bids.

title: Asset Status Import
body_text: It would be helpful to have a way to import asset statuses. We tried to develop a template for a discipline where there are 29 asset statuses. However, we have no way to import this as a template for already existing projects; we have to recreate each status manually. It'd be nice to have a way to import asset statuses for already existing projects.

title: Drawing and/or Specfication Indication with RFI Response
body_text: I would appreciate the ability to add a toggle on RFI responses where the responder can indicate that their attachment includes a new drawing sheet or specification. Additionally, the ability to filter by this toggle would be helpful in auditing.

title: Process for viewing -> changes last edited.
body_text: When we process a file for viewing the attribute 'Last edited' is changed too. This is very inconvenient as this is not really a edit. If I want to check the last updated drawings I filter it by 'last edited' but now it takes files that aren't updated but just processed for viewing.

title: Metrics for issues
body_text: Like Procore, add a feature where metrics can be compiled across Contractors to show number of issues open, average days open, rate of issues completed, rate of issues closed, number of issues not approved, ratio of not approved issues to total issues. Add multiple Contractors to these reports to show performance values across a project.

title: Dashboards and monthly reports
body_text: Add a feature where like Procore. Dashboards can be created to show rain days, delays, issues open/ unresolved, daily reports created, hot work permits created, etc.

title: Copy Folders with Subfolders Within a Project
body_text: It would be nice to copy folders within a project. For example, if there is a subfolder with many subfolders that need to be created per external subcontractor/vendor, this is painfully tedious! A bit surprised that this isn't already a functionality.

title: Export Activity Log
body_text: Currently you can only export 31 days of activity log each time. In BIM 360 you could export the whole log. Why would Autodesk change this? Found this a useful tool.

title: Increased OCR Capability - Sheets
body_text: Currently, the OCR feature within the Sheets module is limited to sheets created from vector PDFs or RVT files. It would be great to expand OCR capabilities to raster sheets and to text that may be saved as shapes instead of text, ensuring all text appearing on a given sheet is searchable.

title: ACC Issues Export as xlxs modify and Import modifications.
body_text: Export Issues to xlxs, do some modifications to them (in this case the title) and import them back to the project with those updates. This feature was available in BIM 360 Field.

title: Issues made on 2D views of a model do not transfer to a new version
body_text: Hi, We recently found that there if we create an issue on a 2D view of a model, and later update that model with the same 2D views included, the issue will not show up in the 2D view from the new version. This happens on all projects, and we believe it's a global bug of ACC that needs immediate attention from the product team.

title: New API endpoint to add more options in dropdown under Custom Attributes
body_text: Hi Autodesk, I found a PATCH API endpoint from devTools ( https://developer.api.autodesk.com/construction/cost/v1/projects/:projectId/properties/:propertyId ), and this endpoint is used to add new Options for the Custom Attributes > Dropdown without manually add new. Currently there is no endpoint that inside documentation for me to call to add new Options. It would be great to have this endpoint. I have attached photos of how we usually add more options manually.

title: ACC App - Specifications Download Option
body_text: I don't know whose great idea it was to change the way Specifications are downloaded on the ACC app, but you just created a massive amount of wasted time to have Specifications available on a mobile device. In what instance did it make sense to STOP having Specifications download automatically without giving users the ability to CHOOSE if they want the Specifications downloaded or not? Not having Specifications download options is like not having download options for Sheets. You have 300 sheets,

title: Asset Quantities
body_text: I would like to be able to quantify assets so that if we have 40 of something and 20 have been shipped, I know the other 20 are somewhere else.

title: Improve all functions - very poor and old fashioned compared to other Doc Control systems
body_text: Can't edit or delete revisions. Only option to delete all revisions?!!! Very poor, I have no time to take them all off to correct on and then start over again. Very outdated basic functionality. Reporting function also very poor, can only export the current revision, not all, can't use as a Doc Register as lacking info all round. Only one report exports to excel.....everything else pdf only???? No use at all!! I wouldn't call this a Doc Control system at all, it lacks too many things and I would

title: Assets are not sort correctly by name
body_text: The application currently sorts assets alphabetically instead of using a natural numeric or alphanumeric order. For example, the sequence goes from 9 to 10 , then jumps to 100…109 , and only later continues with 11 . This becomes even more confusing when asset names include letters combined with numbers.

title: Model coordination: Ability to save a created viewpoint in docs environment
body_text: Make it possible to use a created saved viewpoint in the Model coordination envrionment into the docs enviroment. The viewpoints also have to be working in docs when acces roles are different between docs and model coordination. Make do No - Yes in the attachement(Picture)

title: User Information Hidden from View
body_text: I would like to add users to my company in Building Connected Pro so that they can access project files and bids, but not have them visible as employees. This would prevent subcontractors from going around the BuildingConnected platform to ask questions, submit bids, etc which is an issue we have seen.

title: ability to select multiple subcontractors at once to apply company tags
body_text: I would love to be able to selected, for example, all subs that have submitted a bid so I can mark them interested in a particular type of project.

title: Schedule Sync Button
body_text: On Autodesk Build have a way to select all or multiple tasks in a workplan and have the dates revert back to the schedule item they are linked too. Currently you have to manually change the dates back to what the linked schedule item date is.

title: Import additional fields in the Schedule module of Autodesk Construction Cloud Build
body_text: Enable the reading and import of additional fields when importing a schedule into the Schedule module, such as % Units Complete . Currently, our project progress is tracked using this field, but the module only supports % Duration Complete , which prevents us from using the Schedule feature in Build to properly monitor and compare planned versus actual progress. It would be highly valuable to allow the import of additional fields beyond those conventionally available, expanding the flexibility a

title: File based Permissions
body_text: My thought here is as the default the files would inherit the folder permissions however, there may be times when a specific file within that folder may need to be hidden or have permissions restricted for privacy reasons or a data control reason. It would be great to be able to view permissions next to a file.

title: RFIs
body_text: Have RFI visibility permission capabilities without use of the watchers. This would be helpful for owners and other parties without the need to overwhelm with notifications.

title: Cost Tab - Show Executed Dates for Commitment Change Orders
body_text: I would be very helpful to see the executed dates for change orders in the Cost Tab under the executed date column. Currently, this column shows the executed date for the original commitment but not for change orders. The goal is to build a commitment summary view with change orders to show current contract status for commitments. We want to show original commitment + executed change orders = current revised contract values and have dates for all. Attachment provided with a example.

title: IFC link also visible in sheets when published from revit to ACC
body_text: Often we got projects with only ifc files. When publishing sheets by revit the only links that are visible in Sheet envrioment on ACC are the save cloud model links. For ifc you have to create a workaround where we first have to make from the ifc an ifc.rvt file that is also saved as cloud model. It would be much easier that this step can be eliminated by supporting IFC files that are within a revit project as a saved cloud model so you don't have to use the work around eachtime you get a new if

title: Removing multiple attachment selection in a Submittal workflow
body_text: Can ACC develop removing multiple attachment in a workflow submittal instead of one-by-one selection. This will help us work faster removing many attachments. Cheers!

title: ACC Form Tables - No Signature or Drop down for Name
body_text: Form Table does not have signature or Drop Down For Name - If no drop down for name maybe have something on the side on who has added the entry .

title: Allow all employees to view all projects and notifications
body_text: As a civil engineering company many of our engineers look to previous projects to see how things may have been done, get new innovative ideas, ensure previous compliance, and many other factors. It would be extremely helpful if the permissions based in roles affected how users could access docs on a broad level. For example, if I set Everyone with View permissions then everyone could see all projects, but only those specifically added would have access to edit. This goes hand in hand with the op

title: Separate submission folders for Technical vs Commercial
body_text: The separate submission folder for Technical vs Commercial would be to being able to evaluate the technical component of a package without being influenced of the commercial component. I have an internal system to score the technical aspect, as it is a quantitative measure for a qualitative proponent. We have a way to weigh the different components based on the value added in for the package.

title: Managing host and link uploaded files - indicators and option to use current versions needed
body_text: Regarding files uploaded using the "Upload Linked Files" command, adding indicators to signal the host/link role and highlight version conflicts would be extremely beneficial. Currently, the interface provides no information or feedback to indicate whether a file is a host, a link, or neither. Furthermore, the process for adding new versions to a host or link is unclear. From my understanding, if the host is updated, the links are removed, but if a link is updated, the host still displays the fi

title: Sheets references get removed when sheet numbers change
body_text: Sheets references get removed when sheet numbers change. This is a real pain when you have hundreds of sheets that have to be adjusted. Please make it so they stay native to the sheet, regardless of number.

title: Adding Transmittal and Correspondence to As-built and Handover
body_text: As Transmittal and Correspondence could be contain legal or contractual information these modules should be able to be selected to be archived/exported in As-built or Handover.

title: Native Forms - adding Table as question
body_text: I would like to request the addition of a table format as a question type in Native Forms. Currently, tables are only available as section elements, which limits form design flexibility. For example: In Section 1 , Question 1 should contain a table. In the same section, Question 2 should include a signature field or a standard text field. Please refer to the attached file for further clarification. I would appreciate your consideration of this feature enhancement.

title: Austin Drone Wash
body_text: We’d like a category added for drone pressure and soft washing for the exterior of commercial buildings. We also washing windows with drones and wash hard to reach structures like water towers. Drones washing is definitely a category that should be added. Leigh Hearn Austin Drone Wash 512-798-2602

title: Ability to Delete Submittal Attachments
body_text: Would like the ability to delete attachments from a submittal in the event that a submitter accidentally uploads the wrong attachment (i.e. wrong revisions, wrong division, sensitive info, etc.)

title: Building Connected - Adding Subcontractors with parameters
body_text: When starting a new bid package it is possible to add subcontractors but it bases the selection on keywords and geography only. Is it possible to add a feature that enables an added parameter of enterprise type to the selection process?

title: Docs // Model Browser // Revit Published Models with links
body_text: A Revit cloud model with Revit cloud links, when published to Docs will retain the links to provide a full federated model. Great! But, when viewing that model, the Model Browser does not contain the link model names. This is terrible because it means you cannot easily hide a single model while leaving the others visible. The publishing of the Revit Model + Links needs to retain the individual file names in the Model Browser to make browsing experience easier.

title: Parent Child Templates
body_text: I would love to have a template subcategory. I could edit the main template, and the changes would apply to the sub templates if they were affected. I have multiple scopes on a project, and I would like to be able to select the sub scope template to add in their Elements (Mechanical, Electrical, Low Voltage Systems) Currently we have one template, so changes are made to all new projects but if a job only has the Electrical Scope it doesn't need to include the Mechanical and Systems Forms, Issues

title: Clickable Hyperlinks in PDFs
body_text: I noticed today that a core PDF functionality of clicking embedded hyperlinks does not work in the default ACC PDF viewer. In order to click them, you must switch over to the Continuous Scroll mode. This should be able to work on both views, not just one.

title: Maximum 10 Autotriggers per folder too limiting
body_text: Autodesk Docs has a limit of 10 autotriggers per folder, however this is too little for the needs of most projects, causing major issues. We have multiple series/parties etc. involved that need to trigger different reviews, and 10 is way too little for our needs. Can we please increase this number? Is there someone senior we can speak to urgently to have this number raised so we can run the project efficiently?

title: Add Transparency Control to “Object Colors” in the Model Viewer
body_text: It would be very useful if the “Object Colors” feature in the model viewer included an option to adjust object transparency. At the moment, it only allows color overrides, and there doesn’t seem to be any way to make elements semi-transparent. Having transparency control would make coordination, clash re view, and general model navigation much easier, especially when trying to see through selected elements without hiding them entirely.

title: Project Home // Insight Builder // Please revert recent changes
body_text: Recently there has been a change on the Project Home with the way the Insight Builder tabs are displayed. There is an icon that takes up space for each tab. These icons are completely redundant. Remove them. The label appears to be much shorter, especially due to the new icon. For the developers, if you can tell me what the two tabs are for (i.e. the label) in the below screenshot you can ignore this request. 😄

title: Update Permissions Across Multiple Projects
body_text: Need a method to bulk update permissions across existing projects. As an organization, we have many open projects, and are relatively new to ACC Build (in our first year of adoption). We are routinely finding cases where we need to grant additional permissions. We can change the template to do this for future projects, but having to update permissions project by project, and separately for the files, issues, etc. is tedious, and very difficult to administer effectively. An example is that we wan

title: Meetings/Minutes
body_text: Meetings - Color Text and Highlight Font

title: Union/Non Union/ Open Shop Opportunities Report
body_text: I wanted to reach out to see if it would be possible to add a line item to distinguish between union, non-union, and open shop projects when sent out to bid. Currently, we enter this information into the description box when setting up an invite, which means a filtered report cannot be pulled at this time for example, if we wanted to see how many of each type are currently out or have been sent out over the past year. We believe having this feature could be very helpful. Any assistance you can p

title: Add Coordinator Role in Submittals
body_text: Adding a Submittal Coordinator role would bring value by improving quality control and keeping workflows consistent. Unlike a Manager who oversees permissions, settings, and system configuration, a Coordinator handles the day-to-day processing of submittals: reviewing for completeness, checking cross-trade coordination, assigning reviewers, and ensuring accurate routing. This separation of roles ensures strong governance (i.e., Manager) while empowering efficient workflow execution (i.e., Coordi

title: Add the ability to preview Revit Family data in ACC
body_text: Requested features: Preview .rfa files directly in ACC Docs Display not only geometry but also key parameters

title: Section Creation - Object Alignment - in the ACC viewer
body_text: It would be really hepful for userbility if sections could be oriented with a plane of an object in ACC viewer. In adition, it would be great to make possible the Section Box oriented by selected object with move options in each plane (similar to Revit section boxes)

title: Dark Mode on Web Application
body_text: Hi ACC-Team! I would really appreciate a "Dark Mode"-feature in the ACC-Web-Application. In my eyes this is a must-have for a modern platform to ensure eye safety. Most of the users are working for hours in your environment checking plans etc. So please esure to enable this feature which should be there since the beginning. Ty, Felix

title: ACC Cost: document templates: make the tax "base amount" available as a variable
body_text: When creating document templates in ACC Cost, you can only access these variables related to taxes: Amount Name Rate Type Imagine 21% tax has to be paid on an item that costs $1.000,00: Amount = $1.000,00 * 21% = $210 Name = " 21% tax " Rate = 21 Type = ? In Belgium, we also need to know the "Base amount" on which a tax was calculated. You can manually calculate the "Base amount": Base amount = Amount / (Rate/100) For example: 1.000,00 = 210 / (21/100) The problem is that we sometimes need to us

title: Back an Excel file to review status?
body_text: When a document is an Excel file, there is no option to add red markups. We can add comments, but these apply to the entire document and do not clearly indicate the specific issue the markup is meant to highlight. Comments can only be added while the document is under review, and once the review is closed, red markups cannot be added—even if changes are needed later, such as during the as-built stage.

title: Placeholders
body_text: We would be well served by having the ability to create placeholders for the various document ranges, which can then be allocated to each different supplier or subcontractor batchwise. g.allaouis@equans.fr

title: Multi review
body_text: When a document is submitted in two reviews, we are not able to easily see the review status of the file in each workflow.

title: Weather - Celsius or Fahrenheit
body_text: Add a setting to switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit—useful for forms. Currently, the format depends on the language of the web browser.

title: Asset Multiple selection 2D view
body_text: In 2D views, where we can display assets and select them one by one, multiple selection does not work for the objects only for annotations. If it could also select the objects, it would help update asset data and status more efficiently.

title: User left menu
body_text: In module build > functions RFI / Submittals / photos ( / schedule) useful for phase design > why not have these functions in other modules? Like meetings, correspondence... Another idea: set up a tick box system to activate menus by user / role / company? The idea would be to stick to a “lightened” ergonomic interface closer to user needs, and not drown the user with x number of menus if they only use 20% of the build functions.

title: Review - Comments / Notes - limit of 4096 characters
body_text: For different review workflows, we have multiple reviewers—for instance, 2 key reviewers and 18 optional ones. In the next step of the review, one person is responsible for centralizing all comments within the notes section so that all feedback can be quickly accessed in one place. For drawings, this is not an issue; however, for technical documents with many sheets, this feature is important for the client. Currently, there is a limit of 4,096 characters, which could potentially be a problem.

title: Multi select issues in interface
body_text: If we want to make multiple selections, we currently have to select the issues one by one. It would be great to have the ability to use Shift + click to select two issues and automatically include all issues between them. (This functionality already works with assets and sheets.)

title: PDF - Calibrate the scale
body_text: Have the possibility to custom the dropdown list or by default have more scale 1:1000 / 1:1500 / 1:2000

title: Document numbering
body_text: Document numbering (as per our document control procedure) is not being generated or assigned by the system. Our expectation is that the system should generate the final digit numbers, but this is not happening, and we have to assign the numbers manually. g.allaouis@equans.fr

title: RFI custom field
body_text: We should be able to specify which customized fields to include in an RFI type, just as we can for Assets.

title: Customer zip files windows 256 limitation
body_text: In 95% of cases, when we receive customer folders, they are ZIP files with fairly complex folder/subfolder structures. When we unzip the folder, some documents are not extracted because the Windows path length exceeds 256 characters. We then have to manually locate the affected files in the ZIP and extract them one by one. This issue consistently occurs when unzipping files from Autodesk Desktop Connector. Idea: Add an unzip/extract function to the ACC website to prevent document loss and/or man

title: Model Coordination - Clash inside the same view / Model
body_text: For coordination and for some trades, it's important to have possibility to clash the same view. For example: to do clash detection only between all the ducts of the project.

title: Clean / Archive Markups
body_text: Have a feature to clean all markups on 1 or several documents.

title: Review - Track the documents 1 by 1 inside a review
body_text: With a lot of documents inside a review, the step of a review could take a few hours to check the documents 1 by 1. It's interesting to have an information to tell these documents are checked (without fill a comment document by document inside the review.

title: Design Coordination - Coordination Space Management / Order
body_text: For all projects, we have multiple coordination spaces. By default, the most recently created space becomes the active one, which often causes confusion and wastes time for users. They have to manually switch to their preferred coordination space each time to access their views, issues, and other relevant information. It would be very useful to allow users to reorder the list of coordination spaces and set a default coordination space based on their individual needs.

title: Filter clash by selecting area/zone
body_text: On big projects, to follow our coordination process, it could be interesting to have an easy way to filter the clashes by selecting an area / box inside coordination module.

title: Add asset multi-selection for iPad / mobile app
body_text: Multi-selection is not available in the mobile app. It is very useful for modifying the properties of several assets at the same time.

title: Markups - Documents - Difference between Browser / Desktop Connector and other application
body_text: When you create markups on a PDF inside ACC Viewer, the markups are not visible in other software when using Autodesk Desktop Connector. The document version does not increase if the markups are made with ACC Viewer. When you create markups on a PDF using other desktop solutions through Desktop Connector, the document version increases — which seems illogical.

title: RFI - Enlarge column in custom fields setup
body_text: We cannot enlarge the column in the interface. For issues, with the same setup (custom fields), it is possible to enlarge the column.

title: Forms - Customize Number / ID
body_text: All forms (safety, healthy, daily report...) are mixed in the same place. The number is unique and not customizable when you select a template, it displays all the forms associated with that template, which is great. It would be very useful to be able to set the serial number according to the used template and with a prefix option: Daily report > DR01 , DR02... Commissioning > C01, C02...

title: Customize the reports
body_text: Provide more customized options for exporting reports Option to enable/disable the coversheet Ability to configure header and footer sheets Only one logo can be set up

title: Forms - Delete/Discard Forms
body_text: To improve the process / ergonomic, it will be easier to have the possibility to discard forms directly in the interface of the forms. Today, we have to enter in the forms 1 by 1 to delete it.

title: Photos - Have a management system for the photos
body_text: To give access to photos depending of companies / roles.

title: Specifications - Improve the analyzed documentation
body_text: Informations / specifications are present in drawings too. How to analyze lot of documentations including drawings ?

title: Add Strike through text format option in Meeting Minutes
body_text: The minutes of meeting text format options would really benefit from the strike through format option as in minutes we would like to keep information in but show they are replaced.

title: Submittals Responsible Contractor Abilities
body_text: When the responsible contractor goes into a Submittal they are responsible for, they can edit the information in the 'General Information' fields. There should be a permission or way to prevent people from changing this if they did not create the item.

title: Support UserDefinedPropertySets (.txt) in cloud IFC export
body_text: Probleem Cloud IFC export (ACC / Model Derivative API) ondersteunt geen UserDefinedPropertySets (.txt). Hierdoor ontbreken essentiële custom Psets in IFC output. Gewenst Ondersteuning voor .txt in cloud IFC translation, gelijk aan Revit IFC exporter syntax, zodat custom parameters als IFC property sets worden meegenomen.

title: Oleada TV APK 7.4.3 (Cuenta Gratis | Renovar Planes PRO) Descargar app premium
body_text: OLEADA TV: LA OLA QUE ARRASA EN TU TELEVISIÓN EN LÍNEA ==>> Descargar Oleada TV Oleada TV es de esas apps que enciendes una vez… y ya no quieres dejar de usar. Un solo icono en tu pantalla Android concentra canales en vivo, películas y series como si fuera tu propio cine portátil. ¿Listo para convertir cada pantalla en un estadio, un cine y un maratón de series al mismo tiempo?

title: Revit Cloud Model Dialog Fails to Display Correct Folder Hierarchy When Parent Folder is Restricted
body_text: When a user (e.g., a Mechanical Engineer) is granted specific, elevated permissions (e.g., 'Edit') to a sub-folder within the ACC Docs structure, but is explicitly denied or not granted access to the immediate parent folder, the file selection dialog within Revit (specifically the "Save as Cloud Model" screen) fails to render the correct folder path. Instead of displaying the accessible sub-folder within its logical hierarchy (e.g., WORK IN PROGRESS > MM-MECHANICAL ENGINEER), the accessible sub-

title: ADD RCW license into ACC
body_text: We need the ability to manage RCW licenses directly in ACC for both internal and external users. Perhaps add a column on the page where we select features to activate or deactivate in ACC.

title: PDF - Calibrate Scale - Snagging
body_text: No snagging in PDF when calibration is required. It is a raster image, so it is not very precise.

title: Insight Builder - RFI dataset to be improved
body_text: RFI dashboards on Insight Builder. 3 Questions: - Where are the customized fields in the dataset ? - How manage the location data for RFI ? In the dataset, we have "location path" with parent and child levels in the same data, it is useful to split easily for each level of location. - The location path doesn't work when the RFI have multiple locations.

title: Discard forms
body_text: The "single contributor" forms can't be deleted by admin. Only collaborative / sequential forms can be. The admin need the rights to clean / delete all forms (not just collaborative forms). The admin had to change the setup of the forms temporarily to be able to delete some forms.

title: Documents inside different review
body_text: We need to check and track if documents are included in multiple reviews at the same time. How can we easily identify these documents? Perhaps an option or alert during the creation of a review to automatically untick documents that are already part of another review.

title: Custom Project Fields
body_text: Have the possibility to create our own project data inside admin project & project template. Data as Entity, Stage (Bid, Design, Construction...) DM / PM ...

title: Issue - limit dropdown list for "assigned" filed depending of category of issue
body_text: We are using ACC for different projects during design & construction stage. We have lot of users / roles / company and client's team. For ergonomics & avoid lot of accidents, it could be great to have the possibility in the issue setup to define role / company in "assigned" field depending of the category issue.

title: Review - Create rights management for the workflow function
body_text: Only admins of project can create and update workflow. It's problematic because Doc Controller, Design Manager, Trade Manager, Cost Controller, BIM manager... have to setup & update workflows. It means, finally we can have 10 / 15 admins per project. It's not logical and it generates mistakes.

title: Handover & As built
body_text: Add an option to export all the reviews with filter option by workflow. We have documents, issues, submittals, sheets... but not the reviews.

title: Assets Creation with 3D View published in ACC (not file)
body_text: The published 3D view should be used like all other functions inside acc (and not the global file). A lot of drafters manually hide objects inside models (with filter, worksets...). ACC generate assets including all hidden elements.

title: Forms - Add people or firms in the response type
body_text: It would be nice to input inside a form the name of a person or organization selecting them from the users datbase.

title: Temporarily blocking the meeting agenda to prevent overwriting
body_text: In recent weeks, it has often been the case that when two users/organizers have been working on an agenda at the same time, not all changes have been applied. We suspect that the ACC is overwriting each other's changes. As with online editing of documents in the ACC, we would suggest temporarily locking the agenda so that it cannot be edited while another organizer is making changes. This would prevent simultaneous changes from being overwritten. Alternatively, a presence notification similar to

title: Work Information Section of building connected
body_text: Almost all of our professional services are not listed as part of the work information section of building connected. Our team is an building envelope consultant. It seems to be lacking Envelope Commissioning - BECx Envelope Assessment's Design Build - Envelope All related testing.

title: Types
body_text: The new update forces the empty fields to be at the bottom of the issues, which has become more time consuming and disrupted our flow when updating the issues. Can we please either revert back to the original where the fields are exactly where we set them up under types, or make it an option to have the empty fields at the bottom so users can choose their preference?

title: Adding Layers to Mobile
body_text: Adding the Layers button in mobile, as it is on the web version. There is a drawing set that I have made, with multiple layers to show differences in a more convenient way than the compare tool that is currently in ACC. However my guys out in the field do not have the ability to use the different layers that I made; turning on/off each layer. I would argue not having this in the mobile version defeats the purpose of having a tab for layers in the first place. However having it on both sides I be

title: Same Name Different Spec Sections
body_text: Ability to use the same name for different spec codes. Example 220513 Motors and 230513 Motors. We had to modify them to be 220513 Motors - Plumbing and 230513 Motors - HVAC.

title: enhanced search for file export
body_text: We need the ability to run export on subfolders to provide drawing lists for QA purposes, such as a current construction issue Cxx revision list or all drawings Stage 5 and such like, presently the search filters do not reference all the documents attribute and properties so this cannot be achieved without a lot of manual editing in excel, we should be able to achieve this as ACC is really a database, how can we access full search filtering or can the functionality be enhanced

title: enhance search by roles
body_text: when adding members, in the email search box you can enter a single word role (such as "Architect") and it will display a list of members but it wont accept input which is two words (such as "Principal Designer") , that would be useful especially when adding general support roles such as quality managers or business support where there may be several users who need the same access

title: Project Invite
body_text: Ability to add people to multiple projects form the accounts admin members area mainly this would assist where we have' internal' roles with several users such as business support and 'quality managers' who need to be added to every single project

title: Last updated by column showing last user that opened file
body_text: Last updated by column showing last user that opened file instead of the consultant that uploaded or modified the drawing. It started happening last Tuesday or Wednesday and is misleading as to who is actually modifying or uploading the drawings.

title: Assign checklist template to multiple equipment
body_text: At this time, we can only assign the checklist by manually way from standard checklist template to each equipment ID, it will be more efficient and useful feature if we can assign standard checklist to selected equipment ID at a time. If example, if the project has 34 generators to install, for CxL2 checklist, now we need to manually assign 1 checklist to the generator no. 1 and repeat the step until finish generator no. 34 which lot of time consuming to get 34 generator installation checklist.

title: ACC Document Management Permissions Enhancements
body_text: Implement 'Uninherit Permissions' option for Granular Folder Security in ACC Docs. Problem: All folders in ACC Docs are currently forced to inherit permissions from their immediate parent, limiting flexibility. Often, specific sub-folders (e.g., '05 Financials,' 'Internal HR Docs,' or 'Early Stage Models') need highly restricted access that deviates completely from the broad permissions of the main parent folder (e.g., 'Project Files'). Proposed Solution: Add an explicit option on any sub-folder

title: ACC Document Management Permissions Enhancements
body_text: Implement Check Permissions Tool for Granular Folder Security in ACC Docs. Problem: Currently, administrators and Project Admins must manually navigate through multiple roles, companies, and individual settings across parent and sub-folders to understand why a specific user has, or lacks, access to a given document or folder. This process is time-consuming, error-prone, and hinders rapid troubleshooting. Proposed Solution: Implement a simple utility/button called Check Permissions accessible fro

title: Add required Field Attribute to Forms API
body_text: Please add a required (or is Required , mandatory ) boolean attribute to form field definitions in the Forms API responses . This would enable developers to implement early validation and prevent submission failures due to missing required fields. We have a 6-step workflow where users sign at each step. Currently, if required fields are missing in Step 1 or Step 3, the form doesn't fail until the final auto-submit at Step 6 when we call PATCH/submit the form .This creates a poor user experience

title: Data Exchange .rvt-File
body_text: I have just looked at the beta version of Data Exchange for IFC files. I would find it very helpful if it were possible to filter Revit models on the ACC by category, etc., and then create Data Exchange from them. This would allow users of the data provided to decide for themselves how much they want to adopt and would not be dependent on a 3D view provided by the author (with the associated effort and responsibility without any benefit to themselves). Translated with DeepL.com (free version)

title: 腾龙公司游戏官网
body_text: 腾龙公司位置于南亚果敢老街双凤塔附近，腾龙公司成立于2015年9月11日，公司主要经营菠菜游戏， 腾龙公司属于一家实体企业公司，公司官方网址《tl091.cc》，可以把这个复制到浏览器粘贴打开， 公司客服微信：《166-8728-8112》Q；《748-238-151》 注册一个自己喜欢的账号，注册好以后再点击下面APP下载安装，然后输入自己的账号登录就可以舒畅游戏

title: Copy markups across multiple sheets
body_text: There should be a function to be able to copy markups across multiple sheets in one go. Currently, we have to go through sheets one by one to paste and publish the same markup on sometimes hundreds of sheets which is tedious and time consuming and far from efficient.

title: SSO Name
body_text: Being able to display a user name other than fixed in on SSO name.

title: Customize Default Messages and Subjects for Contracts
body_text: Please allow us to input the Default text in the Subject, and Message Box when we are about to send a contract from Cost. If I'm sending a Purchase order the Language should be different from sending a Short form Contract.

title: Default Settings For Meeting Items
