body_text: In Autodesk Build Meetings, new meeting items automatically default to the “Open” status. It would greatly improve workflow efficiency if project teams had the ability to customize the default status for new items—specifically allowing “ Information ” (or any other status) to be set as the default. This would reduce manual adjustments, streamline meeting documentation, and better align the tool with different project workflows where not all items require action. Request: Add a project-level or m

title: Additional conversion rates for function Weightbyvolume
body_text: When WeightByVolume is used, the only two inputs that are allowed to be requested is lbs/cf and tons/cf. It should have lbs/cy and tons/cy as well.

title: Bug in Issues Empty Fields feature - Watchers field mistaken as empty
body_text: The new Issue feature of empty fields bundling together at the end has a bug - it currently does not detect the data in 'Watchers', mistakenly bundling it into the 'Empty Fields' area at the bottom (see screenshot attached). This is causing confusion. Can this bug please be addressed and secondly can admins be given the choice to disable this feature, it may not be wanted on every project. This could be a toggle in Settings.

title: [File & Sheet] Disable Printing Option for View-Only Permission Level
body_text: To enhance document security and maintain strict control over sensitive project information, we propose disabling the Printing capability for users assigned to the View-Only permission level in both Files and Sheets modules. Regarding this, as the Taiwan project requires all workers to always refer to the latest drawings, we need to ensure that certain users are strictly View-Only (i.e., not allowed to access or download drawings). At this point, it seems almost equivalent to giving View + Downl

title: Submittal configuration within project template
body_text: You should be able to set up "Submittals" default values and review template in the project template

title: Locations Bulk Linking to Drawings on Projects with  Single Location Tier
body_text: When setting up locations for a smaller project where all the rooms are on the first tier or in large location hierarchies where rooms on a level may have to linked to different Sheets, a method to bulk select and link locations to Sheets in bulk would save project admins a lot of time. Currently, each location must be selected and linked separately in those use cases. It's currently not possible without adding a second tier.

title: Stamp function
body_text: Include the stamp function in the review process with predefined positioning. The stamp function appeared a few weeks ago, but for the moment is considered as a “classic” markup such as cloud, text... The stamp should be linked to the review and have an additional “stamped” metadata rather than markup in the document metadata. In the stamp, have the option of inserting an image in addition to the “digital” stamp.

title: Permissions
body_text: Provision of permissions must be completed manually at every step, creating a huge bottleneck every time someone must be added. Maybe the use of Role or Company might solve this issue. g.allaouis@equans.fr

title: Old Markups on new revisions
body_text: Markups that are made on a certain revision track through on later revisions of the same document. I know this can be disabled when asked to Autodesk, it would be great to have the option to turn it on or off by the Project Admin. g.allaouis@equans.fr

title: Streamline review process
body_text: The review process needs a lot of streamlining. Each review process requires a lot of clicks and is time consuming, even in the simplest scenario of not applying any markups and accepting the document directly. g.allaouis@equans.fr

title: Version control don't tracks through all folders
body_text: There is no way to ensure that version control tracks through all folders; i.e. once a new version of a certain document is uploaded in one folder, other folders where copies may be stored will not automatically get the new version. So if different stakeholders have access to different folders, they may be looking at different versions of a document. The copied files should be “links” to the original version one g.allaouis@equans.fr

title: Uploading : prevent needed information
body_text: There is no way to prevent a document from being uploaded without certain information being filled in properly, such as the correct document number and title etc. This should be mandatory, else the uploading should be rejected. g.allaouis@equans.fr

title: Document numbering not reliable
body_text: Document numbering also can be changed by manual input during the project, whereas we believe it should remain the same through the project lifecycle and not be subject to change – only the revision number must be subject to change. I fully agree, maybe it is an option that shall be added to the naming standard options (ex. “Allow file name to be modified”). This way we could have the flexibility to change name in dedicated WIP areas but keep it locked in Shared/Published folders. g.allaouis@equ

title: Assets and forms creation
body_text: When we attach Form Templates to Asset Categories, it would be great to have the option to automatically create them. This would be of great help to see the progress on how many forms have been completed compared to the total number of forms.

title: Enable Deletion, Editing or Archiving of Sent Transmittals in ACC Docs and BIM 360
body_text: Issue: Currently, once a Transmittal is sent in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) Docs or BIM 360 Document Management, it becomes immutable and cannot be edited, hidden, or deleted. While this preserves the formal nature of document exchange, it poses challenges in real-world workflows where Transmittals may be created by mistake, used for testing, or sent prematurely. Suggested Enhancement: Introduce an admin-level feature that allows project administrators to delete or archive Transmittals mar

title: Workflow from ACC to Tradetapp to accrue subcontractors by project
body_text: The companies section of ACC ( https://acc.autodesk.com/project-admin/companies/projects/ ) as its updated as a project is created and subcontractors are added, then updating to Tradetapp to reflect the changes. There is already a feature with projects in bidding, to have Active Projects tab would be helpful as well. The majority of users are working in ACC, and it would be best if it would flow to tradetapp, as more often then not, GC's are playing catch-up with their pre-qualification efforts.

title: Visible Grid Lines in ACC Mobile
body_text: Viewing grid lines while navigating a model is crucial for field workers on large models/projects. Other Autodesk programs allow for it, but those applications are mostly for office work and not field installation. Field install workers want easy navigation and grid lines would drastically improve it.

title: Model Coordination - Models UI
body_text: At the moment there is a very limited set of columns visible in the 'Models' portion of Model Coordination. Please add 'Description' to these columns. If a file naming convention is used with sequence numbers it is difficult to know what model is what without seeing the description field. Even better if you allow a way to view all the columns that exist in Docs, perhaps allowing you to make them visible or not. But firstly get the 'Descripition' column in there.

title: Specifications Auto-Description
body_text: Add a feature to identify the standard location of the specification number and description, similar to Sheets with the Title finder.

title: Improve Photo Clarity in Reports
body_text: We are using the Issues tool to track punchlist and noticed when we print the Issue as a report, the photos come out blurry. We are concerned the architect may not accept the corrections if they cannot properly see the fix that was done for the punchlist item. I know the photos are compressed when sent to PDF, creating the blur, but would love to see if there is any way to improve the clarity!

title: Enable "Track Changes" functionality for Excel Files in ACC Build
body_text: I’d like to request the addition of native Track Changes capabilities for Excel files stored and edited within ACC Build. Why This Feature Is Important: Accountability & Transparency Construction teams rely on shared spreadsheets for budgets, equipment lists, RFIs, commissioning logs, manpower, and more. When multiple people update these documents, there’s no simple way to see who changed what and when . Track changes would create a clean audit trail and eliminate guesswork. Reduced Rework & Con

title: Review notification for design team
body_text: If a document is sent in Review by a doc controller in behalf of a design team, that are selected in the notify windows at the last step of the creation of the review, the design team has no notification when the Review is closed.

title: Data Connector > no access
body_text: Data Connector > no access to document listings or documents within a review. No possibility to track documents / status with data connector. Solution 1: Manual extraction of document logs on a regular basis. Solution 2: Wait for Insight Builders module (currently being developed by Autodesk).

title: MIDP / TIDP deliverables
body_text: Listing Deliverables: Have function to create MIDP / TIDP - Provisional listing of documents to compare with issued documents - also some template list could be shared from project to an other.

title: Review : Copying files
body_text: Provide document access to all users involved in the review process.

title: Insight - Share Dashboards between users (on the same project)
body_text: It’s not working ? Some cards are disappearing.

title: ACC server location
body_text: Would it be possible to access a French server for ACC?

title: Share Document - Improvement
body_text: To view document sharing history, it will be great that the author of the share receive a notification with all recipients.

title: Global Translation in French
body_text: To have a gouvernance of the data, it's important to have everything translate in French (or other language) - depending of language of web browser. For example: The "default" status of the issues are well translated automatically in French. The "default" category/type of issues are always in English.

title: Roles administration
body_text: Get the roles administration by project and not by hub.

title: In submittal feature: copy automatically all documents in docs/files when documents are approved
body_text: The submittal feature is more interesting than the review to manage markups, to have the stamp, to manage the visibility of the comments during the review... When approved, the documents stay in submittal and they are not present inside files/docs.

title: Review with several key reviewer
body_text: When you have review with a step with different key reviewers. After validation of each key reviewer, you go to the next step. In the next step, if the person send back to previous step to just 1 key reviewer, in fact every key reviewer have to "approve" again this step.

title: Review - Time allowed for each step of review - Working days
body_text: In the review setup, we can setup the time allowed for each step of review. We need to evolve the working days option, it's only Monday to Friday. In some countries, Monday-Friday is not the standard for working days.

title: Section plane is not always available
body_text: Different people have not always the possibility to select the section plane on ACC.

title: Folder subscription - notification for metadata update
body_text: When some metadata are updated on the files, we don't have notification. It could be really interested to have an option for notification when metadata on the files are updated (as review status).

title: Reviews - Improve the time allowed per step
body_text: It would be useful to have a checkbox to "respect" the time allowed. For example : When we have a step with 10 days with 2 key reviewers and 2 optional reviewers, if the key reviewers validate the documents in 2 days, the optional reviewers won't have the possibility to review the documents.

title: Form - Timesheet - Ergonomics
body_text: Improve the ergonomics to fill the data in timesheet form. Too much click for the users to edit timesheet on mobile or laptop.

title: Forms - Timesheet
body_text: Improve the timesheet form : We can't add new data / column - Only the discipline can have dropdown list.

title: Build - Export PDF - Sheets / Drawings 2D
body_text: Error msg for some sheets "export failed" or "can't export sheets" in Build with lot of elements when trying export in PDF. Same project - other sheets but with less "elements", it works. Same in Acc Docs - we can't export the same 2D sheets including in Revit file Does it exist a limit of number of lines/elements in a drawing to export in PDF ?

title: Markups - Export to do the following / track
body_text: During reviews, we create a lot of markups. It will be very useful to have a feature to export all markups inside excel (as Bluebeam, Acrobat...) Our clients as us, we want to follow each markup in a tracking list (Excel), more common & user-friendly

title: Federated Views - All levels are invisible in Docs
body_text: We use Model Coordination to create federated view by overlapping different 3D Models. All these views are saved in Docs. In Docs, we can't use the level feature to quickly filter the view by level. We use a lot this feature with native files.

title: Add an Option to Automatically Apply Approval Stamp to Multiple Files During Review in ACC
body_text: Currently, when conducting a review in ACC, members must open each file individually and manually apply the approval stamp. This process is time-consuming, especially when handling a large number of files. I propose adding a feature that allows the system to automatically apply the approval stamp to all selected files in a review session once the approval status (Approved) is chosen, without requiring each file to be opened separately. Benefits: Saves significant time during review processes. Im

title: Minecraft Blast APK 0.11.2 (Oficial) Baixar Grátis para Android
body_text: Minecraft Blast APK 0.11.2 (Oficial) Baixar Grátis para Android Baixe Minecraft Blast APK Minecraft Blast APK é uma versão emocionante do Minecraft, trazendo combates intensos, gráficos aprimorados e desafios exclusivos. O jogo oferece modos rápidos, recursos atualizados e performance otimizada para Android. Baixe Minecraft Blast APK gratuitamente e aproveite uma experiência dinâmica, cheia de ação e totalmente envolvente para jogadores móveis.

title: Restrict Specifications from Downloading
body_text: We have sensitive security documents that cannot be shared without password protection when outside of ACC. Therefore, we would like to restrict the ability to download from the specifications module to protect documents from unauthorized distribution. @collin_georgeZGKCN - this post was moderated to remove sensitive content.

title: Return for Review Keep Responses
body_text: After all the ball in court people have responded, the RFI is returned to the manager court as "Answered". The manager is then given the choice to either close and distribute or return for review. There are times where I don't like the answers/ responses provided, or they weren't answered completely and I need additional responses. When I click "return for review", the previous responses are totally removed! I would like to be able to return for review, but KEEP the original responses for refere

title: Distribution Templates for Transmittals
body_text: Regarding the Transmittals module. It would be beneficial to create distribution templates at the project level. External project users could select the one they would like to use, knowing that the transmittal would be sent to the correct team members. For example, suppose an external user uploads drawings to a folder that requires either our internal and/or external engineering and design teams to review. In that case, they can select a "Drawing to be Reviewed" distribution template. When that

title: ProEst Estimate Items Deletion Warning
body_text: We would like to request a warning or dialog box for when users delete items in a ProEst Estimate. When you delete Items/Assemblies from the Database, it asks you if you are sure that you want to delete the item, and the user has to click yes to delete it. We would like the same functionality in the Estimate when deleting items. Or even a Role Permission/Permission setting to allow us to restrict users specifically Deleting Items from an Estimate.

title: Enable to link documents from Files in Forms
body_text: The only way to add an attachment to a Form question is to add it directly from your PC, and is missing an option that was there on BIM360, to directly link something from Files.

title: Details in contract menu
body_text: When working with the detail pane of the contract on the right side of the screen, certain tabs are irrelevant for some companies. Making the extent of all the tabs cumbursome to work with but you are also loosing oversight of what you should look at and what not. Having the option to specify in the settings which tabs should always be visible by default for users and which don't need to be visible, would be interesting. You now have the option to change it individually, but you should be able t

title: Feedback on ACC development focus – viewing performance and usability
body_text: Dear Autodesk team, I really appreciate the ongoing development of Autodesk Construction Cloud and the strong focus on data-driven features. That’s valuable and shows real progress. However, I see a growing issue in daily practice. The level of detail in BIM models keeps increasing, and it’s becoming almost impossible to work with large models in the web viewer. Navisworks an some BIM viewers are so much better. The point cloud viewing feature is a great addition, but in reality, it’s almost imp

title: Cost Management Home Page
body_text: Currently, there is no way to view Cost Management in a similar fashion to the Build home page. Build has a homepage where you can view all due submittals, RFIs, and other items assigned to you across all projects you're a part of. As it stands there is no similar option to view assignments across all projects you're a member of for Cost Management, and to see items assigned to you, you must tab through each project individually. It would be a good idea to streamline functionality and ease of vi

title: After review approval, I want to automatically apply an approval stamp.
body_text: After approving sheets or PDFs using the review feature, we want the system to automatically stamp files with an approval status indicator when they are automatically copied. To track approval status when files are downloaded, we want to record within the file itself when and by whom it was approved.

title: Photos in Forms need automatically filled in Location
body_text: Since you can fill in a location on a Form. And Photos can have a location aswell, the location on a photo needs te be filled in automatically at the moment the photo is referenced to the form. This makes is more easy to filter the photo library by location. Currently is no easy overview of al photos that are taken in Forms SHeets and other location related features in Build. Please make possible to automatically fill in the location on Photos the same way the location is filled in when the Form

title: Allow us to delete Voided Submittals(Or Filter them out automatically Like closed Issues)
body_text: Allow us to Delete, or "Hide" any submittals that are voided, even if its just an automatic Filter Voided Submittals at an account level

title: Build-Assets- System Status Options
body_text: I would like my systems status to be tied to the asociated assets status set. For example the ability to only allow the system status to be changed if all of the associated assets have also been changed. If a specific asset of a system is changed, a warning that the change will also change a system status could be incorporated. This would allow for Assets to be used to track systems percentage of completion, or LOTO status.

title: report layout
body_text: capability to customize layouts of reports specifically asset reports

title: No option to create new company profile when company domain already exists
body_text: Good morning. Our organization is a national/international company and we have multiple branches with multiple customers - some who use the BuildingConnected platform for bid leads/solicitations, etc. Our company is over 90 years old with many sales representatives and so by the time we realized that there was a not-so-friendly user issue with the BuildingConnected platform, many of our sales reps were already registering "outside" of our organization's correct profile (domain). We have spent ho

title: API for Transmittals
body_text: An API for Transmittals would allow Morta (or other third party application) to sync the data (including custom attributes) to automatically create an outgoing document register.

title: Form Labor Summary
body_text: The .pdf report of the Form Labor Summary limits out at 500 entries. It does not flag to the report runner that any entries over 500 will not be included. For they typical user, this is not clear and many labor and manpower hours are being left unaccounted for. ADSK should include a message for those reports that are not including all the entries.

title: Asset report visual references
body_text: could it be possible when creating an asset report for curtain areas can it also provide a visual snapshot of the highlighted asset form sheets to provide a visual reference on drawings. i attached a report where i did screenshots.

title: Project Closeout (handover and as-built export tools)
body_text: In the process of closing out a large Design & Construction project on ACC using the handover and as-built export tools. Recently, our team encountered a significant challenge while attempting to export over 8,000 project photos collected during the past two years. It appears that the current export tools do not include photos, so we’ve been trying to export them manually. However, this has proven to be extremely time-consuming and technically challenging due to the following issues: 1. Only 30

title: Transmittals - Recipients List
body_text: We are heavy users of the Docs and Transmittals modules, both internally and externally, to track all shared project documents. To improve efficiency, we would like to explore options for streamlining this process.Currently, our team spends significant time retyping recipient information multiple times a day when creating transmittals. To avoid repetition, reduce the risk of errors, and enhance overall efficiency, is there a way to create and save recipient lists that can be easily applied to ne

title: Signed and Reviewed forms need the ability to be reopened
body_text: We have had team members that need to go back and edit a form that was reviewed and signed off, and unlike non reviewed forms that are closed reviewed ones cannot be reopened. My ask is can reviewed closed forms have the ability to be reopened?

title: Correction Request - Open API's
body_text: Open up the API's for corrections request so we can pull that information into our data warehouse for project team visibility. Due to other issues that I have posted about we do not want project teams in the trade tapp system but this would allow them full visibility of the subs they are tracking.

title: Feature Request – Dynamic Asset Markup Color Based on Linked Issue Status
body_text: Currently, the asset markups on sheets do not automatically reflect the status of the pinned or linked issues associated with them. It would be highly beneficial if the markup color could dynamically change according to the status of the issues linked to that asset or room. For example, if a markup represents a room and all pinned issues tagged in that room are marked as “Closed” , the corresponding asset markup color should automatically update to a designated “Closed” color status. This visual

title: Locking Profile in Trade Tapp Post Qualification
body_text: Would like the option to lock profiles down once they are qualified with a GC, especially a change in the Tax ID. Not having a locking mechanism here greatly increases risk to a GC as a company can change from one to another or change documents whenever they would feel like it. GC's need to have an accurate historical record of their prequalification and the ability to track customers by TIN.

title: Link multiple elements to a single Issue in ACC
body_text: Currently, in ACC it is only possible to associate a single model element with an Issue. The system only stores the Element ID or GUID of that one component. I suggest extending this functionality to allow multiple elements to be linked to a single Issue . In the BCF standard, it is possible to store multiple GUIDs for a single Issue. Implementing similar functionality in ACC would not only align with the existing BCF standard but also improve interoperability between different platforms. Benefi

title: Model Coordination Clash detection - expand clash check to include all objects within each model
body_text: Currently clash detection can only be run for objects between model files, so clashes inside a model file are not possible to be checked. This needs to be expanded to all objects within each model are able to be clash checked so INTRAmodel clash detection as well as INTERmodel can be included in the clash detection process.

title: Bring native Schedule ingestion to Docs (+ Kanban view) with 2D/3D document linking to activities
body_text: In Build , we can attach a schedule (e.g., .mpp ) and view tasks. However, Doc, where project teams truly centralize information does not natively ingest schedules. As a result, engineering/document control lives in Docs while time (activities) lives elsewhere, fragmenting project governance and slowing coordination. Proposed solution: Enable Docs to natively ingest and surface schedule activities, with options to: Upload schedules at theproject level (support .mpp , .xer , and .csv ), exposing

title: Custom Attributes - Required Option
body_text: In Cost, I created custom attributes that are required to be filled out to generate our Subcontract. However there is no "required" option when creating these attributes there for the subcontract still generates but is missing important information as it was not "required" for them to input the data. If we could have an option of required that would be awesome.

title: Tradetapp - Move the order of sections of questionnaire
body_text: Would be helpful to move the order of your Questionnaire Sections. I added new ones and didn't realize I couldn't move them and they are all filled in. They need to be in a different order to make it a little easier to read and complete

title: RFI Export Excel Report- Limitation Of Rows
body_text: When i export report in excel to RFI's, there is a limitation to 1000 Rows, the meaning of that if i have more that 1000 RF's i can't export one the report that will show me all items. its applicable only to RFI's, for example in submittals its works well. its a critical issue, please solve it.

title: ACC BUILD Reference Specifications on Sheets
body_text: Something very common that comes up during the construction phase of projects is sifting through drawing sets and seeing "Ref Specs" or "Refer to Specifications for exact locations" etc. In my experience, this can be very time consuming as both the GC and the sub-contractor to find and reference over and over again. Is there not a way to create a pathway or "link" from the sheets to the specific specification being referenced (similar to the way a detail in a sheet can be linked to another sheet

title: Proest markup filters/reports
body_text: Proest markups on the summary tab allow you to apply filters to include or exclude bid packages and etc., which is great, however the filters applied do not show anywhere when running reports on the estimate. Would be helpful if details of the filters applied would be able to show on the reports.

title: Spam is strong in Ideas board, why?
body_text: Why?

title: Form API Update for Section Assignee Native Forms
body_text: Hi Autodesk, I would like to know whether is there a plan to update the PATCH Forms API or develop another endpoint that: Submits a section for section assignee enabled forms. This is useful when forms are bulk created. Currently, there is no way to bulk submit sections to close the whole form. Reassigns a section to a user/role/company I believe this is something worth considering.

title: ACC new Review tool new service message with link to explanation
body_text: On the message, it would be much better to have a clickable link directing to the FAQ page, https://help.autodesk.com/view/DOCS/ENU/?guid=BIM360D_Document_Management_About_Reviews_Reviews_FAQs_Reference_html , to avoid unnecessary confusion amongst project team members.

title: Integrate Clearstory with ACC Build
body_text: Clearstory is a great T&M tracking platform that is being used a lot. PlanGrid had a direct integration with Clearstory to link issues and photos. However, Build does not have this, as yet. Please provide a direct integration between ACC and Clearstory. That would be awesome!

title: Allow invited members to view applicable submitted forms
body_text: I am an erosion control inspector and created a Forms template in Build to complete my erosion control inspections for each project my company works on. Sometimes, those outside of our company, or outside our clients, who have a subscription to ACC would like to see these reports (usually a county inspector). I was hoping if I invited them to the project and gave them permission to view Build, they would be able to see the Erosion Control Inspection Form when it's completed. I have recently lear

title: Automating the reflection of the "Transmittal Title" in the "Doc's area"
body_text: Automating the reflection of the "Transmittal Title" in the "Doc's area" for each associated file would significantly enhance efficiency by reducing manual data entry. This feature would automatically populate the corresponding "custom attribute fields", thereby saving time, minimizing errors, and ensuring consistency across all transmittal records.

title: Power Query feature in Docs
body_text: To include a Power Query feature that enables the consolidation of all Excel files. To reflect all TIDP's in MIDP

title: Move option for the folders
body_text: An option to move folders may be added to enhance flexibility in managing the folder structure

title: Enable the Account Administrator to make limited edits within the imposed Naming Standard in ACC.
body_text: Enable the Account Administrator to make limited edits within the imposed Naming Standard in ACC. This may include: Defining or enforcing the naming convention for folders containing files that comply with the established standard. Providing an option to rename files that do not conform to the naming convention. Allowing modifications to the attribute values associated with the applied Naming Convention in ACC

title: Remove markups on a document with a single click
body_text: Allow for project admins to remove markups on documents in a single button. If a new version of a document is being submitted, the markups should get cleaned and removed at the first step before pushing to the next reviewers, and going through a hundred markups in insufficient and time consuming.

title: RFI Official Response Attribute
body_text: Within RFI's we can respond answered or rejected but there is no way to see this response in Insight or the RFI module without opening the RFI. It seems odd to have a drop down attribute within the RFI that does not show as an attribute. We need to be able to filter and dashboard how many RFI were rejected versus answered. Currently I cannot see a way to do this.

title: In forms user is able to create back dated forms as well as back dated due date
body_text: In forms user is able to create back dated forms as well as back dated due date. So we are not able to identify that work was done on that particular day or the user created form just for audit purpose. Also, due date option should have option to make in mandatory so that we can perform ageing analysis

title: Add project number to the projects page of the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile app
body_text: It would be very useful to have the project number shown on the projects page of the Autodesk Construction Cloud mobile app. It is shown on the projects page of the web portal but there is currently no way to view the project number through the mobile app.

title: Bidder List Templates
body_text: It would be helpful on BuildingConnected to be able to create our own Bidder List Templates under the reports tab so that we can filter what information we would like to have on the report. For example, when getting a Bidder Status Report, I dont need all of the information given. I would like to be able to pick just the bid package number, the bid package name, the company and whether that company was bidding.

title: Library Form Template Versioning or Folder Structure
body_text: We would like to have a way to differentiate between old versions and new versions of a form template in the Library. Our form templates are pushed from the Library to projects through the project template. When we have a new version of a form template we'd like to use, if we update what is currently in the Library, it can create two different versions of a form in an individual project. We'd like to avoid this to have consistency with forms that are being turned over with commissioning. Some of

title: Asset Category Manage Permission - Prevent creation of new asset categories through template upload
body_text: When creating assets through the template upload, users who do not have project admin permissions should not be able to create new asset categories. They should still be able to create assets, but because a single difference in the asset category path can create a new category, it creates extra work for a project admin to have to go in and correct asset categories. This can potentially cause issues, with filtering for example, the results of the filter may not show all the assets that should be

title: Photo Upload data
body_text: When uploading mass photos to ACC from a computer you should have the option to add the attributes as you would if uploading a file. This would allow you to upload in groups and easily add a location or photo type. Now it is very painful to add a location to uploaded photos 1 by 1.

title: Adding members users link
body_text: Give a stakeholder (eg Architecture Office or Subcontractor) a link to input the required fields for adding members. This will save time for the project admins having to add multiple users continuingly. Once the information is inputted, the users submits, the project admin then just gets a notification to approve or reject and then the users are added to the project.

title: Make small font sizes available in sheet.
body_text: I would like to see size 4pt and 6pt fonts available for sheets markups.

title: The ability to own a package
body_text: There are times when a package gets published under someone’s name who’s no longer with the company, or the company itself has been subsumed by another company. Without the ability to edit or remove those packages, folders can get messy fast. It would be incredibly helpful if we had the option to take ownership of a package by being able to delete or edit companies without Autodesk intervention. Another issue that could be solved with the same is duplicate company folders. The same company shows

title: Submittal Smart Search
body_text: We would like to propose extending the capabilities of the Search function within the Submittal section to align with the Files search behavior. Currently, the Submittal search requires exact word matches (e.g., “Submittal” must be spelled precisely to return results). In contrast, the Files search supports more flexible matching—it can locate results even when the search term has no spaces or differs slightly from the exact text, and it also searches within document contents. It would be highly

title: Sheet-picker similar to Takeoff (ILO thumbnails) - Web-version
body_text: See attached image. Instead of thumbnails that don't tell you much (not even the title of the sheet), use a drop-down selector similar to how ACC Takeoff functions. Squish the sheets closer together, so you can see more content and include markup, RFI, Issue indicators. Also, please make the drop-down longer than what Takeoff has. This conveys WAY MORE information than the thumbnails.

title: “split screen” in the iOS app.
body_text: Initial situation: For the workflow of ACC users (construction/project managers), it would make sense to have a kind of “split screen” in the iOS app. Why? If it were possible to log into a project and then display “Plans” on one side of the screen and “Tasks” or similar on the other side, it would not always be necessary to switch between menu items, which is time-consuming. A workaround involving opening the “ACC” in browser tabs is not practical because the layout and functionalities are not

title: Cost - need additional Budget Scopes
body_text: We have Budget Codes that are non-billable, that we do not want to pull into the main contract. It would be beneficial to have a Non-Billable "Scope" to select that would allow us to incur cost to the budget code, but not show in the Main Contract. We also need a Scope for Budget Codes that have Budgets, but will not have any Subcontracts, SCO's or RFQ's (removes the Cost Status) but it is a Budget that only incurs expenses against it. So, "Budget + Expenses". Example, all of our Equipment budge

title: Edit Attributes of Files inside packages
body_text: Currently, it is not possible to edit attributes of files from inside of packages. The only way to view and edit the description of that file for example is through the normal file browser. It would be great to have this edit ability inside packages, as it would enable better workflows like having a custom dropdown attribute that tracks production of individual shop drawings. If you really wanted to get fancy, you could add a feature to associate a file to an asset and show those statuses as the

title: Upload link request similar to Egnyte
body_text: Would like ability to send link to people (who may not always need access to project) to upload files to a specific folder. We would want to limit their permission to upload files and not see or have access to other files that have been uploaded to the same folder. This would be helpful for close out type documents or Subcontractor Pricing.

title: Export Report Function for Review Workflow Triggers
body_text: In ACC, we can now set up automatic triggers to start review workflows — a great feature for automation and consistency. However, there is currently no way to export or report these trigger configurations . For teams managing multiple projects or workflows, this creates a challenge: Each trigger setup must be documented manually outside of ACC. There’s no quick way to audit or replicate trigger settings across projects. Suggestion: Introduce an “Export Trigger Settings” report — similar to how w

title: Cost - Allow Batch Quote No Cost to move into PCO
body_text: In order for a PR change to be a part of the contract documents (owner and subcontractor) it needs to be written into a change order. In Cost right now if we use batch quotes and the sub clicks "close and no impact" the $0 cost doesn't move into the PCO to be able to write an owner CO or Sub Co. We have to manually add the cost item. We'd like a more streamlined way to have $0 costs responses be tracked in the PCO with batch quotes and not having to manually add cost items or update their propos

title: Meeting visibility
body_text: It would be beneficial if we could have all directors to be able to see all meetings within all projects without having to manually add them. We also don't want directors as project admin as they are only viewing top level info. Thanks

title: User Interface Experience for Chrome Browser
body_text: When viewing Cost Management from Chrome at 100%, the "Send" button is cutoff at the bottom of the popout (e.g. trying to send an OCO or SCO.) To get to the "Send" button, you have to reduce the zoom scale on the browser to 90% or less. These popouts should be rescaled, such that the entire popout can be viewed at 100%, and the "Send" button is accessible.

title: Schedule - Bulk edit suggestions
body_text: Within the Schedule module, the schedule manager should be able to bulk edit the statuses of schedule suggestions.

title: Favorited Sheets
body_text: Sheets favorited on an iPad do not translate to the browser. Cannot favorite sheets in browser. This is especially challenging because the sheets show alphabetical and not in the order they are uploaded in.

title: File exports (PDF) with markups to include metadata
body_text: The file (PDF) export feature in ACC provides the option to inlcude published markups. This is an excellent feature, but the exported markups do not include the metadata of the markup such as the information related to the user, time it was published etc. This is a critical feature to meet quality standards.

title: Auto-populate document metadata from title-block at upload
body_text: Today we create title-block modules based on an existing sheet stamp and read document attributes from that title-block so those attributes can be exported with the files. However, when uploading files to the Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) Common Data Environment (CDE) the metadata fields still need to be filled manually (or by post-upload scripts), which is time-consuming and error-prone, especially for batch uploads. Proposed functionality Add an option during file upload to automatically e

title: Files - Add red flag or red exclamation next to to the files
body_text: Add red flag or red exclamation next to to the files. This already exists in meeting minutes, we can add red flag next to items.

title: Adding Ground Penetrating Radar or GPR to list of Trades
body_text: Adding Ground Penetrating Radar or GPR to list of Trades

title: Allow for duplicating and renaming as entire assets module to allow for multiple construction management use cases
body_text: If we could duplicate and rename assets we could create a range of other use cases where the module essentially becomes a register / grid that could be used for a huge number of uses. This is a similar proposition to smartsheet, asana, monday.com, which are, at their basic level, variations of an online grid/matrix/spreadsheet. Examples could include temporary works registers, permit registers, RA/MS registers, etc etc

title: Add national holidays to the ACC-project
body_text: For the approval processes in ACC, it would be great if we could add relevant holidays to a project. This would ensure that the due date for a review does not fall on a holiday. It has often happened that the due date has fallen on a holiday. If this is the case, a note must appear here.

title: Increase Current Contract SOV Limit per Contract
body_text: To request an increase in the current Contract SOV limit per contract. The existing cap of 3,500 line items is proving to be a blocker for our client, as they need to set up a Contract SOV with over 13,000 line items. Increasing this limit would significantly support their ability to fully configure and utilize the system according to their operational requirements.

title: Scrollable Members List.
body_text: Good afternoon, Simple: I want to scroll through my project members. I want to be able to display more than 20 names per page load.

title: Attaching / Using a Hyperlink in Messages / Project Information in Building Connected
body_text: It would be nice to be able to attach a hyperlink into a message or even include it within the project information within Building Connected. For example, I was trying to conduct a virtual Pre-Bid meeting and wanted to send out a Microsoft Teams link and was not able to do so. This is the same for any video conferencing services and would be nice to be able to send out meeting invites or any other link that would tie to a website or forum. Hope this makes sense and hope to see this option in the

title: RFI References Downloading
body_text: Hi, Please can you add an option on RFIs to be able to download the references in one go , instead of having to click and download each one individually

title: Direct link to a Form Template in Build
body_text: Having a direct link to an existing Form Template in Build could be beneficial in many ways. Here are some use cases: Could be linked via QR code to ensure team is completing the correct checklist for an area / item. Could be provided to subs to complete a Site or Safety Orientation form (rather than assigning individually) Could be provided to multiple contributors to sign off on a specific day's work

title: Request to Enable Seamless Switching Between Databases in ACC Build App
body_text: I’d like to request a feature enhancement for the ACC Build app that allows users to switch between databases without needing to log out and back in each time. At the moment, transitioning from the USA to the Australia database requires a complete logout and re-login process, which also means re-downloading every project when switching regions. This creates inefficiency, especially for users managing or referencing projects across multiple regions. As our team is currently making the major shift

title: Please allow to turn off/on Vector Viewing on a sheet and LEAVE on or off when you close and return to ACC.
body_text: Please allow to turn off/on Vector Viewing and LEAVE on or off when you close and return to ACC. Vector Viewing OFF is faster than ON. Speed over pinpointing.....

title: Forms - Member Question Type
body_text: We'd like to have a question type that pulls the members of the project that have visibility of a form into a multi-select dropdown. Currently, to record the participants of a form, you must have a question that asks for either a text answer or a managed drop-down where resources have to be spent to keep it updated. The form activity will track the account of the device but is not available through the data connector. If users share a device and do not log into their own account it will skew tha

title: HSE and QAQC Quick Access Ribbon Icons
body_text: If ACC has the concept of running all HSE and QAQC related items through the Issues and RFI modules, we think that there should be separate icons on the LH ribbon for both HSE and QAQC respectively. This could essentially be a copy of the RFI module but renamed for HSE and QAQC so they have their own place. It is extremely confusing and unintuitive to explain to contractors, and our own internal people, that all HSE and QAQC items need to be tracked and submitted in an RFI or Issues as that goes

title: Enhancing Flexibility in SMART PDF Forms
body_text: It would be beneficial if the SMART PDF feature in Forms could include similar functionality to that available in Submittals , where users have the ability to add or remove pages from a PDF. In some cases, not all pages within a SMART PDF are necessary for submission. However, making adjustments currently requires changing the entire form template, which can be cumbersome. Providing flexibility to delete unnecessary pages or add additional ones directly within the SMART PDF would significantly i

title: Able to view linked NWD file in Docs viewer
body_text: I have a Revit central model in which an NWD file is linked. After publishing the model, I observed that Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) does not currently support viewing linked NWD files within the Docs viewer. It would be a valuable enhancement to have the ability to view the central Revit model together with its linked NWD file directly in the Docs viewer, without the need to switch to another module to view both files simultaneously.

title: Home Page - Add Quick Links to Home Page on the Web & App
body_text: Home Page - Add Quick Links to Home Page on the Web & App

title: Build Photo Management
body_text: Limiting the photo management to ACC Build limits the use of 360-degree photos in normal work flow for existing conditions. It would make more sense to include that with the base Autodesk Construction Cloud subscription. It would also be useful in BIM360, other products from outside Autodesk already allow their use.

title: Snap Function in Comparison
body_text: When comparing 2 versions of a new plan page, have a snap function to make alignment easier.

title: Stitching Pages Together
body_text: Allow us to “stitch” pages together in 2d so we can do yard piping/mechanical piping/etc. takeoff.

title: Symbol Detection
body_text: Add a function allowing you to do symbol detection across a page range.

title: Previous Payment Field
body_text: There is a column in Cost Payment Applications called Paid Amount. Can we get the sum of all the payment reference amounts by SWO/MPO/PSA as a variable to use in document generation.

title: Need a place to put company files that subcontractors cannot see.
body_text: There are important files that we need located in Autodesk but only visible to company or specific personnel. We do not want these files being seen by subcontractors accessing the Build/Bridge system. Each folder or file should have specific permission capability. This is really urgent.

title: Change application status from "Not Started" to "Complete"
body_text: When completing the prequalification renewal, sometimes trades send their documents with alternative methods and we upload them to their profiles on their behalf and complete their qualification, but in the Invitation page their status still appears as "not started". I'm suggesting that the application status should be updated to "complete" when their qualification is completed, to avoid confusion for other users.

title: QAQC and HSE Modules
body_text: We understand that ACC was designed for using Issues and RFIs for safety and quality tracking, but we have found when integrating companies into our environment, the concept of using an RFI or Issue to track HSE and non conforming work is very unintuitive and goes against most contractors understanding of what the modules are for. Since Forms is self-limiting (you cannot actually have an assigned member in a form sequentially in a template) I think it would be beneficial to have a virtual copy o

title: Allow Required Fields in Contract SOV
body_text: Hello. We have added a custom attribute to the Contract SOV. Because retainage laws vary, and retainage on Labor items may be different than retainage on Material items, we need to specify an amount of retainage on each when create the SOV. This retainage amount is integrated to our ERP (CMiC), and integrated again into our Billing Platform, Textura. We will use this custom attribute even when we don't have varying retainage %s to apply. This is a small yet critical detail we capture for every C

title: GPS project address for correct location
body_text: Not every project has a postal address. There must be an option to add GPS data or latitude & longitude instad street name & number when creating a new project. Exemple/Attachment - Correct project adress => 51.39864786163376, 12.188505429113905 not only the Streets name is helpful, there is no number! We cannot use the correct location for all ACC tools without GPS information! #EON #enviaM

title: Optimise web ACC and app on phones
body_text: Currently there is no way to use ACC on web while on the phone, only the app as the windows aren't optimised in the slightest. The folder structure on the left hand side is not hideable and takes 95% of the screen, so the right window is not showed and cannot be worked on. App is missing a lot of features, such as Reviews and Members and makes it unusable if I'm on the go but need to urgently do something.

title: Submittals & Sheets - Put Sheets through a Submittal
body_text: To be able to put sheets in a submittal for the team to review. At the moment there is no sheet review workflow on ACC.

title: Restrict Subcontractor Ability to Add Submittals to GC/Owner Registry
body_text: External users should not be able to create or add new submittals directly within the Owner or GC’s submittal registry . To maintain data integrity, contractual flow, and proper review processes, only GCs or Owners should log official submittals. External users can submit documents for review, but creation rights should be restricted.

title: Transmittals - Customize Automated Output Email Message
body_text: We would like to have more functionality with what can be automated for the transmittal email message. For example, we would like a list of drawings added to a specific folder in files. Our field staff can view the email message and quickly determine which documents were uploaded versus just a link. It is cumbersome to try to manually populate this information in the body of the email message. Attached is an example of what we can generate using Power Automate and SharePoint, which our field sta

title: SORT / ORGANIZE ASSEMBLIES IN REVIT
body_text: WE UTILIZE ALLOT OF ASSEMBLIES. ALLOW FOR THE ORGANIZATION AND SORTING OF ASSEMBLIES.

title: CUSTOM CONDUIT PARAMETERS
body_text: ALLOW FOR CUSTOM CONDUIT PARAMETERS THAT FOLLOW THROUGH TO CONDUIT RUN, CONDUIT FITTINGS AND CONDUITS.

title: Bridge Form Templates between Servers
body_text: Would it be possible to add a feature to enable the bridging of Form Templates between Servers? Currenltly have almost 200 form templates created on US server and no way to manage and replicate this on EU server other than manual creation. A work around was available by using BIM360 import/export fuction which has since been removed.

title: Additional Spec Divisions`
body_text: We need the ability to select multiple Spec Divisions, there is nothing for Divisions 27 or Division 28 - our scopes aren't listed as an option.

title: ACC Insights Scheduled Extractions
body_text: Support predefined options (e.g. last month) for scheduling activity data extract. Currently it only allows you to select specific days but if you are setting up a scheduled extraction it should not be limited to the days selected during the setup.

title: Differance "App UI files" by User and Admins.
body_text: I'm currently working on one of our projects where we're using ACC Build on the tablet. What we're seeing now is that a project administrator has a very limited overview, showing only the project files on the left side without the folderstructure, while a regular user sees the folder structure neatly displayed on the left side of the screen on the iPad. When we change the administrator back to a regular user, they see the correct screen again. we have people on the construction site who are both

title: Quick "Report Outage" button
body_text: It's horrible when we can't sinc our revit models and have no idea what is happening, and then look for the outage official dashboard of Autodesk and it's still nothing reported there. I would like a Quick "Report Outage" button in that webpage so that not only Autodesk could get a priority notification that something may be wrong, can give faster feedback and also we can see, as a user community, that we are not alone in having that outage and can give our vote to that reporting - and stop sinc

title: SVG files
body_text: It should be interesting that SVG files could be uploaded and viewed directly in ACC

title: Assets - Bridging Assets with Consultants
body_text: Bridging Assets with Consultants - Choose what custom fields from assets that you want to Bridge (when this feature becomes available). There may be ones that you wouldn't like to bridge across.

title: Forms - Ability to go to next when already in a form
body_text: Ability to go to next when already in a form. You have to go out of the form or right click and open new tab.

title: Forms - Smart Forms Activity Log
body_text: Similar to native forms would be good to see activity log on what comment has been changed on Smart PDF.

title: Forms - Markups on Files to be apart of the form export
body_text: When you export a form, markups do not export with the attached file. For example; there is an attached file with markups to the form. I export the form and the file is attached but no markups are on there.

title: Review - Exporting Issues from a specific review
body_text: Unable export what issues were created on a specific review. Team have trouble filtering when 2-3 are on the same review on what issues were created on what review.

title: Correspondence Type Import
body_text: When setting up a project, we add the correspondence types. Each project manager has their own list they want. Please add the ability to upload a spreadsheet with the abbreviation and type name so we don't have to add them one by one.

title: Provide us a security matrix with different roles
body_text: Currently there is NO security roles in Building Connected and once you are on the project, everyone can see everything. As a result we have to create two projects for Internal and External packages as some packages are not relevant to the Client. Please provide security roles where we can define what we want team members to see. We have been promised an alignment with the ACC security matrix but that was a few years ago.

title: add attribute drop down on pdf view/doc view
body_text: something which I find a little irritating is that on the actual doc view page , you can’t see the attributes, this is important as frequently status is only awarded at meta date/attribute level and so the drawing remains clean when looking at it. We need something like the attached which I have quickly crudely drawn, please can you raise this a s a feature request for me. A drop down so you can see the status at attribute level while looking at the actual drawing, ideally of course the review s

title: RFI's
body_text: Project Management systems should send automatic email reminders for overdue RFIs

title: Building Connected Filters for Bid Opportunities
body_text: When navigating the "Bid Board" on Building Connected, there should be another column or filter which determines distance from the office location. Example: My office address is set to "1 Main Street, City, State" A new project invitation address is set to "10 Bridge Street, City, State" The new Filter or Column called "Distance" would read "45 min" User can now Sort or Filter for "Within 45 min" or other increments that are manually set by the organization This information filter is useful in d

title: Folder/Sub Folder creation in Forms
body_text: To create consistency across Modules, it would be great to create the folder structure within forms the same way you can create folders/subfolders like one would in Docs.

title: Being able to link correspondence with outlook folders
body_text: The correspondence within ACC is not the prettiest or easiest for people to use (i.e having to always add the email address to other correspondence). Also emails sent form here do not include company headers etc. It would be brilliant if it could be linked to am external email folder (outlook for example). that way could continue to use more refined system but still have all relevant emails stored.

title: Insights to include Autodesk Assets
body_text: We would like to be able to analyse the assets platform on ACC Build using Insights Dashboard (i.e., Status, Qty, Locations...)

title: creating seperate accounts
body_text: make separate accounts so that if a company has 40 offices , we can separate our projects from 39 other offices along with our admins and users

title: Allow all users to control project list in ACC
body_text: I find it absolutely ridiculous that as a user I have no control over which projects I see in my project list. I have to contact the old project admin to have them remove me from the list or archive the project. What if that company no longer exists? The project will just stay there forever? This seems like simple common sense and a huge miss by autodesk. All users should be able to control which projects they want removed/archived from their own project list.

title: Preserving Navisworks saved views and properties in ACC
body_text: As a Client, I find Navisworks very powerful and effective as a tool to coordinate models produced by different suppliers and to build on top of them, for example creating views or adding properties useful for the O&M activities. ACC could maximise the use of these models, making them accessible directly online. However, ACC does not consistently preserve the visibility settings of the Navisworks saved views or the way custom properties (e.g. hyperlinks) are organised in Navisworks. I think this

title: Remove sheet collections from a project
body_text: Give the ability to remove a sheet collection from a project after it has been created. Allow sheets to be removed from all collections. Allow the deletion of the sheet collection(s) with no sheets in them.

title: Easier Forms management (deletion-specific)
body_text: Add ability to delete multiple forms at same time (instead of just archive, delete, or discard one by one).

title: Common asset statuses should be recognized when changing types
body_text: Changing asset categories makes status show as unspecified even in the status are commonly named between asset types. If an asset is set as specified and the asset type is changed, the status shows unspecified even if "specified" is a valid status in the new asset type. This causes some confusion when doing asset imports or trying to understand what's going on with an asset as the status says unspecified even if it was set to specified previously before the type was changed.

title: Create and edit Workplan tasks on Mobile
body_text: Tasks can not be edited or created on the mobile app. If we are to use the task plan to assign tasks to personnel, then they will have to log into the web version to be able to update progress percentage and/or adjust the start or completion date if needed. Not sure if this is a deal breaker but most field foreman that are in charge of a work scope do not have laptops. The web application does not work well on phone or iPad browsers either. Just something to think about.

title: Ability to take snapshot from Submittal cutsheet and paste into a sheet
body_text: In general, it seems like there is a need to be able to take screenshots "natively" in the platform or to be able to save to PDF without some kind of workaround (print screen, SnagIt, etc.). This specific request is looking to add information to a sheet from information within the project and have it available on the sheet instead of referencing it back elsewhere.

title: Hide empty Docs folders on Mobile
body_text: Having empty folders hidden by default would help field personnel find documents faster without having to go through empty folders. Big time saver.

title: Visibility of critical fields in RFIs to be manageable
body_text: For example, fields regarding cost or cost impact should have selective visibility; not all users should see these.

title: Append attribute values to file names - Save Settings
body_text: It is possible to attach attributes to file names, but these settings must be done manually each time a file is downloaded. It would be helpful if users could save their settings for future downloads, or if the administrator could set this function for all downloads for the whole project. This would ensure that any file downloaded from the platform has the necessary attribute (e.g. status or index).

title: Editable ID# for Search Option in Reports
body_text: When thousands of checklists need to be reconciled, it would be beneficial to be able to filter the "Sort by" drop-down using a specific ID# (ability to sort by ID#).

title: Library Form Templates - Save Changes Prior to pushing to projects
body_text: Customer would like the ability to edit Form templates in the Library and save / Review the changes prior to pushing the changes out to projects. Admins need to ensure that the changes to Form templates are complete and accurate prior to pushing to projects.

title: Forms Mobile - Search on Description on iOS
body_text: Field staff are not able to search for Forms using text that is in the Description, which is available in Web.

title: Request to have the ability to copy more than one form at a time
body_text: Currently, in Forms, you can only perform the 'Copy' action of one single form at a time. The customer would like to have the ability to select multiple forms and perform the 'Copy' action on all of those forms at the same time rather than having to do it one by one.

title: Auto Archiving
body_text: It would be nice to have a new feature in ACC to automatically set projects that have not been touched in a defined period of time from active to archived. This would take away the manual task to reduce the project lists. Admins would still have the option to go in and revert projects to active. The none accessed period could be a setting. 3, 6, 9, 12 Months or user defined.

title: Review : 'clear all' button
body_text: We have a WIP Review which is enable to be created from anyone to anyone. However this is a long process as when putting documents through this process you have to individually remove approvers as it automatically selects everyone to be an approver (why no clear all button) then select who you want . This is admin and time not needed. We cant be the only company who is suffering this? or is there a work around?

title: Plant 3D and Navisworks
body_text: Navisworks is the best solution to identify the clashes in 3D models. But the real challenge is with the 3D model developed in Plant 3D. In the Plant 3D, there is an option called " Stub-In, " which is the biggest problem in Navisworks. As per the user modeling and site condition, this is not a clash or problem. But in the Navisworks, this Stub-is will be considered a clash. There is no such opinion to filter all the stub-in and save it to create sets. If there are no sets, we can't create rules

title: User Control Login
body_text: The idea is to control the user not to accessing the ACC Account outside of the office premises. Or the User ID should lock to any particular system, which is specified by the IT person. Reason for asking this solution. Recently, management has been facing a challenge. Some of the team members who are part of the project have full access to all the folders in ACC Docs. So they are collaborating with the clients and delivering the project details without notifying the management.

title: Budget Amounts in Change Order Tools
body_text: A recent release in the Cost Management added budget amounts to the Change Order tools when selecting budgets- this way when you are selecting a budget you can see how much money is remaining in the budget. Currently it shows Revised Budget less Actual Cost. Can we change this to be Revised Budget minus projected cost? This way we are moving money around based on what we think we will spend instead of what have spent.

title: Another list of ideas I've been tracking..
body_text: Tracking Feature Requests: Keep spaces or other characters in template generation: The CLBuild Location Template generates extra, unnecessary characters such as Area/Floor/Room preceding the actual data. This is cumbersome and is not an accurate depiction of room numbers in many cases. In my project, every Area, Asset, and Room number has a special character. Every time you click on a link in ACC Build, it opens in a new tab. You're siloed and cannot go back, etc. It's a handicap. Ability to dup

title: Issue report - cannot exclude unpublished issues in report
body_text: When creating an Issue report through 'Reports" content can be filtered in multiple ways, but there is no way to filter to exclude unpublished issues. This seems like an easy feature to implement and a reasonable request as the reason the issues are unpublished is that they are not ready for viewing, so I therefore would need a way to exclude them from the report.

title: Issue suggestion: Issue number appearing when hovering over it and deploying a gradient for the coloured dots in 3D views for depth perception
body_text: Issues are appearing in the model as coloured dots without any reference to which issue number they are. In order to find out, one must click on the issue dot, but then the view takes you to that issue's perspective which is not what I want, I want to be able to hover over the Issue dot and see the reference number without losing the view I am currently in. We note many users making this mistake, and then there is no way to go back a step to get back to the exact same view you were just in, one

title: Ability to Create a template for other costs in building connected
body_text: I would like to have the ability to create a template in bid leveling for each bid package under other costs to aid in the bid leveling for a project as this is the only place that a subcontractor can't view, but currently you have to add in those items on each bid package on each project. Since we do not have any inclusions on our bid form, we simply can't level bids in building connected.

title: Option in the issue reports to add an official letter
body_text: As a construction manager, I would like to be able to choose when creating an issue reports whether an official letter/defect letter (legally compliant, VOB-compliant) is automatically generated. This letter should be able to be saved as a template and also be adapted at a later date in the event of changes.

title: Compare two 360 photos taken at different times
body_text: In the web app I want to compare two 360 photos taken at different times to compare the progress. It may be helpful to trace the cable routing at a later stage.

title: Capture 360 photos directly with the ACC app
body_text: I want to capture 360 photos directly in the ACC app. I want to locate the 360 photo on the sheet and add the photo.

title: Markup Images in Issues
body_text: Right now, you can only add an image to an issues created on ACC. There is no functionality to markup and image. Please make the same markup tools available for 'markups' avaible in the image viewer .

title: Distribution workflow
body_text: Seems that the edit option to remove persons from the default distribution list of a workflow is available only for the Project Admin. I believe this should be always available for all the project members. Otherwise, either we need to create as many workflows as there are specific approvers, or you need to give Admin level to all the workflows initiators to make them able to remove the users from the default list of the default workflow. See attached screenshot. As Admin, I have the pen icon.

title: TradeTapp Risk Color Codes Not Visible
body_text: I would like to request that the color coded "Arrow symbols" in TradeTapp's Risk Assessment be improved for visibility. The icons are too small and the colors too similar to easily distinguish the difference between each point. I have a user that is color blind and cannot read the color-coded risk rating at all, it would help if when you hover over a risk score arrow symbol, that the risk rating would appear.

title: Report | Option to have a sheet overview in the issue summary report
body_text: As a construction manager, I would like to be able to choose in the issue summary report, if I want a sheet overview to see the location of the issues. First, the sheet overview should be displayed, followed by the summariezed issues on this plan.

title: Automatic location transfer from Revit
body_text: We create our 3D models in Revit and publish the plans from the model in the build plans area. However, the location areas have to be created manually again. This takes a lot of time. The location areas should be automatically transferred from Revit to ACC so that they no longer have to be created manually.

title: Grant external permission to close issues
body_text: We need the option that external parties can close issues they didn't create. The best way for this soloution will be to add an additional custom attribute to the issue type which allows to add a member, a role or a company to close the issue. This option also increase the analysis of the issues because the removal company remains in the assigned to field and the construction site manager no longer need to close the approved issues.

title: Editable Estimate Code ID
body_text: The PROEST estimate code (ID number) should be editable, as this is often enforced. If we make a mistake, there is no way to correct it. We want to be able to edit this number at our convenience.

title: Handover - Save to files
body_text: Can you add ´Save to files´ option to handover? Then we could create transmittals from entire handover package. Currently we can only export handover. This is available only for admins and it downloads zipped file. Then we have to re-upload this zipped file back to ACC -.- in order to create transmittal -.- ´Save to files´ function is available across ACC, for example attachments from correspondence can be saved to any folder on ACC with ´Save to files´.

title: Adding Assigned Workplan Tasks in the Home "Assigned to me" and Build "Work status" Dashboard Card
body_text: It is crucial that just like issues, RFIs, submittals and meeting items, we can see the assigned workplan tasks and deliverables (from Schedules tool) in the dashboard cards of "Assigned to me" (home page) and "Work status" (Build home). This will allow users to quick see which of their tasks and deliverables are due within 3-7 days or which are over due; in one single view with all the other assignments. As I understood at this moment such a feature is not available but since the data is there

title: Make Issue Attachments Viewable in Navisworks
body_text: Within Issues, the Attachment section only shows its files in the webpage. When viewing issues in the Coordination Issues Add-In on Navisworks, the Attachment section appears but none of the files living in the attachment section do. Frequently during meetings we have to navigate back to the webpage to see Issue Attachments and I have gotten multiple messages from trade partners who are confused on why their attachments 'aren't showing up'.

title: Add/Remove Models without Opening View
body_text: In Model Coordination, I would like to add/remove models within a view without having to open the view. This would cut down on time spent opening every view to append a new model in or remove an outdated model. It also would help if the reason I'm removing models is because the view has become too large and constantly crashes. Sometimes I cant remove models to make the views stop crashing because the view needs to be opened to make the change.

title: Have normal file options in Packages
body_text: It would be useful to be able to have the same 3 dot options in Packages like files, for example to be able to right click on a file in a package and have the option to Add to a Package there too. Right Click File options 3 dots options in Packages Advantage of having this is to be able to create or add to a package from another package or to essentially be able to copy a package into a new one.

title: Multiple RFI Import from .xml
body_text: be able to import multiple RFIs via .xml import similar to assets or schedules.

title: Multi-field support within a single container
body_text: Containers currently support only one field or dropdown, which restricts the naming convention flexibility (especially under ISO 19650). Please introduce the ability to add multiple fields or dropdowns within the same container. This would allow users to configure two or more input elements (e.g., dropdowns, text fields).

title: Identification of who created/assigned the Issue on Mobile Application
body_text: The issue module in mobile app lacks a vital information - There is no information shown on who has created or assigned the issue to the user. Example - If an issue is assigned to me, I will not be able to understand who assigned it to me, leading to confusion on who I should assign the issue back for closure. Showing a brief trail of who has created and assigned the issue to me or the users involved in that particular issue trail will be helpful.

title: Import option for Custom Fields in Issues Module
body_text: Currently there is no option to import custom fields from any other project or using a template, which would have made it easier to set up custom fields and issue categories & types in new projects. There are 400+ items in custom fields which have to be added manually for each project. Although this can be handled to some extent using project template, custom fields are updated constantly. Additionally, there is a substantial time gap between project creation and start of project execution due t

title: Need a new Snagging/Handover Module for Apartment Handover Process
body_text: This requirement may be specific to the Indian Markets - Most of the big developers have a process of handing over apartments & common areas through multiple levels of checks like - Execution Level, Quality Level & CRM Level. These checks are done in sequence, and the apartment moves ahead to another team only after completion of the previous team, till the flat is approved by the CRM team. The basic process is - Snags/defects for different Finishes, Services, etc., are raised by an engineer (ty

title: Programme Management Team Role with Scoped Permissions
body_text: Description: Introduce a new role or permission set within ACC that allows a designated team to: Create new projects Manage project members (add/remove users, assign roles) Archive and restore projects Constraints: This team must not have the ability to: Delete projects Unassign or revoke licenses Purpose: This role is intended for operational teams responsible for project lifecycle management without risking accidental or unauthorized deletion of critical resources or license mismanagement. Ben

title: Removing restrictions on number of locations (Currently 9999)
body_text: We use the locations feature in ACC to define location Work Breakdown Structure (WBS) based on structural and architectural drawings of a project, so that the locations can be used in Forms & Issues module. One building usually has 3000-5000 different locations (Floors, Apartments, Rooms, Concrete Pours, etc.) and a project may have multiple buildings (12-15 in some cases). In such cases, we have to create multiple projects in ACC for the same project due to restriction on maximum locations that

title: Viewpoints - Ability to update the views retrospectively
body_text: ACC recently released Viewpoints, a way to save 3D views within the Model Coordination space. Viewpoints are specific to Views, but the dashboard does not communicate how many saved Viewpoints there are in each View.
