With numerous views and viewpoints, there is no way for users to see which viewpoints live in which view, so I am suggesting an additional feature to help users identify this. Secondly, I am proposing additional features for the Viewpoint itself. It would be great if the camera angl

title: Remove Closed Items From Assigned Work on Main Page
body_text: Closed out items that are approved are still popping up on the home page. For the year leading up to last month, this never occurred but is now showing up on my home page. This action hinders the general contractor's ability as it leads to potential misses within the submittal process. The "Your Assigned Work" column should only be highlighting items that are currently open. This bug needs to be removed.

title: Placing issues retrospectively
body_text: We have big problems with not being able to retrospectively place Issue in a 3D location. Some issues may only be visible (and tagged) on a 2D drawing when it was created, but over time, this issue has been modelled and is better viewed/understood/tagged in a 3D model. Please allow users to place pre-existing issues that were once created in Docs in the Model Coordination space. We are currently forced to create a static 3D view for tagging, but with new models each week, it immediately becomes

title: Support HTML File Uploads in ACC
body_text: It would be very useful to allow uploading and managing .html files within Autodesk Construction Cloud. These files are a common export format from Navisworks (for example clash reports and model reviews) and are frequently used by project teams as part of the coordination and validation workflow. Currently, users are forced to convert or compress these files in order to store and share them on ACC, which reduces interoperability and adds unnecessary steps. Allowing direct upload and visualizati

title: Confusing Button Labels in Issue Interface: Suggestion for Improvement
body_text: We’ve noticed that many users are misunderstanding the meaning of the "Unpublish" and "Publish" buttons displayed in the Issue interface. When the "Unpublish" button is visible, users often assume that the issue is currently unpublished. As a result, they click the button thinking they are publishing the issue, but it actually gets unpublished — leading to repeated problems across multiple departments. Suggestion for improvement: To reduce confusion, we recommend updating the button display to r

title: Underlay Options/Settings
body_text: Please add the option to set the transparency/colors/position of the underlay in a easy and quick way. Just take an example from Archicad! It works perfectly there and it's a really important tool and easy to include. Thank you

title: Embed approved documents as attachments to reports in the main screen
body_text: Hello, A useful addition would be to allow you to export attachments in reports from the main Submittals screen in the same way we can do it in the submission screen

title: References
body_text: @bbeverlin We would like the ability to pull a report, filtered by tags, of all references requested and completed. We would like the following information to be pulled with the report: Company Name Application Status Qualification Status Questionnaire Sent Tags Primary Contact Primary Email Completed Projects Reference Completed Status Star Rating From Reference Notes From Reference

title: Project Phase
body_text: It’s essential for ACC project-lifecycle management to have a way to record and report a project’s current stage—or to set that stage. A Project Phase field in Project Admin, which can later be surfaced in Insight Builder for dashboard reporting, is crucial. Alternatively, there could simply be an option to add a custom project attribute similar to issues or RFI but in project admin , setting Tab. Currently, some project-phase fields exist in the BIM 360 APIs, but they aren’t connected to ACC or

title: Feature Suggestion – Project Directory Tool, Separate from Members
body_text: Hello Autodesk R&D Team, I’d like to suggest adding a Project Directory tool to Build. Currently, the platform allows us to add “Members,” which is great for permissions, but it doesn’t fully address the practical need for a centralized project contact directory . In day-to-day construction management, we need a simple and quick way to view critical contact information. A Directory feature would allow users to: Pull in “Members” that are already added to the project and pre-populate. Also, allow

title: Resizable Stamps in Markups
body_text: Stamps currently cannot be resized. I want to create a stamp with only my initials (3–4 letters), but the stamp has a fixed width . Also, the background cannot be 100% transparent, so when I place the stamp it can cover text on my plan or document. Please make it possible to resize the stamp and remove the excessive white space around it. Musst have: Allow resizing of stamps with short labels (e.g., initials with 3–4 letters ). Remove the fixed stamp frame and excessive white space . Support a 1

title: Filter by Attribute feature
body_text: Dear Development Team, I work within the BIM team at Coventry University, and as part of our approach to maintaining well-structured data, I have created custom attributes and assigned them to the relevant documents and drawings. Currently, the filter setup is member-by-member . It would be highly beneficial to have an option that allows all project members to access the same filters by default, rather than requiring each member to add them manually. Thank you.

title: Change Approved and Rejected to real status assigned to the document, not the value of the status
body_text: If I want to create a report from the main Reviews window to find out the statuses of closed reviews, and have more than just Approved and Rejected, such as Approved with comments, this Approved with comments automatically falls under the value Approved column instead of indicating separately that there is a document, meaning if I have more than just the Approved and Rejected statuses, I have to click within each review to report on the actual status the document received. While generally Approv

title: Add .pst support
body_text: The architecture firm I work for requires employees to archive our email conversations to a .pst file after a construction job is completed, so that the firm can still have proper legal records after the employee leaves the company and their email account deleted. However, ACC / Docs does not support the .pst file format. It simply will not upload them to the cloud. This means we are starting to go back to using a local server or other cloud services like MS OneDrive. Autodesk, if you want to ke

title: Baseline Start & Finish Columns
body_text: When importing an XML file from Primavera P6/Oracle Primavera Cloud with an attached baseline, it would be helpful to have the "Baseline Start" and "Baseline Finish" columns available in the scheduling module. While I understand that the baseline bars can be turned on within the Gantt chart, it would be helpful for the columns to be available as well. This would allow for a side-by-side comparison of dates in the columns in addition to the comparison on the bars.

title: RFI Default - Due date per step
body_text: Instead of having a due date for the full workflow from the start of the RFI until it's been closed, additional default options should be there available for the admins to set up the default workflows, similar to how Reviews are configured, with due dates per each step in addition to the overall due date, so we can track if an RFI is due at a certain stage, and not overall.

title: giving Submittal creators more options without adding them as a submittal manager
body_text: in the Submittals section under "Build", when one tries to create an item, and as they scroll down that box, filling in the required information, one hits a bump where that creator can't select a package or a review template unless they're a Submittal Manager (The two boxes don't appear). Any project member whether a general contractor, subcontractor, supplier or any other project member with access to "Build" should have the option to select a package and template. without the need to add them

title: Default Tags for Photos and Sheets
body_text: To ensure consistency and reduce errors, customers should establish a default set of tags for both Photos and Build Sheets. This helps prevent duplicate or inconsistent tag variations (e.g., "drywall," "GWB," "sheetrock," "gyp board") as well as misspellings. Project Admins should have the ability to manage tag creation permissions—specifically, to enable or restrict the addition of new tags by users.

title: Move Documents 200plus
body_text: Please can we have the ability to move more than 200 documents at once. Adds room for human error and admin for moving docs from WIP to approved and then to Handover. Thanks

title: Feature to filter files by who has locked it
body_text: Currently there is no feature available that allows to filter files by who's locked it in Docs in ACC. The user needs to filter by status "Locked" all the files and then hover over the lock icon of each file to know who locked it. I suggest including a filter called as "Locked by" or a feature to "sort by name" all the locked files that appear in the search.

title: Kanban board view for Work plan
body_text: Ability to arrange the tasks in work plan to a Kanban view. This would be beneficial for design phase when manage; what has been done, what work is on-going, what needs to be done, what hasn't been started.

title: batch plot - combine to .pdf
body_text: it would be advantageous (in Docs) to be able to batch plot/print/combine multiple selected files of different file extensions. select multiple files - sent to printer plotter, print as .pdf select multiple files - export to single or multiple .pdf's

title: Cost Management Markups on Proposed Column
body_text: It is my understanding that the "Proposed" column in the Change Order module is related to downstream suppliers (subcontractors). So not understanding why financial markups auto calculate on that column. Markups don't calculate on the "Committed" column which makes so why does it on the "Proposed" column. "Estimated", "Submitted" and "Approved" are upstream columns so auto calculating on those columns makes sense. Seems like another setting that could be set (on or off) in the settings part of t

title: Activity Log Overhaul -  Project Admin
body_text: I was recently looking into the activity log in the admin area of my project. I noticed that it only can go back the last 31 days. I feel like this is a huge oversight. In my opinion, the activity log should house everything that happens in build. I also feel this should be searchable. Every action taken. From references being added to assets, to RFIs being linked to markups. Everything. This should be the GO TO location for an admin trying to solve a problem. From the job being created to the v

title: Ability to reference Sheets on an Issue
body_text: When creating an issue, we have the ability to link Sheets to this specific Issue. However, this is only possible on the desktop version. It cannot be done or viewed on the iPad. It would be very helpful if this feature could be available on iPad as well, since most of our work is done on site. Thanks

title: Forms - plus minus counters and overall calculation of percentage of the values
body_text: Forms need possibility to have plus-minus counters as a question-response type. Then while submitting (or real time) the form should calculate the percentage of positive values to all values (positive and negative) and record it to the form. This is a standard method to score construction site safety/quality. Lack of this functionality is forcing our company to use other systems than ACC for the scoring/rating of construction sites. Plus and minus (click) counters need to be available for many n

title: Do not list the first document in the Exhibit listing in the commitment.
body_text: The first document in the Document Package is always the commitment document and does not need to be listed as an Exhibit.

title: Optional Editable Attributes for Forms in the List View
body_text: Currently, all forms created from the same template appear identical in the list view, unless the creator manually adjusts the title or adds a description. However, neither of these fields can be made mandatory in the template. As a result, the only distinguishing factor often becomes the creator’s name, which in many cases is irrelevant. To improve searchability and identification of forms , there should be an optional editable attribute in the list view for all forms, similar to the attributes

title: Improve Notification Settings for Form Submissions for Administrators
body_text: Currently, all Project Administrators automatically receive email notifications for every form submitted for review, even when they are not assigned as reviewers. In large projects, this results in an overwhelming number of emails, many of which are irrelevant to the Project Administrator. The reviewer settings defined in the form templates should also control who receives these notifications. In other words, if a Project Administrator is not explicitly assigned as a reviewer for a form, they sh

title: Customizing the transparency of the red dot in the report
body_text: At the moment, the Red dot in the thumbnail is hiding the detail of the drawing. We are looking to see if we can customise the transparency of the red dot placed in the sheet/file thumbnail when exporting a detail issue report.

title: ACC Takeoff | Make Hidden 3D Takeoff Types Completely Transparent
body_text: It is super helpful to hide Takeoff Types to declutter the preview pane as takeoff is captured. In 3D takeoff, this creates a workflow where estimators know all hidden items have been addressed and all visible items are pending. Hiding items is also a great way to declutter the model for presentation purposes. While hiding Takeoff Types works well in 2D, when takeoff types are hidden in 3D the model objects are ghosted, or opaque, but still visible. This prohibits the decluttering of comprehensi

title: Add a Direct Link to Our Company Profile for Easier Bidding Invitations
body_text: I’ve noticed that General Contractors often use BuildingConnected Pro to send out bid requests. However, as subcontractors, we’d like to make it easier for GCs to find and invite us to bid. My suggestion is to allow us to create a direct link to our company profile in Autodesk apps like BuildingConnected and PlanGrid. We could place this link on our website’s contact page, so if a GC is interested in working with us, they can quickly access our profile and send an invite—without having to search

title: Naming standard for Assets
body_text: It would be really great if we could enforce a naming standard for asset names in Asset tools. This will ensure consistency along the project assets but also for consistency during operation and facility management phase. Currently we cannot enforce any rule to the asset names.

title: Upload file with different name but only update version
body_text: The possibility to upload a file with different file name and replace the old name with updated version.

title: Mandatory comment if review is being sent back to initiator or previous step
body_text: I understand that key reviewers who are sending back the review to the previous step or the initiator during a review process in Docs can put a comment for the initiator or previous step to see why this has been sent back, but I believe it's really important that this comments is not optional but rather mandatory. We need to have the same principle as if a key reviewer of a cost management approval workflow does not approve, they have to (mandatory field *) put a comment before being able to sen

title: Importing Sub Bidders
body_text: When importing a bidder from a project (a) into another project (b), it would be helpful to have the ability to not bring over the bid form associated with project (a) into project (b) - Similar to the check boxes available when duplicating a project.

title: Building Connected - Proposal report - condensed
body_text: I am looking for a report to download proposals and print them for a binder. Right now the bid archive report downloads every bid separated in folders by trade and subcontractor. They still have to be printed one by one. If there were an option for this report do download every bid into 1 pdf, it would be very helpful. Even better - if the groups of bids were separated "blank" pages that identify a new trade group. This type of report would save my team many hours a month.

title: REMOVE QUALIFICATION STATUS COLUMN
body_text: Please remove the Qualification Status column when viewing the bid package lists. Not sure when or why you guys implemented this column, but it is a waste of space for me. Please remove this, or allow us to remove it.

title: Improving ACC Coordination: Separate Transform Handling for Shared and Project Base Points
body_text: I’ve encountered challenges with model transforms when working between Navisworks and the ACC viewer, particularly on large industrial projects. Outside of model coordination I can transform models as I need for the project within Navisworks. One federated model set to Project Base Point while another federated model can be set to Shared coordinates. This for specific coordination purposes. Current Limitations Transform in ACC Views: While the transform tool in ACC is easy to use, it applies uni

title: Subs Should Not Be Allowed to Bill Unless Contract is Executed
body_text: The current process as I understand it is Subcontractors create their Schedule of Values in ACC, submit that SOV to the General Contractor for review and approval. Once SOV is approved, contract is set to executed which locks it down. The problem is Subcontractors are able to submit a cost payment application without an executed contract. There should be a setting to disallow this. The current "open billing" process is causing confusion and lots of rework.

title: TAKEOFF - Add POST Functionality for Takeoff Types in the Takeoff API
body_text: Right now, the Takeoff API does not support POST functionality for Takeoff Types , which is a major limitation. Without the ability to create Takeoff Types programmatically, users are forced to do this manually in the interface, adding unnecessary steps and slowing down processes that should be automated. Having POST support for Takeoff Types would open the door for better integrations, efficiency, and consistency across projects. This seems like a basic feature that should already exist, and it

title: Archive Projects as a Project Member
body_text: You should be able to remove yourself or personally archive projects that you are no longer working on in ACC Build. I work on a lot of projects and it is difficult to stay organized when I can't remove myself after a project is complete for me. I rarely stay to the end of a project and have more involvement upfront, so waiting until a project admin archives the project is not feasible. Without the admin archiving the project, there are a lot of times that I cannot even stop notifications withou

title: Reporting functions
body_text: More options to be able to run individual reports based on attribute selections and will has repotting functions within "packages"

title: Features on ACC Mobile Apps
body_text: I would like to request the same features be made available on the ACC Mobile Apps for both Android and iOS users. I recently discovered that there are limitations when using the ACC Mobile App on Android. • In Forms, iOS users can view all comments with the “See Form” option, whereas this option is not available for Android users. • During Inspections, iOS users can crop photos taken within the app and have option to retake photo, but this functionality is not available on Android devices.

title: Files: Export folders structure with description
body_text: Actually there is an option to export "Folder Permissions" with the list of the folders and subfolders. Unfortunatly there isn't an option to include folder descrptions field implemented recently. Users need a function to export folders structure with relative descriptions.

title: Replication Tool Improvements
body_text: I've been trialling the Replication Tool for Docs and have a few improvement suggestions: Allow Scheduling of full project copying Only update files if they are changed in the source Purge (move to deleted files) files that have been moved or deleted in the source When a multiple project copy is created, create one task with sub-tasks rather than multiple individual tasks.

title: Need the ability to remove a tag suggestion
body_text: Once a tag is created and automatically assigned to a photo, it can't be edited or removed from the suggested list. If there's a typo or a duplicate, it's there forever. Someone can get overzealous and create far too many tags where they're no longer efficient. Please create a way to remove tags from the suggested list as long as they aren't currently assigned to a photo. There should be a way to do a "tag cleanup."

title: AutoSpecs - make it easier to do quality control on the split PDF's for each spec section
body_text: In the Spec view you get the opportunity to do QC on how Autospecs has read the name of the spec section. However, only a limited number of characters display, regardless so you cannot see the full text. Hovering over the name of the specification displays the full text, but only when the specification is not grayed out (an indication that no submittals or products were found). It is frustrating and slow to do QC in this way. I would prefer an approach similar to the sheets wizard that when you

title: Allow for System Assets to be Mapped and for QR Codes to be Added
body_text: Currently, you are not able to map a system asset on a drawing. It would be nice if you were able to map the system/area. Additionally it would be nice if there was a barcode field on the system so team could scan the system and see all assets associated with it. Instead we are having to have a qr code for each individual asset.

title: Paste Issue Image Attachments from Windows Clipboard
body_text: When an Issue is create you can included attachments. The dialog states "Drag or paste files here or choose files". There is no apparent method to paste from windows clipboard. It would be excellent to be able to quickly copy/paste an attachment from the windows clipboard.

title: Meeting Minutes PDF Footers
body_text: Add the ability for project admins to add a standard footer that will appear as a footer on Meeting Minute PDF's for messages such as, 'A ny comments and disagreements with the minutes to be sent within 72 hours or they will be null and void'.

title: Allow for Control on Issue Numbering
body_text: Currently, if an issue is created and then discarded the Issue ID is not reused. It would be nice if there was a parameter that allowed project teams to select if they want issue numbers to be reused or not. For one project team they were confused why their issues started at 11, but it turns out the first 10 were discarded.

title: Search feature needed when importing a form template from another project
body_text: When selecting a project with Form Templates to import from there is no search functionality to help me find the project. Project admins must scroll through a long list of projects on which they are project admins. Add the ability to search for the project name/number rather than just displaying a list of projects.

title: Option to Notify of Self-performed Tasks (like closing RFIs, etc. for project documentation purposes)
body_text: My current project I'm on requires an extreme level of documentation. I need to provide "evidence" of completing my tasks, including closing RFIs and submittals. Due to that fact, I would like the option to receive ALL email notifications, even of the tasks that are self-performed. I had 2 open tickets with Autodesk Support, 02167805 and 02167802, both cases I was told to list myself as a Watcher to receive notifications. I had to tell the support person that being a Watcher doesn't provide emai

title: Create Multiple Filter Groups to import Assets from 3D Model
body_text: In ACC Build Assets we need import assets from 3D Model (NWC) that identify assets with different source files and different nomenclature in tthe same asset category and it's not possible generate multiple filter groups into assets management configuration.

title: View Issues on a Kanban board
body_text: Add a Kanban view for issues that allows you to sort them by various categories (ie. Company, Team Member, Status, etc.)

title: Feature Request: "View As" Functionality for Autodesk Construction Cloud
body_text: A "View As" setting would significantly improve project management. This feature would allow a project administrator to select any user on the project and see exactly what files and folders are visible to a selected user. It would also show what permission levels they have for those files (e.g., View, Download, Edit, Manage). This setting would be invaluable for troubleshooting access issues and verifying that user permissions have been set up correctly without needing to search through each fol

title: Change Order Multiple Budget code SOV Import
body_text: We have very large change orders sometimes with several (sometimes 100+) budget codes. We need an easy way to export all budget codes at once to build the SOV import (like how commitments SOVs Excel import work in Cost) instead of having to export each budget codes one at a time.

title: Submittal status set should be customizable.
body_text: Goal: Better tracking of submittal statuses that reveal more information of where the submittal is along the process of approval. Process: This could be accomplished by allows for customizable status sets on the Submittals tool similar to what is in the ASSETS tool. We could create the submittal and put it in a development status. After all the information and documentation is uploaded we could send it to a project member for the existing review. After review the submittal could be submittted to

title: Tool/Equipment Tracking across multiple projects using the Asset Tool
body_text: Goal: We would like to be able to track certain tools and equipment used to complete a project across the company, so that we know where they are and what condition they are in. Examples of this would be Generators, Hammer Drills, or Scissor lifts. Those with permissions could use the barcode feature within the ACC ASSETS tool to add and transfer an asset to a new job. The Asset status set would be carried over to the new job from either an existing job or a Tool library. A default status set co

title: Model Coordination - Clashes in a coordination Space
body_text: In Model Coordination, users should have the ability to save their filtered Clash Matrix views within a coordination space so that filters persist per user per space

title: Custom Attributes to be included in SOV Export for Cost and Change Orders
body_text: When exporting our schedule of values from Cost and Change Orders to build the commitment in Excel, we would like the ability to include custom attributes in the export. For our case it would be an address field so the supplier would know where to ship the material.

title: RFI Reporting doesn't give company in brackets for any of the names
body_text: Unlike BIM360, ACC doesn't give the information for user companies when a report is generated, neither on the company where the user who created the RFI is from, nor the company where the user who is assigned to as ball in court is from. Names are in most cases useless for big projects when you have tens of companies working on RFIs. Add metadata on the company for each name in the reporting, because if it's available in the online version, should be replicated in reporting as well

title: Same Assets in diffenrent models
body_text: When I use the workflow from Design Coordination, I may have copies of a model in the “Work in Progress,” “Shared,” and “Consumed” folders. The same elements in these models should then have identicaL GUIDs. Since assets are linked to GUIDs, wouldn't it make sense or be possible to display the assets in all copied models and edit parameters? At the same time, this would prevent identical assets from being created twice. Translated with DeepL.com (free version)

title: Ability to navigate DWG by scrolling
body_text: This feature aims to enhance the user experience by allowing users to navigate through DWG (Drawing) files seamlessly using the scroll function of their mouse or touchpad. The inclusion of this feature will make it easier for users to explore and interact with large and detailed DWG files.

title: Asset Manager Permission
body_text: Customers would like to see and Asset manager permission that is between a Project Admin and a member so that they can assign members to add/manage assets and customer fields for assets. Adding these members as Project Admins does that work due to certain data that cannot be exposed.

title: Ability to See Percent Complete in Forms
body_text: Customers would like the ability to see the percent complete of all forms that are in process. Their request is to have a column that populates as forms from the field are synced. Currently they only are able to see the two statuses. They don't know if a form that is required to complete a task is 5% complete or 99%. Admin is assigned to all forms as a reviewer so they can open in-flight forms to see the completeness of them.

title: View Sheet Markups in Comparison Mode
body_text: Sheets Comparison: There is currently no ability to add markups to overlays or export the comparison Adding the ability to view sheet markups while in comparison mode would be beneficial. Provide the ability for users to save comparisons to files, add markups to them, and have the ability to export them with markups.

title: BuildingConnected - Adding Bidders
body_text: In BuildingConnected after you create a project and create a bid package you then can click the tab BIDDERs and start adding bidders by selecting ADD BIDDERs. When in this area you have the option to search by if the Trade is “willing to travel to” you would change the address to the location the company would be willing to travel to and then you can slide the slider bar at the top of the screen and it will select 1 or more companies based on your settings you select based on their best match's

title: Folder Usage
body_text: It would be useful to identify which folders in a folder structure are being actively used (or not) and to be able to do this across a number of projects. We are looking to identify if a particular folder is being actively used. Currently the only way to do this is to access each project individually and check in it manually.

title: Form Limitation: Need for More Than 40 Sections
body_text: Currently, the number of sections in the forms is limited to 40. I find this quite unfortunate, as there are forms that require more sections. In my case, it's an electrical distribution system with 50 different residual current devices (RCDs), each requiring a separate checklist.

title: Build Reports - Need Field to filter submittal reports
body_text: Previously, the Responsible Contractor was available as a filter option within the Reports section for Submittals. It is no longer available. I understand that I can filter and sort the Submittal Log and then export a list of submittals. However, my goal is to create an automated report that can be filtered directly by Responsible Contractor, rather than relying on manual exports. Current Workaround: The only current workaround is to filter the Submittal Log by Responsible Contractor, export the

title: Use Windows offline
body_text: Please allow the browser or an app for Windows to be used offline (or limited internet access) with locally cached project files and sheets. I need to use the browser in a slow internet area and would prefer to only update the project overnight. Locally cached sheets and files would allows the computer to operate faster decreasing downtime while waiting on the browser to download a sheet, project pdf for submittals, photos, RFI's, etc. This would function excellent if it operates the same way th

title: Include a place to add the contractor license number in the company information.
body_text: There is a place to add ERP information and Tax ID but not contractor license numbers. Please include a place to add the contractor license number

title: Automatically archive closed RFIs to specified folder
body_text: It is my understanding that you have to manually send closed RFIs to a specific folder as you close and distribute them. It would be nice to have the option to automate this process if desired by the project team. A manual process allows for RFIs to be missed and an incomplete archive.

title: ACC Submittals Permissions on Project Admin level
body_text: Our company would like to have various levels of the manager role within the Submittals area. This would allow our subcontractors to create, or review submittals. However, if they are submitting a file, we do not want them to also have the ability to review the file or make comments to other reviewers. Can this be done? The only permission within the tool is the manager role. It is required for our subcontractors to sometimes initiate the submittal or review. Unlike the RFI module, Submittals do

title: Searchable Form Content
body_text: Please make Forms Content Searchable. IF we are looking for something specific like a delay form a Daily report, its currently not intuitive when you have to generate an excel spread sheet and then find the custom delay field to locate the delay to locate the date and then go look up the form tied to that date.

title: Preset continuous scroll settings
body_text: There is an option to set the continuous scroll option in Docs. It is needed for heavily texted documents. When viewing drawings you don't need it. It would be nice if an account administrator could preset the continuous scroll option on certain folders in the projects template(s). It would even be better if it could be set afterwards over all projects in an automated way.

title: ACC Library Permission Control
body_text: In the current setup, the ACC Library can only be managed company-wide by the Account Admin. However, in most cases, the ACC account is managed by a very specific group of people, and not everyone is allowed to handle account-related information. The Library is currently tied to the Account Admin role, but this should not be the case. Typically, the Library is managed on a project-by-project basis. Shared parameters vary by project, and Revit families also differ from one project to another. The

title: Enable Automated Drawing Extraction (ADE) in ACC Project Templates
body_text: ADE only works in live projects when PDFs are published, not in project templates. This means attributes and title block mappings must be redone each time a new project is created. Allowing ADE in templates would let us set up and test extraction once, ensuring all projects start with the same standards and saving setup time.

title: RFI Submitted On Date
body_text: Currently the RFI tool does not allow you to have a "Submitted On" date, and only has "Created On", "Updated On" and "Closed On". The date that the RFI was actually submitted is the most important to us when tracking how long an RFI has been in the reviewers court. There are a lot of times when there is a lag between when an RFI draft is started versus when it is submitted to the reviewing party. As an example below. You can see that this RFI moved out of the Draft to Review stage on 8/11/2025,

title: Issue Status Permission
body_text: Currently the subcontractors can assign any status to their assigned Issues. We would like to see permissioning around Issue statuses to limit what they can select. For example, we do not want them being able to status an issue as "Pending" or "Closed", but currently they can.

title: Location and sublocation modifications
body_text: Currently Locations or Sublocations cannot be moved into or out of "super"locations. Add a modification tool to move filed location of locations/sublocations. e.g. Imported 212 project locations, which have now all been linked to drawings, assets, photos, issues etc. Need a Superlocation to split between staged works that did not exist at the time of import. The solution offered by ACC was to delete all locations and start again - this is not feasible given the amount of linked items.

title: Link For Project Location in Maps
body_text: Having a link where the project address is pulled up directly into maps. Our field staff who travel to different jobs frequently would find this very helpful to not have to type it in every time and be able to just click a link from the Autodesk mobile app that pull up the route in maps.

title: Project Team List on Build Home Page
body_text: On the Build Home Page, it would be nice to have a place to list the Project Manager, Assistant Project Manager, and Superintendent - maybe under the project address? Easier to find their contact information vs. searching in the member directory.

title: ACC Revolution - Design ACC for humans, not IT developers - Aconex example
body_text: Hi ACC, Here is something you never heard before - why don't you design ACC as platform for humans and not for IT developers? For example, when I speak with my colleagues who worked on Aconex platform, they all say it is a much better system to use because it is designed for humans, not for IT experts. Yes, you developed APIs for people who know how to use it. When you ask your ACC staff who worked in construction before, what do they tell you about IT skills from people who actually work on con

title: Systems as reference in issues (apparently not a bug)
body_text: Currently it is possible to add Issues to Systems in Assets, but not add systems as reference within Issues on WEB. It is possible in the mobile APP and you see the reference. On WEB you don't even see the system reference in Issues. I was thinking it was a bug, but Autodesk support responded that it is designed this way and it might be on a future Roadmap... Would also be nice if the system reference also could reference to the assets in the system as a choice.

title: ACC Docs Reviews – Action upon completion: Autoincrement revision attribute
body_text: Problem statement: Customer uses the “Actions Upon Completion” from the Approval workflows to copy files to folders and to update attributes. The "Status" attribute allows to auto-increment upon completion but the revision attribute does not allow to auto-increment. Desired action/outcome: EBA customer would like to have possibility to tauto-increment the Revision attribute upon completion, similar to the Status attribute. This increment could be numeric or alphanumeric depending on the lest rev

title: Meetings Module Flexibility
body_text: The meetings module needs the ability to add metadata / attributes to all meetings. You should also be able to sort all columns in the meetings module. When working on large projects there is a large volume of meeting series, and the module currently works by bringing the latest updated meeting to come to the top of the list. As part of communication planning, we number all meeting series and want the ability to sort by the series number.

title: Specifications Module
body_text: The specifications module should include the ability to add attributes for ease of filtering and searching. You should also have the ability to sort on each column. Lastly, the ability to delete each individual spec instead of a version set would be very beneficial.

title: Expense Fiter or Group by Budget Code
body_text: Can the ability be added to filter or group by budget code in expense

title: Ability to Customize or Shorten the Email “From” Name in ACC Notifications
body_text: We should be able to modify the option to customize the “From” name currently shown as: Autodesk Construction Cloud reply@acc.autodesk.com for all automated email notifications sent through ACC (including Daily Reports, RFIs, Submittals, etc.). If full customization is not possible, I suggest at least shortening the name (for example, to ACC ) to make emails easier to read, especially on mobile devices. The current name is quite long and takes up valuable space in the inbox, often hiding more im

title: inner office communications within building connected
body_text: Current there is no way for the estimating team to know when more quotes have been entered into any of the bid packages unless we go into each bid package. On bid day it is pretty crazy so communication between estimators is key: If I add a quote in If the subcontractor uploads a quote If I put in revisions We would love to be able to communicate with each other within the system

title: Supported Video Format
body_text: Currently, the viewer in ACC supports few video formats, which makes workflows more difficult. Enable support for additional video formats to be displayed in Docs.

title: Required fields for custom attributes on cost payment applications
body_text: Can the feature be added to make cost payment applications have required fields so custom attributes can be created and made required prior to submission, similar to what is already in place for Contract

title: Schedule tool - Plan Feature
body_text: The current plan feature that was added to the autodesk schedule platform is a solid idea on its face. However, without the ability to export this as a PDF that is printable or shareable it makes this feature redundant as there is no way to share it with the people who need to know (site staff). If a PDF export was made this would make this feature usable and allow companies to utilize it.

title: Add a way to mass-create Forms templates
body_text: There is a need in some projects to create a variety of templates in forms with no quick way to accomplish it. This could be similar to a copy+paste of an existing template with the ability to then make changes.

title: Add a folder structure for Forms that is separate from the Template folder structure
body_text: Add the ability to create a folder structure for the Forms area of Build that is separate from the Templates folder structure.

title: Notification for Updating  packages
body_text: If you add data to an existing package in Docs you and the "members" of the package don`t get any notification / e-mail. You could configure lots of notifications, but not for packages. Please add also packages in the notification management of the project admin.

title: Takeoff Permissions for Adding / Amending Locations
body_text: Currently only Project Admin can add or amend Locations in Build. While using Takeoff we would like the ability for selected users, who may not be project admin to be able to add or amend. The use case being that in Preconstruction, the Locations are not always defined, and this is the intinal phase of work where these are being thought about with measures being created. For example, creating concrete pour layouts, and being able to reference these to locations.

title: BIM Collaborate Pro permissions
body_text: We would like to share models with our client in BIM Collaborate Pro so that they can review the sheets and 3d model, create markups and issues and export PDFs if they need to but no download permissions. Would need the correct permissions option and also a free or very affordable option for access to BIM collaborate pro

title: Cost - Owner Change Orders
body_text: For certain change order types (owner), for example contingency types that transfer budget, we would like the option to restrict setting the status to executed if the sum of the lines do not net $0.

title: Submittals activity note not reflected in API
body_text: Hi, I believe that the "note" added is not reflected in any submittal API. Can help to rectify this? Thank you.

title: Library Form Permissions at Project Level
body_text: Would like to have the ability to add "starting roles" to Library-Form-Permissions, so project teams are not required to manually set this up (low touch solutions preferred here). So, allow the roles to be added on the screenshot attached regardless if the "manage permissions at library level" is toggled on or not.

title: Dashboard Tracking of Reference Forms and Their Status
body_text: Background & Use Case: In our current workflow, a Work Inspection Request (WIR) form is often linked to multiple reference forms (e.g., plaster work, tile work, etc.). The closure of a WIR is dependent on the closure of all its reference forms. For project quality and safety control, it is essential to track the status of both parent forms and their linked reference forms in real time. Current Limitation: Insight dashboards and reports currently do not provide a direct way to: Display the names/

title: Enable direct filtering of Change Orders by type for payment applications
body_text: Description: The current system does not provide a direct, iterable collection of all change orders linked to a payment application with type-filtering support. This makes it difficult to create custom report sheets that only display change orders of a specific type (e.g., "Owner Unit Selection"). Example Use Case: We need to generate a separate sheet in our payment application template that exclusively lists all OCOs of the type "Owner Unit Selection" along with their details (name, number, app

title: Allow filtering of payment.totalApprovedChangeOrders variable by Change Order Type
body_text: Description: The current payment.totalApprovedChangeOrders variable returns a single numeric value, making it impossible to filter by attributes like ccoType. It would be very useful for creating detailed payment applications to be able to sum approved change orders of a specific type (e.g., "Owner Unit Selection") directly within a single cell. Example Use Case: We need to display the sum of all "Owner Unit Selection" change orders in a payment application. A variable structure like {payment.to

title: Need to be able to communicate with customer when the application status is "NOT STARTED"
body_text: I need to be able to communicate with the customer once their prequal expires. I need the comment boxes to be there so that if they ignore the automated emails from Building Connected asking them to complete their renewal, I can go to their account and click on the areas that I need updated and request the info I need for the renewal. For example - if their business license is expired, I want to be able to click on the comment box and request a current license. The application status doesn't sta

title: Building Connected - create contact with awarded contract
body_text: In the bidder list window, when creating a contract, there needs to be functionality that allows users to add the vendor company and contacts to ACC (Build/Cost), from the create contract window. Right now, the vendor must be added to the project first and then it can be assigned from BCPro.

title: Asset Activity Log and Restore Deleted Assets
body_text: Give project admins the ability to run an overall activity log for Assets to determine which Assets have been added/deleted/edited, and provide the ability to restore deleted Assets.

title: Searching for photos referenced in a form
body_text: Currently when a photo reference is made from a form. (Captured with the camera in the form) It doesn't make the photo's form reference searchable within the Photos module. Right now, we would have to take the photo from the photos module and then go back to the form to make the reference in order for the search feature to work. Which is not only extra steps but it's also inconvenient and leads to messy references. And while we're on the subject, if it could also reference the location that the

title: Review Comments
body_text: As with RFIs and Submittals, it would be helpful if we could add comments along the side under the Activity Log. Could this be added?

title: Edit form templates from account-library in project
body_text: When creating templates from the account library and adding them to a project, the form becomes locked and can no longer be edited. This limitation removes the ability to predefine a required issue type for a question. Since issue types are project-specific and cannot be selected from the library, there is no alternative way to assign them within the template. As a result, the usefulness of library templates is significantly reduced in certain cases. To address this, there should be an option to

title: Sort & Filter by Linked References
body_text: Would it be possible to add a functionality to sort and filter directly by "Linked References" without adding more customised fields? It will be really handy for us to manage assets and their corresponding sample submissions.

title: AutoSpecs - make it easier to do quality control on the split PDF's for each spec section
body_text: In the Spec view you get the opportunity to do QC on how AutoSpecs has read the name of the spec section. However, only a limited number of characters display, regardless so you cannot see the full text. Hovering over the name of the specification displays the full text, but only when the specification is not grayed out (an indication that no submittals or products were found). It is frustrating and slow to do QC in this way. I would prefer an approach similar to the sheets wizard that when you

title: Add Option For Restricting Sheet Version Viewing
body_text: Add the ability to apply security restrictions at the Role level so users assigned the role can only see the latest version of each Sheet.

title: Forms Item Workflows
body_text: Add Forms items workflow functionality such that the person editing the form would be directed to different questions or sections, or must answer additional questions if they answer a question with a certain response.

title: Allow Members to Opt Out of Reports in Notification Settings
body_text: Add an option to opt out of Reports in the Opt Out Notification settings.

title: Asset Dropdown Custom Column Sequence
body_text: Allow Asset dropdown custom column value sequence to be changed.

title: Enable Ctrl+Z (Undo) and Ctrl+Y (Redo) Functionality in ACC
body_text: I am sure ACC users struggle with navigating back to previous views or modes. Enabling a Ctrl+Z (undo/back) and Ctrl+Y (Redo) feature would greatly enhance usability and reduce the need to open multiple tabs in Edge/Chrome browsers.

title: Add a Setting to have reference badges always off
body_text: Reference badges can add unnecessary clutter to a drawing and make it difficult to view the content of the drawing. They can be manually turned off, but they only stay turned off for that session. There should be a default setting for the project where reference badges can be turned off or on based on the team's preferences while still keeping the option to turn them off or on for the session.

title: Create Report Filter "Watchers" for Issue Reports
body_text: The current Insight Issue reports include Issues created by or assigned to the person running the report, but do not include the Issues that the project member can see where they are a 'Watcher'. The project feels this is an oversight and the Watched Issues should be automatically or optionally included in the Issue reports.

title: Asset Detail Report - Add Markup Option
body_text: Add an option to include a snippet of marked-up area on the Asset Detail report, similar to Issue detail report showing issue pins, when the Asset is marked on a Sheet.

title: Administration of members information
body_text: As Admin I find I need the ability to edit members core information such as name, and email etc.

title: Allow Issue Ownership to be Changed
body_text: Have a means to assign ownership of an Issue to another person, role or company so they can assume responsibility and close the Issue.

title: Add Option to Include Attachments in Meeting PDF Exports
body_text: Allow users to optionally include attachments to the Meeting PDF exports instead of hyperlinks.

title: Automatically Attach Issues to Assets That are Added From an Asset in the Mobile App
body_text: The expectation for a user in the field to see a tiny Save option in the upper right-hand corner when on an iPad or iPhone screen in the glaring light is poor interface design. At the very least, the Save should be a larger blue button, like the +Create Issue button at the bottom of the screen AND the app should ask the user if they wish to save their outstanding change if they navigate off the screen. As well, in this use case, when the user clearly creates the Issue using the +Add button from

title: Specifications Compare
body_text: Like in sheets, it would be nice to have a compare sheets option within the viewer.

title: Specifications Bulk Export
body_text: Users currently cannot export multiple specs at once, or the whole document for that matter. It has to be done individually within each page viewer.

title: Add Personal Viewing and Sort Options to Sheets
body_text: Allow users to show/hide columns when viewing a Sheets list and to be able to sort by the columns, similar to BIM 360 Docs and Build Issues and Assets.

title: Add Additional Information to the Markups Activity
body_text: Add the drawing set name and drawing version to the markups activity data.

title: Issue Dropdown Custom Column Sequence
body_text: Allow Issue dropdown custom column value sequence to be changed.

title: Required Asset Custom Attributes
body_text: Add the option to mark Asset custom attributes as required.

title: Improve Duplicate Functionality to Allow for Markups to be Duplicated/Copied Across Multiple Sheets
body_text: Currently, there is a 'Duplicate' option that allows team members to duplicate a markup within a drawing. It would be incredible if teams couple duplicate and/or copy that markup across multiple impacted sheets.

title: "Suggested Company" field when adding new members
body_text: To reduce the possibility of assigning duplicate companies (or forgetting entirely) when adding new members, a "Suggested company" entry at the top of the companies list could be useful. It could work by looking for other members added to the project with identical @email .com providers, and then looking up the company assigned to those members, and recommending that company at the top of the list of available companies when assigning to the new member.

title: Add Form Template Types
body_text: Allow us to add custom Form Template types. As an example amongst many others, to add “Environmental” as a form template type, as opposed to using “Other”.

title: In Progress Form Delete/Close
body_text: At the end of projects, during efforts to clean everything up, there are always several Forms that have been opened, but never closed. To address these checklists, a project admin must go to each one, one by one, and either complete it with N/A answers and a note, or discard it. We would like the capability to close these checklists and/or delete them (In Bulk), as this would save a lot of time going through them one by one.

title: Improve the Issues Import Spreadsheet - Published vs Unpublished
body_text: Presently when importing new issues via the spreadsheet they all default to Unpublished status. Then you have the agony of only being able to edit 50 at a time to published status. Improve the import spreadsheet to have a column where users can define if the new issues being imported should pull in a published rather than unpublished.

title: Form Template Permissions
body_text: In order to create a Form Template, you must be an admin. We want to limit the number of admins that we have in ACC Build, because it gives them admin privileges to the whole project. We would like for non-admins to be able to create checklist templates, and have more control over the permissions for Forms.

title: Capture Most Recent Drawing Revision Information During Sheets Upload
body_text: Capture the most recent revision number and date during the Sheets upload process.

title: Add Issue Assignee List Filtering to Project Administration
body_text: To prevent anyone to assign issues to an individual, It would be great if ACC allows to select only the company rather than any individuals from the team list. The filter setting would allow project admins to specify if the Issue Assignee list would show Individuals, Companies and/or Roles in a multi-select checklist interface.

title: Offer an Autodesk Build Canadian Storage Option
body_text: Docs was a great first step, now please add Autodesk Build to the Canadian hubs.

title: Meeting Minutes Activity
body_text: Allow users to view the activity on updates to meetings, including on each individual item. The Meeting Minutes module currently has a large topic, and individual items to help build out minutes. Within each individual item, there could be several updates that do not all happen the same day. The current work around is to name the item, in high level, and them manually time stamp any any updates below it. We would like BUILD to either have a time stamp option for updates on an item, or potentiall

title: Allow Projects to Import Meeting Templates From Other Projects
body_text: Set up an import mechanism, similar to the Forms Template import, so projects can import meeting templates from other projects.

title: Display Active Issue Count on Sheets List
body_text: It would be nice to have an Active Issue Count column on the Sheets list with the count of pinned Issues that are not Draft, Closed or Void on each Sheet.

title: Factor Issuance Date into Specifications as is in Sheets
body_text: Currently, Specifications are displayed in the order they are uploaded. Like Sheets, Specifications should be shown based on the Set Issuance Date, not the upload order.

title: Allow Project Admins to Edit Single Contributor Forms
body_text: As per https://help.autodesk.com/view/BUILD/ENU/?guid=Forms_Statuses_Permissions , only the form creator can edit and submit a Form created from a Single Contributor Form Template. If the form creator is no longer around due to illness, vacation or is no longer with their company, nothing can be done with the Form and it will sit as "In Progress" for eternity. This is not acceptable. Project Admins need to be able to assume control of the Form and/or re-assign it.

title: Implement a Means to Reduce Size of the Discipline Displayed In the Sheets List
body_text: Add Discipline 'Display Names" for situations such as cases when an Architect creates Sheet numbers with long prefixes, we must create long Discipline Designators to reach the actual Sheet number designator. Because the Designator is concatenated before the Discipline Name, it makes for a very long Discipline in the Sheets listing. Add an Abbreviation or Display Name field that appears on the Sheets list instead of the full name.

title: Allow Insight Users to Filter Issue Reports by Issue Template
body_text: Allow users to filter Issues in the Issue Insight reports by Issue template.

title: Projects MUST be Able to Revoke Section Signatures & Re-Open Closed Sections
body_text: Projects MUST have the ability to un-complete a section, and in doing so, it revokes the signature(s) in that section. This is accommodate situations where the party doing the work goes into an area after an inspection and removes their material or work. We need to be able to revoke the authorization before the entire form is closed so we can fail the work and create Issues from the items in the affected Form section. 'Discard' is not an option on multi-section Forms where other trades have comp

title: Add Option to Quickly Add all Company User Issue Assignees in Filter
body_text: Create a means to quickly include all users for the Company selected in the Assignee Issue Filter parameter. Selecting a Company in the Assignee filter parameter does not include issues that are assigned to a specific member of that company. Adding each company user to the filter is slow because every time a user is added, the interface closes the dropdown list.

title: Sheet Filter Settings or Favorites
body_text: On Sheets, remember the users last filter setting or provide a quick favorites selection.

title: Add a Field to Record and Display the Date the Issue was Closed
body_text: The date closed field is valuable piece of information for project teams for filtering and sorting on. While it is possible to see the date closed through the activity tab, it is currently not exposed as a separate field in the grid view on screen, or in the excel export. This field was available back in Field Classic and it would be very useful to have this available in Build.

title: Control Project Logos
body_text: In Insights > Reports > Report Settings I can add a new logo, and then apply it to the project. However, I cannot delete / manage logos at the project level. The published work around to user the BIM 360 portal no longer works. Please add functionality to better manage logos.

title: Bulk Issue Edits - Allow more than 50
body_text: Presently if a user needs to bulk edit issues, they are restricted to 50 at a time. Allow users to select more. Example of when this is a problem; when you import issues (using the spreadsheet method) they all default to unpublished. It is inefficient to change just 50 at a time to be "Published".

title: Importing Forms Into Another Project - Make it Less Cumbersome
body_text: 1. You are limited to importing a max of 50 templates at a time. It's tedious to individually click them. 2. It should ask you to what template folder you want the imported templates saved. It always saves them in the parent Template folder so they you are stuck clicking on all 50 individual files again to select them in order to relocate them.

title: Form Versioning to Help Meet ISO Standards
body_text: In order to meet ISO Standards, project teams are required to have some form a version control on their Forms (Checklists) to ensure the latest/approved version of the form is being used. Previously in BIM 360 Docs, there was at least a version number on the Form template, but it looks like this information is no longer available in Build. This idea would be to implement some sort of versioning on Forms so teams can easily track and report all the form changes as required.

title: Searching "Files" Across Multiple Pages
body_text: When you search a keyword within a file in "Files", it only searches for the results on your current page; I would need to search for the same word on every single page to see if that page contains my keyword.

title: Exporting sheet lists with the drawing # already linked in the emailed Excel spreadsheet
body_text: Currently we need to export the log (Excel option only), then pdf the log, then upload the PDF to the sheets section before exporting it again. If we could export the excel log with the drawing #s already linked it would simplify the process of sharing the drawing lists with our project partners. It would also be helpful to have the link to the "Search Result" Page on the cover that indicates the filters used to generate the current list of drawings in the generated Excel Log.

title: Missing request access to project or account
body_text: When prompted with "Project or account is not available, You no longer have access to this project or account. Contact you project administrator for more information." Typical software would have a button or form to request access at this page. Is all the data there for it to be automated? Current process: 1. Go find out who has admin privileges (This is not common knowledge for the typical user and chances are admin users are not local). 2. Explain what project I am trying to access (When ever

title: Tilt Cloud Markups
body_text: Build does not have the functionality to tilt a cloud markup to not be parallel with the bottom of the drawing. This makes it difficult to properly cloud parts of drawings that are square but off kilter. The polygon function is useable, but it is not possible to change a polygon shape to have a cloud border instead of a straight line.

title: Issue Due Date Period Default Setting
body_text: Add the ability to set a default Issue Due Date period for each Issue Type at the project level that would get applied to every new Issue of that type.

title: Add Ability to Filter Issue Detail Report by Closed Date
body_text: Add the ability for users to filter the Issue Detail report by the Issue Closed Date, which is the closed_at field in the Issues table.

title: Bring Back Snap to Grid on the Measurement Calibration Tool
body_text: BIM 360 used to have a snap-to-grid feature when calibrating the measurement tool. Users miss that and would like to see it brought back in Build.

title: Carry Forward a Sheets and Files Content Search into the Sheet or File Itself
body_text: In order to find a keyword in files or sheets, you currently have to search twice, once for sheets that contain keyword, and again within the sheet (Even more times in files and the search option only works for the page you are on). Carry forward the content search or mimic what is done on Bluebeam, to be able to target locations of keywords a lot faster.

title: Allow Project Admins to Sort Members by the Access Level Column
body_text: Minimum: Allow project admins to sort the Members list by the Access Level (Project Admin, Project Member) column. Ideal: Add filtering on the Project Members list similar to how Issues, Sheet and Assets can be filtered, with a filter interface invoked by the filter icon.

title: Add columns in Reviews main page for analytics
body_text: Add columns in Reviews main page to show for each review the date when first, second, third, etc. step was submitted as this is needed to build reports for PowerBI, as it's not possible to extract this data directly from ACC

title: Add option for admin to change the workflow once review has been submitted
body_text: Add option for admin to change the workflow once review has been submitted, because this way you void a review because it will not reach the correct reviewers and have to wait for the user to resubmit the documents for a review in another workflow

title: Reviews default watchers
body_text: Add option to add default watchers per workflow in reviews, so they have visibility but not the option to edit and take action.

title: Can't change review name after it's been closed
body_text: It is not possible to change review name after it's been closed. If lets say a Document Controller is not included in the workflow and they see reviews are named incorrectly only after they have been closed, there is no possibilities. A project admin should be able to change the name even after they have been closed, same as when they were open

title: Have visibility and restore deleted markups by project admin
body_text: In case a markup is deleted when it shouldn't have been, there is no way to retrieve it nor even see that it was there unless it was left on a previous version. Project admin should have the visibility of deleted markups like on BIM360, and have the opportunity to make it current again.

title: Stamp restore with restoring of previous stamped version
body_text: When you restore a version that was previously stamped, it doesn't return the stamp and has to be restamped

title: Copy folders with its content and permissions within the project
body_text: Add an option to copy folder(s) as you have for move on the online version of ACC together with everything it has within and its permissions.

title: Edit file description while viewing it
body_text: When going through a number of files all named according to a non-documented nomenclature or numbering system, it is beneficial if users could edit the file description of what they are currently looking at. Closing the file will show the source folder with no file selected. This makes it hard to find the file just viewed again and is prone to errors.

title: Arabic Comments Not Displayed in Review Step Attachments
body_text: We kindly request your availability and assistance to investigate and resolve an issue we are encountering within the submittals workflow on Autodesk Construction Cloud. Specifically, we are unable to add or retain comments written in Arabic language within the attached files at the Review step .

title: ACC Build Photos
body_text: In ACC build photos please place a feature to allow for rotation of a photo within the app and auto organization of the photos taken. When taking a photo in assets (during construction process documentation) it would be beneficial for the software to automatically send that to a folder of which they were taken (in this case assets).

title: Assets Details Reports Template .CSV file format
body_text: Add options for asset details report templates to be able to choose a .CSV file format in addition to .pdf

title: Combined filters to create Assets from 3D Model Import
body_text: It is necessary to be able to create filters for importing assets using 3D models, combining several different conditional gates in the same import filter (combining the O option and the Y option). For example: Composite object whose name begins with “OPT1” (O) whose name begins with ‘OPT2’ (Y) whose source file is “OPT3”. Currently, only one logical gate can be used, which greatly reduces the operating options.

title: AI Assistant to work in "My home" outside of projects and accessing data from all projects
body_text: AI Assistant should use all data from all files stored in all ACC projects I am able to access and should work outside of projects in the "My home" Area. This is very essential to make use of much more data and support the promt user in a much better way.

title: Docusign - reassigned status
body_text: When an envelope is sent from ACC to DocuSign and a recipient reassigns the envelope to another signer, the status in ACC shows that the first recipient has signed the envelope. I was wondering if there is another way to handle those scenarios. Thank you Cost Management development teams for this response: " Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We’ve looked into this scenario, and it turns out that when a signer reassigns a DocuSign envelope, two events are triggered: a "recipient compl

title: Hyperlink in RFI Official Response
body_text: Currently we are able to add a link in the question, suggested answer, comments and reviewer response in the RFI and it will be a hyperlink. Somehow, when we add the link in the official response section, it becomes a normal string and is not hyperlinked. Can we have the hyperlink be activated in the official response too? This is crucial since the answer to a RFI could be more than just text, the attachment that comes with the answer would be saved in Microsoft SharePoint(for collaboration in d

title: Request for Bulk Metadata Processing Option in Autodesk Build
body_text: I would like to propose the addition of a new feature in the Files section of Autodesk Build to support bulk processing of file metadata and attributes . Currently, Autodesk Build offers two methods for managing file attributes: Applying naming standards to folders. Using the "Extract pages and attributes" function within the Files area. While the existing methods are beneficial, they have limitation —particularly when managing files with varied and non-standard attribute requirements (refer bel

title: Project Progress Tracker Editing
body_text: I have met with some teams who would like to have the ability for project members to edit the project progress milestone dates, instead of only project administrators.

title: Issue Module – Contractor Able to Edit Custom Fields Despite View-Only Permissions
body_text: Issue Module – Contractor Able to Edit Custom Fields Despite View-Only Permissions Issue Description: During UAT, User created Non-Conformance or Observation issues related to Quality or Safety , and assigned them to a Contractor . The Contractor is correctly restricted from editing default system fields like: Title Issue Type Description Due Date Location This behavior is as expected and desired. However, the Contractor is still able to edit all custom fields , such as: Risk Rating Correction t

title: Add Sheet Saved Searches to the ACC mobile app
body_text: The Saved Searches on Sheets should also be on the mobile app.

title: Promote Asset & Location Markups when Slip Sheeting from Bridge
body_text: When slip sheeting sheets via Bridge, Asset & Location markups do not get promoted to the most current version. Currently, the new sheet (coming from a Bridged project) is completely void of any Asset or Location markups.

title: Automatically Associate Related Form References
body_text: Automatically associate Issues to the Asset from which a Form was created that initiated the Issue, such as the Asset to Form to Issue.

title: Allow Projects to Restrict Form Submission Until All Sections Complete
body_text: Forms should only be able to be submitted after all sections are complete.

title: Cloud+ Markup Tool For Sheets
body_text: I would like to add the Cloud+ tool to create a Polygon / Rectangle markup with a cloud-like appearance and callout text box preset. It is essentially the Cloud Tool, and the Callout Tool combined into a single tool, appearing as a single markup. This is currently a tool that is used in Bluebeam

title: Folders and Sub-Folders for shared saved searches.
body_text: Having the ability to create folders and sub-folders in the shared searches list would benefit teams that have a large number of searches. Being able to group searches by Discipline or by Tag would reduce clutter.

title: Option to Restrict Issue Assignment to Companies
body_text: To prevent anyone to assign issues to an individual, it would be great if Build had the ability to restrict Issues to only a Company.

title: Custom Line Weights for Markups
body_text: Currently Build is limited to a min of 0.5 pt and max 24 pt line thicknesses. It would be useful if these line weights could be modified to custom values and values outside that 0.5-24 pt range. As a workaround, coordinators will download the drawing, markup in Bluebeam, and re-upload, which is time consuming and introduces additional risk of human error.

title: Issue Comments upon on closing
body_text: While the activity log is great for recording comments over the course of resolution of the issue, it would be nice to have a single field where comments upon closing could be logged, as the final comment recorded. BIM 360 issues had a field called "Response" which allowed for a single comment to be recorded and the field printed on PDF's making it an ideal field to show our owner some closing notes. Build does not have this field, causing all comments to be recorded in the activity log, which c

title: View which Sheets are linked to a
body_text: In sheet activities view, you can view when a file has been referenced in a sheet. In file activities view, you cannot see if a file has been referenced in a sheet. This would be a useful feature to check if an RFI has been redlined on the drawing. Ideally, the feature would also say which sheet or file has been referenced in the activities list.

title: Improve Issues downloaded view
body_text: After downloading an issue from Build you are unable to see the attachments that are connected to the issue without opening them in a separate tab. If you needed to send them to someone in one PDF file you would have to download everything and combine the PDFs. A solution for this would be to have to PDFs open at the bottom of the page in the same file.

title: Searching Function in Sheets/Files
body_text: In order to find a keyword in files or sheets, you currently have to search twice, once for sheets that contain keyword, and again within the sheet (Even more times in files and the search option only works for the page you are on). Instead is there a way to mimic what is done on Bluebeam, to be able to target locations of keywords a lot faster.

title: Assets - Ability to Rename Default Status Set or Remove
body_text: We are currently creating multiple status sets applied to specific asset categories with the default causing confusion. Options to workaround default asset status set Leverage the default status set for a specific asset category PROBLEM: We cannot rename the default status set so its confusing to users filtering/reporting on what category the status set applies to since its generically named default Bypass and ignore default status set PROBLEM : the list of default statuses will always be displa

title: BuildingConnected - Add messages to history
body_text: When reviewing a subcontractor’s history on a project, it's helpful that we can see if they’ve viewed the invite, downloaded files, and interacted with the bid package. However, one key element is missing: the ability to see messages that have been sent to the bidder. It would be extremely useful to have all communications linked directly to the bidder’s activity log , so we can easily reference what information was shared, when, and by whom. This would improve transparency, reduce duplicate out

title: Searching for subcontractors in Building Connected
body_text: I have found that a subcontractor can include in their work preformed ASPHALT. But when trying to setup a bid package for asphalt, it is not possible to include the word asphalt in the keywords for the bid package. If a type of work can be included in the work preformed section of the company description, you should be able to choose that same type of work in the keyword section of a bid package setup.

title: ACC Mobile App - Pre-populate location in Issue when viewing through the Locations menu
body_text: When you click on locations and view the list of issues on the ACC mobile app – it gives us the option to create an issue. When we click on create issue – can it not pre-populate the location in the issue since we’ve already selected the location when getting to that page? This will save us entering the location every time.

title: Automated Custom Date Ranges for Reports
body_text: I would like to suggest the ability to have custom date ranges/date range formulas for automated recurring reports. For example, I have an automated report that runs Sunday night to compile the information from that week's daily report forms. The problem is, sometimes our supers are behind and it takes until Monday to get these forms in. I would like to, as an example, have a report that runs every Wednesday but that pulls data from the previous week's Monday through Sunday. Currently I only see

title: Submittals development - save as a version of file in 'Files' and add update file attribute -submittals status
body_text: suggestion, please can you develop the save submittal file option at the end of the submittal so that it can be saved as a new version of the file on docs – similar to the search/selection feature at the start (although I have my API tool now that batch creates, attaches and submits the submittal required from the files logs report ) and if it could furnish the file with a submittal status attribute that would be great.

title: Memeber Emails Associated to More Than One Company
