body_text: Can Member emails be associated to more than one company. Often times, we have owners who create LLC companies associated to each project. If there is more than one project active with the same owner rep, they can not be associated to more than one company name.

title: Filter by multiple issue types in ACC mobile app
body_text: On the ACC mobile app, in Issues, can we filter by multiple issue types? Currently, you can only select one issue type, but we want to be able to select multiple issue types.

title: Enable bid form upload based on a large excel bid form
body_text: Hello, In my industry, bid forms can be quite large and include multiple unit rates and different quantities. As it is, the module of bid form in buildingconnected does not allow to replicate a long excel bid form table(copy from excel to buildingconnected) unless we add line items, quantities and units one by one. Can you please create a functionality to replicate long excel bid forms into the BuildingConnected bid form section? Thanks in advance.

title: Saved Searches on Mobile
body_text: Expose Saved Searches—both private and shared—inside the ACC mobile app. Field teams must access the same pre-configured filters available on web to avoid rebuilding them on a phone, cut version-control errors, and uphold ISO 19650’s single-source-of-truth. Implementation is straightforward: add a “Saved” tab in the mobile search panel that lists existing searches (read-only is acceptable for phase 1). One-tap execution will accelerate inspections, keep drawings consistent across devices, and de

title: Streamline photo upload and Form Reference
body_text: I regularly upload 100 to 200 photos at a time to ACC using the mobile app and them add those photos as a reference to a form I fill out daily. Currently there is a limit of 50 photos that can be uploaded at a time and it requires me remember which photo was the 50th and then restart the process again after I've picked 50 . This limit should be removed or increased . When adding the photos as a reference to a form, the dialog box requires you to scroll to the bottom and then click "show more" .

title: Not possible to find closed collisions
body_text: closed collisions should also be displayed in a matrix – perhaps in different colours (e.g. blue and magenta). Filter options are also needed to search by reason, user, time and comments. It is currently not possible to find and view a resolved collision in order to evaluate it.

title: Feature Suggestion: Text Explanation for Color Changes in Comparison Tool
body_text: Currently, the comparison feature only highlights changes using color coding, without providing any textual explanation of what has changed. This makes it harder to quickly understand the nature of the differences, especially for complex documents. We suggest enhancing the comparison tool to include text-based descriptions of the changes, similar to what Adobe Acrobat Pro currently offers. This would allow users to see not only where changes occurred, but also understand exactly what was added,

title: Saving Files
body_text: If possible, I would like there to be a way to combine all files/attachments into one PDF when saving on building connected. For example, you open bids, you have 3 bidder for a Carpentry package. You go to the "Bid leveling" tab, ABC Carpentry has 7 attachments, consisting of bid bonds, OSHA logs, clarifications, ect. Right now, I have to download and save each document one by one, then combine them into one PDF. I think it would be great if there was a way you could hit "Print Proposal" and it

title: Bulk Edit Asset Fields
body_text: Once an asset is created at the start of the project - it will be a lot more efficient to be able to bulk edit existing asset fields via .csv import (similar to the workflow when creating an asset for the first time). This then allows for enriching asset data as the project lifecycle progresses

title: TAKEOFF - Independent X and Y Axis Scales
body_text: Currently, the platform only allows users to define a single uniform scale for a drawing. However, in some cases—particularly when working with exaggerated cross sections or profile views—the horizontal (X) and vertical (Y) scales differ. It would be extremely helpful to have the option to set independent scales for the X and Y axes. This would improve measurement accuracy and make it easier to quantify dimensions on drawings with non-uniform scaling.

title: Build - Submittals - Automatic Submittal Review Time Based on Priority Setting
body_text: It would be useful to have a configurable setting that, when toggled on, automatically sets the submittal review duration based on the selected priority level . For example, setting a submittal to High priority would automatically assign a 3-day review period, Medium would default to 7 days, and Low would be set to 14 days. This would help standardize turnaround expectations, reduce manual entry, and improve consistency across projects by aligning review timelines with urgency—while still allowi

title: Build - Submittals - Ability to Downloading Multiple Files from Ball in Court Window
body_text: Recently, the Submittals feature was enhanced to include the ability to download all submittal files once a submittal is closed, which is a helpful improvement. However, this functionality is currently not available during the review process , specifically within the Ball in Court window. It would be a valuable enhancement to add a "Download All" button in the Ball in Court section, allowing users to easily download all uploaded files at once when multiple documents have been submitted for revie

title: Column for Sorting and Filtering Sheets based on Date Updated
body_text: It would be nice if there was a column in the Sheets tool where you can see the date last updated for each sheet. I know you can view this in each sheet manually while you have it open in the viewer, by selecting the drop down menu by the sheet name. I also know you can export a Sheets log and see which page was included in which version set on which date. However, having this simple addition could still prove useful, even though it's not critical.

title: Dynamic view for the Reference interface
body_text: When referencing a form or creating new form references, the UI or referencing box for forms needs to be adjustable (i.e. columns that can be expanded, or scale according to screen size. The current behavior does not allow a complete view of forms selection especially when creating new forms using the reference function.

title: More Cross-Project Report Functionality
body_text: More cross-project report functionality and diversity, such as open cost items, open reviews, submittals, etc. Only having reports for Issues and Budgets is quite limiting.

title: Follow-Up Reminder Emails for Cost items
body_text: Having the ability to have reminder emails when something is overdue in someone's court, such as a contract approval, change order approvals, cost payment application approvals, etc.

title: Upstream vs Downstream Contract File Folder Separation
body_text: Separate Owner Contract and Subcontracts when using the automatic file feature within Autodesk Documents. Meaning choose separate file locations for the Prime Contract (upstream) and Subcontracts(Downstream) in Files. This action would be for the purpose of File permissions and visibility restrictions.

title: Add Attachments feature to Assets
body_text: Recently 'attachments' have been added to Issues/Forms which allow us to add photos to an item that does not automatically upload to photos and become visible to all project members. Would like this same feature to be available on Assets as well.

title: Automatically Batch Associate Codes to Main Contract SOV During Upload
body_text: Would like ability to have budget code upload sheet include a required field for the Main Contract SOV items so that it automatically batch associates the budget codes to Main Contract SOV. Removes the task of manually linking the codes.

title: Cost Module - Search & Filter Option for Invoices
body_text: Cost Module - Search & Filter Option for Invoices instead of being required to scroll down through 100+ invoice numbers. Would be nice to search for the one you need.

title: Asset Column order to be saved and all the same, working in the topdown structure
body_text: At this moment the order of showing the (custom) fields, assigned to asset categories aren't saved. At the moment it is very time consuming to rearrange the (custom) fields order, when you want them to be the same for a specific group of asset categories. Please make it possible to make this more configurable for all project members and not user specific.

title: Direct Integration of Issues and Reviews in ACC
body_text: I would like to suggest an idea about integrating the Issues and Review feature of ACC. The idea is to enable the raised Issues to be subjected to Review and can be 'Closed' their once the review is done. This way, we can initiate our internal review process in a single stream of QA with Issues then close it using Review. We are working with Architectural projects where design iterations are reviewed thru PDF's and where Reviews is crucial but doesn't have the factor of accountability from the e

title: workspace order
body_text: unfortunately, the functionality of reordering the workspace is currently unavailable. it is ordered by creation time.

title: permission level for contributing to the agenda
body_text: We are missing a permission level for contributing to the agenda. This would allow individuals to assist with the creation of meeting minutes without being full organizers. Permissions for this Role: Can add, edit, and comment on agenda items. Can create and edit meeting minutes. Can assign tasks from the minutes Target Group: Individuals who actively contribute to the content (e.g., subject matter experts, assistants) but do not have organizational responsibilities.

title: Edit Individual Specification Sections
body_text: I am working on a progressive design build project and we are constantly updating the specifications. Sometimes the spec section number changes, and sometimes the spec name changes. When this happens, the older version spec section is no longer relevant, but it cannot be removed. The problem I am running into is that I am trying to go back to the older spec versions to individually delete and/or mark as an old version, however I am unable to individually delete the sections. It would be really h

title: Workshop XR: Remove or enable toggle for background environment
body_text: We are working on extensive workarounds to enable a baseline acceptable performance level with our models. Do the clouds in the sky really need to be there, and do they really need to move? I would rather my models load without having to stick my nose right up to it. Relatedly, while the high-rise office environment is pretty neat I would like the option to enable Passthru in the Quest headset instead. Thank you

title: Takeoff - Unit of Measure
body_text: Currently there are only 6 units of measure in TAKEOFF (Each, m, m2, m3, t and kg). Some clients have much more units of measure than this. It would be great if we could create custom units of measure (just like you can in COST MANAGEMENT) so that it will display correctly in TAKEOFF. For example, if a bid item is paid by kilometer, we need to measure in meter, and use the formula to change to kilometer (distance/1000), but it is still displayed as m which is confusing. Also, there are only 4 op

title: Bulk Edit Assets - Add/Update References through CSV
body_text: There are instances where an ACC project will have a large number of Assets. On occasion, these Assets will need a reference to a file. When dealing with numerous Assets and numerous unique file references, it would be beneficial to Add or Update an Assets references via the "Bulk Edit Assets through CSV" workflow. We can currently export a files log that contains all 20 files (with hyperlink). If the files log contained a non-hyperlink URL we could then take that file log URL and correspond it

title: Manager Idea
body_text: Can a filter be added so that I can run reports and see when items have changed, such as Status level. I may want to see when something was changed from "Submitted" to "Other" or a Timestamp of when something is Declined or Archived.

title: ACC Build Issues status labels
body_text: Please add 'Ready for inspection' to to issue status labels or change 'in review' to this. This is standard industry practice

title: Public link default expiration date
body_text: Allow us to modify by project the days count for the default of the expiration date for Files/Sheets public links. Currently we can extend the maximum days for expiration, but not the current default of 2 weeks.

title: Edit atributes in more than 500 files
body_text: Now there is a limit of maximum 500 files to edit an atribute. It should be higher. Mass changing an atribute is sometimes necesary.

title: ACC Construction Filtering
body_text: It would be useful to have a Lock Filtering View in Forms, or possibly throughout. Going from forms to sheets or from one form to the main list of forms, one has to filter every time new page is open in ACC. This is counterproductive, and the Save Filter view or Lock View filters would alleviate that and increase productivity specifically when working with thousands of forms

title: No Capitalization in Fields
body_text: Can there be an update that corrects the issue were some fields in forms don't auto capitalize? It seems like the majority of the fillable areas don't capitalize automatically. I think this is an area for improvement.

title: Structural Analysis viewer in ACC
body_text: ACC should have an integrated structural analysis results viewer, like modal analysis viewer with animation, animated drift displacement viewer, FEM/FEA viewer for simulations and, of course, axial, shear and bending moments diagram viewer. Robot exchange files should be viewable in ACC.

title: Limiting visible tabs en the left side voor users
body_text: When opening ACC, we can see a lot of tabs on the left side. While they are useful for the admin/project managers, some of them aren't needed for our subcontractors. We would like to be able to limit the options those end users can see. This is to improve ease of access and to encourage them to use ACC.

title: Add a "Viewed" column to the project history tab
body_text: Add a new column on the project history tab to include if an employee under the subcontractor's profile has viewed the invite, making it easier to consolidate solicitation calls to the subs. This information is currently only visible when opening the individual bid packages and viewing the list of invites or by running a bidder status report.

title: Default RFI for Managers
body_text: RFI creators are not aware of the correct individual to assign RFI for review. Rather they need to assign it to Managers. By default RFI is created "for Reviewers". Can we change the default creation "for Mangers".

title: Populate Meetings with Dashboard Data
body_text: One of our Field Safety Supervisors is asking if it's possible to have certain meeting sections populate with dashboard data? He's hoping down the line that it will be possible to have data from our safety reports to auto-populate into meetings. Not sure how viable this is, but it would be great if it would work.

title: Undo button ACC Mobile App
body_text: It would be good to have an undo button in the mobile app, especially for when using assets. If you notice very late that you made a wrong change it's difficult to trace back for which object it has been done.

title: Multi Users remove from a project.
body_text: We need a multi-selection option for project members to be removed as a bulk from a project , as this needs to be done when we need to substitute company by another one for example , and so we need to remove all the current company team members. And this to be done by project admin and not account admin.

title: Add markup tools to PDF Forms
body_text: In Build you are able to highlight and add photos to PDF fillable type forms. Would like to include other markup tools (cloud, callout, etc.) as options on the form as well.

title: Internal Budget Transfer to Multiple Cost Contracts
body_text: The ability to associate an internal budget transfer to a Cost Contract is not currently available. We have multiple cost contracts split among a single Budget Code. When I entered an Internal Budget Transfer, I am unable to split this into more than one cost contract. This is a major issue we are experiencing.

title: Clarification on License Assignment Process
body_text: Hello I hope you're doing well. We need to find a way to better control the assignment of licenses, and in essence, we assign the license to the company. When a stakeholder leaves, their replacement should use the same license. We have been acquiring Docs licenses in different batches, each valid for 1 year. For example, if we give our last available license (with 6 months remaining) to Stakeholder 1, and then 3 new stakeholders join, we acquire new licenses with a 12 month validity. If Stakehol

title: Plangrid only features on ACC platform
body_text: the only feature we use is plangrid type of features like viewing drawings and marking them up and adding issues to them etc. Would like access to this under ACC but the pricing i am finding would be too high because it is for way more features than we need.

title: Ability to duplicate Financial Markup Formulas in settings
body_text: The ability to duplicate financial markup formulas would be very useful and save time when setting up templates and projects. Some markup formulas can be very complex and require 5 or more line items, each with their own settings and cost code mapping. When having to create multiple versions of a complex formula, this can take a very long time. The ability to Duplicate an existing Financial Markup Formula, just like we can duplicate an Approval Workflow, would save time and remove opportunities

title: Contract SOV line item numbering
body_text: Currently, in a Contract SOV there is no way to number the line items. In other document types we can use {index} or {number} but for some reason, there is no line item reference code for the SOV items in a Contract. Having this number is very common in documents in use outside of the ACC system, and allows for easy reference to specific line items. It would be very useful to have a simple way to reference each line in an SOV with a unique number like the {index} or {number} code in other docume

title: Recyle Bin - Go Back to Documents- Button
body_text: In Docs/ Documents , there is the recycle bin button in the top right-hand corner for deleted elements. Clicking on it takes you to the recycle bin, but the way back is not intuitive, as you can only get back to the folder via the link above the title (left side). A Go Back To -button in the same place as the recycle bin in the file explorer would be much more intuitive.

title: Able to remove out-of-the-box tabs in Insight module
body_text: Hope we could remove the out-of-the-box tabs in Insight module. As we wanted to configure and manage our own dashboards that suits our business needs and requirement.

title: Ability to export non-pdf files after review
body_text: Currently, you are limited to transmittals for non-pdf files, which isn't helpful for most workflows - including keeping attributes associated.

title: Can generate reports out of Issues tab in Model Coordination Module
body_text: It will be really helpful if we can generate various kinds of reports based on our filter combinations.

title: Ability for Views in ACC to Save Cropped Area
body_text: On Model Coordination it would be great if we could save views with cropped area. As a coordinator we have to go through so many hoops to break up large models into smaller pieces to focus on areas for coordination. Currently we set up scope boxes in Revit and publish several views that are stitched back together in ACC. If we could have the ability to go into a view, select a crop box and save it to the view would greatly help. Eventually we could template these views for future projects.

title: Recurring Meeting (Jour Fixe) Feature in Build – Meeting Module
body_text: It would be very useful to have the ability to schedule a recurring meeting (Jour Fixe) in the Build module – Meetings , e.g. weekly or biweekly at a fixed time. Additionally, it should be possible to carry over and update the discussion items (agenda points) from the previous meeting, so that ongoing topics can be tracked and followed up more easily. This feature would greatly improve continuity and efficiency in project communication , especially in long-term construction workflows.

title: ACC Cost Management: Void PCO without having to detach cost items
body_text: When an RCO is rejected by the client, we would like the ability to void the original PCO without detaching the cost items. These cost items are an historical part of the PCO which we might want to review at a later date. @zfeece @gcic.com

title: Adjustment to size of the Create Correspondence Pop-up
body_text: The dialogue for new correspondence is very compact, and each field is difficult to read with the restricted space. Even selecting recipients is challenging. Please allow the whole pop-up to be resized, and remember the changes. Each drop down should also expand accordingly or be larger to assist in navigation.

title: [Schedule] Remember Workplan export name and saved file path & settings
body_text: I use the CSV export from the workplan/task to load into Power BI. I am exporting to the same place and file name every time so having the option to remember these settings would be awesome.

title: Watchers be able to upload files even when not assigend to them
body_text: It has been an issue lately for us that the watchers are not able to upload anything when the issue is not assigned to them. I understand not having access to change status maybe but to add notes and upload documents, I think it wouldn't cause any issues.

title: .pdf vs .PDF
body_text: Our system automatically used .PDF (uppercase) for all documents and they will NOT upload to your system unless they are .pdf (lowercase)

title: Make files visible in the review overview list
body_text: It is desirable that the links to the file/files are visible in the review list. Now the review always has to be clicked open before clicking through to the respective files. A workaround is to a export to Excel. But that is cumbersome. It would be desirable to be able to click through the files immediately in the review overview. Also sort and filter on the files in the review list will be good.

title: setting drawing scales in Takeoff
body_text: It would be helpful to set the most common drawing scale for a drawing set when uploading it. Most drawings in a drawing set have a common scale. This would save considerable time vs having to enter the scale for each drawing as you come to it. (True this could lead to using the wrong scale on a drawing, but companies could decide if they have enough discipline to fix those few drawings that have a different scale. Or if they want no scale for the drawing set upload.)

title: [Feature Request] Display All Outputs When Clicking a Takeoff Object – ACC Takeoff
body_text: Currently, when you click on a takeoff object in ACC, it only shows the primary output (e.g., area, length, etc.). However, it doesn’t display any of the additional outputs that are part of that condition. You can view the summed additional outputs in the condition details panel, but that doesn’t help when you want to see the values for a specific object. I know using locations can be a workaround to break things down further, but that introduces its own challenges. It would be really helpful if

title: More Languages
body_text: We need more languages in the Middle East. Languages should not be a barrier in gathering valuable site data especially in ACC Build, specifically the mobile application. The region has a rich ecosystem of multinationals which need to be represented in your software, there is no excuse these days of adding translation to your software, all software languages have a package or library to facilitate this. you could even map(hardcode) the languages/translations if you didn't want to use external li

title: Building Layout on Photos Map
body_text: I would like to request a feature which allows us to upload a 2D layout (DWG or PDF) on the Photos map. This will allow users to see the location of the photos if the building is still under construction. The Google map view (Satellite or Terrain) is not always up to date or does not always show where the photos are from specially if the project is a new building. It would be great to be able to upload a 2D layout over the map.

title: Add Comments in Transmittal
body_text: During a recent transmittal, I noticed some errors in the files being sent. However, I was unable to provide comments or feedback directly within the transmittal, which made it challenging to communicate the issue to the recipient effectively. It would be greatly beneficial if the transmittal system allowed users to add comments or notes, especially in cases where incorrect files are included. This functionality would help streamline communication and avoid potential confusion

title: Customizable Reports
body_text: Could Autodesk take a look at the way reports are generated? Would be awesome if there were more flexibility in how the reports look (similar to how things can be customized within Cost Management document templates)

title: Add Specifications to a Package
body_text: Would like to be able to add Specifications (Single Sections or Multiple Sections) to a Package as part of a Transmittal for a Work Package. We can include drawings and other files from Docs into Packages but would also like to add Specification to a Package and have them retain their version as they were added to the package.

title: Redline capabilities for Specifications
body_text: Add the same markup/publish capabilities to the Specifications tab as the Sheets tab.

title: Reactivate Naming Standard on Folder
body_text: i think it really convinience if we can reactivate naming standard without deleting the files in the folder. because if someone accidently turn off the naming standard, it cannot be turn on again without deleting all files in folder.

title: Remove bidders after bid package is published
body_text: I would like to be able to edit who is included in a bid package after the package has been initially published. Currently I can only delete entire companies out of the package before it has been published or delete individual contacts from the package after it has been published.

title: Camera Zoom OUT
body_text: When you use an iPad through the standard Apple Camera app, it will let you zoom OUT to capture more of what's right in front of you (helpful when in a small room and you want a view of the whole room). But when you take a photo within the PlanGrid app, it will not let you zoom OUT, it instead defaults to a camera view where you can zoom in, but you cannot zoom OUT to see more of what's around you. I don't really understand why functionality is restricted the like this, can you please allow the

title: When creating Reports (with issues) we don't need the info from the footer in the PDF report
body_text: When creating Reports (with issues) we don't need the info from the footer in the PDF report. We have to manually delete footer on every page we send to customer

title: Viewer layers on mobile app
body_text: Could the layers filter that is already available on browser viewer be added to the app?

title: ERRCS/BDA/ERCES
body_text: We are getting requests in the DFW area to submit proposals for ERRCS testing as well as installations. If you can set up a category for this type of testing and also for system installations I believe it would be helpful for everyone. This sort of work is going to become very prevalent in all markets. Thank you,

title: link to single 3D component in ACC 3D model
body_text: In ACC Docs you can view 3D Revit model but can you make possible to click on single component, isolate it in view and generate web link? It will help to share the component location with others rather than view entire 3D model of the building.

title: Building Connected Mark all Messages as Read
body_text: Can we create a feature that allows all messages on Building Connected to be marked as read? Often times I will just get the messages on email and read them there, but then I get a stack of unread mail in Building Connected even if I have already read it.

title: Building Connected Login Authenticator
body_text: Hello, The new authenticator process needs to be changed in terms of bidding. If you have any experience with HARD bids, they have a very specific deadline. Typical rule of thumb is 2:00pm which means if I submit by 2:01 my bid is deemed nonresponsive and thrown in the trash. In my experience, I can expect to receive a straggler by 1:55pm. My heartburn with the new process has to do with timing. I now need to enter my login, wait for an email, enter a code, then scan a QR code. On bid day this i

title: [Schedule] "Select All" button on schedule filters
body_text: When filtering status and other things in the schedule plans, I will typically want to filter out "completed" tasks, however to do so I need to first select all other status. If there was a "select all" toggle, that would save a lot of clicks every time. Thanks!

title: Auto-trigger attributes when using Design Collaboration
body_text: It would be nice to have an auto trigger when packaging and sharing files through Design Collaboration that can update any attributes associated with the files. It could be part of the process when selecting the files, writing a description and then specifying which attributes need updating when sharing and ideal for ISO19650 processes. It's a manual process at the moment either before going through the Design Collaboration process or afterwards.

title: Re-moving attribute columns
body_text: Once a naming convention has been enforced, and the ‘Project Code’ for example needed changed but it has been enforced on files already you cannot delete it. This becomes very messy and causes a lot of confusion, for example we have had to put the description as 'DO NOT USE'.

title: Increase the Number Locations Selectable in the filter in Issues from 10 to as many as I want.
body_text: Currently you can only Select 10 Locations what you filter Issues, unless you want to select and entire sub locations. If I have a floor with 12 Suites, an elevator room, a Janitor closet and a Hallway, I want to be able to select Just the suites without selecting everything. I feel like this should be an easy one.

title: Adobe Sign Title
body_text: When we send documents for out E Signature, the title changes in Adobe Sign. It adds dashes in random spots. Can it pull the title exactly as we have it in Autodesk?

title: Ux idea
body_text: When creating an issue and typing text the character limit isn’t communicated in the description field, it might be good to add that. Also, on mobile the description field is small and makes writing a description longer than two sentences challenging. I feel like there’s room to improve the UX there. Best, Chris O'Neill

title: Metadata fields to be individually enforced per folder
body_text: It would be useful to apply Metadata fields to be individually enforced per folder without having them be applied to the main naming convention. So folders we would like to enforce the up loader to apply certain Metadata but not all.

title: Adding a 3rd Status in reviews
body_text: When working on site in fast paced construction it is often required that a document review is required to be processed in order to allow construction to continue on site. Now we have the 2 status Approved or Rejected. My suggestion is to have a 3rd middle status which allows partial acceptance to proceed but the document is not approved i.e needs to be resubmitted. This would allow Document Controllers to easily see which files need to be resubmitted and also enable more clear dash boarding. Th

title: Project Proxy's for project admins and members
body_text: It would be great to be able to apply a proxy for project members/admins on an ACC project. If a critical member is not available and cannot respond to Issues/RFI's/Reviews/Forms etc. where permissions are specifically applied.

title: Inherit Location for Images Taken on Drawings with Locations and in Forms/Issues
body_text: Description: To ensure consistency and reduce manual input, I propose that images taken within a drawing or form/issue should automatically inherit the location metadata from the context in which they are captured—similar to how it currently works for issues that are opened on a drawing with locations. Additionally, images added from the project library or device (that do not already have a location) should inherit the location of the form or issue they are attached to. However, if an image alre

title: Submittal log showing original and revised lines
body_text: When printing a submittal log, it only shows the current revisions. We need the submittal log to show originals and revisions for our clients. This is especially true when submittal responses cause delays in the project.

title: Reports | Sheet overview and Issues on sheets also for issues in files
body_text: It will be great if the sheet overview and issues in files report type is also available for issues created in files

title: Be able to categorize issue templates
body_text: It would also be useful to subdivide the issue templates so that several templates can be activated or deactivated at once.

title: Be able to set external (roles/companies) options more specifically for issue creation
body_text: We would like to be able to limit the possibilities of external parties more when creating issues. We would like to release certain issue types for them so that all issues from customers can only be created with them. In addition, they should only be able to assign issues to selected people/companies. It should also be possible for a project admin to determine the possible statuses that can be selected when processing the issue

title: Please add a functionality for unsubscribing from emails within BuildingConnected.
body_text: It's 2025. Why can't I unsubscribe myself from BuildingConnected emails?

title: Customizable Table of Contents in Exported Forms
body_text: It would be nice to be able to select what "Fields or Variables" appear in the Table of Contents in exported forms when many or several forms are being exported into one report. Currently only the Form ID# and Form Name "Fields or Variables" are listed. In my case the Form ID#'s are sometimes created out of chronological order due to some forms being created and then dismiss. Thus the Form ID# is basically useless. I'd like to be able to have the "name of the form", the "date the form was create

title: Be able to set issue type Coordination to inactive
body_text: At the moment it is not possible to inactivate the issue type "Coordination". I don't need the issue type because the model coordination module is not activated. Since the type cannot be set to inactive, the list of issue types only gets longer and more confusing

title: Upload Forms Across Multiple Existing Projects
body_text: It would save a lot of time if multiple forms could be uploaded into different folders under the Template Forms section for various existing projects simultaneously. Instead of having to open each project individually, navigate to Form Template , select folders, and upload forms one by one, it would be much more efficient to perform this action across multiple projects at once.

title: Export Folder permissions for Project Templates
body_text: It appears this feature has been implemented for Projects, however not for Project Templates. We use the Project Templates as a repository for a common folder structure, but each Project Template has unique Folder permissions that are maintained and managed at the Project Template level. Having the Export Folder permissions feature available would make this activity much easier to perform.

title: Possibility to archive or delete review templates
body_text: Add a tab in the review settings so that review templates that are no longer needed can be archived. Another option is to delete them. By this option it is easier to have a better overview about the relevat review templates

title: Cross collections automatic hyperlinks
body_text: Currently, sheets with callouts containing sheet numbers as reference will create hyperlinks only if the reference sheet is published in the same collection. One of the instance where cross-collection automatic hyperlinks seems necessary is when we have a set of standard drawings that apply to sheets that are published in more than one collection. These standard details are stored in a separate collection to avoid duplication, and the amount of work in publishing the same drawing in multiple col

title: Combining several pdfs into 1 pdf on export in the form module
body_text: I have loaded several smart pdfs into the templates in the form module. I create a pdf (daily work report) and then create a separate pdf ( material testing). I then go to the daily work report and add the material testing as a reference. Then export the daily report, but the material test report only shows up as a hyperlink and not actually in the work report pdf. Some of our clients ( State DOTs) want everything in 1 report and do not want to use hyperlinks. It would be wonderful if Autodesk B

title: Ability to Share and Export Multiple Spec Sections At Once
body_text: The ability to Share and/or Export Multiple Spec Sections at a time would be a MASSIVE improvement.

title: Export of Members with Assigned Licenses
body_text: We need to export a list of the project members showing their current license assignments, allowing us to identify which licenses to revoke from departed employees.

title: Temporary Role Assignment with Expiration Date
body_text: Introduce a feature that allows roles to be assigned to users with a specified expiration date. This would enable temporary role assignments for tasks that need to be completed within a certain timeframe. Once the expiration date is reached, the role is automatically revoked, ensuring that permissions do not remain active indefinitely.

title: Show responsible person's name in schedule plans
body_text: When a short-term plan is created in a schedule, a very felxible and maliable gantt is produced which is great to organise the coming week's tasks. Nonetheless, the name of each responsible party (whether it's a person or a company) is not shown. During look-aheads or general site meeting it is key to quickly identify the responsible party and many times people do not have a picture in their profiles and, even if they do, the little picture shown at the right side of each task is too small. It w

title: Adding members to Insight Builder
body_text: Make a more efficient way to add members in Insight Builder. One by one adding with is biot a solutiuon if we have hundreds of users we need to share dashboards with.

title: Share screens when contacting support
body_text: When contacting Support it can be a very frustrating experience trying to resolve technical queries using chat. I do not understand why Autodesk do not use Teams or Zoom to share screens as a means of resolving technical quires. I have just finished a 1 hour chat conversation with your agent Erika without a resolution to my technical query. I am sure that my query could have been resolved within 10 minutes if I had shared my screen with your agent. Your agent done her best to help me. My complai

title: Schedule - new feature
body_text: It would be great to add a checkbox or filter that hides all empty WBS, that is hides all WBS that do not contain any activity. This is possible in Primavera P6, but ACC shows all WBS items even though you hide them in Primavera P6.

title: Bridge : Folder update (When adding folders or renaming folders)
body_text: Hi, The sync option should implicitly update the folders added and the name changes when it happens Recreating the bridge each time is time consuming.

title: Reviews
body_text: It would be very beneficial to have the Review Status column available even after updating review status and moving to round 2 in the review. Also, update the "Approved-with comments" to hold the value of "Approved-with comments" instead of the value showing as "Approved".

title: Sheet Numbering Options
body_text: When uploading sheets to autodesk build, there should be an option to exclude the letter "O" in the sheet numbers. Most of the jobs I upload drawings have a zero after the trade discipline drawings, and autodesk more often then not interprets that as the letter "O" instead of a zero. Editing 1600+ sheet numbers for every set revision is extremely time consuming. Having some sort of option to exclude the letter "O" would make it much easier to maintain sets.

title: Reviews workflows and ACC Roles
body_text: As the Account and Project Admin: -able to edit, rename or modify created Reviews workflows. -able to rename Roles.

title: Prevent Submission of Smart PDF Forms Without Filling Mandatory Fields
body_text: In Autodesk Build's Forms module, we created a Smart PDF form with several fields marked as required/mandatory. After uploading it as a form template and using it within a project, we noticed that users can still submit the form without filling in the required fields. This defeats the purpose of having mandatory fields and poses serious risks in workflows like safety inspections, quality control, or compliance checklists, where complete information is critical. Smart PDF forms with required fiel

title: Highlight in model
body_text: Using ACC for facilities management, the "Highlight in Model" feature, available in Revit, would be hugely beneficial in the FM world. Having a tech be able to select an item or circuit in a panel schedule and finding what else is connected to that circuit, or where a panel may be located, would be a big efficiency boost for maintenance and operations teams.

title: Deleted documents query
body_text: Hi Team, We have had a query recently regarding deleted documents. On this case the document is not on the system and is not in the deleted document folder the file just says deleted. The Engineer has came back to us querying this why it was deleted however we are unsure as to why. Is it possible for a filter tab to be added when deleting a document ? This then allows us to see those documents which are deleted and why they were.

title: Schedule supported Languages
body_text: In the middle east, there's some project make their time schedule in Arabic and when I important that schedule in the Schedule tool in the Autodesk Build It didn't work at all and when I tried other solutions from your side as Autodesk, It didn't help either So, I need the Arabic language to be supported in this tool

title: Takeoff - Don't Allow Window Select Outside of Section Box
body_text: When applying a section plane/section box, you can still window select objects that are outside of the section, which leads to inadvertently assigning objects to takeoff types. Idea is to prohibit objects that aren't visible from being selected.

title: Takeoff - Information about Published Model
body_text: When a model is published to Takeoff, there is no way to tell where it came from (which folder) or which version of the source file was used to publish. We need a way to be able to determine exactly where a model came from. This would significantly improve the ability to QC that model and make sure we are using the correct version. Even something like the "File Activities" feature in Docs would be really useful.

title: Re-Host Issue Pin
body_text: The ability to select an Issue pin and rehost to another model's geometry. There are times where we may have issues assigned to 'design' models that will eventually be replaced by subcontractor content. If you've hosted issues on that design model and then move that model out of the coordination space, you will lose those issues.

title: Foreign Entities Address
body_text: The foreign entities that we work with typically do not have US offices, they are unable to provide their foreign addresses as a response to these questions: What is your company's address? In what year and state/province was your company founded? Responses to these types of questions should not be limited to Canada, US, and Mexico.

title: Integrate Issue thumbnails into ACC App
body_text: When using the ACC App, we have noticed at least on our google tablets that the Issue thumbnails are not shown. Having this thumbnail shown would make the tool much more usable for those of us flagging issues with the Navisworks Coordination Add-in. Most of our issues only have the thumbnails and no attachments, so now we need to go back and add additional photos for the field team to see an image of the issue.

title: Add a way to filter by issues that no longer have a placement associate
body_text: With hosting clash detection at an immense scale in ACC, lots of issues have the placement removed when the issues have been resolved. It would be nice to find a way to quickly filter by issues that no longer have a placement. The current work around has been using a report, then filtering it in excel. This would just save us an extra step.

title: requested a file log from all folders for a specific file type (such as pdf) search window
body_text: You requested a file log from all folders for a specific file type (such as pdf) to streamline your workflow. Currently, ACC only supports exporting files, not the file log after filtering across folders for a specific file type. I understand the importance of this function for you, and I have submitted a feature request for this valuable input as well.

title: Ability to make emails filed to Correspondence from the project email address private by default
body_text: Currently, emails filed to Correspondence from the project email address are public by default. The originator must manually set each of their emails as private if the content should not be visible to all project members. Even if all correspondence for the project is set to be private. This is a major shortcoming for our projects. We have hundreds of emails a week from many different people for each of our 5+ projects. It is simply not feasible to manually change the privacy for each one, especi

title: Conditional Dropdowns for Precision Data Entry in Forms
body_text: Problem Statement: In the current Autodesk Build Forms, we plan to use them to submit Work Inspection Requests (WIRs). However, to ensure standardized and precise data collection, we need the ability to use dropdown fields with conditional logic. At present, Forms don't support dynamic dropdowns where the second dropdown auto-populates based on the selection in the first. Proposed Solution: Introduce multi-level conditional dropdown fields in Autodesk Build Forms. This enhancement would allow fo

title: Don't switch between schedule and plans when adding schedule items to plans
body_text: When you click on a schedule activity and then add it to an existing plan, ACC will automatically switch to that plan. This is fine when you're only adding one activity from the schedule to the plan (unlikely) but if you're trying to add multiple activities (more likely) to the plan, this can be very cumbersome because you need to click back and forth between the plan and schedule, scroll back down to where you were, and so forth. If ACC simply added the schedule activity to the plan and remaine

title: RFI closed date attribute
body_text: Would be nice to add a closed date to the RFI attribute list. That detail is identified in the RFI details page in the review status bar, but the attribute is not available in the RFI log.

title: Confidential Status for Projects
body_text: Would really love to see a confidential status for projects that can be part of the Projects home page with the ability to filter which projects are confidential and export a list for Account Admin purposes. Assigning a confidential status of a project could be part of the project creation process along with the other project details. It could be edited in the project details by the project or account admins.

title: Insights dashboard with AI capability
body_text: We have a client that requested a Dashboard, either in Insights, or in project home page that functioned as a project assistant. The dashboard would be used to ask questions/queries (similar to gpt) and spit out information from the project. For instance, asking the assistant to explain the differences between two versions of a sheet or other documents saved in files.

title: Change target folder as mandatory field in Reviews
body_text: We see ACC users of Review within Autodesk Docs often forget to change the target folder within a Review process. We can fix that quickly by changing the target folder in the Review, but sometimes you don't want to much Reviews. It would be helpful to make it mandatory that the target folder in a Review Workflow is mandatory.

title: Fabrication parts/additional properties on the ACC NWCs/NWDs model properties viewer
body_text: The issue: Currently if you open an NWD or NWC in the ACC model viewer and click on an object such as fabrication ductwork, there properties are severely limited. This essentially makes the properties useless to the field crew. Proposed solution: Add additional Revit properties to the properties viewer in the model viewer on ACC. This way, the field team can click on any pipe/duct and easily find exactly all the information that will be useful to them. This will save the MEP detailer an immense

title: Account Admin - Company - See member and project detail
body_text: Account Admin – Companies: When you pull up a company, you should be able to click on the members to see detail. It shows how many members are under the company, but you can’t see the detail of it. (Same with the projects)

title: Document version details in Issues
body_text: When pinning an Issue to a document, could the document version details be automatically appended to the file name listed in the Placement field? It is difficult to identify which document version an Issue has been raised on if we are ever required to look back.

title: Desktop Connector and File Activity
body_text: Hi, We just noticed that if someone downloads a file (or copy on their own hard drive) via desktop connector, the file activity will not capture that activity. Could you please come up with a solution for this?

title: Asset Description on Mobile
body_text: Currently, when referencing to an asset in the mobile app, you only see the name, category, and status of the asset. It would be helpful if you could see the description as well.

title: Package notifications
body_text: Get notifications when items in a package are updated.

title: Bulk Delete Forms
body_text: It would be good to be able to bulk delete forms. Right now I need to go into each individual form and delete it. However, it would be good to multiselect and then delete. I think this is specific to the forms being in progress as opposed to complete?

title: sheets discipline designator wildcards
body_text: It would be nice if in the sheets-disciplines-designator wildcards could be used like for example ??-???-*E (for Electrical). Now the first letter(s) becomes the discipline, in the way with wildcards the discipline doesn't have to be at the beginning anymore.

title: Shared & consumed on timeline
body_text: Hi all, A valuable enhancement to the Design Collaboration timeline would be to clearly display details whenever a package is selected, specifically indicating: Shared Date and Shared By Consumed Date and Consumed By Currently, some users become confused as they only notice the date and overlook whether it refers to a package being 'shared' or 'consumed.' Additionally, making this information easier to access would significantly improve visibility and understanding of key project milestones.

title: Sharing Individual Specification Sheets
body_text: It would be helpful to have the ability to share individual specification sheets, similar to how individual sheets can be shared in the Sheets tool.

title: Effective Versioning and Plan Management in ACC Build for Large Projects
body_text: Hello ACC colleagues, I know this idea might face some resistance, but we are trying to push it through. Although we talk about digitalization, but in our industry still work on construction sites with paper as we did years ago. For large projects, like the one we are currently working on as electrical installers, it is common to divide the building into several sections. We now have a major problem with versioning plans in ACC, where we have to reinvent the wheel. As electricians, we have 15 tr

title: Cost Management Rounding (Trunc)
body_text: My clients progress estimate form that I am trying to replicate in Cost Management uses a "Trunc" formula (excel) when rounding. Can this feature be added? I am having issues with the total budget, retention or individual costs are off by 1 or 2 cents, which I believe is because of this.

title: Add Correspondence attachments to Cost attachments
body_text: Product Name: Autodesk Build & Cost Feature Summary: Add attachments from Correspondence items referenced to a Cost item into the Cost item Documents/Attachments area Current Limitation: Can reference a Correspondence item within a Cost item, but cannot pull attachments from it. Proposed Solution: When I reference a Correspondence item from Build into a Contract in Cost, I would like the option to bring the related attachments into the document/attachment area. We can already do this for other B

title: Issues List
body_text: 1. Be able to sort by the person the issue is assigned to. 2. When utilizing the mobile version, it is very difficult to see the location of a specific issue on the map when there is many. 3. At the top of the issues page on the PC version, there is a lot of wasted space that could be shrunk so more issues could potentially be viewed at one time(this issue applies to most ACC build tabs).

title: Custom attributes
body_text: For files, we are able to create and use custom attributes in Docs, same attributes are visible for both files and folders, but for some reason you cant fill the attribute for folder. Why shouldn't i be able to? If i want to sort by said custom attribute i would not be able to because i can't fill it in for folders.

title: Schedule version Edit/Delete (P6 file)
body_text: I have noticed today that on the schedule section. I am unable to delete a version or a specific version that is incorrect/or has an error internally. by not being able to do so. It messes up my natural consequence. I should be able to edit or delete the uploaded file (p6 format). Please let's have this feature added. Thank you

title: Removing watchers in bulk
body_text: Right now, it is very easy to add watchers in bulk. But if a watcher needs to be removed from 10s or 100s of items, one needs to open them one by one. It doesn't help that the platform doesn't like having multiple tabs open. A bulk action to remove them would be great.

title: References linked to systems automatically linked to assets within system
body_text: I noticed that if I link say an RFI to an asset system as reference and then pull up an individual asset within the system, that RFI is not shown within that asset's references. I would have to check each system that asset may be a part of for additional references which can get very messy. I suggest that when a reference gets linked to a system of assets, that reference is then viewable at the individual asset level with something to cancel out doubles.

title: Issues-Watcher Signoff
body_text: We need a way for 'watchers' to record that they've acknowledge the issue---Or 'assign' multiple people to the issue for them to individually sign off on. For instance, if I move an exterior wall and inform the team, I need Civil, Structure and Electrical to all acknowledge that they have seen this with a simple dropdown or checkbox. This field should also be available to sort/filter issue statuses. As it stands, I can send out issues but I have no confirmation (or confidence) that the parties h

title: Sheet Download From Autodesk
body_text: It would be nice to have a shareable link provided when trying to share drawings instead of having to wait until a PDF file is generated and exported from autodesk. Plangrid had this feature and was very useful.

title: Notification to add to Selected Projects when added to a project
body_text: We are architects working in ACC via design collaboration. Pain point - a user joins a new project, can access via revit, but links don't load because they have to go into desktop connector to add the new project in. It happens all the time for us. Idea - When a user is added into a project, desktop connector could have a pop up to say, 'You've been added to XXX new project, would you like to add this project to your selected projects?' it could have some spiel about links etc. and then it's the

title: Company Set Up
body_text: It would make it easier to set up companies and any subcontractors in a different place than with your company contacts. That way everything isn't intermingled. It would also be beneficial if at the project level you could export a list of companies and contacts per that individual project to be able to share with team members or others.

title: MARKS UPS WITH LOCK VIEW
body_text: Hi Autodesk, Good day! Please activate or restore the Markup Feature in Autodesk Docs and other products. This feature is extremely helpful, especially during our BIM walkthroughs. Currently, it is not functional when we add markups (such as dimensions and text) via issue assignments; they only appear as images in the thumbnail and do not show up in the hypermodel. During the walkthrough, our clients suggested that we should be able to turn off all issue pins, as it cover certain portions of the

title: Version compare for NWC & DWFx
body_text: Currently, you can only compare a few different file types (DWG, IFC, etc). Most coordination models are exported as NWC or DWFx. Being able to quickly compare these files on ACC would be great. This will be especially helpful after you signoff an area and somebody uploads a new model for that area and creates new clashes. Thanks!

title: Budget and Contract Allocation
body_text: In Cost Management-->Settings-->General-->Budget and Contract allocation. There is an option to select "Multiple budgets to one contract" and "One budget to more than one contract". We need both selected, but that is not possible. Please help.

title: Issues: Custom Field Improvements
body_text: I searched for Cutom Fiels and found 35 ideas with some very good suggestions among them. Search - Autodesk Community Could Autodesk please review and improve the custom fields. My idea to add to the above is as follows. When the custom field has a drop down, please allow multiselect as an option. Sometimes I have a list and I want to allow users to select more than one option, but I don't want to allow free text as that messes up my Power BI graphs. Other times, I want to restrict users to choo

title: Workflow states - ISO
body_text: This is crucial to ACC functioning as a logical CDE. We cannot be making copys of files and moving them between folders to replicate ISO19650 states in 2025. Please Develop workflow states defined by workflow and then add the function of generating exchange formats based on state. Meme

title: Visualisation like Twinmotion in ACC
body_text: It should be possible to make visualisations (virtual reality) like Twinmotion direct in ACC

title: Please add project scheduling to BIM Collaborate
body_text: When planning projects in BIM collaborate, we currently do not have project scheduling at hands as this is only available in Build. project scheduling would be a great addition for project planning. Please care.

title: Exporting Forms on Desktop vs App
body_text: It would be great if the same export options in Forms could be available on the app as they are on the desktop. Specifically the email options. What is nice about the desktop, when you select "Email to (optional)", a list of current project members is immediately suggested (similar to the "assigned to" feature in Issues). This is fantastic for a fast click and go! On the app however, the default is to send via email through the mail app on a cell or tablet and manual input is required. As a jobs

title: Sort Projects by Location in homepage
body_text: Hi, So projects in ACC can have location metadata associated with them. my suggestion is to surface that metadata in the My Projects dashboard so that the user can sort & filter projects by location. This can include state/region/country/continent etc. It may be another idea submission, but adding similar functionality to the project picker in the top nav would also be great, but that has more of a UI/UX impact and would have longer dev/leadtime. Thanks.

title: ACC Docs Issues - Workshop XR(WXR) Issue Thumbnail/Support/VR
body_text: Couple of suggestions for ugrading issues in WXR. 1. Thumbnails of issue should be added when issues are created in VR-mode. This is is automaticly created when reporting issues from web browser. (1.VR, 2.Browser) 2. Go to issue should be available in browser mode. 3. Issues created in Model Coordination does not show as an "orange dot" in Docs & WXR and vice versa. (1. Docs 2. MC) 4. Grounded to floor while walking, also in stairs. 5. Support for Inventor files (Iam,ipt) and also dwg.

title: Company directory in the ACC
body_text: Why do you need admin rights from the entire system to create a company, which is not my job. Wouldn't it make more sense to introduce an authorization role administration to let those do this where it belongs: in the administration or assistant to save double work. Since the assistant is currently writing me a ticket with the company data, which I then enter into the ACC. Could you do that yourself with a certain role, where you are only allowed to do this?

title: Content catalog tags - adding tags to the content
body_text: Currently, adding tags to families is very cumbersome. If I scroll thru the list of tags I can check several tags to add at one time. However, if I search for a tag (this is essential as we have a laundry list of tags) I have to pick the save button and ten open the dialog and select the next tag. Many of our families have 3, 4 or 5 tags. it would be very helpful to have an Apply button, allowing me to stay in the tag list dialog box and save after I’ve selected all my tags. also, have a preview

title: Assign users to a project by role
body_text: We can assign multiple users to a role, so it makes sense we should be able to add roles to a project and have all users of that role be automatically added to the project.

title: Transmittal Settings should be able to be be set in the template
body_text: We need to send out transmittals to users who don't have Autodesk Docs accounts, which is fine, we can set the transmittal settings to allow this, however we need to set it in every project. Can this not be added to the template so settings can be set once for all projects created using that template?

title: Exporting forms to emails/reports
body_text: It would be great to have the choice in Forms to select if you want to export 1 photo per page/row or multiple photos with your Form report. This feature is already available when you want to "run a report" in the Reports section. Would save a step and exporting Forms, in "Forms", is much faster than running a report. Thanks! 😄

title: Matching automatically generated section view hyperlinks
body_text: When uploading sheets, links to section views or details are automatically generated on the drawings. These links (usually a blue circle or square) are clean and do not detract or block information on the drawing. Sometimes links do not generate automatically. I've noticed that sections cuts that are annotated with diagonal text are often missed. Adding a markup and linking is not difficult but it does not look nearly as clean as the automatic links. A manually added markup can be moved, and it

title: Grouping Assets like Photo Mark-Up in ACC Build
body_text: Just a suggestion... Developing a feature that can group Assets, similar to the functionality of the Photo Mark-Up tool where one photo tag can contain multiple images. The idea would be that you would have the option to add multiple assets to one highlight (just as you have the same option to add multiple photos to one photo tag). It would create a 'one-stop-shop' for all necessary information based in the unique tracking parameters that are developed in a 'Custom Fields' setting in Assets (e.g

title: Scheduled reports to only those who are assigned issues
body_text: It would be a nice feature to send scheduled issue summary reports to only those that are assigned an issue (within the report). This way a trade partner only gets a scheduled email report if there is an issue assigned to their name. Bonus points if one issue summary report scheduled weekly could send out individualized reports to each issue assignee (only showing their issues and hiding the other issues not assigned to them). This would help cut down the number of reports people receive as well

title: Feature Request - Filter photos or issues that have no location assigned
body_text: I'm running into this issue where team members have not entered a location when uploading photos or issues. Would be nice if I could filter photos/issues that have no location assigned.

title: Built-in visual model link planner for Bridge
body_text: Many who manage ACC projects of simple to complex need to think through how they will manage linked models, within their own environment and with external partners upstream or downstream. Best-case projects would include such planning in a BIM Execution Plan or similar. While best practice, that is quite often not done for a wide variety of reasons. However, BIM managers or BIM project leads must solve their project's link setup one way or another. It could be amazing to have a very simple, yet

title: Reports
body_text: We've been exploring the reports feature, especially the Assigned Items by Company report which will email individualized punch list issues to all the assigned company members. But what we find awkward and frustrating is the need to download those reports before they can be viewed. Build will email you a pdf attachment for other processes, like Meeting minutes or completed Forms. Can you do that with Reports? Or maybe you can make them so they first open in a browser as a pdf, which can then be

title: Cost Management  - Tab Names and Order
body_text: Changing the tab names and order is terrific; I love that. There is one minor hiccup, though. When I changed the order of the tabs, I assumed that it would also change the default tab when navigating to the Cost module. Say, for example, under the cost tabs (instead of having the Contracts tab be first), I want Expense to be first, Contracts to be second, and Cost Payment Application to be third. When I navigate to the cost module, it opens the contracts tab even though it's not first anymore, a

title: Possibility of sending a contract to a company that is not in ACC - Cost Management
body_text: The possibility of sending a contract to a company that is not in our ACC environment is required, without having to register their email or without being invited to the project. This is useful when we want to send a material order to a supplier that does not use ACC, for example the concrete supplier, this company does not have Build licenses and does not need them if it is only going to receive its contract from Cost Management.

title: Section Tool Flexibility
body_text: It would be beneficial to have the ability to adjust the sectioning tool within the ACC model viewer dynamically, similar to the functionality in Navisworks. In Navisworks, users can also select the move button to snap the sectioning tool back into view if it is lost. Having this feature in the ACC model viewer would allow for more flexibility while navigating models, and would make the sectioning tool less rigid.

title: Photos Reference Picker Thumbnail Adjustment
body_text: When referencing a photo, there is currently no way to adjust the size of the thumbnail to increase the number of photos in the window at a given time. This means lots of scrolling if there are significant drawings. It would be ideal if there was an option to adjust thumbnail size.

title: Submittal Packages should include more than one spec section
body_text: We need the ability to include more than one spec section when building a submittal package. Vendors often send bulk submittals in one pdf file. For example, ball valves, gate valves, butterfly valves, check valves, etc. may all be in one package sent to the contractor, but each valve is a different spec section. That package either has to be broken up into separate files by spec section or somehow communicated that the submission contains materials across multiple spec sections, and if you do t

title: Design Collaboration Search Bar
body_text: Feature request to add a search feature such that the user can type in something and all packages that have a matching name/description/model/file will be returned. Or, to go a step further, add attributes to packages so you can tag them and filter/search for them easier. For example, if you have a lot of teams that use Design Collaboration to manage DRBs, it would be useful to search "DRB 14" and have all packages for that deliverable be returned instead of needing to click on dozens/hundreds o

title: Language Settings
body_text: It would be very helpful if the language settings could be made in a project template. Then they would not have to be set anew in every project. For companies with many projects, this would make work much easier.

title: Automatic backup of projects (Build)
body_text: 294 / 5.000 Hello, What I miss is that I can't plan an automated backup of the projects with files, images, tasks and plans, i.e. everything from a project (build) on my or an external cloud server! It is possible to do it manually, but unfortunately I'm not sure that this always happens!

title: ACC Viewer // Display Object Info
body_text: This is another request to make the ACC Model Viewer work more like the Tandem Viewer. In this request I would like ACC to adopt Tandem's Display Object Info viewer setting. What this setting does is put a label at the bottom of the view that displays the details (Type/Instance) of any object that you hover your cursor over. This is awesome! How is this not already in ACC?!

title: Enable HTML upload of model checker reports
body_text: In Revit, we are provided with the model checker, which is a great way to QA check the project models for compliance with various standards & good practices. While we can make power BI dashboards from the checker data, we can't store the data itself in the CDE. Can ACC be enabled to accept html files for upload, even if they can't be viewed directly. Although if desktop connector is installed, surely open in new window can be made to work.

title: Import Navisworks Clash Groups and Clash Rules
body_text: I would like to recommend that Autodesk consider maintaining consistency in the naming of Clash Groups and Clash Rules when transferring issues from Navisworks to ACC. This will help for better understanding of both the products and also for clear reporting purposes.

title: Alert when a Project has not been accessed by user
body_text: In trying to ensure archiving is completed, it would be great to be able to have an alert of some sort when a project has not been accessed in a certain time frame. Using the data connector, you can export 'last_sign_in' data, but this is ONLY for BIM360, and not for ACC.

title: Details Panel
body_text: The Details Panel should be a full screen. It is confusing to see it on the side. It should pop up to a new page.

title: Change Event information
body_text: The information and attachments we put on the main change event, should flow to all cost items created and be editable in the cost item and then all information in the cost items should flow to the Contracts, SCO, and OCO's. Currently, we are entering the information in at least 3 times. Change Event, Cost Item, & SCO/OCO.

title: Cost Payment Application Invoice Number
body_text: The Cost Payment Application Invoice Number should not auto populate. It should be blank until the supplier fills in the number and should be editable until it is fully approved. We sync with sage and it can only be a certain number of digits, plus we have a format that we can only accept. Currently, we are unable to edit it once the supplier submits.

title: Better review and approval insights
body_text: There needs to be some additional analytics around reviews and approvals for the dashboards in Insight and release the review datasets for use in Insight Builder. It would be good to be able to delve a bit deeper into the review statistics for a project and at an account level.

title: In ACC Account Admin views column headings should be expandable
body_text: All views column headings to be expandable in ACC Account Admin (e.g. Projects, Members, Roles tables)

title: Review Optional Reviewer Notification
body_text: When adding members into a review as an 'Optional Reviewer', they don't receive a notification that they've been added. I'm currently having to create a separate General Correspondence notifying them that they've been added. My suggestion is to add a notification step similar to the OOTB notification step for initial review creation. This step would immediately follow the adding/updating of optional reviewers. Thanks

title: Adding Checkboxes for Comments Within a Review
body_text: Would be a nice to have, if adding comments within a review if there was options to tick box comments once they have been actioned? Would be a great addition to reviews 🙂

title: ACC cannot upload more than 400 files in one upload
body_text: Why the limit? Please sort this restriction.

title: the posibility to add other status values on the Meeting items or on issues
body_text: It would be great if on the Meeting items we can edit/add other item status values, not only "Open, Ongoing and Closed". The same for the issues part

title: The posibility to activate the public link at a folder level, not on the entire project page
body_text: From time to time, on projects we collaborate for example, with the country Authorities. It would be great if the public link will be able to be activated to the folder level, not for the entire project page. (I want to activate for example only on the Permitting folder or on a tender folder, not for the entire folder's structure)

title: ACC meetings, add basic text in template
body_text: It can be handy to add in the template some basic text underneath a title. The purpose is to add general agreement we want need in all meetings.

title: To review Navisworks appended point cloud file in ACC browser.
body_text: Currently, RCP files can only be viewed if uploaded as an RCP file in ACC folder, But when RCP file is appended to Navisworks NWD file and upload to ACC, then we are opening NWD file in ACC browser we are not able to view point cloud file in browser. I would like to formally request this as new feature for future development

title: Shared Files logged to Correspondance
body_text: When files are shared in Docs, emails are sent from ACC to the team members with a link to the document. This is what I'd consider to be correspondence, and it'd be nice if this was automatically logged to the correspondence module, or at least when creating the share, there was a check box to optionally include to correspondence module.

title: Blank last name in ACC user
body_text: We have a challenge with usernames in ACC for many of our colleagues in South India. There are cases, when they do not use their last name, and in all the government documents also, they would use their first names. In ACC environment it is an issue, because last name is mandatory. It doesn’t even accept a “.” Or “ “ . We would like to request a possibility to add users with only first name.

title: Meeting invitees search bar
body_text: A search bar within the existing meeting invitees would be useful to streamline the attendance process in meetings with large groups. This would eliminate unneeded scrolling to check all those who are present when Teams doesn't have members listed in the same order as ACC.

title: Allow responsible Contractor to create submittal revision
body_text: If a responsible contractor is listed on a submittal, they should be able to create a submittal. When a submittal is approved as noted, it will be closed and distributed so that the submittal information is available to the project team. The submittal does not need to stay open but if/when the responsible contractor is ready to submit a final for record submittal with comments incorporated, they should be able to open a new revision and submit. Currently, only the submittal manager can create a

title: [ACC]Masquer des fonctions
body_text: Bonjour, ACC propose de nombreuses fonctionnalités très intéressantes toutefois sur certains projets nous souhaitons ne pas toutes les utiliser afin d'amener petit à petit les utilisateurs vers ce travail en mode données. Par exemple sur une projet nous décidons de ne pas utiliser le module Réunion car les compte-rendu seront réalisés de manière "traditionnelle" sous Word. Il serait utile alors de masquer la fonctionnalité Réunion aux utilisateurs ou encore mieux à certains utilisateurs.

title: A better way to merge/replace existing cloud models by new local Revit files (and show in web viewer)
body_text: I often work in areas with unreliable or no internet access, so manual uploading is faster and better suited for my needs. (open/save cloud models takes at lease x10 times) However, using cloud models to view Issues better suits my needs. So I need a better way to merge new local Revit files with existing cloud models, while retaining all element IDs, Issues, and incrementing the file versions in the new merged file. Instead of manual copying everything from local file to cloud model.

title: Asset Markups tracking dimensions
body_text: If I'm tracking installation, having area, counts or linear feet based on markups would be helpful. Maybe something to turn off/on or in properties? Or a field you can turn on/off in the Asset Category settings?

title: Asset Markups having dimension markups
body_text: If I'm tracking installation, having area, counts or linear feet based on markups would be helpful. Maybe something to turn off/on or in properties? Or a field you can turn on/off in the Asset Category settings?

title: Availability of User-Created Attributes in the "Review" Area of Autodesk Construction Cloud
