body_text: I propose improving the "Review" area within Autodesk Construction Cloud by allowing user-created attributes to be available for selection, just as they are in the "Files" area. Currently, user-created attributes can be added to the "Review" template, and when applied, they become available in the review process, with the option to require "approver" input for specific attributes. While this is a useful feature, it would be more efficient if all user-created attributes were available by default

title: Bridge within a Project
body_text: Idea: Automated bridge within a project . For example you have some documents in WIP that you would also like to have in SHARED (reference to ISO19650). Instead of manually copying them every time there is a new version, it is automatically bridged into SHARED. This is similar to the "Review auto-trigger" but without a review.

title: Sheets Markup Tool in Mobile - double tap to lock on the screen
body_text: When using the markup tool on sheets in the mobile app, the markup toolbar collapses when the tool is selected. In PlanGrid, you could double-tap the tool bar to lock it on the screen. This functionality is very helpful when making multiple of the same markups repeatedly.

title: Additional reference numbers for sheets
body_text: When uploading sheets, the ability to add additional fields to label each sheet other than the sheet number. See the example image attached. There are three different identifiers on each sheet of this drawing set. Various members of the project team refer to the sheets differently. For example using the attached image, the Owner will say look at drawing 12810724, our construction team will say look at sheet 215, the engineer will say look at sheet LPS-S-119. Searching by content on the sheets is

title: ACC 3D Viewer - New Tools - Viewer Toolbar
body_text: The ACC viewer, (compared to Trimble Connect), has several limitations: it does not allow checking the coordinates of a point, it lacks the ability to adjust element transparency, it does not allow area selection, IFC files in global coordinates are displayed incorrectly, and it does not support viewing IFCs exported from Quadri with global coordinates. Proposed tools: Single point measurement to check coordinates Model transparency Area selection mode I hope other users find these proposals use

title: reply/foward, and add bcc
body_text: Hello, It can be a good add the possibility to reply and foward the correspondence, also to send it to bcc people. thank you,

title: Auto Filter Markups By Package
body_text: It would be nice if we could put markups on a file in Sheets/Files and then auto-assign of what markups will be shown in a given package. There are times when we have so many markups to show scope of work that a document becomes unusable. It would be nice if a user didn't have to manually filter to see only the pertinent markups for the package they are executing on.

title: Calculate on normal Cost Item qualifiers
body_text: I had to make a Markup Formula rule where a OH& Fee charge was only relevant to budget items NOT starting with 01. I could not do this and had to make 17 rules to include all of the potential budget item starting digits that we not 01. Can we add a 'Does not start with' qualifier to that list? or some other way to un-include items from a list? I could not use does not contain because many of the codes include 01 somewhere else in their 6 digits.

title: Create several cuts in Model Viewer like in Navisworks
body_text: It would be useful if we could create several cuts in a model on more axis than one. At the moment in the Model Viewer this is nog possible like in Navisworks.

title: Review of Multiple pdfs
body_text: Current state: Drawings files are output as individual pdfs in DOCS or BUILD so that version control of each sheet is kept. This is fantastic however... Question: What is suggested as the best process or tool to review the above individual pdfs within ACC to obtain markups from the team simultaneously or collaboratively within ACC without opening and closing individual pdfs. Sheets is the closest tool I believe that Autodesk offers however... ideally we would love to also utilise the Bluebeam St

title: ACCdocsで2Dビューの細線表示オプションが効かないため、改善を求める。
body_text: ACCdocsで2Dビューの細線表示オプションが効かない。 細線表示オプションOFFでしか表示されないため、太い線が線幅がつぶれた表示で、詳細がわからない。 ACCdocsでもRevitの細線表示オプションが機能するよう、改善を求める。

title: improve research in Content Catalog
body_text: I discovered “ ” not so long ago, and so far I've found it an almost perfect solution. The EU version seems to be coming soon. But I think it still lacks an improvement for searching. The tool doesn't seem to search in the “Notes” fields. Is it possible to add this simple function?

title: Remove second reviewer in reviewer workflow
body_text: In the submittal review workflow if you have multiple submittal steps you are not able to remove the second reviewer from the workflow once the first reviewer has completed their review. Example: Submittal was submitted with a two step review workflow - first reviewer (EOR), second reviewer(Owner). Upon completion of review by the first reviewer, it was determined that the owner (second reviewer) did not need to review the submittal that was now in their court. The workflow does not allow for de

title: Correspondence: Allow References to Correspondence in Issues and other modules
body_text: We need to be able to Reference email from the Correspondence. This would be useful in Issues and other modules such as RFI.

title: Mobile App // Home page rearrangement
body_text: The Home page in the mobile app needs to be rearranged. At the very top of the Home page, it states: " Here's what's happening on your project today ". The immediate few sections under that are " Take a photo ", " Recently viewed sheets ", and " Recently viewed files ". None of these sections have anything to do with "what's happening" You know what does, the next section under that for a member's " Work status ". THIS section needs to be relocated to be just under the "what's happening" heading

title: Submittal Reviews Collaboration ability
body_text: Just like in Microsoft cloud shared documents and Bluebeam sessions to be able to do markups and edit at the same time and within the same document for a few people to review of submittals. Currently a submittal document has to be downloaded and put into Bluebeam Sessions for a group of people to review the submittal at the same time and then one control person to pull the document out of Bluebeam and back into ACC Submittals. This is a daunting task. Would be nice if we could keep it in ACC to

title: Sheets and Files List View & Tile View
body_text: Currently, if you are viewing sheets in a tile view and navigate to files, the tile view remains. If you're viewing files with a list view and navigate to sheets, the list view remains. In my experience, most uses prefer the tile view for sheets and the list view for files. The views between the two modules should come up how you last viewed that specific module, not transfer between sheets and files.

title: Forms
body_text: Saved views for forms in the Project Template.

title: Save front/top orientation settings in viewer
body_text: In cases where a model has been saved with the wrong coordinates, the models show up in viewer on their side. This can be mended using the viewcube, but only for the active session. There should be a save option so that the user can view the model correctly oriented the next time.

title: Mapping of Form and Issue status to Asset
body_text: I suggest using Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) Build to map forms and issue statuses to assets for better reporting. Here’s how this can help you: Link Forms and Issues to Assets: Customize forms to capture important details about each asset and connect any issues directly to them. This ensures that problems are tracked and resolved for the specific asset. Create Detailed Reports: Use ACC Build to generate reports that combine data from forms and issues linked to assets. This will give you cl

title: ACC上でのビュー参照活用
body_text: Revitの機能としてビュー参照があるが、ACCでも活用したいです。 Revitでビュー参照を設定すれば関連するビューに飛ぶことができるが、ACCにデータをアップするとビュー参照の機能が無効となってしまうのを改善してほしいです。

title: Docs内の新・旧データの閲覧
body_text: Docsにて「2D図面の位置合わせ」をすると、一覧に「リンクされた図面」として表示されますが、この状態で旧バージョンの古いデータを閲覧する際、「リンクされた図面」の欄に最新データが表示されてしまいます。 例）最新（V14）の状態で2D位置合わせを行った後、旧バージョン（V12）を開くと最新のリンクされた図面欄に2D位置合わせした図面が表示される。旧バージョン（V12）の時点では2D位置合わせをしていないため、表示されない状態にしてほしい。※何が最新か混乱するのを防ぐため

title: シート内に複数ビューがあった場合の3D重ね合わせ対象ビューを指定
body_text: シート内に複数のビューが配置されている場合、3Dと重ねる際に見たいビューと重ねられず、ACCが任意で判断したビューに重ねられてしまいます。 見たいビューと重ねられないと、この機能を十分に活用できません。 例）シート内に平面図と詳細断面が含まれる場合、3Dと平面図を重ねたいのに、3Dと詳細断面が重ねられてしまう。

title: Submittal Markup - Searchable Document
body_text: In the submittal markup window, add the ability to search the document.

title: Slow page transition in ACC
body_text: One of our customers pointed out that the page transition in ACC tends to be extremely slow in comparison to BIM360; the customer tested ACC and BIM360 under the same network environment. The enhancement should be made so that the page transition in ACC occurs smoothly without any stress.

title: 「3Dで図面を表示」機能の改善
body_text: ACC上で3Dモデルとシート図面を念のため、正しいレベルに重ねられません。 例）B2階シートはB2階レベルに重ねたいが、1階レベルに重ねられてしまいます 3Dモデルとシート図面を機能は非常に便利なため、正しいレベルに配置してほしいです。 現状では実務でうまく活用できず、ACCが浸透しません。

title: Submittal Markup - Add Control Points
body_text: The polygon markup feature allows you to draw a shape with multiple control points, but if you need to adjust you cannot add control points. It would be nice to able to add control points to submittal markup shapes.

title: Autodesk needs to fix Desktop Connector in Virtual Environments
body_text: Autodesk needs to fix Desktop Connector in Virtual Environments. This has worked for years until just recently with the newer versions of Desktop Connector. Now every day each user must repair Desktop Connector. This is inefficient and time consuming. When will this be fixed? Autodesk Desktop Connector crashes in Virtual Environment

title: Takeoff Link to Build Sheets
body_text: When creating a Takeoff package, the only way to add sheets is to upload new files or link to a PDF in Docs. If the Build module is activated, it would be nice to have an option to link to the sheets that have been published to Sheets.

title: Submittal Markups - text boarder, callout hold leader
body_text: Add the ability to put a boarder around text boxes in the submittal markups For the callout, setting the arrow to the desired location and then moving the text box but holding the arrow would be helpfull in getting the callout to the desired location. currently you have to move the callout text box, then move the next control point on the leader, then move the arrow to the desired location.

title: Submittal Reviewer Re-assign
body_text: It would be helpful if the submittal reviewer had the ability to reassign the "reviewer" to someone else. At least to any project member under the same company as the listed reviewer.

title: Mobile App // Sheets // Better Search and Tags
body_text: The mobile app needs better tools for finding Sheets using Search and Tags to match the desktop experience. There are two features that need to be added: Filters > Tags needs the ' Results must include all tags ' checkbox, so that it can be turned OFF . Saved Searches.

title: Coordination Issues // Add Next & Previous buttons
body_text: This is a request for an ongoing and very old usability problem with coordination issues. The below image is from Model Coordination, where an Issue is displayed. To move to the next/previous issue you must use the back button and then open another Issue. This process is painfully slow. The below image is from Navisworks using the Coordination Issues add-in. It is exactly the same, but it has previous/next buttons so we can move rapidly through the issues. We need this in Model Coordination for

title: Improvement the Project Model feature by supporting the publishing instances in the "master model view"
body_text: I am convinced that working with a method - the Shared Positioning links in a different locations in the main Revit model, makes work easier and more productively, instead working with Create Group (for example) This method allows to work on reduced a files sizes and make changes in the different main Revit models simultaneously. I believe that Autodesk is able to improve the Project Model feature, and will support the publishing instances in the "master model view".

title: Advance Steel support for web publishing
body_text: I have noticed that when publishing using Sheet Set Manager for Web, Advance Steel detail objects do not appear on the published sheets. I know AS is in maintenance mode, but being able to publish drawings produced in AS is fundamental, and finding workarounds is proving challenging. I assume it would just be a matter of incorporating the functionality of the AS object enabler into the web publishing handler.

title: Set scale
body_text: In Autodesk Construction Cloud, can you add the scale 1:125 and 1:250 in the "set scale" of sheets, that would be very usefull

title: Extract activity log for each payment application in xls or pdf format
body_text: Please add the ability to extract the activity log for each payment application in XLS or PDF format. Currently, there is no option to export this detailed information, which is crucial for tracking and auditing purposes. Being able to extract the activity log would provide a clear record of all actions taken, enhance transparency, and simplify the review process for project managers and stakeholders.

title: Extract Payment Application (Budget and Cost) in xls format
body_text: Please add the ability to extract Payment Applications (Budget and Cost) in XLS format. Currently, only the budget and main contract overview can be exported as XLS files. It would be highly beneficial to extend this capability to include payment applications as well.

title: Automate Model Prep for Transmittal
body_text: There is a need to prepare models for transmittal without having to download entire project and then do E-transmit on the model. The effort of downloading is time consuming. This could be tied into the Transmittal process. This would be a huge time savings on those of us managing models. The requirements are similar to the E-transmit tool. - Delete Sheets and/or Views - Purge projects. - include necessary links This is a big deal for many firms. I know on my projects I have contract requirements

title: Built in Template Builder should have sequential Collaboration Model
body_text: Some users prefer to have sequential collaboration to control editors at a time.

title: Search Operators
body_text: Add search operators such as quotations (" ") and wildcards (*, ?).

title: Assets
body_text: I am creating assets on build, and it has turned to be a tedious process. There is a duplicate button but the problem with that is a couple of things. 1. You can't mass change the title of an asset when you are creating it. Which is weird to me because you can change the location and description in bulk when you highlight everything you want but not the title of it? 2. When you duplicate something the title of it becomes "copy of..." whatever the original title is. It is extremely counter intuit

title: I want to change the sender of the automatic email to the organizer.
body_text: The Meetings feature in Autodesk Build automatically sends meeting invitations to invitees, but the email they receive is labeled "Autodesk Consutruction Cloud". It is difficult to tell who sent the email, so we would like to be able to change the sender to the organizer.

title: Custom field- searchable
body_text: I have a droplist custom field with around 40 item (packages from submittal module that not exist in RFI And issues) and it's difficult to scroll down to find the relevant package, please add search function to make it easy.

title: Cost Management Custom column
body_text: Creating custom column which is not formula based so that they can manually input the values in the Budget tab same as adding values in unit cost.

title: Make Packages Searchable
body_text: Those with Collaborate licenses can designate files to reuse in future packages. They will need to locate these packages in the time liner before they can be reused. One can subscribe to package shares and consumption and get email notifications, but if one creates the package oneself, one does not get a notification. If one of the recipients subscribes and searches for the mail notification, they can search by package name and see the date of the package share, and then the package can be reuse

title: STEP file Viewability on Mobile
body_text: NWD files, IPT files, ASM (1st level) and IDW files are all viewable on mobile, but STEP files are not currently viewable on Mobile. Perhaps that would be something worthwhile for some of us. Having 3D viewing capabilities of STEP files on Mobile would simplify the steps needed to provide access to models, without having to go through the steps like adding the file into Navis or import into inventor and re-upload to Docs.

title: ACC API Forum
body_text: Hope you are doing well! @handjonathan The request is to create a Forum for ACC API similar to the BIM 360 API Forum in the BIM 360 section of the Autodesk Community Forum. The existing BIM 360 API forum, while valuable, often focuses on broader BIM 360 functionalities. A dedicated ACC API forum would provide a more targeted space for developers working specifically with the API. The increasing adoption of the ACC API highlights the growing need for a dedicated support and knowledge-sharing plat

title: Add functionality for stamping comments and GPS data into photos
body_text: Add functionality for stamping comments and GPS data into photos

title: When referencing assets add functionality to allow filtering
body_text: When referencing assets add functionality to allow filtering so it's easier to find the asset you are trying to reference.

title: Add functionality to filter by a single date instead of date range only
body_text: Add functionality to filter by a single date instead of date range only. Currently, you can only filter by date range. Filtering by a single date would be helpful.

title: Variable in Forms
body_text: Feature request to be able to use variable (just like in cost management) to create forms that will mimic and look similar to existing company branded forms or client specific forms.

title: SORT Issues by Placement Field(alphabetical)
body_text: Currently, ACC Issues can only be sorted by Issue Number, description, status, due date but not by the Placement field. We want to see a list of issues on a document in a package- in order and the only way to do this is to export issues to excel.

title: Allowing adding multiple groups to "Assigned to" sector when issuing clash detections
body_text: Required to assign the issue to multiple disciplines; Lighting vs MVAC. The Issue field only allows user to select one group(ROLE). In common sense, there will be more clashes between disciplines rather than between the models in the same discipline. Need a function to select multiple roles.

title: Share Photo's out of the hub of Build
body_text: For some companies it would be useful to be able to share a public link to a photo. For example: a company is making photo of an existing construction site and they place a reference on a sheet drawing, with the photo attached. After exporting to PDF, there is a link to the photo. However this link is (logically) at the moment not public. It would be cool and helpful if this could be available in the future. Bottom line: more control about permissions in sharing Photo's within Build

title: Support WEBP images
body_text: I just found out that ACC Docs cannot show pictures in .webp format. Change that as this seems to be very common nowadays. Windows' own image viewer can show these files, so can the web browsers.

title: Include in ACC Viewer the possibility to read Sets of Navisworks
body_text: Currently the ACC Viewer only read Viewpoints Will be great add the feature to read SETS created in NWDs

title: Add Project Brief and Project Roles to Autodesk Build Home Page
body_text: The Autodesk Build Home page is a good start, but it needs a couple of things. Check out what Asana does for the Project Overview tab . It's a great place for team members to see who's filling Project Roles, and for the project brief . The way they allow for simply dragging and dropping the topics to the brief with a quick description of what you should be writing really makes it easy to quickly create the document. Having a Project Brief is critical for these projects so as of now I'm just addi

title: Fields in XLXS Issue Reports
body_text: ADD Created by FIELD TO DE XLXS ISSUE REPORT Since the person who created the Issue in ACC are the only ones (with the exception of projet Admins) that can close them, is importat to have this field added to the XLXS report so as a team whe can follow up all the issues that were created and wich of them can be closed by it creator.

title: Mandated file Description, Status and Revision
body_text: When implementing the 'Naming Standard' in Docs/Files to have the ability to mandate the Description, Status and Revision.

title: Comprehensive Reference Display: Accessing Associated Elements for Selected Plans or Project Files
body_text: Ability to Display All Associated References When Selecting a Plan or Project File (Forms, Photos, Objects, etc.)

title: Enhancing Plan Permissions: Tailoring Visibility for Individuals
body_text: It would be helpful to refine permissions within plans so that individuals can only see the plans that are unlocked for them, rather than all plans.

title: Reschedule date of item in meeting minutes
body_text: I would like to reschedule the date of an item in the meeting minutes, keeping the initial date. Then if I need to revise the date, I'll still have the initial delivery date. It would be a due date and a review date.

title: Sheets tagging (ADD CHECK BOX FOR APPLYING SAME TAGS TO MULTIPLE SHEETS)
body_text: Currently, you're forced to select each tag manually instead of having a check box that applies the selected tags to multiple sheets. This is very time consuming, also typing in the tag number in the tag box does not retain the text to select multiple tags at one time. It resets the searched tag, once selecting a single tag! annoying... This is common sense functionality. Please add this function! Also the "AI" acc needs to look at every title box and sheet number again? when our sheet title box

title: adding "align to surface" for the sectioning tools in ACC model viewer
body_text: adding "align to surface" for the sectioning tools in ACC model viewer

title: Add a cover photo to the project's Home page
body_text: I'd like to have the feature to add a cover photo to the project's Home page so that all the project members can easily identify the projects.

title: Members Tab - Access Level Sorting
body_text: Please enable sorting for the "Access Level" column under the members tab.

title: Improve the model coordination "Transform" Feature
body_text: I am experiencing a lot of problems with the model coordinator right now, i am working with "Tekla" .ifc models and ACC is having difficulties reading the rotation of the .ifc file. That wouldn't really be that big of a problem except the transform tool is really lacking in it's abilities. The rotate tool is really bad and way to complicated, just have a normal rotate tool where you can rotate where the axis of rotation is not the global zero but in the center of the model it´self.

title: Project Executive/Administrator requires a concise summary of pending tasks for all project members for all projects in the oraganization
body_text: Executive Member should be able to get a brief of all the projects in a single TAB, pertaining to pending actions of project members for each project.

title: GPS Coordinates on Assets
body_text: Similar to the ability to add GPS coordinates to Issues, allow for GPS coordinates to be added to Assets. This will allow for tracking of materials on site through scanning of barcodes and adding the current location.

title: Non-hosted linked model publish
body_text: Find a way for models that are linked but not hosted on ACC to be published in cloud workshared model.

title: Don't get out of issue view when clicking on an element to show properties
body_text: When you click on an issue, and the issue view is opened (the view that was used to create the issue) and that view has a section applied. When you click on an issue, the section is removed. Currently, I need to have three browser tabs open when running a meeting: one to check the issue number, the second to navigate to the issue and the third to check the properties of an element! It's extremely counterproductive. We should have a toggle in the navigation bar to switch between the issue view an

title: Hide 'Holding Area' in Files unless Naming Standard activity
body_text: Hide 'Holding Area' in Files unless Naming Standard activity

title: Is there a way we can stop people from initiating a Review from certain folders?
body_text: We have noticed that some members of our team have been initiating Reviews from the incorrect folder. Is there a possibility we can stop this?

title: Suggestions to Improve Forms
body_text: Since myself and my team have been using the ‘Forms’ function more on ACC, we have came across some blockers along the way. For example when I am creating a template in forms, for one of my questions I chose the ‘drop-down’ option. I then realised that you can only have 10 options for this selection. This is also the same for single-select response option. This is slightly frustrating when we do need more options to fulfil the question appropriately. Another query that I came across was if makin

title: Member Report showing license
body_text: It would be really handy to be able to sort or have a report that shows those members that have a license, in our case an unlimited license or a trial license. This would Allow us to be proactive that a member invited to our project will continue to have access to the project rather than the trial version stopping and access denied.

title: Allow editing .RTF files as well
body_text: While native Microsoft Word files can be edited from within Docs, open rich text format files cannot. The idea would be to remedy that.

title: Assignee Role Indicator on Home Screen Dashboard
body_text: I would like if i assign a role to an Issue or Review Process, that outstanding item appears on that person assigned to the roles home dashboard. Currently if start a review process and a designer needs to review a drawing first, the designer on the project will not see an open action item on their home screen. this will cause the action item to go unnoticed and not be worked.

title: Filter models by model properties
body_text: Problem statement & desired action/outcome : To be able to do takeoff on 3D object based on the detailed parameters. Lets say the same door type have beeen used, but a item parameter define the fire rating of the door. The user would then like to make a take-off for easy fire rating level and add the doors that fit that rating. Please have a look at what the Docs viewer does with the parameter breakdown. This would be a good start to filter the object based on the users own filters. Current issu

title: RFIs - Default Watchers
body_text: Have the ability to configure default watchers for an RFI instead of creating them every time over and over again. There are cases when there are dozens of watchers.

title: Add date ranges to labor rates
body_text: Account Admin>Library>Preconstruction>Costs>Labor contains a template with labor type, standard rate, union rate, and prevailing rate. These rates are already defined by the state department of labor and escalate yearly. There should be a way to input one labor type with rates for date ranges so we can accurately project costs based on the project schedule.

title: Extracting Attributes under "Capture Title Block"
body_text: Working under "Build" and the "Files" module. When you go to extract pages and attributes there is no attribute to extract "Description". Please add "description" as something you can extract from a file as it is one of the core attributes.

title: Project name in the naming convention area
body_text: The area where the naming convention is followed could contain only the project name.

title: Request for More Granular Admin Roles in Autodesk Account (manage.autodesk.com)
body_text: The Autodesk Account administration framework within manage autodesk lacks adequate permission granularity between the User and Secondary Admin roles. Organizations must elevate users to Secondary Admin simply so they can perform routine user and product management tasks. This creates unnecessary security exposure, increases compliance risk, and violates least privilege principles. Autodesk customers need an intermediate permission level that enables operational management without granting high-

title: Need the ability in Insight Builder to join two data sets
body_text: As a company, we run a large number of relatively small projects. Insight builder is a great start down that path for us. Where are coming into challenges is that we cannot use more that one dataset in the same visualization. An example: We want a data quality report that shows all the projects that DO NOT have a schedule created yet. The admin-projects data set contains all projects, but doesn't have the schedules. The schedules data set only include the projects for which there is already a sc

title: Daily Log Forms auto-generation/assignment
body_text: Ability to automate forms (ex. daily logs) and assign them to companies/subs so it is easier to see when a sub is delinquent in their daily logs.

title: Submittal Default - Due date per step
body_text: Instead of having a due date for the full workflow from the start of the submittal until it's been closed, additional default options should be there available for the admins to set up the default workflows, similar to how Reviews are configured, with due dates per each step in addition to the overall due date, so we can track if a submittal is due at a certain stage, and not overall.

title: Custom Views - Won Tab
body_text: On Bid Board Pro - Won tab. It would be helpful to have the "Outcome Date" be a column and be added into the custom views. Currently you cannot filter the won tab by outcome date. You are unable to filter to see your most recent wins.

title: Retainage
body_text: Currently, trades with collaborative permissions on their payment applications can reduce their retainage , even if “Enable Retention Release” is toggled off. This can create risk and confusion , especially if a PM does not review invoices promptly. Trades should never have the ability to modify retainage , regardless of their permissions. Retainage adjustments should remain under the control of the PM or authorized approver only. Proposed Improvement: Only PMs or authorized approvers should be

title: Allow setup of default view for all users in Assets
body_text: Unlike in Issues, custom attributes added and rearranged in the Assets module does not change the view for all users. This makes it impossible for a project admin to set up a standardised experience with all needed fields visible to the project team and greatly detracts from the usability of the module

title: See all Locked files Associated with Account
body_text: Files often remain locked by accident - it would be incredibly helpful if there was a place that showed all the locked files associated with you account where users can unlock them on mass. This should work similar to ProjectWise's Local Document Organiser tool. A bonus would be that project admins could see the files locked and how long for for each project.

title: Create New Folder When Saving Submittals
body_text: When saving RFIs, we have the ability to create a new folder and save to it; however, we can't do the same with submittals - we have to create the new folder under Files prior to going into Submittals and saving the submittal. Could you add the ability to create a new folder when saving submittals as well?

title: ACC Template builder to support a sequential editing template creation
body_text: Sequential Editing templates need to be supported in the Template Builder on ACC.

title: Enable the iOS gyroscope feature on mobile devices using the "New Model Viewer"
body_text: When using the "New Model Viewer" on a mobile device the Gyroscope feature isn't supported - For field use - this feature is very useful for new users while navigating systems.

title: Escalas 1:25 y 1:75 en las opciones de calibración en Shets
body_text: Actualmente en acc Build, en Sheet existen ciertas escalas por defecto para poder calibrar los laminados, y la otra opción es hacerlo mediante dos puntos, pero esta última opción no es exacto, ya que los dos puntos que se colocan no son excatos lo cual genera errores. Seria de mucha utilidad tener las escalas 1:25 y 1:75 ya que son escalas comunes que deberían existir y facilitarían mucho en la gestión de la información en las obras y mas aún hoy en día que usamos los dispositivos móviles a trav

title: Lock Mark-ups on Sheets
body_text: We have recently noticed that anybody with create permissions on sheets can move around or even delete a tag we have created in Sheets for an RFI/submittal that are relevant to that location/detail, etc. We would like the ability to lock these mark-ups so that they do not accidentally get moved.

title: Optimize Recap Project Point Cloud Viewing
body_text: When uploading a Recap project to ACC, works as expected. However, the performance loading the Recap project in ACC to view is not great. It appears ACC is loading the raw point cloud data for viewing, which is inherently heavy data. If ACC was able to create a temporary mesh of the point cloud data to view, rather than the raw point cloud data, performance would be drastically improved in the web browser. Ideally, there would be a toggle if someone wanted to see the "view mesh" or the raw point

title: Option to Disable Automatic Expansion of Subfolders in Files
body_text: When opening a project in Autodesk Construction Cloud > Files, the folder tree automatically expands all subfolders by default. For projects with large or deeply nested folder structures, this results in a cluttered and difficult-to-navigate folder tree. Currently, users must manually collapse folders every time they access Files, which is inefficient and time-consuming on active projects with many directories. Please add an option to control folder expansion behavior, such as: A user preference

title: Project Access
body_text: Allow users to choose to remove themselves from a projects.

title: Allow Export of schedule to excel
body_text: It would be useful to allow the exporting of schedules into excel , particularly if the user has minimised items not relevant to them so that they can then export and use the data they need. Additionally if this export also showed any assets linked to elements on the schedule and the status of them this would also be a big game changer for project and materials management

title: Create Assets from IFCSpaces
body_text: Assets is a very useful function for linking information (issues, tasks, forms, etc.) in one place. During the interior construction of a project, we usually think in terms of rooms, so we represent a room list as assets. Currently, it is not possible to generate a room list in assets from a 3D model (IFCspaces) because the IFCspaces are not displayed in the mapping process within the assets function. They are not treated as physical objects within the Autodesk Construction Cloud viewer. It woul

title: ACC Form improvements request
body_text: Hello, Autodesk Build's form module is a very useful tool. However, with the following if resolving the following issues, it can be even more powerful. 1. Adding multiple worklogs in same form Currently ACC Forms cannot add multiple worklogs in same form. Eg 01: Daily Progress update by Sub Contractor A, Sub Contractor B Eg 02: Daily Progress update by Day Shift, Night Shift. 2. Cannot add additional units in material logs, such as “kg” 3. No Revision history in forms. In ACC forms for tracking

title: As-Built & Handover Progress Visibility and Time Estimation
body_text: Request the ability to view real-time progress and status when generating or downloading As-Built and Handover packages in Autodesk Construction Cloud. The feature should include: A progress indicator showing the current status (e.g., preparing, processing, packaging, downloading). An estimated time or time range based on file size and number of files. In-platform status visibility instead of relying only on email notifications upon completion.

title: Public Plan Room
body_text: My suggestion is to remove the Owning Office column in the Public PlanRoom and put the project location (city) in it's place. It can be confusing to subcontractors when they see owning office and think that is the project location and will not entertain the idea of bidding a project based on this information

title: Add Cost Items to "Assigned to Me" card on Autodesk Homepage
body_text: Currently, the “Assigned to Me” card on the Autodesk Home page only displays items from the Build module. Our team frequently reviews and approves items in the Cost module and having those Cost items appear in the same “Assigned to Me” view would be extremely valuable. In Cost approval workflows, items often move back and forth between the same reviewers. Email is the primary notification method, but with a high volume of daily emails, these notifications can easily be missed, leading to delays.

title: Add Photos as a Reference in Packages
body_text: Today, there does not seem to be an ability to create a Package and have Photos as a Reference linked to them. This would be a nice functionality to have - seems similar to other modules that are able to Reference photos. I did a roundabout way, by creating an Issue, and then referencing a bunch of photos within the Issue, then I referenced that Issue in my package. This does not fit my vision state for the tool capability.

title: Addition of company scope of work to be listed in a bid package along with their info: Notes/ History/ Certificates/ Invitees
body_text: Hello, I would like to suggest the addition of the Performed Scopes of Work to be listed under the company info when selecting a company in a bid package. I find myself clicking on the company profile to confirm that their scope is correct. Often times, companies will add themselves to a bid package and they offer different services than the bid package that they add themselves to. Which makes it more work on my end to research the company by looking into their company profile for their offered

title: Subcontractor NDA for releasing financial statements
body_text: Please put in a request that this functionality be implemented for subcontractors. We should be able to decide who receives our financial information upon receiving an executed NDA. This is a significant limitation of BuildingConnected. Subcontractors should be able to control its protected confidential information to those they decide to do business with. Current setup does not allow subcontractors the ability to control the release of financial statements until an executed NDA with a contracto

title: Vectoring Mobile App
body_text: The ability to turn vectoring on/off in the mobile app. This will allow users to see text for unsupported fonts.

title: Issues metadata when Users are removed form a project
body_text: When we remove a user from a project we loose the metatdata showing the creator of the Issue. It will instead show unknown user. RFIs & Submittals show the user name(removed) as the metatdata and it would be good to have this across Issues as well.

title: Practical design expertise
body_text: As technology evolves, the demand for practical design expertise will continue to grow. AI, automation, and sustainable materials are changing the way designers approach problems.

title: Practical design expertise
body_text: As technology evolves, the demand for practical design expertise will continue to grow. AI, automation, and sustainable materials are changing the way designers approach problems.

title: UNIVERSAL FOLDER ATTRIBUTE SETTINGS
body_text: I would like to request the option for UNIVERSAL FOLDER ATTRIBUTE SETTINGS in ACC Docs that can be set by Project Admin. This would mean Project Admin can set the specific folder attribute fields AND the order that they appear in ACC docs which would be locked and viewable by ALL project users. The UNIVERSAL FOLDER ATTRIBUTE SETTINGS would not just be set from the project template - but be able to be adjusted at any time in a project, by Project Admin which would update the folder for all users

title: Text Enhancements
body_text: Add additional text editing tools - highlighting, color of text. Being able to highlight text or change text color would be very helpful in order to stress importance in our messages. Just being able to bold or underline isn’t enough.

title: Download all the bidforms I have created in my
body_text: I need the ability to download all bidforms that I create in my projects. I taylor many of my bidforms to the project as well as spend a ridiculous amount of time transposing 1 bid format to what my bidform format.

title: Historical dates that were replanned in the committed tasks/milestones to be visible in a log and swimlane
body_text: Recently we received an update in Schedules tool which allow user to commit to a task or milestone in a workplan. We found it a great update, but we noticed although when re-planning a committed task/milestone, ACC asks us to enter the new data and the root cause for the change, but after the change, there is no way we can see the history and the re-planned dates. We would preferably want to have that history visible both in the task/milestone panel itself but also a marker (such as a red dot or

title: ACC BUILD Improvements
body_text: - Ensure that the filter created from a plan is applied to existing filters in the PROBLEMS list. - Display PROBLEMS directly in the plan list, with a colored dot corresponding to their status and the number of associated reservations. - Include the PROBLEM number in the dot, not its type. - Simplify reporting. These limitations are major drawbacks and hinder the large-scale deployment of this solution within the group.

title: Building Connected Automatic Push Notification for Due Date Updates
body_text: Basic idea is that if the creator of the job updates the due date an email is automatically sent to all people who have accepted the opportunity. Or give people the option to opt into sending those automatically when date is changed and/or allowing bidders to opt out of receiving auto updates if they are attached to the job at a high level. I believe that currently the GC is responsible for sending a message with the update which seems like a menial task that could be missed. If sent with a spec

title: Non-ACC Users (Public) Upload to Files
body_text: While we have public downloads, it would be extremely beneficial to have the ability to have non-ACC users be able to upload files to a folder within Files via a link that is sent to their email. Only the person that the upload request is sent to would be able to upload to a Folder that is specified by the link that is sent. This would be very helpful for those people that don't need to be added to the ACC project, but do need to share a file with the project team. Really don't want to have to f

title: Automated Email Notifications for Asset Status Changes
body_text: I am currently working within the Assets module of Autodesk Build and would like to know more about how the notification workflows. Specifically, I am looking to set up an automated email notification that triggers whenever the status of a specific asset is updated. I've already created a custom status. I would like for this notification to be sent directly to my entire team or a specific distribution group to ensure everyone is informed of the change in real-time.

title: ACC Project Admin Activity Log - Filter by Issue Status Changed to Completed
body_text: It's possible to filter the activity log for Issue status changed to every other available status except Completed, which is equally of interest to see activity for. Can this status be added as an option?

title: Pressure washing service
body_text: How can I configure my account to receive quote requests for pressure washing services? If anyone has already set this up, could you please guide me? It would be even better if it could be added to the dropdown menu.

title: Ability to add default due date to Form Templates
body_text: Would like see the ability to add a default due date to Form Templates, so when a form is created from a template, the due date (e.g., 10 days from creation) is automatically applied. This would help avoid the problem of excessively late forms, as well as users avoiding accountability/ownership by not manually entering due date in Basic Information on form creation.

title: Delete/Hide Transmittals
body_text: One of my colleagues suggested the ability to delete/hide transmittals that were created in error or the information is not accurate. Sometimes we create transmittals that are deemed invalid because we cannot modify the content or it is irrelevant based on internal conversations.

title: Systems functionality
body_text: It seems the new Systems functionality has limitations which means it cannot be used as we had anticipated as you cannot assign QR codes to systems or link schedules or sheets to a System only assets which almost defeats the purpose of adding this new ability to group things together. I pulled together some slides during my investigations to try and explain what we expected it to be able to do. I suggest that systems to have the same functionality as assets so that you can link to them and creat

title: TradeTapp - Respond to notes
body_text: When a prequalification is submitted and the contractor reviews it and wants corrections. They add notes in the prequal form. It would be good to be able to respond to those notes right in the form because 90% of the time the correction or request is incorrect.

title: Import Issues
body_text: Currently, it is not possible to transfer issues from one Coordination Space to another within Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC). This limitation creates challenges when managing coordination workflows across multiple spaces or phases of a project. Proposed Solution: Introduce functionality to import issues using BCF files between: Model Coordination spaces and Docs models. This matters because: Improved Workflow Flexibility: Projects often require reorganizing models or creating new coordinatio

title: Contracts
body_text: The SOV limit per contract is currently set to 3,500 line items, which is insufficient for many projects, as some contracts may require more than 30,000 line items.

title: Change Order
body_text: In the Change Order tab, PCO, OCO, SCO, and RFQ numbers cannot be automatically generated based on the contract type. Instead, they are numbered sequentially by creation date, regardless of contract type. This is a limitation, especially when managing multiple contract types, each of which requires its own numbering system. Otherwise, the numbers must be assigned manually, increasing the risk of human errors. In the Change Order tab, the Compliance feature is currently available only for RFQ and

title: Expense tab
body_text: In the Expense tab, the available permission options are limited to View All and Full Control. However, there is a need for a permission level that allows the initiator to create an expense without being granted full control. There is also a need to control permissions at the contract level, since there may be many expenses across multiple contracts, and visibility needs to be restricted accordingly.

title: Cost Payment Application
body_text: Cost payment Application The initiator must be granted Full Control permissions in order to edit Custom Attributes, which does not reflect real-world practices. The Compliance feature is only applicable to the initiator; however, in practice, compliance may be required at each step of the review process, and based on the invoice (Cost Payment application) type. when populating an invoice (Cost Payment Application) using the Excel template, we can only enter the current value (work completed in t

title: Option to show Issue Photos within Form Export
body_text: When you export a Forms Report and there are issues within the forms you only get a link to the issues. Would it be useful when exporting the report if you had the option to select give detailed view of issues. This would be useful so you wouldn't have to do a second report to export the issues.

title: Option to Disable Grid Shadows in ACC Viewer
body_text: Add a viewer option in the Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) Viewer that allows users to disable shadows for grid elements. This setting should be available in the Viewer options and enable grids to remain visible while no longer casting or receiving shadows, without affecting other model elements or the underlying data. The functionality would improve grid readability and visual clarity, especially in shaded or realistic view modes and in complex models, supporting more efficient navigation, co

title: Minecraft 1.21.31 APK: nueva versión para explorar y crear
body_text: Minecraft 1.21.31 APK llega como una actualización interesante para los jugadores que disfrutan de la creatividad y la exploración sin límites en dispositivos Android. Esta versión mantiene la esencia clásica del juego, pero incorpora ajustes y mejoras que ayudan a que la experiencia sea más fluida y estable. Uno de los puntos más destacados es su buen rendimiento en distintos tipos de dispositivos. Tanto en móviles como en tablets, Minecraft 1.21.31 ofrece una jugabilidad equilibrada, con tiemp

title: IpadのACCappで承認行為を行う
body_text: 日本語が出来ませんので、 PDF 内の文章は google翻訳 してお送りしています １ 前半の３枚は PC を使用したchromeブラウザの画面になります。私が求めているのは「レビュー」→「完了」です ２ 後半の３枚は iPad の ACCapp を利用した画面になります。「レビュー」→「完了」がなく「保留中」という文字になっており承認できません。 ３ 今回の PDF にはありませんが、 iPad でも ACCapp を利用せずchromeで操作することでPCと同じ画面に進むことができましたが、問題があります。 ４ 相手から送信されたメールの URL リンクを強制的に開いて ACCapp を 開いてしまうため「２」へ進むことに なり ます 。 PDFが送信できませんでした。この文章がわからない場合はemailにて連絡ください。PDFを送付いたします

title: ACC Build - Split View
body_text: It would be extremely helpful if we could open sheets and files at the same time so we could compare information from both places. I'm sure there are many other reasons that a split view would come in handy too. You can do this on Bluebeam.

title: ACC Build Mobile - Tool Bar Always On
body_text: It is very helpful to have a tool bar always on so we can navigate back and forth between tabs quickly. Example: When inside sheets I want to access a file and instead of clicking the back arrow, I have the option to have the bottom toolbar always on so I can just click one of the items in the tool bar like files or issues.

title: Dimension Markup Text Edit
body_text: Ability to override/edit the dimension text on dimension/measure markups to allow revised dimensioning to be conveyed via markups. (Previously available in BIM360.)

title: Monitor/restore voided RFIs
body_text: As an Admin I need to be able to see all voided RFIs. They may have been voided (deleted) by accident, and I need a way to monitor this and bring them back if needed. As this information is not stored within the RFI tool, and not tracked within Activity, how am I supposed to properly manage (and get notified) each time an RFI is voided?

title: Exporting
body_text: I need the verbiage I wrote in Ratings for vendors to show when exporting, as exporting only shows the stars, so then what is the point of writing in the verbiage....very frustrating

title: Sending a Teams link directly to subcontractors invited on a Bid.  - KL
body_text: Sending a "Teams link" directly to subcontractors invited on a Bid. (Or i.e. Zoom link) Not in a Message sent with a document attached and the link within the document. But an actual link invite directly.

title: Tracking changes within RFIs as an admin
body_text: Currently, as an CDE administrator, I have no way of tracking or getting notified whenever a team member makes a change within an RFI. I don't get notified when one has been created, answered, returned etc. The Activity centre does not capture any changes to these, so if I wanted to know if any of the RFIs have progressed, I need to sort by 'updated on' and check them manually. This is not efficient as I end up doing this manual checking process daily to make sure I am aware of all activities. I

title: Meetings: Allow inviting roles & companies and/or create a separate setting for visibility
body_text: We can currently only invite individuals to meetings on ACC. This means in order to share visibility of the minutes with for example the client team or project management team, we need to add each member to each meeting so they can view the minutes. They will not attend the meetings but they require visibility. Currently this wastes a lot of time, adding countless of people to each meeting we know won't attend. Could we either allow for roles & companies to be invited, or create another section

title: 指摘事項_アドレスでの一括割り当て
body_text: 現時点では指摘事項で複数の担当者を一括で割り当てるには 役割や会社名を統一するしかないが、 複数のメンバーのメールアドレスを一括で登録できる機能を追加してほしいです。 例えば、Excelデータでの取り込み、スペース等でメールアドレスを区切り貼り付けることで一括で割り当てることを可能にしたいです。

title: Enable the ability to reference a file package to a meeting agenda.
body_text: Currently, files & sheets can be referenced at the meeting and item levels within a meeting agenda. As a minimum enhancement, it would be logical to enable referencing a file package at the meeting level.

title: As-Built Export Filter or Split
body_text: Document Selection and Preview Capability Introduce an option within the As-Built / Handover tool to allow users to select and preview individual files prior to generating the final as-built package. This will enable early verification of documents and help prevent export errors, file size limitations, and system threshold exceed issues during the compilation process. Date-Based Filtering for As-Built Generation Add a date range filter to allow users to generate as-built documentation for a spec

title: Building Connected Pro - Bid Board - Grouping Bids
body_text: In Bid Board Pro - Adding in Grouping to the bulk actions drop down list. Instead of searching for each bid to group together, can the check boxes on the left hand side be used to group projects together? This would be done by checking the boxes on the left hand side then selecting "Bulk Actions" Then group.

title: ACC Build - iPad/Web App - Add Multiple Assigned To
body_text: There are several QC's that we write that two separate trades need to know about. For example, during punch list we will write one for point up and paint, but we can't add the drywaller and the painter because it only allows for one company/person to be selected. In PlanGrid we were allowed to select up to two companies/people, so this feels like a downgrade not having this option.

title: ACC Build - iPad/Web App - Files Sheet Tag
body_text: We keep our RFI’s in files. On PlanGrid we were able to see if the RFI (in documents) was tagged to the sheet and which sheets it was tagged to. We can no longer see this on Build. It is a nice check to make sure the RFI has been tagged to the needed sheets and it makes it simple to click on the hyperlink (from the tagged sheet) to jump to that sheet after reading the RFI.

title: ACC Build - iPad/Web App - Add Issue to Specifications
body_text: It's necessary to add an issue tag to a specification, but it's not possible to do so. Several times there is an issue that correlates to a specification, and it can't be tagged directly to the spec like we would a drawing.

title: Building Connected - Bid Packages in Subject Line
body_text: When a subcontractor sends a message via building connected, the message is received as an email notification inside building connected and it does not specify what bid package they are assigned to. In addition, there is no way to filter by bid packages on the messages.

title: Cost Payment Application - Request for Info log
body_text: I would like to have a log that I could print to show the subcontractor that I requested a pay application from them, but that they never submitted one.

title: Void a Cost Payment Application
body_text: I would like to be able to void a submitted pay request to keep the back up and information logged.

title: ACC Build - Web App - Printed Issue Field Order
body_text: We are able to create custom fields which is great, but not being able to have those fields at the top or where you want when it prints is annoying. For our Quality Issues, we have conforming or non-conforming. The reports are printed off with standard fields and custom fields after. It would be best if we can move custom fields within the standard fields so the report shows how we want it to display. When reading a QC report, you don't want to wait to scroll to the bottom of the information (cu

title: ACC Build - iPad/Web App - Order photos during issue export
body_text: When exporting an issue from Autodesk Build, it would be a very, very helpful option for picking the order the pictures will be printed. While completing a QC, we screen shot the approved product data and/or shop drawings and highlight items that show what we are taking of picture of in the field to verify the product matches the install. It would be great to put this side by side instead of the picture of the material in the field at the top and 10 pictures down the highlighted material on the

title: ACC Build iPad - Files Swipe Left/Right
body_text: On the iPad - on Plangrid we used to swipe left and right when opening up a pdf to navigate to the next page. Now you swipe up and down on PlanGrid and Build. Why do you swipe left and right on the plans and then swipe up and down on files ? This makes it more difficult for new users and people who don’t work with technology often. I would suggest keeping the same motion to view information.

title: ACC Build - Customized Quick Button for Sheets
body_text: On iPad and computer - We have sheets covered in issues. We would like a custom “quick button” to only show “open issues and the red lines” at the same time. We mostly only care to view open issues on the drawings with the RFI’s. The quick button should be at the top so it’s one click and not needed to go into other tabs to get to. The quick button should be customized so that it is similar to the filters that you can do with “only show issue pins” filter, but keep the markups with the issues on

title: ACC Build iPad - Recently Viewed Sheets
body_text: On the iPad - when you open your project there is a "recently viewed sheets" section. This section is very helpful, however, when you go to swipe left or right to the next page nothing happens because it only takes you to that single page. Can we make it so that when clicking "recently viewed sheets" it takes us to that sheet within sheets so we don't have to go back out to the main page to click on that sheet again?

title: Add Budget Codes to Contract via Change Order
body_text: It would be helpful to have the ability to add a new budget code to contract via change order. For example, if an item is purchased using a contract, and the vendor adds a freight charge upon shipment of said item, it would be good to be able to add a freight budget code to that contract with a CO.

title: Archiving action affected multiple opportunities beyond the selected job
body_text: We encountered unexpected behavior in BuildingConnected while archiving an opportunity. An estimator was reviewing and cleaning up previously accepted opportunities and attempted to archive one specific job that was approximately two weeks old. During this action, a system prompt appeared, and the estimator proceeded under the assumption that only the selected opportunity would be archived. After confirming the action, it became apparent that: Multiple opportunities dated into the following week

title: Add Know Your Business (KYB) Capability to Tradetapp
body_text: It seems that a fair amount of effort has gone into classifying business entities in Building Connected and Tradetapp. Is there currently any process in place to compare W-9 submissions with the entity names that are entered into the profiles by each vendor? Furthermore, adding KYB capability--comparing W-9 submissions to Secretaries of State databases--to the Tradetapp prequalification process would be a game-changer. Tradetapp is an ideal platform to add this capability and would add value to

title: Incentivize Owners to Solicit GC Bids via Building Connected
body_text: There should be something offered (a discount perhaps) to Project Owners (municipalities, private owners, etc.) to incentivize them to post their solicitations for General Contractor bids on the Building Connected platform. There currently isn't a good single nationally recognized hub in existence where GCs can go to discover a vast array of potential bidding opportunities (whereas Subcontractors who are using Bid Board Pro do have this). From my experience, most GCs are finding their work from

title: Specifications Upload Error Messages in ACC
body_text: I am trying to upload specifications to ACC and am receiving the red upload failure message for a few of the pdfs that I am uploading. When I receive this message, I need it to tell me what caused the failure so that I can attempt to fix it. Selecting "retry" has failed multiple times. Please fix.

title: Ability to add additional Response Types in Bid Forms
body_text: In the Bid Form supplier price certain materials and units in containers that are not in the Response Types. Due to this it causes conflictions to our Accounting Team and the Supplier's Estimating and Accounting Team when pricing a job. Can there be a function that allows the building connecting host to add additional response types?

title: Cost Vehicle/ Change Order Tracking
body_text: Create a program like Clearstory where users can create potential change orders with a simple narrative and ability to add photos. Assign a responsible contractor and then allow a performing contractor to be added to that issue. Allow fields to add total man hours and labor rates.

title: Easier UI when navigating sheets
body_text: Like Procore, make ACC allow users to return to the previous sheet they were viewing when they click on a linked drawing.

title: Ability to Further Edit "Hit Rate" Formulas
body_text: I would like the ability to further edit the "Hit Rate" formulas. Current formula is wins/wins +losses + submitted (ex: 25wins / 25wins + 75losses + 100submitted) = 13% +/- But shouldn't it be wins/submitted (ex: 25wins / 100submitted) = 25% It's more intuitive. Same for the money.

title: Filters on scope or work
body_text: Idea Summary: As a large industrial painting contractor (FD Thomas), we often receive a high volume of painting bid invitations nationwide through Autodesk Construction Cloud and BuildingConnected. While we want to continue seeing large-scale industrial painting opportunities—such as infrastructure, manufacturing, or energy-related projects—we frequently receive invitations for commercial retail projects (e.g., Tractor Supply, Walmart, 24 Hour Fitness, AutoZone), which fall outside of our target

title: Cut list optimizer
body_text: A Cut list optimizer for linear stock lengths of materials. This would help during the takeoff process of aluminum storefront material when you need to figure out how many 24' (288") stock lengths of material you will need for a job. I currently use an old school method on excel and it is laborious. There are some other programs available, but It would be helpful to keep it all in house when you look at plans on acc.

title: Submittal Filtering by Type - "Select All" capability
body_text: When Filtering Submittals by "Type" - There needs to be a feature to "select all" so that deselecting 1 or more is more efficient. When there is a need to filter out the majority of submittals by "Type" some functionality to support selecting all or clear all would be helpful.

title: ACCの指摘事項について
body_text: データ交換によって生成されたファイル上で指摘事項を作成し、その内容を元のモデルファイルへ反映させたいです

title: Work Performed Task Addition Request
body_text: Hello, my company performs a specialized task that does no appear in your list of tasks under the work performed section. I have been receiving requests and am not sure if they are really asking for our services or not as the only 2 tasks that I could select that would be relevant to us is Consultant and Inspections. Our company provides Accessibility Consulting services, which includes plan reviews and construction walks for compliance with applicable accessibility requirements, such as the Ame

title: Last update - changed layout of bid package
body_text: Regarding the recent update that altered the layout of a specific bid package, the page that displays the list of subcontractors and their bid status. The latest update introduced the Tradeapp qualification, listing that status next to each subcontractor's name in lieu of project specific notes. While I appreciate the efforts to keep everything organized and streamlined, I believe it would be more beneficial to include these project-specific notes in the list rather than the qualification status

title: Assets - Copy/Paste Caching Issues on Web
body_text: When creating checklist forms for assets, we are adding the equipment/asset name to the description field for easy identification. The first one will populate and save with no problem. After that, copying into the field will delete when you click the check or the add reference button. You have to add a space after the last letter/number of the name before creating form. When creating the 3rd one, this workaround doesn't help. In order to get it to stay, you have to click into the description fie

title: ACC Build - Files Sync in Mobile - Ability to sync files anytime in mobile app
body_text: Having to select multiple files if not selected on first sync is a hindrance on field workflow and time.The option to sync files and folders is only "select"able on first sync from Mobile. It can never be changed after that.

title: View Proposals and Message from within Bid Leveling Tab
body_text: I would like to be able to view uploaded proposals from within the bid leveling tab; currently when you click "View Proposal" it downloads the file, but when you click "Create Revision" it does provide a file viewer within the tab. This view window should be present when clicking "View Proposal" as that makes more sense. Additionally, I would like to be able to message subcontractors directly from the Bid Leveling tab; clicking the dropdown should give a "Message" option so that I can give feedb

title: Building Connected - Work Codes
body_text: Good morning. I had put in a trouble ticket regarding work codes and they indicated that I needed to reach out here to get our problem potentially resolved. We are a geotechnical specialty drilling company that performs micropile, anchor, tieback and pressure grouting work. There is not a code of this specific work. We have picked the code for drilling and shoring but we are not getting invites for the type of work we have listed. Is there any way you can put a code for these? I have spoken to a

title: Additional cost types in estimate sheet
body_text: I would like to see the ability to add additional cost types when estimating a project allowing further diversification when it comes to markups and other functions. If not, allowing the renaming of cost type line items per estimate might also prove helpful. For instance, sometimes I will group a certain cost under "other" it would be nice to rename that to what I am grouping there when estimating.

title: Improve Link Generation (Desktop Connector & Web)
body_text: Sharing links to folders and files is currently inefficient and user-unfriendly. Links can only be generated in the web interface and are long, unreadable URLs that provide no context. Users often have to open the same folder twice: once in Windows Explorer (to see the readable path) once in a browser (to generate the link) This creates unnecessary extra steps and confusion for recipients. Proposed Improvements 1. Generate ACC web links directly from Windows Explorer (Desktop Connector) Add a “C

title: Bulk Transfer of Takeoff to a different package
body_text: Currently have takeoffs from one package and want to transfer everything to a different package.

title: BuildingConnected Public Plan Room Office Order
body_text: Please add functionality to allow office locations to be ordered based on importance, not the order they were created.

title: Setting up required attributes with existing files in it.
body_text: Currently its not possible to check required attributes in a folder with files in it. For example: We have some standard files in our ACC template and after we create a new project we want to add required attributes in the folders. Can these standard files be automatically moved to the "Holding Zone" when checking the required attributes for the folder that contain files.

title: Add more condition field options to Auto-Triggers to allow filtering by file format (PDF/DWG)
body_text: We are using auto triggers a lot but finding the available condition fields too limiting. Most urgently, we would like the Auto trigger to filter by file format. For example, we only want to send PDFs to be reviewed, not DWGs. I am proposing a field called "file format" to choose from within the conditions to solve this issue.

title: Find a file
body_text: If I have a specific file name, E.G. *344-EC-DWG-0018* I want to be able to search for that file name in all of the projects to see if I can find it, and therefore know which project a file is sitting in.

title: BuildingConnected - Add functionality for same employees to see information in two or more subsidiary companies
body_text: Current BuildingConnected (BC) Functionality: Each BC, BidBoard (BB) Company must be a separate entity. Domain name and email addresses cannot be duplicated between companies. This functionality keeps each company secure and protects their Intellectual Property. Opportunity for New Functionality Example: Situation: Company A has a paper subsidiary or paper sister company, Company B. Company B exists in name only for accounting structure purposes. Company B has no employees. Company A is set-up i

title: Active Projects Report for BuildingConnected
body_text: It would be helpful to have a Report or an Export Button to export the list of Active Projects to an excel file; see attached as an example.

title: Export Location Mapping from Revit Model into Build
body_text: ACC needs to create an option to import all Revit Model location data (names and boundaries for each location) into Build sheets so that manual location mapping is not necessary. The location information is already exists in the Revit model, so this should not be a complex item to implement. Our staff finds it a complete waste of time to have to map every single location on a sheet and then have to do that same thing over any over to add the location maps to other sheets. At a minimum figure our

title: Asset Assembly / Spools
body_text: I think it would be very helpful to be able to group assets together in assemblies, or spools. When we build something in our fab shop from several pieces or assets, we typically track the entire assembly as one unit once it is assembled. This would be helpful to group assets into spool assemblies so that when you update the status of a spool assembly, the entirety of the assembly and all of it's assets change and update in the model it is mapped to.

title: Desktop Connector Unselect All Projects
body_text: Add an 'Unselect All' button in the 'My Selections' Tab of the Project Selection in Desktop Connector

title: Sent SCOs not in Approved CO column
body_text: @ian_turner Would like ability to make it so that SCOs that are in the "sent" status are not in the approved change order column and they should remain in the pending columns. Desire is to show only executed SCOs are in the approved change order.

title: Transform the individual item in nwc
body_text: I want to transform the individual items under the top model. I can do so in Navisworks, but not in Model Coordination. Is it possible to have the same function as Navisworks?

title: Dramawave (Android App) Problema com importação de vídeo para projetos de visualização
body_text: 👉 👉 BAIXE AGORA 👈 👈 Dramawave é um jogo envolvente que combina narrativa emocionante, escolhas impactantes e visuais vibrantes. Cada capítulo traz dramas intensos, romances inesperados e mistérios que prendem sua atenção do início ao fim. Personalize seu personagem, influencie a história e descubra finais únicos conforme suas decisões moldam todo o enredo. Uma experiência perfeita para quem ama histórias interativas.

title: Free Fire Mobile (Game Android) - Problema ao renderizar recursos de jogos no 3ds Max / V-Ray
body_text: Olá a todos da comunidade Autodesk, Estou trabalhando em um projeto pessoal de animação e estudo de caso, focando na otimização de recursos 3D de jogos para dispositivos móveis, e estou usando o Free Fire como meu objeto de estudo devido à sua popularidade e variedade de recursos gráficos.
