body_text: Olá, comunidade, Estou explorando algumas soluções para um problema de performance que venho enfrentando e encontrei uma documentação que pode ser útil para outros usuários com a mesma questão. Gostaria de compartilhar e discutir aqui. 👉 👉 Download Now 👈 👈 A minha questão é sobre a otimização de recursos para garantir uma experiência de jogo mais fluida. Visão Geral da Situação Tenho notado que, após as atualizações mais recentes do BitLife BR, o consumo de recursos do dispositivo aumentou consi

title: Docs使用時のファイル転送機能の制限について
body_text: ファイル転送を実施する際に、対象のファイルが格納されているフォルダに権限がないメンバーにも共有機能を使用することで共有が可能となります。 フォルダ別で異なる会社に権限を付与している場合、機密情報などファイル転送機能で他社に情報が共有される可能性があり、これを制限する機能が欲しいです。

title: Forsaken Ar Apk 2.6 {Gratis} La Última Versión
body_text: Descargar Forsaken AR APK Forsaken AR es un título que reinventa los juegos de terror en realidad aumentada, llevando al jugador a un mundo donde las criaturas, los espíritus y los fenómenos paranormales aparecen directamente en tu entorno real.

title: Red Dead Redemption (Mobile Game) - Desafio com Rigging Facial no 3ds Max para Personagens Realistas
body_text: Olá a todos da comunidade Autodesk, Estou a trabalhar num projeto pessoal inspirado neste universo incrível: 👉 👉 Download Now 👈 👈 Estou a tentar criar um personagem com um nível de realismo semelhante ao que vemos no jogo, utilizando o 3ds Max e o Mudbox para a modelagem e texturização. A minha maior dificuldade neste momento é o rigging facial. O Problema O meu objetivo é alcançar expressões faciais subtis e realistas, especialmente na área dos olhos e da boca, para dar mais vida ao personagem.

title: Scheduled Handover Reports
body_text: When working with ACC in a manufacturing environment, a project may have different phases or product be built in batches. Having the ability to schedule a handover report for the phases or product set to a certain status (Shipped/Completed/etc...) within a certain time period, the last 7 days for example, would help with the creation of the documentation without the need to manually track which items need to be included in the export.

title: Improve Photo + Description Workflow in Build Field Reports
body_text: We need a simple way to include photos with individual descriptions directly in a Field Report export . Right now: Photo attachments in a Field Report cannot have descriptions tied to each image. The new Table feature does not support attachment columns. Adding Issues to a Field Report only shows the Issue ID in the export — not the photo or description . Request (either solution works): When adding Issues to a Field Report, include their photo + description in the exported PDF , OR Allow attach

title: Specifications in Mobile App
body_text: When we do job walks prior to a project start, we have to download all the individual specs before the walk so we can have them available; this can be tedious and time consuming. Would love to see the ability to download all the specs on the iOS app like you can with files when downloading from the cloud, rather than on demand.

title: Autodesk Desktop Connector - File Description
body_text: We use a naming standard on all of our files within ACC. When opening a working document through Desktop Connector, it would be really handy to have the description that has been entered into ACC alongside the file name. This would help us easily find what document we are looking for without having to open the ACC project files as well.

title: Propane
body_text: My company has been asked to register on the BuildingConnected site for a future project. We are a Propane supply and Propane services company. There is no option in the work performed section related to propane. Is there a possibility to add this option? Kind regards, Barry Thompson

title: Expected Document List and Progress Tracking by Folder
body_text: It would be very useful to have the ability to define, for each folder, a list of documents that are expected to be uploaded either by team members or by external contributors. As the files are uploaded, these predefined “slots” would be automatically filled, allowing users to track both the total number of expected documents and how many have actually been submitted up to that point. This feature would also enable progress metrics—such as upload completion percentages and document-issuance prog

title: The content of email notification for submittals
body_text: We want to request an enhancement depending on the type of submittal it is they need to add instructions to the email notification, etc. like proceed, for the record (say if it was informational only such as maintenance manuals, owner's manuals, etc.), no further action required, etc. Right now, the content of email notification for submittal is not very clear to users causing messages are ignored or misleading.

title: Previously Approved Change Orders listed when creating new change orders
body_text: Our old system would list all previously approved change orders for OCO & SCO's when created and in cost management there is no way for this to happen with out creating a work around. Would like the option to have this added to the forms.

title: Allowing edits during preview
body_text: When merging submittals in smart register, we would like the option to manually edit the "Sub section number" and "Submittal type" the same way you can currently edit the "Submittal description" in the Preview stage before confirming the merge. This would save time and room for error on the back end when doing multiple merges at once.

title: More options for visualization processing
body_text: Since a few weeks uploading with Desktop Connector is a lot faster because the visualization process in ACC is skipped. I makes uploading more agile. But processing for visualization in ACC takes some time and can be tedios in ACC. Also because you can´t see which archives are already prepared for visualization and which not. Would be great to indicate that some way! Another improvement is a tool to plan Bulk processing for visualization (for example at night or in the weekend).

title: Ability to Set Permission for creating Mark Up or Issue in file/document stored in ACC DOCS - Files
body_text: This idea will help in term of controlling which document/file that allowed for Mark up / issue creation and which are not allowed. This will avoid non authorized markup/issue created by user.

title: Add Daily log section in Build
body_text: In addition to photos, it is important for construction and other similar industries to share among the team members logs for each day of the works and link them to the photos module, similar to Daily logs in Field Management of BIM360. At the moment there is no tool for this available in ACC, and can only be raised as issues or photos, which is insufficient.

title: FORMS
body_text: In the Forms / Templates embedded PDFs with digital tool will help and more user friendly rather than creating smart pdfs and questions and ansers templates. Every company has their own customized check lists during construction execution and thousands of similar check lists to be filled and signed in a billion dollars projects.didgital signature option with embedded pdf templates function will be helpful.

title: communication and closure of comments on files during reviews
body_text: During internal or external review , comments are generating as mark-ups and no way to communicate between different reviewers or initiator to reviewer either to repsond to comment , dispute or close the comments within Review section. ACC team suggesting to use Isuues category to follow up and tracking the comments , it is not helpful at all.

title: Export Mark-ups on files & sheets
body_text: Asset tracking is interesting feature, however it is not helful with its limitations. Unable to share the mark-ups to the teammembers outside ACC or not downloadable or printable.This goes same with files mark-ups during reviews.

title: ACC Locations - QR Codes
body_text: ACC Locations doesn't automatically generate a QR Code, could it be useful to Automatically Generate QR Code and manage permission settings on who views certain things on the field. Scan QR Code for Location see Checklist that needs to be completed. Right now, doing this through Assets.

title: ACC Locations - Cannot Export All Items Associated with the Location
body_text: No Way to Export a list of Open Items that are associated with the Location

title: ACC Sheets & Assets & Locations
body_text: Be able to link an issue automatically to assets based on location. i.e. If a Quality Issue is created on a sheet then be able to automatically link to a certain folder in assets with the same location.

title: ACC Forms - Integrate Two Different Forms/Templates into One
body_text: If another party creates a template for the same "form" be able to add their template to your template - without any other parties being able to manipulate it. At the moment, you can set manage rights to people but that means all other parties have access to edit the form.

title: Fuel Distribution be added as an option in Work Performed
body_text: Is it possible to Fuel Distribution as an option in Work Performed? We have a few fuel vendors but this option is not available. The only options: Fuel Storage Pumps Fuel Storage Tanks

title: BuildingConnected - Implement Separate Managed Access Level Permissions for User Accounts (Admin-vs-User)
body_text: The current framework of the BuildingConnected site does not differentiate any permissions levels between users, which gives any single member of a company profile free reign to make changes to office locations, services offered, etc. Putting it bluntly, this creates an unmanaged and disorganized free-for-all. In the specific case of my company, we maintain separate company profiles for our various regional brand identities. Without any restriction on editing permissions, users have created dupl

title: Separate Subcontracts from Purchase Orders in Cost Contracts Tool
body_text: Subcontracts and Purchase Orders are handled differently in many cases. It would be helpful to separate these functions in the Cost / Contracts section of Cost Management. For example we have no need to request vender feedback for the SOV on a purchase order and do not need an action required notification. Also in many instances are not sending it directly to the vender, such as a PO to obtain materials from a local home improvement store. Not sending the vender limits us from sending the PO to

title: Ability to open in a Word / other Microsoft Desktop Apps when opening a file on the Web in ACC Build
body_text: When you open a Word / Excel / other Microsoft file through Sharepoint (Microsoft's online platform), it gives you an option in a dropdown to open the file in the Word / Excel / Microsoft Program desktop app (instead of work on the Web). It would be really nice if ACC Build / Docs allowed you to do this, too. I understand that by using the Desktop Connector tool, you can open directly in a Word / excel / Microsoft Program desktop app. But, it would be really helpful, so as to not disturb yoursel

title: Adding more than 6 review steps to an RFI or Submittal Review Template
body_text: It would be nice to be able to add more than 6 review steps for an RFI or Submittal Review Template. We have come across a few situations, especially on mega projects with large teams involving designers, construction managers, document controls, and subs, where being able to add more than 6 review steps would be incredibly beneficial, to distinguish between each layer. We've had to modify our ideal workflows to conform to the ACC platform limitation.

title: Renaming a workflow step in Submittals / RFIs
body_text: It would be very beneficial to be able to name / rename a workflow step in Submittals or RFIs, during a review workflow. So, rather than it being " Review Step 01", etc., you could name it "Design Project Manager - Initial Review" or something like that, where you could name each step specifically with who and what each step in the workflow correlates with. This way you can distinguish in the platform who is responsible / what is occurring in the step more quickly when you go look at a Submittal

title: Add companies
body_text: would highly suggest submitting a feature request to add this kind of functionality. I can definitely see where it would be helpful to implement this functionality. We encourage you to submit your idea directly to our R&D team via the ACC Forums: https://forums.autodesk.com/t5/acc-ideas/idb-p/acc-ideas-en Our ACC R&D team actively monitors these forums and considers customer suggestions for future development and prioritization. This is the best way to communicate the needs our software is curre

title: Option for External RFI Number to Filter by Number
body_text: In RFIs, External RFIs sort by text rather than by number. Because our collaborators use numbers, not text, for their RFI numbers, when we sort it jumps 1 - 10 - 100, rather than 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, etc. It would be great if there could be an option to have ACC treat the External RFI # as number OR text, to encompass all users' potential needs. This is incredibly important to our current job, as we have hundreds of RFIs and when you are in conversation with the Owner, it's difficult to go through in

title: Files Automatic Sequential Number
body_text: In Files, can a "custom attribute" be added that generates an automatic sequential number, structured with a certain number of characters (e.g. options for X, XX, XXX, XXXX, etc)? For document management, we use "codification" structures to assign numbers to all of our documents, and part of that ideal codification involves a number. If we could have a sequential number automatically populate, rather than have to add the next number in the sequence automatically, that would be incredibly benefic

title: Generate photo report of a mark-up sheet
body_text: It would be great to have this function, to generate a photo report of a mark-up sheet like PlanGrid used to have. Otherwise, for now export the mark-up sheet only give a page of PDF and the camera icon that I put on there will take forever to load and keep jump to the web version. If the report got generate whoever has the pdf is very easy to read. Also, to print out is much easier cause now the photo that I link to the sheet is not even printing in the pdf.

title: Allow to expand layer panel on Docs viewer
body_text: Hi, Our layer names are long and with a fixed panel size we can't see the end of the name of the layers, which is highly problematic for us as it is what differentiate them (we added filters at the start of the layers). Is it possible to allow to modify the size of this panel to show the entirety of the layers' names? Regards, Alexis Massaert

title: Takeoff Export sheet to PDF - Not all takeoff types fitting on the legend
body_text: We have experienced an issue when exporting a sheet to PDF in Autodesk Takeoff. When exporting the software does not fit all the takeoff types within the legend of the created PDF (if there are a lot of individual takeoff types). There is no warning that the takeoff types won't fit in the legend, and the software doesn't create a second sheet with the additional takeoffs which have been cut off the initial page. Possible solutions: 1. Within the filter by classification and take off types dropdo

title: File attribute view settings
body_text: As a project admin, it would be ideal to be able to set and order the required file attributes for specific project folders in ACC Docs that are applied for all users across the project. This would ensure that file attributes that are always required are automatically turned on and in the correct order for all users. At the moment, there is no dynamic way to control which file attributes users see and in which order they are in, if this is to change or need to be updated during a project. A togg

title: Update attributes - Approved & Rejected files
body_text: Currently, users can toggle the Update Attributes setting to apply changes either to approved files only or to both approved and rejected files . By default, the system is configured to update attributes for approved files only. To include rejected files, users must manually adjust the setting each time. This default behavior introduces a risk: if an end-user overlooks changing the toggle, customizations or add-on tools may fail due to incomplete attribute updates. To mitigate this risk, it woul

title: Asset Category & Exporting
body_text: When you export to excel from a Asset Category all the custom fields come up not just the ones on the asset category. Good if there was an option to export all custom fields or just the ones relevant to the asset category.

title: ACC Handover - Cannot Export Asset Systems
body_text: Cannot Export Asset Systems only Assets

title: ACC Handover - Export Asset only has links and not the pdfs as an attachment
body_text: When you export from Handover it gives you direct links but not attachments - will be good to have option where handover exports everything as a zip with issues and forms attached, similar to the Ipad set up but in export format.

title: Autodesk Takeoff needs a larger color pallet
body_text: Autodesk Takeoff needs a larger color pallet. Other Takeoff platforms have a spectrum. It's easy to run out of colors to choose from.

title: Navigation Error in Issues Email Notifications
body_text: Email notifications generated by the "Issues" tool direct users to the "Docs" module instead of the "Build" module. This creates confusion for members, because the Docs view hides familiar Build tools in the left sidebar. The requested change is for email links to open directly in "Build" so users land in the correct module.

title: Bidder Status Mass Updates
body_text: After creating all my bid packages as the GC, I often find that the a contractor will be attached to multiple bid packages. When I create a note for that contractor it updates on all bid packages they are connected to, but when I change the status to bidding or not bidding, it only changes the status on that one bid package. Which means I have to go through multiple trades in order to make sure that single contractor connected to multiple bid packages is marked as not bidding or bidding across t

title: Saving Markups in Submittals and Returning to them at a later time.
body_text: My team would like the ability to begin review of submittal items and be able to save all comments and markups and then return to it at a later time to finish the review prior to submitting. Some submittal items are upwards of 100 pages and it is a lot to sit down and do the full review and submit the response. Having the ability to save the in progress review and then returning would be greatly beneficial.

title: RFI export changes needed
body_text: At the moment to get a simple date in format dd/mm/yyyy is nearly impossible from the export and takes so many steps to change it. You can probably count on fingers of one hand that might use the information what time zone the RFI was raised on, just copy the BIM360 format if you cannot have date and time in separate columns and metadata Created by column gives no information on the company originator which is such a downgrade from BIM360. Working on projects with hundreds of members and dozens

title: Cash Flow Forecasting
body_text: We are an Owner, not a GC, and accurate forecasting is crucial to us and the ACC functionality does not work for us. We would like to be able to export a forecast to Excel then adjust in Excel and import that adjusted version. At this point we would have to be doing this manually in ACC with hundreds of line items which is very time consuming.

title: Provide option to add scan tool for assets to project shortcuts on project homepage within ACC mobile app platform
body_text: It would be really useful to have an option to add the scan tool that is found within Assets on the ACC app to the project homepage using the shortcut tools if using QR codes for assets on-site. The scan tool is found within the assets tool itself and to get to it you are already half way to the asset folders anyway, so it would be more effective if this scan tool was available on the project homepage for easier access to asset folders as soon as you open the project on the app.

title: Photo - tag several photos at the same time
body_text: It is not possible to tag photos simultaneously, which makes the process time-consuming.

title: Assets - the color status ‘To be assigned’ appears differently on laptops and mobile devices
body_text: The color assigned to an object may differ depending on whether the laptop or the mobile app is used. This inconsistency is not ideal for usage and user training.

title: 2Dビューにおける指摘事項のサムネイル
body_text: ACCの指摘事項を作成する際に、3Dビュー同様に2Dビューでも「指摘事項のサムネイル」が生成されるようにしてほしいです。 近い範囲の複数において同じ指摘をしたいときや移動方向等「指摘事項のサムネイル」でマークアップによる書き込みができると便利です。

title: Export Drawing Log
body_text: Once I upload drawings to the takeoff tool, identify their page numbers, page titles, Dates and revisions numbers, I should be able to export the list of pages as a PDF to use as a drawing log. OR in the Docs tool, when I upload a PDF of drawings, it should be able to list each page and create a drawing log

title: Sheet Discipline
body_text: Needing an option to pull the discipline letter from the middle of the Sheet Number. 001-A-310 or 010-A-403

title: Changing Bid Admin on Sealed Bids
body_text: Only Bid Admins are able to unseal bids. BuildingConnected requires the existing Bid Admin to appoint a new Bid Admin. BC Customer Support does not have the ability to change Bid Admin. Our Bid Admin was out of the office during a scheduled bid opening. Our team was forced to push the bid opening for lack of ability to update Bid Admin and unseal bids. Our team recommends Autodesk/ACC/BuildingConnected add ability for team members to change Bid Admin.

title: Improve the options within RFI Types
body_text: The options when setting up an RFI type are limited. We would like to propose the following improvements: 1, Ability to add optional reviewers to the template 2, Option to choose Calendar days as well as Working days. 3, The maximum 50 character limit in the name is often too little for us. Please increase. 4, Filtering options; there is no good way to sort or filter amongst the RFI types. Please add the same filtering features as for Reviews etc. so they are more manageable, and add base inform

title: Web Browser with automatic translation
body_text: Hello, When the web browser have a setup with automatic translation in local language, the folders name as the file name can be translated automaticaly. It's very problematic when we have to search documents if the file name & folder tree is different between 2 users on same project.

title: Photo Measurement Capture in the ACC Mobile App
body_text: Provide functionality that allows users to take measurements directly from the camera preview in real time, with the measurements remaining visible on the captured photo in the ACC mobile app. This would allow field teams to quickly assess dimensions, verify site conditions, and record accurate measurements without relying on post-processing or separate measurement tools. On iOS devices, similar functionality exists in the Measure app, which uses augmented reality (AR) to calculate distances. Im

title: Enable Freehand Sketching Capability within the ACC Mobile App
body_text: Provide functionality that allows users to create freehand sketches using native tablet styluses, on iOS and Galaxy tablets. Users should be able to sketch directly within the ACC mobile app and save their sketches as files in Autodesk Docs, making them available for reference in other ACC tools downstream in Autodesk Build. While Autodesk Docs already includes markup tools for existing documents, not all field teams may always work from pre-existing drawings. Site matters and construction ideas

title: Assets : import rules
body_text: Import rules for mapping assets need to be more flexible. Currently, the only available conditions are “Equals” or “Contains.” We need additional options such as “Starts with” and the ability to use “NOT” to exclude objects. Furthermore, “AND” and “OR” conditions should be applied to each part of the rule individually, rather than being the only condition for the entire rule.

title: Ergonomic document search/filter
body_text: Be able to search documents using filters at the top of each column, rather than or in addition to the search pane on the right.

title: 3D Viewer - Grid Name Display
body_text: In Revit, in 3D view, we can see the grids along with their names. In ACC, we only see the grid lines, but the bubbles with the names are missing (see attached screenshot). Having the grid names visible would be very useful for quickly locating issues or topics for the teams.

title: Project Admin - Role
body_text: When we filter the member list by role, all roles created in the hub are displayed, including those that have been removed. Please hide or delete the removed roles from this list.

title: Revit - information of the version/date of the Revit files
body_text: When creating links in Revit with models in ACC, it is useful to know the version and date of the Revit file. By default, this information is not available (the same issue occurs when linking via Autodesk Desktop Connector).

title: RFI > Field discipline not editable
body_text: In the RFI feature, we have to specify the discipline. Currently, the dropdown list cannot be modified. It would be useful to make this list editable or to have the same flexibility as in the Sheet feature. In the Sheet feature, there is also a default “Discipline” field, but this one can be edited.

title: Issues - Translate
body_text: Other Translation Issue When using the browser in French, the data fields “Cause” / “Root Causes” for issues are not translated—the default values remain in English. (See screenshot for an example with root causes related to design and safety).

title: Review - Save filters
body_text: As for documents, to have the possibility the save filters to avoid to redo the same thing all days or 10 times per day.

title: Review - Filter - Multiple selection ergonomic & Select All option
body_text: Many users need to filter reviews based on workflow. There are dozens of workflow types in the project, and filtering reviews by selecting multiple workflows is very complicated. After ticking a box, the search resets, which makes the process even harder. We need an option like “Select All” to quickly select all workflows after performing a search.

title: Extraction in csv frequently fails
body_text: Extraction to CSV and transposition into Excel. This extraction often fails to compile, making it impossible to download. In other cases, recent changes to ACC seem to have rendered the CSV files incompatible with the macros used for dashboards. Perhaps Insight Builder or Data Connector could help resolve this issue. g.allaouis@equans.fr

title: Redo uploads
body_text: Uploads often fail in signal blackspots and are not queued for re-upload, in some cases becoming lost. g.allaouis@equans.fr

title: Linked folders vs master file
body_text: We cannot create linked folders to order documents based on different properties while still having one master file. I think the smart folders might solve this topic.

title: Documentation handover / stakeholders integration
body_text: We would like to have more flexibility in the menus so that they align with our documentation handover requirements and the corresponding folder structure. Additionally, we would like to further explore the integration between ACC and SharePoint, as I believe there is a way to connect them. Since many stakeholders do not use ACC, we often end up working in ACC while trying to interface with another system (e.g., SharePoint). This requires us to find integration solutions and ultimately take on a

title: Asset selection mode
body_text: For progress tracking, please add the support of a lasso / window like selection mode, in 3D to easily select routings (cable trays, pipes/ducts and fittings).

title: Assets in view
body_text: Add the option to view Assets in views created from Model Coordination. This way we could see the assets in a federated view created in Model Coordination.

title: Asset links from BIM models
body_text: It would be great to have the ability to link assets that are manually created (or imported via Excel) to a 3D object in the BIM models. This feature would be particularly useful for generating all assets required for Testing & Commissioning from an Excel asset list—complete with numerous attributes populated in Excel—while still being able to leverage 3D/2D views for status visualization

title: Assets update
body_text: Add an option to automatically update (or not) assets when a new version of a model is available.

title: Assets rules on multiple models
body_text: It would be great to create assets based on rules that apply to multiple models simultaneously. For example, if my project includes three electrical models for different parts of the building, I would like to create one rule targeting electrical equipment across all three selected models, instead of having to create a separate rule for each model.

title: RFI editable categories
body_text: Default Categories and Disciplines should be editable.

title: RFI co-reviewers
body_text: We should be able to define default co-reviewers. As a workaround, we currently use the ‘Default Watcher’ feature to predefine co-reviewers

title: Permissions folder cascading
body_text: We should be able to lower the permissions of subfolders. Example: I have a folder with 10 subfolders. I want to grant Write permissions to 9 of them and View permissions to the last one. Ideally, I should be able to set Write permission on the parent folder and then adjust only the one subfolder. Currently, I have to set View on the parent folder and then upgrade the 9 subfolders to Write.

title: Markups
body_text: Improve markup rights management (do the same as for issues), markup management in the same menu as rights management by folder limits markup management. Have markups managed by roles, company...

title: Ability to Edit Project Companies
body_text: Can we please be allowed to edit company details within a project. Currently when you create a company you can't edit any of the details after creation. Given the company is an ID in the back-end, surely we can change company details without it breaking Cost or any allocations in Docs/Build.

title: Export file register from a Package
body_text: Our package managers would like to be able to export an excel schedule of all the files within their package so they can be logged and shared outside of ACC. This is possible for files inside a folder, but currently not possible for files in a package and as a package can contain files from countless folders, there is no easy way to create this. Currently this is a slow, manual process, prone to errors so we would urgently like to request this feature.

title: Leave clash numbers in the matrix, after creating an Issue
body_text: https://www.autodesk.com/support/technical/article/caas/sfdcarticles/sfdcarticles/Clashes-in-a-clash-matrix-in-BIM-360-Model-Coordination-disappear.html?_gl=1*1y5wsb6*_gcl_au*MTYyMjQ2MzEwNy4xNzY0MDc3MTc1*FPAU*MjAzODQ3MDA3Mi4xNzY0MDc3MTcz*_ga*Njc2NDM2MDIuMTc2MzA2MjEzMA..*_ga_NZSJ72N6RX*czE3NjQzMzg5NjYkbzE0JGcxJHQxNzY0MzM5NTkyJGozOSRsMCRoMA..&_ga=2.10545140.1943730583.1764338967-67643602.1763062130 Leave the clash matrix numbers. Change the design behavior

title: Ability to visualize the "View a Document" activity on ACC mobile in the Project Admin Activity log
body_text: Context: The Project "Admin Activity log" tracks a wide range of activities from the web such as who created an issue, who viewed a document, etc. Issue: However, when performing these activities on the ACC mobile app, not all of these activities are tracked in the log. Activities such as creating an issue, make a change to the project that needs to be synched and then this activity appears in the log. However activities such as viewing a file, they do not require the project to sync from the AC

title: Naming convention management flexibility
body_text: Improve naming convention management flexibility - impossible to modify naming convention once applied to folders or impossible to modify attributes.

title: 3D files comparison
body_text: 3D File Comparison Compare two 3D files (e.g., Revit, IFC) that are completely different files—not just two versions of the same file. This process works for PDF files but does not currently support 3D files. It would be useful for comparing 3D models between WIP and Shared stages, or for comparing files with different names.

title: Meeting – Assign Company/Role as Invitee
body_text: Enable the possibility to invite a role and a company to a meeting, rather than just individual users.

title: Review With Transmittal - Package
body_text: Have the possibility to create a review with a transmittal or package.

title: Download documents with custom attributes / Version
body_text: When downloading a document, each user can set which attributes they want to use as a suffix. It would be useful to have this configuration applied to everyone in the project, rather than managing it user by use.

title: Better management  of the folders rights
body_text: It could easier to manage the rights between parent folder and child folder and evolved the inherited rights.

title: Assets – Freeze columns like issues
body_text: To have possibility to freeze some columns as the feature in the table of the issues.

title: Asset - Interface - Put the 2 buttons import & export asset in the same location in the interface
body_text: In ACC, for the asset, we have 2 interesting functions to export and import assets. The import feature is "hidden", it will be better to have the 2 buttons in the same place.

title: Manager members on ACC mobile app
body_text: It would be useful to manage members directly from the app — to add or remove people and manage their permissions. Currently, we can only view the people assigned to a project.

title: Card item meetings to add
body_text: We hold meetings on different projects where items are assigned to people. It would be useful to have a card for these items in the Insight module. For PMs and DMs → a global view to see all items by person. For other team members → a view to see the items assigned to them. Note: An item is not necessarily linked to an issue.

title: Import coordinates from links
body_text: With Revit cloud models, it's not possible to export coordinates to links (when we work without ACC, it's possible to do it). The process with ACC is to open the links and to import the coordinates inside each link. When you have a project with X buildings, the acc process for coordinates is time consuming.

title: Review Worflow - Role display during setup
body_text: During setup, when selecting a specific role for a step (initiator, reviewer, etc.), all roles in the hub are visible. It would be better to filter the roles based on the project.

title: Revit files in ACC with links - No possibility to filter by links
body_text: We published Revit files with links. If a 3D view is published with visible links, in the web browser viewer we cannot manage the links individually to show or hide them. It would be useful to have this as a federated view created with Design Coordination or as Navisworks files.

title: Admin Project/Admin HUB - Sort by access level
body_text: It's useful to sort / filter the members project or members hub by access level to see quickly the admin of the project/hub. We can filter by access level in the hub.

title: Improvements to Reply Via Email and subject lines
body_text: Reply via Email: First, there are many requests for more information to be included in the subject line of the emails sent by Autodesk. In Cost, many of those subject lines can be manually updated before sending, but who has the time. A way to improve this would be to add a setting in the Default Email message area for the subject to also be customized for each type of email, and to allow project variables to be used there, like {project.jobNumber} in the same way they're used in the document te

title: Transmittal link to External
body_text: At this moment a transmittal to non-members can be sent, but the e-mail they receive doesn't have a very professional layout and can't be edited to company specific standards. It could be helpful if you can generate a transmittal link, that can be used within e.g. Outlook. That way you can log the transmittal within the project, but you can sent the transmittal in a professional email as a shareable transmittal link.

title: Preconstruction Estimate - Improved Functionality
body_text: Please add an “Expand All” and “Collapse All” option for all line items and sub-items in Preconstruction estimates. Currently, estimates default to a fully collapsed view when a new session is opened. Additionally, implementing a snapshot function to capture and preserve the estimate at a specific point in time would be beneficial.

title: ACC Deleted items UI - Update
body_text: When a user clicks on deleted items on a project on ACC, the first step the webpage displays "No deleted Items" even though in reality there are deleted items when we browse to appropriate folder where files were deleted from. Instead of UI saying "No deleted items" it could say browse to appropriate folder to find deleted items or just display the folder structure directly here... Suggestion 2: Would be good to access this interface via Desktop connector file explorer.

title: Link multiple Submittal items to one submission
body_text: If you use AutoSpec, it creates individual submittal items under for a spec section (product data, warranties, shop drawings, etc.). If the Responsible Contractor has multiple items in a single PDF file being sent in for review, they have do one of the following: -attach the same PDF to each item and submit them -the person creating the submittal entries has to combined from the start -they have to break each type out (not typically possible) in its own PDF file. It would be helpful to be able t

title: Enable Insight Builder for Build Unlimited (Sheets Unlimited) Accounts
body_text: We would like to propose enabling Insight Builder for Build Unlimited (Sheets Unlimited) accounts. Build Unlimited is widely used across project delivery teams, especially in organizations managing multiple large-scale projects. However, Insight Builder is currently restricted to EBA or account-based licensing, which leaves a significant capability gap for Build Unlimited users. Why this feature is important Allowing Insight Builder in Build Unlimited accounts would provide major workflow improv

title: Key Words and Work Performed added Parameter
body_text: Is it possible to add bidding parameters and keyword in any of the Work Performed divisions: Fuel Supply Service- Diesel, Unleaded Gasoline Wethose Fueling Service - Jobsite Fueling of Equipment Loaned Fuel Storage and dispensing Equipment DEF - Diesel Exhaust Fluid Supply Service Thank you

title: Not to cut the conection when IP is changed from client side
body_text: When we download large amount of files in a ZIP (16,8GB) with the funcionality "Download original files" the conexion is cut on Autodesks side on a change of IP from our side. It would be great if Autodesk maintains the conexion when we change the IP.

title: Mark-up tools independent color
body_text: The color selection for the different mark up tools needs to be independent of each other. If you change the color of the cloud tool it also effects the highlighter as well.

title: TradeTapp - Indicate required fields when reviewing a prequal submission in the portal.
body_text: It would be helpful if the “required” fields were marked/starred when reviewing a submission in the TradeTapp portal, as opposed to having to look in the Admin section or downloading the questionnaire.

title: TradeTapp - Add name of automatic approval rule to audit log.
body_text: It would be helpful if the audit log box of the Summary page on a Vendor profile included the name of the Automatic Approval rule that was applied, in addition to the name of the reviewer and the date.

title: Share Information between Build and Preconstruction Tools
body_text: When you upload drawings in the Preconstruction tool for takeoff, there should be an option to send them straight to the Build tool too—and the other way around. Right now, it’s double the work to upload in both places. If customers don’t want a bunch of Preconstruction versions showing up in Build, just give Admins the option to unlink the two. Same idea should apply to specs.

title: ACC Cost - PCO Status
body_text: It doesn’t appear there is a way to “close” a PCO when we need to. It seems to be driven by transaction versus letting us update a status. This is an issue because we like to be able to track our PCOs by where they are in the process. For example: Architect Reviewing Owner Reviewing On Hold Void – which we can do now. Rejected Closed – No cost and not needed to be in an Owner CO. This is likely a feature request but is there way in the interim to close a PCO. We have a no cost change that does n

title: Issues Permissions - Full Visibility without Comment Capability
body_text: We need a permission setting for Owner's reps that allows them full visibility of Issues (ideally by Issue type, but even just by Issues as a whole would help/work) regardless of who created them or who they are assigned to, but without the ability to add comments. Right now, Full Visibility and Watcher settings do all of this except they also allow comments by the user, which we need to have eliminated for some users.

title: Export Packages as PDF
body_text: Build, Files, Packages. I would Like to be able to export a full package as one PDF. I do not want to have to download zip ect. What I am ready to send the packet over to my client I want to Export, PDF the full Packet not individual documents.

title: Photos Glitches and Errors
body_text: Photos taken using the camera tool in markups on sheet/documents - (first image below) get to show up/appear in the left navigation photo folder (second image below, accessible by every user). Most of the photos taken using the camera tool in markups are usually for inspections, issues and QA/QC purposes, hence shouldn't appear in the photos bar. Can this be looked into?

title: Forms - Add Column to Sort by Photos/Attachments
body_text: It would be beneficial to have a column within Forms that identifies if the form has attachments or photos. This would be very beneficial for sorting through daily reports.

title: Continuous Scroll - Individual users choose this option
body_text: Some team members may not be interested in the continuous scroll feature. It would be nice to allow those with create/edit permissions to be able to select this option for their own workspace similar to subscribing to a folder.

title: Workplan API's
body_text: Currently, we have been using Workplan and Schedule in Autodesk Construction Cloud this a powerful tool for planning and collaboration. We prefer Workplan, over Schedule, as it has the ability to be able altered. Opposed to Schedule which still relies on working in another product to adjust dates etc, so there is duplication here which makes it ineffective. Workplan is much better solution as it allows you to work in one platform to make changes, but its potential is limited by the lack of any a

title: Forms - Formatted Standard for Text Field Question and Answer
body_text: A feature to require the answer to a text field question to be formatted the way the answer is desired in the form template, like how in files there are naming standards for files. An example might be a tool/serial/or model number that needs to be typed in that requires letter (n) and number (#) characters to be used in the answer. If we wanted to require fields be answered with a specific format, that format would be set on the question in the template. If the template was set to be n-#### on a

title: Increase Maximum Pages Viewable in Sheets
body_text: I would like to be able to increase the maximum viewable pages when navigating the Sheets module to over 100. Being able to scroll through at least 500 pages would streamline drawing searches and make it easier to select sheets for exporting.

title: Autospecs/Pype Filter Options
body_text: It would be nice if there were more filter options when exporting through Autospecs or Pype. For example, not everything is listed under closeout so there are always line items that do not get pulled when creating a closeout log. Would be nice to have specific options like warranty, as built drawings, etc.

title: BC Pro Bid Leveling - Bid Review Status
body_text: The Bid Leveling tool currently does not have any way to assign a "review" status to bids that are submitted. In other words, if a vendor submits a bid there is no way to tell if someone on our team has actually reviewed that bid without running some kind of external tracking sheet. This status tracking is an important part of the bid management workflow and would ideally be handled within BC. This could be accomplished within Building Connected with adding these status options to the drop down

title: Report listing all submitted bids with leveled bid value shown
body_text: We would like to see an exportable report that includes a list of all bids submitted on a project with the leveled / "with plugs" bid amount shown. Currently we can only get a list showing all of the leveled "soft-awarded" bids but not the rest of the bids received. There is an also a way to export a list showing all bidders but it only shows the initially submitted bid amount and not the leveled bid amount.

title: filtering issues on mobile device
body_text: We have trained our users to assign issues to companies rather than individuals to ensure that everyone at the subcontractor's company is notified and has access to those issues on Build. In particular, we've trained our superintendents to do this for Punch Lists. But today I learned that the software doesn't allow you to filter by company when using a mobile device. Filtering a punch list by Assigned To is very important for superintendents working in the field, and limiting this feature to ind

title: Add Project Address to Cost Management Home page
body_text: Please add the project address and details on the Cost Management Home page (similar to the Build Home page). Many users are only involved on the Cost side of the platform, and need to have access to the project address to manage shipments/deliveries, etc.

title: Model coordination - Coordination spaces subselect bug

But ACC chcek only Main Folder parh for permission.

You will have to select each photo and add a location while we just added the data?! Please link the location of the form or issue with the photos attached to them so we can filter by location afterwards.

title: Issue Placement opening speed enhancement

When processing Issues, we need to open the placement of each issue in the PDF so that we can delegate it to the design team. Unfortunately, opening the Issue Placement currently works like this: Open a new tab in the browser -> Load the ACC environment -> Open a specific folder in Docs -> Open the PDF -> Open and zoom in on the defect. This all take

title: Sort documents by markups date

title: Allow Submittal Managers to attach files
body_text: I learned from the IT team that Submittal Managers need to follow extra steps to be able to create a submittal. The steps are as follows. Create the Submittal with no attachment Send to a Subcontractor representative to attach the file Representative sends it back to you You then need to send it to the worthy parties from there My company does not add a representative from every Subcontractor to the project so we have them submit the documentation for our PE's to submit to the AOR or the EORs. See below, we have quite a few people using this and our estimating assistant would benefit from the change. body_text: When you extract model assets from a NWC file and open the model, the asset information panel does not automatically open when you click on the model element, you have to click on the model name. When you extract model assets from an IFC, you can click on the model element and it will automatically open the the asset information panel. The NWC should behave the same way.

title: Publish Notification (Sheet and Specification)

body_text: Need the ability to clear or remove a Form Assignee. SBO: User accidentally adds an assignee to the wrong form. You don't know who the assignee should be on this form. There is no option to reset or clear the assignee, so you have to delete the form and re-create. If the form already has information completed, that information has to be manually re-added. Copying the form retained the assignee listed.

title: Editing Calibration of Markups
body_text: Markups created before calibration retain their original (uncalibrated) scale. Markups created after calibration will follow the new scale. This results in inconsistent sizing between old and new markups. It would be nice to be able to calibrate the existing markups that were uncalibrated without having to delete the original markup and create a new markup. Uniformity across multiple sheets is important. It would also be nice to be able to setup calibration for multiple sheets at one time.

body_text: We must be having an feature where we can see the dedicated view in 3d using sheets feature in ACC. If in a single sheet there are multiple views placed we must be having an feature which allows which view we can see in the 3d on conjunction to 2d drawings prepared.

title: Photo selection with Shift
body_text: To make selecting photos easier in ACC's Photos tool, it would be helpful to have a Shift key option.

title: Data Exchange Mail- Email notification for updates
body_text: When I create a Data Exchange on the cloud and save it in a separate folder, I should receive an email notification if I have subscribed to this folder. It would even be more practical if Revit checked for updates when opening a project with a linked Data Exchange and reported this accordingly.

title: Berechtigungseinstellungen für Überprüfungen

Als Workaround exportieren wir manuell den Überprüfungsbericht und fassen ihm diesen per Power Pivot Table zusammen. Dieser Prozess kann aber nicht automatisiert werden. Wir wollten dann mit einer Datenverbindung via Power BI die Daten dem Dokumente

title: Assigned to Option (Select all button) in Filtering
body_text: Hi ACC team, Can you add a select all button in filter option in assigned to section of issues? If we have more than 30 plus reviewer in a project, selecting all the roles reviewing the document at one time will be helpful. Thanks! Regards, Oliver Jomadiao

title: Allow a form to be attached to a drawing
body_text: We are using the files area of DOCS to manage our drawing register and internal QA approval workflow. We have a form created for engineering QA review and another for drafting QA review. At the moment we have to create a dummy issue and add these forms as a reference to the issue in order to attached the form to the drawing. It would be an enhancement if the form cold be attached directly to the drawing via "add reference" or similar process to avoid the need to the dummy issue.

title: Please add the ability to add a project through deployment on docs connector

Currently during a deployment it requires a pause to the deployment for the user to add the project you may have standards files in. If the user starts the software before adding the project it removes the standards folder locations during profile compiling. I would rather this happen during deployment rather than write a list routine that will constantly relo

title: Pype Autospecs Import to Build Follow Project Submittal Numbering
body_text: I imported submittals from Pype Autospecs to Build and all of my submittal in Build are now numbered "unspecified." It would be nice if the submittal numbering had instead followed the submittal numbering convention that is set up for the project.

title: Submittal cover letter from project files
body_text: When adding a custom cover letter to a submittal document, the tool only allows selecting files from a device. Please update this workflow to include the option to select a document from project files. Thanks,

title: Ability to Scan Documents into Docs/Files
body_text: We want the option to scan documents directly into Docs/Files as pdf documents with an iPhone or iPad similar to the way it can be done in Microsoft OneDrive. In ACC currently we can only take a photo in Docs/Files. This is especially helpful for when Superintendents and PM's pick up permits etc. and need to scan them in directly to Docs/Files as pdf's.

title: Request to Modify Issue Tag Display
body_text: Hi ACC, Would it be possible to modify the display method for issue tags by including the issue number? For further clarification, please refer to the attached images: Picture P1 shows the current issue tags. Picture P2 illustrates the issue numbers, which I manually added one by one using a PDF reader app. Thank you for your support.

title: Include location on Issue list view (ACC mobile app)
body_text: It would be nice if the Issue list view on the ACC mobile app included locations, so that assignees working on multiple issues at the same time could easily determine which issue they wanted to open next. I.E. ID # 3259 means nothing to most people, but if you tell someone it's in Room 101, they will go there, fix it, close it, and then move to Room 102 to do the same thing, which could be ID # 1657. Currently, the mobile app just shows the next ID#, which is not always helpful.

title: ACC Security concerns
body_text: Dear Autodesk Team, Our organization enforces strict security measures, including SSO and 2FA, to protect sensitive project data. However, we frequently collaborate with external consultants who use standard Autodesk accounts, and we currently have no way to verify whether these accounts meet similar security standards. This creates a potential risk: organizations that take extra steps to secure their environments cannot confirm if external collaborators have done the same. To address this, we w

title: ID Elements
body_text: It is suggested that in the ACC Model Coordination Module, it should somehow be possible to visualize the ID of the elements to which the issues are assigned.

title: Public link generating option for Trial users
body_text: Allowing trial users to generate public links would encourage more users to continue using ACC.

title: Filter reviews
body_text: Add an option to filter reviews by Key Reviewers so they can quickly view only the reviews that require their action.

title: Custom Layout Configuration for forms and issue pages assigning roles / user wise.
body_text: Custom Layout Configuration for Roles or Users Enable administrators to define. This feature would allow admins to control what tools, widgets, and panels appear for each user group, ensuring a tailored experience. Use Case Scenario: A large construction firm uses ACC for multiple teams—designers, project managers, site engineers, and subcontractors. Each role requires different tools and data visibility: Project Managers: Need dashboards showing cost tracking, schedule, and RFIs. Site Engineers

title: Meetings - Export Report & Company Logo
body_text: Report is often long and unable to put company logo on the Meeting.

title: Forms- Restricting signature in steps if "Required Question" is not filled
body_text: Can we have it so that when fields that are required * are not filled up, the users cant sign in that particular step, this is especially useful when there are multiple steps for different users. We dont have to backtrack to ask the previous users to fill in their respective part due to missing information.

title: Allow Continuous Scrolling in Version Comparison Mode
body_text: The version comparison feature is very useful when reviewing revisions. However, when a document is opened in comparison mode, continuous scrolling cannot be used, and each page must be selected or opened individually. This significantly slows down the review process, especially for files with many pages. Please allow continuous scrolling while comparing versions.

title: Locations in ACC Library
body_text: We typically use a common set of location for project types. It would be great to be able to add locations to the ACC library that could then be linked to projects and updated as required to all projects. this would likely also address the needs of posts like https://forums.autodesk.com/t5/acc-ideas/bridge-locations-across-projects/idi-p/13833137

body_text: Bulk downloading spec in the specifications module

The problem with that is if the log gets heavy, it can be difficult to track specific cost items to their associated Changer order. Can there be a way to give the Cost items a prefix (or suffix) that coincides with the Changer or number (or name) to make it easier to view, sort or filter list?

title: RFI Default View

title: Display Recipient Role in Change Order “To” Field for External Users
body_text: When external collaborators submit a Change Order (CO) in Autodesk Build, they are required to select a recipient from a dropdown list. On large projects, this list can include dozens—sometimes even hundreds—of team members. Currently, the list only displays name and email address, which makes it difficult for external users to determine the correct recipient for their CO submission. Request: Add a third data point to the recipient dropdown list showing each user’s role(s) in the project.

title: File Naming (Submittals Documents Names Limitation)
body_text: While uploading documents after a submittal review, can we increase the character limit for file names that we need to download to match the client’s naming conventions exactly?

title: Budget PayApp summary/list

title: Bulk upload for Issues - permissions

However I have to give them manage permissions to be able to bulk upload which is too much control to be able to close other peoples issues. Thanks

title: More than 10 Reviewers Needed for Submittals

We also need one location to pull all the latest drawings and revisions if possible. Please advise.

The issue we're experiencing is that as soon as the first reviewer takes action, the workflow closes and enables the rest of the reviewers to access the document to incorporate their review. Can the review process be configured to allow multiple reviewers to add comments simultaneously within the same review session? Please advise.

title: Members Profile Requirements (Role, Company, and Access level)

title: Feature Request – Option to Separate Issue Detail Report by Date and Location
body_text: I would like to request an enhancement for the Issue Detail Report in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC). Currently, when we generate the issue detail report, all issues are listed in one continuous list. It would be very helpful if the report could include an option to separate issues by date and location . The purpose of this request is to make it easier for us to track the number of issues raised each day and monitor progress more accurately. For example, I am using a scheduled weekly report (

body_text: 根据您提供的信息，我查询了相关的网络资料，但需要特别提醒您：‌网络上关于“腾龙公司”的客服联系方式存在极高的风险，很可能是诈骗信息‌‌。 在参考的网页内容中，虽然出现了“腾龙公司”相关的客服联系方式（如QQ、微信、网址等），但这些信息均来自非官方渠道，其可信程度被标记为“一般”或“较高”，且与已知的电信网络诈骗手法高度相似‌。例如，有资料明确指出，不法分子会通过社交平台发布高薪工作诱导，进而引导下载非官方软件进行诈骗‌。 强烈建议您：‌ 切勿轻信‌：对于任何非官方公布的、通过非正规渠道获取的客服联系方式，都应保持高度警惕。 核实渠道‌：如需联系游戏官方客服，请务必通过游戏官网、官方应用内等正规途径查找。 防范诈骗‌：请牢记，凡是以“刷单返利”、“轻松赚钱”、“高额回报”等为诱饵的，极有可能是诈骗‌。 为了您的财产安全，请务必谨慎对待此类信息。如果您遇到任何可疑情况，建议立即向公安机关举报。

title: Feature Request: Ability to Add Custom "Submitted Date" Attribute to Reports
body_text: Currently, Autodesk Construction Cloud does not support the ability to edit reports to include a custom "Submitted Date" attribute. This limitation presents a challenge for teams that rely on tracking payment submission timelines as part of their workflow and documentation standards. In many construction and project management workflows, it's critical to record when a payment was officially submitted, especially for compliance and coordination purposes. While reports may include invoice date, th

title: API to retrive list of permission for Form Templates imported from Account Library inherited to Project
body_text: Hi all, currently we are unable to retrieve list of permission for Form Templates imported from Account library. It is a know limitation according to APS support. You can only retrieve permissions for forms created locally in the project itself. For companies with multiple projects and using the same form template created at Account Level, this will be very detrimental to better control the access to which form for transparency and trust with the users. Really hope that ACC team can come up with

title: Work Status View in Mobile App
body_text: Widening the Work Status tools to reflect the Web version would increase users' use of the mobile app. Currently, the mobile app only displays Forms and Issues, whereas the web version displays all tools where a user can be assigned an item.

title: Qualification Option for Both Safety and Financial
body_text: Currently there is a denied reason for safety and financial, it would be great if the was a qualified and qualified with exceptions option for both safety and financial.

title: PlanGrid web display - compact request
body_text: request in for a view with a collapsed condition which can be saved as normal. There is too much clutter and graphic waste. Only able to see 5 projects on the screen at a time when I have 114. Too much scrolling for no benefit.

title: Folder permission: parent different than children
body_text: I did not see this elsewhere. We have a folder structure that we secure to ensure that our top level (1 and 2, most of the time) cannot and should not be changed; however, Level 3 we allow for additional subfolders (and start with a certain amount as well). I do not see a way to control this permission in the way we would ideally have it: Level 1 cannot be edited at all Leve 2 cannot be edited (no new Level 2, no renaming); however, subfolders may be added to Level 2 elements - BUT, existing lev

title: Turn off Transfer Tool
body_text: Using forwarding in a project, members can use the transfer tool to copy or sync folders from one project to another. They only need to have editing rights in a folder in both projects. This leads to confusion and unintentional copying of files from one project to another. To avoid this, we would like to deactivate the transfer tool for a project or extended permision settings to manage who can forward what and where to.

title: Forms pushpin in models/sheets
body_text: It would be nice with pushpins for Forms in models or sheets. It would give a good overview of the forms in 2D or 3D

title: Submittal  review reponse is not the latest one on lists.
body_text: Hello, I have a question about the Submittal Home. There is a list of submittals with several filter columns. I thought the “Review Response(s)” column shows the latest reviewer’s response. However, for the submittals I was involved in as a reviewer, I can only see MY EARLIST response even not my latest response. Still, I can't see others responses. When I hover over the “Review Response(s)” column, I can see all review responses, but I’d like to see the latest response and the most recent proce

title: Model Coordination UI views; sorting table columns.
body_text: A lot of UI tables in Model Coordination currently provide the sorting option per table column in addition to filter options. However, this is not the case for the "Views" section. As per screenshot, none of the table columns has the sorting option. If possible please add 🙂

title: Exporting Excel Files
body_text: Currently, you are only able to export an excel file, stored within "Files", into a PDF or CSV format. Consider giving users access to export editable Excel documents, that preserve formulas and formatting.

title: Toggle on/off Photos saved to device on the mobile app
body_text: Add a feature to the settings of the mobile application. Currently, any photo that is taken within the "ACC" app is stored on your project, however it is also duplicated and stored locally on your device. In an effort to save storage on your mobile device, consider adding a setting that does NOT save photos locally on your device that are taken in the "ACC" mobile app. These photos will only be stored within your project, on the cloud.

title: Add Infraworks Support for additional Regions
body_text: It appears that Infraworks is only supported in the US and EU regions of Docs. Maintaining multiple data regions just to access collaboration for Infraworks support complicates user and account management for small firms. Help | About Autodesk Docs and Autodesk InfraWorks | Autodesk

title: Budget Details available in Revised Cost
body_text: We would like the ability to see budget details in the Revised Cost Screen of the forecast tool. There are situations where it is helpful to see what your budget is while you are working through cost projections (Making sure you are projecting costs on the correct line, making sure that your projections are in line with what the original plan ect.). Right now to see the budget we either need two windows or we have to navigate between a few different screens to make this work. Below is an idea th

title: Add statuses in project overview
body_text: Currently, in Autodesk Construction Cloud, projects can only be marked as either Active or Archived . It would be very helpful if we could assign additional project statuses to better reflect the actual lifecycle of a project. For example: Concept Design Preparation Execution Maintenance / Operation Completed This would make it easier for teams to manage and filter projects based on their current phase, improving overall project organization and visibility.

title: Member Access
body_text: I believe we are running into a issue in regards to the not only us but also the trades being able to see various items on ACC Build. I have gotten numerous inquires about not being able to see submittals specifically. For example with submittals if we put down the actually trade company as the responsible contractor it appears that there may be a issues in who can view it. If we only put down a specific person in that company obviously only that person can see it. This is an issue when filterin

title: Section box in mobile app
body_text: It should be possible to create a section box on the mobile app, same as in the web viewer. Either this or multiple sections.

title: Changing Subcontractor Proposal Attachment Names in BuildingConnected
body_text: It would be great to be able to easily change the file name of the proposals that the subcontractor attaches to a bid. Often times we have our own file naming conventions for subcontractors. And we often have several proposal revisions. I'd like to be able to easily change the name of the file, add dates, revisions, drawing sets, etc. Right now, I see the only way to do this is download the file, change the name and then upload again manually.

title: Mobile App // Android // 360 Photos no Motion-Touch Toggle
body_text: On the iOS mobile app, the 360 Photo viewer has a toggle to switch from Motion to Touch interaction. The Android mobile app does not. This makes viewing of 360 photos a somewhat frustrating experience. Please ensure that the Android mobile app Photo viewing experience is on par with the iOS equivalent with the inclusion of Touch.

title: email add-in for Outlook
body_text: It would be great if we had an add-in for Outlook where we could file emails directly from email to our projects on ACC. Sending an email to a ACC generated 'too many characters' email is not efficient. This will push Autodesk ahead of Newforma auto filing and maybe more users will decided to switch. It will benefit the users to have a filing system as robust as Newforma and bring more money to Autodesk by adding new license holders and teams. Many architecture firms will not make the move witho

title: Introducing a Contact Group feature to categorize members
body_text: Introducing a "Contact Group" feature to categorize members by trade or working group would simplify addressing and notifying recipients when creating transmittals and initiating review.

title: Searching Companies - Zip Code
body_text: I know we can search for companies by who is willing to travel or by searching withing a certain mile radius, but it would be helpful to have a feature where we can find companies by specific zip codes they are located within.

title: View uploaded quote in multiple folders
body_text: In a bid project, it's common for a subcontractor to be represented in multiple folders due to their various areas of expertise, so it would be helpful to have the option to view an uploaded quote across different folders without needing to upload it multiple times.

title: PSSR Walks for Shutdown Activities
body_text: As a Piping Design Engineer, I need to walk down newly installed piping to verify that everything required for a specific EWO has been addressed. If I have to add a valve, vent, or drain to the P&ID, it would be helpful to have a block that I can easily click and drag onto the sheet. It would also be useful if the system automatically recognized the sheet scale, so I wouldn’t need to manually adjust it. All changes should be made in red, since this function is considered redlining a live documen

title: Asset and Location Markups
body_text: Create a way to tie a location markup with an Asset markup. If locations are built out for a building including location markups. There should be a way to copy that location markup and make it the asset markup as well. It is time consuming to draw out markups on large projects.

title: limited user profiles
body_text: Different user functionality options: -only Leads have the ability to publish to market -only leads can create a new project -Leads have to approve any additions to bid list -main Lead is automatically added to any new project for admin oversight

title: Cost Management - Forecast - Bar chart at the division level, not just the phase code level.
body_text: In the Forecast module (Cost & Time), within Cost Management, having a bar chart at the main division level that sums the phase codes within that division would provide a better 'birds-eye' view of the budget forecast.

title: Stempel sollten nicht gelöscht werden
body_text: Die Stempel-Funktion in der ACC muss so aussehen, dass ein platzierter Stempel nur noch vom Benutzer selbst gelöscht werden darf. Andere Benutzer sollten das nicht dürfen, da es ansonsten keine Möglichkeit gibt mit Freigaben zu arbeiten.

title: Add Statuses in PCOs
body_text: Request additional options for us to add statuses. We like to be able to track the status of the PCO/COR like “architect court”, “owner”, etc. Currently it’s not an option to override. We don’t mind the automation but would like to be able to override with a status that makes sense to us.

title: Access to meeting templates on mobile app
body_text: Our superintendents work in the field on iPads only. They run meetings with their subs every week. We'd like them to use the meetings module on Build, but they can't access the templates and they can't create a follow up. Please work on expanding access to this module on the mobile app.

title: Overall Folder Permission Report for Admins to Control Access within Project
body_text: Current Situation In order to review access rights within a project, a report is needed that lists the entire folder structure and displays all assigned permissions. Currently, such an overview is not directly available in the Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC), Doc or Build. Access rights can only be reviewed by manually opening each individual folder and checking its permissions, which is very time-consuming. In terms of security needs to check this on a regular base this is a very suboptimal s

title: Allow Default Workdays Configuration in Project Templates for ACC Build Schedule
body_text: Currently, the Schedule tool in Autodesk Build allows users to set project workdays (e.g., Monday–Friday or Monday–Saturday) from within individual project settings. However, there is no option to define default workdays in a project template. For companies managing a large number of projects, this becomes time-consuming and repetitive, as we must manually adjust the workdays for every new project created from the same template. Proposed Improvement: Add an option within Project Template Setting

title: Multiselect in asset view to bulk edit custom fields
body_text: We are using the asset tool in ACC to track site productivity and equipment/materials manufacture and delivery. One issue we are having is to be able to bulk select assets in the web model viewer and change a custom field for all selected. An example we have experienced is to correct the level parameter from REVIT, which is mapped to a custom field, we would like to filter the model to a level, select all items in that model view and update a custom field we have for level. At the moment this is

title: Infraworks model in Model Coordination
body_text: It would be great if you could add Infraworks models to model coordination. I mean look at this. This is an infraworks model of mine on ACC viewed in the ACC viewer. It can be viewed and shared which is great, but it cannot be pulled into model coordination and viewed together with other models. Please make this happen.

title: ModelCoordination : Request to Enable Team-Based Update Permissions in Model Integration Space
body_text: When setting update permissions for the model integration space in an ACC project, each member can only update the view which he created. I would like to be able to set update permissions as a team so that members can edit each other's views. I would also like to be able to set permissions for model integration.

title: Ability to Refresh Owner Contract SOV
body_text: We have run into a few situations where we need to adjust out budget and Owner Contract SOV after they have been created the first time. Right now that process is very manual. Is there a way we can a "Re-Fresh Button" to update the SOV to match the budget instead of manually changing it.

title: Change Names on Top of default workflow boxes
Confusion Between Reviews and Transmittals in German Language UI
body_text: The German translations for "review" ("Überprüfung") and "transmittal" ("Übertragung") are very similar, and the user interface for both features also looks almost identical. As a result, users often accidentally create transmittals when they actually want to start a review. This leads to confusion and mistakes in workflow. Improving the differentiation between these features in the German UI—through clearer wording or distinct design—would greatly enhance usability.

title: Enable File Reviews in Docs While DWG Is Opened in AutoCAD
body_text: Currently, it is not possible to create a review in Docs while a DWG file is open (locked via Desktop Connector) in AutoCAD. When a review needs to be started, the workflow is very time-consuming: the file has to be closed locally in AutoCAD, then Docs must be opened, the correct folder and file located, and only then can the review finally be created. This process is inefficient and disrupts productivity. It would be much more efficient to enable users to initiate a review directly from within

title: Isolate element > Section > Show all keeping section
body_text: We have a request to improve Autodesk viewer in general, we need to isolate, then section and the show all to know where elements are. It will improve many workflows in powerbi. Please make and improve with that, some software like BimCollab has this option

title: Platform/Storage to store initial and latest data value
body_text: Is there any possibility to have a platform to store data (budget) based on Cost Centre selection that will appears in let say, Form with running number C1001. Once C1001 is approved, the value will be deducted and updated in the platform. When user create Form C1002, it will fetch latest data (deducted value from C1001) from the platform. The initial budget is updated early of January every year.

title: Manually Assigning File Versions
body_text: I think it would be helpful to manually assign a file to be a previous version of another,. I.e., if I have CCD01 in my file system, and I received a file titled CCD01r1, I want to nest the previous version behind it as a previous version. I currently do this by changing the current file's name to CCD01r1 and then uploading the new, but then when you pull up previous versions its named r1 and I wish it wasn't. It would help reduce file clutter and improve clarity.

title: Markups created on a document in the ACC viewer are not visible when opening the document in Desktop Connector
body_text: The workaround is: It is possible to Export the File from ACC with the markups included to be able to view them in the PDF outside the ACC viewer. This new file can then be uploaded back into ACC and opened in Desktop Connector. The markups would be visible in the exported file when opened in Desktop Connector because they are embedded in the file itself. The embedded markups cannot be edited in the ACC viewer anymore. This is a very time consuming process, besides, when you re-upload the PDF, t

title: Download FULL Specifications set with one click
body_text: There are multiple internal platforms etc that others use. It would be much easier to allow for a download of the full specifications for a project at once. Right now it is only possible to download on spec section at a time.
