title: Model coordination - Sharing links associated with a saved view/ adding saved views to seach sets in search feature.
body_text: It would be very helpful to have the ability to share a link to a saved view in Model coordination . This would boost the user experience and streamline project administration by sharing specific saved views to users (or including these saved views in the search sets search feature) , roles or companies reducing the amount of documentation and training sessions on how to use Model coordination also boosting uptake of this product across user groups.

title: Review workflow - Ability for initiator to submit a review to a specific step
body_text: Currently, if an approver sends back the review to the initator, all the people inbetween need to re-submit again (or asking administrator to skip steps). It would be helpful for the initiator to have the option to re-submit back to the person (step) that sent the review back to the initiator. This would prevent many people that might be in steps between the initiator and person that sent the review back causing delays and confusion, workflows getting stuck, and lots of extra administration.

title: Viewing Sheets in Browser.
body_text: Would like sheet names in hyperlinked markups to shop showing it's very difficult to view pages. Ref photo attached Also, browser resolution is still very poor until completely zoomed in. My internet was down briefly this morning. Because this is web-based I couldn't function. Will there ever be a desktop app like PlanGrid so we can still work even when offline? Also, selecting sheets always opens them in a new window. Can this be disabled to stay within one webpage?

title: Reallocate Budget Codes to different Main Contract Items
body_text: Autodesk needs to make everything more flexible for the users. A good example is a budget codes was associated with the incorrect contract item and inadvertently billed to the Owner. Now I can't move the budget code to the correct contract without deleting multiple budget pay applications and recreating them. YOU NEED TO FIX THIS!! This is idiotic. On construction projects, things change all the time...the Owner asks for changes all the time...people make mistakes. The system overall needs to be

title: Subject: Inquiry Regarding Adding "Stretched Ceiling" Category on BuildingConnected Portal
body_text: Dear BuildingConnected Team (or To Whom It May Concern), I recently registered on your platform, BuildingConnected , at the request of several General Contractors and Designers interested in receiving quotes for upcoming projects. While navigating the portal, I quickly realized that the category for "Stretched Ceilings" is currently unavailable, and there is no comparable category under which I can accurately list my services. I wanted to bring this to your attention, as Stretched Ceilings are b

title: Organization of output information in Inventory and at Takeoff
body_text: Please organize outputs in the inventory window in columns instead of rows, and allow a simple cut and paste from inventory window to excel or another program instead of having to create a confusing export document.

title: Desktop Connector - Lock out Folders people do not have permission to Upload or Create Folders in
body_text: Please add a Warning, or just don't allow people to create folders or upload to folders they only have viewing permissions in. We have had several issues where someone has tried to upload or create folders they don't have permission, and their is no warning or message, so they assume its uploading, and then a day later realize something is wrong, and they have log jammed up their file uploads, because it has halted upload at the Files that aren't being uploaded or Created.

title: Ability to Assign People to Projects from Account Level Members List or Have Roles and Companies Assigned in Project Transfer to Account Level Members List
body_text: Currently, If I create a New Member and assign them their company and Role in an Individual Project, and then check the Account Level Members list, that Information has not transferred. I am having to do extra work by adding them at the Account Level, and then adding them to the individual Project. Please Either Consider having someone be able to be assigned to a project from the Account Members list, or making it so we have the ability to Make sure people keep their assigned roles and Companies

title: Locking the main contract SOV
body_text: We would like to implement the Amount locked | Fully locked | Unlocked status on the Main contract SOVs, which is the same as the contract amount lock. Rules: When main contract is set as Executed, SOV will be automatically set as Fully locked if it was Unlocked or Amount locked User can manually change it to Amount locked under Executed status or ERP Integrated & Locked. Unlocked option will be disabled with a tooltip: Schedule of Values can't be unlocked at Executed status. If we can lock SOV,

title: Incorporate new fonts or type of alphabet to ACC visor
body_text: ACC should be able to visualize sheets views of the model with the same font that is in the model. In my case, is needed: "Adif Fago Co" and "Adif Fago No" Thanks

title: Project Template Create Project Permission
body_text: It would be nice to have a setting to prevent people from creating projects from templates but allow them to contribute to its content. This would only allow Account Admin to create projects, but collaboration to build out a template from a larger group of users.

title: Draft an RFI
body_text: I want to be able to draft an RFI without immediately submitting it to the design team.

title: Restricted File Access in Building Connected Pro
body_text: There is an ability in Bid Board Pro to set up internal and external files. When you create a new project in Building Connected Pro that option does not exist. If you create a new project directly from Bid Board into Building Connected Pro the internal files become accessible to all bid invitees. There should be a way to limit access at the folder level so internal files can remain within the platform and ultimately be moved into Build once the project has been won in Building Connected Pro.

title: Photo Tool
body_text: When using the photo tool icon and placing it on a sheets, the functionality of the tool is clunky when viewing the photos. You can only view one photo at a time. Instead, improve functionality to be able to scroll through all photos associated with each individual photo icon.

title: Version Sets - Sheets and Specs
body_text: When setting up version sets in "Sheets", the same versions sets should automatically be available in "Specifications." You should have to create the same information in both the "Sheets" module and the "Specifications" module. When construction documents are published by an Architect or Contractor. the "Version Set" for the drawings and the specs usually always match, especially when the 1st versions are published.

title: TradeTapp - Include Primary Email in Contacts Tab
body_text: In TradeTapp, the Contracts tab in the vendor profiles do not include the "Primary Contact". The "Primary Contact" can only be found on the TradeTapp Dashboard. Can we include the "Primary Contact" on the Contacts tab of the vendor profiles?

title: Ability to change the name “Budget” in Cost Management
body_text: The ability to change the name “Budget” in Cost Management. Budget is used throughout the Cost Management tool for different use cases, and it is why it cannot be currently renamed. (Note: This request comes from our customer in the EBA program)

title: Ability to change the description that is shown in the black box when hovering over the name of an item
body_text: Be able to change the description that is shown in the black box when hovering over the name of an item. The reason is because a PCR for the customer does not have the same meaning as the default description provided in Cost Management. (Note: This is a customer in our EBA program)

title: Ability to toggle off the Change Order Transfer button
body_text: Ability to toggle off the Change Order Transfer button because many customers do not move money within their budget and therefore don’t want users to be able to see or use this button. (This request comes from a customer in our EBA program)

title: Integrate Teams on ACC or create instant messaging?
body_text: Can you create some instant messages on ACC? Or integrate Teams with ACC? So we could contact project members from ACC on Teams. Currently, in our company Teams is locked for external users.

title: Filtering items to display only elements with takeoff performed
body_text: ACC allows the user to filter out elements that have no takeoff performed but re-sets EVERY TIME another item is added, requiring user to apply filter again, and again, and again. Please allow software to maintain whatever filters have been applied until USER determines they don't want it anymore, even if you leave website until the following day.....

title: Daily File Submission - Trade Tapp
body_text: The program should automatically prompt the contractor if a recurring form needs to be submitted. For example a FLHA, the section in tradetapp should automatically prompt the contractor that it must be sent in. Same goes for weekly meeting minutes, monthly insurance reports, possibilities are endless.

title: Improve Rich-Text Editor Formatting for Scope of Work and Contract Generation
body_text: Currently, when users copy and paste formatted text (such as numbered lists and indented paragraphs) from Microsoft Word into the Scope of Work editor in Autodesk Build’s Cost Management module, the formatting becomes inconsistent. Fonts, font sizes, nested numbering, and paragraph alignment often change once pasted or when exporting the generated contract document. Suggested Improvements: Allow users to maintain Word-based formatting (fonts, indents, and nested numbering) when pasting into the

title: Sending Contract for Signature and Requesting Input Simultaneously
body_text: My team and I would like the ability to both send a contract for signature and request supplier input within the same step to streamline the contract process. We begin by compiling the 6 documents that make up our contract using the document package. After it is created, we would like to send our contract for signature. At the same time that the subcontractor is signing and returning the subcontract, we would also like them to be notified of the compliance requirements that we are requesting pri

title: Permissions - Adding more than 400 Roles to a Folder
body_text: In organisations with several layers of hierarchy, during Engineering and Procurement phases, there are 100s of packages and its disciplines, we do have scenarios where there are 1000+ roles in the Organisation. In such cases, there does seem a requirement for allowing adding of 100s of roles to a folder and assigning different levels of permissions to them. Currently this limit of assigning roles to folders is set to 400 roles in ACC, which we request be increased to 1500 roles.

title: ProEst Proposal Changes
body_text: We are sending proposals with labor and material breakouts, unfortunately as of right now, you get the price with a decimal.. we would like to send out our proposals with no decimals to make it easier on accounting. Can there be a formula set up so that when we put material and labor costs broken out on our proposals that they are rounded to the nearest dollar please?

title: Bulk Forms Report does not include Attachments - and it should!
body_text: Hello! It was noticed on one of our projects that when we bulk export forms into the report that attachments do not appear. We're trying to have a workflow where we select all the forms of the day, and export them all in one PDF. The table of contents page would be amazing to have, however without the forms attachments printing out into these reports then this doesn't work for us. As a workaround what we do is export each form, and manually combine in adobe. Perhaps in a future state we could ha

title: Budget code visibility on Pay App for Change Orders
body_text: When the 'Below Schedule of Values' option is selected on a Payment Application, there is no visibility into the Budget Code associated with each change order line item. The budget allocation is not displayed on the generated document (there is no variable), nor is it accessible on the Budget Payment Application overview screen. This limits the ability to track or reconcile change orders against their corresponding budgets without full access to the system. Could there be a setting in Change Ord

title: Executive summary, AI generated, to sum up the previous day's activities.
body_text: One feature I’d really like to see (maybe it’s already in development) is a daily AI-generated audio briefing. Something in the style of a 20–30-minute podcast I can listen to on my commute. It would pull from the daily reports across all our active projects and give me a clear rundown of what happened yesterday: progress, issues, anything that needs attention. I know dashboards and Power BI are out there, but I don’t use those—I need something I can absorb passively while driving. If it could f

title: Delete Form that was Previously Closed and Reopened
body_text: A delete feature should be added to forms that have been closed and then reopened. Sometimes forms are closed and then reopened for editing, and then need to be deleted. Currently, there is only the ability to archive these sorts of forms.

title: API to retrieve form permission for forms added from ACC Library to project
body_text: As i understand the limitation now is that we can only retrieve form permission from forms that are native in the project. For forms that was added from ACC libary into Project, there is no such API. I think it would be very useful especially when you have multiple projects using similar templates and are added into project from library

title: Instant Syncing option for new models in the Coordination Space
body_text: When updating (or adding new) models linked to the ACC Coordination space in Model Coordination, it does not instantly sync. I am requesting an 'instant sync' button so work can take place faster and more efficiently. The delay is often 10-20 minutes, but if a model is updated at night, it can take many hours, sometimes not updating until the next morning which wastes time and causes frustration for the team. Please give users the option to instantly sync and update the Model Coordination Space

title: Inactive Members
body_text: On BIM 360, when you attempt to add a user to a project whose account is inactive, it will notify you and instruct you to contact your administrator; ACC should do this too. Currently, ACC merely pretends to add the user, but they never appear in the Members list, and you have no idea why. If the user is in the members list, then add an inactive icon or notifier next to the user - see attached image so the end user doesn't select the wrong user to the project.

title: Amount Visibility for Change Orders in Cost Management
body_text: We would like to limit visibility in the different amount fields by permission in Cost Management for Change Orders. We would like to limit an owner from seeing a committed amount , and subcontractor from seeing a approved amount ect. Current permission settings allow too much visibility into the Change Order Process.

title: include progress in report with status of reviews
body_text: In Autodesk Construction Cloud / Docs, when creating a report with the status of the reviews (export all ; screenshot 1), the progress (see screen shot 2 : Stef comments “NOK volgende posten niet …”) is not reported. title: Submit for Review - dialogue box user interface improvements
body_text: When submitting a file for review, a dialogue box opens to select a workflow. This box is a fixed size and doesn't respond to any width of screen, dynamically resizing to suit. It also has lots of wasted white space and does not have nay horizontal scroll. Consequently, workflow names that are beyond a few words are lost off the right hand side in the dropdown, and cant be read. Please alter this so that the dialogue box dynamically adjusts to screen sizes, and/or make better use of the availabl

title: Issues Viewpoints - Allow for longer view names
body_text: Issue Viewpoint names are limited to 30 characters only which is too little for our purposes. We would also like the option to link Viewpoints to issues! Would also be good to be able to tag people/companies in viewpoints to communicate information, and to show Issues on them as well.

title: Request to Improve Review Tracking and Delay Calculation Features
body_text: We are facing two main issues in the Review workflow within ACC Docs: 1️⃣ Next Action By Visibility for Pending Reviewers: Currently, it’s not possible to identify the “Next Action By” for members who haven’t yet submitted their review response. This makes it difficult to determine which reviewer is causing the delay in multi-step review workflows. We need a way to show which member has not provided a response yet, so we can track responsibility for delays clearly. 2️⃣ Delay Days Attribute and D

title: Allow different Forecast/ Cash Flow for all main contracts
body_text: Main contracts are usually set up as per stages like pre-con and site con etc. Allow forecasting/ cash flow individually for each main contract type rather than combining all in one

title: OCR in Specs
body_text: It would be useful to be able to integrate OCR into the Specs tool, in the same way that Sheets does. It would be a real time saver if we could target a page element in order to have the tool recognize the sections.

title: Properties box in Takeoff
body_text: Allow some of the pop-up boxes such as properties, to go outside the program window. Often we will want to know some of that information while looking at the takeoff and these small pop up windows cover that takeoff.

title: Allow control of pan speed when performing takeoff.   Also need to have an option when removing an item to "not show again".
body_text: Screen moves wildly right/left/up/ down when performing a takeoff where I am zoomed in and have to move past the zoomed in area. This requires me to zoom in, takeoff within the zoomed area, zoom out and zoom back in another area to continue takeoff. Very time consuming. Also, need an option to "not show again" the warning if you are sure you want to delete a takeoff....

title: Allow cut and paste from a quantity view for takeoffs
body_text: Allow cutting and pasting takeoff items straight from takeoff view as opposed to having to export a report that is very confusing with it's output.. Perhaps a sheet that shows "all the takeoff" simple and clear....

title: Subcontractor Status Change Notifications
body_text: There should be notifications, that could be toggled off/on, for when subcontractors do any of the following: 1. View a bid package for the first time (helpful to know that it was received and that they are considering the project) 2. Invite other team members from their company to a bid package (helpful to know who the new people involved from their company are) 3. Change their status on a bid package (helpful to know who is/isn't bidding without needing to enter each project and then each bid

title: Report for Sub Invoices
body_text: It would be nice to be able to build a report that filters all sub invoices together by current billing period and cost code.

body_text: Actions and Stuff 1.6: A Nova Atualização Chegou! O Actions and Stuff 1.6 é a mais recente versão do popular jogo de ação para Android. title: Autodesk Assistant Dock Panel
body_text: When using Autodesk Assistant, you can dock the panel to the left side of the interface. However, this action does not reposition the existing content on that side—instead, the panel simply overlays it, obscuring anything behind it. It would be helpful if the existing content shifted to the left when the panel was docked.

title: Cost Reports Tab
body_text: Can the Reports Tab in Cost Management be change so that non-admin users can have to access the Reports tab without needing Project Admin Permissions ? (same as in the Reports tab within Build module) Currently non admin users cannot run reports from this tab.

title: Deductive SCO shown as Overbilled
body_text: Currently - If you have a deductive Change Order the entire Subcontract Pay Application is flagged as overbilled because the over billing checking happens on every SOV payment item level. It is by designed behavior. There are two options that can be taken here to get rid of the overbilling message. Revert the payment application status and decrease the this period work completed amount. Enable the setting "allow over billing". We would like the overbilling flag to be applied to the totals of the

title: Cost - Views controlled by Roles or Permissions
body_text: In short there are views we have that we consider an internal Project view, but I don't want the owner to see. I want to still be able to wipe columns off of it or filter it down some more. I want people in my company to have a default view that is different from the default view the owner can see. Currently this is not possible. We need to control what the owner see's and eliminate unnecessary questions. Example: In the PCO screen the Scope means nothing to the owner and raises questions becaus

title: Improve iOS drawing link navigation
body_text: The way drawing links show up and are navigated in iOS seems counterintuitive. You have to go all the way down to the lower corner, where the link is also partially cut off. See screenshot for reference. A couple other comments adjacent to the link itself: why is there no link button in that black box? It doesn't make a lot of sense to me to push a link button and then have to navigate all the way down to the corner to go to an actual sheet. And why is there an unpublish button front and center?

title: Mobile Sync Status
body_text: A few years ago when we first on-boarded with ACC- there was a tool on the home screen that allowed us to see who had and had not synced their iPad. It was good to know who was working with old information. Can we get that back?

title: Connector to AirTables
body_text: A connector to AirTables like one for Power Bi would allow many strong automations and efficiencies in managing a project.

title: Sharable 360 Photos Links (none users)
body_text: We continue to encounter scenarios where we want to share 360-degree photos that are viewable in the Photo app with external users who do not require an ACC account (E.g., City officials, tenants, real estate agents). It would be great if ACC could create a public shareable link for 360 photos that can quickly be sent to outside users without adding them to the ACC Cloud. It would be even better if we could keep the company logo on the photos to keep marketing and branding intact. The only way t

title: Generate Sharable Links for folders from an iPad and directly link into an email (PlanGrid used to do this)
body_text: Any folder or sheet should be able to be shared as a link directly from an iPad. Most of our field users only work from Ipads but cannot share content directly to people who need it quickly.

title: Include attributes in the Replication Tool process
body_text: Can there be an option to include attributes in the Autodesk Replication Tool process. Attributes such as: State, Status, Description would be great to bring across with the file.

title: ACC & External Hyperlinks as Reference Option for Markups & Issues
body_text: Request Add "Hyperlink" as a reference type option in the existing References feature within ACC Issues and Markups tools. The References feature currently ONLY supports linking: Sheets Files RFIs Forms Proposed Addition Add "Hyperlink" as a fifth reference type, enabling users to link to: External URLs (vendor documentation, manufacturer specs, compliance resources) Internal ACC objects (other markups, issues, RFIs via their ACC URL) Project-related web resources (submittal portals, tracking sy

title: Sealed Bid Packages
body_text: Currently we can Seal a whole project or not. Can we please have the option to only seal specific packages within the project if we wish to?

title: Ability to re-assign the Tender Administrator without restricting that function to the existing Tender Admin
body_text: Currently the Tender Administrator is set at the beginning of the job and once set, only they can re-assign it to someone else. People go on leave and forget to do this and we end up having to remove them completely from the company and re-assign their work to someone else. There needs to a super admin role with the ability to do this without reverting to the above workaround.

title: Formatted Bidder List Report
body_text: The Formatted Bidder List Report is great, but I would love to be able to export it as an Excel file so that's it's able to be manipulated/updated more easily. Thank you

title: Comments in Review Rounds
body_text: Utilising the 'rounds' function for the first time in the business, if I add a comment on a drawing in round 1 I can't see it in round 2 so I have to have either the exported report or round 1 open on a different screen. If the drawing is a just a new version the comment should be visible for seamless reviewing.

title: Comet AI Browser – Best Smart Web Tool for Fast Browsing
body_text: Click Here - Comet AI Browser Comet AI Browser is a next-generation smart browser designed to make your online experience faster, safer, and more efficient. With advanced AI integration, it learns your browsing habits, delivers personalized search results, and improves productivity. Unlike traditional browsers, Comet AI Browser optimizes speed, reduces data usage, and blocks unnecessary ads for a cleaner web environment. The AI assistant inside the browser helps users discover information quickl

title: Insight Builder - Create Shared Folder
body_text: It would be nice to be able to create a shared folder for company dashboards, with subfolders for various project related templates. This would make it easier to organise and share dashboards.

title: Add "Hyperlink/URL" as a Data Type for Custom Attributes in Document Management
body_text: Problem Statement Custom Attributes populated via API integrations, specifically those intended to store external URLs (e.g., links to Submittals, RFIs, external documentation, or related systems), are currently limited to the "Text" data type. When a valid URL string (https://...) is written to a "Text" custom attribute field: The link is displayed as plain, unclickable text in the Document Management list view. Users are forced to manually copy the entire URL string and paste it into their bro

title: Home page
body_text: Would like to be able to add a section on the home page of each project that we could use to include site specific information for ease of reference.

title: Syncing
body_text: Is there a way to sync all projects when in the mobile app instead of having to select each one individually?

title: Company setup
body_text: We were told our field guys could add companies into their projects if they were located in the master company list. They are unable. We would also like it to be part of our project template to add certain subcontractors that we use on all of our projects instead of having to add this into each new project when it is created.

title: Project Types and Company Types
body_text: There should be a method to add and delete these types based on your company's scope of work performed. There are too many in there that do not pertain to our business and we would like to add some specific to our industry.

title: Issues in mobile app
body_text: Can't see who created an issue when in the mobile app. It is also very tiny in the bottom right corner on the desktop app.

title: Daily Reports
body_text: Would like the locations set-up in a project to be differentiated in the Daily Reports instead of having to submit a Daily Report for each location.

title: Restore Activity in Forms
body_text: When a Form is in collaboration mode. Multiple users can add/edit/delete contents such as Daily Manpower Log line items. If a line item is deleted, they are able to see this action within Activity. There should be the ability to restore that back to the Form.

title: Allow listing a Subcontractor as a preferred vendor through the contacts tab
body_text: Currently, in order to list a subcontractor/vendor as preferred, you need to go to active project, then to a scope and find them to only then select the preferred option. It would be more convenient if we could just search the company up in the contacts tab and make the selection there.

title: How much data do i have
body_text: I have found on a few occasions it would be helpful for me to have an overall idea of how much data my entire ACC account has. Both in number of files and number of GB. Even if i have to contact support to find out. I know i can download file info per project but with hundred of projects that is a very difficult task.

title: RFI Reviewer on Mobile
body_text: The ACC mobile application does not currently support sending an RFI to a reviewer via their email. That functionality is reserved solely for the the web version. It would be great to have the mobile app mirror the same abilities as the web.

title: Reports
body_text: Would like to see a feature where a shared report can be edited by multiple users on Bid Board Pro

title: Bulk Edit Report Template Schedules
body_text: When report templates are set with a schedule, if many reports need to be updated it must be done one at a time. If reports are needed, but the end date of the project is ambiguous, they may have to be set for a random point in the future. If the reports are not scheduled far enough in the future, the schedule period will have to manually be edit for each report. And the same is true if they are scheduled too far into the future. The reports would continue running and sending out emails to the c

title: Bulk Edit Reviewers & Watchers
body_text: While ACC does provide the option to bulk add 'Watchers' to a Submittal, RFI, etc., it does not provide the option to bulk remove 'Watchers.' This is inconvenient when there are personnel position or project changes amongst all project team companies. For example, someone on the engineering team who was a default watcher on all submittals has been moved to a different project and does not wish to receive updates on this project anymore. We have approximately 40 submittals that they were added to

title: Delete Preconfigured / Locked Issue Types & Remove from Filter within the Issues Home Page
body_text: ACC developers have preconfigured a number of issue types. These are marked by a locked symbol within ACC. We have deactivated all preconfigured issue types and have built our own. The issue all of our projects are facing is the preconfigured issue types still show within the issue home page filter even though no issues were generated from these types. The system needs to be adjusted to only reflect the current issue types applied to the project to remove all confusion by project teams.

title: General Settings
body_text: We currently use Excel spreadsheets to store project information, including the BIM coordinator, superintendent, project director, lead project manager, preconstruction project manager, and others. However, the list of team members does not clearly identify the main point of contact, as multiple individuals can be in the same roles. I believe that adding custom fields within the General section of the job would be beneficial, not only for this issue but also for other purposes.

title: Need way to export a copy of a blank form
body_text: We need a way to export copies of our forms to provide to our customer. Currently, the only way to do this is to create a form and then archive it once you've printed it out.

title: Highlighter tool should not cover drawing elements
body_text: Highlighting or creating a color markup washes out the sheet since the color elements cover the original black sheet elements. Also, highlighting multiple times layers the color thicker, eventually blocking sheet elements entirely. The color elements for highlighter should not darken, it should work like an alcohol marker and not layer on itself. Also, all color elements should not block black elements on the sheet. This is making sheets unreadable.

title: Form Detail Report - Multi-select Form Template Name
body_text: Ideally, we’d like to be able to run a form detail report where the location would be the final “AUDIT COMPELTE” sub-location for the skid and then multi-select the form template names that we wanted to include in the report. Then as forms get completed, it will all automatically sync and be available in the external project for any documentation turn over and referencing needed.

title: Connect Multiple Schedules to Workplan
body_text: Sometimes on projects we might have separate schedules to track different phases, logistics, or procurement. It would be nice to have the ability to link a workplan to multiple schedules.

title: Schedule
body_text: I wanted to suggest to Autodesk the idea of adding insights for the scheduling module; it's a very vague module without tracking of overdue tasks. Another thing would be to link document delivery to tasks. For example: if I added a document that needed monitoring, the task is automatically updated.

title: 2D sheets published from Civil 3D to overlay on 3D ACC viewer
body_text: Currently the published 2D sheets from civil 3D can't be overlayed on 3D ACC viewer, kindly enable this feature in line with what currently available for Revit published sheets.

title: AVT Access under AEC Docs and Build license
body_text: I would like to request a reconsideration of the current AVT access limitation, as it is only available with a standalone Docs license and not when Docs is included under the AEC bundle, even though AVT is primarily used with Revit. This creates difficulties for users who already have Docs through AEC, and it would also be highly beneficial if AVT were made accessible under the Build license since Build includes Docs. Expanding AVT access under both AEC and Build licenses would better reflect ho

title: Reports tool on mobile app
body_text: We need the Reports tool on the mobile app. Our site teams need to be able to generate reports on iPads, and there is more functionality for customization in the actual Reports tool as opposed to exporting reports through Issues, for example. There is the workaround of accessing Autodesk through a web browser, but it would be more convenient to be able to do everything in the app.

title: Outside links
body_text: I’d like to propose a feature enhancement for BuildingConnected. In the Project Overview → Internal Use section, it would be extremely helpful to have a dedicated area for storing project-related links. Currently, if we want to reference the owner’s website, video walk-throughs, LinkedIn pages, or other external resources, we have to save them in separate Word or PDF documents. This creates extra steps for the team and makes quick access harder. The request: Add a configurable “Links” field grou

title: Collections - Allow users to select ungrouped Version Sets as they upload to collections
body_text: Currently users are forced to create version sets for every collection when uploading sheets instead of being able to select ungrouped version sets in the project. The version set may be the same for all uploads, but they are forced to recreate them which is time consuming and could lead to errors.

title: Specs Tool - Annotation, linking to files/sheets, etc.
body_text: Provide the ability to annotate and mark up and link to spec section pages (in a similar fashion as the "Sheets" tool). Provide the ability to link from spec section pages (in a similar fashion as the "Sheets" tool) to files, sheets, RFI's, Submittals, etc. These enhancements would greatly improve the specs tool within ACC. Also - please make sure the Autodesk Assistant remains online - there are days where that feature is absent from the platform and that is a big drawback for teams that have l

title: Sheet Collection Visibility
body_text: Customer has created several "Collections" in their projects - however, they would like to be able to limit visibility to subcontractors who are bidding on the project. What they envision is a capability to manage permissions individually for each "Collections" folder created. This would enable them to restrict access to other bidders who may be competing for the projects.

title: Specs Tool Improvement & Bug Fixes (Issue Date Control for most "Current" spec section)
body_text: The Version Set Issue Date should control for what specification is given priority as being the most current, regardless of the publish date. This should operate the same as Version Set Issue Date in the Sheets Tool. I was recently setting up a new project and the base specification with the oldest issue date took longer to process in and correct the spec section errors from the import, even though I started with that set first, I was able to finish processing and correcting the Amendment Versio

title: Exclusive Access Level for Opening Projects
body_text: The platform has a setting in the account admin that allows project administrators to create new projects. This is problematic, because in a large company with multiple departments, each with project administrators, giving everyone the ability to create projects makes it difficult to manage what is created within the ACC. The platform should have the option to allow only account members with a "Project Creator" access level (for example) to create projects. The hierarchy could be as follows: Pro

title: Workplan task handoffs to be automatically created based on Master Schedule hand offs (dependencies)
body_text: The master schedules (.mpp or other formats) already have hand offs (dependencies) and when we create a new work plan based on the items in the master schedule, we'd like to see the hand offs to be automatically created based on those dependencies. Of course both items (previous and future) needs to be imported into the workplan otherwise the hand off cannot be created, but such a feature is not yet available. This feature help us a lot by saving time and our team members won't need to recreate

title: Disable the center screen pop up when uploading files
body_text: The center screen pop up only slows us down when we are trying to upload large groups of files to multiple folders. Allow us to disable this or at the very least just click off of it to minimize it and continue working, forcing us to move over and click a specific button creates too much drag when trying to work efficiently. It's there in the bottom right corner anyways!

title: Spot Elevation tool for the Model Coordination space
body_text: It would be great if Model coordination would have a 'spot elevation' and ' spot coordinate' tool like in Revit to quickly see the AOD of items (not just levels). We compare modelled items to 2D drawings tagged with spot coordinates and would like a quick way to verify directly from the models without the need to open the file separately in Revit to check for this. Note this is not just for floors which you can see the top and bottom level in the properties panel, but could be any item (middle o

title: Add Project Scheduling to Division 1 under Work Performed
body_text: I suggest adding Project Schedling under Division 1. I will request it to be listed becuase it is a major sub work on construction projects. Typicall under Spec 01 32 00. It is missing at this point and i am not getting the bid request, i was hoping.

title: Ability to set specific rules for subcontractors
body_text: I would like the ability to have RFP's that contain a certain keyword (end user name for example) be automatically forwarded to a specific co worker in the office. This would help ensure that when a GC sends an RFP to the office and forgets to include the person that handles that end user account, that it will make it to the proper account manager.

body_text: Is it possible to add Ground Penetrating Radar (GPR) and Concrete XRay to the list of industries? Our company offers these

title: What Levels Should Beginners Start With in Geometry Dash Lite?
body_text: Why Start with Easy Levels in Geometry Dash Lite? Unlike many platformer games, Geometry Dash Lite doesn’t hold your hand. Each level is filled with spikes, moving platforms, and rhythm-based obstacles that require precise timing. Helps you understand rhythm and jump timing. Gives you confidence as you progress. Best Geometry Dash

title: マークアップ機能の複数ページ選択
body_text: TL;博士 現状、マークアップ機能では複数ページを同時に選択する方法がありません。これを改善することで、ユーザーの利便性を向上させることが期待されます。 背景と課題 マークアップ機能で、複数ページにわたる選択ができず操作が非効率。 複数ページの同じ位置にマークアップを配置する機能が未実装。 ユーザーが一括選択できないため、公開作業に時間がかかるリスクがある。 提案 何を : マークアップ機能に複数ページ選択機能を追加。 誰に : 開発チームに依頼し、機能改修を進める。 どうやって : 小さなPilotとして、特定ユーザーグループでのテストを実施。 期待インパクト & KPI 初回応答時間を24時間から4時間に短縮。 ユーザー満足度の向上が期待される。 次の一歩 ★担当者: 開発チームへの依頼書作成と送信。 コメント募集 & 投票 マークアップ機能の改善で、どのような利便性が期待されますか？ 複数ページ選択機能が実装された場合、どの業務が効率化されますか？ 他に改善が必要な機能はありますか？ ご意見・ご投票をお待ちしております。

title: Linke document
body_text: It would be very helpful if ACC had an option to link a document from one folder to another. In our project files, we often need the same document to appear in two folders — for example, one as a received document from the client and another in the approved documents folder for sharing with users. This would help avoid duplicate files and make version management much easier.

title: Allow users to change the Collaboration settings inside their ACC template.
body_text: Currently, once a template has been created from a Project that has Collaboration active in it, the user cannot easily go back into the Template and make changes to the setup for Collaboration. Folders can be moved and rename but this is a laborious process.

So, we would appreciate seeing that as a feature added to bolster ACC's value and ability to automate workflows related to submittals.

This limits flexibility, especially when collaborating across multiple platforms such as Revit, Navisworks, and different ACC views. title: Access level drops for project admins when assigning a new role
body_text: I noticed that recently there has been a change to members tool. Now if you assign a role with default access level of project member to a user who have been assigned as project admin in the project, the user gets demoted to project member based on the most recent role added. This has caused some problems because during the project we would like to maintain our project admins but have the freedom of adding them to multiple roles. Now every time we add a new role to a user, we also have to double

title: Allow project members to manage Budget/Cost Overview Columns and Custom Attributes
body_text: Currently, there is no access for project members to manage Budget/Cost Overview Columns and Custom Attributes. In the case of our practices, it is common that configuring Overview Columns and Custom Attributes based on the requirements for different clients. Even for the same client, they may frequently ask to change the Overview Columns and add Custom Attributes for certain periods or purposes. Is it possible to allow project members to have the permission that managing Budget/Cost Overview Co

title: Ability to Make a Main Contract Item Non Reimburseable
body_text: There are times on a project when there are costs that the Owner rejects or won't pay. Currently, the only way to deal with this is to remove the costs off the project entirely. It would be nice to ability to designate a budget code and contract item as non-reimburseable. Meaning the costs will still live on the project but the non-reimburseable contract item would not appear on the Owner Budget Payment Application.

title: TAKEOFF - Import Takeoff Types - Include Filter for Classification System
body_text: When importing Takeoff Types, the only options available are Project Name, Takeoff Package, and Takeoff Types . This is really limiting when dealing with large projects / Classification Systems, because some packages can have hundreds of Takeoff Types, making it time-consuming to find the right ones. It would be a huge improvement if there were additional filters for Classification System 1 and 2 Levels . This would make it much easier to quickly locate and import the correct Takeoff Types, inst

title: Allow Companies to Report or Extract Ideas from the ACC Idea Board
body_text: Add a report or extract feature for companies to report on or extract the details, vote counts and idea status of ideas posted by their employees on the ACC Idea board.

title: Language Translation for Forms
body_text: There needs to be language translation available, especially for forms. We have our field guys fill out many safety and quality forms, as well as daily reports, and it would be a complete game-changer if these could be filled out and translated into different languages.

title: NDA signed pdf file
body_text: The client requires an actual NDA pdf file to be filled out before bidders can view the documents. The electronic signature is not adequate.

title: 腾龙公司游戏网址
body_text: 缅甸果敢老街腾龙公司：成于2010年，是扎根于缅甸果敢自治区的多元化企业。 腾龙公司官网 TL087.cc（客服微信885367416）（QQ3972637212） 业务涵盖房地产、基建、旅游、物流运输以及农产品加工等多个领域。公司还积极投身公益事业，在教育、医疗和环境保护等领域大力支持，为果敢地区发展贡献力量

title: File Sync - Download
body_text: I would like to be able to sync files automatically when updated by the general contractor to our local file system. Now we have to download a zip file and extract all files, overwrite, etc to make sure all our files are up to date. We could always work with the latest project files locally and not worry about working with outdated files.

title: Create reference parameter for Curve Length. So it can be used with an equation to drive instances
body_text: Create reference parameter for Curve Length. So it can be used with an equation to drive instances. Or an i logic to access "curve length" of a rectangular pattern and create a parameter inventor 2025

title: Create a Progress Tracking Tool for Labor Hours
body_text: Create a progress tracking tool that allows a PM to track used hours against the estimated hours. Also allow for a "field observed" percentage complete for forecasting out a job. Below is an excel version of how things could break down.

title: Saved filter options from with reviews
body_text: From the "reviews" would be great if once filter were applied for search criteria, i.e "status "Open" that this filter selection could then be saved for future reference, rather than each time having to keep reapplying the filter options to obtain the search results required

title: Model Coordination: Permissions checks to select folders only
body_text: When creating a Space Coordination, we must select a main folder that will be used to load all the models in the folder and its subfolders. Thereis an "Edit" option to select only the folders thta we want to load into Model Coordination, thus limiting the number of models loaded. The problem is that Model Coordination doesn't check permissions for just the selected folders. If users don't have permissions to all the folders selected in the main folder, they'll receive an error stating they don't

title: Add a line item for an additional date milestone in the "Information" tab.
body_text: Add a line item for an additional date milestone in the "Information" tab. We have a virtual pre-bid meeting with all subs. I post it in "Messages" and "Description" but would like an official line for this date milestone upfront on the "Information" section.

title: Publish multiple tasks at once.
body_text: I would like a feature to publish multiple tasks at once.

title: DISPLAY DOCUMENT NAME IN DATA CONNECTOR
body_text: When connecting to ACC to create a PowerBI Report, it would be really helpful to be able to access document names and not just their versioned_urn. Thanks! Alessandro

title: Bid Board Pro
body_text: Provide a way to copy rules from one office to another. I have about 11 offices I need to copy rules to, but I have to build the rule 11 times. I have to do this 11 x 11 because each office has a specific rule...then the opposite of that rule needs to be copied to the rest.

title: Allow Forwarding of Single Contributor Forms for Assistance Without Changing Template Type
body_text: Description: Currently, when a form is set to Single Contributor , there is no way to forward it to a colleague for help or input without changing the template to Collaborative . This limitation creates unnecessary friction in workflows where the contributor may need assistance—for example, uploading images, linking to other forms or issues, attaching documents, or simply getting a second opinion before submission. I propose adding a feature that allows a Single Contributor form to be temporaril

title: Add Comment Field When Returning Forms to Editor During Review
body_text: Description: When reviewing a form, there is currently no option to include a comment when sending it back to the editor. This lack of functionality makes it difficult to communicate why the form is being returned, often requiring a phone call or in-person meeting to explain the issues. This process is time-consuming and undermines the goals of simplicity, efficiency, and traceability in digital workflows. I propose adding a comment field that becomes available when a reviewer chooses to return

title: Review Module and Submittal Modules to be linked up.
body_text: The current Review module and Submittal cannot be linked. Enabling integration between the two would enhance user experience and allow for more comprehensive utilization of ACC.

title: Autosync / bridge in ACC within same project
body_text: Unable to sync the file to another folder. The use of a bridge within the same project offers flexibility to user and eliminates the extra step of copying files between folders, especially when the folders may have different permission settings

title: Expose Forecast Final Cost line item details from data range forecast bases to data connector for reporting
body_text: Would like to use the date range forecast basis for forecasting and capture line item details in reporting. Capture; Number, Name, Start date, end date, qty, unit cost, date range based final cost, forecast final cost and final cost variance columns. see screenshot attached.

title: Resolve the issue where the 'Close' box appears on Submittals whenever an area outside the submission is selected, which is different from how it works in RFI.
body_text: Resolving the issue where the 'Close' box appears on Submittals whenever an area outside the submission is selected—unlike in the RFI feature—is essential for consistency and usability. Addressing this discrepancy will provide a smoother and more intuitive user experience, minimizing confusion and enhancing the efficiency of managing submittals.

title: Spreadsheet Uploader - Building Connected
body_text: Create a feature that would allow a list of 100's or 1000's of items in a specified format to be uploaded into Building connected in the bid form. Right now they need to be manually entered, which is fine if you are not dealing with a large volume of items, but is less than ideal when you have many items to bid out. It is currently faster to bid the items in a spreadsheet with email and excel than it is to enter them manually into Building Connected.

title: Increasing the size limit for Exporting PDF report on issues
body_text: Hi R&D team, We are facing huge amount of Snaglist issues from our Consultant and Client. We created a template report for exporting the Snaglists under issues that were issued by Client/Consultant to us which we assigned to our Subbies. We have come to know that there's a size limit of issues that can be exported in the report in PDF format as per ACC tech support answer to our query "Reports tool is 500 issues per report, up to 2,500 total". I would like to request you increase the threshold l

title: Issue Filter on the Mobile Device - Sheets Module
body_text: Issue filters on the mobile device when in the sheets tool needs to be expanded upon so that if we are using custom fields, we can accurately show those and filter by them like we can in the issues module and on the web. We need this exact same functionality on the mobile device.

title: Automatic detection of duplicate document name
body_text: Would be nice that ACC can detect the same document name but different content. As we encounter an issue that the contractor duplicates the document number when uploading submission on ACC. We would like to seek for your advice, whether it would be possible to set some restriction or pop up some warning message when they input a duplicated number manually to prevent it happens again.

title: Export NWD with comments from ACC/BIM360
body_text: I want to be able to download the NWD, which is already available on BIM360, but with markups, like with the PDFs how we can export the PDFs along with markups, I want to do the exact same thing but with NWD Can we take this as a feature request ASAP, since this would be really helpful for my current workflow, I am open to having a discussion on a teams call if required

title: Mass removal of internal team members from opportunities
body_text: As a subcontractor subscriber to BC, provide an easy way to remove internal team members from an undecided opportunity that we have been sent? We have some customers that send opportunities to us and invite 40+ people from our company. The only way I have found to remove team members is to one-by-one click their name and click remove. Is there and more efficient way to shrink down the number of team members on an opportunity?

title: Cost Payment Application Ball in Court tracked in the workflow steps in the flyout - similar to Contracts
body_text: Cost payment applications need the same workflow steps as Contracts. We need to send documents aka lien waivers out for signature after the amount submitted by supplier has been accepted. unless I'm doing something wrong?

title: Cost Payment Applications Document Package Activity Log
body_text: Would it be possible to have the Document Package "Send for Signature" or "send email" activity in the flyout of the cost payment application? We find ourselves constantly monitory Ball in Court and chasing down for signed documents like lien waivers after the dollar amounts have been accepted. But what if we actually forgot to send it? we get the little green box at the top of the screen letting us know the email was sent successfully, but could that also be in the activity log? I'm grateful it

title: Hover Tool Tip for Issues
body_text: Be able to hover over an Issue pin in ACC and see the Issue number and other relevant information.

title: Data Connector
body_text: Being able to gather data for multiple projects at a time, rather than just one

body_text: Our Quality Control Field Inspectors have requested the ability to pin selected In Progress forms to the top of the list in the Forms tool. They will first create inspection forms from templates, and then later will need to access a certain set of them in the field from a mobile device. title: Mark Ups Revit Plug-in Similar to Issues

It would be super to give Markups the same in-Revit functionality of Issues, that way modelers and PMs, who aren't in Revit, can communicate on the drawings. Most firms use Bluebeam, which is great, but Markups have the same functionality, just missing keyboard shortcuts, but with a Revit plug-in, Markups could be as effective and efficient as Bluebeam.

title: Enhance the scope of work that subcontractors do
body_text: I am a concrete countertop and sink producer and that's all I do. Right now there is no way to specify that. Right now I constantly get bid invitations for concrete(flatwork) or countertops(granite,solid surface) neither of which I do. You need to be able to combine the two instead of having them listed separately.

title: The ability to open forms on a separate tab
body_text: When selecting a form under the Forms module, it would be ideal to open forms on a separate tab and retain the original tab for easier navigation. Users currently needs to revert all the way back to the main folder which means it will have to navigate to the specific subfolder once again each time they wish to review a form.

title: Ability to search all Forms content
body_text: Customers want to be able to search all the content of all Forms - similar like you can do in Sheets already. Form search bar only searches Form name or description.

title: Reports Detail Selection
body_text: For choosing details when generating reports, under Filter, if we're choosing Type, for example, we have several types listed under our Customer Care category and we have to select each checkbox one by one which is tedious and time consuming. Would it be possible to have a checkbox next to the Category so that it would automatically select all types under that Category? Also, under Fields, we currently have 48 fields as we have several custom fields. If we only need to select two of those fields

title: RFI Numbering When Revision is Made
body_text: The current functionality is to use the same RFI and simply append the current RFI number to a revision number. If a setting could be added to make turn that function off to where the RFI number automatically goes to the next number instead of reverting back to a number used in the past. It would

title: MFA limited to use of mobile devices (no email)
body_text: When asking for an authentication, limit it to mobile devices only (sms or authenticator app) but no email. Some clients have a strict policy when using authenticators and it would be very helpful if the preferred method can be set by the client.

title: Showing sheets placement location for asset report
body_text: Hello, I noticed that when I create issues report, it shows its sheet placement location on a zoomed-in sheet inside the report. I think it would be a really good and cool idea to have this feature available for assets as well. Thank you

title: Meetings Agenda/Minutes
body_text: It would be great if the Agenda could be "locked" once the meeting starts, at which point you could add notes/minutes for each item (without affecting agenda items). Once the meeting is finished and the notes/minutes are completed, it could be "locked" as the final meeting minutes. Currently, we make notes on the Agenda and they get lost or conflated with the agenda items.

title: Admin Analytic Reporting
body_text: In the PlanGrid Admin console, I was able to see and dive into more detail reporting on how the team is using the software and the frequency where in Autodesk Build admin side, I don't anything close to what we had on the PlanGrid console side. Is this option coming over soon to Build?

title: Link to Photos on Photo Report
body_text: Since coming over from PlanGrid, when creating a photo report or punch report where a photo was attached, there was a link where the end user can click on that link to download the photo. In Autodesk Build, that option is no longer there or available.

title: Disable the auto-save feature where photos automatically save to the photo roll
body_text: Photos previously did not auto save to my camera roll (android) now they suddenly do. I need to be able to turn that feature off.

title: Déclenchement automatique de revue
body_text: Bonjour, Le système fonctionne bien lorsque le fichier est chargé par l'interface web par contre la revue n'est pas déclenchée si le fichier est chargé en local puis sur le cloud via desktop connector. C'est difficile à expliquer.

title: Avoir le module photos avec Collaborate
body_text: Bonjour, Dès la conception nous utilisons des photos du site existant. Il faut que nous activions le module Build pour cela ce qui "fait croire" que la phase de construction est commencée.

title: Possibility to automatize the copying of the approved files in the submittals
body_text: I would like to suggest an improvement regarding the handling of approved files in submittals. Currently, once a document is approved and the Close and Distribute option is selected, the system allows placing an overview report in a folder, but not the original approved file(s). It would be very helpful if this process could be automated - either enabling the distribution of the approved documents directly (similar to the functionality available in Docs review), or by allowing the original files

title: Looking for a bulk uniform supplier who can help me out with staff uniforms?
body_text: Hi everyone, I’m in the process of finalizing uniforms for my startup detailing company and could really use some guidance from those who have gone through this before. I’m considering sourcing from reputable bulk uniform suppliers or uniform manufacturers in India to get quality uniforms at scale. If anyone has recommendations for trustworthy bulk uniform vendors, please share! A few questions I have: Are there specific colors that work better for detailing staff uniforms? Any colors to avoid?

title: Improvement Request for Naming Convention Error
body_text: 現在、命名規則では、記号、数字、テキストの混合の使用はサポートされていません。この制限により、ユーザー操作の柔軟性と効率が低下する可能性があります。理想的には、記号、英数字、テキストを自由に入力できる入力ボックスが必要です。この機能を実装すると、プロジェクト管理が大幅に合理化される可能性があります。

title: Default PCO / SCO status to be managed at project level
body_text: Currently, the various status options for PCO and SCO are set and can't be changed. It would be helpful to have the option to set which status a PCO or SCO automatically starts at. For instance, a PCO defaults to "Draft" however a PCO in draft status does not report any of its values on the budget columns. The PCO status has to be set to "Open" for it to be reflected on the budget columns. Similarly, a SCO that is in "Draft" or "Open" status doesn't appear in the budget columns either. A SCO has

title: RFIs
body_text: I believe that all project members should be able to view and access all information requests. Otherwise, access management shouldn't be too complex. One thing is certain: site administrators should be able to view and access everything at any time. They should also be able to download them in Word or PDF format. Information requests can concern technical, legal, and financial matters. The most important reason is the legal aspect. Disputes can arise years after a project's delivery and take eve

title: enhance viewing support for MicroStation files: 3D ref. content in 2D files
body_text: This is a high priority issue for companies that do not only work with Autodesk files on ACC, but also use MicroStation with ACC (currently only as a 'cloud platform'): In order to make use of further ACC processes like issue management viewing of .dgn files must be accurate. Please make sure that 3D elements coming from (internal) 3D model references are also displayed in 2D models (layouts).

title: Link the List of Disciplines that you select from when you create an RFI to your Sheet Disciplines
body_text: We would like to be able to choose Disciplines like Geotechnical and others, but you can't edit the List of Disciplines currently. Could you link the Disciplines that you have for your Sheets to the List you can choose from in the RFI.

title: Add Status: Descision to meeting minutes
body_text: Currently, it's not possible to track decisions in meetings. A decision status is required that behaves the same as the "Closed" status. However, this is important for traceability, so we can filter these decisions. Please add this status. Without this status, meetings are difficult to use because there isn't enough overview.

title: Composite filters in Build asset searches
body_text: Be able to apply filter groups to asset searches within the Build module. For example: Concatenate AND and OR logic. Assets = Item Name “Begins with...” AND Description “Contains...” AND Source File = OR Source File = selecting only 2 source files from many different ones contained in our common NWC file.

title: Extracting Key Responses to Improve Form Identification
body_text: In the current list of forms, there is only limited information available. For larger projects, when contractors and subcontractors need to complete a significant number of forms, the list becomes long and the forms are difficult to identify. At present, it is only possible to use the form name or description to add searchable information, but neither of these fields can be enforced for the person completing the form to edit or fill in. Moreover, in many real-world cases, the individual referred

title: Hyperlinking in multipage PDFs
body_text: Currently, there is a limitation with hyperlinking. This function is not possible in multi-page PDF documents . This prevents a large part of the functionality, since many registers and similar documents are multi-page, and their purpose is precisely to reference other documents. If one were to split them into individual PDFs, it would result in more extensive document management and an increased number of documents in the project. Hyperlinking functionality should be supported in multi-page doc

title: End date in submittals summary report, review report
body_text: Please add a section(end date of RFI) in review report and end date in submittals summary report as well. Also add next action date, time and next action team members in Reviews summary,so each stage of RFI can be identified. These are minimum requirements for tracking. End date is missing in Summary report and next action date too.

title: Model Brower keybord functions
body_text: When a component is selected in the model, it would be helpful if the ‘left arrow key’ on the keyboard would jump to the next higher level in the hierarchy (as in Navisworks). This would make it easier to find out in which substructure/model the selected component is located. In addition, a ‘close all collapse tree’ function for all open substructures would be advantageous. Idea: ‘Up arrow key’ – close all ‘Down arrow key’ – reopen all

title: ACC Model Browser Filter
body_text: It would be helpful if the disabled elements were listed at the top of the display. It is very tedious to always scroll to the end of the sometimes very long list to activate the disabled elements. This is the same for other filter options.

title: Customizable “Internal Project Support” in Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC)
body_text: It would be highly beneficial to have a feature in the Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) that allows creating an “Internal Project Support” section within each project. This feature would provide users with a centralized, configurable support overview and make it easier to connect with the right contacts: Customizable support categories Ability to set up different support areas, such as IT Support , BIM Management , Project Management , Construction Site Coordination , Specialist Planners , etc.

title: Ability to have Workshared Cloud models in ACC project templates
body_text: It'd be great if we could have our Revit templates as workshared enabled cloud models in our ACC project templates so Revit models are ready to go at project setup.

title: Split PDF Report when select multiple Forms to download
body_text: When exporting reports from the Forms tool , I noticed that selecting multiple Forms generates a single consolidated PDF containing all the selected items. I would like to request an option to export each Form as a separate PDF file , even when multiple Forms are selected at once. This would greatly improve efficiency, as users would not need to export each Form individually. Thank you for considering this enhancement.

title: Option to hide metadata when export a report
body_text: I would like to suggest an enhancement to the Meetings tool in ACC. Currently, when exporting a report for Minutes of Meeting (MOM) , the report includes metadata such as the “ Created on ” record. It would be very helpful if there were an option to hide or exclude this metadata when exporting the report, so that the output can be cleaner and more professional when shared externally. Thank you for considering this suggestion.

title: ACC > Account Administration > Account members (add Email column)
body_text: Adding "Email" property to the Account members list view would be helpful. Often times users are added but the company is omitted. (Adding the email address would be beneficial to sort and filter. After all, it is possible to search on email address).

title: Suggestion for Field-Level Access Controls in Submittal Module
body_text: I’d like to propose an enhancement to the Submittal Module within Autodesk Build that would significantly improve data security and workflow integrity across project teams. Currently, when a member is added to a project via the Admin module, their access is governed by their assigned role. While this role-based model provides general control, it lacks the granularity needed to manage access to specific fields within modules such as RFIs and Submittals. This means that once a user has access to a

title: Building Connected - Ability to view bid history at the bid item level (bid items within each bid package)
body_text: It would be transformational for this platform having the ability to view or export a comprehensive list of bid items from multiple bid packages that could potentially refer to the same item being quoted but for different projects. Example: Requesting a $/ft quote for each of the following items: 855,350 ft of MV-105 Cable, 133% insul, #1000Kcmil Al, CN 1,785,450 ft of MV-105 Cable, 133% insul, #750Kcmil Al, CN 525,875 ft of MV-105 Cable, 133% insul, #500Kcmil Al, CN The majority of our projects

This is a very specific and common trade in the southwest. It makes it very difficult for GCs to find the right subs and for subs to find the right projects. Most companies that do drywells, just do drywells. Happy to loop in any customers if needed.

title: Filter category for annotation
body_text: when creating a filter, in the filter list don't have an annotation category. anything that's an annotation is lumped into nothing.

title: Export of Bid Solicitation Emails
body_text: Hello, We need a way to mass export the bid solicitation emails. Public projects require proof. Thanks.

title: RFI page arrows
body_text: Arrows to "flip" between RFIs would be incredibly helpful. Similar to the arrows to go through sheet sets. As soon as you exit one RFI to search for another, you are moved back to the beginning of your list. Being able to flip through them be RFI# order would help tracking workflows.

title: When member is admin, and you change their role, it removes the project admin from the account
body_text: If we try to change the roles on a project admin, without touching the access level, it will remove the project admin back to project member. See before and after pictures.

title: Ability to Sort by “Assigned To” in the Issues Tab
body_text: Currently in the Issues tab within Build, sorting is limited to certain columns (Title, ID, Status, Type, etc.), but it is not possible to sort by “ Assigned To ” or “ Created By .” This creates challenges when I need to quickly review issues grouped by assignee, since filtering only allows me to see one person’s issues at a time and doesn’t provide the bigger picture across the team. Having the ability to sort by “Assigned To” (and ideally “Created By”) directly in the Issues tab would make it

title: Auto-Suggest Next Sequence Number on Upload
body_text: Feature Request: Auto-Suggest Next Sequence Number on Upload When uploading a file to ACC using an enforced Naming Convention, it would be extremely useful if the system could suggest the next available sequence number based on existing files with the same naming fields (Project Code, Originator, Doc Type, etc.). Why this would help: Prevents accidental reuse of sequence numbers. Saves time by eliminating manual checking. Reduces errors that cause files to be rejected or require renaming. Sugges

title: RFIs - No way to type in Ball in court, but needs to be manually scrolled through in the dropdown and selected
body_text: There is no option to type in a name in Ball in court in RFIs, only select from the dropdown

title: RFIs filter by In review by each step, not just in review
