body_text: Can't assign Ball in court or Manager to multiple people when you only need one response

title: Allow users to nominate a temporary delegate during absences
body_text: Users should be able to specify a delegate for assignments (reviews, meeting action items, issues, RFIs, etc) for a specific time period, e.g. during longer absences. Delegation is a common practice in systems that manage assignments, and implementing this would significantly improve efficiency, prevent delays, and reduce the need for manual intervention to reassign tasks.

title: Forms notification settings
body_text: If a form is created based on a template with section assignee and automatically notification after submitting a section to the next assignee - this notification doesn't work anymore when in the form an assignee has to be changed manually. This would make it possible to create forms for different assignee groups with just one template, or to change assignments in forms that have already been created.

title: Published NDA Adjustments
body_text: Good afternoon, I think it would be very beneficial and helpful to have the ability to make adjustments to a previously submitted NDA on a project that has been published in Building Connected. NDAs can change during the bid process and it would create mass confusion having to close out a project and then duplicate it. This would send invites twice to the same bidder which is where the confusion would come from. Thanks

title: Add the ability to preview more file types in the Files module of ACC
body_text: If a file can have a preview from Desktop Connector, it should also be able to be previewed in the web version of Docs. One example here is saved emails. While they can be previewed in the Desktop Connector, they cannot be previewed in the web version of Docs. The more files that can be previewed in the web version, the less need there is for Desktop Connector on the computers of non-design users who may still need access to project files, contracts, documentation, etc.

title: Add "Snaps" for Document Compare in ACC
body_text: When using the document compare capability, the user needs to be able to have snap functions in order to accurately align the two documents being compared

title: ACC - Docs - Civil 3D Project with References - Change drawing order
body_text: In Civil 3D (or AutoCAD) projects with refeences I would like to change the "drawing order" if I have for example surfaces, alignments, pipes and some images in my project.In AutoCAD or in Civil 3D it`s one click to change the drawing order. An implementation in the standard ACC Viewer and in the special Viewer for the Civil Tools would be very helpful.

title: Collect view functionality in the dedicated viewer
body_text: We want to highlight the benefits of using scans from ReCap in Model Coordination, including the view bubbles combined with the models (currently available in beta(?) in ReCap). At present, this functionality is missing in Model Coordination. We are aware of that we can upload and open ReCAP projects. But the need is to include with the developed content i CAD/CAE in reviews, issues, etc. Since we already collect our projects in here, it would be highly beneficial to avoid redoing this work in R

title: Account Admins Edit Non-Active User Information (Cost)
body_text: When we add non-active user information in cost, Account Admins should be able to edit the contacts information if there is an error, or if they change their name. This is particularly important when a generic contact email address is used for a company (EX: customersupport@company.com ). Additionally, this contact information is pulled into contract documents and used for DocuSign, so there is a need to edit names associated to an email address.

title: Ability to measure from DWG files in Takeoff
body_text: Currently only PDF files can be uploaded when using 2D takeoff. We would like to be able to import and measure from DWG files.

title: Workflow Review
body_text: I hold a senior position and have to approve all Cost items for all our projects. It would be nice if there way one area i can go to review and approve all the workflow reviews I have to do for all the projects without having to go into each project? It would be nice to go to One place like maybe my Admin "home page" where i can review and approve all my workflow reviews all in one place.

title: Assign License Account Admin
body_text: When adding a new user to the Account in Account Admin, where we can select their company, default role, and access level, why can't we choose what license they will be granted? After I've added someone, I have to search for that person in the directory, then assign the license after the fact. It feels like a lot of clicks that don't need to happen. This is especially frustrating when I have to had 10-15 people at once and have to search for all of those users individually to assign them all a l

title: BuildingConnected Profile Separate DBA designation
body_text: In the company profile there should be a secondary line where a company can input there DBA. This would ideally help to improve searchability when contractors are unaware that the company is operating under a DBA and do not know the companies primary name. If it is possible to then choose a "Network Display" name this would also improve searchability. The reason the DBA cannot be the regular display name is to ensure that the profile matches tax documents, which often display the primary company

title: Public Correspondence not fully public
body_text: Public permissions aren't really public for all members and if you need to reference an email, project member cannot see it if not included in the email, which makes the module senseless, and pushes you to use Files for emails instead

title: Need an option to customise clasification for review status
body_text: Need an option to customise clasification for review status, sometimes it shouldnt only be between approved and rejected

title: Handover - no way to edit/delete/supersede/archive information
body_text: No way to edit or delete information within 2 - Submittals folder. Once a document is automatically copied from the Submittals, there is no way to edit name of the folder or file, or move to a different location. If a new revision of a submittal is created with the same document, the document in the Handover module will not be updated or replaced with new revision, but will just add it as a new document, whether or not the document names are the same

title: Handover - no way to edit copied items
body_text: No way to edit or delete information within 2 - Submittals folder. Once a document is automatically copied from the Submittals, there is no way to edit name of the folder or file, or move to a different location

title: Handover - allow for Reviews module to be copied automatically
body_text: If the documents are being reviewed in Reviews rather than Submittals, they need to be manually copied into Handover module, making it redundant. Automatic copy of documents that go through O&M workflow in Reviews can achieve the same outcome and there is option to edit the structure after. A lot of work to be done in the Handover module as at the moment it lacks use. Furtheron, the fact that it is under project admin makes no sense and does not allow all members to have visibility of what is th

title: No project admin settings in app
body_text: No project admin settings in app available

title: No reviews available on app
body_text: No reviews available on app

title: Submittals - Rename field Assign to responsible contractor
body_text: Field 'Assign to responsible contractor' when creating a submittal creates an additional unnecesary step where some contractors might assign it to themselves, while some to managers, creating room for error and confusion

title: Submittals - automated copy upon approval
body_text: Can't copy documents upon approval to another location in Submittals. If you wanted to have a centralised location for approved documents from Submittals, you'd have to manually copy (and when manually copying, markups can't be copied over)

title: RFIs - Add Answered on and Closed on columns next to Created on
body_text: Add Answered on and Closed on columns next to Created on in the main tab of RFIs so reporting is made easier

title: Can't add more options for pre-existing fields in RFIs
body_text: Can't add more options for pre-existing fields in RFIs, but you'd have to choose 'Other' or recreate as custom fields but then they can't be required

title: Can't assign Ball in court, Manager or Reviewer in RFIs to role
body_text: We need an option to assign Ball in court, Manager, Coordinator or Reviewer to a role in RFIs as opposed to individual members because if one is not working, e.g. Co-reviewer doesn't have the same rights as Ball in court

title: Working days for each step of RFI workflow
body_text: Need an option to add working days for each step in the RFI type, not just the total workflow number of calendar days, similar to Reviews setup

title: Punchlist Item Workflows
body_text: Can you apply the workflow format to ISSUES / punchlist items? For example - I have drywall that needs to be patched/repaired. I create the issue and assign it to my drywall contractor. Once he completes it, I need the same repair/location to now be addressed by the painter as soon as the work becomes available. Currently, that mean creating/managing multiple issues. It would be ideal to have the flexibility to preset the steps and assign 1 issue to multiple contractors. ie. ISSUE - Patch/Tape/S

title: Export combined PDF files for Desk Set
body_text: In the files module, I have an issue with the fact that you cannot export a group of PDF sheets as a combined file. BIM360 would export the selected sheets as a group, with custom sorting, and with hyperlinks.

title: Multiple Feature Requests for General functionality
body_text: Desktop Connector : Ability to open desktop connector without it being pinned to screen. It cannot go to background or be moved without it closing. Also would like notifications on syncing errors since they're so frequent. Not backlogging syncs when there is 1 error 'in front'. Just skip the error and keep going. Better syncing between connector & Browser iPad App : Ability to make updating comments on room status from app. This is only available in the web browser. Easier way to 'drop tool' in

title: Comments Column for File Version in Version History in ACC Docs
body_text: We use ACC Autodesk Docs and Files for housing all CAD documents. I want the functionality in Docs to mark the exact version of a dwg used in the IFA set of drawings or in the IFC set of drawings. If there was a manual way in the version history window to mark the file "V2" as the IFA version then I can easily go back when I save the file 15x down the road and can compare "V40" to the IFA version. This could be an attribute or could be a comments column to make notes on the version that was save

title: ACC Bridge Metadata Capturing - Metadata captured from source to destination project using bridge functionality
body_text: After files being transferred from source to destination project using bridge the metadata like the file uploaded by whom in source project or when it is uploaded in source project and other details is not copying/syncing which the request from my side.

title: Report Filter Additions
body_text: I would like to run a daily automated issue report for certain watchers assigned to specific issues. However, a "watcher" is not a filter option when creating a report. Can you please add "watchers" to the filter option within the report selections.

title: Contract Status in Building Connected
body_text: Building connected should have a contract status column in the project bid package window to quickly identify which packages have already been awarded contracts and been created in Cost Management.

title: Commitment Code added to Cost Payment Application
body_text: Can we get the Commitment Code added to the Cost Payment Application screen (as a field that can be viewed)? We can see the Commitment, but it would be really helpful to see the actual Commitment Code itself. So it would look something like this: Thanks!

title: Forms: Work log - Work Performed field
body_text: The Work Performed field in the Work Log is quite small. This is where we need to enter the most information, and it isn't sized correctly to quickly add text. Could it please be made larger?

title: Display model coordination of hidden elements in the viewer
body_text: Within the Settings menu of the "Model Coordination" viewer, users have the option to either conceal hidden elements or allow them to remain partially visible. To enhance the visibility of collision alerts and place task pins, it is advisable to disable the display of hidden elements. However, for the purpose of orienting in the model, I would like these elements to be clearly visible. For this reason, I alternate between the two view options. The process would be streamlined if a toggle button

title: Pushing Standard Home Page to All Users
body_text: It would be very useful to be able to design a company specific user home page and add this to all users from the account admin. We can then ensure critical items are shown in each user's home page in the preferred configuration.

title: Naming Convention - Drop down selection rules
body_text: We have developed an external app/website that allows our sub-contractors to easily name their files following the ACC applied naming convention prior to uploading to ACC. Within this app we have set rules which sets the next container/field drop down list based on the previous container selection. This allows us to reduce mistakes and reduces the errors by human decision as the drop down list visible for selection are smaller and limited. Here is the draft example: Project Document Naming Tool

title: Add Received Date to Sheet Sets
body_text: Add a 'Received Date' to Sheets Sets to note when the set was actually received from the architect.

title: Set Standard File List Views on Projects
body_text: Allow project admins to set what columns in the File list views that members can see.

title: Add Option to Set What Sheet List Columns Are Displayed
body_text: Add the ability for project admins to set and restrict which Sheet columns display in the Sheets list for all project members.

title: Docs Review Summary
body_text: When you create a workflow to review a document, it does not tell you the review status of each person assigned. To add to this, the folks that do review a document have to reference this in the recent activity window. It would be nicer and cleaner to show an itemized list of all the people assigned to a review, their status, and any comments.

title: Allow Members to Completely Opt Out of Form Notifications
body_text: All members of our company are granted View permissions on every Form Template so they can see the Forms completed on any part of the site. Unfortunately, project members cannot currently opt out of all Forms notifications. Our employees are getting instant notifications on every Form status changes, as is documented in the Form Notifications Help page ( https://help.autodesk.com/view/BUILD/ENU/?guid=Build_Forms_Notifications ). This is very frustrating to users who only require access to the Fo

title: Allow users to display temperature in centigrade.
body_text: Allow users to display temperature to Centigrade directly in Build.

title: Add the ability to include the "Activity Log" of an issue to be displayed within a report
body_text: It would be useful to add the ability to include the "Activity Log" of an issue within a generated report. This would allow the full history to be displayed clearly within a detailed issue report.

title: Add a "Redetermine all location from placements" button
body_text: If new locations are added or locations are changed, there is no way to "recalculate" the automatically determined location of an Issue placement pin on the drawing, except for manually moving the issue over by a couple of pixels. We suggest adding a button which could force this update for all issues in a project. While this can be avoided by setting up locations before any pins are placed, it would still be a useful feature if project teams do not remember to configure locations or must change

title: Improve Where Build Takes You After You Discard a Form
body_text: On a computer, if I discard a draft form I was previously filling out, don't later kick me out to the project home screen. Kick me back to the Forms screen. This current process causes extra clicking steps.

title: Submittal Document Deletion
body_text: Would be nice to be able to delete submittal documents after they've been submitted, not just at the first step. Sometimes there will be an updated file that needs to go in place of the originally uploaded document, but there's no way to delete the original document, you can only download.

title: Add Notification and/or a Report Warning of Unpublished Sheets
body_text: In order for projects to see if they have unpublished Sheet Sets, someone on the project must open the Sheets Publish Log and review the Statuses for sets that did not publish. This is a huge problem when sets are published via an API. Please add a notification or an Insight report that provide a means to warn project admins and users with the ability to publish Sheets if there are any unpublished Sheets Sets.

title: Add Status to the Sheets Set Data Extract Table
body_text: In order for projects to see if they have unpublished Sheet Sets, someone on the project must open the Sheets Publish Log and review the Statuses for sets that did not publish. This is a huge problem when sets are published via an API. Please add the Status to the Sheet Sets Data Connector extraction table so this can be identified in a Power BI dashboard.

title: Allow Projects to Select What Sheets Columns Users Can View and Only the Current Version
body_text: Allow project admins to set the viewing settings for Sheets, including the ability to remove all columns except the drawing number and name, and to restrict users to be able to see only the current drawing version. Restrictions on Collections is desired as well.

title: Allow Projects to Select What Issue Columns Users Can View and Only the Current Version
body_text: Allow project admins to set the viewing settings for Issues, including the ability to remove all columns except the drawing number and name, and to restrict users to be able to see only the current drawing version.

title: Add the ability for Model Viewers to Add Issues in the ACC Mobile App, as They Can on the Web
body_text: Allow model viewers with the appropriate permissions to add Issues in the ACC mobile app like they can on the web interface.

title: Include Hyperlinked References to Forms, Assets and Sheets in the Issues Detail Report
body_text: Include hyperlinked references to Forms, Assets and Sheets in the Issues Detail Report.

title: Allow Sheet Versions to be Made Current Individually
body_text: Allow users with Sheet Manage permissions to make a single sheet version as the current version, similar to the 'Make Current' functionality in BIM 360 Docs Plans folders.

title: Clearly Indicate Which Form Items Were Optional on the Forms Detail Report
body_text: Add the word "(Optional)" to all Form Items on the Forms Detail report so users viewing the report know that an item was not ignored.

title: Specifications Saved Searches
body_text: Like in sheets, it would be nice to have a save search option within the viewer and/or Autodesk Assistant.

title: Include Hyperlinks in the Sheets Log Export
body_text: Include hyperlinks to the drawings in the Sheet export log. Additional user request: It would also be helpful to have the link to the "Search Result" Page on the cover that indicates the filters used to generate the current list of drawings in the generated Excel Log.

title: Add User Option for Sheets to Open in Same Tab
body_text: Add an option for Sheets to open in the same tab instead of opening in a new tab. This should be a setting at the user level.

title: Hide Build Additional Modules at the Project Level
body_text: Allow projects to hide the Correspondence, Specifications and Meetings Build modules from project members.

title: Add a 'Copy Link' button to the Share Saved Searches Interface
body_text: Add a 'Copy Link' button on the Sheets Share Saved Searches interface that copies a link that can be published on project dashboards.

title: Copy All Permissions from Project Templates
body_text: Copy Specification and Asset permissions from project templates to the new project.

title: Allow Users to Hide Photo Markups on Sheets
body_text: Currently, there is no way to hide only Photo markups on sheets. It would be nice if users could hide photos.

title: Improve Form Detail PDF Report Bookmarking
body_text: Improve the Forms Detail report bookmarks to have the Forms ‘Number – Name’ as the high level bookmarks with the Forms “Forms”, “Supporting Information” and “Form detail” bookmarks to be subordinate below the ‘Number – Name’ level. This would allow for easy separation by PDF editors into separate PDF’s.

title: Additional Form As-Built Filtering Criteria
body_text: Add additional filtering criteria to the As-Built Forms selection so users may choose to include forms based on form date, status, template type, Assigned To, Location and Template Name.

title: Form Names in the Forms Notifications Emails
body_text: Currently the daily email notifications appears to use the name of the form template in the notification email, not the form name. It would be more helpful if is displayed the name of the completed form, because users will often edit the form name to be something unique.

title: Print and Download Overlays
body_text: Please add the capability to print or download the results of the Sheets and Files overlays.

title: Asset Detail Report Issue Snippets
body_text: Add an Issue snippet that would show up in the Asset detail report (similar to Issue detail report showing issue pins).

title: Show Information When Hovering in Sheets for Pinned Issues
body_text: Display the the "Description" and "author" of a pinned Issue without forcing a user to click on it to pull up the side detail window.

title: Add "Created By" Mobile App Filter
body_text: In the field, and on the mobile app, a construction team was wanting to filter Issues by "Created by" but was not given the option. I would like to see this filter, and potentially more from the web, on the mobile app as it would be helpful for teams to have more options.

title: Adding Users - Improve Visibility of Role Selection on Screen
body_text: Improve the Role dropdown so we can actually see the words. Presently you have to guess which one you want, then when it's added you check if you picked the right one. If we should have any admins that accidentally assume the correct one was picked (or they don't double check), we are asking for mistakes.

title: Pin Navigation Panel in Specifications Module
body_text: The user should be able to pin the side navigation panel so that it doesn't go away when the user clicks on a different spec section. The pin state should be retained in subsequent browser sessions.

title: Add the Ability to Make Description Mandatory on Forms
body_text: We are seeing project members inconsistently use the description field in the Form Basic information section. It would be nice if we could make this field mandatory so that an appropriate description is entered for the checklist.

title: Add a Function to Duplicate Form Templates
body_text: There is currently no way to duplicate a form template. It would be very efficient if we can create a generic form template, and duplicate it/revise as needed. The only way to do it right now is it import the form template, from that project, into the same project which isn't efficient when creating all your QC checklists

title: Create Links to Specific Shared Saved Search Filters
body_text: We'd like to be able to create links to specific shared, saved search filters to send to trades who have access to the project on Build. It would also come in handy to be able to add to a SharePoint based project page for external partners with access instead of making folders.

title: Add a Side by Side Sheets View on Web
body_text: I'd like to see a side by side view, similar to good readers, so the folks in the field and compare 2 drawings at once. I could see this being useful in the field, and at the computer, when you are trying to put together 2 details, or understand how a detail is use on a plan/section, etc.

title: Whether - Wind unit m/s
body_text: On the home page in build and in wethertabs in forms the wind in metric is described with the unit km/h. In Europe the unit we mostly use is m/s . Please give the alternative to change this otherwise this data is not as useful.

title: Allow Sheets to be Moved from Ungrouped to Other Collections Folders as New Versions
body_text: Allow project members with appropriate permissions to move Sheets from the Ungrouped 'Collection' to other Collection folders if the sheet already exists in the target collection. That is currently not allowed, users should have the option to treat the move as a version update of the existing drawings in that target Collection. (ref: https://help.autodesk.com/view/BUILD/ENU/?guid=Move_Sheets_Collections_Autodesk_Build )

title: Add an Account Level Setting to Require a Role and/or Company for all Build Project Members
body_text: Add settings at the in the account level to trigger errors if a Build project member is added without a Role or Company. Ideally it would be separate settings.

title: Add Alternate 2-Step Authentication Methods in Build
body_text: We have external users who do not own a cell phone, use only a PC and need email authentication. We cannot enforce 2-step authentication if Autodesk does not support that. Most multi-factor authentication MFA solution providers, including the ones we use for every other web application used in our company, provide email and text authentication as alternate authentication methods to set up and use MFA in their solutions.

title: Add The Ability to Search Across Sheets Collections in the Mobile App
body_text: Allow project members to search across Collections folders in the mobile app.

title: Bring back the archive option on Sheet markups
body_text: Allow users to archive markups so projects can manage markups and keep a history of markups for historical reference and potential disputes resolution.

title: Sheet Discipline Restrictions
body_text: On Sheets, add the ability for a project admin to restrict access to Sheets of specific disciplines, e.g. Security.

title: Issue and Form Mobile Sync Filters
body_text: Add Issue and Forms filters to the mobile app sync filter options to ignore items they are not interested. This would allow users to do faster syncs by not having to sync closed Issues and Forms. Location filters would be very beneficial for large projects as well.

title: Sheets - Improve Functionality While in Full Screen
body_text: The Full Screen button helps users have less blank space on their screen when looking at a drawing. However, there are 2 limitations that could be addressed by: 1. Allow the ability to jump to other sheets. You can only see this option if you escape out of Full Screen. 2. You can't click to open referenced links from Full Screen. You have to again escape out of full screen to read these.

title: Add Sheet Search function option "Does Not Contain"
body_text: Add a "Does not contain" Sheet search option. As an example "Lower Level L1" VS "Level L1" searches for only Level L1 are very tricky and would be simple if you can use the "does not contain "Lower" as part of the search.

title: Sheets Staging Collections
body_text: There are drawing packages, sometimes with hundreds of pages, for which we need to pull reports to gain approval before officially publishing for trades to view and use for construction. Allow project to create Sheet staging Collections that can be restricted by role, company or individual for package approvals before publishing to other Collections after being approved. Files could be used, but the Sheets functionality is preferred for viewing.

title: Remember User Viewing Preferences in Sheets
body_text: Users often need to view only the core drawings, sometimes with markups, reference badges and/or Issue pins turned on and off. Users would desperately like Build Sheets to remember their preferences or last settings.

title: RFI ID closing RFI from Waiting for submission
body_text: When closing RFIs directly from Waiting for submission stage, the system doesn't assign the RFI ID, so by the time someone manually adds an ID, it is already not the number it should be if you have a large number of RFIs on a project

title: Review search function
body_text: Enable when searching reviews to search also for document names and numbers that have been submitted within the reviews, not only review names

title: List watchers in Notify other project members field when sending email notification in Reviews
body_text: Give option for see watchers in particular reviews, those who other project members have notified through Notify other project member

title: Access to all General Contractors Bidding on a project
body_text: To Whom it May Concern, Often times we receive bid invitations from one GC when there are multiple GCs looking at a project. As I was informed there isn't a way, currently, to look on your site for all of the GCs working on that project. Is this a feature you can incorporate sometime in the near future? It would be very helpful! Respectfully, Scott Ford

title: Establish  a global ACC account / tenant
body_text: As a global customer we would benefit of a global account solution that would allow us to share all metadata and configurations while also providing the flexibility to select storage locations at the project level. Currently, if we need specific storage locations, we are required to maintain separate accounts at each data center. This results in significant duplicated effort in managing configurations and master data, as these accounts are independent.

title: There should be attributes like Supplier (Manufacturer) and Scope of Supply in the Assets section.
body_text: Autodesk should add attributes like Supplier (Manufacturer) and Scope of Supply in the Assets section. These attributes will give much clarity on whose scope of supply does this Assets belong and who is the manufacturer of this Asset. So, when the Assets are exported the scope of supply and the supplier's name should be exported to have a better track on the Assets.

title: Swipe left or right on reviews
body_text: Can't scroll through reviews left or right, but you have to go out to all Reviews and click onto the next one, and when you are handling a big amount of reviews at once, it is a nightmare because you forget which one you have been looking at previously.

title: List of all markups left on the document
body_text: If a page has been renamed in V2 and there were markups on the V1, they will not show on Markups tab. On BIM360 all the markups associated to the document were listed in the markups tab, while on ACC if the page where the markup was has been removed or renamed, it will not show in the list

title: Edit without delete permission
body_text: There needs to be an upload permission with ability to edit without deleting. Contractors keep deleting documents and only way to prevent that is to lower their permissions to upload, but then they aren't able to add descriptions or create folders

title: Add option to lower inherited permissions
body_text: Inherited permissions from parent folder cannot be lowered, only raised. If you wanted to lower a permission or remove it to a child folder, you'd have to lower/remove the permission on the parent folder and add individually permissions on each of the children folders, which can be a lot if there are a lot of children folders

title: Void status in
body_text: Show voided status in the folder structure like there is for approved and rejected in Review status column. Currently you have to investigate the file history to see if its been submitted or not because it shows no status

title: Restore deleted document as a previous version
body_text: When restoring a deleted document when there has been already a document with the same name uploaded since, there needs to be an option to restore the deleted version in the original folder as a previous version. Currently if someone deleted a document and uploaded a new document named the same, to restore the deleted document, you have to spend time moving documents around and creating Superseded folders or renaming the documents

title: Remove option "Show object in 3d" for objects that are not visible in the default 3d view
body_text: When option "Show object in 3d" is selected in 2d sheet for object that is hidden in default 3d view, it will open this 3d view anyways, which is misleading. Three solution proposals: 1. Open other view that is showing this object in 3d. 2. Display massage that object is not visible in the 3d view. 3. Remove option "Show object in 3d" from selection for objects that are hidden in default 3d view.

title: Allow to carry markups when a document is copied
body_text: Add option to copy also markups when manually copying documents

title: Mirror the folder options on the left and right hand structure
body_text: Add folders and adjust permission settings on the right hand side folder structure. Mirror the option in the left hand side folder structure to right hand side

title: Misleading "Action Required" Email Notifications for Project Admins - ACC Forms 'Review' Step Notification
body_text: Hi ACC, Context: I have brought this up to "Contact Support" page last year and the response I got was "this is working as intended". Current Issue Project administrators currently receive email notifications with an "Your action is required" heading whenever a form is submitted for review. This is misleading because: In many cases, no action is actually required from the project admin The review responsibility belongs specifically to users/roles/companies designated in the "Review" step of the

title: Suggestion to display Transmittal ID and Date as attributes in Docs Module
body_text: Hi everyone, I'd like to suggest a feature enhancement for the Files module in Autodesk Construction Cloud. It would be incredibly helpful if the Transmittal ID and Transmittal Date of the latest transmittal a document was included on could be displayed as default attributes or columns in the Files module. Currently, tracking down which transmittal a document was included in can be time-consuming: You have to open the version history of individual documents and manually look for transmittals Man

title: Published Markup Crown Visible on Sheet List to indicate Published Issues on Sheet
body_text: When publishing a markup linked to an issue on a sheet, the Published Markup crown icon should appear in the sheet list, just like it does for other types of published markups. Currently, if I publish any regular markup, the crown icon appears next to the sheet name in the list, clearly indicating that there's a published markup present. However, when I publish a markup associated with an issue, this icon is not displayed, even though the markup is live and visible when viewing the sheet itself.

title: Meeting agenda to minutes workflow - A draft status option that isn't shared to invitees/attendees
body_text: A draft or internal review status for minutes is something that would be beneficial, if not essential. Until the wording or contents is finalised and approved internally, we do not want everyone who attended or is invited to be able to view the 'Work in progress' version of the meeting minutes, especially for items of a contractual nature.

title: Display Failure Reason in UI for Auto-trigger Review
body_text: Today when an auto-trigger fails, we can see it in the UI as a number, but have no way to see why it has failed. We do get an email with the reasoning but it is very easy to miss with all the ACC notifications we might get. There should be a way to explore the reason directly in the UI

title: Bid Leveling Line Total
body_text: It would be ideal to have the ability to type a total dollar amount for a line item and the $/unit would automatically populate. Since the $/unit is truncated at the penny, it can be hard to reconcile large quantities with a large total value and get a total bid to match the subcontractor's breakout.

title: Being able to Search for a member to see what projects they are assigned to
body_text: Hello, If I'm involved in a lot of different projects, but want to know what projects does Joe Smith have. I want to be able to search on the home page his name and see what projects he's associated with. Is there any way to do this? Thanks.

title: Unverified Account notification for BuildingConnected
body_text: When there is an account that has joined the company office, a notification should be added where it shows the office leads that the account is "unverified access" or something along those lines. This would be on top of the email that the leads receive to yes/no someone wanting to join the office. Thank you.

title: Access to Meeting Minutes without the need for Build-Access
body_text: It's essential to have the possibility to access the minutes of meeting of meetings which are attended, without the need to access ACC Build. Many attendencies to not have build Acees, but need to take part at some meetings.

title: Possibility to add and view references of a file to other objects (forms, assets, issues...)
body_text: Right now it's only possible to add or view a reference between a file and another object like Issue, Form or Asset, from "the other side". It would be extremly helpfull to see and add a reference also from the file area. Not easy or possible to find out where a pdf is has been referered into (Issues, Assets, Forms) Also, it would be essential to be able to create a complete report with all the references between the different objects.

title: Hide all function for Issues
body_text: Good afternoon Kindly install a hide-all function for issues in sheets. Issues is an excellent tool to communicate improvements needed during construction. The issue is that it's used during construction, so the subcontractors/contractors/suppliers need to see the plans to finish construction, not the issue pins.

title: Punchlist
body_text: We are requesting a solution for when there is a punch list (issues) added to an active sheet, that it can be hidden or that a separate sheet can be created to track punch list items. It is very hard to read an active sheet with all the yellow highlighted indicators that there are issues.

title: Search inside contect of MS Office Files (Word, Powerpoint, Excel, MS-Project)
body_text: The search functionality should also give results from MS-Office Files. Not only pdf. This is a key feature!

title: View native Tekla Files in ACC Viewer
body_text: Would be good to be able to view native Tekla Files inside the ACC Viewer without the need to convert the files.

title: View E3 (Zuken - Electrical Design tool) File formats in ACC Viewer
body_text: Would be great to have the possibility to view E3 Files Formats inside ACC Viewer.

title: Bring all Project Admin Features  (additionally) at one place (Like in BIM360)
body_text: Today the project admin-features are distributed in several places in each of the modules. Would be good to have all the project admin settings in the Area "Project Admin" as it was available in BIM360. A good compromise would be to have this as additional option. SO 2 different entry points. One as is it today on the top right corner of each module, and additionally for better overview in the "Project Admin" Area of the project.

title: Open DWG in Content Catalog
body_text: It would be helpful for at least administrators to be able to open a dwg inside Content Catalog without downloading it first.

title: Require email address before downloading files via shared link.
body_text: Require email address before downloading files via shared link to be able to track who viewed/downloaded the files.

title: BuildingConnected - Push Bid Data to Docs
body_text: Once we complete a project on BuildingConnected, it would be incredibly helpful to have the ability to push all related data—bids, attachments, and other documentation—directly into Docs within the project. We rely on this information as backup when processing contracts, and currently, it requires a lot of back-and-forth between platforms, which is time-consuming. Having a seamless way to transfer this data would streamline our workflow and improve efficiency.

title: Adding new trade name option
body_text: Our company would like to see "carports" added as a trade name to help us better find new bid board opportunities. Adding this option would allow companies with projects needing carports to specifically select that option. A lot of the potential jobs that show up on our board are not in the scope of our business.

title: inner office messaging
body_text: Consider setting up inner office messaging within the team about items we want each other alerted to about projects we are working on. i don't see where it can be done currently

title: Forms: Bolding text
body_text: We're not sure that everyone filling out forms will read and follow all instructions accordingly. It would be great if we were able to bold text to ensure everything is read.

title: Forms: Work Log reorganization
body_text: Something we would like to be able to do in Build is reorganize the companies in the Work Log. The ability to drag and drop to reorganize the list would be helpful.

title: Add Surface Area Calculation Feature
body_text: Currently, ACC provides basic measurement tools for distances and areas through manual drawing. I suggest expanding this capability with the following options: Manual Area Measurement (Similar to Existing Tool): Allow users to manually draw a custom boundary or region and receive an instant calculation of the enclosed surface area. Component Face Area Calculation: Enable users to select a building component (such as a wall, floor, ceiling, or panel) and then click on one of its faces to automati

title: Be able to filter activities in the issues (e.g. only see the comments)
body_text: The activity log in an issue is currently quite confusing, so that it is easy to lose track. We would like to be able to filter the activity log, for example, to see only the comments like a chat or only the status changes

title: Request to Change World Icon
body_text: Regarding the [world icon] at the top right of Autodesk Construction Cloud, I initially thought it was for language selection, but it turns out it means [data storage region selection]. I primarily work in Japanese. Due to a bug, the display sometimes switches to English. When this happens, if I click the world icon, my projects disappear, which was very confusing. The world icon on the Autodesk homepage is for language selection, and it looks identical. This is misleading, so could you please c

title: ACC Build - RFI’s & Submittals
body_text: We are a Civil Engineering Consultancy that uses Build to manage construction projects often times as the client representative. Our internal users are saying they have need for separating internal comments and discussion from external user (contractor) view during the review process. They wish to have that dialog available to only internal users until only at time of final answer have such available to external eyes (contractor) to act upon.

title: BuildingConnected Bidder Scope View
body_text: While in the "Bidders" tab on a project for a specific scope, it would be extremely useful if there was a little menu/tool that showed which other scopes the bidders are also bidding on the project. For example there are generally the same subs bidding multiple finish scopes and being able to click on their name and be told what other scopes they are bidding on the project rather than looking through manually would be super useful for communication. Thanks!

title: Customise Issue Notifications
body_text: Is there a way to customise the notifications based on the table below (please see screenshot)? Our clients are added as watchers in the issues and prefer to receive notification when an issue is created and when it’s closed at the end – they are not interested in receiving notifications for any other actions. Can we manipulate the permissions outlined in the screenshot below?

title: Sheet scaling
body_text: It would be great if you could add the scaling for sheets for 1:25

title: Enable multi-user Track Changes for MS Office documents in review workflows
body_text: Idea description: Introduce functionality within the system to allow multiple users to check out a Microsoft Office document and make updates using Track Changes, all within the Reviews workflow module. Reason: Currently, the system does not support this essential capability, forcing teams to move documents into external platforms for collaborative review. This creates unnecessary IT and resource overhead, including increased licensing costs, data integrity risks, and manual effort. This limitat

title: ACC - Linking Scan Files via Desktop Connector
body_text: Can we add a link between ACC desktop connector and the recap .RCP file extension, so larger scan files can be hosted on the ACC platform and all we need to have is link the .RCP file via the Desktop connector.

title: ACC - Design Collaboration Publish Files directly to Files
body_text: In design collaboration model files require downloading to the platform through the swim lanes for hosting on the modeler's target folders, for linking to the in revit models. Can this action be completed in one swoop. Whereby the published latest model goes directly from Revit to the shared folder for linking?

title: ACC - Drawing Mark ups not shared
body_text: Sharing Marked up drawings tech subs do not carry the mark ups. There should be an option to capture this or not. Stamping of drawings is vitally important to show that these have been given full approval. Yet this simple task does not exist.

title: ACC - BUILD FORMS EXPORT
body_text: THE FORMS TOOL DATA EXPORT IS DISPLAYED IN A WAY THAT IS NOT MANAGEABLE FOR THE QUALITY TEAMS. THE EXPORT DATA IS STRUCTURED IN SUCH A WAY THAT IT PREVENTS USERS FROM GENERATING A STATUS OVERVIEW FROM THE EXPORTED DATA. THERE SHOULD BE A COLUMN FIELDS "SECTION", "QUESTION", "ANSWER". CURRENTLY THOSE FIELDS ARE SPREAD ACROSS MULTIPLE DIFFERENT COLUMNS. CURRENTLY THE DATA CAN BE ADDED VIA CUSTOM FIELDS BUT IT IS THEN IS FORMATTED IN A WAY THAT SHOWS THE NECESSARY FIELDS FOR FILTERING IN THE ROWS A

title: ACC - Forms Exporting PDF Report
body_text: Currently the .com server (US) does not support exporting multiple forms as a single PDF with attachments. It is currently restricted to exporting a single PDF with 30mb of attachments and does not support file attachments. A fix for this was rolled out on the .eu server (EU) in July 2023. (ticket number 01889051) Can this be rolled out for the US server. An increase of the file size to 100mb would be ideal.

title: ACC - RFI's Reviews and Issue Dates
body_text: Add Working days and calendar days options to all tools for Due Dates, its available in the submittal tools and we action an issue add a 5 day lead time for close which is sometimes on the weekend days.

title: Dynamic Behavior in Native Forms
body_text: We’re implementing ACC Smart Forms for our HSE team and need the ability to show or populate fields based on user selections (e.g., displaying an "Amount" field when a specific option is chosen). Currently, this isn’t possible forcing us to create multiple sections for each variation—leading to inefficient and complex forms. I think this can be easily addressed under conditional logics. We’d appreciate enhanced field-level conditional logic to simplify form building and improve usability. Thanks

title: Add ability to create folders in Files on ACC app
body_text: Add ability to create subfolders in Files on the ACC app.

title: Printing submittals from ipad/iphone
body_text: I have had a number of supers request to have the ability to print submittals from their iPad so they can review items with this subcontractors when sometimes looking at a screen will not do it. would love to see this feature added.

title: Specs and Submittals
body_text: Specs and Submittals should be able to have markups on them. We need to be able to highlight, strike through, and make notes.

title: Ability to Have 2 Distinct Budget Columns
body_text: We would like to have a budget column in the budget table that reflects our internal budget. Currently when we set up Contracts (subcontractor or purchase orders) and associate the costs to the cost codes, these are related to the Budget, which is the sales budget (Main Contract) based on your terminology but in actuality is not what we have alloted to spend on that particular cost code. Our goal is to spend less than the Budget so that we make a profit. In reality, our internal budget for a giv

title: TAKEOFF - Takeoff Type - Increase Character Limit for Takeoff Type Names (cannot exceed 64 Characters)
body_text: Currently, Takeoff Type names are limited to 64 characters , which can be restrictive for teams that use more descriptive naming conventions to capture scope, location, or specification details. This limitation has been a pain point for users who need longer names to ensure clarity and avoid ambiguity across complex packages. It would be a valuable improvement to increase the character limit for Takeoff Type names—allowing for more expressive and informative labels. Expanding this limit would he

title: TAKEOFF - References in Takeoff Types to Improve Traceability
body_text: Currently, there is no option to add references to takeoff types , which limits traceability and context—especially in complex estimating workflows. It would be highly beneficial to enable a feature that allows users to attach references directly to takeoff types. These references could include files , specification sections , or even links to other takeoff types in different packages . This functionality would be especially powerful in scenarios where quantities are developed using external too

title: COST - Budget - Ability to add Budget Items to Existing "Draft" Payment Applications
body_text: Currently, when updating a draft payment application in COST , users can only add change orders —there is no option to add new budget items . However, in practice, some clients have budget items that do not require an approved change order , such as bonus/penalty adjustments , asphalt binder and diesel fuel cost adjustments , or interim crushing payments . Users have reported frustration when they realize mid-process that they need to include such an item, as the only current workaround is to de

title: COST - Change Order - Allow Direct Creation of OCOs Without Requiring a PCO
body_text: Currently in COST , users are required to first create a PCO (Potential Change Order) and go through its associated steps in order to generate an OCO (Owner Change Order) . However, in many cases—particularly when the change is already approved or doesn’t require internal pricing review—a PCO is unnecessary , and users simply want to generate an OCO directly. Several users have expressed frustration with this limitation, noting that they are resorting to creating "fake" PCOs as a workaround just

title: Selecting assets directly from the model
body_text: Hello, I created and imported assets(deutsch "Objekte") to track the progress at the construction site. Unfortunately, it is not possible to click on the asset directly in the model for example to change the status from delivered into installed. It is inconvenient when I am only able to click on the asset in the list but not in the model. Is there a possibility to arrange that? Thank you in advance!

title: Option to Hide Section List in Forms View on iPad App
body_text: Hi Autodesk team, I’m a regular user of the Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) app on iPad, and I’ve found the Forms tool incredibly useful for field documentation. However, I’d like to request a UI enhancement: Currently, when filling out a form, the screen is split with the Form Section list on the left and the form content on the right. On smaller screens like the iPad, this layout can feel cramped, especially when working with detailed forms. It would be extremely helpful to have an option to

title: All settings to be included in Project Template
body_text: All cost and build settings that a project administrator is able to set with in a project should be available in the project template. this would save time for majority of project creation and setup.

title: Bulk Markup Posting
body_text: I was posting RFIs to some plans and thought that it would be helpful if we were able to post a markup on multiple pages simultaneously.

title: Delegated permissions for adding or importing Locations and Associating Sheets
body_text: Currently only Project Admins can create locations, link to sheets, and define areas of the sheet. It would be great to have this security able to be granted within the Sheets tool so managers of sheets can also add, update, link and define areas as well.

title: SCO
body_text: being able to create an SCO without having to do all the other steps

title: Modify RFI creation date
body_text: Would it be possible to have the option to modify an existing RFIcreation date?

title: Auto-filtering or conditional selection of document templates in Cost Management
body_text: If the document templates will differ based on some attributes , we need to have many document templates uploaded in the settings. For example, based on the amount of the COR (specific ranges) and the type of discipline we have different signers for change orders. This means that we will have 3-4 document templates per discipline and the list of templates the user need to select from will be very long. Since requirements for choosing the correct document template is already recorded in custom at

title: Download all messages between team and bidders
body_text: We use BC as our main platform for communicating with our bidders. This communication is an important element of our good faith effort. Not being able to download them, is disappointment. The only solution being offered is screenshotting them; which, when you have over one thousand messages, become an onerous task. BuildingConnected's GFE report should include messages.

title: Upload errors
body_text: When I receive an upload error, how can I determine which items have not been uploaded, without having to check each uploaded/published items? I am informed of where the errors may have occurred, however items a ffected are differentiated in no way I can perceive. Thank you for any help in the assistance of this matter.

title: RFI sorting by External ID on mobile
body_text: On mobile devices, the RFI sorting options are ID Number, Title, Status, and Due date. As a subcontractor, it would be very helpful to be able to sort RFIs by External ID, since the GC's numbers are more frequently referenced than our own internal ID numbers.

title: [Schedule] Ability to bulk remove handoffs
body_text: Sometimes you need to rearrange activities on a plan due to an updated construction schedule. If you have handoffs on these activities, then you need to manually remove them one at a time. Being able to bulk remove these handoffs would make this process much easier.

title: Ausdruck Protokolle
body_text: Im Modul Besprechung sind die PDF Protokolle sehr technisch dargestellt und Seitenumbrüche sind in mitten einer Aufgabe. Das Logo auf dem Protokoll muss a je nach Besprechungsserie anpassbar sein. Es braucht eine übersichtliche Darstellung im Ausdruck in der die Struktur mit den Themen, Besprechungsinhalten sichtbare ist. Die Informationen der Erstellung des Themas und der letzten. Die Fälligkeit und die Zuweisung wird am Schluss der Besprechungsinhalt angezeigt. Dies ist unübersichtlich und sch

title: Specification Upload
body_text: When uploading new specification sets, it would be really helpful if specifications auto-sorted to their correct version order based on issuance date. I accidentally uploaded one spec with an issuance date before a specification that was previously uploaded, and it became the newest version despite having an issuance date before one that was previously uploaded. I now have to go back and delete a previously uploaded version in order to get the specification version history in the correct order.

title: Bid Board Pro - save filters
body_text: Provide a button or way to save filters that you have set up. (i.e. on the main page and on the calendar page). My bid board pro keeps forgetting the filters I've set up and I have to constantly re-do. It would be nice if there was a save function for them.

title: Files for Opportunity Use
body_text: When a main job opportunity is shared with a subcontractor and that subcontractor would like to link their own opportunity to the main opportunity, for purposes of reporting the same information, including job files. I have come across a scenario where those files, for one reason or another cannot be linked. When I reached out to technical support through chat and posed this question, the response that I received was: "Great follow up question - The intended use of the site would be to utilize t

title: Filter by attributes using the mobile app
body_text: Possibility to filter by attributes using the mobile app. Now its only possible to search by file name.

title: Scanning Barcodes in Assets using Laptop
body_text: The mobile application for scanning barcodes in Assets, is inefficient for some of the data entry. I would prefer to use the camera on my laptop, with the full website functionality. It would be ideal if you could scan barcodes using a laptop on the full website.

title: E-Signers Order When Document Templates Are Uploaded in Cost Management
body_text: I've noticed that the order of E-Signers showing up when a document template is uploaded in Cost Management is not actually based on the document template itself (where the value of the Field tag or Field key has been entered on the .docx file) but rather is based on the order of E-Signers on the " Manage e-signature signers" setting tab. This means although the E-signers might have been ordered properly in the .docx file but when uploading the template, a lot of priority and ordering adjustment

title: timestamp of a sealed bid in comparison to the sealed date
body_text: We would like to see/need for Sealed Bids to have a report that tracks: Bid Submission Time Stamp Submitted Document Upload Time Stamp Unsealed Bid Date and Time Unsealed Bid Opened By Add a submitted bid confirmation acknowledgement window for the subcontractor that is tracked in a report This helps when clients/project owner wants details on the above, none of which are available at the moment. Thank you, Diana Skanska USA Building

title: Biuld App on IOS - Apple Pencil
body_text: In PlanGrid, when I use the apple pencil to select the "pen" tool, it will automatically disable touch inputs for that tool, but will still allow panning with touch. In Build, selecting the "pen" tool does not disable touch inputs for the pen, so it is difficult to avoid leaving pen marks all over the sheet when navigating. It would be greatly beneficial to add this feature so that only the desired inputs are recorded when using an apple pencil on an IOS device.

title: Test
body_text: Test for support

title: Invoice API
body_text: We have ongoing projects that are going to be migrated from our old system into Autodesk. We would like the ability to post Paid Invoices into cost management. Some projects are already in the construction phase and there are over thousands of paid invoices that needs to be migrated from the old system to Autodesk. We can't seem to find any API or any way to migrate the data.

title: PHOTO DATA
body_text: Add the functionality for the system to read text in photos and allow them to be included in searches

title: Keyboard Navigation & Workflow Accessibility (web content accessibility guidelines (wcag)
body_text: Problem: A majority of the product does not follow accessibility guidelines such as keyboard accessible navigation and data entry in places such as the assets module. Why is this a problem? Greatly expands data entry effort and time spent adding and maintaining large sets of complex data Support for users with disabilities Opportunities Make this a part of your standard design, dev, and testing procedures for any page that gets a bug fixed, feature added, and/or for any new features/modules This

title: No Minimap in Mobil viewer
body_text: It would be useful to have a minimap in the mobile viewer like in the Web viewer in Model Coordination to better understand where the user is located.

title: Workshop XR: add support for inventor presentations
body_text: Ability to scrub through Inventor presentations with WXR would assist with design reviews.

title: Scaled Printing of Plan Sections
body_text: It would be good if you could print a true-to-scale section of a plan from the ACC. Currently, only complete plans can be printed. This would be an interesting function for some companies.

title: column selection in the member report
body_text: We would like to be able to configure the export of project member lists in ACC by selecting the columns that interest us

title: payment application numbering format prefix
body_text: Not everyone refers to a Payment Application as such. Application for Payment (AFP) and other acronyms are common depending on the parties involved. It would be terrific if we could have a way to customize the payment application numbering in the same way that you can do so for Change Orders and Contracts. Having the ability to choose the prefix used within a company rather than having to rename each payapp from PA001 to AFP001 would save time and confusion.

title: Specify default (prepopulated) value for a field in a naming standard.
body_text: Fields are left blank until a user fills it in, using Naming Standards. It would be helpful if we could specify a default value for specific fields, so that the user does not have to type it in or select it from a list, unless it requires another value.

title: Clearer distinction between different rates.
body_text: ACC call all rates unit cost. and relies on the tab you are in to determine what that rate is. This is confusing and has caused errors because on projects we deal with (at least) 3 rates:- Cost Rate - This is what we pay the supplier - this is the rate in the suppliers SoV Budget Rate - This is what i have allowed to spend on an item - rate from the Budget Tab Selling Rate/Buy Rate - this is what the client will pay me for an item - From main contract Tab. We should as a minimum be able to renam

title: Building Connected Bid Leveling Toggels
body_text: Adding the toggle option that is currently only available in the alternates section, to line item and other cost categories would be a game changer for leveling bids on Building connected.

title: entfernte Rollen auch nicht mehr unter den Filtern anzeigen lassen
body_text: Rollen, die entfernt wurden, tauchen unter den Filtern noch auf. Gekennzeichnet mit "(removed)". Das ist total unpraktisch. Versehentliche Auswahl ärgerlich. Deshalb sollten die entfernten Rollen unter den Filtern auch nicht mehr auftauchen.

title: "Open With" - Feature needs multiple choices
body_text: When right clicking on a file on ACC and the menu offers the choice to "open with", but only gives the standard option, seems pointless. For example, I have a dwg file I want to open. I want to open it directly to my desktop. Right click, open with, and I get one choice, to use the web app, which when I am in the field that's great, but I am sitting at my desk. So, I open with the web app, then have to re-open with desktop app, which requires another download, except it doesn't work due to a fir

title: レビュー機能について
body_text: 現在レビュー時の資料として確認照査項目がついているExcelの回覧を予定していました。 現在1人目の確認者がExcel内の確認欄にサインし、承認者へ回すと元のExcelはVer.が上がりますが、レビューに使用しているExcelのVer.は上がりません。 レビュー中のデータのVer.も上がる仕様や途中の人でも最新に更新できるように改造していただきたいです。

title: Mark Bidder Status as "Bid Received"
body_text: Currently, we as the GC are only able to mark a bidder status as "Bidding" within a bid package. We really need the ability to mark them as " Bid Received ", as many of our subcontractors only submit bids via direct emails, and not through BuildingConnected. We could enter their bid total, but this often involves more time for the estimating team to tally up alternates, etc. which is done outside of BC. For a quick snapshot of who has submitted bids, this would be extremely helpful.

title: Review API- Post and Patch requests
body_text: Hi, I would like to check if there would be PATCH request to add documents to existing Review, and POST request to create a review with documents in the next release. Needed those options to automate Reviews using APIs.

title: Provide Option to Include Links when Downloading Revit Models
body_text: When downloading a Revit, ACC predetermines if it will include the linked models in a zip file. This set based on the time stamp of published models. Seems like it would make more sense for the user to have the option of including the links, regardless of their published status. Kind like the include links option when publishing a model. It's frustrating that sometimes it'll download all the linked models, and sometimes just the target model. We like to download "snapshots" of our model when a p

title: Submittal Codification
body_text: Hello! I would like to know if is possible to increase the maximum digits of the Number field in submittal from 20 to 35 fro example, to be able to include an internal codification like something like this: program code-project location-work order-originator-document type-discipline-subdiscipline-squence number-revision. Other solution would be to be able to configure new fields for this internal codification. Thank you.

title: [Feature Request] Persistent Hidden Takeoff Conditions When Navigating Pages – ACC Takeoff
body_text: In ACC Takeoff, I know we can hide takeoff conditions using the "Hide All Takeoff" button—either globally or individually per condition. This is super helpful for reducing visual clutter, especially when dealing with overlapping takeoff items. However, I’ve noticed that when flipping to the previous or next page, those hidden conditions are no longer hidden—they reset and reappear. I understand that creating additional packages can help as a workaround, but this doesn’t completely solve the prob

title: More methods to change view points
body_text: *more methods to change view points but not changing Views For example. 1. Copy every views and also create these view points in RVT, not just do these in nwd files. I need a quick way to fly to another viewpoint but keep watching the issues in current view. **If these view points can save to project, and using in other models will be better. 2. Keep current viewpoint when changing model versions, so that I can Intuitively compare 3D model differences in versions.

title: Forms Reference file with markup export
body_text: While exporting forms with reference, its better export with markups together with forms embedded reference.

title: ACC Support for MOV file viewing
body_text: ACC should support viewing MOV files via the web portal. iOS devices commonly use this format, and we have to convert videos from iOS devices to MP4 before uploading to ACC for viewing.

title: Reports for Reports
body_text: My customer is always concerned with security and likes to audit all functions of every process. What came up recently was they wanted a report on all the reports that are being created and sent out. Particularly the automated ones. It would be very useful if I could get a export for this. Then I could share the information with my customer or better yet make a dashboard showing the data.

title: only allowing local GC's to send bids
body_text: We've noticed that we often receive bids from general contractors located across the country. While we understand that this is how the platform is designed, our experience over the years has shown that working with GCs outside of the New England area tends to be less successful for several reasons. One of the biggest challenges is during the final billing stage—these companies are often no longer actively engaged with the project and typically lack a local presence or office we can contact. This

title: Model Coordination // Fix access to the Model Browser
body_text: As far back as when the Model Coordination views had a Model Browser panel, there had been a duplication of Model Tree functionality. There was a Model Tree on the Model Browser panel, as well as an older Model Browser floating panel from the view's bottom toolbar. Recently, the Model Browser on the toolbar went away. And with that removal was also a degradation of workflows. This is a similar problem as the Levels panel . There are two problems with the current Model Browser functionality. It h

title: Adjusting information in Templates updates any associated Forms that haven't been closed
body_text: I pre-developed many Forms and linked them to Assets so that my Inspectors could easily access the Inspection Forms they needed to complete for their Asset. When I needed to update the information in these Forms, I thought I would be able to update the Template which would then update all Forms associated with the Template, but this isn't the case. I think that this would be a time and cost saving adjustment to your programing. It would make adjusting and updating our inspection forms quick and

title: New Project - Auto populate PO with line items
body_text: When creating a new project, we would want a PO to be auto populated with all the line items.
