body_text: Ao realizar a extração de "Registros de Arquivos" (vide imagem) em determinada pasta com subpastas, houve a omissão de algumas pastas e arquivos devido a uma limitação do ACC Docs não sendo possível a extração dos status dos arquivos. A partir do relatório obtido, estamos realizando o tratamento dos dados dentro do Power Query e criando um controle de documentos específico. A melhor alternativa para contornar este problema seria ter a opção de selecionar as pastas para extração do Report "Regist

title: Assest Transform to Form Reference
body_text: The Forms uses for Site Inspections. In one of the form sections, users are required to fill in the unit number of the apartment/house they are inspecting. And all unit numbers have already been categorized and imported as Assets in the system. We would like to request a feature where, once the unit number is filled in the form, the system can automatically link the related Asset as a reference. This will help avoid duplicate work where users need to manually fill in both the form and the Asset

title: Collections Vertical Ribbon
body_text: In Sheets, make the Collections vertical ribbon customizable to show Discipline too. This way is quicker to filter to specific discipline rather than filtering

title: Budget Payment Application Retention Inherited from linked Cost Payment Applications
body_text: I would like the retention amounts from the associated Cost Payment Applications to show up on the Budget Payment Applications retention column. Using a straight % skews the retention number too high once we add in expenses that do not have retention withheld.

title: Form Permission Data Extraction
body_text: It would be helpful if you can bulk extract the data from all the form template to be able to see who and which role have access to edit, view and manage the forms. Right now you have to check individually when auditing the permission level.

title: ACC Mobile Apps - Limiting Build Forms Download / Storage In Mobile Device
body_text: Please look into to also provide option to limit the download and storage of Build Forms in the ACC mobile apps to avoid overloading the device storage. Since the forms can be archived, I wish to propose that those archived forms will not be stored within ACC apps in the mobile device. If possible, create an option to toggle whether to keep or to remove the archived forms storage in the ACC apps / mobile device.

title: Bidder Notes
body_text: Is there a way to add the internal notes on bidders to the formatted bidder list that can be printed. This would help our process out greatly.

title: Improving Quality Control Documentation Efficiency for the Field
body_text: Would your company consider the idea of having a feature where you may upload an excel spreadsheet/file to function in Build? For example: Upload an excel sheet/file that has an entire projects list of rooms (room # and name of room by level and area of the building) Part of this may be available I don’t know unless some one typed it in manually. From this, having the option in Build to mass select by level or area or entire project or individually those that were uploaded and create forms from

title: Creating subtotals within scope-specific bid forms in Building Connected
body_text: It would be great to have the ability to total up all items under a section header, then providing a grand total of all section subtotals. For example, Section A has 5 line items that would total together, Section B has 10 line items that would total together, and as many other Sections necessary. Then having a Grand Total of all Sections (A, B, and so on). Section A Item #1 $ 2.00 Item #2 $ 5.00 Item #3 $ 6.00 Section A Subtotal $ 13.00 Section B Item #1 $ 2.00 Item #2 $ 5.00 Item #3 $ 6.00 Ite

title: Suppliers deny invoice request
body_text: When we create an invoice and request input from supplier - there should be an option for them to deny. Can you add that as one of the status? Also make it an option for us to delete the invoices in "Denied" status after we review it.

title: Docs functions in ACC app
body_text: We will use Reviews function for our approval process as some of our team members only have Docs lisence. But Reviews function is not available in the ACC app as only Build function is available in the app. It would be great if Reviews function is available in the app.

title: Export Sheets Log - Including Tags and Discipline
body_text: Please include the Tag and Discipline in the Export of Sheets Log.

title: test for support
body_text: Test to see if I can post as a user said they can't

title: Review API Item Endpoint
body_text: I would like to check if there is any endpoint to get the review item directly. Now there is endpoint to get all reviews using https://developer.api.autodesk.com/construction/reviews/v1/projects/{projectId}/reviews but there is no option to filter by id or reviews/:id option with the above endpoint. Only option is, to get versions using https://developer.api.autodesk.com/construction/reviews/v1/projects/{projectId}/reviews/{reviewId}/versions There is no option to get a single review item. Could

title: Select returned fields from GET Forms API Call
body_text: Currently there is no way to determine what forms have been discarded via an API call. To do this requires making a GET request for all the forms associated with a project , extracting the form ID's and comparing it to the form ID's extracted from a previous GET request. The returned data from the GET request is too verbose for this task and it can take several paginated requests to extract all the form ID's. A solution would be to have a select parameter on the GET Request to only return the de

title: Enable swiping between images in a form on desktop /Feature parity with Mobile App
body_text: Currently, users can easily swipe through images within a form on the mobile app, which significantly enhances the user experience when reviewing or comparing multiple images. However, this functionality is missing from the desktop version of the platform, where users must click each image in and then out again, individually, to review them. I propose implementing a similar image-swiping or carousel feature in the desktop version of the form interface, like in the picture folder. This would enab

title: ProEst Feature Request: Drawing Metadata Reporting / Export Functionality Similar to Procore
body_text: As a ProEst user, I've found a significant gap when it comes to reporting on drawing sheets. Currently, there is no built-in way to export or generate a report listing drawing metadata — such as sheet name, number, discipline, revision, or date — in a structured, tabular format. This kind of drawing log is a standard in many construction workflows and is critical for preconstruction documentation, takeoff coordination, and downstream project management. We need the ability to: Export a drawing l

title: Visibility into Folder Syncing/Processing Status (ACC Web)
body_text: Context: A user accidentally moved approximately 500 GB of data from one folder into different folder using Desktop Connector. When attempting to move the data back via ACC Build (Web) and Desktop Connector, they encountered issues likely due to the volume of data and processing delays. While moving folders individually eventually worked, the lack of visibility into the syncing or processing status made it difficult to manage access and structure during the transfer. Request: Introduce a clear i

title: Please add a work type to encompass geotechnical instrumentation, structural instrumentation, and geotechnical/structural sensor monitoring
body_text: Hi there. The company I work for (and several others) deal mostly in the installation and configuration of geotechnical and structural sensors (piezometers, inclinometers, automated total stations, etc.). We then integrate these data with cloud software for ongoing regular monitoring of sensor data. None of the existing work types fit the "instrumentation and monitoring" or "structural health monitoring" industries (these are two separate, but related terms). Without an accurate work type, the t

title: Total allowed time to review a approval workflow
body_text: Now you can define a allowed time for each step in a approval workflow. It will be good if there is also a allowed total time for all the steps of a approval workflow.

title: Handover Submittals attached the files from EVERY step
body_text: Every submittal in the Handover has the file from every step instead of just the last file/approved final files copied to the final response. For some submittals, this is okay, but for final handover, typically we don't need the history of markups at each step, just the final approved file - then the older ones can be in a reference folder just like a submittal report links to the documents in other steps as needed. For Record submittals do not need 4+ copies of the same file... knowing this cha

title: Option to only delete the lastest file version or new permission levelfor folders that cannot delete files
body_text: We want an option that user could delete the latest uploaded wrong version of file or a new permission level where people cannot delete files. As we found that ACC user who has ‘Edit’ right would easily delete the entire version of one record when they found a wrong file has uploaded to ACC, they’ll delete the file but they didn’t recognise that the entire records would be deleted until they have taken this action; it is a critical issue as this action would removed the previous version of recor

title: Include changes to notification settings in Acivity log
body_text: We would like to be able to see in the activity log who has made changes to the notification settings (frequency). Currently this is not shown in the activity log

title: Optional Reviewer for One-Step Review
body_text: When setting up ‘One-step’ WF Template, found that there is no ‘Optional Reviewers’ box, not like ‘Two-step’ or ‘Three-step’ WF Templates. We need a ‘Optional Reviewers’ box as on option for adding ‘cc’ recipients on the WF when setting up ‘One-step’ WF template

title: Specifications Tool Publishing and Editing Improvement
body_text: Specification Tool Settings: Add option to create Group from the Settings When Publishing: Add option to delete pages that are not necessary to be added in the section (ex. blank pages) When Published: Add option to move/add specification section to Groups

title: Questionnaire Visibility and Auto Populate Factors
body_text: Show the original submitter's name(s) on the submitted questionnaires. I have noticed that changing one company contact/name changes the contacts on ALL questionnaires, even the submitted ones. So if a coworker of mine gets a new questionnaire/application that I have nothing to do with and removes my name (since I'm auto populated), on my end it shows my name gone and there's substituted on all of the questionnaires including the already submitted ones (that I or other coworkers already filled o

title: Email notification for scheduled tasks
body_text: Send an email to the individual when a scheduled item/task is assigned to them.

title: Auto-update new subfolders
body_text: When creating a new subfolder in a created bridge, it would be much better if the option for autoupdate of them where avalible.

title: Ability to duplicate Change Orders (PCOs)
body_text: The ability to duplicate Change Orders and some/all of their related Cost Items would be very helpful. On some projects, certain types of change orders can be repetitive and it would be a great time saver if we were able to reduce the work involved in recreating multiple of the same Cost Items that reoccur on each change order.

title: Estimate Summary
body_text: Please allow a way to customize and sort the estimate Summary Sheet

title: Markups in issue tab under model coordination with federated model placed in model coordination space
body_text: I want to create annotations or markups directly within the ACC platform while reviewing issues, specifically using the federated model. This approach would be more effective than working within the docs environment, which only supports a single model and lacks the collaborative and distributed capabilities of the federated setup.

title: Ability to bulk edit "Hide Subitems" within Main Contract SOV
body_text: The ability to bulk edit multiple SOV items at once to hide their subitems would be a very handy tool. I have a large SOV at the top level, and do not want the equally extensive budget subitems to be visible on my pay application. Manually selecting each SOV top line and selecting 'hide subitems' takes a frustratingly longer time than it should, and could easily be fixed by the ability to checkmark the whole list and 'hide subitems'. I like the ability to hide the sub items per line - I do not w

title: Prevent SCO creation without approved OCO
body_text: Currently, users can create an SCO at the same point in time that they can create an OCO. But if the OCO isn't eventually approved, the SCO shouldn't happen, and yet the documentation has already been generated and send to the sub. It would be very practical to have a toggle to turn on the ability to prevent the creation (or anything past draft status) of an SCO without an approved/accepted OCO or COR in place. This can prevent major budget issues and reinforce a proper order of operations when

title: Ability to delete and amend coordination spaces
body_text: Why are we unable to delete coordination spaces? Why is it limited to 20 that can't then be amended at all? This seems like another absolutely pointless restriction written into some software by Autodesk, so please just update it to allow this basic functionality.

title: Hotkeys for moving sectioning tool
body_text: The section tool is nice, but it would be nice with an option to press CRTL and the scrollwheel on the mouse to move the section in the viewer rather than the need of click and drag the arrow for the section.

title: Unify Model Coordination and Docs into One Space
body_text: It is very difficult for those without prior experience working with CDEs to navigate models. Having Model Coordination and Docs as separate modules is counter-intuitive, especially for those on the site. This also means that there are 2 different viewers with 2 development teams from Autodesk working on them. Please unify both spaces, and differentiate between viewing by subscription: those without Model Coordination subscriptions can only view one model at a time.

title: Final billing and retention billing as separate billings but in the same billing period
body_text: I want to be able to have a subcontractor enter in their final billing for the project and then enter in a separate full retention billing. I want these two billings to be separate billings but occur in the same month and ultimately be combined on a single owner pay app billing. How can this be accomplished?

title: Allow subcontractors to enter retention billing once the retention is set to open
body_text: Sub Contractors who Collaborators for pay app billing are not able to input their retention billings unless they have full access. I don't want to provided full access to the sub contractors but want them to be able to upload their retention billing once retention billing is selected to be opened for billing.

title: SI Tool
body_text: Could you create an SI tool alongside RFIs? The SI gets put in sheets; however, it should be its own entity with issuance tracking and hyperlinks to the RFI that initiated the creation. Should also have further info as to what sub consultant SI# are included.

title: Crear reporte automica de carpetas especificas
body_text: Hola buenas tardes, actualmente cree un dashboard de información que exporto directamente desde exportar registros de archivos, y me gustaria que esta opción estuviera automatizada, para no tener que hacerlo manualmente. Espero este habilitada proximamente esta opción para así sacar info automatica de carpetas especificas.

title: RFI types
body_text: In creating a new project we used created an RFI type called "Bid RFI". It was incorrectly used with the RFI default workflow, when it should have been the coordinating workflow. We never used the RFI - we never created a single RFI. But it was the wrong workflow type so I deleted it. When I tried to re-do it, I got the error message that " RFI type with same name already exists." It seems ridiculous to lock down that name if not a single RFI was ever created. Please provide 1 of 2 options: 1) i

title: New Category Request
body_text: Hi! My name is Wendy, and I am a Sales Representative for an LED Sign company. Our Company specializes in outdoor LED Business and Church signs and indoor LED displays for businesses. Please consider adding a specific category for LED outdoor Signs and inside displays. At this time, we are getting requests from every new building needing room signs, restroom signs, etc. It would greatly help our business, and I am sure other companies like ours if there was a category that clearly understands wh

title: RFI Posting - Markup Tools
body_text: All RFIs are posting on the Construction Documents under Sheets in order to inform the field. However, the markup tools are very limited as far as grouping or creating custom tools to help with posting. The concept is to allow us to make custom markup tools.

title: Add link to review in 'Review Status' column for copied files
body_text: At the end of the review workflow, once files have been assigned a status there is an option to copy the file into a different folder. We use this functionality to copy the file into a 'for construction' folder, which the site team then works from. When hovering over the status, in the original folder, a hyperlink is available, taking the user directly to the review that Version of the file was included in. This is vry helpful to find comments that were added during the review workflow, or to fi

title: TradeTapp - Allow custom values in the Prequalification Status drop-down
body_text: The default drop-down values in the prequalification status field are useful, but having the ability to customize your own would solve a lot of issues.

title: Zooming in on photos attached to issues
body_text: Autodesk Construction Cloud Case Number : 02122981 I have heard back from our Engineering team who have confirmed that this is intended behavior for the platform as attachments has more limitations. In order to be able to zoom in or out you will need to add the photos to the Issue as a reference instead of an attachment. We encourage you to submit your idea directly to our R&D team via the ACC Forums here . Our ACC R&D team actively monitors these forums and considers customer suggestions for fu

title: Permission levels
body_text: ACC Permissions question. In my company we have a whole draughting / digital design team to take care of all the drawings and models for the engineers. An internal issue I know, but we don't like giving engineers permissions to download native files like .dwg or .rvt. But we do want them publishing markups so we can address any design comments. Thing is, to have publishing ability - this comes with download ability which people do, and then make duplicate copies of stuff away from the ACC CDE. H

title: Data Exchange for GIS data
body_text: This may not be the right forum. Now that GIS data is becoming more accessible in Autodesk products it would be great to see GIS data being recognised in data exchange to that apps like Revit could extract the information they need. Data exchange could possibly recognise GIS data types such as geodatabases, DEM, shapefiles.

title: Naming Enforcement template error explanation
body_text: Currently while trying to upload naming enforcement when error message comms up it doesn't explain where the issue it therefore it takes ages to solve it. Please look into the functionality of it. Thank you

title: Auto-Trigger Review on Date
body_text: Projects have milestones which are are set dates. Each Milestone requires delivery of a specific information container. It would be very helpful if a (deadline) date could be set to trigger the review. It would be perfect if it would be possible to exchange the information container to a Bridged project on that date to trigger a review there.

title: Mobile App needs a "Field Model" Function
body_text: On a large project you don't dare sync the files to view the models because it is all or nothing and we don't need every single model or file in the field. You had it right once and only once in BIM 360 Field Classic and BIM 360 Glue with the "Send To Field" option. Also provide a bridge function so it can be sent to another projects "Construction Models" Bring that back so we can have our federated and coordinated models available and actually be able to navigate them in the field. The Mobile i

title: Enable Search Filter during Package Creation
body_text: A Package can currently only be created efficiently if all of the files you want are in one folder together, and nothing else that you don't want in the Package is in that folder. If this were always the case, there would be less of a need to create a Package since all of the information could already be easily found in a folder. To create a package where the files you want are part of a large folder and buried among many other files you do not want, there is no way to search except by filename

title: Date Answered Column in RFI Log
body_text: It would be very helpful if there was a column for Dates of when an RFI response was provided, when exporting an RFI report. My current project is experiencing long delays from designers taking a month+ to review RFIs. And with 400+ RFIs, it's very time consuming to review and add dates of when their response was provided.

title: AI for Safety Checklists
body_text: Create a way to utilize AI to read current jobsite progress photos to create tailored safety checklists that are pertinent to the work taking place on the jobsite. For example, if the progress photos have trench excavation, the system would generate custom safety checklists focused on trench safety.

title: Sheets
body_text: I would like to receive a weekly report of the chosen sheets (Last published, by whom etc - the functionality of a plan list). For now on I can export it manually, (Sheets> export plan report) but I would prefer to have it sent automatically every week. I also don't see a template for this.

title: Option to skip the Holding Area step when Uploading File that Follows the Naming Standard
body_text: Hi All, I would like to submit a request for folders which applied Naming Standard, it should be possible to have a selection to skip the Holding Area Step if the file follows the Naming Standard. By Using Desktop Connector, this can be done, however, when uploading files into ACC directly, it will prompt the Holding Area interface first then only Upload and appears in the Folder.

title: Takeoff Model with Criteria/Property Filters
body_text: Similar to how Search Sets work in Navisworks, it would be nice to be able to save a set of property criteria which can then search through the model and find all instances that match. Instead of needing to recreate filter states again (which is prone to user error), there would be a list of previously-defined filter states that the user can choose from. This would also be very helpful when processing updated models that are published to Takeoff which included added elements. Instead of manually

title: Specification editing
body_text: Recommend an edit option that allows you to either overlay or delete specific sections of a submittal package with updated information vrs having to delete the whole package and start over.

title: Export IFC
body_text: IFC Export from viewable model formats.

title: Option to download a PDF file with comments
body_text: It would be great if it were possible to download a PDF annotated in ACC, be it via a button or something similar.

title: Project Admin access to Forms
body_text: We have a First Aid Record in Forms that requires privacy and a very limited number of viewers. However, Project Admins are automatically set as Managers and have access to view all forms. Could you update it so that Project Admins can be removed from having Manager permissions on Forms? Right now, under Managers, Project Admins is greyed out and can't be deselected.

title: Reoccurring meetings with an option for different attachments.
body_text: In the meetings tab in Autodesk Build, you can go in a create a new meeting with descriptions, topics and also add meeting attachments. I would like to see the ability to create a meeting and be able to choose if you want it to be a reoccurring meeting (set the day, time and how often you want it to be occurring). As well as being able to have it send out a different attachment each time. For instance, if you create a meeting and you set it to reoccur weekly, for 20 weeks, you can drag and drop

title: I want to be able to send an email of an issue to another member of the project other than myself.
body_text: When an issue is created, I would like to send it to another member of the project other than myself to allow them to attach it to a Work Request for the employee or contractor.

title: Creating a transmittal from files in multiple packages
body_text: I believe it would be really helpful if users could create a transmittal from files in multiple packages. Currently such a feature is not available. Once a transmittal is created from files in one package, other files from other packages cannot be added to that transmittal. Alternatively, if we had an option to create a package which could combine files from multiple other packages, it would also help with creating that combined transmittal.

title: Calendar Sync Configurability
body_text: When Syncing the BuildingConnected Calendar to Outlook there is no option to only sync certain events. Many people in my organization do not need to know when a bid is due from vendors and this clogs their Outlook calendar. Also, it is especially confusing that they both begin with the name "Bids Due From...". Please give the option to change the names of the Event Types as well. Thank you

title: MOVE FILES IN A REVISION PROCESS BETTER THAN COPY.
body_text: In order to don't have a lot of files copied in the ACC project, it should be fine better than have thousands

title: Remarks from reports don't stay attatched to documents
body_text: When a document gets pushed through an assessment review projectmembers can add remarks to all documents. These remarks get grouped for each round an assessment goes through, but at the end when the final reviewer finalises the proces he can choose to attach the remarks to the document, but when a user opens the document after the review has been processed through the file browser these remarks are nowhere to be found... Ideally this would remain as a chathistory on the side of the document. The

title: interface update for assessments
body_text: This might be a translation issue, but when processing a multistep assessment the important/main assessor gets 3 options depending on how the system has been setup: "Send back to initiator" = to refuse the assessment "delegate" = ask another projectmember to assess in the name of the initial adressed user. "submit assessment" = to accept the assessment (possibly with remarks) It would be a lot clearer to communicate to unexperienced users that submitting = accepting. The color of the buttons cou

title: Adressing issues to unasigned roles
body_text: It's currently impossible to assign issues to unasigned roles. This would be usefull in case someone wants to prepare a set of questions for a yet to be decided project memeber. Maybe said member still needs to be introduced to the platform, so they haven't been added yet until they receive a proper explination of how things work. Like when a general contractor wants to initiate an ACC environment and he has received the projectfiles. His team might want to start analysing stuff, but the Archite

title: Text box border line needs to automatically size itself.
body_text: Text box border line needs to automatically size itself. User should not have to adjust text boundary line each time

title: Allow Callout Text to be edited directly on the sheet not just in the callout tool panel
body_text: Allow Callout Text to be edited directly on the sheet not just in the callout tool panel

title: If a markup I make is not published before I close the document down, then show screen warning popup and highlight it on the screen.
body_text: If a markup I make is not published before I close the document down, then show me a screen warning popup and highlight it on the screen. I want to know if any of my markups are not published.

title: Lock tool panel & Callout to Stop Document View and Whole Screen From Moving
body_text: Lock tool panel & Callout to Stop Document View and Whole Screen From Moving. Everytime I click on a markup tool or edit an existing markup tool the callout screen turns on and shifts the entire document view over and I lose my view place. Lock it in place.

title: Increase size of file name space, so I can read full name in top left of document
body_text: When reviewing a document, in the top left of the screen is the name of the document. Following 19650 naming protocols, I have 42 characters in each file name. This character length is too long for the review screen and I cannot see the full file name. Make it longer.

title: Lock Drawing List Columns Spacing
body_text: Every time I return from marking up a drawing to the list of drawings in a review, the columns spacing returns to some default and I cant see the full names of the drawings and description. Make it remember.

title: work log
body_text: I would like to be able to add a company 1 time and include as many roles in that 1 line. Now I need to enter 1 for each person. This is very time consuming if I have 1 company and 5-6 different entries needing to have data entered.

title: BidBoard Pro - Plan Room project filtering
body_text: In BidBoard Pro Plan Room we need to be able to remove or hide projects from our search filter that we do not wish to bid on. We also need to have the option to filter by newest projects. It is not sufficient to only be able to filter by the Bid Due Date. Please advise if these functions exist and I'm just missing them.

title: Tables in Rich Text custom attributes
body_text: It would be great to be able to build small tables in the rich text custom attribute fields in Cost Management.

title: Keep Current View When Switching Model Versions in 3D
body_text: When switching between different versions of a 3D model, it would be very helpful if the current view (camera position and zoom level) could be preserved, rather than resetting to an exterior view of the building. This would allow users to quickly and clearly compare changes within a specific area, making version comparisons much more efficient—especially when reviewing edits in localized regions.

title: Enhancement Proposal: Zone-Based Task Tagging with Controlled Dropdown for Sheets Tool
body_text: On sheets if you could set up rooms/zones so all the task/punch items dropped in that zone could be automatically connect to the room number/floor, rather than having to manually input. – or if we could set the Zone and have it as a drop down instead of the user typing in random locations – Main user to control drop down set up.

title: Markup duplication to carry to other sheets
body_text: Create the ability to duplicate a markup (copy/paste) and all associated references and assign to more than just the sheet bein worked on.

title: Ability to modify assets by clicking on them in model
body_text: I am using the Assets tool to track the status of fabrication duct and pipe with options such as "fabricated, installed, tested" etc. This works great on ACC's mobile viewer except for when you want to change the status of a specific object. There needs to be the ability to click on an object in the Assets view and be able to change the status rather than clicking through the Assets list hoping you land on the correct objects. Thanks!

title: Enable Element Selection in Autodesk Takeoff Based on Custom or Additional Revit Parameters
body_text: We would like to request an enhancement to the "Select All" functionality in Autodesk Takeoff. Currently, selection and grouping of model elements are limited to the Type Name property only. This limits our ability to efficiently group or filter model elements based on more relevant Revit properties such as Size, Material, System Classification, Level, or any Custom Parameters . In real-world workflows, especially in MEP and architectural modeling, element properties beyond Type Name (e.g., duct

title: Viewing Models with ESRI Basemaps
body_text: I'd like to see the ability to turn on/off ESRI Basemaps when viewing models in Docs and model coordination just to give a bit of context.

title: Project Template Name in Project Settings to be Static
body_text: When creating a project from a project template, the project template name it was created from is included in the project settings. At the moment, if the project template name changes, its name in the project settings changes as well, I would propose that there should be some indication as to what the project template name originally was, this is because as we update our project templates, we increase the version number in the naming - as the name automatically updates across all the projects hi

title: Please make ACC auto-send a notice to BIM person, when copy/monitored elements change.
body_text: For Autodesk ACC, please implement a tool that can send out an email notice of changes to Copy/Monitored elements, directly to the designated BIM Managers. The BIM Manager often has no need to open the Revit project files, so that person does not get notified that a Coordination Review is necessary. Getting a notice from ACC will allow the BIM person to fix problems so they don't accumulate. Thank you

title: BULK FILE ACTIVITY REPORT
body_text: Is a great option to have batch files activity reports per multiple files for analyse this activity and even review the locked and unlocked option for them.

title: STATUS (LOCKED/UNLOCKED) in activity log.
body_text: You must add the status of LOCKED/UNLOCKED in the project folder ACTIVITY LOG... because this gives the option to know the files on hold meanwhile their are under revision or updating. Best Regards.

title: Support for editing simple files
body_text: ACC should support Notepad features, like editing simple files: txt, xml, md. It would be really great if ACC would connect with Google's Firebase IDE so we could edit python files and C# files directly.

title: Supplier change order detail
body_text: In the Supplier change order tab we need to easily see if the change event associated with the supplier change order is “in-scope” or “out of scope”. It could either be as a column on the main page or in the top “Details” section of the details panel.

title: Support a Single Issue with Multiple Snapshots from 3D/2D Views, Including DWG/PDF Files
body_text: With only a picture on the PDF, it's hard to explain what and where the interference is. It's often unrealistic to expect reviewers to fully memorize others' drawings and 3D views before checking issues. As a result, I frequently need to crop and attach partial screenshots from related drawings manually. It would be very helpful to support marking partial views from multiple models and drawings directly within the issue, which could greatly reduce the need for manual screenshots. And I think thi

title: Asignar campos personalizados a categorías de activos de manera conjunta
body_text: Sería muy práctico poder asignar las propiedades o campos personalizados de manera conjunta a las categorías de activos creados, ya que tengo que ir uno por uno asignando los mismos campos personalizados a las diferentes categorías de activos, si puedo asignarle con una sola selección los mismos campos personalizados a diferentes categorías ahorraría mucho tiempo. ¡Gracias!

title: Prevent Issue creation on old file version so that we don't miss any issue
body_text: When a drawing or a document is replaced with a new version, it's still possible to create an issue on the already open file. As the browser is not automatically refreshed, a user can keep creating issue on the old file version without knowing there is a new one. This results in issues that will not appear on the last file version. So that, another user can miss them. In this case, ACC browser should either poll the server regularly and let the user know there is a new version (without having to

title: Autodesk Build Forms Add Day - App-Version
body_text: Adding the day to the Date in the mobile App

title: [Issues on Sheets Report] feature to be available for “Files”
body_text: Submitting this request on behalf of the EBA customer. They would like to generate "Issue reports" for issues created in documents within ‘Files,’ reporting functionality available for 'Sheets' as shown in the link below: https://help.autodesk.com/view/BUILD/ENU/?guid=Issue_Reports#issues-on-sheets-report

title: List of Hyperlink Locations
body_text: Where Autodesk automatically hyperlinks sheets when it notices the details, etc., it would be useful for some customers if you could click on that hyperlink and then see a list of everywhere where that detail is hyperlinked. Not necessarily a need, but would help customers with keeping their documentation organized.

title: Choosing Modules on the Mobile App (Bottom Ribbon)
body_text: It would be a great option for mobile users to have the option to select which modules are shown at the bottom of the screen while they are working within the mobile application.

title: Unable to filter Issues placed in NWD model viewer on mobile
body_text: Currently, when viewing Issues placed within a model on the mobile app, there is no way at all to filter them. What even is the use if I can't filter the issues? At this point it'd be more useful to strap a laptop to my chest so I can view and filter them in the field. Please add the ability to filter issues placed in an NWD on the mobile app.

title: Permission Conflicts Within Files
body_text: When it comes to Role and Company Permissions for Files within Docs the system does not function as expected. You would think that if a Role and a Company were both in a folder's Permissions and Company had a higher permission level that Company permissions would outweigh the Role. Yet it does not work that way. Roles takes precedence over Company. This defeats the purpose of having both. Who's with me on making the higher permission level outweighing the lower?!?! #HigherPermissionWins!

title: Autodesk User Management portal - ability to manage members in Teams based on subscriptions and contracts independently of hub.
body_text: The clarity of user management in the Autodesk User Management portal would be improved if teams were connected to contracts and displayed more information on the subscriptions of individual users, independently of the hub and account.

title: Add Work Performance
body_text: Open the attachments. This option helps improve the Work Performed descriptions with visual photos.

title: Published Revit Model Comments
body_text: I want this but for published Revit models. I can't tell the difference between published Revit models except by date.

title: Enable a filtered drop-down
body_text: Enable a filtered drop-down for the Cost Payment Application-Filter and group by Supplier feature I feel most other drop-down lists in Autodesk will filter as you start typing. This one you must scroll down the list to find the supplier’s name. Features should be consistent across the platform

title: Takeoff Markup Issues and option to "Lock" or "freeze"
body_text: 1) Option to “Freeze” or “Lock” takeoff markups - Sometime these takeoff-markups on sheets move unintendedly when panning around the drawing. Would be great to be able to freeze the markup to avoid this from happening. 2) When panning / zooming in, sometime TAKEOFF glitches and zooms somewhere way off the page. See video attached. 3) When applying a cutout to a takeoff markup that has arcs, the arcs automatically convert to points. Can they stay as arcs when applying a cutout?

title: View and Markup permissions
body_text: Give permissions to project members with only View and Markups permissions, without the option to download data.

title: iPad vs Computer
body_text: Our field crew often used iPad for easy of carrying around, but get frustrated at the limitations. They'd like to have more functionality on the mobile. Specific requests have been to see comments on Issues on the iPad and be able to review submittals.

title: General template configuration
body_text: Straight to the point: it should be possible to perform all configurations in a template project in the same way as we configure a new project. Examples of configurations that could be made in the template: Permissions for companies in folders, permissions for companies in issues, assignment of naming rules to folders in the template...

title: Saved Views in Schedule
body_text: It would be helpful if you could save filtered views in the schedule module. This would be helpful for users so that they can quickly toggle to views that they use frequently.

title: Cost Payment Application and budget Payment application exporting the excel report for period to period after approved
body_text: Hello, We use ACC Cost Management and have encountered issues when exporting the Excel report for each Cost Payment Application and Budget Payment Application after the approval steps. These reports are essential for providing Finance with detailed line items claimed in each period. Could you please investigate this issue and forward the information to the development team for process improvement? Thank you for your kind support, Nitin

title: See Owner Information in Properties for Each Version
body_text: Team, I think it would be ideal in the properties palette on the cloud to show the owner information for each element for every Publish. I am having an issue at my firm trying to figure out who modeled something, but I can't see that information anymore in Revit after upgrading the model. It just says that I own everything after the upgrade, and I am weary of rolling the model back to before the upgrade. I have a feeling it will cause issues, and since this is a live project I would rather not.

title: Enforce specific projects to be "Always Keep on This Device"
body_text: Since Docs is a Project based platform, we have a couple "projects" that reflect our standards. It would be helpful from an admin view, to be able to enforce these standards projects as "always keep on this device". Making individual users do this is spotty at best. Without these project being cached locally, AutoCAD fails to pull the necessary files. I know Autodesk is testing out standards within each project which doesn't need to be cached. That could work for projects that aren't our typical

title: Schedule Status Options
body_text: It would be great to have the flexibility to customise the status options in plans within the Schedule tool in Build. For example, we would like to create a new status option 'in review'.

title: Ignore .DWH files from synchronizing
body_text: Please have the Desktop Connector ignore .DWH files from synchronizing. These files are created by an AutoCAD Express Tool that saves a drawing history text file of the same name as its drawing. They aren't necessary within ACC/ADocs but we can't selectively turn them off, while we using them on our local server. The .DWH files creating sync issues and clog up our DC status.

title: Asset's Placement and Model Links Accessibility
body_text: Currently in the Assets tab of Build, each asset has links to the asset's placement in sheets and a link to its location in the model. However, when you follow those links to either the sheet or the model, those links are not present in the asset's description in those areas. On the Web app you get a new tab with the viewer open set to the specific asset, but no way to go back within the ACC system. Sheets: Model: On the mobile app you can see the links in the Model view, but they are not presen

title: Editing on Mobile Version
body_text: I would love to see the ability to edit in ACC on the mobile version. Currently, it seems like editing is only available on desktop. Are there any plans to bring this feature to mobile? This would be incredibly helpful for onsite work.

title: References in TAKEOFF
body_text: This request is for the ability to add references or attachments to takeoff types. For example, we still might want to use C3D to calculate grading quantities, create a takeoff type as "count", add a checkmark to a checklist / table in the drawings and hard input the quantity generated by C3D. I If there was the ability to add references to files or even an attachment option, then we could link the C3D files and surfaces used to generate that quantity to the takeoff type.

title: Edit documents directly in ACC
body_text: We cannot edit docx and xslx files directly in ACC. We cannot add Issues directly in ACC in docx and xslx files. ACC should use openDocument formats and allow creation of Issues in document files. We can only add Comments in docx and xslx files, but Comments are not Issues, we can't add status to Comments, we cannot assign roles or users to Comments. We cannot filter Comments by status, by role or by user. We cannot create reports on those Comments, therefore we can't track Comments.

title: Link workset detection
body_text: We discovered that if a Revit model has a link and that link is assigned to a specific workset (for example Link_A), once the model is published on ACC, the viewer does not recognize the elements of the linked model with the previously assigned workset name (Link_A) but rather detects the original workset that the linked model was made from (for example Workset 1). This way there is no possibility to filter out the linked models from the original model if the published 3D view contain everything

title: XER | Not Share Source File
body_text: It has come to my attention that anyone on the schedule can download the source (.XER) file from the ACC Platform (attached). I could find this option when checking the comparison version. We consider this not a good practice and believe this option should either be confirmed or made unavailable. We typically do not share .XER files with other stakeholders in the project, as we feel this is not a standard quality procedure and puts private project information at high risk. Is there a way to lock

title: submit for review button
body_text: There is a publish button directly in the interface for ACC , but why isn't there a Submit for review button? If we follow an ISO workflow, then there will be multiple reviews before we even think about publishing, but the review button is hidden away in the more menu.

title: Nearest Grid Intersection & Level Display for Camera Position and issue pin
body_text: Problem Statement In large BIM models , users struggle to locate objects because construction teams are accustomed to referencing grid intersections and levels rather than XYZ coordinates. This makes it difficult to place and report issues precisely within the 3D environment, slowing down collaboration and resolution times. Solution A feature that automatically detects and displays the nearest grid intersection and level for: The user’s current camera position in the model. Issue push pins when

title: Filtering Sheets by Collections - Mobile Application
body_text: It would be very useful if mobile app users could filter through sheets by collections.

title: Added the ability to filter using the "or" and "and" hyphen
body_text: Currently, filtering data, e.g. reports, is only possible with respect to one selection. It would be very useful to add logical tests based on combining the "and" and "or" functions. For example, when creating a report from issues, I do not have the option to limit the selection to data from a time period and, e.g., from functions. This is a very important element when using the reports tool.

title: Personal Weather Station Integration - Job Site Weather Report
body_text: Please support the integration of personal weather stations (jobsite weather stations). It would be nice to have the weather report from the weather station on the job site as this information is far more accurate than the jobsite address location information that ACC uses. @annieweldon

title: Reminders to Project Milestones
body_text: Hi! It would be great if we had the possibility to have editable reminder notifications (for whom and how many days in advance) for existing Project Milestones in the project progress dashboard on the project homepage.

title: ADB needs to include more standard selection options that are standard to Heavy Civil Construction industry for public works and infrastructure projects.
body_text: We are a Heavy Civil Construction Company, that performs much Infrastructure work (Roads, Bridges, Utilities, ets) for State’s Department of Transportation, Municipalities, public authorities, as well as private/commercial owners. Although I recognize that some categories might be different from different states and municipalities, the core of infrastructure Business, general standards and categories are very similar. I would like to see more options and standardizations within the platform that

title: PROJECT TIMELINE- PACKAGE TARGET SCHEDULE
body_text: Hi Autodesk, Can we add a TARGET SCHEDULE for the sharing package? (Please see the image below for your reference.) This will help us to: Set a target schedule for sharing the package per team Improve awareness of the importance of sharing design updates on time Notify us about the status of their packages based on the set schedule: Outstanding / On Time / Pending Please make this happen. Thank you 🙂

title: Budget - detailed cost
body_text: From the Budget you should be able to click on the commitment number and see a list of all the detail cost. When you click on the three dots next to the budget then click, view actual cost. It only brings up the base contract, not any change order.

title: RFI Answer Window Covers up Question
body_text: When answering an RFI, the pop-up window blocks the question so I am unable to re-read the question as I type my answer. A draggable window or embedded window would be helpful. Otherwise I have to copy my text and discard my answer to see the whole question.

title: Add subitem to a from when filling out - like nr. and info about unknown number of checked component
body_text: It could be useful to have the option to add several subitems to a form when filling out. Ex: you are checking 3-30 components and needs to fill in some information regarding each component. Could be like 3.1.1, 3.1.2 etc... Attached example is for electrical components. Would be better with the option to have a few columns with info and then be able to add more lines when needed. Would also made it easier to get the data out later in Power BI/Insight Builder.

title: Download All Current Models for Archive (Individual Only)
body_text: Currently if I wanted to pull and archive of all of the "Current" models from a project hub that I administer because say we hit a milestone or we were done with the project and want to archive it, I have to download each individual file and all of it's links. This results in a massive amount of duplication. If I have cad Files, I can simply download the entire folder and I don't get any duplicates. But if I try the same with Revit models, I have to take all of the models and all of the models t

title: ACC Build: Copy and Paste task in workplans (schedule)
body_text: It would be good if you could copy and paste the created tasks in a schedule with CTRL+C or CTRL+V.

title: WinExplorer library - show files from the Desktop connector
body_text: It should be possible to make librarys with Windows Explorer and show the files from the Autodesk Desktop Connector.

title: Stop using corrupted, incorrect embedded fonts in PDF reports.
body_text: The word "Open", "Side", "；"( ; in Full-width) have wrong shapes. It's been more than three months and haven't fix yet. These are three question. 1. Why using Noto Sans CJK JP for Traditional Chinese, Not TC? 2. There already exist Noto Sans CJK JP in Windows Font, why not use same one but create a new one? 3. Why using embed font? I don't care about using what fonts, Proportional MingLiU is fine, too. But being readable is the minimum requirement. It's very hard (and waste time) to edit the tex

title: 3D Model Review - enable comment same in 2D
body_text: Requesting to enable a comment on specific elements or views during review process.

title: When holding Shift + middle mouse button, do not interact with section or box control lines.
body_text: Or more, do interact with section or box control lines with left button only, right button only, or add a mode here. Having to take an extra step to undo a mistake repeatedly is more annoying than taking an extra step every time.

title: View submittals in progress and Download submittals to tablet or iPad
body_text: The current format for submittals only allows you to view closed submittals. During submittal review field verification is often performed to compare with the submittals or shop drawings. Having the ability to view open submittals as well as download them to your device for editing in different programs would be helpful to personnel in the field. Currently the only work around is to save submittals in files which you can then open on the iPad but only have the ability to edit within ACC.

title: Supplier Invoice
body_text: We need to be able to create more than 5 invoices for one supplier for a billing period.

title: Create warning when installing 80 projects at once in the desktop connector
body_text: Although there is an option to synchronize 80 projects at once in the desktop connector, I suggest warning the user of the impact of this action, because when doing this synchronization there may be an overload on the computer depending on the number of files within each project. This could cause the desktop connector to crash and even not be able to be used due to data overload. I mention this because I have seen users unable to use the desktop connector because of this, and the impact was such

title: Autodesk user management > Remove users with help of a .csv file
body_text: To remove users from the Autodesk user management portal Primary & Secundary Admins have to option to remove users 1 by 1. Same applies for removing users from a group. (currently a group can be deleted when it contains less than 200? users). An function to remove users from a group or team in bulk would be great!

title: More Special Characters allowed in forms
body_text: In some diciplines there are need of more options for the text in the forms. Like ^2 for square meters+++ or Ohm for Electo formulas+++. Would be nice to enrich the form templates more.

title: Multiple attribute assignment by using a table
body_text: Currently I have to apply my own custom naming conventions AFTER creating a project on ACC. Then, I have to go to the project admin panel and change the settings of each attribute so they don't display in some folders where they are not relevant. one by one, on each project in a company that has many projects on ACC. Could you guys change the attribute settings to be a schedule with tickboxes where you decide globally and selecting several folders at once where to see the attributes and where no

title: Commitment Code to autopopulate
body_text: The Commitment code should auto populate with the next subcontract number or purchase order number.

title: RFI- create a separate workflow for subcontractors
body_text: As a subcontractor, we are not bringing 3rd parties into our site. We would like to simply send through an RFI and then post the response we receive. The current process requires us to upload RFI responses into "Submit Response" and then perform a second step of "Close and Distribute". Would be nice to have the option to turn on a subcontractor workflow to minimize unnecessary steps.

title: Allow Account Admin to see who created a member
body_text: We would like the ability to see who created members in the Account Members screen. We can see when they were created but have to sift through Admin Activity reports to see who added them.

title: Allow us to toggle off "add/edit/delete users" for Project Admin
body_text: There are many settings that require Project Admin status (set up project locations, set up submittal numbering, edit disciplines in Sheets, set up permissions in Specifications) that we would like our team members to have access to. But, Project Admin are able to add/edit/delete people and their permissions and that has already caused us problems. We'd like a way to toggle off the ability for Project Admin to add/edit/delete users and their permissions, similar to how you can toggle off their a

title: Members of the ACC
body_text: Wouldn't it make more sense to introduce an authorization role for assistance in order to have this done by the assistant in order to save double work. Just like sending a new invitation so that the member gets a new mail should not be the task of the administrator.

title: Reopen a meeting item
body_text: Sometimes there is a meeting item that is closed, that comes back in play at some point. We need the option as admin/meeting owner to be able to reopen/activate a closed meeting item.

title: Meeting items should have fixed ID's
body_text: To make it easier to track items in meetings there should be a fixed ID for all Items in meetings. Now it is just a numbered list 1. 2. 3. etc. But how can you keep track of it all later in the project? Also, nice for reference purposes.

title: Enable Build By Default to Users
body_text: There should be a way to enable Build as a product by default to users. This should a setting that can be toggled on or off in our Admin area. It's so silly that we have to add Build every single time we invite a new employee to Build. There will never be a time we won't add Build. I'm sure this applies to more companies.

title: Users have List of Jobs Under their profile that admins can see
body_text: Admins should be able to see what jobs all users have assigned to them. We need to be able to see if someone has already been added to a job or not without having to click through everything just to find out. Sometimes foreman and other workers in the field request to be added to a job they alread have access to. It's very frustrating to have to click into the job, then look for them as a user instead of just being able to go to the user and see what jobs they have.

title: Page names when exporting from "Sheets"
body_text: When you export a group of sheets, export the drawing number and/or drawing title for each page, so the whole set can be bookmarked using page names. Currently when you export sheets it names each page as 1,2,3 etc...

title: Thumbnails within Files to able to be defaulted for project or project template and add images
body_text: For UI experience, I think it would be good if you could make the thumbnails view within files default at folder levels on a project or project template and then to be able to add images to the folder.

title: Request for component properties exported to ACC
body_text: Currently it is not possible to filter which component properties that is exported to ACC. This would be a nice feature to not overload the viewer with a lot of irrelevant information in a lot of cases. It would also decrease the time consumption of looking for the information that you need.

title: Identifying attribute configuration in folders
body_text: When we configure an attribute for folders contained within other folders, there is no way to identify the folders that have configured attributes when they are collapsed. It would be interesting to have a mark on the folders that contain subfolders configured with attributes.

title: Custom folder permissions
body_text: Users should have the ability to create custom folder permissions, for example I have a folder and I want to be able to allow users to upload/download from it, but at the same time, I do not want to give them the ability to create mark-ups on the files contained, seeing as how rubbish the mark-up system is in Docs, we should have the ability to restrict users from commenting in selected folders and retain the ability to upload files as well as view/download them.

title: Select Model Object to Open Assets Detail Panel
body_text: Feature request to click on an object in the model viewer and have it open the associated asset's detail panel. Currently, you can only select the asset name from the list of assets and have it select the model object, but asset names are not always perfectly identifiable and it can be confusing to know which object you're actually selecting. It would be more useful to people viewing the model (especially non-BIM people) to be able to click on an object in the viewer and have it tell you about t

title: Stützen und Träger verbinden
body_text: Hallo, es wäre sehr hilfreich, wenn man stützen mit Trägern verbinden könnte, damit bei einem Schnitt die Linien der Schnittstelle nicht mehr sichtbar sind. Bei Trägern und Geschossdecken beispielsweise funktioniert das ja auch.

title: Can ACC automatically update the revisions once submitted and publish them on the title block?
body_text: Can ACC automatically update the revisions once submitted and publish them on the title block?
