title: PlanGrid
body_text: I don’t understand why if Autodesk bought Plangrid years ago, why does the Plangrid domain even exist any more? Shouldn’t it just be ACC? This causes confusion and dysfunction. My boss sends(assigns) me reports on PlanGrid to edit and she checks and says they are in my drafts assigned to me, but in the ACC app, I have 0 drafts assigned to me. So it looks to her like the problem is on my end but I’m about to pull my hair out.

title: Edit asset properties in the files folder from the mobile app
body_text: Now it is only possible to work with assets in the "sheet" folder, and not in the "files" folder. This is a problem because the "sheet" folder cannot handle DWG files.

title: Create locations from Civil 3D parcels, Mpolygons or Assets.
body_text: Now it is not possible to create "Locations" from DWG files. Create locations from import Civil 3D parcels or Mpolygon objects is a solution. An other solution is to create "locations" from "assets".

title: About insight's project design cards
body_text: We would like to use Insight's project design cards to make important Docs models and files accessible to project members. We would set the viewer URL, but the markups and issues that are displayed in the Docs viewer are not displayed from the Insight cards. In order to use the markups and issues, we will end up having to open them from the Docs file. Is it possible to make it possible to see and create markups and issues from Insight cards (the same as in the Docs viewer)?

title: Title: Enhance Autodesk Build & ProEst Integration with Automatic Project Manager©
body_text: Content: We are highly impressed with Autodesk Construction Cloud’s suite of tools, particularly ProEst and Autodesk Build, and believe our Automatic Project Manager© program is the perfect complement to these products. Our tool bridges a critical gap by providing advanced document generation and project tracking capabilities that streamline construction management workflows. How It Aligns with ProEst and Autodesk Build 1. ProEst Integration: o The Automatic Project Manager© seamlessly utilizes

title: Model Coordination Permissions enhancement
body_text: We work on highly sensitive projects and would like to have the ability to restrict users to only use Model Coordination in the web portal for model reviews. Currently users can download the free "Coordination" add-on for Navisworks, open the Model Coordination view from ACC and then Save As to nwd. To prevent unauthorised sharing of the model we would like to have the ability to disable this feature on certain projects.

title: Filter Issues by "Recently Closed"
body_text: It would be helpful to be able to filter through issues in the Issues Tab by "recently closed" and have the option to choose between issues that have been closed in the past day, the past 7 days, 30 days, 3 months.. etc.

title: Report Page Size
body_text: We need to be able to select the page size used in reports. At the very least, add the option of A4.

title: Allow Roles to be Assigned to the Watcher field in an Issue
body_text: Allowing a 'Role' to be entered in the 'Watcher' field in an issue would enable certain workflows that are typical in construction. If there is a group of people who are responsible for collecting, reviewing, tracking, and approving inspections, they could be collectively defined as the "Inspection Team". If issues with inspections are entered into the "Issues" workspace, then these people can be added as watchers quickly, instead of separately. And communication in the chat box can also use the

title: Publishing Cloud Models
body_text: I recently ran into an issue where I had forgotten to detach a large CAD linked file from our project before publishing. I was getting a processing error on the ACC where the model had essentially "timed out" but it appeared as though the model was still being uploaded. The majority of the suggestions to resolve this issue was to publish again. Unfortunately, this was not an option as it was greyed out in the drop down menu. It would be beneficial to have the option to "cancel" or "abort" an upl

title: Copy tool idea
body_text: Greetings! I often have team mates use the copy button in the web browser to try and make a copy of a Revit model to use inside of Revit but are confused why it doesn't appear inside of Revit after they've made the copy. I would like to propose that copied Revit models in the web browser are workshared by default, so they appear inside of Revit as naturally expected. Not only is this the intuitive behavior for project teams, it also saves several steps and a lot of time versus the current workfl

title: Gestion des fichiers et dossiers dans ACC
body_text: Bonjour, Je ne comprends pas qu'il ne soit pas possible de supprimer définitivement les fichiers et dossiers devenus inutiles, même par les administrateurs de projets. Après suppression, je n'ai trouvé aucun moyen de vider la corbeille. Si c'est une question de sécurité pour éviter les erreurs de manipulations, il y a des moyens moins radicaux (utilisés par les concurrents) comme deux ou trois corbeilles successives avec des alertes à chaque étape. Sinon, je ne comprends pas la logique, surtout

title: add "Ends with" to Advanced Filter in ACC Model Coordination
body_text: currently the advanced filter in ACC Model Coordination has several options for filtering based on various properties like "Contains", "Starts with", "Is/Is Not". I would like to add "Ends with" to this list of options. Currently we disposition objects to be relocated, abandoned, demolished with -R, -A-, -D layer suffix. An "End with" filter would allow us to isolate these objects much easier and control their display.

title: Design Collaboration Package Older Version of a File
body_text: Feature request to be able to package an older version of a file. If a team forgets to create a package before publishing/uploading a new version of their file, there is currently no way to do this without making an older version of the file current, packaging, then resetting the file version again. This is cumbersome and opens up teams for making mistakes with version control, so it would be nice to be able to just specify which version you want to package from a dropdown menu.

title: ACC Issues - Improved Plugin Availability
body_text: Feature request to provide the ACC Issues plugin to more authoring software, including non-Autodesk software. Currently, it looks like the plugin is only available to Revit and Navisworks, but we work with a lot of different companies that use non-Autodesk software as part of their workflow (especially subcontractors who have to use specific software that supports their fabrication process). We currently use Newforma Konekt as our issue tracking platform and they support integrations with dozens

title: Version control
body_text: Project admins should be able to edit the version. A lot of the time we are well into the construction design process before ACC is rolled out so we have to upload dud files to bring the version in line with the drawing. Also V1… should be changed to C01… so it is cohesive with ISO 19650. You should also be able to change the version control to P01… as a lot of companies use the P01… & C01… to denote whether it’s Preconstruction or Construction issue drawings.

title: Uploading to sheets
body_text: When uploading to ‘sheets’… there are too many clicks. If you have already uploaded a pdf from files ACC should be able to recognise the file name, description & version. All this data already exists in files so why can’t it transfer across. You should be able to hit publish to sheets and boom it’s in sheets and ready for site. Currently, I don’t know anyone using sheets as you have to double manage your files. Most people have a shared folder in their designers folder and all this is shared wit

title: (1) To copy Folders and content together.  Files and description with corresponding version
body_text: Hi, I have three suggestions for an easier use of folders and files for ACC and BIM 360: 1. It would be very usefull if we could copy Folders within content directly in web platform, to reduce steps moving information, without affecting a Review state . Today there's no option to copy folders in BIM 360 neither ACC. 2. A really important and will be a plus for consulting and comparition of versions, would be if "Description" for a File, could be preserve aditional to date and whom made modificat

title: Sharing Links Sheets and Views in a Revit file on ACC/BIMN 360
body_text: Dear Autodesk Team, It would be great if we had the ability to share links directly to specific 2D and 3D Views from the Revit Viewer on ACC (and BIM360). This would provide ACC users with the ability easily share the published views inside Revit The 2D sheet views from this screen are fantastic. They provide the end user with a much more data enriched experience then the same 2D PDFs that are published to the sheets section. From the 2D Views on the ACC Viewer in Revit, users can click on any o

title: The new "Packages" module is missing the "View Drawing in 3D" for 2D Sheets
body_text: The new "Packages" module is missing the "View Drawing in 3D" for 2D Sheets: Red X indicates what is missing when viewing a 2D Revit sheet from within a package. The below is a screen shot of the same file outside of the new "Packages" module which is working fine in Docs. Consistency would be nice.

title: Keyboard command
body_text: Could you please add it when you access the documents? Use the left arrow key to scroll to the next page, or the right arrow key. I frequently used this feature in PlanGrid.

title: Autodesk Construction Cloudアプリで指摘事項機能を追加してほしい
body_text: Autodesk Construction Cloudアプリで指摘事項機能を追加してほしい

title: Add blackboard functionality
body_text: Build photo functionality is available, but additional functionality is suggested. In Japan, the blackboard needs to be included in the site photos. Most Japanese general contractors use solutions from other companies, and we get this feedback a lot when we roll out Build. This may be unique to Japan, but I would like to see it considered.

title: Cost Payment Application
body_text: A link to the Cost Payment Applications should be in the details panel of the Contracts and Change Orders.

title: Budget Default View
body_text: We need to be able to set up a default budget view in the template settings. Currently it doesn't allow you to delete the ones that were already there.

title: Title of page should not be frozen when you scroll down.
body_text: The Title of the page should not be frozen in place when you scroll down on the page. It is huger and takes up so much space. For example, on the photos section you can only see two rows of photos. It would be so much better if we could view more on one page, but the Title "Photos" is frozen there with so much blank space taking up the page.

title: Build, Sheets, Edit Feature
body_text: The "Edit" feature in Sheets need more functionality. Currently, it can only change the name.

title: Default Vendor Phone Number to United States
body_text: When adding a Company, the Country Code in the phone number should default to our company country code.

title: Characters in Supplier change orders
body_text: We need more than 5 characters for the supplier change order number.

title: Cost - Supplier Change Orders
body_text: We need more than 5 characters in the change order number.

title: Sustainability
body_text: I am an engineering professor at the University of Maryland and would like to have an Autodesk representative speak on Zoom at one of my classes. Do you have a contact for me? Thanks, Professor Schulman, nrs@umd.edu

title: Data connector for 3rd party ifc and navisworks files
body_text: It would be nice to be able to interrogate 3rd party ifc and navisworks files at a granular level, being able to link them to PowerBI for insights into parts, types, materials, etc.

title: ADC caching
body_text: Ability to just cahe select folders/files within a project.

title: Scrolling down file lists in folders restriction
body_text: Scrolling down folder lists shows up to 2000 files but then have to drag the scroll box down to see the next 200 files and so on, takes ages to see all the files in the folder if I have many thousands of files in one folder.

title: Settings for sahring files/folders in a template project
body_text: Switch on the settings for sharing files and folders with third parties in a project cannot be set in a template as a default. It must be done within each individual project in Docs > Settings > Advance settings.

title: ACC User Profile details not picking up user phone number.
body_text: User profile details not picking up user details/phone number from the user's main Autodesk account details in all cases. Also, the phone number is not in the regional format (e.g. UK format).

title: In Docs > Files, the Name field should widen to the full width of the longest file name
body_text: In Docs > Files, the Name field should widen to the full width of the longest file name when you open a folder. It is a drag having to widen the name field each time.

title: Bulk title block edit tool
body_text: A tool that could work within Docs that recognises/reads title blocks in dwg and rvt files and displays them in a list that could be edited. Similar to Sheets being able to read pdfs.

title: Prevent naming or renaming Docs files, Docs folders, ACC projects using unsupported characters.
body_text: It is currently possible to use unsupported characters when naming a project, file , folder, etc. which cause down stream issues. I suggest introducing a process which will alert a user the name they are inputting is not allowed (and why) and force a compliant name in order for it to be saved. https://www.autodesk.com/support/technical/article/caas/sfdcarticles/sfdcarticles/The-following-special-characters-aren-t-allowed-with-Revit-cloud-models.html

title: Use the same icon for PDF files in Docs as Adobe.
body_text: Enough said!

title: ACC create new project - ability to typ he crrency type value in the curreny type field.
body_text: This is just a request to reduce the time it takes to create a new project, or alternatively put the local currency at the top of the ist (say based on the Windows language setting).

title: Associations to the Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrato and Premire desktp apps.
body_text: Currently there are no associations between the files types of Adobe Photoshop, InDesign, Illustrator and Premier with the applications used to edit these file types. The associations need to be ceated so that these file types when stored in ACC or BIM 360 open the applications associated with them.

title: Forms // Missing the vertical scroll bar
body_text: Just a really simple request to ensure that Forms have a right-hand vertical scroll bar on the UI. All of other ACC UIs have this, so the Forms is the odd one out. Not everyone uses a mouse or knows how to scroll on a trackpad, so these users instead use what they know which is via the UI scroll bar.

title: Meetings Topic Assignee
body_text: When assigning a meeting topic to someone, you should be able to click "assignee" and then start typing right away instead of having to click in the text box of "add item assignees"

title: Designs Pool
body_text: So I actually share my GLB files with potential customers to allow them to view and get measurements from my products on the 3D Autodesk Viewer wich is linked on my website. A "designs pool" would be a unique URL to share with my customers that contains all the designs I want to share with them including notes on the features if needed. So if they turn the product the notes I added ome up in a bubble, for example.

title: Export CSV of all files in a cloud folder
body_text: There is no easy way to find all of the files uploaded to a cloud project folder unless you click into each subfolder. It would be great to have a csv export that lists all the file names of what's in the cloud project folder.

title: Asset Markups having dimension markups
body_text: If I'm tracking installation, having area, counts or linear feet based on markups would be helpful. Maybe something to turn off/on or in properties? Or a field you can turn on/off in the Asset Category settings?

title: Asset Markups have Measurements
body_text: If I'm tracking installation, having area, counts or linear feet based on markups would be helpful. Maybe something to turn off/on or in properties? Or a field you can turn on/off in the Asset Category settings?

title: Asset Markups have Measurements
body_text: If I'm tracking installation, having area, counts or linear feet based on markups would be helpful. Maybe something to turn off/on or in properties? Or a field you can turn on/off in the Asset Category settings?

title: ACC指摘事項
body_text: ACC指摘事項を3Dの図面に書いた場合Revit上の3Dのビューにしか表示されないため、平面図ビューの方にも表示したい

title: Project Tool Start Default // Only half works
body_text: In the September 2024 release , there is an improvement to the Project Home page where you select projects. The improvement was to the 'Default access' column which now includes Tool selection, not just the product. Problem is, it only half works. If opening the project from this Project Home page, it works as expected. If opening the project from the project selector at the top of the screen while in a project, it doesn't work. It would be good if the project selector while in a project obeyed

title: Android App // Markup Text missing ENTER key on keyboard
body_text: This appears to be an Android App specific issue that needs to be addressed. When adding a markup that has Text, the keyboard does not have an ENTER key. The problem this creates is unformatted text. Adding Line Returns adds space between information, which in turn adds clarity for the viewer. I can't say for sure, but I suspect that the Android App is presenting a Single-Line text box, and therefore the system is providing the appropriate keyboard. This issue does not exist in iOS or the Deskto

title: Permitir Scroll abra en otra ventana cualquier documento
body_text: Buen día, Sería muy útil la posibiliada de que con la rueda del mouse (scroll), al igual que en todo navegador, puedas utilizarlo con solo seleccionar el archivo, en cualquier lado de la plataforma, puedas abrirlo en otra pestaña, o que con el botón secundario (derecho) te de la opción. Desde ya muchísimas gracias.

title: export/import issues with BCF file (General Panel / NWC)
body_text: First, Allow to export/import issues with BCF file from Issues panel (general) without 3D model combination requirement, allowing a issues follow-up at control panel level; Second; Allow to Export/import issues with BCF file in 3D models using *.NWC format .

title: Improve Model Coordination Viewer Performance
body_text: Opening a model through Docs, or even opening a Model Coordination View that has been "Saved to Docs" works really well and is smooth. However, opening the same models within the Model Coordination module (in a Coordination Space) is laggy and the frame rate suffers. The Model Coordination viewer should be on par with the other model viewers, especially since that is the module where model analysis is being performed and being able to fly around smoothly is essential.

title: Really? Only 25 projects?
body_text: On the ACC Projects landing page, please let me see more than 25 projects at a time. Better yet, don't even use pages. Just let it be a scrolling list that shows all your projects at once. Or at the VERY least, let me choose how many projects I see per page. Like, 100 or 200 or something. I realize that once I select a project and go into Docs, there is a dropdown list that you can scroll through ALL your projects without flipping through pages... but why does the landing page not also function

title: Custom field notification
body_text: In issues, I would like the possibility to be notified for the custom fileds I created. For now, I have to review all issues to see if custom fileds has been filled

title: Model Coordination - Saved View in App
body_text: When in the Model Coordination module, if a View is Saved to Docs, that view is not availablein the ACC app. If models need to be shared with others, they need to be saved as specific files (.nwc, .rvt, .ifc, etc.), which limits the usefulness of the Model Coordination module, especially when trying to make specific subsets of models available for field use.

title: Added feature to edit zip file name when downloading file
body_text: My customer uses the "Share - anyone with the link" function to share data with a partner. Their folder name is quite long, please see the attached - When downloading a zip file, the zip file's name will be the folder's name with the "date + time" the file was downloaded. EX: "Folder name + date + time".zip - After downloading, my customer cannot view the PDF file in a zip file due to a long path error when they open directly the PDF file in the zip file. The path shown on File Explore of the wi

title: Assets - Reorder columns or change order
body_text: At present, it is not possible to re-order columns, only select to display them on/off. Please replicate the behaviour used elsewhere in ACC, e.g. in Docs, where the column order can be sorted by dragging each column header to change the order. Example in Assets: Example in Docs of desired behaviour:

title: S Curve as a Dashboard in Insights
body_text: I would like to add an idea whereby the client stated that the S Curve would be a crucial Dashboard of a project hence why it should be along with the other Dashboards on the Insights of the Project. Client highlighted where the Insight should compile all necessary dashboards of a project hence the efficiency of the top level management to view the summary (Dashboards) at a glance. Therefore, the idea of having the S Curve (Chart in Cash Flow of Forecast) to be in the Insights as a Dashboard.

title: Consultant Control in BIM360/Autodesk Docs/ACC
body_text: When our project is in the architect's server, we don not want them to have the ability to open and access our proprietary details, families, and other information unique to our company. When we share packages, we share only model information, but it doesn't matter if other consultants, in particular the server owner, can still download our source file at any time. There needs to be a way to ensure that only members of the company that uploaded the model can access it, and only that which is sha

title: Optional supplier invite
body_text: Hi there, Could you please add in an option when adding a supplier/contact to a project, of being sent an invite? It is not always necessary, especially in our case, for a supplier/contact to be sent an invite and it creates a lot of confusion from them. I get many emails/phone calls about it. There is the option to send contacts an email when an PO/invoice has been accepted, so would like this to be the same for setting up a contact in a project. Many thanks!

title: RFIs referenced attachment markup tools - blank page needed
body_text: In the reference attachment within RFIs there is markup tools to add text and shapes to existing document. Can we have the ability to add a blank page if we need to add additional information for our markups (like submittals allows you to add a blank page and rearrange pages as needed).

title: Doc Package Externally Shareable
body_text: In order to keep project directories, it would be incredibly valuable to share Packages (not Design Collab, but Docs) externally like we can with a folder.

title: Form Rejection - include option for why
body_text: When a Form is submitted, the comments lock down. If the reviewer returns the Form, there is no place to put why it is being returned.

title: ACC APP
body_text: Issue: Unable to sign-in directly for the first time on Apple Devices via the ACC APP, users needs to authenticate via the browser for the first time before they can login to the APP. Can this be fixed and have a app based in built browser which allows users to authenticate and directs them back to the ACC App when they are switching between data centers. Thanks,

title: Hide Elements While in Clash Detection
body_text: When going through clash detection, it would be nice to have the ability to still hide elements in the model. For example, I want to hide the roof to look at an object that is conflicting with the steel joist and I cannot hide the roof.

title: Account admin access to projects
body_text: At our firm we have the need for Account admins to be able to access Autodesk docs in each project without adding him/herself to each project as a member. This would greatly improve the quality control work and general overview of administrators.

title: Add Ability to Generate ISSUEs via Table Format
body_text: Our clients perform reviews using Bluebeam and export comments in table format (Excel or CSV). With a feature to import table-based comments (aligning sheet, issue type, X & Y locations on the sheet, owner, assigned to, etc) we could quickly convert a long list of comments into action items. Even if we needed to fill in some missing fields, the process could save our team a lot of time.

title: connect to file explorer
body_text: Add the ability to connect a project to windows explorer directly from the website rather than through Desktop Connector. Microsoft Sharepoint has this option. Or in addition, add a button to the welcome to the project email to immediately add the project to windows explorer.

title: Coordination Views To be Live for all Users
body_text: I would like an update where all users if they are the author of views created in ACC Cordination views that they can open them as view and keep live rather than only having the option to save as NWF.

title: Takeoff Revit Specify 3D View to Publish
body_text: The options for Takeoff determining which 3D view to use when publishing a Revit model are pretty limiting and the user has no control over it. A preferred option would be to specify which 3D view in the Revit model you want to use in Takeoff.

title: Locations // Move between parent locations (i.e. Tiers)
body_text: Currently, Locations cannot be moved between other parent locations, i.e. Tiers. This can have a negative impact on the project should there be a late design change, or if you may want to change/improve the hierarchy of the locations. e.g. Here is a starting structure. Project |-- Tier 1 | |-- Location 1 | |-- Location 2 |-- Tier 1 | |-- Location 3 Here is what I may want to change it to. Project |-- Tier 1 | |-- Location 1 | |-- Tier 2 | |-- Location 2 |-- Tier 1 | |-- Location 3

title: Forms // Expandable navigation panel
body_text: The truncation of template names in the navigation panel seriously needs to be addressed. The panel needs to be resizable.

title: Photos // Add Schedule to the Referenced By filter
body_text: This is a super simple request to please add Schedule as a source to the Referenced By filter in Photos. The use case is when you add photos as references to Schedule Activities, there needs to be a way to provide reports of those Schedule photos. e.g. a Weekly report from the past 7 days. Obviously, I would also like more detailed photo reporting from the Schedule itself, regarding certain Activities. However, this request for better Photo filtering should be an easier first step.

title: Model Coordination Coordination Space Edit and Sort
body_text: Need to be able to edit a Coordination Space after it is created. Edit the name, edit the folder it points to, etc. I accidentally selected the wrong folder when I created a Coordination Space, and now I can't change it. I also can't deactivate it and create a new one because it is giving a duplicate name error. Also need to be able to sort the list of Coordination Spaces instead of having them appear in reverse order of creation.

title: Allow Images to be added to Projects and companies on APAC server
body_text: Allow image icon / thumbnails to be added to Projects and companies on APAC server

title: Show links button on the Desktop and iOS (Device)
body_text: We have some serious hyperlinking going on with our Construction documents (which is great! - Thank you Autodesk) however because there are so many, the thumbnails consistently pop up as you are moving your finger or mouse over the document. This is a user experience request from our site team. They would love the option (like the turn off markups function) to turn off links as they are navigating around the document. This is particularly annoying on devices where the "canvas" is much smaller.

title: Access Levels and App support for Microsoft Store
body_text: Hello, here at Perry Building Contractors we give people the freedom to use whatever brand/type of device that people prefer. One of our Project Managers here prefers the Surface or Surface Pro but wanted to have the app on it instead of having to go through a web browser. A whole other issue that keeps on arising is from the Access Levels/Permissions on each new project. We want an easy way to adjust permissions of a general role, so when they are added as a member, the permissions for forms, f

title: Submittal reports include Submittal Number
body_text: For Submittal reports/exports the information should include the Submittal Number.

title: Asset Naming to Allow Multiple Parameters
body_text: When we are mapping our model to assets we've uncovered an unfortunate limitation with the naming of the asset. Currently we use 3 parameters to concatenate our equipment (for very good reason). Equipment Identifier, Equipment Location, Equipment Number i.e AHU-01-01 This allows us to gain more control of our filters when viewing and scheduling. Generally the Identifier is a "type" parameter and the others being instance. Unfortunately you cannot add more than 1 parameter to the name. The "worka

title: Add Permission Control for PUBLISH
body_text: Only the Model Manager should be authorized to publish the model to ACC from within Revit. While modellers can still contribute to the modelling process, they should not have permission to publish the model to ACC.

title: Enhanced File Security for Files inside Cost Management Module
body_text: Autodesk Build should integrate advanced file security measures directly into the platform's cost management module. Currently, while there are options for external integrations with security apps, having robust, built-in file security features is crucial for safeguarding sensitive financial data. Without additional cost to the users, the platform should be able to prevent the downloading or editing of sensitive documents and the watermarking or embedding of user information when these files are

title: Blockchain for 3D endorsements
body_text: As of today, 3D models have no endorsement. Drawings are endorsed by Professional Engineers on 2D. When they are being printed and distributed, we ensure that the drawings are the approved and accountable. However, 3D models are distributed with various version and downloaded multiple times. Most of the time, customers will be using ACC to view the federated models via ACC. However, when they are distributing among task team or construction team, the models are being downloaded with changes and

title: Document Profiling
body_text: ACC Document Controller Friendly Document controllers need to track all the data progress. Unfortunately it can only be done if the file goes through review and there file is being approved at the same location. However in reality, the document will be copied to another folder once it is approved and another approval workflow is created for the new folder. Therefore, there is a lost of chain in document as it progresses. ACC needs document profiling that has a continuous chain from one folder to

title: View payment applications (Budget and Cost) in yearly view (not per period)
body_text: Please add the ability to view payment applications in a yearly view, not just per billing period, and to extract this yearly view into XLS format. This enhancement would provide a comprehensive overview of financial transactions over the entire year, allowing for better analysis and strategic planning. Being able to export this yearly data would facilitate easier reporting, auditing, and sharing of information with stakeholders, ultimately leading to more efficient financial management.

title: Add 'Forms' to Docs (for Design)
body_text: It's been said many times on this forum and by many people that there are numerous tools in Build that need to be made available to Docs for design use. This includes Forms. When you think about Forms in the build process you understand that they are used for Quality and Safety records. That is, a Form is a record of activities or compliance to ensure that onsite procedures are done correctly. The same applies to the design stages of a project that are performed in Docs, Design Collaboration, or

title: Make it easier to select the Regional Data Storage Location for new & existing projects
body_text: Hello, We welcome the recent news for a Regional Data Storage Location in Australia. However the steps involved in migrating projects to this storage location and even migrating the administrators account so that they can create new projects in Australia is close to impossible. Our current projects located in the US are still painfully slow to access even with super fast NBN. So we are quite keen to get the migrations happening.

title: ACC Forms Excel Report Update
body_text: At the time of extracting a form report in ACC, it would be really helpful, if Autodesk can incorporate a Assigned column in the excel report. So that it can be easier for us to track the templates that are assigned to whom.

title: Saved Search Hyperlinks
body_text: Generate hyperlinks for saved searches.

title: Remove extra stop when changing from a B360 to an ACC project
body_text: Currently users switching from a project done in B360 Docs to another done in ACC Docs, find themselves in an ACC projects breakdown asking for which project the user wants to work in. To make this experience even worse the order in which the projects are presented differs from the list where the user had previously already selected the project. What is more, is that the list inside the B360 dropdown menu shows little project thumbnails, the ACC list does not.

title: Autodesk BuildのミーティングスケジュールをGoogle カレンダーと自動リンクさせるようにしたい
body_text: Buildのミーティング機能で、設定した会議の開催日時を「招待者」のGoogle カレンダーに予定が入るようにしたい。 もしくは、ビデオ会議の「リンクを追加」したときに、ビデオ会議側で設定した日時がBuildの アジェンダに反映されるようにしたい。

title: Workflow Review in Issues
body_text: I think it would be helpful to add worflow review that will show the full response from the assigned person and in addition , to sync it to status field that will automatically change to "In progres" and closed accordingly. Right now we to needs change the status manualy and it's very difficult with a lot of issues, and the response field exist only in comment or in custom field created with no restricted premession that anyone can fill.

title: Assigning Clash issues to whoever uploaded the file
body_text: When doing clash detection in ACC (or navisworks with the coordination add-in) what if you had an option to assign the issue/clash to whoever uploaded that file without having to search in a long list of project members?

title: Filter for Map View
body_text: Currently the filters applied in under the Gallery tab in Photos does not apply to the map view. It appears to contain the info in the URL but it actually doesn't filter anything.

title: QA Review Functionality & Workflow Through Docs Review Tool
body_text: Hi, I would like to add functionality to undertake a review of Contractors QA through the review tool in ACC Docs. (Note * indicates where functionality requirements are currently needed) I would like to be able to perform the following: 1. Receive Contractors QA Documentation (Lot pack) 2. Upload QA Doc to Files tool 3. Create a Review and attach QA Documents 4*. Undertake a review and approve conforming docs if documents are missing or nonconformance's are identified I would like to be able to

title: Connecting issues and markers
body_text: We place markers in the published plans and want to link them to issues. The aim is for the markers to have the same status as the issues and for only current markers to be visible at all times

title: Issues Assignemtn on Mobile
body_text: On the Desktop version you can have a file open and assign an "issue" to a specific spot or file that is assigned to that file directly. The mobile version requires you to exit the file, open the issues tab, create an issue, and then assign the file to it. Why not add the issues option directly to the file? I noticed this already works on PDF's, but why not add it as a feature to .idw, .nwd, and .ipt files? (Specifically, regarding Mobile App)

title: ACC Model Coordination Clash Matix_Hide or Off Function
body_text: The ACC model coordination reports the number of clash groups between two models between primary model on vertical and horizontal column and I noticed that it was providing duplicated reports with different values depending on which primary model. The user must have an option to choose which clash will be show by having Hide function or not to run the Clash in ACC Model coordination Clash Matrix.

title: ACC - Crear incidencias con Build en los Modelos 3D con dispositivos móviles.
body_text: Dear. The use of ACC on mobile devices becomes increasingly necessary to boost the collaborative workflow between the office and projects that are under construction. For this reason, it is suggested to add the incident tool to 3D models in the same way that incidents are generated in PDF files. The Workflow would be substantially improved to communicate the inconsistencies of the 3D model with what is being done in construction. I attach an image with the explanation. Estimad@s. El uso de ACC e

title: Parameter Services - Assignable schedule properties
body_text: It would be great if we could assign schedule properties to each parameter. This would allow for the quick creation of schedules with consistency. Schedule Properties such as: Column Width Formatting tab values (Heading, Orientation, Alignment, Field Format, etc.)

title: Add Functionality to Pull Previous Data into forms and reports
body_text: Add the ability to pull data from a date range into site reports and forms. This would be useful for assessing program delays due to wet weather etc.

title: Exported Form Title and Key Information
body_text: When exporting forms from ACC, the header of the form just says (form details) and the title is simply the form template name. Ideally, when exporting the forms, the title page would have KEY information displayed. For example, if the title page has the actual form title (Site Instruction No. 12 - Tree Relocation) rather then the template title (Site Instruction Template)

title: Assets // Better use of the 'Model' attribute
body_text: I have a very long list of Assets that have been linked in from numerous models. Each asset when selected will show which model it belongs to, and, the asset list Filters has an option to filter to selected models. However, even after filtering the list to selected models, the Export process will export All assets. Just as the label on the button says it will. I request two enhancements when working with the Models attribute. Allow the export of only the assets that are shown/filtered in the ass

title: Objects settings
body_text: Why can't you save the settings for the objects (categories, user-defined fields, status groups) across projects?

title: 差分チェックの機能について
body_text: ACC内のドキュメント表示で利用できる「比較」に関しまして、2つほど提案いたします。 １．差分チェック時に表示される図面番号を整列する 差分チェックをする際に、Revit内の図面を選ぶ時に、図面番号順で表示ができませんでした。 サポートセンターにも問い合わせましたが、仕様でそうなっているとのことですので、ご対応いただけますと幸いです。 ２．差分チェック時の書面と図面の比較について 「比較」を利用してA4サイズの書面とA3サイズの図面を並べて見ようとすると、左側で選択した書面のサイズに合わせて、右側の図面が引き伸ばされる（もしくは縮む）といった現象が起きます。並べて表示にした際に、サイズが戻る、といった対応ができませんでしょうか。

title: Searching in Properties
body_text: Sometimes the properties of elements within the viewer are quite hard to filter and hard to search in. It would be helpful to have a search option within the Properties pallette in the Autodesk Viewer.

title: Overwrite Takeoff types
body_text: When importing Takeoff types out of a different project, currently importing a Takeoff type with the same name will create a new take off type with (1) after the corresponding name. It would be helpful if it is possible to overwrite the existing Takeoff type and automate that kind of workflow.

title: Edit Asset Status Set
body_text: Currently you cannot Edit the Status Set of an Asset. If you mistakenly apply the Status Set, you have to delete the Asset and remake it to change the Status Set. See the attached image for context.

title: "Model is Empty" pop-up improvement
body_text: When you add a model to a View in Model Coordination and it has no geometry, you get a "Model is empty" pop-up. This is fine if you are adding a single model, but if you are adding multiple models, the pop-up does not tell you which model is empty, despite the pop-up telling you to "Please contact the author". This pop-up window needs to include the specific model that is empty so the user can effectively resolve the issue.

title: Workflow Submittal Optional Reviewers to review on behalf (maybe set in permissions)
body_text: In our workflows, we setup optional reviewers to review a submittal in case the required reviewer is out sick or on PTO. It would be great if they could review on behalf of the required reviewer to keep the process moving to the next step, As it would take the submittal manager to move it along to the next step for the optional reviewer.

title: Validation of model data
body_text: Opportunity to to a validation the model data and that it is according to the requirement of the project.

title: Broadening ASL software
body_text: Currently the ASL software solely extracts specification data from the specification book. Broadening the functions of the code would diversify the functionality of the software you already have in place. Inputting the capacity for the software to extract all data, and organize it into an excel sheet where the information could be filtered by the various overarching categorizations (products, execution) would make Plangrid a unique software that offers reliable extraction of specification data f

title: Have a way from project in web browser to identify what release of Revit cloud models are in.
body_text: Have a way from project in web browser to identify what release of Revit cloud models are in. If Revit release isn't identified in file name, it is a guessing game as to which Revit release is being used for cloud models for a project.

title: BIM Collaborate Pro Folders
body_text: As a user with multiple client accounts, I would like to have a folder system that would identify the client and then all their projects would be housed under that client name. System admins can create a client folder. Then Client admins (a new role) would be able to add projects and users only to a client folder. When you open BIM as a client admin, you would only see the folder you have access to. Today, the admin function allows me to see all the projects, whether I am authorized to access or

title: Modelos 3D con NWC
body_text: 3D models do not display correctly when loaded in . nwc, If it is feasible to add the .NWD format to be able to coordinate with Model Coordination. The .NWD format allows us to have greater control over third-party 3D models and for this reason it could be better coordinated in ACC with Model Coordination. Los modelos 3D no se visualizan correctamente cuando se carga en formato. nwc, Si es factible agregar el formato .NWD para poder coordinar con Model Coordination. El formato .NWD nos termite t

title: Submittal Reviewer Groups
body_text: Currently it seems that only individuals can be assigned as a required reviewer or optional reviewer of a submittal. In reality, a review may be required from any one member of a group, but not each member of that group. For example, when a review by the structural engineer is required, that may be completed by one of a few different people within that company's project team. If ACC allowed a group to be created which contains each potential reviewer from a single consultant company, and then th

title: Add a note to BIM360 Ideas Hub advising to use this forum for ACC related ideas/support
body_text: Add a note to BIM360 Ideas Hub advising to use this forum for ACC related ideas/support

title: Add hyperlink to notification after file and folder action
body_text: When copying or moving a file/folder to a new folder, a green pop up notification appears in the upper right corner of the screen. It would be helpful if the folder/file name could be hyperlinked to the final destination folder to allow easier navigation of the folder structure. Current notification - Example Current ACC Notification following file copy Example Microsoft OneDrive example

title: allow measurement result indicating in mark-up of "Issue"
body_text: allow measurement result indicating in mark-up of "Issue" Measurement is one of the most concern topic for construction project. If we can easily include the measurement result in the mark-up of "Issue", which can facilitate the coordination.

title: Calendar View for ACC Cloud Health DashBoard
body_text: On the Autodesk Cloud Health Dash Boards: https://health.autodesk.com/, Autodesk should consider adding a calendar view on this site to show incidences much like how AWS has on their site: https://health.aws.amazon.com/health/status .

title: Toggle stroke in viewer
body_text: The in-browser viewer automatically adds a stroke (or border) to all objects on a page. When added to fonts, I'm not sure what the benefits are. Suggestion: provide an option to toggle stroke. The examples below are screenshots taken on a 2560x1440 px monitor in portrait mode at 100% scaling; each page occupies slightly less than half the height of the monitor (approximately 1,000 px). Document is scaled identically in Acrobat and ACC viewer. In Acrobat, all text is legible; in ACC, letters blee

title: what is guarantee to have latest openSSL included in software developed in rescent day
body_text: We are working on vulnerability remediation. 1. We see autodesk licensing application running on older open SSL. What is the guarantee to address this with latest open SSL.

title: Improving model browser organisation in Model Coordination
body_text: It would be a great help if when browsing the models inside a Model Coordination view, they were all broken down in a similar way. Currently, when adding native models (rvt or dwg) to a view, they are broken down by categories (rvt) or type of elements (lines, 3D objects, blocks for dwg). While when adding an nwc, they are broken down by level (if the nwc came from a revit file) or by layer (if the nwc came from a dwg file). I think that if we could have the native files broken down by level/lay

title: Sheet drawing number and title - allow user to draw locations BEFORE OCR
body_text: New user here, I looked everywhere, but can't figure it out if this feature is there or not, but it seems like I had to let the built in OCR try and fail before i had the option to draw the box around where the sheet number and sheet title boxes are. It would be very handy if we had the option to just tell the OCR "look here for the sheet number/title" and then let the OCR do it's thing.

title: Model Compare // Transform distance filter or heat map
body_text: Across the entire platform, the ability to Compare models is largely considered (where I work) a valuable feature. But when trying to understand 'transformed' changes, the value is not quite as high as what it could possibly be. A quick background for those who may not be aware. While comparing models, you can select an element to open the Object Change panel, and then at the bottom of the panel is an option to show the element in its previous version location. This way you can see how much and

title: Allow submittals to be forwarded
body_text: The GC sets who the submittals go to and sometimes it is the incorrect discipline or sometimes additional review is needed by more than one discipline. A permissions level should be added to allow someone else on the project team (e.g. AOR or a EOR) to forward submittals similar to the GC.

title: Design Collaborate // Timeline // Improve the 'Multiple Nodes' Representation
body_text: This idea is to improve the DC Timeline 'Multiple Node' representation to make it more informative so the user can decide whether to zoom/expand a node grouping. The focus of this idea is specifically on the last node. Looking at the below screenshot, it is unclear whether there are nodes that require review and consuming? Let me explain. A grouping of multiple nodes can be one of four combinations. All nodes are not consumed. All nodes are consumed. A combination, which may include multiple nod

title: Please add a filter so we can see if a checklist has an attachment.
body_text: Currently if I want to check if a checklist has an attachment I have to open each checklist individually and go to the attachments section to check. This can be very time consuming when there are a lot of checklists. Can you put in a filter like in the issues tab that shows whether an issue contains an attachment just by looking from the outside without going into the issue. Checklists currently without filter for attachments issues tab with filter for attachments

title: Assign Completion date to each section in Forms/Field Checklist
body_text: Assign Completion date to each section in Forms/Field Checklist, which will be linked to the project schedule & 3D model, which can suffice the need of 4D BIM in ACC itself.

title: Form (Field Checklist) to be linked with 3D model
body_text: Form (Field Checklist) to be linked with 3D model, can achieve the work done in the model. Once the Form is completed which is linked to the 3D model, automatically it will reflect in the model as work done/completed in the model itself for that specific activity to which Form/Checklist is initiated & linked to the 3D model, which will also be helpful for progress tracking.

title: a smart folder structure
body_text: Hey, One folder structure often has his limitations for a big company, that's why the search and filtering option is really great. And it's nice that you can save the search, but I do miss a possible "personalized folder structure" based on search and filtering from metadata.

title: Summary data to be fetched in the Home section of ACC for the projects managed in BIM 360
body_text: Kindly find below Queries for Summary data to be fetched in the Home section of ACC for the projects managed in BIM 360. As per below snap, in BIM 360 a project summary for a project member is displayed only for specific projects only, whereas in ACC, in the same Home section it is displayed for all projects in which the respective project member is added into.

title: More options for spreadsheet issue import
body_text: When importing issues found in other applications you can make use of spreadsheet formats. The columns available do not provide camera location and view direction though. The idea would be to remedy that.

title: It will be nice if in ACC DOCS Files "Shared folder" we could see popup list like in WIP folder (that will show files in review and rejected)
Let users change delimiter type on Assets export to CSV
body_text: Asset attribute values sometimes contain commas, which is hard to avoid, esplecially when the values are extracted from Revit models. When exporting those assets to a CSV file that uses comma as the only option for delimiter, the commas from the attribute values get mixed with the delimiting commas which makes the export unusable. Giving the users more delimiter options would prevent from these problems to occur.

title: Show a published views properties
body_text: In projects that are still work in progress, we often publish views especially if there are no sheets to be had yet. I just found that these published views do not show whether they are floor plans, rcps, sections or whatever. Users end up with many views all called Level 1 (depending on your localization). Those using ACC for design reviews or meetings are often times not identical with those using authoring applications and may not be able to tell them apart. The grand idea would be to show th

title: Assets - Barcode Custom Property
body_text: Allow additional barcode fields to be added as custom properties such that assets can have a barcode assigned at an individual level (e.g. structural member) but also at a group level (e.g. as part of packing list).

title: Date drop downs for sheets versions
body_text: The year dates for projects only goes back to 2004. We are using Build to archive projects for buildings of different ages, 1981, 1926, and 2019. All of these buildings are still in service and we want to include their history of projects to inform current ones.

title: ACC Docs
body_text: Dear All. ACC Docs allows you to load 3D Models very easily and in various formats, which helps to visualize quickly, but I see it as very necessary to be able to use the commenting tools in Docs and not necessarily have BIM Collaborate to perform and assign tasks. to the work team. Check the Status of comments etc. It is very necessary in ACC Docs. Customize texts, symbols, etc. When the respective comments are made on a 3D Model or the documents, it would be very good in order to adhere to the

title: Sort or report by a member to show projects they are working on
body_text: It would be helpful to be able to sort or have a report that illustrates what projects a member is associated with. Is this possible?

title: Assets // Rename the Barcode field
body_text: In the Assets > Settings > Custom Fields, the default fields for Manufacturer and Model can have their name changed. This is great as it allows customisation to meet client standards. But the Barcode field cannot be changed. This Idea is to allow changing the Barcode field so that its name can also adhere to client standards. A renamed Barcode field should continue to allow this field to be used for barcode scanning on the mobile app.

title: Model Coordination // Object Exclusions // Admins
body_text: I've recently been getting into the Object Exclusions, and for the most part it addresses the issue it was designed to solve. Which is, to reduce the number of elements that generates clashes. For coordination spaces which the Project Admin manages this process is fine. But for the coordination spaces of other Teams, such as for Design Collaboration, there is no way for those Teams to manage their own Object Exclusions. Particularly when their Team coordination space can be used by them either b

title: Re: Revit wish list
body_text: Dear Autodesk Wishlist Home & Design Collaboration Module: The size of the Package Description dialogue box . Please make this expandable . If you look at that site page, there is sooo much unused space in there. Looks pretty, but please can you give it more flexibility and User control. 1.1 and not being able to create a PDF of the Package shared, screengrabs are not cool, please help! The Upload dialogue box in the bottom right, needs to be expandable because you cant read the file name if its

title: RFI - Backlogging Functionalities by modifying automatic dates
body_text: Adjust RFI backlog capability by allowing date modifications of response date.
